igbo: Onyeka Ibe (amụrụ na Septemba 29, 1971) bụ onye amụrụ na Naijiria nke bụkwa onye America na-ese ihe

O nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii mgbe mbụ o gosipụtara ọrụ ya na National Gallery of Modern Art, Lagos A kọwara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe na-akpali akpali nke si na Sub-Saharan Africa pụta kemgbe afọ 1990, e nyere ya 'The Best SOLO Artist of the Year 2006' na International Artexpo New York
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2007, Art Business News kọwara ma kpọọ ya dịka otu n'ime 'Today's Top Artist'
Ibe nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Fine Arts na Mahadum Benin, Nigeria
A mụrụ Ibe na Septemba 29, 1971
A mụrụ ya n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe agha obodo Naịjirịa biri ma o tolitere na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na-emepe emepe nke a kwụsịrị na mberede
Ọ kọwara nna ya dị ka onye nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu, onye gbara ya ume ịchụso nka site na nwata
Ọrụ Pablo Picasso na Jackson Pollock metụtara ụdị nka ya na usoro ya

Onyeka Nwelue onye amụrụ na abalị iri-atọ na otu n’ọnwa mbụ n'afọ 1988, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye edemede nke Naijiria, onye akwụkwọ ya bụ Hip-Hop bu nani maka umuaka,ma turu ugo dịka ode akụkọ mere eme na 2015 nke Nigerian Writers ’Awards

Ọ gbanwere akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, Island of Happiness dịka ihe nkiri n’asụsụ Igbo, dịka Agwaetiti Obiụtọ wee merie Best Feature Film site n’aka onye ntụzịaka na 2018 Newark International Film Festival , a gakwara n'ihu ịhọpụta ya maka Best First Feature film nke Onye ntuziaka ya na nrite Ousmane Sembene maka Ihe Nkiri Kachasị Mma n'Asụsụ Afrika na 2018 Africa Movie Academy Awards
Ọ bụ ya guzobere La Cave Musik, aha ndekọ, nke dị na Paris
Nwelue gụrụ Sociology & Anthropology na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa, Nsukka wee nweta onyinye ọzụzụ mmụta ịgụmaka ntuziaka na Prague Film School na Czech Republic
Ugbu a ọ bụ osote prọfesọ na- eleta na Onye Nleta Ọmụma nke Africa literature na ọmụmụ ihe na Ngalaba Asụsụ Bekee nke Ngalaba nke humanities, Mahadum Manipur na Imphal, India
Ọ bụ onye nleta nyocha na Center for International Studies, Mahadum Ohio , ebe ọ gburu oge na Atens, Ohio
A hopụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke abụọ, maka akara ANA Prose Fiction Prize na 2018 ya na nchịkọta abụ ya, The Lagos Cuban Jazz Club, bụ ndị edepụtara aha maka ANA Poetry Prize n'otu afọ ahụ
A mụrụ Onyeka Nwelue na Ezeoke Nsu na Ehime Mbano na Imo State, Naịjirịa nye Honorable Sam Nwelue, onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na Knight nke St
Christopher na Lady Catherine Nwelue, onye nkuzi na Lay Reader
A mụrụ ya n'ime ezinụlọ nke nọ na ogo dị elu, ọ bụ nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụ isii nne na nna ya

Nne ya, onye a zụlitere n'ezina ụlọ ndị ama ama n'ọchịchị nke Obua Ajukwu (Ndanike), nke Oguta, bụ nwa nwanne nna Flora Nwapa, nke a na-ahụkarì dịka nwanyị Africa mbụ dere akwụkwọ nke ebipụtara na mba ụwa

Ndị nne na nna ya ochie bụ Origbudu SBC Obiora na Ogbuefi Odiso Obiora (née Nwakuche na nwanne nwanyị nke okenye bụ Maazị Gogo Nwakuche , di Nwapa nke abụọNwanne mama ya nke nwanyị, Prọfesọ Leslye Obiora, bụbu oṅye minista Naịjirịa n'ihe gbasara steel na mines
Nwelu gara Lagos mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii ịga Ememe Wole Soyinka , emesịa akowaara Noble laureate bụ Soyinka onye ọ bụ
Afọ ole na ole ka nke ahụ gasịrị, Nwelue gara India maka emume nke abụọ maka International Writers festival ’,site n'ọkpụkpọ òkù nke India Cultural Association
Nobel Laureate, Wole Soyinka ka bụ otu n'ime ndị onye nkwalite Nwelue dịka Nwelue kwuru,'Ọ gụọla ihe niile m bipụtara,'
O haziela nyocha nkeonwe nke ihe nkiri ya maka Nobel Laureate
A kowara ya dịka onye nkwado ụmụ nwanyị N'okwụ gbasara nkwuchite ọnụ ụmụ nwanyị
N'ajụjụ ọnụ, mgbe emechara The house of Nwapa, ọ sịrị 'Emere' The house of Nwapa', n'ihi na abụ m onye nkwuchite ọnụ Ụmụ nwanyị
Ekwenyere m na anyị niile hà nhata
Na mbido ọrụ ya, Nwelue dere maka The Guardian na Naịjirịa, ohere ndapụta nke Jahman Anikulapo nyere ya , onye nchịkọta/nhazi akụkọ nke Sunday Edition nke a maara dịka The Guardian na Sọnde
Nwelue na-anọchi anya onye na- ede akwụkwọ ọgụgụ, Priya Doraswamy nke Lotus Lane Literary Agency, nke dị na New Jersey
N’afọ 2012, Debbie Edwards nke Debbie Edwards Talent Management, bụ onye njikwa ya
Nwelue bidoro ide edemede mbụ ya, The Abyssinian Boy mgbe ọ nọ n’India
Akwụkwọ ahụ kọwaturu ihe ọ hụrụ na India dị ka onye ojii, mbipụta ya gosipụtara Nwelue dịka onye ama ama na mba ụwa
The Abyssinia Boy nwetara ntụle dị egwu na isi akwụkwọ akụkọ Naịjirịa na India dịka ('akụkọ Greek') na Hindu ('the Indian ethos are original')

Akwụkwọ nke abụọ ya bụ akụkọ n'amaokwu ma onye ọdee abụ Britain-Hungaria bụ George Szirtes kọwara ya dịka 'breathless'Nwelue gazuru ala iri-abuo n’ise na Europe n’afo 2014, n’ịkwalite akwụkwọ a, asụgharịrị ya n’asusu Italia, Spanish, Igbo na Yoruba
Nsụgharị a bụ site n'aka onye edemede Venezuelan bụ Alberto Quero, e bipụtara ya na Peru, ebe ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Cusco Book Fair na 2015

Nwelue sooro ndị egwu na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru La Cave Musik wee gaa mba dị iche iche iji zute ndị egwu dị iche iche ma wepụta akwụkwọ ḿgbaha kowara ọtụtụ ihe, nke na-akọwapụta nzụkọ ya onye na ndị egwu na ndị na-akwalite egwu
E wepụtara ya na Jenụwarị 2015 ka ọtụtụ kwadoro ya
E kwupụtara n'erelari otu nde
O weputara otu ihe omuma nke kowara ndụ Flora Nwapa, nwanyị Afrịka mbụ dere akwụkwọ n’olu bekee
A họpụtara ya dịka akwụkwọ ederede ihe ọmụma kachasi nke 2017 Africa Movie Academy Awards
Na ngwụcha ọnwa Ọgọstụ, afọ 2017, Nwelue kwuputara site na edemede na o kechiri ihe nkiri nke ọhụụ ya, 'Island of Happiness, nke sitere na obere akụkọ n'ewepụtabeghi
Ka afọ asaa nke DADA Books bipụtara The Boy Abyssinian, Nwelue bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ọhụụ bụ'The Beginning of Everything Colourful
Mgbe ọ laghachiri India, Nwelue debara na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa, Nsukka, iji mụọ Sociology & Anthropology

O lekọtara Sandwich Class nke English Language Department nke Mahadum Lagos dịka ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke FilmAfrique, ihe mmalite nke ihe nkiri Afrika, nke Africa Film Academy bipụtara, ndị na-elekọta Africa Movie Academy Awards
E nyere ya ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ onye ntuziaka n'efu na Prague Film School na Czech Republic
Kemgbe ọganihu nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ya ,Nwelue sonyere dee ihe nkiri Namaste Naija, nke Teco Benson duziri wee mee ya na Hyderabad na Lagos ma bụrụ nke Lilian Bach mepụtara
O sokwa chepụta echiche obere ihe nkiri, The Beginning of Everything Colourful ya na onye omee Britain na onye nlere anya ejiji Dudley O'Shaughnessy
Na mbido afọ 2012, e debanyere Nwelue na Pontas Agency na Spain
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Blue & Hills Consultancy, nke ọ na-elekọta La Cave Musik
Site na Blue & Hills, egosipụtara ya na MTV Meets MTN ya na Ben Mụrray BruceNdị ọrụ Nwelue haziri Bayelsa Book & Craft Fair nke mbụ na mbụ ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ntụzi
Ọ malitekwara idezi na ibipụta FilmAfrique, bụ ihe nkiri mbụ na sinima Afrika, nke ndị nyere Nkwado ego bụ Africa Film Academy, ndị na-ahụ maka nhazi ihe nkiri Africa Movie Academy (AMAA)
N’ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2016, ihe nkiri Nwelue dere maka Flora Nwapa, nke akpọrọ The House of Nwapa, bidoro na Harare, Zimbabwe
Kemgbe o biputere The Abyssinian Boy na 2009, Nwelue jiiri otutu oge ya kwuo okwu na mmemme, emume na ọgbakọ dị iche iche
Ka a kpọchara ya na emume agụmagụ nke Man Hong Kong, a jụrụ ịnye Nwelue visa na Hong Kong, nke butere itimkpu ndị mgbasa ozi, ihe kpatara nke bụ ikpaoke ọdịdị anụahụ ya
Agbanwere mkpebi ahụ ma ọ nwetara visa ịga ememme ahụ
N’afọ 2017, ụmụ nwoke ndị agha mekpara Nwelue ahu n’ihi na ọ chọrọ igbochi ha idina onye ji ahụ ya achụnta ego n'ike
Otu afọ mgbe nke a gasịrị, e jidere Nwelue n'ụlọ ezumike nke Onomo Hotel na Kigali wee tụọ ya mkpọrọ ụbọchị asatọ, maka ebubo 'na-okparịrị Onye isi ala Rwandan, Paul Kagame na Twita na RwandAir
A tọhapụrụ ya site na ntinye ọnụ nke onye isi ala Naịjirịa, Olusegun Obasanjo
Tupu e jide ya, ọ bụ onye nkuzi afọ ofufo na Kwetu Film Instịtut, nke onye na-emepụtai ihe nkiri, Eric Kabera hiwere
N'ọnwa mbụ nke February 2018, ka oji otu ụbọchị gafee ụbọchị ncheta ọmụmụ ya nke afọ iri atọ ya , Onyeka nwere ihe mberede okporo ụzọ, nke o nwetara ọtụtụ mmerụ ahụ na mgbara azụ ya
Ọ nọ na oche ọlụsị ọnwa abụọ,tupu ojiri ihe eji enyere njem aka eme njem

Onyeka Okongwu (/oʊnˈjɛkə oʊˈkɒŋɡwu/ ohn-YEH-kə oh-KONG-gwoo; amụrụ na onwa Disemba 11, na afọ 2000) bụ onye America ọkachamara basketball player maka Atlanta Hawks nke National Basketball Association (NBA)
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji maka USC Trojans
Okongwu bụ onye mbido afọ anọ na Chino Hills High School na California, na-egwuri egwu n'akụkụ Lonzo na LaMelo Ball
Dị ka onye ọhụrụ, o nyeere ndị otu ya aka imeri n'asọmupi steeti ma nweta ihe ịga nke ọma mba, mgbe a na-akpọ ya MaxPreps co-National Freshman of the Year
N'oge ya nke obere na nke okenye, Okongwu duuru Chino Hills gaa n'ọkwa steeti abụọ ọzọ, na-enweta nsọpụrụ California Mr
Basketball
ESPN na Rivals weere ya dị ka onye natara kpakpando ise
N'otu oge kọleji ya, Okongwu gbara bọọlụ maka USC ma kpọọ aha ya na otu mbụ All-Pac-12
Okongwu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Chino Hills dị na Chino Hills, California wee malite na otu egwuregwu basketball kemgbe oge ọhụrụ ya
N'afọ mbụ ya, ya na ụmụnne nwoke Lonzo, LiAngelo, na LaMelo Ball bụ ndị otu, bụ ndị nyere aka bulie ndị otu ahụ n'ime ihe ngosi mba
Ndị otu ya bụ ndị mbụ na mba ahụ na ndekọ iri atọ na ise-0 ma weghara California Interscholastic Federation (CIF) Open Division state title
Okongwu kesara MaxPreps National Freshman of the Year na onye otu ya, LaMelo Ball, mgbe ọ nwesịrị nkezi 79, 72 rebounds, na 31 blocks kwa egwuregwu
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ nke abụọ, Okongwu nyeere Chino Hills aka iru CIF Southern Section Open Division semifinals na CIF State Southern Regional semifinals
N'oge obere ya, ọ duuru ndị otu ya gaa CIF Southern Section I na CIF Division I championships
Ọ na-enweta akara ịrị abụọ na asatọ, iri na anọ rebounds, na blocks anọ n'egwuregwu ọ bụla, na-enweta California Mr
Basketball na USA Today All-USA California first team honours
Dị ka onye okenye, Okongwu duuru Chino Hills gaa na nke abụọ na asọmupi CIF Southern Section Division I na nke abụọ ya na CIF Division I state title
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị akara ịrị abụọ na asaa, rebounds iri na otu , blocks 43, na enyemaka anọ n'egwuregwu ọ bụla, ọ kwughachiri dị ka California Mr
Basketball, na-aghọ onye ọkpụkpọ nke ise mere ya, ma nata USA Today All-USA California mbụ
Okongwu mechara oge ọhụrụ ya site na onyinye igba basketball kọleji maka UCLA na USC
Na onwa Mee ubochi nke iri na anọ, n'afọ 2018, o tinyere aka na USC n'elu UCLA na Arizona State
A dọtara ya na mmemme ahụ n'ihi ịdị nso ya na ndị nkuzi ya
Okongwu hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị ka onye natara kpakpando ise na ESPN na Rivals na dị ka onye nwetara kpakpando anọ na 247Sports
Okongwu guzobere onwe ya ozugbo dị ka onye egwuregwu kachasị mma na USC

Na mbido kọleji ya na na onwa Nọvemba ụbọchị nke ise, n'afọ 2019, o dekọrọ akara ịrị abụọ, ịrị na atọ rebounds na ihe ndekọ ụlọ akwụkwọ asatọ iji duru ndị Trojans gaa mmeri ịrị asaa na asaa- iri anọ na asatọ na Florida A&M
Ọ ghọrọ onye ọkpụkpọ USC mbụ biputere okpukpu abụọ na mbido ya kemgbe Taj Gibson na afọ 2006
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Nọvemba, o nwetara akara iri atọ na atọ kachasị elu, gụnyere iri na asaa n'efu, na mmeri 91-84 Pepperdine
Ọrụ ahụ nyeere ya aka inweta onye egwuregwu Pac-12 Conference na onye ọhụrụ nke izu na Nọvemba 25
Na onwa Disemba 1, Okongwu dekọrọ akara 27 na 12 n'ime 14 ịgba égbè, 14 rebounds na blocks atọ na mmeri 77-62 na Harvard na Orlando Invitational
O nwetara akara 28, 24 n'ime ha bịara na ọkara nke abụọ, wee jide 12 rebounds na mmeri Disemba 15 na Long Beach State
Otu ụbọchị mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a kpọrọ Okongwu Pac-12 freshman nke izu maka oge nke abụọ ya
Amụrụ Onyeka Onwenu n' ụbọchi iri na asaa n' ime onwa ise n' ime afor 1952
Ọ bụ onye Naijiria, Ọ na-agu egwu, na-ede abụ ma na-eme ihe egwuruegwu
Ọ bụkwa onye nta akụkọ, bụrụkwa onye ndorondoro ochichi obodo
o bu onye oka ikpe na ihe ejiji X factor
O bu onye nkasi nwa ohurnru nwa nwayi nke onye nwere ozuzu na ihe nmuta nsi na Naijiria, papa Onyeka Onwenu bukwa onye ndorondoro ochichi, Afa nna Onyeka Onwenu bu D
Onwenu
Ndi nta akuko na akpokwa ya 'enenebe eje oru', obukwa onye isi npugoro apu na Imo State Council for arts and Culture, ugbua, obu onye isi kacha na ulo oru ihe gbasara oganairu umu nwayi

Onyema Ugochukwu // (na-ege ntị) CON (amụrụ na abali iteolu n'ime ọnwa iri na otu, n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri anọ n'anọ) (9/11/1944) bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba, onye nta akụkọ, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ugochukwu jere ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche na nkwukọrịta nye onye isi ala Naijiria Olusegun Obasanjo na onye isi oche mbụ nke Niger Delta Development Commission (NDDC)

N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa abụọ n'afọ puku abụọ n'asatọ (25/2/2008), ụlọ ikpe ntuli aka nke steeti Abia kwupụtara na Ugochukwu bụ onye mmeri nke ntuli aka gọvanọ nke steeti emere na afọ puku abụọ n'asaa (2007) na Gọvanọ a họpụtara nke steeti abia

Otú ọ dị, na abali iri n'otu, n'ime ọnwa abụọ n'afọ puku abụọ n'iteolu (11/2/2009) ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị ikpe na Port Harcourt kagburu mkpebi ahụ, ma kwupụta na Theodore Orji nke PPA meriri ntuli aka ahụ n'ezie
A mụrụ Onyema Ugochukwu na abalị iteolu, n'ime ọnwa iri na otu, n'afọ otu puku, nari iteolu na iri anọ n'anọ (9/11/1944) na Ohuhu, Umuahia, Abia Steeti, Nigeria
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Naijiria, Nsukka, nwete nzere nke BSc na Economics
Ọ lụrụ alụmalụ di na nwunye ma nwee ụmụ anọ

Ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke sochiri ọchịchị ndị agha mbụ n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri isii n'isii (1966) batara n'agha obodo mgbe mpaghara ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria kewapụrụ dịka Republic of Biafra otu afọ ka e mesịrị
Ugochukwu debanye aha na ndị agha Biafra wee ruo ọkwa onyeisi ala tupu agha ebie n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asaa (1970)
Mgbe Ugochukwu gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji, e were ya dị ka onye enyemaka nyocha akụ na ụba nke ụlọ akụ etiti nke naijirịa Central (CBN)
Ọ nọrọ na CBN afọ abụọ tupu ọ gbahapụrụ ọrụ na-ekwe nkwa na akụ na ụba iji gbasoo ezi mmasị ya, akwụkwọ akụkọ
Ugochukwu sonyeere otu Business Times dị ka onye nyocha akụ na ụba na onye ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ nke ihe ga-emesị bụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ gbasara ego na Naịjirịa
Ugochukwu ruru n'ọkwa wee bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ akwụkwọ akụkọ Business Times n'afọ otu puku, nari iteolu na iri asaa n'asaa ruo otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asatọ n'abụọ (1977 ruo 1982)

N'afọ otu puku, nari iteolu na iri asatọ n'atọ (1983), Ugochukwu ghọrọ Editor na Chief nke akwụkwọ akụkọ West Africa nke dị na Lọndọn, ebe o dere ọtụtụ ihe gbasara mmepe, iji nye nghọta nke ọma maka nsogbu ụgwọ n'Afrịka
O mechara laghachi Naịjịria ka ọ bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ n'isi nke Daily Times of Nigeria ma emesịa họpụtaya na bọọdụ ya dịka onye isi nchikwa nke ndị ọrụ na mmepe
Ọ lara ezumike nkà na akwụkwọ akụkọ n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n'anọ (1994) dika onye isi nchikwa nke mbipụta
Ugochukwu nọgidere na-arụsị ọrụ ịke dịka media consultant for the Dow Jones Financial News Service
N'oge niile Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye nta akụkọ, Ugochukwu ezutela ma gbaa ọtụtụ ndị isi ala ajụjụ ọnụ – gụnyere mgbe ahụ onye isi ala Briain british prime minister Margaret Thatcher,
South African President Nelson Mandela, onye isi ala Jamaica P

Patterson, French President Jacques Chirac, Venezuelan President Hugo Chavez, Cuban President, Fidel Castro, Nigerian presidents Ibrahim Babangida, Muhammadu Buhari, Sani Abacha, and Abdusalami Abubakar – ma wepụta akwụkwọ gbasara mmepe akụ na ụba na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchichị Afirika na ọgbakọ di iche iche gunyere Oxford University, England, na Uppsala University

Site na nloghachi Naịjirịa na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na-afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n'asatọ (1998), Ugochukwu ghọrọ onye nduzi mgbasa ozi na 'Obasanjo for President' Campaign Organisation, ma nye aka nke ukwuu na nhọpụta nke Olusegun Obasanjo dị ka onye isi ala Naịjirị
A họpụtara Ugochukwu dị ka Onye isi enyemaka pụrụ iche nke Onye isi ala na nhazi obodo na ihe gbasara ọha
Ọ butere ụzọ mkpọsa 'National Rebirth' nke e mere iji tinye omume ọma ịhụ mba n'anya n'ime uche mba nke ọtụtụ afọ nke ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nrụrụ aka mebiri
Ọ bụ n'elu ikpo okwu a ka Ugochukwu malitere 'Nkwupụta Naịjirịa nke Ọrụ Mmadụ', nke na-ekwupụta n'akụkụ ụfọdụ 'Onye a na Ọrụ Mmadụ
Ọ na-achọ iweta nnwere onwe na ibu ọrụ n'ime nguzozi ka mma, iji mee ka ọ pụta ìhè ma mee ka a mara ọrụ anyị ji ibe anyị na mba anyị ụgwọ

Iji mee ka obi dajụọ ọgba ghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmanụ-ọgaranya Niger Delta mpaghara south Naijirịa, onye isi ala bụ Obasanjo bịanyere aka ya na Niger Delta Development Commission (NDDC) omume nke afọ puku abụọ (2000) n'ime iwu
Ugochukwu a họpụtara dika onye ọsụ ụzọ onye isi oche nke kọmitii ekere ọhụrụ, ne emepe steeti iteolu na-emeputa mmanụ na mba ahụ , n'oke ego mmanụ

Ugochukwu nyere aka ịkọwa ọhụụ onye isi ala banyere mmepe na-adịgide adịgide na mpaghara Niger Delta, ma mepụta iwu nke na-agba ume imekọ ihe ọnụ n'etiti ndị metụtara ya na ndị isi agbụrụ ha, ndị agha ntorobịa, ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ na ndị isi ha, gọọmentị Naijiria, na Òtù Na-abụghị Gọọmentị, na òtù mba ụwa dị ka United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) na World Bank
N'oge Ugochukwu nọ n'ọkwa, NDDC lekwasịrị anya na mmeghachi omume akụ na ụba na ọganihu, imezigharị gburugburu ebe obibi, na mmepe nke akụrụngwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Na ngwụcha afọ anọ ọ nọrọ na NDDC, Ugochukwu laghachiri Abuja ma gaa n'ihu na-eje ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche nke onye isi ala na nkwukọrịta
O nwere mmasị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị steeti, wee gbaa arụkwaghịm n'ọfịs iji sonye na agbụrụ gọvanọ nke Abia State
N'afọ puku abụọ na isii (2006), a malitere mkpọsa maka Abia Rebirth (CARE), na nkwa iwughachi steeti ahụ

N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa iri na abụọ n'afọ puku abụọ na isii (13 Disemba 2006), Ugochukwu pụtara dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye otu People's Democratic Patị (PDP) maka ntuli aka gọvanọ nke Abia Steeti n'afọ puku abụọ na asaa (2007)
Ebubo nke ntuli aka, na ime ihe ike, mebiri agbụrụ ahụ a na-ese okwu nke ukwuu, nke niile rụzuru na nhọpụta nke onye mmegide Ugochukwu, Theodore Orji nke Progressive Peoples Alliance (PPA)
E mere mgbalị igbu Ugochukwu n'oge ntuli aka Gọvanọ nke Abia Steeti na abalị iri na-anọ n'ọnwa anọ, n'afọ puku abụọ na-asaa (14 Eprel 2007)
Ndị mwakpo ahụ gbara égbè n'ụgbọala ya, na-emerụ otu n'ime ndị nche ya nke State Security Service (SSS), bụ ndị merụrụ ahụ site n'isi na aka ya

Ugochukwu, onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isiala na onye na-ebute ụzọ na ntuli aka ahụ, boro ndị na-emegide ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na All Nigeria Peoples Party (ANPP) na Progressive Peoples Alliance (PPA) ụta maka mwakpo ahụ
Ugochukwu chọrọ imezị ya n'ụlọ ikpe nhọpụta ndị ọchịchị Abia State
A kagburu nhọpụta gọvanọ Theodore Orji na abali iri abụọ nke ọnwa abụọ n'afọ puku abụọ na asatọ, (25 Febuarị 2008) n'ini na orughị eru ịzọ ọkwa n'ọkwa ahụ
Orji na onye osote ya dara n'agbaghị arụkwaghim n'okwa ha n'ọchịchị Abia Steetị, abalị iri atọ (30 days) tupu ntuli aka ahụ dika ekwuputere n'ịwụ mke 1999
Ụlọ ikwe ahụ kwukwara na gọvanọ Ọrji emeghi ka ọ pụta ìhè n'enweghi obi abụọ ọbụla inwe mmekọ ya na òtù nzuzo

Ugochukwu wee bụrụ onye e si otú a kwupụta na ọ bụ onye meriri n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro na ntuliaka gọvanọ e mere n'ọnwa anọ, n'afọ puku abụọ n'asaa (April 2007), na Gọvanọ-ahọpụtara nke Abia Steeti - na-eche ihe ga-esi na ya pụta n'ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị Port Harcourt

Òtu ọ dị na, n'abalị iri na otu nke ọnwa abụọ, n'afọ puku abụọ na iteolu, (11 February 2009) ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị ikpe dị na Port Harcourt kagburu mkpebi ahụ, na-ekwupụta na Theodore Orji nke PPA n'ezie emeriela ntuli aka ahụ

Onyinye Chikezie bụ nwanyị Naịjirịa n'eme egwuregwu ịgba ọsọ lara ezumike nka, onye pụrụ iche na 100 mita
Ó meriri n'Ihe nrite ọla edo n'egwuregwu a na-akpọ Afirikan Championship na Cairo
Òkwè kachasị ya mma na 100 mita bụ 1156

O sonyekwara n'egwuregwu World Junior Championship nke 1992 n'Athletics na Seoul na 100 mita, 200 mita ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na- agba ọsọ 4 × 100 , ma ọ gaghị n'ihu iru na ngwụcha n'ime ihe omume ndị a
Onyinye Ough bụ onye Naijiria na-ede akwụkwọ, ọkà okwu na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Step up for Social Development and Empowerment in Nigeria, otu òtù na-abụghị ndị gọọmentị na-emegide nrụrụ aka na-eji akụkọ akụkọ na-akụziri ndị na-eto eto Naijiria banyere ụdị nrụrụ aka dị iche iche na mmetụta ya na ọha mmadụ
N'akwụkwọ ya, Emeka's Money, onye Emeka, gosipụtara dị ka ezigbo nwoke na-anwa ime ihe bara uru maka ndị gbara ya gburugburu
Ọ leghaara ikweta site na mbido na 'omume obi ụtọ' ya nye ndị enyi ya nwere ike imerụ mmepe nke obodo ya
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-ese njikọ n'etiti akụkụ dị iche iche nke nrụrụ aka na ezigbo mmebi ha na-akpata
A gbanwere akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi

N'ọnwa Julaị 2019, Onyinye Ough sonyeere òtù ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ọha na eze iji rịọ Onye isi ala Naịjirịa, Muhammadu Buhari ka ọ bịanye aka na Federal Audit Service Bill nke Nzukọ nke asatọ nke Mba nke ọnwa asaa tupu mgbe ahụ ka ọ bụrụ iwu

Onyinye Ough na-aga n'ihu na-eme mgbalị iji mepụta ụzọ okike iji gbochie nrụrụ aka na Naịjirịa, o mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ nke eziokwu iji gosipụta nsonaazụ nrụrụ aka n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na Naịjarịa site n'anya nwa akwụkwọ

Onyinyechi Salome Zogg (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ato n'ọnwa ise (Machị) n'afọ 1997) bụ onye Switzerland amụrụ na Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbachitere otu bọọlụ nke Swiss Women's Super League FC Zürich na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa
A mụrụ Zogg ma zụlite ya na Bern
Nna ya bụ onye Switzerland na nne ya bụ onye Naijiria
Zogg gara Monroe College na United States
Zogg agbaala bọọlụ na BSC Young Boys, Femina Kickers Worb, FC Bethlehem na Zürich na Switzerland
Zogg mere egwuregwu izizi ya maka Naịjirịa na 10 June 2021 na mmeri enyi na enyi 0-1 nke Jamaica
Ookpik () bụ ihe eji egwuri egwu Inuit na-ewu ewu
Ọ bụ obere, ihe ncheta owl nwere nnukwu isi na nnukwu anya, ọnụ, na obere mkpịsị ụkwụ ojii
A na-ejikarị ajị anụ ọhịa wolf, akpụkpọ anụ seal na ihe ndị ọzọ ọdịnala eme ha
E kere Ookpik mbụ na mbido afọ 1960 ma jiri akpụkpọ anụ mee ya
Jeannie Snowball nke Fort Chimo, nke bụzi Kuujjuaq, mepụtara ihe oyiyi ahụ maka ngosi azụmahịa na Philadelphia na 1964
E mepụtara ọnụ ọgụgụ Ookpik na Ft Chimo Eskimo Co-operative na Quebec na 1963
Ookpik bụ ihe nnọchianya nke a na-eji amata ọrụ aka nke Canada na mba ụwa
Ọtụtụ ndị Canada na ndị America na-echeta inwe Ookpik, ma na-echetakwa ya dị ka ihe nnọchianya a ma ama nke Canada
Ihe nkwanye ugwu nke Northern Alberta Institute of Technology (NAIT) bụ Ook, ụdị mkpirikpi nke Ookpik
Ngalaba Federal Department of Northern Affairs and Natural Resources (nke bụzi Indian and Northern Affairs Canada) gosipụtara ihe nkedo a na 1964
A na-akpọ ọtụtụ n'ime ndị otu egwuregwu NAIT Ooks
Okpik bụ ma aha na mascot maka ụfọdụ mmemme ogige oyi nke Boy Scouts of America na-achị
E mepụtara ọzụzụ Okpik mbụ na Northern Tier High Adventure Bases na Ely, Minnesota na 1970s, ọtụtụ ebe ndị ọzọ dị elu nke BSA ejirila usoro ọmụmụ yiri ya
E bipụtara Ookpik Waltz na 1965 site n'aka onye nwụrụ anwụ, Mission, British Columbia, onye na-eme violin Frankie Rodgers
Dance of the Ookpiks, abụ ndị Regents, ruru # 10 na chaatị RPM nke Canada na Jenụwarị 11, 1965 wee mee ya na chaatụ mpaghara ụfọdụ
O meghị ka ọ bụrụ chaatị RPM
E dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, ọkachasị nke ụmụaka, banyere nnụnụ a a ma ama, gụnyere

Ookpik, ihe na-atọ ọchị nke Allan Beaton, na-agba kwa ụbọchị na Toronto Telegram na ihe dịka akwụkwọ akụkọ iri ise nke Canada na America, gụnyere Los Angeles Times Syndicate, site na Nọvemba 30, 1964, ruo June 27, 1966
Ebe ọzọ e si nweta ya bụ na 1963
Ooredoo Algeria(formally Nedjma) is a telecommunications company in Algeria
Ọrụ Ooredoo Algeria malitere na 2004 dị ka Nedjma, nke e debere dị ka onye ọrụ mkpanaka mbụ na Algeria
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2013, a gbanwere aha Nedjma ka ọ bụrụ Ooredoo Algeria
Ooredoo Algeria webatara netwọk EDGE mbụ na mba ahụ na 2004 wee malite ọrụ 3G na Algeria na Disemba 2013
Ooredoo mechara nnwale 4G mbụ nke Algeria na Nokia na Tlemcen na-eru ọsọ ruru 75Mb / s
Na Septemba 2016, Ooredoo malitere ọrụ 4G na Algeria, malite na naanị 3 wilayas, Bechar, Tlemcen na Tizi Ouzou, tupu ọ gbasaa na mba ndị ọzọ
Ooredoo ugbu a na-ekpuchi mpaghara niile nke Algeria, ma bụrụ onye ọrụ mbụ nwetara mkpuchi 4G na mpaghara niile
Ooredoo Tunisia bụ ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta onwe onye na Tunisia
E guzobere ya na isi obodo nke 330 nde dinar Tunisian, e hiwere ya na 11 Mee 2002
Ooredoo Tunisia bụ akụkụ nke Ooredoo Group
N'inwe ihe karịrị ndị debanyere aha 75M, ọ bụ onye ọrụ kachasị na Tunisia
Ooredoo Tunisia malitere ọrụ azụmahịa na 27 Disemba 2002
Ọnwa isii ka e mesịrị, netwọk ekwentị mkpanaka ya kpuchiri 60% nke ndị Tunisia
Dị ka nke June 30, 2006, ọ nwere ihe karịrị nde mmadụ abụọ na nde ise debanyere aha ma ugbu a, o nwere ihe karịrị ndị nde mmadụ ise debanyesiri aha
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2005, netwọk ahụ kpuchiri pasent 99 nke ndị bi na ya
Na mbido afọ 2006, Ooredoo Tunisian weputara GPRS na EDGE n'ahịa Tunisia
Na 24 Mee 2012 ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwetara ikikere iji nye 3G na ọrụ ndị a na-akwụsi ike
Tunisiana gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Ooredoo Tunisia na 24 Eprel 2014
Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ Youssef Al Masri
Oorlams (nakwa Oorlands, Oorlans) bụ olumba nke Afrikaans nke ndị Oorlam na-asụ na Republic of South Africa na Namibia
A na-ewere ya ka ọ bụrụ asụsụ creole dabere na Afrikaans ma ọ bụ olumba Afrikaans kwesịrị ekwesị
Oorlams nwere ọtụtụ ihe sitere na asụsụ Khoi
Oosthuizen bụ aha nke nna obodo South Africa, ọkachasị nke a na-ahụkarị n'etiti ndị Afrikaners
Ndị ama ama nwere aha a gụnyere ndia
Ọzọkwa
Ọkpara bụ ihe ana-akpọ nwa nwoke
Obukwaa aha enwere ike kpo nwa nwoke mbụ amụru na-ezi n'ụlọ
Ebe ụfọdụ na ala igbo, ana akpọ ya diọkpara
Ophelia Hoff Saytumah bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mba Liberia
Ọ bụ onye isi obodo nke obodo Liberia na Monrovia
Onye isi ala Charles Taylor họpụtara ya n'afọ 2001 n'ọkwa ahụ
Ọ bụbu onye isi nke Ophelia Travel Agency ma rụọ ọrụ na bọọdụ ndị nduzi nke Roberts International Airport
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka onye isi obodo, ọ ghọrọ osote onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ Liberia

Onye ozi ala Prọfesọ Kwadwo Nimfour Opoku Onyinah (amụrụ na Julaị 22, 1954) bụ onye ọkà mmụta okpukpe Ghana, onye na-ekwusa ozi ọma na telivishọn, onye na'ede egwu na onye isi oche nke ise nke Chọọchị Pentikọst site na 2008 ruo 2018
O guzobere Pentecost International Worship Centre, ozi nke Chọọchị Pentikọst na 1993

O nwere nzere dọkịta nke nkà ihe ọmụma na ọmụmụ nkà mmụta okpukpe site na Mahadum Birmingham (2002) na nzere masta nke nkà mmụta okpukpe na nkà mmụta okpukpe eji eme ihe site na Regents Theological College
Ọ bụ onye ikpeazụ n'ime ndịozi na onye guzobere Chọọchị Pentikọst, Pastor James McKeown
Onyinah sonyeere ozi nke Chọọchị Pentikọst na 1976 ma rụọ ọrụ n'ọkwá dị iche iche, gụnyere onye isi nke Mahadum Pentikọst, onye otu kansụl na onye isi ọrụ mba ụwa mbụ nke ụka ahụ
Ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi na Pentecost Theological Seminary

Onyinah jere ozi dị ka onye otu National Peace Council na Ghana, onye isi oche nke Ghana Pentecostal and Charismatic Council site na 2011 ruo 2019, onye isi oche of Ghana Evangelism Committee site na 2010 ruo taa, onye isi ala nke Empowered21 Africa site na 2013 ruo taa, ndị otu ndụmọdụ nke International Review of Mission kemgbe 2013, onye otu Kọmitii nke World Pentecostal Theologians na Dialogue na Catholic Church kemgbe 2011, onye otu kọmitii na-adịgide adịgide nke Health and Healing of World Council of Churches / DIFAM, 2005 2010 onye otu Commission on World Mission and Evangelology site na 2007
Opoku Onyinah mụrụ Opanin Kwame Onyinah na Maame Rebecca Akosua Addai nke Aduman n'ihe dị ka elekere 7 00 nke ụtụtụ n'ụlọ ebe a na-amụ nwa n'obodo ahụ
Dịka ọdịnala Akan si dị, a kpọrọ ya aha nna nna ya, onye isi obodo Dwumakyi a ma ama nke a na-akpọ Opanin Nimfour
O tolitere n'aha 'Koofour' bụ ụdị kwadwo Nimfour gbajiri agbaji
A nabatara 22 Julaị dị ka ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya n'agbanyeghị na Asambodo Baptizim Katọlik bụ 24 Julaị dị ka ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Yamfo Presbyterian Primary School wee gụchaa Middle Form Four na Yamfo Catholic Middle School
A zụrụ ya n'ịkwa nkà na nkwonkwo na Sunyani Technical and Tamale Technical Institutes

Ọkpụkpọ oku ọ kpọrọ ịbanye n’ozi pastor na 1976 nyeere ya aka inweta onye mmụta mmụta mmụta mmụta mmụta na nkà mmụta okpukpe etinyere na 1998 na Philosophy in Theological Studies sitere na Mahadum Birmingham na 2002
Abena Oppong-Asare (amụrụ na 8 Febụwarị 1983) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị British Labour Party
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye omeiwu (MP) maka Erith na Thamesmead na ntuli aka 2019
Ya na Bell Ribeiro-Addy, ndị a họpụtara na ntuli aka nke afọ 2019, bụ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ bụ ndị omeiwu British Ghana
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke ndị mmegide n'afọ 2020, ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ Shadow Exchequer na Treasury
Oppong-Asare bụ onye Ghana ma mụọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na International Relations na Mahadum Kent, ebe o nwetakwara nzere masta na International Law na International Relations
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Labour Women's Network

Site na 2014 ruo 2018, ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ ndị ọrụ maka Erith ward na Bexley Council, na-eje ozi dị ka osote onye ndu nke otu ndị ọrụ mmegide sitere na 2014 ruo 2016 wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ekwuchitere agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ bụkwabu onye nnyemaaka ndị omeiwu na onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mpaghara, ma dụrụ mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mgbochi ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ ndụmọdụ
Tupu nhoputa ya, Oppong-Asare rụrụ ọrụ na Greater London Authority, na-akwado ndị òtù GLA ka ha na-anọchite anya ndị London nke ọma
N'oge a, ọ duru njikọ aka obodo na-eso ọkụ Grenfell Tower
N'afọ 2019, ọ gbara ọsọ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-achọ ịbụ onye omeiwu na Erith na Thamesmead mgbe onye omeiwu nọ n'ọkwa Teresa Pearce kwupụtara na ọ ga-akwụsị na ntuli aka ọzọ
Oprah Gail Winfrey (amuru Orpah Gail Winfrey ; Jenụwarị 29, 1954) bụ onye nnabata okwu America, onye na-eme ihe onyonyo, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede na onye enyemaka
A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe ngosi okwu ya, The Oprah Winfrey Show, na-agbasa site na Chicago, nke bụ usoro ihe omume telivishọn kachasị elu nke ụdị ya na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Ọ gosiri n'igwe onyonyo wee rue afọ iri abụọ na ise, site na 1986 ruo 2011

Akpọrọ ya 'Queen of All Media,' ọ bụ onye Africa-America kasị baa ọgaranya na narị afọ nke iri abụọ (20th Century), ọ bụbu kwa naanị onye isi ojii nwere ego rụrụ ọtụtụ ijeri n'ụwa, na onye isi ojii kachasị ukwuu ma burukwa onye Na-enyere mmadụ aka dị ka akụkọ ihe mere eme na mba America si wee di
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2007, ahọpụtara ya mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka nwanyị kacha nwee mmetụta n'ụwa
A mụrụ Winfrey na ịda ogbenye n'ime obodo Mississippi site na nne na-eto eto ma mesịa zụlite ya na ime obodo Milwaukee
O kwuwo na e metọrọ ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata na mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma wee tụụrụ ime mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ; nwa ya nwoke nke ọ mụrụ na- akaghị aka wee nwụọ mgbe ọ bụ nwa ọhụrụ
E zigara Winfrey ka ya na nwoke ọ na-akpọ nna ya biri
Aha ya bụ Vernon Winfrey, onye na-akpụ isi na Nashville, Tennessee, o wee nweta ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi redio mgbe ọ ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ka ọ na-erule afọ iri na iteghete, ọ bụrụ onye nkwado maka akụkọ mgbede nke mpaghara ahu
Winfrey na-enwekarị mmetụta uche, nnyefe n'efu mechara mee ka ọ bufee ya gaa na ebe ihe ngosi ụbọchị ehihie, na mgbe ọ kwalitechara ihe ngosi okwu Chicago, ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya
Ka ọ na-erule n'etiti 1990s, Winfrey weghachiri ihe ngosi ya na-elekwasị anya na akwụkwọ ọgụgụ, nkwalite onwe onye, iche echiche,ref>Tacopino, Joe
'Oprah, Glenn Beck are America's favorite TV personalities poll', Daily News, January 25, 2010 na ọnọdụ ime mmụọ

N'agbanyeghị na a katọrọ ya maka ịtọhapụ omenala nkwuputa, ịkwalite echiche enyemaka onwe onye na- arụrịta ụka, na inwe ụzọ mmetụta uche, a na-etokwa ya maka imeri ahụhụ iji ghọọ onye na-enyere ndị ọzọ aka

Winfrey pụtakwara dị ka onye kpara ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ọsọ onye isi ala n'afọ 2008, na nkwado ya nke o nyere Barack Obama, nke e kwụrụ na ọ karịrị otu nde votu na Democratic praịmarị nke afọ 2008
N'afọ 2013, Onye isi ala Obama nyere Winfrey ihe nrite Presidential Medal of Freedom, Ọ natakwara nzere doctorate abụọ n'aka Duke na Harvard
Na 2008, o guzobere netwọk nke ya, Oprah Winfrey Network (OWN)
Enyere ya site n'ịmepụta ụdị mgbasa ozi na-akpachi anya karịa, Winfrey kwalitere ma gbanwee ụdị okwu tabloid nke Phil Donahue keputara, o mekwara ka o wuo ewuo karịa
N'afọ 1994, a kpọbatara ya n'otu nke National Women's Hall of Fame

Winfrey eritela ọtụtụ ihe nrite n'oge ọrụ ya nke gụnyere Daytime Emmy Awards iri na asatọ, gụnyere Lifetime Achievement Award nakwa Chairman's Award, Primetime Emmy Awards abụọ, nke gụnyere Bob Hope Humanitarian Award, otu Tony Award, otu Peabody Award nakwa Jean Hersholt Humanitarian Award, nke ọ bu Academy Awards na-enye nakwa nhọpụta Academy Award abụọ
Ahọpụtara Winfrey dika onye otu nke American Academy of Arts and Sciences n'afọ 2021

A mụrụ Orpah Gail Winfrey na Jenụwarị 29, 1954; Aha mbụ ya bụ Orpah na akwụkwọ ọmụmụ ya dika aha a bara otu nwanyi n'akwụkwọ Nsọ dị ka ọ dị na Akwụkwọ Rut, ma ndị mmadụ sụhiere ya mgbe niile nke mere ka a malitezie kpọba ya 'Oprah'
A mụrụ ya na Kosciusko, Mississippi, nye nne dị afọ iri na ụma na-alụbeghị di
Nne ya, Vernita Lee (1935–2018), bụ onye na-eje ozi n'ụlọ
A na-akpọkarị Vernon Winfrey (a mụrụ c
1933) nna mụtara Winfrey
Vernon Winfrey bu onye na-egwupụta coal, ọ bubu onye isi ọchịchị obodo ma bụrụ kwa onye nọbụ n'òtù ndị agha mgbe a mụrụ ya
Otú ọ dị, onye ọrụ ugbo Mississippi na onye lụrụ agha ụwa nke abụọ aha ya Noah Robinson Sr
(amụrụ c
1925) ekwuola na ọ bụ ya bu nna mụrụ ya
Nnwale mkpụrụ ndụ nke e mere na 2006 chọpụtara na Winfrey sitere n'agbụrụ Kpelle, n'ógbè nke dị na Liberia taa
Achọpụtara mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa ya ka ọ bụrụ 89% Sub-Saharan Africa, 8% Native American, na 3% East Asia
Agbanyeghị nke a, n'ihi enweghị ezigbo ihe nyocha nke mkpụrụ ndụ, akara nrịbama East Asia nwere ike ịbụ nke America
Mgbe a mụsịrị Winfrey, nne ya gawara mgbago ugwu, Winfrey nọrọ afọ isii mbụ ya na nke nne nne ya, Hattie Mae (Presley) Lee (Eprel 15, 1900 - February 27, 1963), ha bikwa n'oke ịda ogbenye n'ime obodo
Nne nne ya dara ogbenye nke na Winfrey na-eyikarị uwe e ji akpa nduku mee, bụ́ nke mere ka ụmụaka ndị ọzọ na-akwa ya emo
Nne nne ya kụziiri ya ịgụ ihe tupu ọ dị afọ atọ ma kpọga ya na chọọchị dị n’ógbè ahụ, bụ́ ebe a kpọrọ ya “Onye Nkwusa” n’ihi na o nwere ike ịgụpụta amaokwu Baịbụl
Mgbe Winfrey bụ nwata, a kọrọ na nne nne ya na-akparị ya

Mgbe ọ dị afọ isii, Winfrey kwagara n'otu agbata obi dị n'ime Milwaukee, Wisconsin, ya na nne ya, bụ onye na-adịghị akwado ma na-agba ume ka nne nne ya sị eme, n'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'ihi ogologo oge ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odibo
N'oge a, Lee mụrụ nwa nwanyị ọzọ, nwanne Winfrey nke obere, Patricia onye nwụrụ n'ihi ihe ndị metụtara ịñụ ọgwụ cocaine na Februarị afọ 2003 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri anọ na atọ
Ka ọ na-erule 1962, ọ na-esiri Lee ike ịzụ ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ahụ, ya mere e zigara Winfrey nwa oge ka ya na Vernon biri na Nashville, Tennessee
Mgbe Winfrey nọ na Nashville, Lee mụrụ nwa nwanyị nke atọ, bụ onye e debere maka nkuchi n'olileanya nke ibelata nsogbu ego nke butere Lee ịnọ na ọdịmma, ma mesịa kpọọ ya Patricia
Winfrey amaghị na ya nwere nwanne nwanyị nke abụọ ruo 2010
Ka ọ na-erule oge Winfrey na nne ya laghachiri, Lee aburula onye mụkwara nwanne Winfrey nwoke aha ya bu Jeffrey, onye nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa AIDS na 1989
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, e mere ya baptizim n'ụlọ uka Baptist

Winfrey ekwuola na nwa nwanne nna ya, nwanne nna ya na enyi ezinụlọ ya mere ya ihe ike ma metọọ ya malite mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu, ihe mbụ o kwupụtara na ihe omume 1986 nke ihe nkiri TV ya gbasara mmetọ mmekọahụ
Mgbe Winfrey na ndị òtù ezinụlọ kwurịtara ebubo mmetọ ahụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na anọ, e kwụrụ na ha jụrụ ikwere Ihe o kwuru
Winfrey kwuru otu oge na ya ahọrọla ịghara ịbụ nne n'ihi na egosighi ya ịhụnanya nke nne na-egosi nwa nke ọma
Mgbe Winfrey dị afọ iri na atọ, mgbe ọ tachara ahụhụ ihe rụrụ ọtụtụ afọ, ọ gbapụrụ n'ụlọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, ọ tụrụ ime, ma nwa ya nwoke a akachagi aka nke mere oji wee nwụọ obere oge ka a mụchara ya
Winfrey mechara kwuo na ọ dị ya ka onye e rere mgbe otu onye ezinaụlọ ya kọrọ akụkọ nwa ya nwoke ahụ nye National Enquirer n'afọ 1990
Winfrey gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Lincoln nke dị na Milwaukee, mana mgbe ọ nwesịrị ihe ịga nke ọma na ememe Upward Bound, ebugharị ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Nicolet dịpụrụ adịpụ

Mgbe e bufere ya, o kwuru na a na-echetara ya mgbe niile maka ịda ogbenye ya ka ya na ndị Africa bi n'America ibe ya na-agba ụgbọ ala gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ, ụfọdụ n'ime ndị Africa a bi na America bụ ndị na-eje ozi n'ezinụlọ ụmụ klas ya
Ọ malitere inupụ isi wee na-ezu ego nne ya iji gbalịsie ike hụ na ọ na-emefu ego dika ndị ọgbọ ya
N'ihi ya, nne ya zipụrụ ya ọzọ ka ya na Vernon biri na Nashville, mana n'oge a ọ kpọghachighị ya
Vernon siri nnọọ ike, mana ọ na-agba ya ume ma mee ka agụmakwụkwọ ya bụrụ ihe kacha mkpa

Winfrey ghọrọ nwa akwụkwọ na-asọpụrụ, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ nwa agbọghọ kachasị ewu ewu, wee sonye n'òtù okwu ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na East Nashville High School, nke mere ka ụlọakwụkwọ ha bụrụ ndị nke abụọ na nkọwa dị egwu
Ọrụ mbụ Winfrey mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ahịa ihe nri obodo
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 17, Winfrey meriri asọmpi ịma mma nke Miss Black Tennessee
Ọ dọkwara mmasị ụlọ ọrụ redio ndị ịsị ojii dị n'ógbè ahụ nke aha ya bụ́ WVOL, bụ́ ndi were ya n'ọrụ ka ọ na-eme akụkọ nwa oge
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ n'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị elu nakwa n'ime afọ abụọ ya na mahadum
Ọ meriri asọmpi okwu ọnụ, nke mere ka ọ nweta ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ n'eri zuru oke na Mahadum steeti Tennessee, nke bu ụlọakwụkwọ ndị isi ojii, ebe ọ gụrụ maka nzikọrịta ozi
Agbanyeghị nke a, o wepụtaghị akwụkwọ ikpeazụ ya wee nweta nzere mmụta ya ruo afọ 1987, bụ́ mgbe ọ mebeworo nke ọma n'ihe omume telivishọn
Ọrụ Winfrey na mgbasa ozi ejughi nne nne ya anya, onye kwuru otu oge na kemgbe Winfrey malitere ikwu okwu, ọ nọ na ogbo
Mgbe ọ bụ nwata, ọ na-egwuri egwu na-agba nwa bebi ọka ya ajụjụ ọnụ na ngere nke ezinụlọ ya
Winfrey mechara kweta mmetụta nke nne nne ya nwere n'ebe ọ nọ, ọ na-ekwu na ọ bụ Hattie Mae gbara ya ume ikwu okwu n'ihu ọha wee 'nye m echiche ziri ezi banyere onwe m'…

Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi mpaghara ahu, Winfrey bụ onye akụkọ kacha nta na onye akụkọ nwanyị ojii mbụ na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi televishọn Nashville nke a kpọrọ WLAC-TV (nke a na-akpọ WTVF-TV ugbu a), ebe ya na John Tesh, onye na-arụ ọrụ na Nashville rukoro ọrụ
N'afọ 1976, ọ kwagara n'ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke dị na Baltimore a kpọrọ WJZ-TV iji na-aguputa akụkọ mgbasa ozi nke ha na-eme n'elekere isii
Na 1977, ewepụrụ ya dị ka onye na-akọ akụkọ ụwa, o wee rụọ ọrụ na ọkwa dị ala n'ụlọ ọrụ ahu
A kpọbatara ya ka ọ sonyere Richard Sher dị ka onye na-akwado ihe ngosi mpaghara ahu a na-egosi na WJZ nke a kpọrọ 'People are talking', nke malitere na August 14, 1978
Ọ bụ kwa onye haziri mgbasa ozi mpaghara ahu a kpọrọ 'Dialling for Dollars'
N'afọ 1984, Winfrey kwagara Chicago ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi okwu ụtụtụ nke WLS-TV a na-eme ọkara elekere nke a kpọrọ 'AM Chicago', mgbe onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ọdụ ahụ, Dennis Swanson goro ya ọrụ
Ihe omume mbụ ya mere na Jenụwarị 2, 1984
N'ime ọnwa ole na ole ka Winfrey weghaara ya, ihe nkiri ahụ si n'ebe ikpeazụ na ọkwa wee gafe Donahue dị ka ihe ngosi okwu kachasị na Chicago
Onye nkatọ ihe nkiri ahụ bụ Roger Ebert mere ka ọ bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta mmekọrịta ya na King World
Ebert gwara ya na ọ ga-enweta ego karịrị okpukpu iri anọ karịa ihe ngosi telivishọn ya a kpọrọ 'At the Movies'
A kpọgharịrị ya The Oprah Winfrey Show wee gbasaa ihe rụrụ otu awa zuru ezu
Emepụtara ihe omume mbụ na mba niile na Septemba 8, 1986
Ihe ngosi Winfrey butere ihe karịrị ndị na-ege ntị Donahue okpukpu abụọ, o wepụkwara Donahue dị ka ihe ngosi a na-eme n'ụbọchị na America
Asọmpi ha kpọsara nke ukwuu bụ isiokwu a nyochara nke ukwuu
Dị ka magazin Time si kwuo na August 1988
Ọ bụ mmadụ ole na ole ga-azọ nzọ na ịrị elu ọsọ ọsọ Oprah Winfrey iji webata ihe ngosi okwu ama ama na TV
N'ebe ndị nwoke ọcha na-achị, ọ bụ nwanyị ojii nke nwere nnukwu ibu
Dị ka ndị na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ si ekwu, ọ dịghị ihe jikọrọ ya na onye dika Phil Donahue
Ihe ọ na-enweghị na nkwubi okwu nta akụkọ, ya ka ọ nwere n'ịmata ihe, ọchị siri ike na, na nke kasi nke, mmetụta ọmịiko
Ndị ọbịa nwere akụkọ dị mwute ịkọ na-akpali anya mmiri n'anya Oprah
Ha na-ahụkarị onwe ha ka ha na-ekpughe ihe ha na-agaghị eche n'echiche ịgwa onye ọ bụla, ma ya fọduzie ndị na-ele ihe onyonyo
Asụsụ Opuo (Opuuo, Opo), ma ọ bụ Tʼapo, bụ asụsụ Koman nke ndị Opo nke Etiopia na South Sudan na-asụ
Ọ nwere myirịta lexical nke 24% na Komo
A na-akpọkwa asụsụ ahụ Opo-Shita, Opo, Opuo, Cita, Ciita, Shita (tinyere Dana), Shiita, Ansita, Kina, na Kwina
Aha onwe maka asụsụ ahụ bụ Tʼapo
'Langa' bụ okwu mkparị maka ndị Anuak na-ekwu okwu ya

Ndị na-asụ Etiopia bi n'ime obodo ise dị n'akụkụ oke South Sudan n'ebe ugwu nke Anuak na Nuer, na ndị South Sudan ya na Upper Nile State, gburugburu Kigille na Maiwut; Otú ọ dị, n'ime ndị ọkà okwu 286 ahụ ndekọ ndekọ ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị Etiopia 1994, 183 dị na Oromia Region (ọtụtụ n'ime mpaghara Mirab Shewa), 32 na South Nations, Nationalities, na People's Region, na ihe na-erughị iri n'ime mpaghara ọ bụla kacha nso

Brian Ndubisi Orakpo (Amụrụ ya na Julaị 31, 1986), bụ onye bọọlụ Amerịka n'èzí onye gbara bọọlụ afọ iri na National Football League (NFL)
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji maka Mahadum Texas, a nabatara ya dị ka onye America niile, Washington Redskins dekwara ya na nke iri na atọ n'ozuzu na 2009 NFL Draft
Ọ gbakwara Tennessee Titans bọọlụ, a họpụtakwara ya na Pro Bowls anọ
A mụrụ Orakpo na Julaị 31, 1986, na Houston, Texas na nne na nna Gloria na Arthur Orakpo, ndị si Naijiria kwabata
O nwere ụmụnne abụọ ọ tọrọ, Jennifer na Michael
Orakpo gbara bọọlụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Lamar High School na Houston, Texas
Ọ na-egwuri egwu na njedebe na njedebe siri ike ma bụrụ onye otu mbụ na-ahọrọ mpaghara niile ugboro abụọ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Texans
Na mgbakwunye, ọ gbara nnụụ bọọlụ site na nwa ọhụrụ ya ruo n'afọ ndị na-eto eto
Orakpo gara Mahadum Texas, ebe ọ gbara bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Texas Longhorns nke Mack Brown site n'afọ 2004 ruo 2008
A na-eyi nye ya redshirt dị ka onye ọhụrụ na 2004, mana n'afọ 2005 ọ gbara bọọlụ iri na atọ niile wee malite n'otu
O mere mmetụta ozugbo maka Longhorns, nyere ha aka mechaa nke 10 na mba ahụ na nchekwa, na-edekọ 27 tackles, ọkara akpa, fumble a manyere ma weghachite fumble
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ nke abụọ na 2006, ọ gbara egwuregwu 13 niile, dekọọ 26 tackles na 45 sacks ma kpọọ ya otu n'ime ndị Lowe's Most Improved Defensive Players
Dị ka onye na-eto eto na 2007, ọ gbara egwuregwu itoolu ma hapụ anọ n'ihi mmerụ ahụ n'ikpere aka nri ya na Arkansas State
Ọ bụ onye na-agbachitere MVP nke 2007 Holiday Bowl megide Arizona State mgbe ọ dekọrọ isii tackles na akpa abụọ n'oge egwuregwu ahụ
Ọ gwụchara oge ahụ na 37 tackles na 55 sacks
Dị ka onye okenye na 2008, Orakpo dekọrọ 40 tackles na 115 sacks ma bụrụ Associated Press Big 12 Defensive Player of the Year

Ọ bụkwa onye mmeri nke Bronko Nagurski Trophy, nke e nyere onye ọkpụkpọ kachasị mma, Ted Hendricks Award, nke e nye onye na-agbachitere onwe ya, The Bill Willis Trophy nke e nyere ndị na-agba ọsọ na kọleji, na Lombardi Award, nke enyere onye kachasị mma ma ọ bụ onye na-aga n'ihu

A matara ya dị ka otu ndị otu mbụ All-American, mgbe ọ natara nsọpụrụ ndị otu mbụ site na Associated Press, American Football Coaches Association, Football Writers Association of America, The Sporting News, na Walter Camp Football Foundation
Ọ bụ onye mbụ Texas Longhorn na-agbachitere onwe ya iji nweta nsọpụrụ All-American kemgbe Tony Brackens na 1995
N'ọrụ kọleji ya, Orakpo dekọrọ takụlụ 132, saksị 32, 38 tackles maka ọnwụ, 62 pressures, isii passes broken up, isii forced fumbles, na a fumble recovery
Orakpo gara NFL Combine na atụmanya dị ukwuu n'ihi aha ya a ma ama dị ka 'onye agha na-eme ngagharị iwe'
31 reps ya na bench press bụ nke abụọ n'etiti ndị na-echebe onwe ha niile na nke asaa kachasị mma n'etiti niile na-eche nche
Ọ na-awụli elu nke 395-inch bụ nke abụọ maka ndị na-agbachitere ya niile, ọ gosipụtakwara ọsọ ya na ọsọ ya mgbe ọ na-edekọ oge 463 40-yard dash
Na ngwụcha usoro tupu draft, a na-atụ anya na Orakpo ga-abụ onye mbụ nke ndị ọkachamara na ndị scouts nke NFL

A họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-agbachitere onwe ya kachasị mma / onye na-anọghị n'èzí na draft site n'aka onye nyocha NFL Bucky Brooks, DraftScoutcom họpụtara ya dịka onye nke abụọ kachasị mma na-agba ọsọ n'èstre na draft site na onye nyocha NFL Mike Mayock
Orange RDC (nke bụbu Congo Chine Télécoms ma ọ bụ CCT)Bụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na-arụ ọrụ na Democratic Republic of Congo
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụbu njikọ aka nke ụlọ ọrụ China ZTE, nke nwere 51%, na steeti Congo, nke nwere 49%
Netwọk mkpanaka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na 2001
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Kinshasa
Orange RDC nwere ndị ọrụ Abt 100
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2011 France Télécom (nke bụzi Orange SA) nwetara 100% nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ma nye ya aha ọzọ Orange RDC na 5 Disemba afọ 2012
Orange RDC na-enye ekwentị,Ekwentị mkpanaaka na ọrụ ịntanetị
Orange RDC na-ere otu ụdị menu ('Kit A12+') na Lingala, Tshiluba, French, Kongo, na Swahili
Oraukwu bụ obodo dị na Anambra Steeti, Nigeria
A na-akpọbu ya Ohaukwu
Ọ bụ otu n'ime obodo ndị dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Idemili North nke Anambra steeti, ọ dịkwa ihe dịka kilomita iri anọ n'ọwụwa anyanwụ Ọnịcha n'akụkụ okporo ụzọ ochie si Enugu gaba Ọnịcha
Ọ dị ihe dịka kilomita iri abụọ n'ọdidaugwu nke senta okpuru ọchịchị Awka
Ndị bi na Ọraukwu gụnyere ụmụ amaala na ndị ọbịa si mpaghara dị iche iche na mba ahụ
Ụmụ amaala ahụ nwere ndị gụrụ akwụkwọ nke ukwuu na ndị ahịa bara ọgaranya na-agụghị akwụkwọ bụ ndị ahịa azụmaahịa mba ụwa
Onye na-ahazi ihe gbasara obodo ahụ bụ onye eze ọdịnala nke nwetara ikike steeti na ndị otu ya nakwa ndị isi otu obodo na ndị otu ndị a họpụtara nke ọma dịka iwu obodo siri dị
Oraukwu nwere ọtụtụ ndị ama ama bụ ndị nwere ọkwa n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke ndụ dịka na agụmakwụkwọ, azụmahịa na itinye ego n'ebe ọ ga-amuputa, nrụpụta ụlọ ọrụ wdg
A maara ha nke ọma maka izuputa na iwuli mmadụ nke ọma yana ọtụtụ mmepe akụrụngwa a na-ahụ anya bụ nke ọ bụ ụmụ amaala ji aka ha na-akwado
Àtụ Infobox television episode
Orb bụ ihe omume mbụ nke oge nke itoolu nke usoro ihe nkiri America Oge njem njem
E dere ihe omume ahụ ma tinye akụkọ na Aleks Sennwald
Ihe omume ahụ malitere na Eprel 21, 2017

Usoro a na-agbaso ihe omume nke Finn (nke Jeremy Shada kwuru), nwa nwoke, na ezigbo enyi ya na nwanne ya nwoke nkuchi Jake (nke John DiMaggio kwuru), nkịta nwere ike anwansi iji gbanwee ọdịdị ma too ma belata na uche ya
N'ime ihe omume ahụ, Finn na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site na iji bịa na ímé ihe, Jake, na BMO na-alaghachi Ooo site na Founder's Island mgbe ha na-ehi ụra ma malite nrọ
N'oge na-adịghị anya, nrọ ha na-emetụta ihe omimi
Orb - nke jere ozi dị ka mgbanwe n'etiti miniseries abụọ Islands na Elements - gosipụtara dị ka akụkụ nke oge nke itoolu nke Oge njem njem
Mgbe ha si na njem ha na mba ofesi lọta, Finn, Jake na BMO riri ọtụtụ unere ma hie ụra
Otu ihe omimi ojii dị n'eluigwe na-amalite ime ka ha nwee nrọ dị egwu nke na-aghọ ihe egwu ngwa ngwa
Nrọ ọjọọ ha na-agbakọta ka ha na-aghọta na ha na-arọ nrọ, ha na-ezute onye Finn na-akpọ Nrọ adaeze
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ chọrọ naanị unere ha, mana BMO na-eme nkwekọrịta ka ha wee nweta ihe ọmụma nke ụwa họrọ site na ndi isi ulo àkù nile n'ala
Ìgwè ahụ na-eteta n'ụra na-ewere ụfọdụ n'ime unere ha, ọ na-ahapụ karama na-acha pinki pinki nke mmiri egwu
BMO na-ele anya na telivishọn iji chọpụta na Ooo agbanweela nke ukwuu, ọ bụ ezie na robot amaghị ya
'Orb' hụrụ na United States site na nde mmadụ 028 na-ekiri ya
Oliver Sava nke The AV
Club nyochara ihe omume a, na-enye ya B+
Ọ na-ekwu na ihe omume ahụ bụ 'ihe niile gbasara mgbanwe'

Orchids bụ osisi ndị sitere n'ezinụlọ Orchidaceae (/ɔːrkəˈdeɪʃiː/ ma ọ bụ-kə-DAY-shee [citation needed]), otu osisi dịgasị iche iche na nke zuru ebe niile nwere okooko osisi ndị na-adịkarị mma ma na-enwe ísì ụtọ
Na Igunye Asteraceae, ha bụ otu n'ime ezinụlọ abụọ kachasị ukwuu nke osisi na-agbasa okooko
Orchidaceae nwere ihe dị ka ụdị puku iri abụọ na asatọ a nabatara ugbu a, nke e kesara n'ihe dị ka ụdị narị asaa na iri isii na atọ
Mkpebi nke ezinụlọ buru ibu ka na-arụrịta ụka, n'ihi na data a kwadoro banyere ndị otu nnukwu ezinụlọ dị otú ahụ na-aga n'ihu
N'agbanyeghi, ọnụọgụ nke ụdị orchid fọrọ nke nta ka ọ hara nhata na ọnụọgụ azụ ọkpụkpụ, ihe karịrị okpukpu abụọ nke ọnụọgụ nnụnụ, na ihe dịka okpukpu anọ nke ọnụọụọgụ anụmanụ na-enye nwa ara
Ezinụlọ ahụ gụnyere ihe dị ka Present isii ruo pesent iri na otụ nke ụdị mkpụrụ osisi niile
Ụdị kachasị ukwuu bụ Bulbophyllum (2,000 ụdị), Epidendrum (ọ dị ụdị otu puku na narị ise), Dendrobium (ọ dị ụdị otu puku na narị anọ) na Pleurothallis (ọ dị ụdị otu puku)
Ọ gụnyekwara Vanilla (ụdị osisi vanilla), ụdị Orchis, na ọtụtụ osisi a na-akụkarị dịka Phalaenopsis na Cattleya
Ọzọkwa, kemgbe iwebata ụdị okpomọkụ n'ime ọrụ ugbo na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, ndị na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo emepụtala ihe karịrị otu narị puku ngwakọta na cultivars
A na-ekewapụta orchid n'ụzọ dị mfe site na osisi ndị ọzọ, ebe ọ bụ na ha nwere ụfọdụ njirimara doro anya ma ọ bụ synapomorphies

N'etiti ndị a bụ symmetry abụọ nke okooko osisi (zygomorphism), ọtụtụ okooko osisi resupinate, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mgbe niile ka a gbanwere nke ukwuu (labellum), stamen na carpels, na obere mkpụrụ
Orchid niile bụ ahịhịa na-adịgide adịgide pụọ afọ nke na-enweghị usoro osisi ọ bụla na-adịru mgbe niile
Ha nwere ike itolite dịka usoro abụọ
Orchid ndị dị n'ala nwere ike ịbụ rhizomatous ma ọ bụ mepụta corms ma ọ bụ tubers
Mmpụta mgbọrọgwụ nke orchid ndị dị n'ala dị mụrụmụrụ ma na-acha ọcha
Ụfọdụ sympodial terrestrial orchids, dị ka Orchis na Ophrys, nwere mgbọrọgwụ abụọ dị n'okpuru ala
A na-eji otu dị ka ebe nchekwa nri maka oge oyi, ma na-enye maka mmepe nke nke ọzọ, nke uto a na-ahụ anya na-etolite
N'ọnọdụ ihu igwe na-ekpo ọkụ ma na-ekwo ekpo ọkụ mgbe niile, ọtụtụ orchid nke ala anaghị achọ pseudobulbs
Epiphytic orchids, ndị na-etolite na eji nkwado, agbanweela mgbọrọgwụ ikuku nke nwere ike ịdị mita ole na ole mgbe ụfọdụ
N'akụkụ ndị okenye nke mgbọrọgwụ, epidermis spongy gbanwere, nke a na-akpọ velamen, nwere ọrụ nke ịmịkọrọ mmiri
A na-eji mkpụrụ ndụ nwụrụ anwụ eme ya ma nwee ọdịdị na-acha ọcha, ọcha ma ọ bụ nchara nchara
N'ime ụfọdụ orchid, velamen na-agụnye spongy na fibrous bodies dị nso na mkpụrụ ndụ na-agafe agafe, nke a na-akpọ tilosomes
Mkpụrụ ndụ nke mgbọrọgwụ nke epidermis, mgbọrọgwụ na-etolite n'akụkụ aka nri na axis nke mgbọrọgwụ iji nye ha ohere inweta nghọta siri ike na nkwado ha
Ihe oriri maka epiphytic orchids na-esikarị na ájá mineral, ihe mkpofu, nsị anụmanụ na ihe ndị ọzọ na-anakọta n'etiti ha n'elu ha
Ntọala nke ogwe nke sympodial epiphytes, ma ọ bụ n'ụdị ụfọdụ n'ụzọ bụ isi ogwe ahụ dum, nwere ike ịka njọ iji mepụta pseudobulb nke nwere ihe oriri na mmiri maka oge ọkọchị
Pseudobulb nwere elu ahụ dị mụrụmụrụ nke nwere oghere dị ogologo, ma nwee ọdịdị dị iche iche, na-abụkarị n'ụdị konikalu ma ọ bụ oblong
Ọdịdị ya na-agbanwe agbanwe; na ụfọdụ obere ụdị Bulbophyllum, ọ bụghị karịa milimita abụọ, ebe na orchid kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa, Grammatophyllum speciosum (orchid buru ibu), ọ nwere ike iru mita atọ

Ụfọdụ ụdị Dendrobium nwere ogologo, pseudobulbs yiri cane nwere akwụkwọ dị mkpirikpi, nke gbara gburugburu n'ogologo ya niile; ụfọdụ orchid ndị ọzọ zoro ezo ma ọ bụ obere pseudobulbs, gụnyere kpamkpam n'ime akwụkwọ osisi
Ka ọ na-aka nká, pseudobulb na-ewepụ akwụkwọ ya ma na-ehi ụra
N'oge a, a na-akpọkarị ya backbulb
Backbulbs ka na-ejide ihe nri na-edozi ahụ maka osisi ahụ, mana mgbe ahụ pseudobulb na-enwekarị, na-eji ihe ikpeazụ a gbakọtara na backbulb, nke na-emesị nwụọ, kwa
Pseudobulb na-adịkarị ndụ ihe dị ka afọ ise
A na-ekwukwa na orchid na-enweghị pseudobulbs a na-ahụ anya nwere uto, nke si na osisi sympodial weputa
Dị ka ọtụtụ monocots enwere, orchid na-enwekarị akwụkwọ dị mfe nwere akwara ndị kwụ ọtọ, ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ Vanilloideae nwere reticulate venation
Akwụkwọ ya nwere ike ịbụ ovate, lanceolate, ma ọ bụ orbiculate, na-agbanwe agbanwe na nha na osisi nke ọ bụla
Njirimara ha na-abụkarị nchọpụta
Ha na-agbanwekarị n'elu ogwe osisi, na-agbakwunyekarị n'ogologo n'etiti ('plicate'), ma enweghị stipules
Akwụkwọ orchid na-enwekarị ahụ siliceous a na-akpọ stegmata na vascular bundle sheaths (adịghị na Orchidoideae) ma bụrụ fibrous
Ọdịdị nke akwụkwọ ya kwekọrọ na ebe obibi nke osisi ahụ

Ụdị ndị na-enwekarị ìhè anyanwụ, ma ọ bụ na-etolite na saịtị ndị nwere ike ịcha mgbe ụfọdụ, nwere akwụkwọ osisi dị arọ, nke nwere akpụkpọ anụ na laminae na-ekpuchi cuticle waxy iji chekwaa mmiri ha dị mkpa
Ụdị ndị hụrụ onyinyo n'anya, n'aka nke ọzọ, nwere ogologo, obere akwụkwọ

Akwụkwọ nke ọtụtụ orchid bụ perennial, ya bụ, ha na-adị ndụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ebe ndị ọzọ, ọkachasị ndị nwere akwụkwọ osisi plicate dị ka Catasetum, na-awụfu ha kwa afọ ma na-emepụta akwụkwọ ọhụrụ na pseudobulbs ọhụrụ
A na-ewere akwụkwọ osisi orchid ụfọdụ dị ka ihe ịchọ mma
Akwụkwọ osisi nke Macodes sanderiana, orchid nke dị n'ime ala ma ọ bụ nke na-eburu nkume ('lithophyte'), na-egosi ọlaọcha na ọla edo na-egbuke egbuke na ndabere akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ
Akwụkwọ osisi cordate nke Psychopsis limminghei bụ ihe na-acha nchara nchara na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ osisi ndụ na akara maroon-puce, nke ihe na-egbuke egbuke na-emepụta
Akpụkpọ ahụ mara mma nke akwụkwọ osisi akpụkpọ ụkwụ nwanyị sitere na okpomọkụ na subtropical Asia (Paphiopedilum), sitere na nkesa na-adịghị mma nke chlorophyll
Ọzọkwa, Phalaenopsis schilleriana bụ orchid na-acha pinki pinki nke nwere akwụkwọ osisi ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ nri
A na-eto orchid ọla (Ludisia discolor) maka akwụkwọ osisi ya mara mma karịa okooko ya na-acha ọcha

Ụfọdụ orchid, dị ka Dendrophylax lindenii (orchid ghost), Aphyllorchis na Taeniophyllum na-adabere na mgbọrọgwụ ha na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ maka photosynthesis ma ghara inwe akwụkwọ ndị na-eto eto, dị ka ụdị heterotrophic niile

Orchids nke ụdị Corallorhiza (coralroot orchids) enweghị akwụkwọ kpamkpam ma kama na-ekpuchi mgbọrọgwụ ha gburugburu mgbọrọgwụ nke osisi ndị tozuru etozu ma jiri fungi pụrụ iche mee ihe iji nweta shuga
Okooko osisi orchid nwere sepals atọ, petals atọ na ovary nwere nkewa oghere atọ
Mpempe akwụkwọ atọ na abụọ n'ime okooko osisi na-adịkarị ka ibe ha mana otu okooko osisi anaghị agbanwe nke ukwuu, na-emepụta 'egbugbere ọnụ' ma ọ bụ labellum
N'ọtụtụ ụdị orchid, ka okooko osisi ahụ na-etolite, ọ na-agbagọ site na dịgrị otu narị na iri asatọ, nke a na-akpọ resupination, nke mere na labellum dị n'okpuru kọlụm ahụ
Labellum na-arụ ọrụ iji dọta ụmụ ahụhụ, na okooko osisi resupinate, na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka ebe ọdịda, ma ọ bụ mgbe ụfọdụ ọ bụrụ ọnyà
Akụkụ ọmụmụ nke okooko osisi orchid pụrụ iche n'ihi na a na-ejikọta stamens na ụdị iji mepụta otu ihe, kọlụm
Kama ịhapụ ya n'otu n'otu, ọtụtụ puku mkpụrụ ntụ ọka dị n'otu ma ọ bụ abụọ a na-akpọ pollinia nke a na-etinye na diski na-arapara n'ahụ n'elu kọlụm ahụ
N'okpuru pollinia bụ nke abụọ, nnukwu efere na-arapadọ n'ahụ ya na-akpọ stigma
Charles Darwin nyochara usoro dị mgbagwoju anya nke orchid mepụtara iji nweta cross-pollination ma kọwaa ya na Fertilisation of Orchids (n'afọ 1862)

Orchid emeela usoro mmịpụta ihe pụrụ iche, ya mere ohere nke mmịpụta na-adịkarị ụkọ, ya mere okooko osisi orchid na-anọkarị na-anabata ogologo oge, na-eme ka okooko osisi ndị na-enweghị mmịpụta mkpụrụ na-adịte aka n'ọrụ ugbo
Ọtụtụ orchid na-ebute pollen n'otu oke
Oge ọ bụla mmịpụta na-aga nke ọma, enwere ike ime ọtụtụ puku àkwá
A na-ahụkarị ndị na-eme ntụ ọka site na ọdịdị na agba nke labellum

Otú ọ dị, ụfọdụ ụdị Bulbophyllum na-adọta ụmụ ahụhụ mkpụrụ osisi (Bactrocera na Zeugodacus spp) naanị site na kemịkal okooko osisi nke na-arụ ọrụ n'otu oge dị ka ụgwọ ọrụ okooko osisi (dịka methyl eugenol, raspberry ketone, ma ọ bụ zingerone) iji mee polinashon
Okooko osisi nwere ike imepụta ísì mara mma

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ dịghị n'ọtụtụ ụdị, enwere ike ịmepụta mmiri ara ehi na eriri nke labellum (8 na ihe osise dị n'elu), ma ọ bụ na isi nke sepals, ma ọ bụ n'ime septa nke ovary, ọnọdụ kachasị n'etiti Asparagales

Na orchid nke na-emepụta pollinia, pollination na-eme dị ka ụdị nke usoro ndị a mgbe onye na-eme ntụ ọka na-abanye n'ime okooko osisi, ọ na-emetụ viscidium aka, nke na-arapara n'ahụ ya ozugbo, n'ozuzu n'isi ma ọ bụ afọ
Mgbe ọ na-ahapụ okooko osisi ahụ, ọ na-adọta pollinium site na anther, ebe ọ na-ejikọta ya na viscidium site na caudicle ma ọ bụ stipe
Mgbe ahụ, caudicle na-agbaji ma na-ebugharị pollinium n'ihu na ala
Mgbe onye na-eme ntụ ọka na-abanye na okooko osisi ọzọ nke otu ụdị ahụ, pollinium ewerewo ọnọdụ dị otú ahụ na ọ ga-arapara na stigma nke okooko osisi nke abụọ, n'okpuru rostellum, na-eme ka ọ na-eme
N'ọrụ ugbo, a na-enweta ntụ ọka orchid aka site n'iwepụ pollinia na obere ngwá ọrụ dị ka ezé ezé site na nne na nna pollen ma nyefee ha na nne na nne mkpụrụ
Ụfọdụ orchid na-adabere kpamkpam na mmịpụta mkpụrụ osisi, ọkachasị na mpaghara oyi ebe ndị na-eme ntụ ọka dị obere
Caudicles nwere ike ịcha ma ọ bụrụ na onye ọ bụla na-eme ntụ ọka eletabeghị okooko osisi ahụ, na pollinia na-ada kpọmkwem na stigma
Ma ọ bụghị ya, anther nwere ike ịtụgharị wee banye n'oghere stigma nke okooko osisi (dị ka na Holcoglossum Marteanum)
Orchid na-agbagharị agbagharị Paphiopedilum parishii na-amụpụta site na ime onwe ya
Nke a na-eme mgbe anther gbanwere site na ihe siri ike gaa na mmiri ma na-emetụta n'elu stigma n'enweghị enyemaka nke onye ọ bụla na-eme ntụ ọka ma ọ bụ nzukọ okooko osisi
Labellum nke Cypripedioideae bụ poke bonnet-shaped, ma nwee ọrụ nke ijide ụmụ ahụhụ na-eleta
Nanị ụzọ ọpụpụ na-eduga na anthers nke na-etinye pollen na onye nleta
N'ime ụfọdụ orchid pụrụ iche, dị ka Eurasian genus Ophrys, labellum na-eme ka ọ nwee agba, ọdịdị, na ísì nke na-adọta ụmụ ahụhụ nwoke site na iṅomi nwanyị na-anabata
Mkpụrụ osisi na-eme ka ụmụ ahụhụ ahụ na-anwa iso okooko osisi nwee mmekọahụ
Ọtụtụ orchid neotropical na-eme ka anwu orchid ndị ụmụ nwoke nke na-eleta okooko osisi iji chịkọta kemịkal na-agbanwe agbanwe ha chọrọ iji mepụta ihe na-adọrọ mmasị pheromonal

A hụla na ụmụ nwoke nke ụdị dị ka Euglossa imperialis ma ọ bụ Eulaema meriana na-ahapụ ókèala ha oge ụfọdụ iji nweta ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, dị ka cineole, iji mepụta pheromone maka ịdọta na ịlụ ụmụ nwanyị
Ụdị orchid ọ bụla na-etinye pollinia n'akụkụ ahụ dị iche iche nke ụdị aṅụ dị iche iche, iji mee ka cross-pollination kwesịrị ekwesị

Orchid achlorophyllous saprophytic na-adịghị ahụkebe nke na-eto n'okpuru ala na Australia, Rhizanthella slateri, anaghị ekpughe ya n'ìhè, ọ na-adabere na ndanda na ụmụ ahụhụ ndị ọzọ dị n'ala iji mee ka ọ na-eme ntụ ọka
Catasetum, ụdị nke Darwin tụlere n'ụzọ dị mkpirikpi, na-eji ike mgbawa eme ihe na-eme ka ọ na-agbawa agbawa mgbe ahụhụ metụrụ seta aka, na-akụ onye na-eme ntụ ọka na okooko osisi ahụ
Mgbe mmịpụta, sepals na petals na-apụ n'anya ma na-akpọnwụ, mana ha na-anọkarị na ovary
N'afọ 2011, a chọpụtara na Bulbophyllum nocturnum na-agbasa n'oge abalị
Ụdị ụfọdụ, dị ka n'ụdị Phalaenopsis, Dendrobium, na Vanda, na-emepụta alaka ma ọ bụ osisi ndị sitere n'otu n'ime nodes n'akụkụ ogwe osisi ahụ, site na nchịkọta nke homonụ na-eto eto n'oge ahụ
A maara osisi ndị a dị ka keiki
[citation needed]
Ovary na-etolite n'ime capsule nke nwere oghere atọ ma ọ bụ isii, mgbe ọ na-anọgide na-emechi na nsọtụ abụọ
Mkpụrụ ndị ahụ na-abụkarị ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ microscopic na ọtụtụ, n'ụdị ụfọdụ ihe karịrị otu nde kwa capsule
Mgbe ha kara, ha na-efegharị dị ka uzuzu ma ọ bụ spores

Ọtụtụ ụdị orchid enweghị endosperm na mkpụrụ ha ma ga-abanye na mmekọrịta symbiotic na mycorrhizal basidiomyceteous fungi dị iche iche nke na-enye ha ihe oriri dị mkpa iji bulie, yabụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ụdị orchid niile bụ mycoheterotrophic n'oge bulie ma dabere na fungi iji mezue ndụ ha
Naanị ụdị orchid ole na ole nwere mkpụrụ nke nwere ike itolite na-enweghị mycorrhiza, ya bụ, ụdị dị n'ime ụdị nwere mkpụrụ hydrochorous
N'iji usoro elekere nke mkpụrụ ndụ, ọ ga-ekwe omume ịchọpụta afọ nke alaka ndị isi nke ezinụlọ orchid
Nke a mekwara ka o doo anya na subfamily Vanilloideae bụ alaka na basal dichotomy nke monandrous orchids, ọ ga-abụrịrị na ọ malitere n'oge mmalite nke ezinụlọ ahụ

Ebe ọ bụ na ezinụlọ a na-eme n'ụwa niile na mpaghara okpomọkụ na mpaghara okirikiri, site na America na-ekpo ọkụ ruo Asia na-ekwo ọkụ, New Guinea na West Africa, na kọntinent malitere ịkewa ihe dị ka 100 nde afọ gara aga, mgbanwe dị ịrịba ama ga-eme mgbe nkewa a gasịrị (ebe ọ bụ na a na-atụle afọ Vanilla dị nde afọ 60 ruo 70)

Usoro kachasị mma nke Alaeze Ukwu Britain bụ usoro chivalry nke Britain, onyinye na-akwụghachi ụgwọ maka nka na sayensị, na-arụ ọrụ na ndị ọrụ ebere na ndị na-ahụ maka ọdịmma, na ọrụ ọha na eze na-abụghị ọrụ obodo

E hibere ya na 4 June 1917 site n'aka Eze George V ma nwee klas ise n'ofe ma ngalaba obodo na nke ndị agha, nke kacha elu abụọ n'ime ha na-eme ka onye nnata ya bụrụ onye ọchị ma ọ bụrụ nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị ma ọ bụrụ nwanyị

Ọ bụ onye hibere, nakwa onye isi oche nke Women's Technology Empowerment Center (WTEC), otu na-adịghị akwụ ụgwọ nke na-enye ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ ike na ọha mmadụ na akụ na ụba site na agụmakwụkwọ na teknụzụ ozi
E hiwere WTEC n'afọ 2008
Ọ bụ onye otu Ashoka na onye nnata nke Anita Borg Institute (ABIE) Change Agent Award
Afọ ndị mbụ Lesi bụ ndị o biri na Nigeria
N'ebe nna onye injinia eletriki, ọ hụrụ teknụzụ n'anya site na nwata nke mere ka ọ mepụta ngwa ngwanrọ nke ejiri na-azụ ahịa akwụkwọ nne na nna ya
Mgbe afọ ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Queen's College, Lagos gasịrị, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ diploma na mmemme kọmputa
Ọ gakwara mba United Kingdom ebe ọ gụrụ gbasara akụnụba wee nweta nzere bachelọ na Economics na Mahadum Essex
Mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum, o hibere akwụkwọ edemede azụmahịa maka ụmụ akwụkwọ, nke ahụ kpalitere mkpamkpa mbụ banyere etu ụmụ nwanyị nwere ike isi jiri teknụzụ mepụta ohere nke akụ na ụba
O nwetakwara, nzere masta na nyocha, imewe na njikwa ozi site na London School of Economics and Political Science
Ọ gụrụ Applied Sciences na Harvard University Extension School

na United States dị ka onye na-enyere aka na nyocha nakwa dịka onye na-arụ ọrụ nkà na ụzụ

Na Naijiria, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Lonadek Oil and Gas Consultancy ebe o jisiri ma lekọta otu CSR Initiative-2020 nke lekwasịrị anya na mmepe nka nke ndị ntorobịa na mpaghara sayensị na teknụzụ
O hiwere WTEC n'afọ 2008, mgbe teknụzụ adịghị egwu dịka ọ dị kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
Enwekwara ntakịrị mmata maka ọdịiche nwoke na nwanyị na teknụzụ yana ihe kpatara imechi ya ji dị mkpa na 2008, nke mere ka ọrụ ya sie ike karị

WTEC na-achikọba ọtụtụ mmemme na steeti Lagos, Anambra na Kwara, nke gụnyere emume 'She Creates Camps' na WTEC Academy (technology afterschool clubs) ma metụtala ụmụ agbọghọ na ndị nkuzi puku iri abụọ na asaa
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, WTEC malitere ọrụ Inclusive Technology for All (IT4All) na mmekorita ya na Center Developmental Children
Ihe oru ngo a na-ewebata teknụzụ na echiche STEM sara mbara nye ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere nkwarụ nke mmepe
Ụfọdụ isi ihe dị mkpa na ọrụ ya na WTEC gụnyere imekọ ihe ọnụ ya na Dr

Omobola Johnson nke ụlọọrụ Federal Ministry of Communication Technology na 2014 iji wulite otu òtù ụmụ agbọghọ na mba nke a na-akpọ Digital Girls Club, bụ nke e mere n'ụlọ akwụkwọ iri na abụọ na mpaghara ọ bụla wee gbasaa gaa n'ihu ma ruo n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ na Naịjirịa
Digital Girls Club gosipụtara usoro ọmụmụ gunyere ihe dị iche iche, bụ nke akwadoro na ọnụ ụzọ intanetị nke ndị nkuzi nwere ike ịnweta ma jiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ha dị iche iche

Prọfesọ Oritsejolomi Horatio Thomas (1917), bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ ahụike na Naijiria nke na-ahụ maka ịwa ahụ na ndozighari ahụ
N'ime ọzụzụ ikpeazụ a, ọ zụrụ dị ka onye enyemaka nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke oge agha, Sir Archibald MacIndoe
Prọfesọ Thomas gụrụ akwụkwọ na Methodist Boys' High School Lagos na Mahadum Birmingham England
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi Naijiria na onye ọsụ ụzọ nke College of Medicine University of Lagos na onye Naijiria mbụ a nabatara na Royal College of Surgeons of England
Ọ bụkwa onye isi mbụ nke Ụlọ Ọgwụ Nkụzi nke Mahadum, LUTH
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi ukwu na onye na-awa ahụ na Mahadum Ibadan, na mmalite nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1962 tupu ọ gaa Lagos
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke West African Medical Journal ma bụrụ onye otu Federal Electoral Commission na 1958
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke kọmitii ndụmọdụ maka nguzobe Midwestern Medical Centre (nke bụzi Mahadum nke Benin Teaching Hospital ugbu a) n'etiti afọ 1969

Mmemme Oro bụ mmemme nke obodo na obodo ndị Yoruba na-eme
Ọ bụ mmemme ọdịnala a na-eme kwa afọ bụ nke sitere na nna ochie, ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụ naanị ụmụ nwoke bụ ndị nna nna na-eme ya n'ebe a kapịrị ọnụ ebe emume a na-eme
Ọ na-efe chi/ orisha, Orò, chi ndị Yoruba nke ndị na-agba ehi na ikpe ziri ezi
N'oge ememme ahụ, ụmụ nwanyị na ndị na-abụghị ụmụ amaala na-anọ n'ime ụlọ dịka akụkọ ihe mere eme ọnụ naekwu na ndị inyom na ndị na-abụghị ndị na-adịghị ahụ agaghị ahụ Oro
Ememe ndị na-agba gburugburu ememe Oro dị iche n’obodo ruo n’obodo, a na-akpọkarị otu mgbe eze nwụsịrị
Mgbe Oba nwuru, a na-eme mgbaghara pụrụ iche na oge iru uju
Ọ na-agụnyekarị àjà mmadụ nke ndị na-eso ụzọ gọnarịrị nke ukwuu
A na-ekwu na Oro na-eme ka ọ dị yie uwe mwụda nwere shells ma na-achọ ihe mkpuchi osisi na-acha ọcha na ọbara na-egbu egbugbere ọnụ

N'ịbụ onye guzosiri ike na ebumnuche azụmahịa ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa, OIB na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ akụ azụmahịa zuru ụwa ọnụ dị ka mkpokọta nkwụnye ego, ịgbazinye ego, ọrụ nnyefe, na ọrụ ụlọ akụ mba ụwa na ụlọ akụ na-enweghị ọmụrụ nwa
Ụlọ akụ ewepụtala sistemu ụlọ akụ eletrọnịkị dị ka kaadị akụ nke a maara dị ka Oro-Card (ATM na POS), Mobile Banking akpọrọ Oro-Cash, Agent Banking-Oro Agent na Internet banking bụ Oro-Click
Ọnụ ọgụgụ nke alaka OIB eruola 225 na Etiopia niile jikọtara ya na usoro ụlọ akụ isi
Banklọ akụ ugbu a bụ otu n'ime ụlọ akụ nzuzo kachasị emetụta na ama ama na Etiopia ma marakwa maka ịsụ ụzọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ na-enweghị mmasị
Oromo (/ ˈɒrəmoʊ/ ma ọ bụ /ɔːˈroʊmoʊ/; Oromo Afaan Oromoo), nke a na-akpọbu Galla (aha nke nwere nkọwa pụtara ya mere ndị Oromo jụrụ ya), bụ asụsụ Afroasiatic nke sitere na ngalaba Cushitic
O sitere na steeti Oromia nke Etiopia na ndị Oromo na agbụrụ ndị gbara agbata obi na mpi Afrịka na-asụ ya
A na-eji ya dị ka asụsụ franca karịsịa na Etiopia na ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Kenya

N'inwe ihe karịrị nde mmadụ iri atọ na isii na-asụ asụsụ nke mejupụtara pasentị 338 nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị Etiopia niile, Oromo nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị ukwuu nke ndị na-asụrụ asụsụ n'Etiopia, ma bụrụ asụsụ nke abụọ a na-asụgharị n'Ethiopia site na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-ekwu okwu (gụnyere ndị na- asụ asụsụ nke abụọ) na-esote Amharic
Ụdị Oromo na-asụ dị ka asụsụ mbụ site na ọkara nde mmadụ ọzọ n'akụkụ ugwu na ọwụwa anyanwụ Kenya
Ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke ndị na-akwaga mba ndị ọzọ dị n'Afrịka dịka South Africa, Libya, Egypt na Sudan na-asụkwa ya
Oromo bụ asụsụ Cushitic a na-asụkarị ma n'etiti asụsụ ise nke Africa nwere ọtụtụ ndị na-asụrụ ya

Oromo na-eje ozi dị ka otu n'ime asụsụ ọrụ gọọmentị nke Etiopia ma bụrụkwa asụsụ ọrụ nke ọtụtụ steeti n'ime usoro gọọmentị etiti Etiopia gụnyere mpaghara Oromia, Harari na Dire Dawa na mpaghara Oromia na mpaghara Amha
Ọ bụ asụsụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Oromia, Harari, Dire Dawa, Benishangul-Gumuz na Addis Ababa na nke mpaghara Oromia na mpaghara Amhara
A na-eji ya dị ka asụsụ ịntanetị maka webụsaịtị gọọmentị yana Tigrinya
N'okpuru ọchịchị Haile Selassie, a machibidoro Oromo iwu n'agụmakwụkwọ, na mkparịta ụka, na n'ihe gbasara nchịkwa

Oron Museum bụ ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie dị na Oron, Nigeria

E guzobere ya bụ ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ n'afọ 1958 iji nabata narị mmadụ asatọ (108) a maara (Ekpu Oro) nke ndị Oron nke a kwenyere na ọ bụ otu n'ime ihe osise osisi kachasị ochie na nke kachasị mma na Africa
N'oge agha obodo, e bukọrọ ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise osisi ahụ ma mebie ihe ngosi nka ahụ nke ukwuu
N'afọ 1975, e megharịrị ihe ngosi nka ahụ ma taa, ọ nwere ihe ndị fọdụrụ n'ime ihe ọkpụkpụ osisi na ihe ndị ọzọ sitere na Naịjirịa
Ụlọ ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwekwara ihe ngosi nke bunkers eji eme ihe n'oge agha obodo yana obodo ọrụ aka
Mmemme Oronna bụ emume ochie nke ala eze Iilaro na-eme
Ilaro bụ obodo dị na steeti Ogun, yana isi ụlọ ọrụ YEWA southwest local government nke a makwaara dị ka YEWALAND
Ndị Ilaro na-eme mmemme Oronna kwa afọ iji chekwaa, kwado na ime emume omenala obodo Ilaro bara ụbara
Oronna nke ndị Ilaro mara na ọ bụ dike, dike nwere obi ike bụ onye e kwuru na o mere ọtụtụ mmeri n'ala n'oge agha, nke ka ukwuu megide ndị agha Dahomean bụ ndị na-eyi udo nke Ala ahụ egwu mgbe niile
Ọ bụ nwoke na-ama ọdịiche, ma nyefee onwe ya na nchekwa, ọdịmma nke ala ahụ ka ọ na-eguzo n'agha iji chebe ala ahụ pụọ n'aka ndị omempụ

Oroxylum indicum bụ ụdị osisi na-agbasa okooko nke sitere na monotypic genus Oroxylus na ezinụlọ Bignoniaceae, a na-akpọkarị ya osisi opi India, oroxylum, okooko osisi opi India
Ọ nwere ike iru mita 18 (59 )
A na-eji akụkụ dị iche iche nke osisi ahụ eme ihe na ọgwụ ọdịnala, ebe a maara ya dị ka Shyonaka ma ọ bụ Sona Patha
Nnukwu ahịhịa akwụkwọ na-akpọnwụ ma daa n'osisi ahụ ma na-agbakọta n'akụkụ ala nke ogwe osisi ahụ, na-eyi ka ọ dị ka ụyọkọ ọkpụkpụ gbajiri agbaji

Akwụkwọ pinnate dị ihe dịka 1 mita (33 ft) n'ogologo na obosara, na-ebute na petioles ma ọ bụ stalks ruo mita 2 (66 ) n'ogologo, na-eme ka nke a bụrụ nke kachasị n'ime akwụkwọ osisi dicot niile, nke bụ quadripinnate (akwụkwọ na-egosi usoro anọ nke alaka)
Osisi ahụ bụ ihe na-acha n'abalị na okooko osisi na-eme ka ha kwekọọ na mmịpụta nke ụmụ oke
Ha na-emepụta nnukwu mkpụrụ osisi na-adịru mita 15 (49 ) n'ogologo nke na-anọdụ n'alaka ndị na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla, na-eyi mma agha
Mkpụrụ osisi ahụ dị ogologo na-agbadata ma yie nku nke nnukwu nnụnụ ma ọ bụ mma ogwu ma ọ bụ agha na-ese n'abalị, na-enye aha ahụ 'osisi Damocles'
Mkpụrụ ya dị gburugburu na nku akwụkwọ
Oroxylum indicum bụ nwa amaala nke mpaghara India, ugwu Himalayan na akụkụ gbasaa na Bhutan na ndịda China, Indochina na mpaghara Malesia
Na Vietnam, a na-akpọ osisi ahụ núc nác (mgbe ụfọdụ sò ফল), a pụkwara ịchọta ụdị ya na Cat Tien National Park
A na-ahụ ya n'ọhịa biome nke Manas National Park na Assam, India
A na-ahụ ya, zụlite ya ma kụọ ya n'ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu n'ọhịa nke mpaghara Banswara na steeti Rajasthan na India
A na-akọ na ndepụta nke osisi ndị dị ụkọ, ndị nọ n'ihe ize ndụ na ndị nọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke Kerala (South India)
A na-ahụkwa ya na Sri Lanka
Oroxylum indicum na-ebi na mmekọrịta ya na actinomycete Pseudonocardia oroxyli dị n'ala gbara mgbọrọgwụ gburugburu
Septobasidium bogoriense bụ ụdị fungal nke na-akpata velvet blight na O
indicum

Akụkụ dị iche iche nke O

indicum, gụnyere akwụkwọ, mgbọrọgwụ mgbọrọgwụ, osisi obi, na mkpụrụ, nwere kemịkal dị iche iche, dị ka prunetin, sitosterol, oroxindin, oroxylin-A, biochanin-A, ellagic acid, tetuin, anthraquinone, na emodin
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ndị ahụ dị n'okpuru nyocha mbụ iji chọpụta ihe ndị nwere ike ịbụ ihe ndị dị ndụ
A na-akụkarị osisi ahụ dị ka osisi ịchọ mma maka ọdịdị ya dị ịtụnanya
Ihe eji eme ihe gụnyere osisi, tannins na akwa akwa
Ndị Kirat, Sunuwar, Rai, Limbu, Yakha, Tamang na Nepal, Thai na Thailand na Lao na Laos na-eji osisi ahụ eme ihe
Na Himalayas, ndị mmadụ na-akwụnye ihe a tụrụ atụ ma ọ bụ okpueze ndị e ji mkpụrụ O
indicum (Skr
shyonaka) mee saịtị n'elu ụlọ ha n'ikwere na ha na-enye nchebe
Ọ bụ osisi nwere akwụkwọ ndị a na-eri eri, okooko osisi, pọd na ogwe osisi
A na-eri nnukwu pọd, nke a maara dị ka Lin mai ma ọ bụ Lin fa na Loei, karịsịa na Thailand na Laos
A na-ebu ụzọ sie ha n'elu ọkụ ọkụ ma mgbe ahụ, a na-etinyekarị mkpụrụ ndị dị n'ime ma rie ha na lap
A maara ya dị ka খ খ খ খkandai n'etiti ndị Bodos nke ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ India, a na-eri okooko ya na mkpụrụ osisi ya dị ka nri na-egbu egbu na osikapa
A na-ejikarị azụ a gwakọtara agwakọta ma ọ bụ nke a mịrị amị emepụta ya ma ha kwenyere na ọ nwere ọgwụ
Ndị Chakma na-eri pods ahụ na mpaghara ugwu Chittagong nke Bangladesh na India
A na-akpọ ya 'Hona Gulo' n'asụsụ Chakma
Osisi a bụ ihe oriri dị mkpa n'etiti ndị Karen, ndị na-enwekwa ekele maka uru ọgwụ ya
A na-esi okooko osisi ahụ esi ma na-eme ka ọ dị mma
A na-egbutu mkpụrụ osisi ndị na-eto eto na-enweghị isi ma na-eji mkpụrụ dị nro n'ime, na-enwe ụcha na ọdịdị nke akwụkwọ lettuce, na-eji na nri dị iche iche
A na-eji mkpụrụ Oroxylum indicum eme ihe na ọgwụ ọdịnala India Ayurvedic na Chinese
Mgbọrọgwụ mgbọrọgwụ bụ otu n'ime ihe ndị a na-eche na ọ bara uru na usoro ngwakọta na Ayurveda na ọgwụgwọ ndị ọzọ
Okooko osisi
Akwụkwọ osisi
Mkpụrụ osisi

Orrin Cromwell Evans (1902–1971) bụ onye odeakụkọ Afrika-American na-asụ ụzọ na onye na- ebi akwụkwọ na -atọ ọchị

A na-ewere ya dị ka 'onye edemede ojii mbụ na-ekpuchi ọrụ izugbe maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ọcha na United States,' o bipụtakwara All-Negro Comics, akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe nkiri mbụ a ma ama nke e dere na nke ndị edemede na ndị na-ese ihe na ndị America America dere
Nna Evans nwere akpụkpọ anụ na-acha ọcha ma nwee ike 'ịgafe' maka ọcha, mana nne ya na-acha oji na-eme mgbe ụfọdụ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-elekọta ezinụlọ mgbe ndị ọ na-amaghị bịara ileta ya
A manyere Orrin na-eto eto ka ọ chee ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ihu mgbe ọ dị obere n'ihi omume siri ike nke ndị mụrụ ya
Evans hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na klas nke asatọ
Evans malitere ọrụ n'akwụkwọ akụkọ dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị Africa America a ma ama bụ Philadelphia Tribune
Na mbido afọ 1930, Evans ghọrọ naanị onye Africa America na ndị ọrụ na The Philadelphia Record, ebe o dere banyere ịkpa ókè n'ime ndị agha n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Na The Record ọ chere egwu ọnwụ na ịkpa ókè ihu, gụnyere iwepụ ya na nzukọ ndị nta akụkọ Charles Lindbergh n'ihi ụcha akpụkpọ ahụ ya
Na mgbakwunye na The Record, Evans dere maka The Chicago Defender, The Philadelphia Independent, na The Crisis, akwụkwọ akụkọ nke NAACP
Onye na-akwado ịha nhata agbụrụ, Evans chere na ọ nwere ike iru ndị na-ege ntị ka ukwuu na akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị
Mgbe The Record mechiri mgbe ogologo oge gachara n'afọ 1947, Evans sonyeere onye nchịkọta akụkọ Rekord Harry T
Saylor, onye nchịkọta akụkọ egwuregwu Record Bill Driscoll na mmadụ abụọ ndị ọzọ iji guzobe ụlọ ọrụ mbipụta Philadelphia All-Negro Comics, Inc, ya na onwe ya dị ka onye isi oche
N'etiti afọ 1947, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bipụtara naanị mbipụta a maara nke All-Negro Comics, akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị dị peeji 48, nke nwere mkpuchi na-egbuke egbuke na mpempe akwụkwọ akụkọ

A maghị mgbasa ozi na nkesa nke ihe nkiri ahụ, dịka otu onye na-akọ akụkọ ọdịbendị na-ekwu n'oge ahụ, '[] Ọ bụ ezie na e nwere ihe oyiyi ole na ole nke ndị isi ojii mepụtara, dị ka ihe nkiri Jive Gray na All-Negro Comics, ihe oyiyi ndị a agbasaghị n'èzí obodo ndị isi ojii

Magazin Time na 1947 kọwara ndị ajọ mmadụ na isi ihe, 'Ace Harlem,' dị ka 'ndị na-eyi uwe zoot, ndị na-ekwu okwu jive Negro, ndị ọnụnọ ha na ihe ọchị onye ọ bụla ọzọ nwere ike ibute mkpesa banyere 'mgbagwoju anya agbụrụ'
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ niile dị n'ezinụlọ, Evans chere na ọ dịghị ndị na-agụ Negro ga-eche echiche onwe ha
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke 'Ace Harlem', Otú ọ dị, bụ onye uwe ojii Afrịka-Amerika; ihe odide dị na 'Lion Man na Bubba' bụ iji kpalie mpako ndị isi ojii na ihe nketa Afrịka ha

Evans gbalịrị ibipụta mbipụta nke abụọ mana enweghị ike ịzụta akwụkwọ akụkọ a chọrọ nke ọtụtụ kwenyere na ndị na-ekesa ya nwere ajọ mbunobi gbochiri ya ime, yana ndị na-asọmpi, ndị ocha na-ebipụta akwụkwọ (dị ka Parents Magazine Press na Fawcett Comics) nke malitere ịmepụta utu aha ojii nke ha
Orrin mechara rụọ ọrụ nka na Chester Times, na Philadelphia Bulletin site na 1962 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1971
O tinyere aka nke ukwuu n'òtù ndị nta akụkọ nke mpaghara Philadelphia bụ Philadelphia Press otú , Urban League nke Pennsylvania kwanyeere ya ùgwù
Dị ka onye nta akụkọ, ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na National Urban League na mgbakọ NAACP
N'afọ 1971, obere oge tupu ọnwụ ya, a kwanyeere Evans ùgwù na mgbakọ NAACP kwa afọ na Minneapolis ma mepụta agụmakwụkwọ n'aha ya
N'afọ 2011, e nyere ya na nwanne ya nwoke onyinye ECBACC Pioneer Lifetime Achievement Award maka ịmepụta All-Negro Comics
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara Evans na Will Eisner Award Hall of Fame maka ọrụ ya dị ka onye isi oche nke All-Negro Comics
Ortho Matarasị bụ ụlọ ọrụ America na-ahụ maka matarasị na ihe ndina nwere isi ụlọ ahịa na ụlọ ọrụ na-ere ahịa na La Mirada, California
E hiwere ya na 1957 na Gardena, California
N'afọ 1996, Ortho jikọtara ya na W
Simmons ụlọ ọrụ ma gbanwee aha ya ka ọ bụrụ WE
Bedding n'afọ 1997
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1998, High Street Holdings, nke ezinụlọ Karmin nwere, nwetara Ortho Mattress
N'afọ 2002, ụlọ ọrụ matarasị ahụ meghere ụlọ ọrụ nke ha na Cerritos, California ebe ha malitere ime ihe matarasị nke ha n'ụlọ
A na-akpọ aha WE Bedding Ortho Mattress n'afọ 2004
N'afọ 2007, ọ kwagara mmepụta ngwaahịa ya niile na Southern California site na China ma n'afọ sochirinụ kwagara isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na La Mirada, California
N'afọ 2007, ọ weghachiri mmepụta niile nke ngwaahịa ya na Southern California site na China
N'afọ 2018, onye na-ere matarasị na-eme atụmatụ ịgbasa na Arizona iji nye ohere mmepụta nke ihe ndị ọzọ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Ortho Mattress nwere ihe karịrị ụlọ ahịa 70 n'ógbè ahụ gụnyere Los Angeles, Orange, San Diego, Ventura na Santa Barbara
Onye na-eme matarasị na-ewe ihe dịka mmadụ 240
A kpọrọ Ortho Matarasị 'Ụlọ ahịa akwa akwa kacha mma' na mpaghara Valley/Ventura nke Los Angeles site n'aka ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ Los Angeles Times na mbụ ya Readers' Choice 2012
A na-emepụta akara ndị dị ka Avant,Cool Quilt, Rata, Dọkịta ahọrọ, Dọkịta ahọpụtara ebe nchekwa na mkpokọta klọb n'okpuru akara Ortho Mattress, Inc
Ha na-ebukwa ụdị matarasị kachasị elu dị ka Tempur-Pedic, Stearns na Foster, na Aireloom
Orthosomnia bụ okwu ahụike maka nchegbu na-adịghị mma maka ihi ụra zuru oke

Ndị na-eme nchọpụta si na Rush University Medical College na Northwestern University's Feinberg School of Medicine chepụtara okwu a na nyocha nke e bipụtara na Febụwarị 15, 2017 na Journal of Clinical Sleep Medicine nke akpọrọ 'Orthosomnia Are Some Patients Taking the Quantified Self Too Far?' ebe ndị nchọpụta na eme ka anyị si nọrọ na ụdị nke chọpụtara na ndị ọrịa atọ ahụ na-ehi ụra na-ebiga oge ókè n'àkwà iji mụbaa 'ọnụ ọgụgụ ụra' ha, nke nwere ike ime ka Insomnia ha ka njọ

Sabra Abbott, onye enyemaka prọfesọ nke neurology na Mahadum Northwestern na otu n'ime ndị nchọpụta na-etinye aka na nyocha ahụ, chọpụtara na mbụ Orthosomnia mgbe ndị ọzọ ụra mbụ Nile nke ụwa ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya malitere inwe 'ọtụtụ ndị ọrịa na-abata na ihe omume nke na-emezughị nkọwa ọdịnala nke ehighị ụra, mana nke ahụ ka na-eme ka ha na-ehi ụra n'abalị'

Abbott chọpụtakwara na n'ihi na ndị na-arịa ọrịa Orthosomnia na-adabere na ngwaọrụ ha na-enyocha ụra, 'ha na-ebibi ụra ha n'ezie' n'ihu na ụdị ke amụta site na iji n'ihi ya, ha anaghị atụ ihe onye na-enyo ha weere dị ka 'ezi' ụra

Ọru ugbo bụ aka ọrụ e jiri mara ọtụtụ mba na obodo di n'elu ụwa
A na-arụkari ọrụ ugbo n'ime ime obodo ebe enwere obosara ala
Nwoke, nwanyi, okorobịa na agbọghọbịa na-arụ ọrụ ugbo
A bia na ala Igbo, a ga-asị na obodo nile na-arụ oru ugbo
N'ezie, e ji ọrụ ugbo mara ndi Igbo
Ọtụtụ ihe ana-arụpụta na ọrụ ugbo bụ akpụ, ji, ede, ose, ndukwu, osikapa, ọka, ojoko na tomato
E nwekwara mkpụrụ osisi di iche iche a na-akọpụta na ọrụ ugbo dịka oloma, ube, ụdara, ụtụ, mangolo, une were diri gazie
Akwụkwọ nri ndi a na-akọpụta bụ ugu, arịgbe, keremkerem, ụgbọgurụ, nchụanwụ, keremkerem, elimieọnụ, anyụ, ọkazị na ndi ọzọ

Ọrụ ugbo chọrọ mmiri, aja di mma na ala di larịị
