Oyilattam ( Tamil ; pụtara ịgba egwu amara) bụ egwu ndị mmadụ sitere na mpaghara Madurai nke Tamil Nadu
Egwu a sitere na ndịda Tamil Nadu ma bụrụ nke a na-eme na mpaghara Madurai, Tirunelveli na mpaghara Tiruchirapalli

Ọ bụ omenala ịgba egwu ebe ụmụ nwoke ole na ole ga-eguzo n'ahịrị n'ahịrị na akwa egwu abụọ n'azonye steepụ dị egwu na egwu egwu, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-agba egwu na-abawanye; N'ime afọ iri gara aga, ụmụ nwanyị amalitela ịgba egwu a
Na-emekarị, ihe egwu ha bụ Thavil na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na eke awka nwere colour na mkpuru aka ha ma na-eyi mgbịrịgba ụkwụ
Oyilattam bụ otu n'ime nka ọha ndị mahadum Tamil mara maka ịgbasa ya
A na-emekarị Oyilattam n'ememme obodo
Ọ bụ egwu a na-eji eme ihe mgbe owuwe ihe ubi na-echebe mkpụrụ n'aka nnụnụ
UOyin Oladejo (born Àtụ Circa in Ibadan, Nigeria) is a Nigerian-born Canadian actress, known for portraying Joann Owosekun on the television series Star Trek Discovery
A mụrụ Oladejo na Ibadan, Nigeria ma tolite na Lagos
Ọ kwagara Canada na afo 2001 mgbe ọ dị afọ 16
O bu ụzọ mee atụmatụ ịmụ iwu, jụrụ ya, wee nweta ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere tiketi maka Canadian Opera Company, ebe ọ chọpụtara mmasị ya n'ime ihe nkiri
Ọ gụchakwara akwụkwọ mmụta na nka ihe nkiri na Humber College dị na Toronto, na Soul Pepper Academy na Toronto

Na mgbakwunye na mmemme ihe nkiri mgbe niile na Toronto, ọ na-arụ ọrụ nkwado na obere ihe nkiri, ma ọ bụghị ya enweghị ihe nkiri ọ bụla; dịka nkwupụta nke ya siri kwuo na N'ajụjụ ọnụ, ọ na-achọ ịhapụ ọrụ ime ihe nkiri

N'ikpeazụ, ọ nakweere ndụmọdụ nke onye ọrụ ya na vidiyo nke onwe ya nke ihe nkedo, na-amaghị ihe mmepụta ya, ma n'oge na-adịghị anya ahọpụtara ya maka ọrụ onye ọrụ akwa mmiri Joann Owosekun na Star Trek Discovery
Oladejo apụtalakwara nakwa usoro ahụ kemgbe oge mbụ nke usoro ahụ
N' onwa ndị sochirinụ, a hụrụ ya na ọrụ Ophelia na William Shakespeare 's Hamlet na ọrụ nwoke nke Lopakhin na Cherry Orchard Anton Chekhov
Oyingbo Bus Terminal dị na Oyingbo Rd, Lagos Mainland, Lagos State, Nigeria
Ebe ọba ụgbọala ahụ ka a rụrụ n'etiti mpaghara Oyingbo ma ya na Yaba, Iddo na Ijora / Costain axis nwere ókèala
Oyingbo Bus Terminal bụ ọdụ nwanne nwanyị nke Oshodi na Ikeja Bus Terminals
Bọs ndị ahụ nwere ikuku oyi zuru oke ma dị mfe
Ebe bọs na-akwụsị dị n'etiti ahịa Oyingbo na-arụsi ọrụ ike
Ịdị mfe ịbanye n'àgwàetiti ahụ na mpaghara ndị ọzọ dị na Lagos site na bọs bụ uru nke ebe ọdụ bọs a dị

Ọ bụ Gọvanọ Akinwunmi Ambode-led administration malitere iwu ọdụ ụgbọ ala Oyingbo na 2017 dị ka akụkụ nke Bus Reform Initiative nke Gọọmentị Lagos Steeti, ga-abụ ọdụ ụgbọ ala kachasị ukwuu na steeti nwere ike ijere nde mmadụ anọ ozi
N'afọ 2017, Gọọmentị Steeti Lagos wepụtara ụdị prototype nke Oyingbo BRT Bus Terminus nye ọha na eze, dịka prototype si kwuo, ọdụ ahụ ga-enwe ike ịnwe ọ dịkarịa ala 50-60 BRT Buses na mgbatị

Ndị na-ahụ maka njem n'ógbè Lagos Metropolitan Area Transport Authority, LAMATA na Lagos Bus Services Limited, LBSL, zigara bọs Midi (40-Passenger Medium) na ọdụ bọs ahụ, n'ụzọ kwekọrọ na ọrụ ahụ na-eme ka obere bọs na-acha odo odo nke nwere oche 14-18 na bọs ndị njem 40 na bọs dị elu nke nwere ikike dị elu iji belata ọnụ ọgụgụ bọs na'okporo ụzọ steeti ahụ, melite gburugburu ebe obibi nke steeti site na mbelata ikuku carbon, melite oge njem na ime ka mmekọrịta ọha na eze (PPP)
Nke a ga-agbakwa ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ ume ịhapụ ụgbọala ha n'ụlọ ma jiri bọs mee ihe iji belata mkpọchi okporo ụzọ
Bọs LBSL bụ usoro bọs dị elu nke na-arụ ọrụ na obodo Lagos
Ọ bụ Lagos Bus Services Limited (LBSL) na-arụ ọrụ na bọs ndị ahụ

Lagos Bus Services Limited (LBSL) bụ ụlọ ọrụ nke gọọmentị Akinwumi Ambode guzobere E debanyere aha ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na abalị nke 1 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2016 dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-enweta ihe onwunwe njem, ọrụ, na ọrụ ndụmọdụ
N'oge ngagharị iwe #ENDSARS nke afọ 2020, ndị na-agba ọkụ gbara ọkụ na ọdụ ụgbọ ala ọhụrụ Oyingbo Bus Rapid Transport (BRT) na Lagos, na-ebibi ọtụtụ narị bọs BRT ọhụrụ
A kọrọ na ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke bọs BRT ọhụrụ a ka na-etinye n'okporo ụzọ mana a na-adọba ya na ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè dị n'azụ ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè na Oyingbo, ọkụ ahụ na-ere ọkụ
Ihe owuwu arụnyere na Terminal gụnyere nnukwu ebe maka njem na azụmahịa gụnyere buutu tiketi, ebe ntụrụndụ, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, wifi n'efu, ụlọ mposi nke oge a, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Gọọmentị steeti Lagos n'okpuru nchịkwa nke Gọvanọ Babajide Sanwo-Olu ekwuputala n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na ọ ga-enye ọrụ na ọdụ BRT na Oyingbo maka iji ọha na eze
Oyingbo Market bụ ụlọ ahịa ultramodern dị na Oyingbo, obodo ukwu dị na Ebute Metta nke Lagos Steeti
Ahịa ahụ bụ otu n'ime ahịa kachasị ochie na nke na-arụ ọrụ ike na Lagos si otú a na-enye aka dị ukwuu na akụ na ụba nke steeti ahụ
E guzobere ahịa Oyingbo na mbido afọ 1920 dị ka ebe nchekwa maka ihe ọkụkụ
Ahịa ahụ ji nwayọọ nwayọọ gbasaa n'ihi mmepe gburugburu mpaghara Oyingbo, Ebute Metta na Lagos Mainland
N'afọ 1930, a kwagara ndị ahịa si n'okporo ụzọ Apapa gaa n'ahịa Oyingbo iji bulie ahịa ahụ n'ihu na-eme ka ahịa bụrụ nnukwu ụlọ ahịa nke ga-adọta ndị ahịa si akụkụ ọ bụla nke Naịjirịa

E emebiri ahịa Onyingbo n'okpuru nchịkwa nke onye isi oche nke Island Lagos n'oge ahụ na mgbalị iji wughachi ya n'ahịa ultramodern site na mmekorita ya na ngalaba onwe onye na-akpọ Chief MKO Abiola ka ọ tọọ ntọala nke ahịa ọhụrụ ahụ
N'afọ 2015, onye bụbu Gọvanọ nke Lagos Steeti Babatunde Fashola nyere iwu ka ahịa ọhụrụ a rụzigharịa mgbe mgbalị iji wughachi ahịa ahụ si n'otu nchịkwa gaa na nke ọzọ

Ihe owuwu ahịa ọhụrụ nke Oyingbo bụ ụlọ nwere okpukpu anọ nke e wuru n'ala dị square mita 504 nke nwere ihe dị ka ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala 150 n'ala ala, ụlọ ahịa 622 mepere emepe, ụlọ ahịa mkpọchi 102, ọfịs 48 mepere emepi, ụlọ mposi 134 na ọnụ ụzọ mpụga isii
A na-eme atụmatụ na e wuru ụlọ ahịa ahụ na ọnụ ahịa nke ijeri
Iyaloye Oyinkansola 'Oyinkan' Abayomi, Lady Abayomi (6 Machị 1897 ruo 19 Machị 1990) bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka mba na ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bụ onye isi nke n'ahu m'aka Nduzi nwanyi na Naijiria nakwa onye guzobere Otu ndi nwanyi na Naijiria
A mụrụ ya but Oyinkansola Ajasa na Naijiria n'afọ 1897
Ezinụlọ ya kpọrọ ya Oyinkan (ụdị mkpirikpi nke Oyinkansola)
O nwere nwanne nwoke nke obere, ahaya by Akuisola
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ
Nna ya bụ Sir Kitoye Ajasa, onye ama ama n'ebo Saro bụ onye Naijiria mbụ ndị Britain mere knight, nne ya bụ Lucretia Olayinka Moore, onye omoba nke ezinụlọ eze Egba
Ọ bụkwa nwa nwanne nne Kofo, Lady Ademola
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Anglican Girls' Seminary, Lagos
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1909
Ọ gakwara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Young Ladies Academy na Ryford Hall, nke dị na Gloucestershire, England
N'afọ 1917, ọ gara Royal Academy of Music na London
Ọ laghachiri Lagos na 1920
Ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi egwu na Anglican Girls' Seminary
Ọ bụ n'oge a ka ọ zutere onye ọka iwu aha ya bụ Moronfolu Abayomi
Ha lụrụ n'August 1923
Egburu ya n'ụlọ ikpe ọnwa abụọ ka e mesịrị
Mgbe ọ nọ n'England, Abayomi sonyeere otu ndu umunwanyi
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa, ọ jikọtara ya na otu Nduzi nwanyi Naijiria nke do na Lagos , nke otu nwanyị Bekee guzobere
Abayomi sonyeere otu ahụ ma bụrụ nwanyị Naijiria mbụ jere ozi dị ka onye nlekọta
Ọ malitekwara ịrụsi ọrụ ike na agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwanyị ntorobia na Naịjirịa, nke na-ahaghị ka nke ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwoke ntorobia
Ọ sonyeere Òtù Ụmụ nwanyị Lagos
O mere nchịkọta ego na ịkwalite maka Queen's College site na West African Educated Girls' Club, otu o guzobere
Ọ meghere na 1927
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Ọ bụ naanị onye Naijiria na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ
N'oge a, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ na Lagos na-anya ụgbọala
N'afọ 1930, Abayomi lụrụ dọkịta Kofo Abayomi
N'afọ 1931, gọọmentị Naịjirịa nabatara otu ndu umunwanyi ma nye ya nkwado
Abayomi ghọrọ onye isi kọmishọna maka Girl Guides
Ọ bụ onye isi nke otu ndu umunwanyi na Naijiria na nwanyị Naijiria mbụ na-arụ ọrụ maka nzukọ ahụ
Ọ sonyeere Ntughari ndị ntorobịa Naijiria na 1935

O dere otu isiokwu na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke nzukọ ahụ n'afọ ahụ, na-achọ ka ụmụ nwanyị bara ọgaranya nke Naịjirịa lụọ ọgụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị ma dị njikere iso ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'etiti na nke dị ala rụọ ọrụ maka ikike ndị ahụ
Na Mee 10, 1944, o guzobere Nigerian Women's Party n'oge nzukọ ya na ụmụ nwanyị iri na abụọ
Nzukọ ahụ chọrọ ikike nhata maka ụmụ nwanyị
Mgbe Eze Nwanyị nke United Kingdom mere Kofo Abayomi knight na 1954, Abayomi ghọrọ onye a maara dị ka Lady Abayomi
Sir Kofo Abayomi nwụrụ na 1 Jenụwarị 1979
Abayomi lara ezumike nká na Girl Guides na 1982
A kpọrọ ya Onye isi oche nke Girl Guides maka ọrụ ya
A na-asọpụrụ Abayomi na utu aha ise nke ndị isi Naijiria, gụnyere nke Iya Abiye nke Egbaland
Ọ nwụrụ na 19 Machị 1990
Barakat Oyinlomo Quadre (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2003) bụ onye Naijiria na-egwu tenis
Ọ bụ onye Naijiria kachasị elu ugbu a na WTA ụmụ nwanyị otu
As of March 2018[update], ọ bụ onye mbụ na Naijiria, nke 9 na Africa na 945 n'ụwa na ụmụ nwanyị na-alụbeghị di
Quadre nọchitere anya Naijiria na Billie Jean King Cup, na-eme nke mbụ ya na 2021
Quadre malite ịgba tenis mgbe ọ dị afọ 4
Dị ka onye na-eto eto, ọ nọ n'ọkwa 173 na 17 Juunu 2019
Na 2015 ITF / CAT Junior Championship na Morocco, Quadre guzobere onwe ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu tennis kachasị mma n'Africa, ma nweta agụmakwụkwọ na High Performance Center na Morocco
Na 2016 ITF U-18 Championship, Quadre mere nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ
N'afọ 2017, meriri Chakira Dermane nke Togo 6-0, 6-0 iji setịpụ esemokwu ikpeazụ na Sophia Biolay nke France
Na mba, a họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Naijiria na 2016 Africa Junior Tennis Championship
O meriri ITF / CAT U-16 Championship na Togo
Na 2018 Lagos Open, Quadre meriri Airhunmwunde, 6-1, 6-0 iji ruo eru maka agba nke abụọ
N'egwuregwu ya ọzọ, Anna Sisková meriri ya wee pụọ n' asọmpi ahụ

Oyiri Oyibo bụ ọrụ nchọpụta plagiarism n'ịntanetị na-enyocha ma ọdịnaya ederede yiri ya ọ pụtara ebe ọzọ na webụ
Ewepụtara ya na 2004 site na Indigo Stream Technologies, Ltd
Ndị nwe ọdịnaya na-eji Copyscape chọpụta ikpe nke 'izu ohi ọdịnaya', nke a na-e copyomi ọdịnaya na-enweghị ikike site n'otu saịtị gaa na nke ọzọ
Ndị na-ebipụta ọdịnaya na-ejikwa ya iji chọpụta ikpe nke wayo ọdịnaya, ebe a na-akwakọghachi ọdịnaya ochie wee ree ya dị ka ọdịnaya izizi ọhụrụ
A malitere Copyscape na 2004 site na Indigo Stream Technologies, Ltd, nke Gideon Greenspan hiwere na 2003
Dị ka ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Greenspan si kwuo, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mepụtara ọrụ ịdọ aka ná ntị a na-akpọ Google Alert, nke ọrụ Copyscape toro dị ka mmụba
Nyere URL ma ọ bụ ederede nke ọdịnaya izizi, Copyscape weghachite ndepụta ibe weebụ nwere ederede yiri ya na ọdịnaya niile ma ọ bụ akụkụ nke ọdịnaya a
Ọ na-egosikwa ederede dakọtara agbanyere na ibe weebụ achọtara
Enwere ike idowe ọkọlọtọ Copyscape na ibe weebụ iji dọọ ndị na-eme ihe ike aka na ntị ka ha ghara izu ohi ọdịnaya
Copysentry na-enyocha webụ ma na-eziga ọkwa site na email mgbe achọtara mbipụta ọhụrụ, yana Copyscape Premium na-enyocha mmalite nke ọdịnaya nke ndị mbipụta ọdịnaya n'ịntanetị zụtara
Copyscape na-eji Google Weebụ API mee ka nchọta ya dị ike
Copyscape na-eji usoro algọridim iji chọpụta ọdịnaya e depụtaghachiri emezigharị site na ụdị mbụ ya
A kọpụtala iji Copyscape mee ihe n'okwu metụtara mpụ n'ịntanetị
Oyo bụ obodo ochie na Oyo Steeti, Naijiria

E hiwere ya dị ka isi obodo nke fọdụrụ n'alaeze Oyo nke akụkọ ihe mere eme n'afọ 1830, ma ndị obodo ya mara ya dị ka 'Oyo Ọhụrụ' (Ọ̀yọ́ Àtìbà) iji mata ọdịiche dị na ya site n'isi obodo mbụ ruo n'ebe ugwu, ' Oyo ochie ' (Ọ̀yọ́)
-Ilé), nke gbahapụrụ n'ihi agha mgbanwe ndị Yoruba
Ndị bi na ya bụ ndị Yoruba ka ukwuu, onye na-achị ya bụ Alaafin nke Oyo
N'ihi oke ọchịchị nke alaeze ukwu Oyo nwere n'oge ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka, a na-echekarị n' ọ bụ ndị otu agbụrụ Oyo nke ndị Yoruba bụ ndị na-achị ebo ahụ

Nke a bụ eziokwu ruo n’ezie, na onye ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Yoruba bụ́ Samuel Johnson kọrọ na ndị Egba – bụ́ ndị malitere dị ka ndị Oyo – mgbe ha kpebiburu ọkwa ọnọdụ ọha mmadụ n’ime ezinụlọ ha site n’iji mara n' onye Egba ọ̀ ga-achọpụta agbụrụ ya wee laghachi na Oyo

Oyo nwere ụlọ ụlọ akwukwọ dị elu ise; Ndị a bụ Federal College of Education (Special), Ajayi Crowther University, Emmanuel Alayande College of Education (Erelu Campus na Isokun Campus), Surveying Federal School of Surveying (nke naanị ya bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ nyocha na Sub-sahara Africa), na Mahadum Atiba

Ọ nwere ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ọha na nkeonwe dịka Oke-Olola Community School, Olivet Baptist High School, School of Science, Saint Benardine Girls Grammar School, Ladigbolu Grammar School, Oranyan Grammar School, Emmanuel Alayande Model High School, Aatan Baptist Comprehensive High School, Shepherd's Field International College, Golden Valley Academy, Nesto College, SPED International College na ndi ọzọ
E nwere ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ma nkeonwe ya na nke ọha nwere ihe ọkụkụ ọhụrụ a na-ebo ebubo 'ero' ụlọ akwụkwọ ndi nkeonwe
Nnukwu ahịa dị n'obodo ahụ gụnyere ahịa Akesan, ahịa Ajegunle, ahịa Owode, ahịa Saabo, ahịa Oparinde (Oja-oke) na ahịa Irepo
Oyo nwere alaka ụlọakụ dị iche iche dịka GT Bank (Owode), First bank, Zenith Bank, Access Bank, Eco Bank, United Bank for Africa etc na ụfọdụ obere ụlọ akụ na ndị otu ndị ọzọ
Ọ nwekwara ụlọ ahịa nri na nnukwu ụlọ ahịa dịka Ace Supermarket, Joba Pharmacy na Stores, Stores Labake, Jara Supermarket na ndị ọzọ
Obodo a bụ ebe ọtụtụ ebe a na-anọ amụ ihe dị ka Ogige Ochie Oyo National Park nke nwere ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie (nke nwere ihe ndị sitere na Alaeze Ukwu Òyó oge ochie) na anụmanụ ole na ole
Ụfọdụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na Oyo gụnyere Labamba Hotel, Tees Resort na mmanya, Begonia hotel, Adesh Hotel, Gold N Rock Hotel, Galaxy Hotel na ndị ọzọ

Obodo ahụ nwere okpuru ọchịchị ime Obodo anọ, ha bụ ọchịchị ime obodo Atiba, nke dị na Offa-Meta; ochịchị ime obodo dị n' ọwụwa anyanwụ Oyo, nke isi ụlọ ọrụ ya bụ Kosobo; ọchịchị ime obodo dị n' odịda anyanwụ Oyo, nke isi ụlọ ọrụ ya bụ Ojongbodu na ọchịchị ime Obodo Afijio, nke hiwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Jobele
Obodo a dị n'etiti ụzọ abụọ, okporo ụzọ awara awara A1 si Lagos nke jikọtara ya site na Ibadan ruo ' Ilorin'

Ozoz Sokoh (amụrụ na ọnwa June 30, na afọr 1976) bụ onye edemede nri Naijiria
A maara ya dị ka kichin urukurubụba

A mụrụ ya na Warri, n'ụsọ oké osimiri ndịda Naịjirịa, njem Ozozī na nri malitere site na nri ụmụaka Wimpy na-enweghị ike iri hamburger, chips na Mirinda n'oge njem ezinụlọ na Edinburgh Summer Festival n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ nke afọ 85
Ọ gara Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo, Ile-Ife, Naijiria ruo afọ atọ, wee hapụ ya na afọ 1997, n'ihi ogologo ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke kpara - ma na-aga n'ihu na-ata ahụhụ - mahadum Naijiria n'oge ahụ
Ọ kwagara United Kingdom ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Geology (BSc
Hons) na Mahadum Liverpool N'oge ọ nọ na UK, ọ malitere isi nri Naijiria iji nwee mmetụta nke ịnọ nso n'ụlọ
Ọ bụ nna ya kpaliri ya, onye nwere mmasị isi nri ma na-eme ihe niile site na ihe ọhụrụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Liverpool, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka nchọpụta na onye ndụmọdụ azụmaahịa n'ime mmekọrịta azụmaahịa na gọọmentị
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya n'ụbọchị, Ozoz malitere nyocha nke nri Naijiria, nke toro mgbe ọ bi ma rụọ ọrụ na Netherlands site na afọ 2007 ruo na afọ 2011
O guzobere kichin urukurubụban'oge a
N'ebe ahụ, ọ na-edekọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nri, ntụziaka, usoro na ihe ndị ọzọ

Ọ na-akọwa ohere izute nri ọ maara n'oge ememme ụbọchị eze nwanyi na mba Netherlands dị ka oge dị mkpa, nke mere ka mkpebi ya ime nnyocha ma dee akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nri na ihe jikọrọ / njikọ n'ofe ọdịbendị

Ihe ọzọ bụ nchọpụta ya na mgbe a kpọgara ndị ohu na Brazil n'oge ahia ohu na-agafe Atlantic, otu n'ime ọtụtụ akụkụ nke ọdịbendị ha na ha were ma chekwaa bụ Acaraje, ihe na-ewu ewu na-esi nri na-acha oji nke a maara dị ka akara na Naịjirịa
Kemgbe afọ 2007, o mepụtara ọtụtụ ngosipụta mgbasa ozi nke ọrụ ya, na-ekwu na nri karịrị iri nri
Onye na-eme nchọpụta nri nke na-enyocha njikọ nke nri na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naijiria, mbata, ọrụ ugbo, na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ụfọdụ n'ime ebe ọrụ ya bụ
N'ịbụ nke Sokoh mepụtara na afọ 2013, New Nigerian Kitchen bụ nkà ihe ọmụma na omume nri nke na-eme emume ụtọ ọhụrụ na nke na-egbuke egbuke nke nri Naijiria

Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa n'afọ 2011, ọ malitere ime nchọpụta etu esi aghọta ihe ndị Naịjirị maara nke ọma site n'ịchọpụta na idepụta ojiji ha n'ụzọ dịgasị iche iche iji ghọta ohere ma mepụta efere site na ọdịnala gaa na nnwale na nke oge a
Ọ na-ewere usoro sayensị nke ịchọpụta profaịlụ ụtọ na textures iji hụ na New Nigerian Kitchen na-akọwa ma gbasaa echiche nke nri Naijiria na, mgbe niile, nri West Afrịka
Akụkụ ọzọ nke ọrụ ya bụ anthropology nri
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-enwekarị mgbọrọgwụ na nri Naijiria, ọrụ ya na-agafe mba ahụ na nri kọntinent iji nyochaa akụkọ ihe mere eme na njikọ

Nnyocha ya n'ógbè a abụwo isiokwu nke isiokwu, ihe ndekọ, pọdkastị, okwu na ihe ngosi gụnyere 2014 TEDx Port Harcourt okwu akpọrọ Journey by Plate Reimagining Nigerian Cuisine Ihe ọzọ bụ ihe ngosi banyere mmalite nke Agege Bread, ihe a na-eri na Naijiria, nke ọ nyochara ma gosipụta na ːFor Africansń
Sokoh na-eji nyocha na akwụkwọ kọọ akụkọ banyere ọdịbendị na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naijiria ma mee ka a mara nri Naijiria n'ụlọ na mba ofesi
Omume nri Sokoh gụnyere ịmepụta ihe onwunwe, ntụziaka na echiche
N'ebe ọzọ, Feast Afrique, ọ na-edekọ ihe nketa nri na ihe ọmụma nke West Africa na diaspora ya
Ọrụ a gụnyere ọbá akwụkwọ dijitalụ nke 240+ West African na Diasporic nri na akwụkwọ ọgụgụ nke na-ejikọta oghere ịnweta ihe ọmụma
Ntụziaka na Ntuziaka Sokoh edeela ntụziaka ndị e bipụtara na blọọgụ, isiokwu, akwụkwọ akụkọ, na akwụkwọ
N'afọ 2017, o mepụtara kalenda mmepụta oge mbụ nke Naijiria na-akọwapụta mkpụrụ osisi na akwụkwọ nri Naijiria yana nnweta oge ha
O mepụtara akwụkwọ nduzi maka ụtọ na ụtọ nke nri Naijiria
Echiche Ọ na-emepụta echiche nke ahụmahụ, gụnyere World Jollof Rice Day Festival nke mbụ e guzobere na afọ 2017
A na-eme emume a iji mee emume nri nke bụ nri kachasị amasị Naịjirịa na nke kachasị ewu ewu n'ụwa niile

Ihe ọzọ bụ bụ Akwụkwọ ahụ, echiche nke na-eme emume nri ndị Afrịka site na ederede ndị Afrịka ma hụ Sokoh na-eweta nri dị ndụ site na akwụkwọ akụkọ ka ndị na-abịa na mmemme akwụkwọ na nka wee nwee ike ịnwale ha
A na-egosi akwụkwọ ahụ na ememme ndị gụnyere afọ 2018 Ake Festival; afọ 2018 Eat Drink Food Festival; na afọ 2019 Afrolution Festival, Berlin
Ọ bụ onye na-ahazi Abori Food System Design Summit
N'ịbụ nke e mere na Alliance Française, Lagos na afọ 2019, nnọkọ ahụ gosipụtara ihe ngosi nri, mkparịta ụka na ahịa onye ọrụ ugbo
2020 - amụma amụma 2018 - Ihe nrite Nhọrọ Readersī nke Saveur Magazine maka blọgụ nri na omenala kacha mma

[circular reference] 2018 ̊ Eloy Awards Chef of the Year Nominee 2017 ̊ Eloyan Awards Female Chef or Food Designer Nominee 2017 Leading Ladies Africa isi nke 100 Most Inspiring Women in Energy Recognition Award 2010 - July Onye mmeri nke Swordfish nke Food 52

E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na usoro mgbasa ozi gụnyere CNN International's African Voices; Channels Television; na CGTN ebe ọ kọwara na ọrụ ya na nri Naijiria na-achọ ịgbanwe ihe ndị Naijiria riri n'ụlọ na ihe a na-enye na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Naijiria n'ụwa niile

Pépé Kallé, mgbe ụfọdụ edere ya dị ka Pepe Kalle (November 30, 1951 na November 29, 1998) bụ onye na-agụ egwú, onye na-eti egwu na onye ndú egwu si Democratic Republic of the Congo
Site na ụda olu dị iche iche na ọnụnọ dị ike, onye na-agụ egwú 210 cm (6 in) 150 kg (330 ) dekọrọ karịrị narị egwu atọ na abọm iri abụọ n'oge ọrụ afọ abụọ ya
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka 'enyí nke egwu Afrịka' na 'La Bombe Atomique,' Kallé mere ka ndị na-ege ntị nwee obi ụtọ site na arụmọrụ ya siri ike
Onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara bụ Solomon
Ọrụ egwu ya malitere na l'African Jazz, òtù nke Le Grand Kallé
O mechara rụọ ọrụ na Bella Bella wee bụrụ onye na-agụ egwú nke Lipua Lipua, ebe ya na Nyboma Mwandido bụrụ abụ
N'afọ 1972, Kallé na Dilu Dilumona na Papy Tex, hapụrụ Lipua Lipua iji guzobe otu nke ha akpọrọ Empire Bakuba
Alaeze Ukwu Bakuba natara aha ya site n'otu agbụrụ ndị agha Congolese, ọ na-ejikọkwa ụda olu sitere n'ime, ụda nke rumba a ma ama wepụrụ kemgbe
Ìgwè ahụ bụ ihe na-ewu ewu ozugbo, ya na Zaiko Langa Langa ha ghọrọ òtù ndị ntorobịa kachasị ewu ewu na Kinshasa
Site na egwu ndị dị ka Pépé Kallé's Dadou na Papy Tex's Sango ya mawa, òtù ahụ bụ ihe na-adịgide adịgide na chaatị
Ha mepụtara egwu ọhụrụ, kwassa kwassa
N'ụbọchị ncheta afọ iri ha n'afọ 1982, a họpụtara ndị otu ahụ ka ha bụrụ ndị otu Zaire
Na ime mmalite afọ 1980, Empire Bakuba gara na ihu na-eme njem n'ụzọ sara mbara mgbe ọ na-ewepụta ihe na-erughị abọm anọ na afọ
Ka ọ na-erule n'etiti afọ iri asatọ, ha nwere ọtụtụ ndị na-eso ụzọ na Francophone Central na West Africa
Njikọ ya na Nyboma na 1986 nke akpọrọ Zouke zouke bụ otu n'ime afọ ndị kacha ere ahịa albums
[citation needed] Mana ọ bụ mmekọrịta nke abụọ ya na Nykoma, Moyibi (1988), nke malitere ewu ewu ya n'Africa dum
N'abụ Moyibi, enwere akụkụ na njedebe nke na-ekwu Bakule, bakule
Akụkụ bakule sitere na egwu Rock-a-Mambo aha ya bụ Bakoule (Bidama), nke Honore Liengo dere na 1961
Na ngwụcha afọ 1980 na mmalite afọ 1990, Kallé jikọtara ihe ndị dị na ngwa ngwa nke soukous mepụtara na ụlọ ọrụ Paris
Abọm ya nke afọ 1990, Roger milla bụ otuto maka ihe ndị nnukwu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Cameroon, bụ ihe atụ mara mma nke ndokwa a
Pépé Kallé mechara webata ụfọdụ ndị na-agba egwú nwere nkwarụ uto dị ka Jolie Bebe, Dominic Mabwa na Ayilla Emoro n'òtù ya
Na afọ 1992, ndị otu ahụ chere nnukwu ọdachi mbụ ha ihu mgbe Emoro, onye na-agba egwu nke otu ahụ, nwụrụ mgbe ọ na-eme njem na Botswana
Na agbanyeghị ihe ndọghachi azụ a, ewu ewu Pépé Kallé nọgidere na-arị elu na afọ iri itoolu ka ọ wepụtara abọm dị ka Gigantafrique, Larger than life na Cocktail
Ya na akụkọ ifo ndị ọzọ dị ka Lutumba Simaro na N'Yoka Longo rụkọkwara ọrụ
Na ọnwa Nọvemba 28, nke afọ 1998, Pépé Kallé nwere nkụchi obi na ụlọ ya na Kinshasa ma kpọga ya na Clinique Ngaliema dị nso
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe etiti abalị gasịrị na Sunday November 29, a mara Pépé Kallé dị ka onye nwụrụ anwụ
A kọrọ na ihe kpatara ọnwụ ya bụ nkụchi obi
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, minista na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị na nka Juliana Lumumba kwupụtara na gọọmentị ga-eme ememe olili ozu maka dike ahụ dara na Disemba 6
Ọ rịọrọ ka a kwụsị egwu niile iji sọpụrụ ya
Mgbe ọ nwụrụ, Kallé natara otuto site n'aka ndị minista gọọmentị na ndị nkịtị
Ozu ya dị n'ọtụtụ ebe n'obodo ahụ ebe o biri ma rụọ ọrụ
A kọrọ na ihe karịrị otu nde mmadụ kwanyere ya ùgwù ikpeazụ na olili ozu ya na Palais du Peuple na n'okporo ụzọ olili oolu
E liri Pépé Kallé na Disemba 6 na Gombe Cemetery na nnukwu olili ozu steeti
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eto eto na-etolite na-eto nke ndị egwu egwu Congolese nwụrụ na nwata
Ụmụ ya ise hapụrụ ya

Ndị ọzọ kọwara ya dị ka onye hụrụ mba ya n'anya nke hụrụ mba yaanya ọbụna mgbe oge siri ike

'Na agbanyeghị ọnọdụ ọjọọ na Zaïre / Congo n'oge afọ ndị ikpeazụ nke Mobutu na n'okpuru ọchịchị Laurent Kabila, Pépé Kallé nọgidere na-ebi na Kinshasa, na-ajụ isonyere nnukwu ndị na-egwu egwu na Europe
Ọ bụ naanị onye egwu na-enwetụbeghị nsogbu na onye ọ bụla
O nwere ike ime ka ọgbọ egwu abụọ dịghachi n'otu, 'ka Tabu Ley kwuru
Onye nta akụkọ Congo bụ Achille Ngoie, onye kpuchiri Alaeze Ukwu Bakuba site na mmalite ya, chetara Kallé dị ka nwoke nke ndị mmadụ
'Kallé nwere ike ịnọ n'elu ikpo okwu na etiti abụ ma, ịhụ onye na ime ndị na-ege ntị ọ na-ahụbeghị kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, ọ nwere ike ikele onye ahụ na ime abụ ahụ

PM News bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na-ebipụta kwa ụbọchị na Lagos, Nigeria site na Independent Communications Network Limited (ICNL)
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ebipụtakwa akwụkwọ akụkọ TheNEWS magazin na Tempo, kwa izu

E hiwere PM News ahụ na 1993 site n'aka Bayo Onanuga, Babafemi Ojudu na ndị ọrụ mbụ sitere na African Concord bụ ndị gbara arụkwaghịm na mkpesa maka arịrịọ MKO Abiola, onye mbipụta akwụkwọ, rịọ President Ibrahim Babangida mgbaghara maka akụkọ dị egwu banyere ọchịchị ndị agha
Ojudu bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nchịkwa mbụ

Ka ọchịchị Babangida kpasuru ya iwe, e nwere obere oge nnwere onwe nke ndị nta akụkọ n'okpuru General Sani Abacha bụ oge ewepụtara PM News n'August 1994 dị ka akwụkwọ ehihie nke gbadoro ụkwụ na akụkọ mana na-ekpuchikwa ejiji, egwuregwu na ntụrụndụ
Paul Alfred Kwesi Aboagye (5 Jenụwarị 1925 - 19 Jụn 2001) bụ odee uri Ghana, odee, na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke asụsụ Nzema
A mụrụ Paul Alfred Kwesi Aboagye nye Tufuhene Koame Aboagye nke Nuba na Mary Bozomah Gyedu nke Ebonloa na mpaghara Jomoro nke ndị Nzema na mba Ghana
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị ya na Beyin na 5 Febụwarị 1934 wee gụchaa akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na 1942
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ụmụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Half Assini Roman Catholic Church ruo otu afọ, ọ gara kọleji ndị nkuzi na St
Augustine's College n'afọ 1944 wee nweta asambodo nkụzi ya
Ọrụ mbụ dị ka onye nkuzi a zụrụ azụ bụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ụka Roman Katọlik Half Assini ebe ọ kụziri ụmụ akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke afọ ikpeazụ na Form anọ
A kpọgara ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ụka Roman Katọlik nke Bonyere ebe ọ kụziri ụdị ụlọ akwụkwọ etiti nke atọ na anọ
E mechara bulie ya n'ọkwa ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe afọ abụọ na ọkara gasịrị
A kpọghachiri ya na Beyin na Axim dị ka onye isi nkuzi
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Nzema Literature and Culture Association - otu nzukọ nke nwere onye isi ala mbụ nke Ghana Dr
Kwame Nkrumah n'etiti ndị ọsụ ụzọ ya
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa odeakwụkwọ ukwu nsọpụrụ maka njikọ a ruo afọ iri abụọ na asaa
Ọ nọgidere n'ọkwa ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ

Ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ na Bureau of Ghana Languages mgbe afọ abụọ n'ọrụ ahụ gasịrị ma bụrụ onye ọsụ ụzọ na-akọ akụkọ asụsụ Nzema na oge ezumike na Redio Ghana mgbe ewepụtara asụsụ Nzema n'ime mmemme nke Ghana Broadcasting Corporation na 1960
Ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ gọọmentị Ghana na 1981 dị ka osote onye nduzi nke Bureau of Ghana Languages
Ọrụ idu ndú obodo ya n'etiti ndị Nzema na obodo ukwu Accra gụnyere ịbụ onye isi oche nke njikọ Accra/Tema Nzema, onye isi ezinụlọ Ahwea, na onyeisi oche nke njikọ ndị bi na Tawiafio
N'ọrụ a, ọ gbálìrì n'iweta udo n'etiti ndị mmadụ site na mgbochi esemokwu na ngwọta na-abụghị nke esemokwu site na iji omume ọdịnala na ụkpụrụ nke ọdịbendị Nzema
N'ụzọ dị otú a, o nwere ike ịzọpụta ọtụtụ alụmdi na nwunye ndị nọ na nsogbu dị iche iche
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ya bụ
O nyekwara aka sụgharịa nsụgharị agba ochie na nke ọhụrụ nke Bible n'asụsụ Nzema ma soro dee ọtụtụ akwụkwọ nkuzi maka usoro agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke obere na nke okenye

Dị ka ọ dị n'oge a na-ede ya, akwụkwọ e bipụtara mgbe ọ nwụsịrị nke a kpọrọ 'my wife's ghost' (akwụkwọ o dere) fọrọ nke nta ka ọ zuo ezuo ma kọọ ụzọ mmụọ nke nwunye mbụ ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ na-amụ nwa, si nwee nwunye ya nke abụọ n'oge niile
Phebean Ajibola Ogundipe, née Itayemi (1927-2020) bụ onye nkuzi na onye ọrụ obodo Naijiria
N'ịbụ onye na-ede dịka Phebean Itayemi, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị Naijiria mbụ e bipụtara n'asụsụ Bekee, mgbe ọ meriri asọmpi nkenke akụkọ nke British Council
O mechara bipụta akwụkwọ ọgụgụ n'okpuru aha PA Ogundipe
A mụrụ Phebean Itaemi na Esa-Oke, Osun State n'abali isii nke ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1927
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na Esa-oke na Imesi-ile tupu ọ gaa Queen's College, Lagos maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Mahadum St Andrews, wee nweta diplọma na Institute of Education na Mahadum London
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na Naijiria, ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi Bekee
Na njedebe nke akụkọ ahụ, nwa agbọghọ ahụ nwetara nnwere onwe, na-ahapụ obodo ya n'abalị iji zụọ ọzụzụ dịka nọọsụ

Itayemi zutere di ya, Adebayo Ogundipe, nwanne nwoke nke Babafemi Ogundipe tọrọ, onye mechara bụrụ Chief of Staff Supreme Headquarters n'etiti Jenụwarị na Ọgọọst 1966, mgbe ya na ya na-akụzi ihe na Queen's School, Ede
N'afọ 1960, ọ ghọrọ onye ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ na Western Region, wee bụrụ onye isi na kọleji Adeyemi College of Education
N'ịkwaga na Federal Ministry of Education n'afọ 1966, a kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ lekwara anya na ijikọ atụmatụ agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị gọọmentị etiti na nke Western Steeti
Ọ lara ezumike nká dị ka osote onye nduzi mmụta na Disemba 1976
N'afọ 2013, Ogundipe bipụtara akwụkwọ nke memoirs, Up-Country Girl
Ọ nwụrụ na Machị 27, 2020 na Charlotte, North Carolina
Prentice Herman Polk (Ọnwa Nọvemba 25, afọ 1898 - rụọ ọnwa Desemba 29, afọ 1984) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto nke a maara maka foto ya nke ndị Afrịka Amerịka
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ ọtụtụ afọ dị ka onye isi nke Ngalaba Foto nke Tuskegee Institute
A mụrụ Prentice Herman Polk n'ọnwa Nọvemba 25, afọ 1898, na Bessemer, Alabama, otu n'ime ụmụ anọ nke Jacob Prentice Polk na Christine Romelia Ward
Aha mbụ ya bụ Herman Polk, ọ nabatara aha nna ya mgbe ọ nwụsịrị ma bụrụ onye a maara dị ka P
N'afọ 1916, ọ debanyere aha na Tuskegee Institute na-ezube ịghọ onye na-ese ihe
Atụmatụ ya gbanwere mgbe ọ nụrụ onye na-ese foto C
Batteyń onye na-eduzi Ngalaba Foto nke Tuskegee site n'afọ 1916 ruo afọ 1927 banyere ikike nke mpaghara ahụ ma gbaa ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere mmasị ume ka ha bịa hụ ya
Mgbe ya na Battey kwurịtara okwu, Polk gara n'ihu mụọrọ ya foto site na akwụkwọ ozi
N'afọ 1924, Polk kwagara Chicago, Illinois, ebe ọ gara n'ihu n'ọmụmụ ya na onye na-ese foto ọcha, Fred A
Jensen
Polk lụrụ Margaret Blanche Thompson na Chicago n'afọ 1926; ha mụrụ nwa nwoke
Polk laghachiri Tuskegee n'afọ 1927 iji mepee ụlọ ọrụ nke ya n'ụlọ ya n'obodo ahụ
Onye nkuzi ya bụ Battey nwụrụ n'otu afọ ahụ, n'afọ sochirinụ Polk sonyeere ngalaba ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
N'afọ 1933, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nke Ngalaba Foto, na-anọgide na ọrụ ahụ ruo afọ1938
Ọ hapụrụ otu afọ na mgbalị imeghe alaka nke ụlọ ọrụ foto ya na Atlanta, GA, tupu ọ laghachi Tuskegee ije ozi dị ka onye na-ese foto kọleji ruo afọ iri anọ
O dere ndị ọbịa ama ama dịka Paul Robeson na Langston Hughes na ihe omume dịka Civil Rights Movement na campus
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ nke ya n'obodo ahụ
N'ịbụ ndị e sere na oji na ọcha, ndị Polk na-achị sitere na ndị Afrịka Amerịka ama ama dị ka George Washington Carver ruo ndị na-arụ ọrụ na ndị Alabamians dara ogbenye
Otu usoro, 'Old Characters', lekwasịrị anya n'idepụta ndị ikom na ndị inyom bụbu ndị ohu si Macon County
Dị ka Battey, Polk gbalịrị iji nkwanye ùgwù na mmetụta gosipụta ndị na-anọ ya
N'adịghị ka Battey, onye na-ahọrọ foto ndị dị nro na idealizing poses, Polk mepụtara ụdị nke nkọwa dị nkọ na ọkụ siri ike gosipụtara onye ọ na-ese
Ụzọ o si eme ihe pụtara ìhè na nkwupụta o mere banyere foto afọ 1932 site na usoro 'Old Characters' nke akpọrọ The Boss
N'ọrụ mbụ ya, Polk jiri igwefoto Kodak box nwere oghere Graphex
Ndị nkatọ ekwuola maka nkà na ụzụ ya n'ihe gbasara mgbasa ozi n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụghị mgbe niile ka ọ nwere ngwá ọrụ kachasị mma

Otu n'ime ihe oyiyi Polk kachasị emetụta bụ foto nke afọ 1941 nke First Lady Eleanor Roosevelt n'ụgbọelu ya na onye na-anya ụgbọelu Charles Anderson, onye bụ onye isi nkuzi ụgbọ elu nke Tuskegee Institute
E ji foto ahụ kwalite 'nnwale' nke Tuskegee Airmen nke e guzobere ọhụrụ nke ga-emecha zụọ ihe dị ka ndị ọkwọ ụgbọ elu ojii 450 maka itinye aka na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ dị ka ndị Tuskegee Flyers
E gosipụtara foto Polk na Corcoran Gallery (Washington, DC), Museum of Natural History (New York, NY), Studio Museum na Harlem (NY), na ọtụtụ gallery na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 1980, e nyere ya Black Photographerńs Annual Testimonial Award, n'afọ sochirinụ, ọ meriri National Endowment for the Arts fellowship
Polk lara ezumike nká na Tuskegee na mbido afọ 1980 wee nwụọ na Tallassee, AL, n'ọnwa Disemba 29, afọ 1984

Chief Patrick Nwokoye Okeke-Ojiudu (1914-1995), nakwa kwuru na dị ka PN ma ọ bụ PN Okeke, bụ a Nigerian ndọrọ ndọrọ ochịchị, na-azụ ahịa, onye nkuzi, philanthropist na nna ochie nke Okeke-Ojiudu ezinụlọ
Ọ bụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo site na 1959-1966, oge akpọrọ Nigeria First Republic
N'ịbụ onye amụrụ na ezinụlọ dara ogbonye na Alor, Anambra, Okeke-Ojiudu rụsiri ọrụ ike iji kwụọ ụgwọ maka agụmakwụkwọ ya n'ọkwa niile
N’afọ 1938 ka ọ gara St
Charles Teachers Training College Onitsha, Anambra Steeti ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ site n'afọ 1938 rue n'afọ 1941
N'ihi ọdịiche putara ìhè ọ nwere, ezigara ya dika Onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ
E ezigara ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ St
Anthony bụ Umudioka
N 'ebe ahụ ka o jere ozi n'okpuru ukochukwu Michael Iwene Tansi (nke Pope John Paul II kporo onye Nsọ n'afọ1998), ọ bụkwa n 'oge ahụ kụrụ ya dị ka Onye Nsọ
Nakwa na St
Anthony, enwere ihe ùgwù ịkụziri Francis Arinze (nke bụzi Kadịnal ) onye banyere ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri

PZ Cussons Nigeria Plc bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na Naijiria na onye na-ekesa ngwahịa ndị ahịa dị ka ncha,ụlọ mposi , ncha na ngwa ụlọ
Ọ bụ enyemaka nke ụlọ ọrụ Britain PZ Cussons Holdings, nke nwere òkè na-achịkwa na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
YPZ na-azụ ahịa ngwa ụlọ n'okpuru akara Haier Thermocool ma na-elekọta ụlọ ahịa eletrik Coolworld
Ọ nwere njikọ aka na Wilmar International iji mepụta ma zụọ ahịa mmanụ akwụkwọ nri na mmanụ nkwụ
Enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na ngwaahịa ndị dị na Sierra Leone na mmekọrịta azụmahịa akwa nke George Paterson na George Zochonis
Ndị mmekọ ndị sitere na Scottish na Greek guzobere ụlọ ahịa ahịa West Africa na Sierra Leone na 1879 nke e mesịrị tinye na Great Britain na February 1884 dị ka Patterson Zochonis
N'afọ 1899, ndị mmekọ ahụ meghere ụlọ ahịa na Naịjirịa ma n'oge na-adịghị anya mepụta netwọk ahịa n'ime mba ahụ
N'afọ 1950, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere imepụta ncha na Naịjirịa site na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe dị na Aba, na-etinye ya n'okpuru enyemaka a na-akpọ Alagbon Industries
N'afọ 1957, otu ahụ wegara ihe onwunwe na-esoghị na azụmahịa ncha ya na ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ e debanyere aha na Naịjirịa nke a na-akpọ Patterson Zochonis Nigeria Limited
E mechara mara ụlọ ọrụ Alagbon dị ka Associated Industries wee gbanwee Paterson Zochonis Industries Limited
E depụtara ya n'ihu ọha na Naịjirịa Stock Exchange na 1972, na-ere 40% nke òkè ya nye ọha na eze Naịjirị, e rere 20% ọzọ na 1977
Iji mụba ego, ọ gbasaa ngwaahịa ya iji tinye ngwa Thermocool
N'ime usoro nke otu ahụ, ngalaba ụlọ ọrụ PZ lekwasịrị anya na ihe nhicha, ncha na mmepụta ncha ebe Thermocool lekwasịrị anya n'ihe friji
PZ gbasaa azụmahịa mmepụta ya wee malite mmepụta nke Elephant na Jet detergents na afọ 1970 ha iji maa Omo nke Lever Brothers mepụtara aka
N'afọ 1973, a chịkọtara friji Thermocool na Naijiria ma ụlọ ọrụ ahụ tinye ego na mmepụta ọgwụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ belatara ọrụ azụmaahịa ya n'oge afọ 1970 iji lekwasị anya n'imepụta
N'afọ 2003, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere njikọ aka na otu Glanbia iji mepụta mmiri ara ehi na mmiri ara ehi
E rere azụmahịa a na afọ 2019
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere mmasị na ịma mma na nlekọta onwe onye, ngwaahịa ụmụaka, ngwaahịa ịsa ahụ, nlekọta ọnụ, nlekọta ahụike, ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na nlekọta akpụkpọ ahụ
Paa o nwere ike izo aka na
Paa Joe (nke aha ezinụlọ ya bụ Joseph Tetteh-Ashong) bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe oyiyi palanquin na onye na-ese onyinyo igbe ozu a mụrụ na 1947 na Akwapim na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana
A na-ewere Paa Joe dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na-ese onyinyo ma ọ bụ abebuu adekai ('igbe ịlụ') nke ọgbọ ya
Ọ na-etinye aka na ụwa nka mba ụwa kemgbe 1989, a gụnyekwara ya na nnukwu ihe ngosi na Europe, Japan, na USA

Igbe ozu ya dị na nchịkọta na ngosi na-adịgide adịgide n'ọtụtụ ebe ngosi nka n'ụwa niile, gụnyere British Museum na London, Brooklyn Museum na New York, Royal Ontario Museum na Canada, Museum of fine Art na Boston, National Museum of Ethnology na Osaka na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ yana nchịkọta onwe nke ndị isi mba ọzọ
Paa Joe malitere ọrụ ya site na afọ iri na abụọ nke mmụta dị ka onye na-ese igbe ozu na ụlọ ọrụ Kane Kwei (1924-1992), na Teshie
N'afọ 1976, Paa Joe malitere azụmahịa nke ya na Nungua
Ọ zụrụ ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe dịka Daniel Mensah, Eric Kpakpo, ma ọ bụ Kudjoe Affutu bụ ndị ghọkwara ndị na-ese igbe ozu na-aga nke ọma
N'afọ 2007, Paa Joe si Nungua kwaga Pobiman (Greater Accra) ebe ya na ụmụ ya Jacob na ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ibe ya na-arụ ọrụ
N'afọ 2013, a kpọrọ Paa Joe maka izu isii na Nottingham, Great Britain

Ọ bụ ezie na iberibe ndị Paa Joe rụrụ bụ ezigbo igbe ozu nke e jị eli onye nwụrụ anwụ, usoro iji nweta igbe ozu ihe atụ dị nnọọ iche na usoro nkịtị mmadụ nwere ike ịga iji nweta igbe ozu maka onwe ya ma ọ bụ onye ọ hụrụ n'anya
Paa Joe enweghị akwụkwọ ọrụ nke enwere ike ịhọrọ igbe ozu ihe atụ, dịka enwere ike iji igbe ozu nkịtị mee
Akụkụ ọ bụla bụ ọrụ omenala nke metụtara ndụ onye nwụrụ anwụ
Ya mere, Paa Joe abụghị onye omenkà nke ngwaahịa ndị bara uru, kama ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe omenala, ihe ngosi
Ọ bụghị igbe ozu Paa Joe niile ka a na-eji maka olili ozu ma ọ bụ na-ezube igosipụta àgwà nke ndụ mmadụ
Igbe ozu ndị a na-ahụ anya nwere nnukwu ihe ọdịbendị dị mkpa na Ghana
Ọ bụ ezie na onye nkuzi Paa Joe, Kane Kwei, malitere omume nke ime igbe ozu ihe oyiyi, echiche ahụ nwere mgbọrọgwụ miri emi na ọdịnala Ga
E nwere igbe ozu ndị a na-ahụ anya kemgbe afọ 1950
Otú ọ dị, palanquins ihe atụ nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme miri emi na Ghana
Paa Joe emeela igbe ozu omenala maka ndị dị mkpa na ọdịbendị Ghana, dị ka Chief Nii Amartey Kwei II
Paa Joe na-arụ igbe ozu ya n'ụlọ ọrụ ya na mpaghara Accra na Ghana
Ụlọ ọrụ ya nwere mpaghara ole na ole nke gụnyere ọfịs, ụlọ ngosi, ụlọ nkwadebe maka eserese na mbupu, na ebe nchekwa ngwá ọrụ
Otú ọ dị, a na-eme ọtụtụ n'ime nruputa igbe ozu bu nke a na-eme n'azụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'okpuru ndò osisi
N'ebe a, ndị ahịa nwere ike ịbịa lelee igbe ozu ma kpebie maka imewe maka onwe ha maka iji ha mee ihe n'ọdịnihu, ma ọ bụ maka onye ha hụrụ n'anya
Usoro Paa Joe bụ ịchọpụta ọdịmma nke onye chọrọ igbe ozu iji chọpụta ụdị igbe ozu nwere ike ịnọchite anya ndụ ha
Ihe atụ ndị gara aga dị mfe dị ka karama coke ma ọ bụ Bible na nke prọfesọ rịọrọ nnụnụ nwere mkpịsị akwụkwọ n'ọnụ ya
Ọ bụ ezie na a maara Paa Joe nke ọma maka igbe ozu ya, o mepụtara ọrụ echiche nke na-elekwasị anya na West Africa na ahia ohu gafere Atlantic, dị ka nnukwu ọrụ ọkpụkpụ ya Gates of No Return
N'afọ 2020, High Museum of Art dị na Atlanta, Georgia gosipụtara ọrụ ọhụrụ nke Joe nke Gold Coast

Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara ụlọ asaa nke jere ozi dị ka ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri maka ndị Afrịka a na-ere n'ohu, tinye n'ụgbọ mmiri, ma ziga na mba Amerịka na Caribbean na narị afọ nke iri na isii ruo nke iri na itoolu
Ọrụ ndị ahụ bụ nnukwu ihe owuwu osisi e sere ese nke gụnyere Cape Coast Castle, Fort Orange, Christiansborg Castle, Fort Patience, na Fort St
Sebastian
Usoro nke ime ọrụ ahụ gụnyere ileta saịtị, ise foto, na eserese
Paa Joe bụ isiokwu nke ihe ngosi banyere igbe ozu nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Britain bụ Ben Wigley na onye na-emepụta Anna Griffin

Paa Kofi Ansong bụ onye Ghana bichemist, ọchụnta ego na onye ọchụnta ego Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke venture capital group INVESTRADE INTERNATIONAL Ọ na-eje ozi na ọtụtụ bọọdụ Ghana gụnyere onye isi Adehyeman Savings and Loans Company Ltd A họpụtara ya na kansụl steeti na February 2017
Paa Kofi Ansong gara Mahadum nke Ghana wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Science na biochemistry
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, ọ gara mpụga Ghana ma rụọ ọrụ na mbụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka njikwa mma na Boots Pharmacy na United Kingdom
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Ghana, ya na enyi ya Kwadwo Amoafo guzobere ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ego, Investrade International Company Limited, n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1993
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onyeisi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'ihi ahụmịhe ya na ego na njikwa onwe ya, ọ na-eje ozi n'ọtụtụ bọọdụ ụlọ ọrụ gafee mba ahụ
Ha gụnyere Adehyeman Savings and Loans Company Ltd, St
Roses Secondary School na Akwatia, Ghana National Procurement Agency na Abossey Okai Spare Parts Association
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2017, Onye isi ala Nana Akuffo-Addo họpụtara ya na kansụl ahụ
N'oge emume iyi e mere na Flagstaff House, Onye isi ala Akuffo-Addo rịọrọ kansụl ka ha dọọ ya ọdụ nke ọma na ebumnuche nke ịkwalite Ghana mgbe niile
N'oge emume inyefe nnọkọ nke isii nke kansụl ahụ na nke asaa, onye isi oche kansụl na-apụ apụ, Naa Prọfesọ

Paa Kwesi Nduom ma ọ bụ Papa Kwesi Nduum, (amụrụ na Febụwarị 15, 1953) bụ onye ndụmọdụ azụmahịa nke Ghana, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na onye guzobere Ghana's Progressive People's PartyA họpụtara onye isi ala ugboro atọ, ọ bụ onye nzuko omeiwu na mpaghara komenda-Edina-E guafo Abirem wee bụrụ onye minista na-ahụ maka steeti na ọchịchị Kufuor
A mụrụ Paa Kwesi Nduom na Elmina na Central Region nke Ghana
A gụrụ ya Joseph Hubster Yorke Jr n'aha nna ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na St

Augustine's College na Cape Coast, ebe ọ nwetara ma General Certificate of Education (GCE) Ordinary na Advanced Levels ('O' na 'A' ọkwa)Ọ gara United States ebe ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts (Economics) na Mahadum Wisconsin-Milwaukee na 1975
O mechara nweta nzere masta na Management (1977) na PhD (Service Delivery Systems) n'afọ 1982 n'otu mahadum ahụ
Nduom malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ mkpuchi ndụ na North Western Mutual Life Insurance Company n'etiti afọ 1975 na 1978
N'ime afọ sochirinụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Blue Cross Blue Shield nke Wisconsin
N'afọ 1979, ọ sonyeere Milwaukee Metropolitan Sewerage District dị ka onye nyocha mmefu ego na njikwa
N'afọ 1981, ọ sonyeere Deloitte na Touche dị ka onye ndụmọdụ, wee bụrụ onye mmekọ n'ọfịs Milwaukee nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 1986
N'afọ 1992, o nyere aka guzobe ngalaba Deloitte & Touche's West Africa Consulting
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu ụlọ ọrụ maka Fan Milk Ghana Limited, Edinaman Secondary School na Ghana Heritage and Conservation Trust
Ọ na-ekerịta ihe onwunwe nke GN Savings and Loans na ndị ọzọ nwere òkè
Ọ bụkwa onye nwe Groupe Ndoum na Coconut Grove Resort na Ghana
Ọrụ ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị malitere na 1997 mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Komenda-Edina-Eguafo-Abirem District Assembly maka Akotobinsin Electoral Area
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2000, ọ sonyeere ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Ghana maka mpaghara Komenda-Edina-Eguafo-Abirem na tiketi nke Convention's People's Party (CPP)
Otú ọ dị, ọ meriri onye omeiwu nọ n'ọkwa, Ato Quarshie nke National Democratic Congress (NDC) site na 26% nke votu ziri ezi
Otú ọ dị, ọnwa abụọ ka e mesịrị, Onye isi ala John Kufuor họpụtara ya dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka atụmatụ akụ na ụba ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị onye otu New Patriotic Party na-achị
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'oge a dị ka Onye isi oche nke National Development Planning Commission
N'oge mgbanwe nke ụlọ ọrụ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2003, Nduom ghọrọ Minista na-ahụ maka ike
Mgbe ọnwa iri na asatọ gachara, ọ lụrụ ọgụ ọzọ maka oche Komenda-Edina-Eguafo-Abirem na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Ghana na Disemba 2004 na oge a ọ meriri site na akara 336 (30,981 vootu na 15,427)
N'oge ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onyeisi oche nke Kọmitii Nhazi nke CPP
Na mbido oge nke abụọ nke Onye isi ala Kufuor, Nduom ghọrọ Minista na-ahụ maka mgbanwe nke ngalaba ọha na eze
Ọ gara n'ihu n'ọrụ a ruo n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2007 mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọchịchị iji chọọ nhọpụta nke pati ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala CPP
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2007, CPP họpụtara Nduom ka ọ sọọ mpi ntuli aka onye isi ala na Disemba afọ 2008
Ọ meriri na ntuli aka ahụ, na-enweta ihe na-erughị 1% nke votu

N'oge ntuli aka nke CPP nke afọ 2011, ndị na-azọ ọkwa na Nduom kwadoro, gụnyere Onye isi oche Ladi Nylander n'oge ahụ, ndị ọhụrụ dịka Samia Nkrumah, nwa nwanyị nke onye isi ala mbụ nke Ghana Kwame Nkrumah Ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị, ndị Convention People's Party boro Nduom ebubo na ọ na-emegide iwu nke pati ahụ
Na Jenụwarị 2012, Nduom gbara arụkwaghịm na CPP wee guzobe otu nke ya, Progressive People's Party
Ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Progressive People's Party na ntuli aka 2012 na 2016
Nduom lụrụ Yvonne Nduom, ọkachamara na njikwa na onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cape Coast na Ghana na Mahadim Wisconsin na United States
Ha lụrụ di na nwunye ma nwee ụmụ anọ, Dr
Nana Kweku Nduom, Dr
Edjah Kweku Nduum, Chief Nduom, na Dr
Nana Aba Nduom
Nana Kweku lụrụ Esinam Julia Nduom (née Baeta) ma ha nwere nwa nwanyị, Maame Adjoa Kakraba Nduom
Edjah lụrụ Kelley Nduom (née Coleman)

Paballo Koza (a mụrụ na 19 Machị 2002) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
Koza malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, ma mesịa nata nhọpụta nke Africa Movie Academy Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma maka ọrụ ya na Doraʹs Peace
Koza malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ ise site n'ime ihe nkiri na mgbasa ozi
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ nọwo n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ ma rụọ ọrụ na ihe ngosi telivishọn na ihe nkiri dị iche iche
N'afọ 2018, Koza bulitere vidiyo mbụ ya na ọwa YouTube ya

Pacharo Mzembe bụ onye Australia na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri, n'ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn na ihe nkiri
Nne na nna Mzembe sitere na Malawi, mana a mụrụ ya na Zimbabwe
Ọ kwagara Australia mgbe ọ dị afọ isii na steeti Queensland
Mzembe bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na National Institute of Dramatic Art (NIDA), mgbe a nabatara ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa

N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2012, o mere njem gafee Australia, nke o guzobere ma kpọọ Run of Awareness, na ebumnuche nke igosi enweghị nhata nke ohere agụmakwụkwọ maka ndị ntorobịa nwere nsogbu na Australia na gburugburu ụwa
Mzembe malitere ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri, mana kemgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ọrụ telivishọn na ihe nkiri, gụnyere Monster Problems, Channel Nine Come the Habibs, Harrow na ABC, nakwa SBS's Safe Harbour

N'elu ikpo okwu, ọ kpara Martin Luther King Jr na The Mountaintop, yana ịpụta na Prize Fighter, nke o ritere Green Room Award ma họpụta ya maka Sydney Theatre nakwa Helpmann Awards maka ngosipụta ya nke onye agha bụbu nwa ghọrọ onye na-akụ ọkpọ
Mzembe nwekwara mmasị n'ịkwado ndị ntorobịa na ime ihe nkiri

Pacific Ocean no na aga Asia na Australia na otu aka, no na agaga ala ukwu Amerika na aka ozo, bu n'elu Antarctica ma okpuru ebe Arctic
Packson Ngugi bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ejije na ihe nkiri, ma pụta na mgbasa ozi TV nke Kenya
Ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi TV, Omo Pick A Box, na ngwụsị afọ 1990

O mere onye na-elekọta ụlọ ozu na ihe nkiri The Constant Gardener Ọ bụ onye guzobere Za kikwetu Productions ltd, ụlọ ọrụ Casting Agency nke nwekwara Recording Studio maka mgbasa ozi redio na ihe nkiri

N'etiti afọ 1990, Ngugi sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Joni Nderitu nwụrụ anwụ, Paul Onsongo nakwa Ben Mutua Jonathan Muriithi (BMJ Muriithi), na-eme ngagharị iwe n'okporo ámá Nairobi iji mee ngagharị iwe maka atụmatụ inweta Kenya National Theatre site na Norfolk Hotel dị nso, ihe mere ka gọọmentị Kenya kagbuo mkpebi ya

Padita Agu bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood nke mepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ, Aha m abụghị Ulusho ma bụrụ onye a maara na ihe nkiri, Last Three digits, O nwere ọwa YouTube ebe ọ na-ekerịta ahụmịhe na nkuzi gbasara mmekorịta ya na ụmụ nwanyị
O mepụtara ihe nkiri My name is not Olosho nke ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Demola Adedoyin, Segun Arinze, Rachel Oniga nke Theo Ukpaa duziri
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood kwụsịtụrụ nwa oge na 2005 iji mụọ ihe ma laghachi na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri dị ka onye isi na-eme na Last three digit, ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke Moses Inwang duziri na 2012
Ndị ohi ji égbè dinara Padita na-eto eto n'ike mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise ma nke a nyere ya ihe mgbu nke o nwere ike imeri mgbe e mesirị
Alụmdi na nwunye nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood dara mgbe ọ chọpụtara na ọ nweghị ịhụnanya na mmekọrịta na mbụ
N'ịkọwa ihe isi ike ya nye ndị na-akwado ya, ọ zutere ya n'ebe enyi ya wee lụọ di na nwunye n'ụbọchị mbu ha zutere

Wangarĩ Muta Maathai (/ wænˈɡɑːri mɑːˈtaɪ/; 1 Eprel 1940 - 25 Septemba 2011) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ mmekọrịta gburugburu ebe obibi na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kenya nke tọrọ ntọala Green Belt Movement, otu ọgbakọ gburugburu ebe obibi lekwasịrị anya n'ịkụ ihe ọkụkụ dika osisi, nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi, na ikike ụmụ nwanyị
Na 2004 ọ ghọrọ nwanyị Afrika mbụ nwetara ihe Nrite Nobel Peace Prize
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na United States, nweta nzere bachelọ na Mount St
Scholastica na nzere Master na Mahadum Pittsburgh
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ nwanyị mbụ na East na Central Africa ghọrọ Dọkịta nke Philosophy, na-enweta PhD na Mahadum Nairobi dị na Kenya
N'afọ 1984, e nyere ya onyinye ihe nrite nke ziri ezi maka 'ịtụgharị arụmụka gburugburu ebe obibi Kenya ka ọ bụrụ nnukwu ọrụ maka mkpụgharị ọhịa'
Mgbanwe ihu igwe na Naịjirịa pụtara ìhè site na mmụba okpomọkụ, mgbanwe mmiri ozuzo (mmụba mmiri ozuzo na mpaghara ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri na mbelata mmiri ozuzo n'ógbè kọntinent)
Ọ na-egosipụtakwa ụkọ mmiri ozuzo, ọzara, ịrị elu nke oke osimiri, erosion, ide mmiri, égbè eluigwe, ọkụ nke mmanụ ala, ọkụ ọhịa, mbuze ala, na ọnwụ nke ụdị dị iche iche
Ihe ndị a niile ga-anọgide na-emetụta ndụ mmadụ na gburugburu ebe obibi na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ ezie na dabere na ọnọdụ, mpaghara na-enwe mgbanwe ihu igwe na okpomọkụ dị elu n'oge ọkọchị ebe mmiri ozuzo n'oge mmiri ozuzo na-enyere aka idebe okpomọkụ na ọkwa dị nro
E nwere akụkọ ole na ole zuru oke nke na-enye ihe akaebe bara uru nke mmetụta dị iche iche nke mgbanwe ihu igwe na Naịjirịa taa
NNỌỌ!
Ị na-agụ, na-ede, na-atụgharịkwa asụsụ igbo? Anyị chọrọ enyemaka gị!

Paige Nick bụ onye edemede South Afrikaa, onye na- ede akwụkwọ akụkọ na onye ode akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi
Paige Rachael Nick toro na Cape Town, South Afrikaa
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ mgbanwe Rotary na Dickinson, North Dakota na afo 1992 ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Dickinson High School wee gaa Mahadum Dickinson State
Na Jenụwarị afo 1993 ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nbipụta na ịre ahịa na AAA School of Advertising
Na Disemba afo 1993, ọ sonyeere TBWA Hunt Lascaris Cape Town maka ọrụ ezumike ụmụ akwụkwọ
E goro ya ọrụ n'ebe ahụ dị ka onye na-edegharị akwụkwọ obere na Jenụwarị afo 1994
Akwụkwọ mbụ nke Nick, A Million Miles from Normal, nke e bipụtara na May 2010 na akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke abụọ, Nke a Ụzọ Up, bipụtara na May afo 2011, ma site na Penguin Books South Africa

Na afo 2013 o sonyeere Sarah Lotz na Helen Moffett, ka ha na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Họrọ onwe gị Adventure agụụ mmekọahụ, gụnyere, Nwa agbọghọ na-eje ije n'ime mmanya, Nwa agbọghọ na-eje ije n'ime agbamakwụkwọ na nwa agbọghọ na-eje ije n'ime ụbọchị ìsì, nke e rere na mba 21 gburugburu ụwa
Ndị Little, Brown (UK) na Harper Collins USA na Jonathan Ball Publishers bipụtara ha na South Africa
N'April na afo 2015 Nick's Pens Behaving Badly bụ nke Kwela Books South Africa bipụtara
Ọ bụ nchịkọta nke kọlụm Sunday Times ya na akwụkwọ ozi nzuzu ha kpaliri
Site na Ọktoba 2011 ruo Febụwarị 2015 Nick dere kọlụm kwa izu gbasara mmekọahụ, mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwaanyị, na ihunanya, na ihe ndị ọzọ na-adịghị mma, maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Sunday Times
Na Febụwarị 2015, kọlụm ya si na kọlụm kwa izu wee gaa na kọlụm kwa ọnwa

N'ime ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ, Nick arụwo ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi dị iche iche na ọtụtụ ụdị obodo na nke mba ụwa, gụnyere BMW, Jeans Levi's, Nashua, Cosmopolitan Magazine, Allan Grey, kulula, Sanlam na Santam
Nick emeriela ọtụtụ ihe nrite mpaghara na mba ụwa gụnyere Loeries, na Loerie Grand Prix abụọ, onyinye na Cannes, The Art Director's Club of New York, Clios, na nnabata na D&D
Na 2013 Nick malitere The Good Book Appreciation Society na Facebook

Kpachara anya maka ibe Facebook maka ndị hụrụ akwụkwọ n'anya ghọrọ ogige egwuregwu maka ịkwalite onwe ha, Nick malitere ụlọ ọgbakọ “nzuzo” mebere akwụkwọ dị ka ebe maka ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ (ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị edemede), biputere eziokwu banyere akwụkwọ, site na nyocha
ajụjụ na ajụjụ ọnụ ndị odee
Dị ka nke March 2015 klọb nwere ihe karịrị 3000 òtù
Ọchịchị ime obodo Paikoro bụ otu n'ime ọchịchị ime obodo narị asaa na iri asaa na anọ dị na Naịjirịa na otu n'ime ọchịchị ime obodo iri abụọ na ise dị na Niger-Steeti Naijiria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị Paikoro dị na obodo Paiko ihe dịka 25 km ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ nke isi obodo steeti Minna
Ọ nwere mpaghara 2,066 km 2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ dị puku narị iri ise na asatọ, iri asatọ na isii na ngụkọ nke afọ 2006; a tụrụ anya na ọ ga-eto site na pasenti iri atọ na ise kwa afọ
Mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo Paikoro bụ otu n'ime ọchịchị ime obodo iri abụọ na ise dị na steeti Naịjiria
O nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa ya dị na obodo Paiko
Obodo Paiko dị na mpaghara ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ nke steeti Niger
Kansụl ime obodo Paikoro na-ahụ maka nlekọta ọha na eze nke ọchịchị ime obodo Paikoro ward iri na otu na kansụl omeiwu ya nke nwere ndị kansụl iri na otu na-eme iwu na-achị mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo
Kansụl ime obodo Paikoro nwere ngalaba iri na otu ha bụ Adunu, Chimbi, Gwam, Ishau, Jere, Kaffin Koro, Kwagana, Kwakuti, Nikuchi/Tungan Mallam, Paiko Central na Tutungo/Jedna
Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ narị iteghete na iri abụo
Palesa Mokubung bụ onye South Africa na-emepụta ejiji
Ọ bụ onye guzobere nakwa onye nduzi okike nke Mantsho, ụlọọrụ ejiji dị na South Africa
Ọ bụ onye mbụ na-emepụta ihe n'Afrịka na-arụkọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ejiji Sweden H&M iji mepụta nchịkọta
A mụrụ Mokubung na Kroonstad, Free State
N'afọ 2014, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nweta nzere Bachelor of Arts na Fashion Design na Vanderbijlpark Technical College
Mokubung gụsịrị akwụkwọ ejiji ya n'afọ 2000 wee malite ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe n'ime ụlọ na Stoned Cherrie, ụdị ejiji obodo
Mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ n'ebe ahụ afọ atọ, ọ hapụrụ ịbanye n'asọmpi mmewe, S’camto Groundbreakers
Mgbe o meriri n'asọmpi ahụ, ọ gara New York na Mumbai ruo ọnwa isii ma n'ebe ahụ, o gosipụtara ụdị mbụ ya
O guzobere akara Mantsho, nke pụtara 'oji mara mma', n'afọ 2004
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ haziri nchịkọta mbụ ya, nke e gosipụtara na ọgbakọ nke asatọ maka ịzụ ụka nke ejiji a na-eme kwa afọ na mba South Afrịka
Akara ya gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosiputa gụnyere Gris, India, USA, Jamaica, Nigeria, Botswana na Senegal
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2018, o gosipụtara nchịkọta ya na ihe ngosi BRICS, ya na ndị na-emepụta ihe si Brazil, Russia, India, na China
Ọ bụ nne nke otu nwa
Pallance Dladla (a mụrụ n'August 22, 1992) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
Ọ natala ọtụtụ onyinye na nhọpụta, gụnyere SAFTA Award
Dladla nwetara nkwado mbụ dịka onye nke abụọ na oge nke abụọ nke Class Act
Ọ meriri ndị mmeri Abdul Khoza na Tumie Ngumla, ndị ya na ha ga-arụkọ ọrụ na usoro ihe nkiri SABC1 Tempy Pusha
Dladla nwere ọrụ na ihe ngosi telivishọn dị iche iche, gụnyere usoro ihe nkiri 4Play Sex Tips for Girls, Intersexions, Isibaya, Rhythm City, Is'Thunzi, na ihe nkiri Tempy Pushas a kpọtụrụ aha n'elu
Ọrụ mbụ ya na mmepụta nnukwu mmefu ego bịara na ihe nkiri Hard to Get (2014)
N'afọ 2019, Dladla pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri Netflix Shadow, dịka onye Shadrach 'Shadow' Khumalo
A mụrụ Dladla na Johannesburg, Gauteng province nke South Africa
A zụlitere ya n'obodo Soweto
Dladla tolitere n'enweghị nna ya ma nna nna ya zụlitere ya
Dịka Dladla si kwuo, nna nna ya kpọrọ ya 'Pallance' n'aha onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị amasị ya, Jack Palance
Ọ gara Parktown Boys' High School na Wellington Road dị nso n'obodo Park Mansion
Dladla zụlitere ịhụnanya maka ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị obere
N'afọ 2010 o sonyere na asọmpi agụmakwụkwọ DALRO nke mba niile, ebe egwuregwu ya dere n'onwe ya bụ onye nke abụọ
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, Dladla meriri Parktown Boys High Original Script Award tinyere Best Actor Award
Dladla gara n'ihu merie ihe nrite kachasị mma na ACT / DALRO / Nedbank Scholarships Development
N'afọ 2011, mgbe ọ na-eso enyi ya gaa nyocha maka Class Act, Dladla mere mkpebi na-enweghị isi ka ọ gaa nyocha na asọmpi ọchụchọ talent nke SABC1 na-agbasa na mba niile
Dladla ruru ọkwa ikpeazụ nke Class Act 2011
Ọ natara otuto site n'aka ndị dịka Darryl Roodt, onye duziri ihe nkiri a họpụtara na Academy Award Yesterday
Dladla mechara merie Abdul Khoza na asọmpi ahụ na ntuli aka ikpeazụ nke ọha na eze
N'afọ 2012, ya na Xolile Tshabalala, Kgomotso Christopher, Tiffany Jones, na Cheryl Ladd, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka Jimmy na usoro ihe nkiri etv 4Play Sex Tips for Girls - Season 3
N'otu afọ ahụ, o nwere ọrụ cameo dịka 'Mohato' na usoro ihe nkiri Britain Wild at Heart
N'afọ 2013, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Sizwe na usoro ihe nkiri SABC1 Intersexions
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ pụtara dịka onye X na SABC 1 comedy-drama Tempy Pushas
Na oge nke atọ nke usoro ahụ, Luzuko Nteleko nọchiri ya
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ nwetara ọrụ dị mkpa na Mzansi Magic soap-opera Isibaya, ebe ọ gosipụtara onye Jabulani 'Jabu' Zungu
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri kemgbe ihe ngosi ahụ malitere
Dladla nwetara otuto maka arụmọrụ ya dịka onye na-akwado onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri iNumber Number (2013)
N'ọnwa June afọ 2014, Dladla sonyeere etv soapie Rhythm City, na-eweghara ọrụ Sibusiso Vilakazi, nke Lungile Radu mere na mbụ
Na mgbakwunye, a tụbara Dladla na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Hard to Get n'akụkụ Thishiwe Ziqubu na Israel Makoe
Site n'afọ 2016-2017, Dladla nwere ọrụ ugboro ugboro dịka Duke na Mzansi Magic-Doug Liman duziri ihe nkiri Is'thunzi
N'afọ 2019, Dladla pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri Netflix Shadow dịka onye Shadrach 'Shadow' Khumalo
Ndị otu ndị ọzọ gụnyere Amanda Du-Pont, Khathu Ramabulana, na Tumie Ngumla
Shadow bụ Netflix's first South African original series na ọ malitere na 8 March 2019
Dladla na-enwe mmasị ịgba egwú na ikiri ihe nkiri n'oge ezumike ya
Dladla kwuru na Al Pacino, Denzel Washington, na Johnny Depp bụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị amasị ya
Dladla bụ enyi Sdumo Mtshali, onye ya na ya gbara na Tempy Pushas, IsiBaya, iNumber Number na Hard to Get
Pallas Daemi Kunaiyi-Akpannah (ka amụrụ na Julaị 12, 1997) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji maka Northwestern Wildcats Ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Italian Seria A n'akụkụ Faenza Basket Project

Kunaiyi-Akpannah malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi na Naịjirịa, ọ malitere ịgba bọọlụ basketball mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, ọ gara ogige bọọlụ bọọlụ Hope maka ụmụ agbọghọ nke Mobolaji Akiode haziri na Abuja Naịjirịa ebe a hụrụ ikike egwuregwu ya

Kunaiyi-Akpannah kwagara Rabun Gap-Nacoochee School, Rabun County, Georgia, United States, site na Nigeria mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ na-egwu basketball njem na ezumike ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya ma ọ na-enwetakwa okpukpu abụọ n'azụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ akara iri na ihe karịrị 11 rebounds kwa egwuregwu mgbe ọ na-enyere Eagles aka na ndekọ 21-5
O duuru ndị otu ya ruo n'ọkwa nke abụọ na 2014 State Tournament O sonyekwara na egwuregwu ndị ọzọ dịka egwuregwu na egwuregwu na ụlọakwụkwọ sekọndrị

Kunaiyi-Akpannah gbara bọọlụ basketball kọleji maka Northwestern Wildcats ebe ọ bụ ndị otu egwuregwu ya na nhọrọ nke ise n'ozuzu ya na 2017 draft Nia Coffey, ọ na-erughị akara 4 kwa egwuregwu ma ọ na-enwetakwa 93 rebounds kwa egwuregwu na egwuregwu Big Ten Tournament anọ n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-egwu naanị nkeji 218 kwa egwuregwu na oge ọhụrụ ya na Northwestern Kunaiyi-Akpannah sophomore afọ hụrụ nkezi 16 akara na 38 rebounds kwa egwuregwu
N'afọ nwata ya, ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Big Ten na akara 113 na 119 rebounds kwa egwuregwu, na okpukpu abụọ ya iri na asatọ bụ nke asatọ na mba ahụ

N'afọ ikpeazụ ya, ndị mgbasa ozi kpọrọ ya aha na First Team All-Big Ten, mgbe ọ gụsịrị nke atọ na ogbako na ihe ndi bekee kpọrọ rebounds na nke iri na atọ na mba ahụ na 11 rebounds, ebe ọ na-eme ka akara ya ruo akara 111
O mere ihe karịrị 1000 rebounds n'oge ọ nọ na kọleji, ọ bụ onye ọkpụkpọ nke abụọ na Northwestern History iji mee ihe karịrị puku ribonds
A na-edeghị Kunaiyi-Akpannah na 2019 WNBA Draft, ndị otu WNBA Chicago Sky bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọzụzụ na Mee 4, 2019, ndị otu ahụ mechara hapụ ya na Mee 8, 2019
Kunaiyi-Akpannah kwagara n'akụkụ Pallacanestro Vigarano nke Italian Seria A n'afọ 2019, ọ na-egwuri egwu dị ka Center na otu ahụ
Na Disemba 15, 2019 o nwere okpukpu abụọ nke gụnyere akara iri na otu na ọrụ dị elu nke 27 rebounds megide Broni ebe ndị otu ahụ meriri 83-75
Na 28 Mee, 2020, Kunaiyi-Akpannah bịanyere aka na Namur-Capitale maka oge 2020-2021
Ndị otu ahụ kwụsịrị oge ahụ na-emeri asọmpi Belgium mgbe ndị otu ikpeazụ, Castors Braine, kwụsịrị n'ihi ọtụtụ n'ime ndị egwuregwu ha nwalere ọrịa covid-19
Na 29 June, 2021, ọ bịanyere aka na Italian Seria A club Faenza Basket Project maka oge 2021-2022
A kpọrọ Kunaiyi-Akpannah ka ọ nọchite anya D'Tigress ma sonye na asọmpi 2019 pre Olympic Qualifying na Mozambique ebe ọ malitere ịnọchite anya Naịjirịa, ọ gbara nkezi 4 rebounds n'oge asọmpi ahụ
A kpọkwara ya isonye na 2020 FIBA Women's Olympic Qualifying Tournaments na Belgrade
Nna ya, Daemi Kunaiyi-Akpannah, bụbu onye otu ndị nnọchi anya Naịjirịa maka Rivers Steeti
Pallet bụ àkwà e ji ahịhịa ma ọ bụ ahịhịhịa mee, nke a na-eji ntinye ubi nke bara ọgaranya omume eme ihe n'oge etiti oge
N'ebe dị nso n'ala, ọ na-abụkarị ákwà linin ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ a na-agbatị n'elu ahịhịa ma ọ bụ ahịhịhịa
Enwere ike ịkpọ matarasị ahụ palliasse, ma ọ bụ mgbe ụfọdụ pallet, dabere na okwu French maka ahịhịa paille
Aha palliasse na-emetụta karịsịa matarasị eji eme ihe n'onwe ya, na-enweghị akwa, ma ọ bụ ihe ndina siri ike
Áki bụ mkpụrụ nke nọ n'ime mkpụrụ nkwụ a na ata-ata
Mkpụrụ osisi nkwụ a na-enweta mmanụ abụọ dị iche mmanụ nkwụ na- esite na ụru nkwụ mpụta, yana elu-áki nke na-esi na ákì pụta
Avuvu ákì bụ ihe na-afọ ma apipụtacha mmanụ na ákì akwọrọ-akwọ, nke a na aghọ erimeri ehi ma ọ bụ ejiri ya na-emeho ọkụ ma na-akwanyekwa ọkụ n'ime obodo
Avuvu ákì na n'enye ihe nke ndi bekee n'akpọ faiba na Protini na ahụ ụmụ anụmanụ dika ehi na ewu
Tinyere ihe ndị ọzọ bụ erimeri ụmụ anụmanụ, avuvu ákì ka avuvu ákì-bekee nma yana nke koko
mana avuvu nke azụ na nke mgbamgba-ekere ka ya enye ihe n'ahụ nke a n'akpọ protini
Ihe mejupụtara ya bụ faiba 16%, avuvu ákì nwekwara ihe ndi ọzọ ọ na enye nke ndi bekee n'akpọ phosphorọs na kalziụm nke na edozi ọkpụkpụ
Onwekwara ihe ndi ọzọ Magneziụm, Ayọn na zink
Ihe ndi ozo atuputara maka inye umu ehi nri bu ahihia kernel (50%), molasses (5%), ahihia (42%), nzu (15%), premix mineral (1%), na nnu ( 0,5%), ya na trace element / vitamin premix
Mkpụrụ osisi nkwụ bụ ofe e ji mkpụrụ osisi nkwụ mee ma ọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'obodo Afrịka
O sitere n'ebo Urhobo na Delta State, Nigeria
Mkpụrụ osisi nkwụ aghọwo ofe kọntinent
Mbanga soup is a palm fruit soup in Cameroonian cuisine and West African cuisine
It is often served with kwacoco
The soup is Cameroon's version of the West African Banga (soup), a palm fruit soup eaten in areas including parts of Nigeria
In Cameroon mbanga is made using fresh palm nuts
Outside the area canned nuts can be used
Ofe akwụ bụ ụdị ofe ndi Southern Niger Delta Nigeria particularly the Itsekiri ethnic group
This cuisine is quite different from 'Ofe Akwu' which is a variant found in Igbo culture
The Binis have a soup from palm fruits similar to 'Ofe Akwu' in ingredients and manner of preparation
Na Naịjịrịa, a na-eji nri ahụ na nri ndị ọzọ dịka Starch (Usi) maka ndị Urhobo nke Delta State, Naị́jerị́a
Ndị Igbo nwere ụdị ofe na ofe dị iche iche nke e ji mkpụrụ nkwụ mee

Ofe akwu bụ ụdị nri a na-ejikarị osikapa eme ihe ebe a na-eji mkpụrụ osisi nkwụ eme ihe karịsịa na mpaghara Anambra nke ala Igbo iji kwadebe ofe Oha na Onugbu tinyere nri a na'akpụ akpụ (nke a maara nke ọma dị ka 'swallow') dịka cassava a kụrụ (utara / akpu), ọka / cassava ntụ ọka (nni oka)
Mkpụrụ nkwụ dị mkpa karịsịa nye ndị Igbo
A na-ewepụta mkpụrụ osisi nkwụ ahụ site na osisi nkwụ na-eto eto n'ógbè ahụ, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a na-asa ya nke ọma, sie ya ma sie ya maka iwepụta mmanụ ya nke bụ isi ihe na-akwadebe ofe Banga

A na-eji beletete, mkpụrụ osisi aidan, akwụkwọ osisi Banga a na-akpọ Obenetietien (a pụrụ iji akwụkwọ osisi na-esi ísì ụtọ ma ọ bụ nke na-esi ilu dochie anya ya), osisi oburunbebe, yabasị a pịrị nke ọma, crayfish, chili pepper ma ọ bụ bonnet scotch, na nnu
A na-eri ofe ahụ mgbe ụfọdụ na cocoyam (taro) pudding a na-akpọ kwacoco
A na-ejikarị azụ̀ catfish (azụ̀ Banga soup) a mịrị amị ma ọ bụ anụ a na-ese n'ọkụ
Ofe ahụ nwekwara ike ime nri dị ụtọ na mgbakwunye nke akwụkwọ nri Okra
Amiedi, nke a makwaara dị ka ofe banga, bụ ofe nke ndị Urhobo nke Southern Naijiria riri
A na-eme ya site na iwepụta mmiri nke mkpụrụ nkwụ
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a na-agbakwunye ihe ndị ọzọ dị ka crayfish, anụ, azụ, ose na eriri ehi
A na-eri ya na eba ma ọ bụ usi (starch)
