Palmer C
Hayden (Jenụwarị 15, 1890 na Febụwarị 18, 1973) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nke gosipụtara ndụ ndị Africa America, ọdịdị ala, ọdịdị mmịrị, na mmetụta ndị Africa
Ọ na-ese ihe, na-ese ma mmanụ ma na mmiri, ọ bụkwa onye na-ese egwu nkè ógè ya
A mụrụ Palmer C Hayden, nke aha ya bụ Peyton Cole Hedgeman, na Jenụwarị 15, 1890 na Widewater, Virginia
Ọ bụ nwanne ya nwoke nkè okenye mèrè ka Hayden mara nka, onye malitere ise ihe mgbè ọ dị obere
N'agbanyeghị mmasị mbụ ya na nka, Hayden nwere ọchịchọ ịghọ onye na-akpọ violin
N'ụzọ dị mwute, ọtụtụ ihe mgbochi gbochiri nke a, gụnyere ọdịdị ya na nsogbu ego n'ezinụlọ ya
N'agbanyeghị nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe, Hayden ga-emecha kwaa ụta màkà mkpebi ya ịhapụ nrọ mbụ ya
Nkụda mmụọ dị ilu nọgidere n'uche Hayden dị ka egosiri na ụfọdụ ọrụ ya
Midnight at the Crossroads bụ ihe osise nke na-egosi mkpebi a manyere ya ime
Ọ bụ ezie na nkwonkwo ụkwụ ya na ihu ya na-egosi mmasị ya n'ụzọ ónyé na-agụ egwú, ọ na-ahọrọ ụzọ nke ọzọ
Akụkụ a na-egosi ihe esemokwu Hayden pụtara
Hayden gbasoro ọrụ nka site n'ịmụ ihe osise icheku ọkụ na Mahadum Columbia ka ọ na-arụ ọrụ abalị na post ọfịs
Mgbè Hayden kpebiri na ọrụ post ọfịs ya were oge ya, ọ kwụsịrị ma malite ọrụ nhicha n'ụlọ dị iche iche dị na New York City
Na mberede, ónyé mbụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ bụ Victor Perard, ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé nkụzi nka na Cooper Union, nke a na-akpọbu Cooper Institute
E goro Hayden ka ọ sachaa ụlọ ọrụ Perard ma gbaa ya ume ka ọ gaa n'ihu na-emepe nka ya

Mgbè afọ ise gachara mba ọzọ, jiri ego ọ gbazitere n'aka American Aid Society nke Paris, otu na-enweghị uru iji kwado ndị America nọ na mba ọzọ, Hayden kpebiri ịlaghachi na United States na August 11, 1932
Ọ nọgidere na New York City, ebe o biri tupu ọ gaa mba ọzọ, mgbè ọ lọtara, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe na-ahụ màkà ọrụ na-aga n'ihu na ụgwọ ọnwa dị egwu nke ihe dị ka $ 30 kwa izu
Afọ iri mgbè nleta mbụ ya na 1926, Hayden laghachiri Paris n'oge na-adịghị anya; obere ihe ka a maara banyere nleta a
Ọ laghachiri na New York n'ime otu afọ ma mgbè ọ dị afọ 50, ọ lụrụ Miriam Huffman

O kpebiri na 1944 ịmalite ọrụ ọhụrụ, nke dugara na mgbalị afọ atọ nke rụzuru ọrụ ya kachasị mma Usoro John Henry Echiche a gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ n'akụkọ ifo nna ya gwara ya mgbè ọ bụ nwata wee gaa nyocha maka ikike nke akụkọ ọdịnala ahụ, na-enweta mkpali iji sonye na nka ya

Nkọwa ọ bụla ọzọ maka ihe mere Hayden ji nwee mmetụta siri ike banyere John Henry na usoro ahụ n'ozuzu ya edoghị anya na akọwaghị ya, mana o yikarịrị ka ọ na-ejikọta ya na mmekọrịta mpako ya na ndị Afrịka America
N'oge ọ kara nká, Hayden nọgidere na-arụsi ọrụ ike na nka ya, a na-ahọrọ ya mgbe niile maka onyinye ndị a ma ama ma na-eme njem n'etiti Paris na United States iji mee ka mmụọ ya dịkwuo mma
Ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nọgidere bụrụ isiokwu dị mkpa na ndụ ya na nka ya, na-eduga ya ikwu okwu n'ihu ọha megide iwu agbụrụ na-egbochi ndị Africa America na ndị Hispanic

A hụrụ ihe atụ nke a na 1966, mgbe Hayden degaara William Booth, Onye isi oche nke City Commission on Human Rights, banyere nkwado maka ọnụ ọgụgụ hà nhata nke ndị Africa America, Latinos, na ndị ọcha nọ na bọọdụ iji gbochie mmeso ọjọọ nke ajọ mbunobi na ike kpatara
Hayden nwụrụ na Febụwarị 18, 1973, obéré oge ka ọ natara onyinye iji gosipụta ndị agha Negro n'etiti agha ụwa
Ụlọ Ahịa Palms dị na ala dị square mita pụkụ ịrị anọ na ise (11-acre) na Lekki, Lagos State
O nwere 21,000 square mita (5 acres) nke ohere ịzụ ahịa
E wuru ụlọ ahịa ahụ n'ala mmiri nke gọọmentị weghaara n'oge na-adịbeghị anya ma onye Oba nke Lagos na Onye isi ala Obasanjo nyere iwu ka e wuo ya
Ụlọ ahịa ahụ, nke meghere na ngwụcha afọ 2005, nwere ụlọ ahịa ịrị isii na itoolu na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri isii nke oge a
Enwere ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala maka ihe dị ka ụgbọala otu puku
Ụlọ Ahịa Palms (ruo mgbe ogige Polo meghere na Enugu) bụ ụlọ ahịa nke abụọ kachasị ukwuu site na mpaghara zuru oke na-esote Ado Bayero Mall dị na Kano nma bụrụkwa nke mbụ n'ụdị ya na Naịjirịa
Ụlọ ahịa ahụ bụ nke Persianas Properties Limited (Akụkụ nke Persianas Group), nke onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria Tayo Amusan, onye na-emepe ihe onwunwe Naijiria, kwalitere
Persianas Group na-ewu ụlọ ahịa ndị yiri ya na Enugu (Polo Park Mall) na Kwara (Kwara Mall) - a na-atụ anya ịmalite ịzụ ahịa na nkeji nke atọ nke afọ 2011
Ọtụtụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-aga n'ihu n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke Naịjirịa
Ndị Anchor Tenants na ụlọ ahịa ahụ bụ South African Giants Game and ShopRite na Genesis Deluxe Cinemas
Ụlọ ahịa ndị ahụ, nke dị n'agbata 28-590 square mita (300-6,400 square feet) na-abịa n'ụdị dị iche iche nke ngwaahịa na ọrụ dị iche iche
Game (akụkụ nke Massmart Group - Walmart weghaara n'oge na-adịbeghị anya) ọnụahịa mkpọsa na-ewe nnukwu ohere na ihe dị ka 5495 square mita

ShopRite, nke na-akpọ onwe ya ụlọ ahịa kachasị ukwuu n'Africa meghere ụlọ ahịa mbụ ha na Naịjirịa na The Palms na The Hub Media Store - ụlọ ahịa mgbasa ozi kachasị ukwuu na Naịjarịa na-arụ ọrụ na ala elu
Genesis Deluxe Cinemas na-arụ ọrụ ihe nkiri isii n'ụlọ dị n'elu na-egosi ihe nkiri mba ụwa nakwa nke Naijiria
Ndepụta nke nnukwu ụlọ ahịa na Naịjirịa
Paltoga bụ ama ukwu no na Obodo Békè ala ana-kpo Mpaghara Russia
Pam Golding (née Stroebel; 12 Septemba 1928 - 3 Eprel 2018) bụ onye South Africa na-emepụta ala na ụlọ
Pam Golding Properties, nke ọ tọrọ ntọala na 1976, bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ kachasị ukwuu na South Africa, nwere ihe karịrị ụlọ ọrụ 300 na sub-Saharan Africa na mba ofesi
Nwa Golding, Andrew Golding, bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ugbu a
Golding nwụrụ na 3 Eprel 2018, mgbe ọ dị afọ 89, n'ụlọ ya na Cape Town, South Africa
Pamela Tshwete (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1961) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye otu African National Congress na onye osote minista na-ahụ maka mmiri na ịdị ọcha na South Africa
Ọ bụ nwanyị di ya nwụrụ nke Steve Tshwete
A họpụtara ya na nke mbụ ya n'afọ 2002
Pam bụ asụsụ Mbum nke dị n'ebe ugwu Cameroon nke ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ ghara ịla n'iyi
Enwere naanị ihe dị ka ndị ọkà okwu 30 fọdụrụ na mpaghara Tcholliré (Commune Tcholliré, ngalaba Mayo-Rey, Northern Region)
Pamela Adie bụ onye na -akwado ikike mmekọ nwoke na nwoke, onye na -ekwu okwu n'ihu ọha, onye na -enyocha ihu na onye na -ese ihe nkiri si Nigeria
A na -ahụta Pamela dị ka onye nkwuchite ihu ọha ama ama nke na -akwado obodo LGBTQ ma na -ekwukarị okwu na nkwado maka inye obodo LGBTQ ikike na Nigeria
Nchọpụta ya na ihe odide ya gbasara ikike LGBT na Naịjirịa apụtala n'ọtụtụ usoro anthology LGBT
Mpụta izizi ya, N'okpuru egwurugwu, nke sitere na ncheta onwe ya, kpaliri ya ịbụ onye ama ama
Ụlọ ọrụ na -emepụta ihe ya bụ fé na -ekwu na ọ rụrụ ihe nkiri nwanyị nwanyị nwanyị mbụ na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Equality Hub, otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị
N'agbanyeghị na ọ lụrụ nwoke, ọ kwupụtara na 2011 na ọ bụ nwanyị nwere mmasị nwanyị n'ihu ọha mgbe ya na ndị ezinụlọ ya kparịtachara
A mụrụ ya na Calabar, Cross River State
Pamela nwetara MBA ya na Mahadum Webster yana nzere masta ya na Mahadum Baltimore
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Wisconsin-Superior na nzere bachelọ na nchịkwa azụmahịa
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ onye ndọrọndọrọ nwanyị nwanyị nwanyị mbụ na Naịjirịa mgbe ọ gbasasịrị ọrụ dị ka onye na -akwado ikike LGBT
N’afọ 2017, ọ kwukwara okwu na mbipụta mmalite nke “Economic Meeting LingT Rights Activists”
O kwukwara okwu na nnọkọ ahụ gbasara mkpa ọ dị ịgụnye ndị LGBT n'ebe ọrụ
O dere, duzie ma mepụta n'okpuru Rainbow (2019), ihe nkiri izizi lekwasịrị anya nwanyị nwanyị nke Nigeria, nke dabere na ndụ ya
N’afọ 2019, ọ bụ otu n’ime mmadụ iri a họpụtara maka mbipụta mbụ nke Mary Chirwa Award, nke hiwere na 2018
N'ịkwado onye ndu nwere obi ike, e nyere ya nhọpụta gị
Ọ kwuputara ebumnuche ya ịme ihe nkiri gbasara obodo ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa na onye isi na -emepụta ihe nkiri fé
Mmepụta ihe nkiri a ghọrọ esemokwu n'ihi mmachibido iwu gọọmentị machibidoro ọrụ mmekọ nwanyị na nwanyị
Uyaiedu Ikpe-Etim na Pamela Adie malitere ọrụ a na mmekorita ya na Equality Hub
A na -ahụta ihe nkiri a dị ka ihe nkiri na -eme nwanyị nwanyị nwanyị mbụ na Naịjirịa, ihe gbasara mmachi malitere n'ihi ụdị ihe nkiri a
Agbanyeghị, mwepụta ihe nkiri a na -egbu oge n'ihi nsogbu ime nnyocha
E turu Pamila Adie na onye na -ahụ maka ihe nkiri egwu na a ga -atụ ya mkpọrọ mgbe ebubo pụtara gbasara mbọ ndị na -eme ihe nkiri wepụtara ihe nkiri a na mba ụwa
Pamela Charlette bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Seychelles onye jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Ebe obibi, Ala, Akụnụba, na Njem Ala n'etiti n'ụbọchị 27 Eprel 2018 na 3 Nọvemba 2020
N'oge gara aga, Charlette jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Azụmaahịa na Ọrụ Ugbo site n'ụbọchị 7 Julaị 2017 ruo 27 Eprel 2018 mgbe ọ ghọsịrị onye isi odeakwụkwọ maka Mmepe Azụmabe na Ihe ọhụrụ Azụmaịa
Pamela Council (amụrụ n'afọ 1986) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé nkụzi
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ iji mepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ, akwa, mgbasa ozi na-ebipụta na nka arụmọrụ
Ọrụ ya na-ekwu maka ọdịbendị ndị isi ojii America, ma na-egosipụtakarị ọchị
Ọ bi na Bronxville, New York ugbu a
A mụrụ Pamela Council na 1986 na Southampton, New York; n'ime ezinụlọ Black
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Stuyvesant High School, site na 2000 rụo 2003
Kansụl gàrà Williams College, site na 2003 ruọ 2007, ébé ọ natara Bachelor of Arts ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Studio Art ma belata na Mathematics
Ọ gàrà Mahadum Columbia, site na 2012 ruo 2014, ébé ọ natara Master of Fine Arts, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nsọpụrụ
Ọ bụ ónyé na-enyere onye nkuzi aka n'ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ya na Columbia, na-akụzi ma klas ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na klas ndị gụrụ akwụkwọ na ihe ọkpụkpụ na ụlọ 3D
Kansụl na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa na ihe ọkpụkpụ, ákwà, mgbasa ozi na-ebipụta na nka arụmọrụ

E nyela ọrụ ya ọrụ ma gosipụta ya site na Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture, Studio Museum na Harlem, Williams College Museum of Art, Southampton Historical Museum na Kianga Ellis Projects n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na MANA BSMT na 2016, ma sonye na nso nso a na otu, Black Women Artists for Black Lives Matter
A Fountain for Survivors (2021) bụ isi iyi dị mita irí na asatọ n'ime dome ma kpuchie ya ihe karịrị mbọ mkpịsị aka acrylic 350,000
E gosipụtara ọrụ a na Times Square na New York City na 2021 dị ka ụtụ nyé ndị lanarịrị ọrịa COVID-19 na United States
Pamela Happi bụ onye telivishọn Cameroon
A maara ya maka Miss P Show, bụ nke Orange Cameroon na-akwado ma na-achọ ịkwalite ndị ntorobịa ka ha nwee ntụkwasị obi onwe na ha
Happi bụ onye Cameroon mụrụ, mana o nwebeghị ozi gbasara nzụlite ya na ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya
Ụfọdụ akwụkwọ kwuru na a mụrụ ya na 1989
Happi malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya dị ka onye na-egosi ihe ngosi TV na Douala, na ihe ngosi okwu a maara dị ka Miss P Show, malitere na April 2015 na Orange Cameroon
'Anyị anọghị n'usoro iwu
Anyị ga-eme mgbanwe maka mkpa ndị na-ege anyị ntị mana DNA anyị na-enye ozi na ntụrụndụ nye ndị ọgbọ anyị (m), 'Pamela gwara Camerounweb
Echiche mbụ ya bụ iwulite ntụkwasị obi nke ntorobịa ka ọ bụrụ mmalite nke ụwa ha site na ihe ngosi okwu ya
Na Septemba 2015 ọ gara na ụlọ mgbe ochie nke Chukwu mbụ na ndị otu ya, gụnyere Nigeria star Alexx Ekubo
Pamela Jelimo (amụrụ na 5 Disemba 1989) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ n'etiti etiti, ọkachamara na mita 800
O ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na mita 800 na 2008 Olympics na Beijing mgbe ọ dị afọ 18
Ọ bụ nwanyị Kenya mbụ meriri ihe nrite ọla edo nke Olympic nakwa onye Kenya mbụ merie Golden League Jackpot
O nwere ma ihe ndekọ ụwa nke 800m na ihe ndekọ Africa nke okenye n'otu anya ahụ
Jelimo bụkwa otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị kachasị nta meriri ihe nrite ọla edo nke Olympic maka Kenya
A mụrụ Pamela Jelimo n'obodo Kiptamok, Nandi District, Rift Valley Province
Nne ya, Esther Cheptoo Keter, bụ onye na-agba ọsọ mita 200 na mita 400, mana omenala nke agbụrụ Nandi pụtara na dị ka nwa nwanyị ikpeazụ ọ pụghị ịlụ di ma lekọta ndị mụrụ ya n'oge agadi
Otú ọ dị, e kwere ka ọ mụọ ụmụ ụmụ nwoke dị iche iche; ya mere, nne Jelimo zụlitere ya n'ezinụlọ nke ụmụnne atọ na ụmụnne nwanyị isii
Jelimo malitere ịgba ọsọ na 2003, mgbe ọ dị afọ 13, na Koyo Secondary na ngalaba Kaptumo, nso Kapsabet
O guzobere onwe ya ngwa ngwa dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu, na-emeri na asọmpi ụlọ akwụkwọ na 100 mita, 200 mita, 400 mita, 800 mita, 400 ihe mgbochi, na heptathlon
Onye nkuzi egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya bụ Philip Ng'eno kwuru na ya na ụmụ nwoke na-asọ mpi na ihe omume sprint ebe ụmụ agbọghọ anaghị enye asọmpi ọ chọrọ
Ezinụlọ ahụ dara ogbenye ma gbalịa ịkwụ ụgwọ iji zipụ Jelimo n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ebe ụmụnne ya abụọ tọrọ ya ahapụla n'ihi na ha enweghị ike ịkwụ ụgwọ ahụ
Ọ jụrụ ịhapụ ma malite ire mmiri ara ehi sitere n'ụmụ ehi ezinụlọ iji kwụọ ụgwọ ya, na-agafe ugwu ndị dị elu iji ree ya na ahịa Chemase
Onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ Daniel Maru nyere ego maka uwe track na akpụkpọ ụkwụ na-agba ọsọ ka Jelimo wee nwee ike ịga ụlọ ọrụ Kenya maka ịgba ọsọ
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2004, Jelimo eruola asọmpi mpaghara na 400m
Maru gara n'ihu na mmesapụ aka ya, na-enye ohere ka onye na-eme egwuregwu na-eto eto gụsịrị akwụkwọ mgbe ọ ka ji ụgwọ otu afọ
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, a manyere nne ya ire ehi ikpeazụ ya ka Jelimo wee nwee ike ịme ule ya
Ezinụlọ ya na-akwado agụmakwụkwọ ya mgbe niile
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2007, ọ bụ onye nke ise n'ọsọ mita 400 na asọmpi Kenya Championships na oge 5582 sekọnd
Ọ nọgidere na-emeziwanye n'oge niile, na-emeri ihe nrite ọla edo nke mita 400 na African Junior Championships na njedebe nke 5493 s ma na-etinye ihe ndekọ mba Kenya na 200 m na 2468 s
Jelimo nwere obi ụtọ na ihe ọ rụzuru mana onye nkuzi ọhụrụ ya bụ Zaid Kipkemboi Aziz tụrụ aro ka ọ gbanwee na 800 m, na-ekwu na ọ ga-arụ ọrụ kachasị mma n'ebe dị anya
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka ndị uwe ojii Kenya ma na-azụ onwe ya na onye na-agba ọsọ Kenya Janeth Jepkosgei
Jelimo gbara ọsọ mita 800 mbụ ya na 19 Eprel 2008 na ule Kenya maka asọmpi Afrịka, na-agba nkeji 2 0102
N'agbanyeghị ọrụ egwuregwu ya, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii Embu dị ka onye uwe ojii, na-enweta KSh 11000 kwa ọnwa (ihe dịka € 100)
O mere ọganihu ya na 2008 African Championships in Athletics mgbe ọ dị afọ 18
Oge ya, 1 5870, bụ ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ nke mba
Na 25 Mee 2008 ọ meriri mita 800 na ihe omume Hengelo Grand Prix ma setịpụ Junior World Record ọhụrụ nke 1 5576
Yuan Wang nke China setịpụrụ ndekọ gara aga (1 5718) na afọ 1993
Ọ bụkwa ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ nke Kenya, nke Janeth Jepkosgei nwere (1 5604 na afọ 2007)
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2008, ọ gbara ọsọ 800m na Berlin wee merie ISTAF Golden League na 1 5499, ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ nke Afrịka
Maria Mutola setịpụrụ ndekọ Afrịka gara aga (1 5519) na afọ 1994
N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2008, ọ meziwanyere ihe ndekọ ahụ ruo 1 5497 na Paris
Ọ bụkwa mmeri nke anọ ya n'usoro na ÅF Golden League, ebe ọ bụ otu n'ime naanị ndị na-asọmpi jackpot abụọ fọdụrụ, onye nke ọzọ bụ onye na-agba ọsọ Blanka Vlašić
N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2008, Jelimo ritere ọla edo na mita 800 na Beijing Olympics
Oge ya bụ 1 5487, ọzọ bụ ndekọ
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị Kenya mbụ meriri nrite ọla edo nke Olympic
Ọ gara n'ihu na-enweghị mmeri site na mmeri na nzukọ Weltklasse Golden League na Zurich na 29 Ọgọstụ 2008 na-emeziwanye ihe kachasị mma ya ruo 1 5401
Nke a bụ nke atọ kachasị ọsọ, n'azụ naanị Nadezhda Olizarenko na ndekọ ụwa nke Jarmila Kratochvílová
Na asọmpi Memorial van Damme na Brussels, na ngwụcha nke ÅF Golden League, Jelimo meriri mita 800 na oge nke 1 5516
Dị ka naanị onye na-eme egwuregwu meriri otu ihe omume ahụ na nzukọ isii niile nke Golden League, ọ meriri jackpot nke asọmpi nke $ 1,000,000
Nanị onye ọzọ fọdụrụnụ, Blanca Vlasic, emeghị mmeri ikpeazụ
Ọ bụ onye Kenya mbụ meriri Golden League jackpot
O kpuwere okpueze ya na-enweghị mmeri site na mmeri ya na asọmpi IAAF World Athletics Final nke afọ 2008
Mgbe ihe omume ahụ gasịrị, ọ laghachiri Kenya na nke mbụ ya kemgbe ule Olympic ma bụrụ onye nnukwu mmemme nabatara
N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2008 n'obodo Kapsabet, a gụrụ okporo ámá aha ya iji sọpụrụ ya
E depụtara Jelimo maka IAAF World Athlete of the Year ụmụ nwanyị n'akụkụ Yelena Isinbayeva na Tirunesh Dibaba, mana Isinbayeba meriri ihe nrite ahụ
E nyere Jelimo ihe nrite IAAF Revelation of the Year na afọ 2008 Kenyan Sportswoman of the Year Award
Ọ hapụrụ oge ime ụlọ nke afọ 2009 n'ihi nsogbu achilles mepụtara mgbe ọ na-azụ onwe ya
Kama nke ahụ, ọ malitere oge ya n'ọnwa Eprel na nzukọ Athletics Kenya na Kakamega, na-agba ọsọ 200 na 1500 mita maka ebumnuche ọzụzụ
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Mee, ọ gbara ọsọ mita 800 mbụ ya n'afọ na Meeting International Mohammed VI na Rabat, Morocco, na-emecha nke isii (oge 2 0246) ọ bụ ọsọ 800m mbụ ọ na-emerighị
Izu abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ gwụchara nke ikpeazụ na nzukọ Prefontaine Classic na Eugene, Oregon
N'ihi nsonaazụ ọjọọ ndị a, o lekwasịrị anya na ọzụzụ ihe karịrị otu ọnwa
Ọ laghachiri n'ụzọ gara nke ọma site na mmeri nke nzukọ Heusden-Zolder na 18 Julaị na-agba n'okpuru nkeji abụọ (1 5959)
Jelimo laghachiri na asọmpi n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010, merie ọsọ mita 800 na nzukọ Athletic Kenya na Nakuru
Ọ mechara nke asatọ na nzukọ Diamond League na Shanghai, China
O rughị eru maka asọmpi Afrịka nke 2010 nke e mere na Nairobi
Na afọ 2011 Prefontaine Classic ọ gwụchara nke ikpeazụ na ọsọ mita 800, oge 2 0912, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ sekọnd itoolu n'azụ onye nke abụọ ikpeazụ, Jemma Simpson
Ọ bụ oge kachasị mma nke Jelimo n'oge ahụ nke IAAF dekọrọ
Jelimo nwere mmalite na-ekwe nkwa maka oge na afọ 2012 na-emecha nke abụọ n'azụ Malika Akkaoui nke Morocco na nzukọ ime ụlọ na Lievin, France, na-agba ọsọ ndekọ ime ụlọ nke Kenya nke 1 5910 sekọnd
Oge ime ụlọ ya nwetara ọla edo na 2012 World Indoor Championships na Istanbul, Turkey, na-eme ka oge ya dịkwuo mma ruo 1 5883 sekọnd
Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ onye nke abụọ n'ihu onye nwetara ọlaọcha Nataliia Lupu nke Ukraine
Ọ malitere oge n'èzí site na mmeri na nzukọ Doha 2012 Diamond League na oge ndekọ nke 1 5694 nkeji
Fantu Magiso meriri ya na Golden Gala, mana o meriri na ule Kenya wee setịpụ oge kachasị n'ụwa nke 1 5676 na KBC Night of Athletics
Na afọ 2012 Olympics, Jelimo mechara n'ọnọdụ nke anọ
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2015, ụlọ ọrụ World Anti-Doping Agency tụrụ aro ka e nye ụmụ nwanyị Russia abụọ mechara na nke mbụ na nke atọ mmachibido iwu ndụ ha niile maka mmebi iwu doping ha na Olimpik
Kọmitii Olimpik mba ụwa ewepụla Mariya Savinova ikike
IOC emebibeghị onye egwuregwu nke ọzọ ma mee ka ndị ọzọ na-agwụcha otu ọkwa, e nyere Jelimo ọla nchara
Jelimo lụrụ Peter Kiprotich Murrey, onye bụkwa onye na-agba ọsọ mita 800, na ngwụcha afọ 2007
Ha enweghị ike ịkwụ ụgwọ nnukwu agbamakwụkwọ kama ha nwere emume obodo dị mfe
A kpughere alụmdi na nwunye ahụ n'ihu ọha ruo na Disemba 2008
A mụrụ nwa ha nwanyị n'afọ 2015
Eziokwu dị ka nke 10 Ọktoba 2008
Ozi niile sitere na profaịlụ IAAF
Pamela Jooste (amuru Cape Town ) bu onye ode akwukwo South Afrika
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, soro ada ogbenye gwu egwu, meriri afo 1998 Commonwealth Writers' Prize, akwụkwọ mbụ kacha mma, Africa, na ihe nrite Sanlam maka akụkọ ifo
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka ndị mbipụta Howard Timmins, yana BP Southern Afrika
Ọ lụrụ di ma biri na Cape Town
Pamela Nomvete (a mụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa / Britain
A mụrụ Pamela Nomvete na Ethiopia nye nne na nna South Africa

Ọ nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'ọtụtụ mba dị iche iche, ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi na United Kingdom, mesịa gụọ akwụkwọ na Royal Welsh College of Music and Drama N'otu oge ọ biri na Manchester, ebe nwanne ya nwanyị bụ nwa akwụkwọ
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na United Kingdom, Nomvete kwagara Johannesburg, South Africa n'afọ 1994, mgbe a họpụtara Nelson Mandela dịka onye isi ala na njedebe nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
N'afọ ndị 1990, Nomvete malitere ọrụ telivishọn, na-enweta aha ọma na South African soap opera Generations
Omume ya bụ Ntsiki Lukhele bụ 'onye kachasị njọ na TV agụụ ike, onye na-achịkwa na onye na-egbu egbu'
Otú ọ dị, Nomvete n'onwe ya lụsoro ịda mbà n'obi ọgụ mgbe di ya ekwesịghị ntụkwasị obi na ịgba alụkwaghịm ya
Ka ndụ ya na-agbanwe, n'otu oge ọ bi n'ụgbọala ya, na-ere uwe maka nri na siga
Na Zulu Love Letter (2004), Nomvete mere Thandi, nne na-alụbeghị di na onye nta akụkọ na-agba mbọ iso nwa ya nwanyị dị afọ iri na atọ kwurịta okwu
Mgbe Thandi dị ime nwa ya, ndị otu ndị na-egbu ọchụ n'akpa ókè agbụrụ wakporo ya, na-ahapụ nwa ahụ ntị chiri
Ọrụ Nomvete mere ka o nweta onyinye FESPACO Best Actress Award n'afọ 2005
N'afọ 2012 na 13, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri UK na-eme ihe nkiri Coronation Street, na-eme Mandy Kamara, onye na-emebu ọkụ nke Lloyd Mullaney (nke Craig Charles na-eme)
A ga-emecha chọpụta na Lloyd bụ nna nwa nwanyị Mandy bụ Jenna
N'afọ 2013 o bipụtara akụkọ ndụ onwe onye, Dancing to the Beat of the Drum In Search of My Spiritual Home
Nomvete na-eme Nichiren Buddhism
Pamela Smith Hudson (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ nwanyị Africa-America na ónyé na-ese ihe na Los Angeles nkè ọrụ nka ya gụnyere ihe osise encaustic, ceramics na nnwale óbíbí akwụkwọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na UCLA, ébé ọ gụrụ nka, akụkọ nka, ọmụmụ ihe ngosi nka, na ịgba egwu
Smith Hudson anọwo na-ekerịta nka ya kemgbe afọ 2015 ma gosipụta ihe ngosi na CAAM, Over the Influence Gallery na gallery ECLina
Pamela Stretton (amụrụ n'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1980) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke ọrụ ya na-emetụta ahụ nwanyị na ịma mma ya, na ọrụ ya na omenala a ma ama
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya bụ ihe odide ink jet dijitalụ nke jikọtara foto na ederede; ha bụ ihe mejupụtara koodu, akara, na mgbasa ozi nke na-emepụta onyinyo buru ibu nke ụdị nwanyị
Eserese ndị ahụ bụ n'ụzọ dị ukwuu akụkọ ndụ onwe onye, mana ha na-enwekwa isiokwu gbasara ọdịbendị a ma ama, ejiji, ahụike, na nri
Ihe omuma nke ihe omuma nke abuo bu ihe omuma na-arutu aka na nsogbu iri nri
N'otu aka ahụ, usoro grid na-egosi nrụgide nke nkwekọrịta
A na-akpọ ụdị ya ụdị nwanyị nke Chuck Close
Stretton nwetara nzere Bachelor of Fine Art (nke nwere ọdịiche) na Mahadum Rhodes n'afọ 2002 nakwa Master of Fine Art ya (nke nwere ịdị iche) na Mahadum Cape Town n'afọ 2005
Pamela Phatsimo Sunstrum bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ise ihe, ntinye ihe

E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi, nke gụnyere GTA21 Triennial Exhibition na Museum of Contemporary Art na Toronto, Canada; The Bronx Museum na New York, USA; The Wiels Contemporary Art Centre na Brussels, Belgium; Museum der Moderne Salzburg, Kunsthaus Zürich, Germany; The Showroom na London, England; na Zeitz Museum of Contemporary Art Africa na Johannesburg, South Africa
A mụrụ Sunstrum na 1980 na Mochudi, Botswana, ma nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke Africa na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Eshia

Ọ bịara na United States na 1998 wee nweta nzere BA na nkwanye ugwu kasị elu site na Mahadum nke North Carolina na Chapel Hill na International Studies na itinye uche na Trans-national Cultures na 2004
Sunstrum nwetara MFA ya na Mt
Royal School of Art na Maryland Institute College of Art na 2007
O mechara biri na Baltimore Maryland dị ka onye na-ese ihe na Baltimore Creative Alliance, mgbe ọ na-akụzi na Maryland Institute College of Art
Ọ na-ebi ugbu a na Johannesburg, South Africa ebe ọ na-egosi na ihe ngosi onwe onye na nke otu gburugburu ụwa
A họpụtara Sunstrum ka ọ bụrụ osote prọfesọ na Ngalaba Visual Art & Art History nke Mahadum York na 2017
N'ịbụ onye nwere mmasị na akụkọ ifo oge ochie na echiche sayensị, Sunstrum na-eche banyere mmalite nke oge, echiche ala, na echiche banyere eluigwe na ala
Ọrụ ya na akwụkwọ, nnukwu ntinye, na ihe nkiri na-akwụsị akwụsị na-agbanye mgbọrọgwụ na akụkọ ndụ onwe onye, na-ekwu maka mmepe nke njirimara mba, njikọ mmadụ, na ememe gafere ókèala
N'ịbụ onye ahụmahụ ya n'ebe dị iche iche kpaliri, Sunstrum na-enyocha otú otu mmetụta nke njirimara si emepe n'ime ọnọdụ ala na ọdịbendị
Ihe osise ya bụ akụkọ ọdịdị ala nke na-apụta n'otu oge na ọdịnihu na oge ochie na-agbanwe n'etiti ihe ngosi na ihe ngosi dị egwu nke ugwu mgbawa, n'okpuru ala, na ala dị elu
Ebe ọ bi na Africa, Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia, na United States, Sunstrum mepụtara onwe ọzọ, Asme, iji gosipụta ọdịdị onwe ya na-agbanwe agbanwe
A na-ejikarị mmegharị ahụ na-emetụta onyinyo Asme dị ka ụzọ isi na-atụ aro oge dị mgbagwoju anya, na-egosi ịdị adị ya zuru ụwa ọnụ, na-enweghị oge

Ọdịdị ala nke Sunstrumńs na-agbasawanye na isiokwu nke enweghị oge; ọ na-eweghachi ebe ma nke dị adị ma nke e chepụtara echepụta iji kpughee obere ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ndị mmadụ n'ime mbara igwe buru ibu, echiche nke na-echetara echiche nke narị afọ nke iri na asatọ nke ihe dị elu
Mahadum Pan-Atlantic bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ onwe onye, nke na-enweghị uru na Lekki, Lagos State
Mahadum ahụ malitere dị ka Lagos Business School (LBS), nke e guzobere na afọ 1991
Gọmentị etiti kwadoro mahadum ahụ dị ka Mahadum Pan-African na afọ 2002, LBS ghọkwara ụlọ akwụkwọ mbụ ya
E wuchara Ajah Campus na afọ 2003 ma na afọ 2010 ọrụ malitere na ogige Ibeju-Lekki

Na Septemba, na afọ 2011 mahadum ahụ malitere Virtual Museum of Modern Nigerian Art, ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nke Jess Castellote, onye na-ese ihe na Spain nke gụnyere ihe karịrị ọrụ 400 sitere n'aka ndị na-ese egwu 81, gụnyere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Naijiria dị ka Aina Onabolu na Bruce Onobrakpeya na ndị na-emepụta ihe dị ka Richardson Ovbiebo na Babalola Lawson
Na Nọvemba na Disemba, na afọ 2011 EDC, maka oge mbụ, gosipụtara Global Entrepreneurship Week (GEW), na usoro ihe omume na Lagos
Ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria nwere ebumnuche ịmalite azụmahịa, ọtụtụ ndị bịara nzukọ ahụ
EDC abụwo onye na-elekọta GEW maka Naịjirịa kemgbe ahụ
Ụlọ Ọrụ Mmepe nke Mahadum (EDC) na-arụ ọrụ na Ngalaba Small and Medium Enterprise (SME) nke International Finance Corporation (IFC) iji nye SME Toolkit Nigeria
Nke a na-enye ozi njikwa azụmahịa n'efu na ọzụzụ maka obere azụmahịa
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2011, Praịm Minista Britain bụ David Cameron kwuru okwu na Mahadum Pan-Atlantic dị na Lagos, na-atụle enyemaka, azụmahịa na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
O kwuru maka mpaghara azụmahịa n'efu nke Afrịka, yana mmụba azụmahịa na Britain
Na Mee, na afọ 2013 a gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Mahadum Pan-Atlantic, iji zere mgbagwoju anya na Mahadum pan-African nke African Union
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2014, Mahadum ahụ malitere mmemme agụmakwụkwọ mbụ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ ya na Ibeju-Lekki
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2019, ụlọ ngosi nka nke Mahadum Pan-Atlantic, YSMA ga-emeghe maka ọha na eze na ihe ngosi abụọ n'otu oge
Pan African Airlines bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu nke dị na Naijiria ma bụrụ nke Bristow Group
Ha na-enyekarị helikọpta na ọrụ nku kwụ ọtọ na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ
E hiwere ụgbọ elu Pan African na Naịjirịa n'afọ 1961

Gọọmenti Naijiria wepụtara oge ngwụcha Eprel 30, 2007 maka ụgbọ elu niile na-arụ ọrụ na mba ahụ ka ha weghachi isi obodo ma ọ bụ gbadaa n'ala, na mbọ iji hụ na ọrụ na nchekwa ka mma Ụgbọ elu ahụ mezuru ụkpụrụ nke Nigerian Civil Aviation Authority (NCAA) n'ihe gbasara ịweghachi isi obodo ma debanye aha ọzọ maka ịrụ ọrụ
Àtụ Airlines of Nigeria
Pan African Climate Justice Alliance (PACJA) bụ netwọk nke ihe karịrị otu 1000 òtù sitere na mba iri anọ na asatọ (48) dị n'Africa
Ọ dị na mba Kenya ma nwee NGO, òtù ndị dị n'okpuru, ntụkwasị obi, ntọala, obodo ndị nwe obodo, ndị ọrụ ugbo, òtù ndị obodo, na òtù okpukpe
Ọ na-akwado maka ihu igwe na ikpe ziri ezi gburugburu ebe obibi ma ọ bụ njikọ ndị mmadụ
Ọ bụ ndị na-ahụ maka ihu igwe Augustine B Njamnshi na Mithika Mwenda guzobere ya
PACJA chọrọ ịkwalite mbelata ịda ogbenye ma zụlite ọnọdụ dabere na ikpe ziri ezi, nke dị mkpa maka Africa na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbanwe ihu igwe mba ụwa
Netwọk ahụ chọrọ gburugburu ụwa na-enweghị egwu nke mgbanwe ihu igwe ma na-akwado usoro mmepe dabere na ikpe ziri ezi na ikpe ziri aga maka ụmụ mmadụ niile

Ebumnuche nke netwọk ahụ bụ ịbụ ikpo okwu Afrịka maka òtù ndị obodo iji mee ka ozi dị, ịchọta atụmatụ, iji soro gọọmentị Afrịka na ndị ọzọ dị mkpa na-emekọrịta ihe, yana iguzo maka ikpe ziri ezi na ikpe ziri ezi n'ime mkparịta ụka mgbanwe ihu igwe nke mba ụwa
Ebumnuche ya bụ ịmepụta usoro mmepe na-adịgide adịgide iji chebe ma ihu igwe, ikike mmadụ, na uto ndị ogbenye
N'afọ 2017, PACJA mepụtara mkpesa iji kwụsị France na EU itinye aka na African Renewable Energy Initiative (AREI)
Ngalaba AREI dị na isi ụlọ ọrụ African Development Bank (AfDB) na Abidjan

Òtù ndị si n'ọtụtụ mba kwadoro arịrịọ ahụ, gụnyere otu ndị dị ka Greenpeace Mauritius, Somali Climate Change Network, Human Rights and Legal Aid Network of Sudan, Journalists for Climate Change in Nigeria, na Young Volunteers for Environment Zambia
Ìgwè ndị a na-echegbu onwe ha banyere EU na France na-etinye aka na atụmatụ itinye ego na mmepe ike ọhụrụ na Africa
PACJA mepụtara ACCER Awards n'afọ 2013 iji kwụọ ụgwọ ma kwado ịdị mma na akụkọ gburugburu ebe obibi

Pan South African Language Board (Afrikaans Pan-Suid-Afrikaanse Taalraad, nke akpọrọ PanSALB) bụ ọgbakọ dị na South Africa hiwere iji kwalite asụsụ ọtụtụ asụsụ, iji wulite asụsụ 11 gọọmentị, yana ichekwa ikike asụsụ na South Africa
E hiwere Board na Act 59 nke 1995 site na nzuko omeiwu nke South Africa
Na mgbakwunye na asụsụ 11 nke South Africa, PanSALB na-agbasi mbọ ike maka mmepe nke Khoe, San, na South African Sign Language
Ihe owuwu PanSALB gụnyere Kọmitii Asụsụ Obodo, National Language Bodies na National Lexicography Units

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2016, Minista na-ahụ maka nka na ọdịbendị na South Africa, Nathi Mthethwa gbasasịrị ụlọ ọrụ PanSALB dum, mgbe akụkọ na n'etiti afọ 2014 na 2015, mmefu nchịkwa nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mụbara site na nde 8 ruo nde 11 ZAR, ebe mmefu na iwu ya dara na nde 17 site na nde 23 ZAR, mgbe mmefu ya na-adịghị mma bụ nde 28
Pana bụ asụsụ Mbum nke Central African Republic
Puku ole na ole na-asụ ya n'ebe ndịda Chad na n'ebe ugwu Cameroon
Otu olumba dị na Cameroon, Nwoke, nwere ike ịbụ asụsụ dị iche
Blench (2004) hapụrụ Pondo na Gonge na CAR enweghị nkewa n'ime asụsụ Mbum
A na-asụ Pana gburugburu Belel (Belel commune, ngalaba Vina, Adamawa Region), na ngalaba Mayo-rey, Northern Region
A na-ahụkwa ya na CAR na Chad
Pan African Historical Theatre Project nke a maara ugbu a dị ka PANAFEST bụ ihe omume ọdịnala a na-eme na Ghana afọ abụọ ọ bụla maka ndị Afrịka na ndị si n'Afrịka
E mere ya na nke mbụ ya na 1992
Echiche nke emume a bụ ịkwalite na ịkwalite ịdị n'otu, Pan-Africanism, na mmepe nke kọntinent Afrịka n'onwe ya
Ihe omume ndị na-eme n'ememme a bụ ihe ngosi na ọrụ na mpaghara ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri, egwu, na uri, n'etiti ihe ndị ọzọ
Ọzọkwa, a na-ahụ durbar nke ndị isi, na njem nleta na ebe dị iche iche na-adọrọ mmasị, dị ka ụlọ ndị ohu

PANAFEST bụ onye nwụrụ anwụ Efua Sutherland mere n'etiti afọ 1980 ka ọ bụrụ ụgbọ omenala maka ijikọ ndị Africa nọ na kọntinent ahụ na ndị bi na mba ọzọ ọnụ n'okwu ndị sitere n'ịgba ohu welitere bụ nke a na-akwụsịbeghị PANAFEST na-ekwu maka nkwubi okwu kachasị njọ nke mere na mmalite okike nke ọha mmadụ Africa, bụ nke n'etiti nsogbu ndị ọzọ mebiri ntụkwasị obi onwe onye na nnwere onwe maka mkpebi onwe onye nke mmadụ dum Oke osimiri Ghana nwere ihe ncheta nke ihe karịrị afọ 500 nke oge a kacha nwee ọgba aghara n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Afrịka, bụ nke emume a kpachapụrụ anya na-eme ka ọ bụrụ saịtị maka iguzogide mmetụta nke ịgba ohu, na-ekpochapụ ihe mgbu nke ndị mbịarambịa, na-ekweta mmetụta fọdụrụnụ nke ahia ahụ kọntinenti Afrịka na imekọkwa ọnụ iji mepụta ọdịnihu dị mma na gburugburu ụwa nke oge a

N'akụkụ usoro ọgwụgwọ ahụ, PANAFEST na-eme ememe ike na nkwụsi ike nke omenala Africa na mmezu nke ndị Africa n'agbanyeghị ahia ohu transatlantic na nsonazụ ya Emebere ya iji nyere ndị Africa aka ị nwetaghachi ike ha wee si otú ahụ nwee mmụọ nsọ na ịmụrụ anya ebighi ebi, nyeghachi onwe ha n'inweta ọchịchị nke ọdịnihu nke ha n'ụzọ zuru ezu iji kwado nkuzi nke akụkọ ntolite ↵ Enwere mmepe ngwa ngwa taa na-eme ka atụmatụ Ghana a ji nganga bụrụ ikpo okwu dị mkpa ma dị mkpa nke na-enye ndị òtù ezinụlọ Africa ohere ịmekọrịta onwe ha na nkwurịta okwu ozugbo N'ime ihe ndị a bụ ihe ọjọọ dị ka ịzụ ahịa mmadụ site na kọntinent, ụbụrụ ụbụrụ, mpụ nke ndị Africa na akụ na ụba ụwa zuru ụwa ọnụ, mmụba ọhụrụ nke ịchụso ihe ndị sitere n'okike nke Africa na iji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-adị n'otu Africa Enwekwara ihe ndị dị mma gụnyere ime ka mgbakọ mba ụwa na njikọ aka na atụmatụ Africa guzobe azụmahịa na-agafe agafe, tinye uru na atụmatụ obodo, na-erite uru nke teknụzụ na ịkwalite ike nke ndị Africa gburugburu ụwa
PANAFEST bụ mmemme mba ụwa nke, dị ka o mere kemgbe nnwere onwe n'etiti narị afọ nke 20, na-eme Ghana ka ọ bụrụ ike na-akpali ndị Africa
Kemgbe 1992, mmemme ahụ adọtala ndị nnọchi anya gọọmentị, ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu na ndị otu sitere na mba Africa, Caribbean na South America, yana otu na ndị si Europe na United States
Gọọmenti Ghana na-ewere nke a dị ka nnukwu atụmatụ mba ma na-enwe ekele maka ụlọ ọrụ, obodo, otu obodo na ụlọ ọrụ chịkọtara akụrụngwa iji kwado mbọ gọọmentị n'ime afọ
Gọọmenti Ghana nwekwara ekele dị ukwuu maka gọọmentị ụmụnna nwanyị niile maka nsonye ha na African Union maka ịgbazinye nkwado ya na ngosipụta omenala a pụrụ iche
Florence Lowe 'Pancho' Barnes (July 22, 1901 - March 30, 1975) bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ na-efe ụgbọelu na onye guzobere otu ndị na-anya ụgbọelu ihe nkiri mbụ
N'afọ 1930, ọ mebiri ihe ndekọ ọsọ ikuku nke Amelia Earhart
Barnes gbara ọsọ na Women's Air Derby ma bụrụ onye otu Ninety-Nines

N'afọ ndị sochirinụ, a maara ya dị ka onye nwe Happy Bottom Riding Club, ụlọ mmanya na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị na Mojave Desert, Southern California, na-enye ndị ọkwọ ụgbọelu na ndị na-eme nnwale na-arụ ọrụ na nso
A mụrụ ya dị ka Florence Leontine Lowe na July 22, 1901, nye Thaddeus Lowe nke Abụọ (1870-1955) na nwunye mbụ ya, Florence May Dobbins, na Pasadena, California
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya, ọ tolitere n'otu nnukwu ụlọ dị na San Marino, California
N'oge ọ malitere, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe onye kachasị mma n'ógbè ahụ, dị ka The Bishop's School
Nna ya, onye na-eme egwuregwu nke ukwuu, gbara ya ume ka ọ nwee ekele maka nnukwu mpụga, Florence ghọkwara onye na-agba ịnyịnya
Nna nna ya bụ Thaddeus S
Lowe, onye bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ ụgbọ elu America site na ịmepụta otu ụgbọ elu agha mbụ nke mba ahụ, ndị agha nke Potomac's balloon corps n'oge Agha Obodo America
Ọ kpọọrọ nwa nwa ya nwanyị gaa ihe ngosi ụgbọ elu mgbe ọ dị afọ iri
Na 1919, Florence lụrụ Reverend C
Rankin Barnes nke South Pasadena, California, ha wee nwee nwa nwoke, William E
Barnes
Nne ya nwụrụ na 1924
Ebe ọ nọrọ ọnwa anọ na mba ọzọ na Mexico, na-ezute ndị na-eme mgbanwe ma na-agbapụ n'aka ndị ọchịchị, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwoke, ọ malitere iji aha njirimara 'Pancho' n'oge a
[mgbe?Barnes laghachiri San Marino, California, na ihe nketa e nyere ya mgbe nne na nna ya nwụrụ

N'afọ 1928, mgbe ọ na-akwọ nwa nwanne ya nwoke Dean Banks na nkuzi ụgbọ elu, o kpebiri ịmụta ụgbọ elu, ma mee ka onye nkuzi ụgbọelu nke nwa nwanne ya nwanyị, Ben Catlin, onye agha ụwa nke mbụ, kwenye na ọ chọrọ n'otu ụbọchị ahụ
Ọ na-eme naanị ya mgbe awa isii nke ntụziaka zuru oke gasịrị
Barnes mere ihe ngosi ad-hoc barnstorming ma sọọ mpi na asọmpi ikuku

N'agbanyeghị ihe mberede na 1929 Women's Air Derby, ọ laghachiri na 1930 n'okpuru nkwado nke Union Oil Company iji merie asọmpi ahụ - ma mebie ihe ndekọ ọsọ ọsọ ụmụ nwanyị nke Amelia Earhart na ọsọ nke 19619 kilomita kwa awa (31574 km / h)
Barnes mebiri ndekọ a na Travel Air Type R Mystery Ship
Mgbe nkwekọrịta ya na Union Oil gwụsịrị, Barnes kwagara Hollywood ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-anya ụgbọelu maka ihe nkiri
N'afọ 1931, ọ malitere Associated Motion Picture Pilots, otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-eme ka nchekwa ụgbọ elu dị mma ma kwụọ ụgwọ maka ọrụ ụgbọ elu
Ọ gbara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ikuku nke afọ 1930, gụnyere Howard Hughes' Hell's Angels (1930)
Barnes had extensive connections in Hollywood

Her early close friend George Hurrell (1904–1992), then eking out a living as a painter and photographer in Laguna Beach, California, would later become the head of the portrait department of MGM Studios

Barnes is credited with helping Hurrell start his career in Hollywood after he took the photo she was to use on her pilot's license, introducing him to her Hollywood friends[N 1] In a short period of time, Hurrell became the most in-demand photographer in Hollywood[N 2]
Barnes tụfuru ọtụtụ ego ya na Great Depression
Ka ọ na-erule 1935, ọ bụ naanị ụlọ ya na Hollywood fọdụrụ

Ọ rere ya, na Machị 1935 zụrụ ala dị hekta 180 na Mojave Desert, n'akụkụ ọdọ mmiri kpọrọ nkụ Rogers na Muroc Field, nke a na-akpọ March Field n'ihi na ọ bụ ihe enyemaka nke March Army Air Base n'oge ahụ

N'ala ya, Pancho Barnes wuru Happy Bottom Riding Club, nke a makwaara dị ka Rancho Oro Verde Fly-Inn Dude Ranch, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na-elekọta ndị na-efe efe n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu dị nso na ndị enyi ya si Hollywood

Barnes ghọrọ ezigbo enyi na ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ọkwọ ụgbọelu nnwale mbụ, gụnyere Chuck Yeager, Robert Anderson 'Bob' Hoover, Walt Williams, Jack Ridley, General Jimmy Doolittle, Buzz Aldrin, onye na-eme nnwale ụgbọ elu nke North American Bob Cadick, na onye nlekọta nnwale ụgbọelu Roy Ferren
Ogige Barnes ghọrọ ihe a ma ama maka oriri na ndụ dị elu nke ndị ọbịa niile
Mgbe nnwale ụgbọ elu gara nke ọma, ndị na-anya ụgbọelu Muroc na Edwards na-enwekarị oge dị mma na Happy Bottom Riding Club
Dị ka onye nwe ya, Barnes ga-enye ha nri abalị anụ n'efu maka imebi ihe mgbochi ụda
Mgbanwe nke iwu na 1952, Otú ọ dị, nyere aka mee ka Barnes banye na esemokwu na United States Air Force (USAF)
USAF na-eme atụmatụ maka ọdịnihu nke ụgbọ elu, ma kpebie na ọ dị mkpa iwu ụzọ ụgbọ elu ọhụrụ, nke dị ogologo iji nweta ụgbọ elu ọhụrụ a na-eme ndokwa ka ọ na-agba ọsọ na ike atọm
Ụzọ ụgbọ elu ọhụrụ ahụ ga-agafe n'ugbo ya
Ndị USAF nyere ya ọnụahịa maka anụ ụlọ ya, ala, na ihe owuwu ndị dị nso na ọnụahịa nke ala ọzara a na-emepebeghị emepe
Ọ rịọrọ ka a nyochaa ya nke ọma iji gosipụta ọnụahịa nke dochie ala ya na azụmahịa ya, mana n'etiti ịnata nyocha ọzọ, ndị isi ụlọ ahụ boro ya ebubo na ọ na-elekọta ụlọ na-adịghị mma n'ugbo ya
Mmetụta nke ọbụna ihe na-ekwesịghị ekwesị mere ka a machibido ndị ọrụ agha iwu, na uru nke azụmahịa ya dara
Barnes wee gbaa akwụkwọ megide USAF, dịka o si kwuo, 'Chụpụ ndị na-eme ihe ọjọọ na gọọmentị ga-eme ụdị ikpe na-ezighị ezi'
Ọ maara na ọ bụrụ na ọ tinye akwụkwọ, ọ ga-enwe ohere iwepu n'okpuru iyi ndị isi na ndị ọrụ dị iche iche na ntọala, eziokwu ga-apụta ma mee ka aha ya doo anya
N'oge agha siri ike n'ụlọ ikpe, n'afọ 1953, ọkụ gbara ya n'ọkụ nke sitere n'ụzọ dị omimi
Mgbe ọkụ ahụ gasịrị, ọnụ ahịa nke anụ ụlọ ya na azụmahịa ya gbadatara ruo n'ókè nke na-egosipụta nke ọma onyinye mbụ nke USAF
Ka o sina dị, agha ụlọ ikpe ahụ gara n'ihu
Barnes kpebisiri ike ịnata uru ziri ezi maka ala ya na azụmahịa ya, yana ime ka aha ya dị ọcha
Otu esemokwu dị mkpa banyere ikpe ya bụ 'Nna m ochie guzobere United States Air Force'
Na arụmụka ahụ, ụlọ ikpe hụrụ ihu ọma ya ma nye ya ụgwọ ọrụ $ 375,000 maka ihe onwunwe ya na azụmahịa ya
Ọzọkwa, e wepụrụ aha ya
Dị ka ọ bịara, e wughi ụzọ ụgbọ elu ahụ a tụrụ aro ya
Mgbe gọọmentị zụrụ ya, ọ kwagara Cantil, California, na-enwe olileanya ịmaliteghachi azụmahịa dị otú ahụ n'ebe ahụ
Ọ dịghị mgbe ọ mere
Ọ bụghị ruo na ngwụcha afọ 1960 ka Barnes ghọghachiri onye a na-ahụkarị na ntọala ahụ ma malite ịkpọ ya 'Nne nke Edwards AFB'
Ọnyá ahụ malitere ịgwọta ka Barnes na ọtụtụ ndị agadi jikọtara
A gbanwere aha ọgba aghara onye ọrụ ahụ na Edwards ka ọ bụrụ Ụlọ Pancho Barnes
Barnes nwere ọrịa kansa ara, nke nwere ike ịbụ ihe kpatara ọnwụ ya
E mere ndokwa ka ọ bụrụ onye isi okwu na Antelope Valley Aero Museum's annual 'Barnstormers Reunion' na Eprel 5, 1975
Otú ọ dị, mgbe enyi ya kpọrọ ya na Machị 30, 1975, ọ pụghị iru ya
Nwa ya nwoke Bill hụrụ ya nwụrụ anwụ n'ụlọ ya, onye nchọpụta ahụ kpebiri na ọ nwụrụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu izu tupu mgbe ahụ
Bill nwetara ikike pụrụ iche, nke e nyere site na United States Air Force, iji gbasaa ntụ ya na saịtị nke Happy Bottom Riding Club
Mgbe ahụ, o ji ụgbọelu mee ihe n'elu ebe ahụ, mana ifufe na-efefe, na-ebugharị ntụ ahụ n'ime obere ụgbọelu Cessna, ka e buru ya ọzọ
'Ọbụna n'ọnwụ, Barnes ka hụrụ ezigbo njem ọṅụ n'anya'
Di ya nke anọ, Eugene 'Mac' McKendry, gara n'ihu biri na Cantil ma dịrị ndụ Barnes ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Nwa ya nwoke Bill Barnes nwụrụ mgbe ọ na-anya ụgbọelu North American P-51 Mustang na-efe n'akụkụ Fox Field na Lancaster n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1980
N'afọ 1940, o guzobere Barnes Aviation nke Lancaster, nke Bill na-arụ ọrụ n'oge ọ toro
Ọ ka dị na azụmahịa ụgbọ elu taa
E gosipụtara ndụ ya na àgwà ya na ihe nkiri epic nke 1983 The Right Stuff, nke sitere na akwụkwọ Tom Wolfe kacha ere ahịa nke 1979 nke otu aha ahụ
Kim Stanley mere ya
Ọ bụkwa isiokwu nke ihe nkiri TV nke akụkọ ifo nke 1988, Pancho Barnes, nke John Michael Hayes dere, nke Richard Heffron duziri, na Valerie Bertinelli
E bipụtara akụkọ ndụ mbụ banyere Barnes na 1986, The Lady Who Tamed Pegasus The Story of Pancho Barnes, nke Grover Ted Tate dere, onye dabere n'ụzọ dị ukwuu na ihe ndekọ akụkọ ndụ nke Pancho Barnes
N'afọ 1996, akụkọ ndụ nke abụọ pụtara, Pancho The Biography of Florence Lowe Barnes, nke Barbara Schultz dere
PBS kwadoro ihe nkiri, The Legend of Pancho Barnes and the Happy Bottom Riding Club, nke e dechara na 2009
N'ime ya, Kathy Bates na-enye olu Barnes
Emere ihe nkiri ahụ n'onwe ya site na ala Barnes
Otú ọ dị, ala ahụ nyere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ohere zuru oke maka akwụkwọ na foto nke onwe ya yana akụkọ ndụ ya nke nwere ikike nwebisiinka nke ala ahụ nwere
Spark mepụtara ma dee ma Amanda Pope duzie ya na njikọ ya na KOCE-TV, ụlọ ọrụ PBS na Orange County, California
Ihe ngosi ahụ meriri Emmy maka nka na akụkọ ihe mere eme kacha mma
Barnes' Mystery Ship #32 was for a long time located in a hangar at Mojave Airport
It was sold to a private collector a number of years ago,Àtụ When and is currently in the United Kingdom, where it has been restored[N 3]
Ebe akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Happy Bottom Riding Club bụ ebe a na-eme emume ụbọchị Pancho Barnes nke USAF Test Pilot School / Edwards Air Force Base kwa afọ (nke e guzobere na 1980)
A na-eme oriri na ọṅụṅụ ma na-enye ihe ọṅụṅụ, tinyere ịgba egwú na egwu dị ndụ iji cheta onye ọsụ ụzọ ụgbọ elu na enyi a
Oge ezinụlọ na-aga n'ihu ruo ihe dị ka elekere itoolu nke ehihie, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ bụ oriri naanị ndị okenye, ikekwe iji cheta ụbọchị ochie nke Happy Bottom Riding Club
Pancho Barnes na Happy Bottom Flying Club bụ ndị Hal Jordan na-eto eto na-eleta na usoro ihe ọchị DC The New Frontier
N'ime ihe nkiri 2019 Captain Marvel, a na-akpọ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ onye na-anya ụgbọelu Captain Marvel Pancho's Bar, nke na-ezo aka na aha njirimara Barnes 'Pancho'
Kpọpụta njehie tag was found
Panel of the Wise (PoW) bụ òtù ndụmọdụ nke African Union, nke nwere ndị otu ise a họpụtara ahọpụta nke ọ bụla na-eje ozi afọ atọ
Ọrụ ya bụ inye echiche na Peace and Security Council na okwu ndị metụtara mgbochi esemokwu, njikwa, na ngwọta
A na-ahọrọ ndị nnọchiteanya maka mpaghara North, East, South, West, na Central nke kọntinent ahụ
E hiwere Panel mbụ nke ndị maara ihe na December 2007, na ikike nke mebie na 2010

Nzukọ nke ndị isi obodo na ndị ọchịchị, na-ezukọ na Kampala na 2010, kpebiri ịgbasa nhazi nke Panel, site n'ịhọpụta otu ìgwè nke 'Ndị enyi Panel of the Wise' họpụtara n'otu ntọala dị ka Panel (otu onye nnọchiteanya maka mpaghara ọ bụla nke Africa)
Ndị otu panel bụ onye isi oche nke African Union Commission na-ahọpụta ma African Union Commission kwadoro ya maka usoro afọ atọ, enwere ike imeghari otu ugboro

Onye mkpọrọ, mgbe Peace and Security Council (PSC) rịọrọ ya ma ọ bụ n'onwe ya, na-eme 'omume dị otú ahụ e weere dị ka nke kwesịrị ekwesị iji kwado mbọ nke PSC na nke Onye isi oche nke Commission maka mgbochi esemokwu'
Kọmitii ahụ na-ezukọ opekata mpe ugboro atọ n'afọ iji kwurịta ọrụ ya ma họrọ mpaghara ma ọ bụ mba ọ chọrọ ileta

Ọ na-ahazi ọmụmụ ihe kwa afọ banyere mgbochi na njikwa esemokwu, yana okwu ndị metụtara ya, iji nyere Panel aka mepụta akụkọ isiokwu nke ọ na-enyefe na Nzukọ nke Ndị isi ala na Gọọmentị Afrịka maka nkwado ya
N'oge gara aga, e mepụtara akụkọ gbasara isiokwu ndị gụnyere enweghị ntaramahụhụ, ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka na esemokwu agha, na esemokwu ntuli aka
Dị ka webụsaịtị ya si kwuo, ikike nke Panel bụ nke a, nke e hotara

PanWise bụ netwọk Pan-African, nke e guzobere site na mkpebi nke Mgbakọ AU nke ndị isi obodo na ndị ọchịchị na May 2013, nke na-ejikọta ndị na-eme mkparịta ụka na usoro, dị ka AU Panel of the Wise, COMESA Committee of Elders, ECOWAS Otu ndị okenye, SADC Panel of the Wise, usoro REC ga-eme n'ọdịnihu, Insiders' Mediators, Africa and international mediators na-arụ ọrụ n'Africa, nwere ọrụ mmekọ
Ebumnuche nke PanWise bụ ime ka mgbochi sie ike, hazie ma mee ka mgbochi, nzaghachi n'oge na mbọ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dị iche iche na-eme n'Africa n'okpuru otu nche anwụ

Dabere na ndokwa ndị dị mkpa nke Protocol metụtara Ntọala nke Peace and Security Council of the African Union (PSC Protocol); Protocol on Relations between the African Union and Regional Economic Communities; the Memorandum of Understanding on the Cooperation in the Area of Peace and Security between the AU, the RECs and Stand by Brigades of Eastern Africa and Northern Africa (MoU); the Modalities for the Function of the Wise Panel (AU); na, n'ikpeazụ, ahụmahụ na nkuzi a mụtara n'ihe gbasara imekọ ihe gbasara mmekọrịta, nke 25th nke UN

PanWise mejupụtara, dị ka ndị isi otu, nke AU Panel nke ndị maara ihe / ndị enyi na ndị ibe ya dị ugbu a na ndị ga-abịa n'ọdịnihu na mpaghara mpaghara gụnyere Economic Community of West African States ' (ECOWAS) Council of the Wise; Southern African Development Community (SADC) Mediation Reference Group na Panel of Elders; Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa (COMESA) Committee of Elders, na Intergovernmental Authority for Eastern Community (AS), Central Community of African Development (ASCA), Community of Central Community (AS)

Dị ka ndị otu, PanWise gụnyere Forum of Former African Heads of State, Association African Ombudesmen and Mediators (AAOM), akụrụngwa mba maka udo, kansụl ndị ogbugbo mba, wdg, yana njikọ / ụlọ ọrụ ndị ogbugbu Africa
Mgbe o kwesịrị ekwesị maka atụmatụ nke PanWise, a ga-akpọ Onye isi oche AU yana ndị ogbugbo Africa Ndị nnọchi anya pụrụ iche, ndị nnọchi anya ndị isi ogbugbo na ndị otu ha ka ha sonye na ọrụ netwọk

Ntọala nke 'Pan African Network of the Wise' abụghị ihe na-emebi nnwere onwe nke Panel ọ bụla, nzuzo achọrọ n'ime ha ka ha na-arụ ọrụ ha n'ime ụlọ ha, yana ikike ha n'ịhọrọ ndị mmekọ, ndị na-enye onyinye na ndị ọzọ nwere mmasị

N'ịrụ ọrụ ya, 'Pan African Network of the Wise' na-amata mgbe niile na ndị òtù ya nwere ike na-arụsi ọrụ ike na diplomacy mgbochi, mgbasa ozi na ihe omume ndị yiri ya na ndị na-etinye aka na esemokwu ma ọ bụ esemokwu, ya mere ikike, nkwanye ùgwù maka nzuzo a na-ahụkwa nlebara anya nke ọma na ndị otu na-akparịta ụka ↵Iwube nke PanWise na-aga nke ọma bụ onyinye dị ukwuu na Golden Jubilee nke OAU mere n'afọ a n'okpuru isiokwu 'Pan-Africanism na African Renaissance' N'ezie, ọ na-emesi ike ma tinye n'ọrụ echiche nke ndị nna ochie nke OAU, Pan-Africanism, ịdị n'otu na ịdị n'otu nke nzube
Ndị otu na ndị enyi ugbu a nke Panel of the Wise, bụ ndị otu na-apụ apụ nke Panel of the Wise na-eje ozi site na 2010 ruo 2014, bụ

Paneer (nke Àtụ IPA-hns [/pəˈniːr/]), nke Àtụ IPA-bn makwaara dị ka ponir (nke a kpọrọ ), bụ cheese acid-set ọhụrụ a na-ahụkarị na mpaghara India (Bangladesh, Bhutan, India, Maldives, Nepal, Pakistan na Sri Lanka) nke e ji mmiri ara ehi ma ọ bụ mmiri ara ehi buru ibu mee

Test na ajuju na tom ochi test test test Ọ bụ cheese dị nro na-adịghị eme agadi, nke na-adịghị agbaze agbaze nke a na-eme site na iji acid sitere na mkpụrụ osisi ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ nri, dị ka mmiri lemon
Ndị Pangwa bụ otu asụsụ Bantu nke dị na Kipengere Range n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ọdọ Mmiri Malawi, na Ludewa District nke Njombe Region dị na ndịda Tanzania
N'afọ 2002, e mere atụmatụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị Pangwa ka ọdị 95,000
Asụsụ Pangwa bụ onye otu ezinụlọ Bantu
Aha ndị ọzọ maka Pangwa bụ Ekipangwa nakwa Kipangwa
Pankshin bụ ógbè Gọọmentị Obodo na Steeti Plateau, Nigeria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Pankshin
O nwere mpaghara km² otu Puku na narị ise na iri abụọ na anọ na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ narị puku na iri itoolu na otu na narị isii na iri asatọ na ise na ọnụ ọgụgụ afọ 2006

A maara Pankshin nke ọma maka ebe azụmahịa ya ebe ọtụtụ n'ime ndị mmadụ bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo na-akụ ọtụtụ ihe oriri dịka ọka kirikiru, ọka guinea, ọka, tomato, osikapa, yabasị, cabbage, carrot na nchịkọta mkpụrụ osisi
Mọnde na Pankshin bụ maka ịzụ ahịa na ire ere, ya mere aha ahụ bụ 'ahịa Mọnde' dịka ndị ahịa, ndị ọchụ̀nta ego na ndị mmadụ nọ gburugburu na ruo n'ebe dị anya dị ka Bauchi na-abịa ịzụta ma ree

N'ịbụ ndị dị n'etiti ndị nwere ọdịbendị dị iche iche, ndị bi na Pankshin na-asụ ọtụtụ asụsụ gụnyere Ngas, Mupun, Miship, Fier, Tal, Kadung, Pal na BijimHa bụ ndị a hụrụ n'anya na-akwanyere ndị mmadụ ùgwù n'agbanyeghị ụcha, okike ma ọ bụ agbụrụ
Ndị Ngas bi na ya
Agbụrụ ndị ọzọ bụ Mupun, Miship, Fier, Tal, Kadung, Pal, na Bijim
Ndị Hausa, Igbo, Yoruba na Idoma enweghị ghị nnọchite anya
Ndị bi na Pankshin bụ ndị otu Kraịst na ndị okpukpe ọdịnala ole na ole, na ndị Alakụba ole na ole
Chọọchị ndị mmadụ kacha biri bụ Chọọchị Kraịst na Mba

Chọọchị ndị ọzọ gụnyere Chọọchị Roman Katọlik , Chọọchị Evangelical Winning All, Chọọchị Anglican, Deeper Life Bible Church, Chọọchị Foursquare Gospel , Assemblies of God, Chọọchị Redeemed Christian Church of God, Living faith, Chọọchị Christ Apostolic , Christ Embassy wdg
E nwere ụlọ akụ anọ ugbu a na Pankshin UBA n'ihu ụlọ ezinụlọ NCCF, ụlọ akụ Unity, ụlọ akụ ọrụ ugbo na ụlọ akụ Union nke Nigeria
Site na mmụba nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, Pankshin ga-achọ ụlọ akụ ndị ọzọ
A maara Pankshin nke ọma maka okpomọkụ ya dị jụụ
Nkezi okpomọkụ kwa afọ nke Pankshin bụ 22 °C (72 ) mmiri ozuzo ebe a bụ nkezi otu Puku na otu narị na iri ise milimita (45 n'ime)
Ọnọdụ okpomọkụ nwere ike ịkachasị ọkụ n'etiti ọnwa Eprel ruo mmalite ọnwa June, ebe nnukwu mmiri ozuzo n'ezo n'etiti ngwụcha June ruo n'etiti August
Enwere ike ịnụ okpomọkụ kachasị jụụ n'etiti ọnwa Nọvemba ruo ngwụcha ọnwa Febụwarị, Jenụwarị bụ ọnwa kachasị jụụ
Pankshin nwere nnukwu ụlọ akwụkwọ abụọ
Ọnọdụ dị jụụ na-eme ka obi dị nro na nke kachasị elu na ikuku ka ị nwere ike ịhụ ugwu dị iche iche, ebe ntụrụndụ dị mma, ihe mgbochi mmiri, isi iyi, ala dị elu, na họtel, wdg

A pannenkoek (Dutch pronunciation (na-ege ntị); otutu pannenkoeken (na-anụ)) ma ọ bụ Dotchi pankeki bụ ụdị pankeki nwere mmalite na Netherlands
Pannenkoeken na-adịkarị ukwuu (ruo otu ụkwụ n'obosara) ma dị arọ karịa ndị Amirikan ma ọ bụ Scotch pankeki ibe ha, mana ọ bụghị dị arọ dị ka crêpes
[citation needed] Ha nwere ike itinye becon, apụl, cheese, ma ọ bụ mkpụrụ vaịn

A na-erikarị ndị dị mfe na treacle (syrup nke e ji sugar beets mee), appelstroop (ụdị apụl Dutch na-enweghị ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ) ma ọ bụ (powdered) shuga ma na-agbakọta mgbe ụfọdụ ka e jiri aka ma ọ bụ na arịa rie
Ihe ndị bụ isi bụ ntụ ọka (nke dị mfe, nke na-ebili onwe ya ma ọ bụ ha abụọ), mmiri ara ehi, nnu, na àkwá
Mgbakwunye nke ntụ ọka buckwheat (ruo pasent 50) bụ omenala, mana ọ bụghị ihe a na-ahụkarị n'oge a
Enwere ike iji mmiri ara ehi dochie mmiri ara ehi na mmiri ara ehi n'agbanweghị nsonaazụ ikpeazụ
A na-akụ ihe ndị mejupụtara ya n'ime ite mmiri
A na-esizi achịcha na bọta ma ọ bụ mmanụ
Ozugbo elu nke pannenkoek kpọrọ nkụ na ọnụ ya na-amalite ịcha nchara, enwere ike ịtụgharị ya
Nke mbụ na-abụkarị ihe na-erughị oke
N'ụlọ, enwere ike ịme ọtụtụ pannenkoeken tupu oge eruo ka onye ọ bụla wee rie nri n'otu oge, ma ọ bụ ndị mmadụ nwere ike ịgbanwee n'ọkụ
Pannenkoeken nwere ike, ma na-abụkarị, iri dị ka isi nri, na-enye ya ọkụ; n'oge oyi, a na-eri pannenkoeken mgbe ụfọdụ mgbe ọ nwesịrị nri abụọ
Pannenkoeken bụ nhọrọ a ma ama maka nri ụbọchị ọmụmụ ụmụaka na Netherlands na Belgium
Ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ pannenkoeken pụrụ iche bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na Netherlands na Belgium ('pannenkoekenhuizen' = ụlọ pancake)
Ha na-enyekarị ihe dịgasị iche iche na ihe ndị mejupụtara ya, ọdịnala na nke oge a (dịka cheese, oregano na salami na pizza-pannenkoek)
Ụlọ ahịa Dutch na Belgian na-enye pannenkoeken e siri esi (microwavable) yana ntụ ọka e mepụtara na ntụ ọka kpọrọ nkụ
Nke ikpeazụ chọrọ naanị mmiri agbakwunyere

Na South Africa, a na-ejikarị pannenkoek eme ihe n'otu 'Kom ons eet pannekoek' (Ka anyị nwee pannenkoek) (Pannenkoek bụ Pannekoek na Afrikaans na South Africa) A na-enye ya sinamọn na shuga; a na-awụnye ngwakọta shuga sinamọn n'elu pancake nke a na-atụgharị ma na-eri ozugbo a ga-ekpuchi ya na akwụkwọ wass iji mee ka ọ dị ọkụ
Cinnamon na shuga na-agbaze n'ime nri a na-ekpo ọkụ ma dị nro
A na-akwadebe ya mgbe ị na-ele ya na ahịa ụlọ ụka, ememe ụlọ akwụkwọ, na ihe omume ọ bụla dị n'èzí nke na-enye nri e siri ọhụrụ dịka barbecue (braaivleis)
Dị ka onye bụ bụrụ onye Dutch na-achị, Indonesia ketakwara nri ahụ
A maara ya n'ógbè ahụ dị ka panekuk ma na-erikarị ya na mmiri ara ehi n'ime ya na ihe ndị na-atọ ụtọ dị ka mmanụ aṅụ, mmiri ara ehi, hagelslag, ma ọ bụ na-agbanye ya na shuga
Ọ bụkwa ihe a na-emekarị iji gwakọta ntụ ọka na mkpụrụ unere a pịrị apị

A na -ejikarị ya maka egwuregwu bọọlụ mana e ji ya emewekwa emume steeti dị iche iche, dị ka mmemme okpukpe, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta ọha
Ọ bụ ama egwuregwu nnọ n'ụlọ nke Gombe United FC ma ewere ya dị ka otu ọ gbakọ egwuregwu kacha ọhụrụ na mba a

Odúm bu ánúmanù àlà nke umunna ologobo úkwú na genus ha kpòrò Panthera
Odúm nòkwà na umunna ndi Felidae
Ọ dị odúm nwoke rúrú 250 kg (550 lb) na ásá, ọ bu ihe méré kà ọ dị na azú Tiger Í bú ologbo kárírí Í dí úkwú
Odúm atā nọr na Afrika okpúrù Sahara na ȯ dị na Asia, mànà he híghì nné

Ha chọpụtara na n'akụkụ ndịda nke ogige ahụ ihe karịrị 90% nke anụmanụ na-ebute nje bacteria ndị a na-egbu egbu
Ọrịa a sitere n'anụ Kaffir bụ ndị ọdụm na-achụgharị, wee bute ya n'ihi anụ ụlọ butere ọrịa ahụ n'ogige ahụ
Ihe dị ka 70% nke buffalo na-ata ahụhụ site na ụkwara nta nke akpa ume, na ọdụm ọrịa ahụ na-egosipụta onwe ya bụ isi na tract digestive
Ụmụ anụmanụ na-aghọ ndị na-esighị ike, na-agbakasị ahụ nke ukwuu ma na-anwụ n'ime afọ ole na ole

Paola Brumana (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1982) bụ onye Ịtali bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye n'ebe goolu nke gbara bọọlụ maka ọtụtụ klọb Serie A ụmụ nwanyị na ndị otu mba Ịtali
Ọ gbara bọọlụ nye UPC Tavagnacco site n'afọ 2006 ruo n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2018
Brumana gbara boolu nke mbụ ya nye Ịtali n'abali iri na atọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2004, na mmeri enyi na enyi na Czech Republic
Onye nkuzi mba Pietro Ghedin atụghị ya, Brumana nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ n'ọzara mba ụwa tupu onye nọchiri Ghedin bụ Antonio Cabrini akpọghachi ya
Cabrini họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu nke ndị otu mba maka UEFA Women's Euro 2013 na Sweden
Papa Demba Camara (amụrụ na 16 Jenụwarị na afọ 1993) bụ onye Senegal na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-edebe goolu
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu bọọlụ mba Senegal na-erubeghị afọ iri abụọ na atọ na afọ 2012 summer Olympics nke eere na obodo London

Papa Ibra Tall (1935-2015) bụ onye na-akpa ákwà, onye na-ese ihe, na onye na-eme ihe osise nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na École de Dakar
A mụrụ Papa Ibra Tall n'afọ 1935 na Tivaouane, na mpaghara Thiès nke Senegal
Ọrụ nka ya malitere n'ise ihe na mmanụ n'okpuru nkuzi nke ndị na-ese ihe na France na Dakar
N'afọ 1955, ọ gụrụ gbasara ihe owuwu na École Spéciale d'Architecture na Paris, ebe a kpugheere ya na Négritude movement ma nye ihe osise maka Présence Africaine

O mechara gaa École nationale supérieure des Beaux-Arts ma gaa n'ihu na ntụziaka na Sèvres site n'enyemaka nke onye isi ala Senegal Léopold Sédar Senghor, ebe ọ gụrụ ihe osise, serigraphy, tapestry, mosaics, na nkuzi
Papa Ibra Tall si France laghachi Senegal n'afọ 1960, ya na Iba Ndiaye na Pierre Lods guzobere École de Dakar
Ọ bụ onye isi nke ngalaba nke nyocha na nka Plastique Nègres
Na ntụziaka ya, ọ chọrọ ịgba ume mmepe nke okwu Pan-African 'a pụrụ ịmata' ma họrọ ịghara inye ntụziaka n'ihi egwu na ọ ga-egbochi ihe o kwenyere na ọ bụ ihe okike nke ndị na-ese ihe n'Africa
Site n'iwu nke Onye isi ala Senghor, o guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ Manufacture Sénégalaise des Arts Décoratifs (MSAD) na 1965
Ebe e si nweta ya

A mụrụ Jaspe-Saphir Nkou-Ntoula n'afọ 1963 na Matadi, Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) a maara ya nke ọma site na aha njirimara ya, Papa Mfumu'Eto 1er ('nke mbụ'), nke ọ nakweere dị ka akara onwe ya (ya na ọdịiche nsọpụrụ dị ka 'le Grand-prêtre' ma ọ bụ 'l'Ambassadeur') dị ka onye okike akwụkwọ ọchị na Kinshasa

Ọ gụrụ ihe osise na ime ụlọ na Académie des Beaux-Arts (Kinshasa) tupu n'afọ 1989 na-edu obere ndị na-emepụta ihe, nke a na-akpọ Mpangala, na-emepụta akwụkwọ dị iche iche na-ewu ewu, ndị e ji aka mee ma na-ebipụta onwe ha na Kinshasa
A maara ya nke ọma maka Revue Mfumu'eto nke, dị ka ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya, edere ya na obodo Lingala (Kinshasa's Lingua franca)
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe ọchị kachasị mkpa na DRC
E bufere akwụkwọ edemede ya na Mahadum nke Florida n'ọnwa Eprel, afọ 2017 ebe a na-echekwa ha ma na-edepụta ha maka ohere ọha na eze

N'afọ 2015, e gosipụtara ihe sitere na usoro Revue Mfumu'Eto na Paris na ọtụtụ eserese nke onye na-ese ihe, na-esote ihe ịga nke ọma mba ụwa nke ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe na Kinshasan dị ka Cheri Samba na mmasị na-arịwanye elu na nka ndị Congo na-ewu ewu
Papa Noel Nedule bụ onye na-edekọ egwu na onye na-egwu egwu na Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC)
A mụrụ ya dị ka Antoine Nedule Monswet n'ọnwa Disemba 25, n'afọ 1940
N'ihi ụbọchị ọmụmụ Krismas ya, a maara ya dị ka 'Papa Noel', a na-akpọkarị ya n'okpuru aha ahụ (na-enweghị 'Nedule')
Ọ bụbu onye otu soukous band TPOK Jazz, nke François Luambo Makiadi duziri, nke na-achịkwa egwu egwu Congo site na 1950s ruo 1980s
Ọ bụ onye otu mbụ na onye ndu nke otu egwu Kékélé mgbe e hiwere ya n'afọ 2000, ọ bụ ezie na ọrịa gbochiri ya isonyere otu egwu ahụ na ụfọdụ n'ime oge ndekọ na njem ya

Jules Shungu Wembadio Pene Kikumba (14 Juun 1949 ̊ ruo 24 April 2016), nke a maara dịka Papa Wemba (mkpọpụta nke French ), bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eti egwu nke Congo nke na-akpọ rumba, soukous, na ndombolo
A na-akpọ ya 'Eze nke Rumba Rock', ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị egwu kachasị ewu ewu n'oge ya n'Africa ma rụọ ọrụ dị mkpa na egwu ụwa
Ọ bụkwa ihe ngosi ejiji nke mere ka ọdịdị Sape na ụdị ya bụrụ ihe a ma ama site n'òtù egwu ya Viva la Musica, onye ya na ya na-eme ihe nkiri n'ụwa niile
Ụzọ Papa Wemba si bụrụ onye a ma ama malitere mgbe ọ sonyeere otu egwu Zaiko Langa Langa na ngwụcha afọ 1960

Ihe ịga nke ọma ya dị ka onye guzobere Isifi Lokole na Yoka Lokole sochiri nke a, yana obere oge dị ka onye otu Afrisa International maka ọnwa ole na ole[n 1] N'oge mmalite nke ọrụ ya, ọ na-eguzobe ụdị nke gụnyere rumba na soukous ọdịnala Congolese, nke nwere ụda ọdịnala Africa, rhythms Caribbean, rock na mkpụrụ obi
Mana Wemba nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma na ọnọdụ mba ụwa na otu egwu ya Viva La Musica, ọkachasị mgbe ọ kpọgara ha na Paris, France na mbido afọ 1980
Ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ ka Wemba nwere ike inweta 'ụda dị iche iche' n'ọrụ ya, nke egwu ọdịda anyanwụ na-ewu ewu nke gosipụtara ụtọ na ụdị Europe, nke a na-akpọ 'Europop'
Wemba kwuru banyere mgbanwe a n'egwú ya n'oge ajụjụ ọnụ n'afọ 2004

Papa Wemba bụ otu n'ime ndị egwu mbụ sonyeere òtù egwu rock-rumba Zaiko Langa Langa (ZLL) mgbe e mepụtara ya n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1969 na Kinshasa, site n'aka ọtụtụ ndị egwu Congo a ma ama gụnyere Nyoka Longo Jossart na Bimi Ombale, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọ nọgidere n'òtù ahụ ruo afọ anọ

Papa Wemba (nke a maara n'oge ahụ dị ka Jules Presley Shungu Wembadio) nyere aka tinye aka na ihe ịga nke ọma nke Zaiko Langa Langa nke mere na, site n'afọ 1973, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu mba Congo na-aga nke ọma
Ka ọ na-erule n'oge ahụ, ihe ngosi na arụmọrụ ZLL gosipụtara ọtụtụ ihe ha na-ewu ewu, ụfọdụ n'ime ha bụ nke Wemba dere
Nke ikpeazụ gụnyere 'Pauline', 'C'est La Vérité', 'Chouchouna', na 'Liwa Ya Somo'

Zaiko Langa Langa enwetala ndị na-eso ụzọ siri ike ma na-ewu ewu ọbụna n'ụwa egwu Congolese nke, n'oge ahụ, ndị egwu dị iche iche gụnyere Franco Luambo na otu ya TPOK Jazz, ma ọ bụ Tabu Ley Rochereau dị iche iche
ZLL na-asọ mpi maka ndị na-ege ntị na ndị ọzọ (n'oge ahụ) egwu ọhụrụ dịka Bella-Bella na Empire Bakuba

N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1974, n'oge a ha bụ ndị a ma ama (na naanị otu ọnwa mgbe Rumble in the Jungle n'etiti Muhammad Ali na George Foreman na Kinshasa), Papa Wemba (nke a na-akpọkarị 'Shungu Wembadio' n'oge a n'ọrụ ya) ya na Evoloko Lay Lay Lay, Mavuela Somo na Bozi Bozi Bojiana, hapụrụ Zaiko Langa Langa Isi iji guzobe otu egwu nke ha
Wemba mechara kwuo na ISIFI bụ aha mkpirisi maka 'Institut du Savoir Ideologique pour la Formation des Idoles,' nkwupụta nke a na-enyebeghị nkwenye zuru oke
N'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1975, Shungu Wembadio nabatara aha a ga-akpọ Papa Wemba
E nyeworị ya akụkụ 'Papa' (nna) nke aha ya dị ka omenala ọdịnala na omenala n'ihi na ọ bụ nwa mbụ nne ya

Mana n'iwere aha ọhụrụ na onye ọha na eze, a na-ekwusi ike 'Papa' ugbu a dị ka ihe na-ezo aka na ọrụ ezinụlọ siri ike nke Wemba weere mgbe ọ dị obere, ebe ọ bụ na nne na nna abụọ anwụọla ugbu a nna Wemba n'afọ 1966, nne ya sochiri ya n'afọ 1973
Isifi Lokole ga-adịgide naanị otu afọ dị ka otu, na otu 'Amazone' (ihe Wemba dere) dị ka nnukwu ndekọ azụmahịa ya
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 1975, Papa Wemba, Mavuela Somo na Bozi Boziana hapụrụ Isifi Lokole iji mepụta otu Yoka Lokole (nke a makwaara dị ka Wa Fania All-Stars nke Kinshasa)
Yoka Lokole nyere aka na egwu egwu egwu nke Africa site na egwu ha gụnyere 'Matembele Bangui', 'Lisuma ya Zazu' (Papa Wemba), 'Mavuela Sala Keba', na 'Bana Kin' (Mavuela Somo)
Dị ka Isifi Lokole, Yoka Lokole nke na-eji ngwá electronic eme ihe agaghị adịte aka karịa otu afọ

Mgbe otu afọ nke obere ihe ịga nke ọma gasịrị, esemokwu n'ime Yoka Lokole banyere ego na ùgwù nwekwara mgbagwoju anya site na njide Wemba na mkpirikpi n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Kinshasa Central n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1976 mgbe a na-enyo ya enyo na ya na nwa nwanyị nke ọchịagha nwere mmekọrịta
Ìgwè ahụ gara n'ihu na-eme njem na-enweghị Papa Wemba

Maka ihe ọ bụla (ma ọ bụ ihe kpatara ya), ma ọ bụ nke onwe ya ma ọ bụ ọkachamara (nke otu isi iyi na-eche na ọ nwere ike ịbụ na ọ na-enwe mmetụta na anya ọha na eze), ka ọ na-erule afọ 1977, Wemba guzobere otu ọhụrụ, ma kpọọ ya Viva la Musica
N'afọ 1977–78, n'ụlọ ugbu a na mpaghara Matonge nke Kinshasa, Papa Wemba malitere ịmepụta otu ya Viva la Musica
A tụrụ aro aha otu egwu ọhụrụ a nye ya n'afọ 1974, mgbe ọ gara egwu na Kinshasa nke gosipụtara ndị Latinos dị na mba New York, Fania All-Stars
N'oge egwu ahụ, otu n'ime ndị na-abụ abụ ga-eti mkpu nye ndị na-ege ntị 'Viva La Musica!' na nzaghachi ịnụ ọkụ n'obi

Ọhụụ Wemba bụ ịhazi Viva la Musica gburugburu ndị na-eto eto, ndị nwere nkà mana ndị a na-amaghị ama, gụnyere ndị na-abụ abụ Prince Espérant, Jadot 'le Cambodgien' Sombele, Debaba el Shabab, Pepe Bipoli na Petit Aziza, na ndị na-egwu egwu dị iche iche dịka Rigo Star, Syriana, na Bongo Wende Ndị otu ọhụrụ ahụ gụnyere ngwá ọrụ ọdịnala lokole
E nwekwara egwu jikọtara ya, mukonyonyo, yana ụdị ejiji
Ndị otu ahụ nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma ozugbo, n'ime afọ mbụ ha na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ, akwụkwọ akụkọ Kinshasa bụ Elima kpọrọ ndị otu ahụ 'ndị otu egwu kachasị mma' na otu ha, 'Mère Supérieure', abụ kacha mma
N'ime afọ atọ sochirinụ, Viva la Musica wuru na otuto mbụ ndị a na egwu ndị ọzọ gụnyere 'Moku Nyon Nyon', 'Nyekesse Migue'l', na 'Cou Cou Dindon'

Ka oge na-aga, e kpughere na Antoine Agbepa bụ onye edemede a na-amaghị ama nke ọtụtụ n'ime egwu ndị a, mgbe Papa Wemba kwuru, 'Ooh! l'homme idée' (Oh! onye echiche!), si otú a na-akpọ aha onye na-eto eto na-agụ egwu Koffi Olomide - aha ahụ wee rapara
Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma ya na ìgwè atọ nwere mmetụta, n'afọ 1977 Papa Wemba guzobere ụdị mmekọrịta maka ndị egwu
Iji mezuo nke a, o jiri ụlọ ezinụlọ ya (n'okporo ámá Kanda-Kanda) dị ka ebe a na-ezukọta ndị ntorobịa Matonge
Ọ kpọrọ ya 'Obodo Molokai' ma kwuo na ya bụ onye isi agbụrụ ya (onye isi nri)

Malite na ngwụcha afọ 1970 na mmalite afọ 1980, Wemba (ma n'onwe ya ma ya na Viva la Musica) malitere ịga Paris, na-ekwere na enwere ndị na-ege ntị sara mbara maka egwu ọ na-enyere aka ịmepụta n'ime afọ iri gara aga
Dị ka onye na-ede akụkọ ndụ Wemba Craig Harris si kwuo ya
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha afọ 1980 na mmalite afọ 1990, ụdị Wemba dị mfe ịmata ọbụna ka ọ ghọrọ ngwakọta nke rumba, soukous na ndombolo, Latin na rock, jikọtara ya na ụdị pop nke Europe
Mana ka na-achọ ịgbasawanye echiche egwu ha, ma na-aga n'ụzọ egwu ọhụrụ, Viva la Musica nwetara njirimara abụọ

Wemba ugbu a nwere otu ìgwè na Kinshasa (nke a na-akpọ mgbe ụfọdụ 'Nouvelle Ecriture', 'Nouvel Ecrita' na ọzọ 'Viva la Musica') na otu ọzọ na Paris ('Nouvelle Generation,' 'La Cour des Grands' na ugbu a 'Viva Tendance')
Ndị otu ahụ nọgidere na-enwe ọkwa dị elu na egwu ụwa na egwu dịka 'Le Voyageur' (1992), 'Emotion' (1995), 'Pole Position' (1996) na 'Somo Trop' (Ọktoba 2003)

Ka ọ na-erule n'oge a, ojiji Wemba ji mmetụta Africa, Cuban na Western mee ihe abụghị naanị otu n'ime ụdị egwu kachasị ewu ewu n'Africa, ọ na-agafe ókèala ọdịbendị ma na-adọta ndị na-ege ntị dị iche iche na mpụga Africa
N'afọ 1993, Wemba sonyeere Peter Gabriel maka njem nzuzo nke ụwa, nke a dọtara uche n'ụdị pụrụ iche nke Wemba na ụda na-emepe emepe
Abọm Emotion a kpọtụrụ aha n'elu, nke e wepụtara na 1995, gosipụtara na ọ na-enweta ndị na-eso ya n'ụwa niile
Abọm a pụtara n'okpuru akara ndekọ Peter Gabriel nke Real World, ma ree ihe karịrị 100,000
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2003, a na-enyo Wemba enyo na ọ na-etinye aka na netwọk nke e kwuru na ọ na'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị si na Democratic Republic of the Congo banye na Europe
N'oge ahụ, e jidere ya na Paris ma jide ya ka ọ na-echere ikpe
Mgbe ahụ, ọ nọrọ ọnwa atọ na ọkara n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ruo mgbe e bipụtara mgbapụta € 30,000 (akụkọ ụfọdụ kwuru na ọ bụ gọọmentị Congo kwụrụ ya)
N'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 2003 a tọhapụrụ Wemba n'ụlọ mkpọrọ nke bụ ahụmahụ nke, mgbe a tọhapụsịrị ya, o kwuru na o nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'uche ya
Onye na-agụ egwú ahụ kwuru na ọ gbanwere n'ụzọ ime mmụọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ma kọọkwa ihe omume a na abọm ya Somo Trop (nke a tọhapụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2003)
N'abụ 'Numéro d'écrou', ọ chetara ụbọchị 'Chineke' gara n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ya
N'afọ 2004, a mara ya ikpe na France, kwụọ ya ụgwọ, ma nye ya ikpe mkpọrọ
Wemba laghachiri Congo n'afọ 2006

N'afọ 1979, Papa Wemba ghọrọ onye ndu na-abụghị nke La Sape (Société des Ambianceurs et des Personnes d'Élégance, nke a sụgharịrị n'ụzọ nkịtị dị ka 'Society of Atmosphere-setters and Elegant People') nke ọ kwalitere dị ka ndị ntorobịa na Zaire
Ụdị ejiji ha sitere na ebe ejiji nke Paris na Milan
Wemba kwuru, sị
Okpukpe Sapeur kwalitere ụkpụrụ dị elu nke ịdị ọcha onwe onye, ịdị ọcha na ejiji mara mma, nye ọgbọ niile nke ndị ntorobịa gafee Zaire
Mgbe m na-ekwu na a na-edozi ya nke ọma, a na-akpụ ya nke ọma
Anaghị m eche banyere agụmakwụkwọ ha, ebe ọ bụ na agụmakwụkwọ na-ebute ụzọ n'ezinụlọ
Mmetụta Papa Wemba nwere na ọdịbendị ahụ gosipụtakwara site na mmetụta ya na ọgbọ ọhụrụ nke ndị na-agụ egwú na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, Priyan Weerappuli (onye ndú nke otu Sri Lankan Pahan Silu) zoro aka na Wemba dị ka otu n'ime nnukwu mmetụta egwu ya

Weerappuli na-ekwu na ọ bụ ya mere e ji mara egwu Wemba n'afọ 2004 ma 'bụ nke ụda egwu n'efu nke Wemba's Soukous style gosipụtara' kpaliri ya nke ukwuu ma, site n'oge ahụ, 'malitere ịnwale ụda ndị a n'ihe ndị ọ dere
Ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ kwanyere ihe nketa Papa Wemba ùgwù mgbe ọ nwụsịrị n'ọnwa Eprel 2016

Ụfọdụ n'ime ha gụnyere ọ bụghị naanị Koffi Olomide na Manu Dibango (ha abụọ a kpọtụrụ aha na mbụ), kamakwa ndị egwu King Kikii na Femi Kuti, tinyere onye na-agba bọọlụ Samuel Eto'o (n'etiti ndị ọzọ) gbara akaebe maka mmetụta na-adịgide adịgide ya na ha

Papa Wemba nwetara ụfọdụ nlebara anya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, karịsịa n'ihi na ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwoke na ihe nkiri Zaire na-aga nke ọma La Vie est Belle (Life is Beautiful) nke onye nduzi Belgian Benoît Lamy na onye na-emepụta ihe na Congolese Ngangura Mweze
Wemba nyere aka ọzọ na ihe nkiri sinima, n'ihi ọrụ ya na soundtracks maka Children of Men, Besieged, na Black Mic Mac
A na-ekwukwa na Wemba bụ 'onye na-ede' ihe nkiri maka ihe nkiri Identity Pieces, Macadam tribu, tinyere Life is Beautiful
N'oge ndụ ya, Wemba mere ihe nkiri ole na ole ọzọ na-aga nke ọma, ọ bụ ezie na ọ rụrụ naanị obere ọrụ

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya n'afọ 2012, o nwere ọrụ cameo na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri Belgian Kinshasa Kids E wezụga mmetụta nke ọrụ ya dị mkpa na Life is Beautiful, enwere ọtụtụ vidiyo egwu ya na egwu egwu edere

Ọzọkwa, a na-egosipụta Wemba (dị ka onwe ya) n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri nke a nabatara nke ọma gụnyere; The Importance of Being Elegant, The Real World of Peter Gabriel na The African Rock 'n' Roll Years (ihe nkiri telivishọn niile)
Wemba nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na isii mgbe ọ dara n'elu ikpo okwu na Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire, n'oge emume egwu obodo FEMUA n'ụbọchị Sunday, 24 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2016
Na Mọnde, 25 Eprel, a kọrọ na nwunye ya di ya nwụrụ, Mama-Marie Luzolo Amazone, ji ụgbọelu gaa Abidjan 'ya na ndị ezinụlọ na ndị ọrụ gọọmentị'
N'obodo nna Wemba nke Kinshasa, ma ndị egwu ibe ya na ndị na-akwado ya gbakọtara ọnụ dị ka ụtụ maka ihe nketa ya
E mekwara otuto yiri nke ahụ na Paris, London, Brussels na Nairobi

Isiokwu a bụ discography nke Jules Shungu Wembadio Pene Kikumba, onye a maara dịka Papa Wemba (14 June 1949 - 24 April 2016) bụ onye mba Congo na-agụ egwu na onye na-eti egwu nke na-akpọ Congo rumba, soukous na ndombolo Mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya Eze nke Rumba Rock, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị egwu kachasị ewu ewu n'oge ya na Africa ma rụọ ọrụ dị mkpa na egwu ụwa
N'ụzọ bụ isi, ihe ndekọ a gụnyere ihe ndekọ Papa Wemba na ìgwè egwu anọ na ndị otu ọ bụ onye otu ya n'oge ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na nke ọ bụla n'ime ha dị ka onye na-ede abụ na onye na-eti egwu
Ìgwè anọ ahụ (nke sochiri afọ Wemba ka nọ n'ọrụ na otu ahụ) bụ
Rịba ama Papa Wemba so na ihe karịrị ndekọ album iri atọ na ise (35)
Pape Abou Cissé (ka amụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1995) bụ onye Senegal na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara otu egwuregwu Super League nke Gris Olympiacos na ndị otu mba Senegal bọọlụ
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Senegal na AS Pikine wee gbaa bọọlụ na French Ligue 2 club Ajaccio
Onye ntorobịa mba Senegal, ọ bụ onye ntorobịa nke AS Pikine
Mgbe nnwale gasịrị, Cissé sonyeere Ajaccio na mbido afọ 2015 dị ka onye ọkachamara na-azụ
O mere egwuregwu izizi ya na Ligue 2 megide Valenciennes n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2015, na-egwu egwuregwu ahụ dum
Ọ gara n'ihu mee ngosi iri asaa na otu na French nke abụọ
N'afọ 2017, ọ sonyere Olympiacos dịka onye na-edebanye aha tupu nkwekọrịta
[nkọwa dị mkpa] Na 14 Ọktoba 2017, o nyere goolu mbụ ya na Olympiacos, mgbe Kostas Fortounis nyere aka na mmeri 4-3 megide Panionios
A kọrọ na Benfica nwere mmasị ịbanye na onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ na windo mbugharị nke Jenụwarị 2018
Cissé nyere goolu oge mmerụ ahụ maka Olympiacos megide Panathiniakos na derby mbụ nke oge 2018-19 Superleague Greece

E tinyere ya na UEFA's Europa League Breakthrough Team maka afọ 2018 nkọwa ahụ kọwara ya dị ka onye nwere 'ọnụnọ dị elu na akara azụ Olympiacos, nke jikọtara ya na ọsọ aghụghọ na mmata dị ukwuu [na] ihe iyi egwu site na set pieces

' N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2020, Pape Abou Cisse nyere goolu abụọ ngwa ngwa iji kpochapụ ihe ịma aka isi ike nke Lamia ma nweta nzere Olympiacos maka ọkara ikpeazụ nke Greek Cup, na egwuregwu mmeri ụlọ 3–2 na-akpali akpali

N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2020, o ji isi na-agbada site na nkuku, mgbe onye mba France bụ Mathieu Valbuena na-agbanye n'elu nnyefe dị ize ndụ n'ime obi nke ebe ntaramahụhụ nke Arsenal na mmeri dị ebube 2–1 na London maka Europa League Round nke 32, ụkwụ nke abụọ
E tinyela ya na UEFA Europa League Team of the Week
Na 30 Jenụwarị 2021, Olympiakos ga-agbazinye onye na-agbachitere mba Senegal bụ Pape Cissé na Saint-Étienne na nhọrọ ịzụta
Onye bụbu onye egwuregwu AS Pikine nwere ohere ịlaghachi azụ na klọb French akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nwere ike ime ka ọ ghara iru nde € 13

N'ụbọchị nke 19 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2021, o nyere goolu mgbe Aguibou Camara enweghi ike imeri onye nche nke Slovan, na-emeri mmeri 3-0 n'ụlọ 2021–22 UEFA Europa League playoffs 1st round game against ŠK Slovan Bratislava Na 4 Disemba 2021, site na goolu abụọ nke Cisse (24 ', 49') Olympiakos meriri OFI na Theodoros Vardinogiannis Stadium, na-eme ka mmeri dị mkpa na mbọ klọb ya iji merie asọmpi ahụ
Na 12 Disemba 2021, ọ bụ naanị ya nyere goolu mgbe Rony Lopes nyere aka na egwuregwu mmeri 1-0 n'ụlọ megide Aris FC
Cissé nọchitere anya Senegal U20s na 2015 African U-20 Championship na 2015
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2018, ọ natara oku mbụ ya, maka asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2019 megide Madagascar n'ụbọchị nke itoolu n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2018
O mere egwuregwu izizi ya na 13 Ọktoba 2018, na asọmpi ọzọ n'ụlọ Sudan, ma nye naanị goolu nke egwuregwu ahụ
