Pape Alassane Gueye (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 24 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1999) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke na-agbara Ligue 1 club Olympique de Marseille bọọlụ
A mụrụ ya na France, ọ na-agbara ndị otu mba Senegal bọọlụ
Gueye mere egwuregwu izizi ya maka Le Havre na 0–0 Ligue 2 tie na Chamois Niortais na 5 Mee 2017
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọkachamara mbụ ya na 20 June 2017
Na 29 Eprel 2020, ekpughere na Gueye kwetara isonyere ndị otu Premier League Watford mgbe nkwekọrịta ya na Le Havre gwụrụ na 1 Julaị 2020
Gueye bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ ise na Watford ma yi uwe klọb ahụ, dị ka ihe nkwado na nkwupụta mgbasa ozi nke klọb ahụ mere
Mgbe awa iri abụọ na anọ gasịrị, Watford kwetara nkwekọrịta maka mbufe Gueye na Ligue 1 klọb Marseille, nke gụnyere ire ere maka Watford
Gueye kwuru na onye ọrụ ya nyere 'ndụmọdụ ọjọọ', na-ekwu na nkwekọrịta Watford ya nwere ụgwọ ọrụ nke £ 45,000 kwa ọnwa, ọ bụghị £ 45,000 kwa izu, nke onye ọrụ ya hotara Gueye na mbụ
N'ụbọchị nke mbụ nke ọnwa Julaị 2020, Gueye bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ na Ligue 1 n'akụkụ Marseille, maka ego a kọrọ na ọ bụ nde € 3 (£ 27 nde)
A mụrụ Gueye na France ma ọ bụ onye Senegal
Ọ nọchitere anya otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba France n'okpuru afọ iri na asatọ na France U19s
Otú ọ dị, o kpebiri ịnọchite anya Senegal na ọkwa okenye
Ọ malitere na ndị otu mba Senegal na mmeri 2–0 2022 FIFA World Cup qualification meriri Congo na 14 Nọvemba 2021
Gueye bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na ọkpọ, amaara maka ụdị egwuregwu ya na-eme ihe ike na asọmpi dị ukwuu
O nwekwara ezigbo ikiri egwuregwu na ike anụ ahụ
Senegal
Ịcha akwụkwọ bụ nka nke a na eji akwụkwọ emepụta ihe dị iche iche
Nkà ahụ agbasala n'ụzọ pụrụ iche n'ụwa niile n'ụdị omenala dị iche iche
Otu ihe dị iche nke ọtụtụ omenala kwekọrọ na nke a n'ahụkarị bụ na a na-eji otu mpempe akwụkwọ eme ihe nka megide iji ọtụtụ ibe akwụkwọ achịkọtara ọnụ
Nka ịcha akwụkwọ pụtara n'oge usoro ndị eze Han na narị afọ nke anọ AD mgbe onye ọrụ gọọmentị China, Cai Lun chepụtara akwụkwọ na AD otu narị na ise
ihe nka ịcha akwụkwọ nke kacha ochie nke dị ugbu a bụ nke akwụkwọ achara ọdị okirikiri na usoro na usoro
Emere ihe nka ahụ na narị afọ nke isii n'oge ọchịchị ndị eze isii
Achọtara ihe nka ịcha akwụkwọ ahụ na Xinjiang, China
A nọgidere na -eme ịkpụcha ma ịcha akwụkwọ n'oge usoro ndị eze Song na Tang dị ka ụdị ihe ịchọ mma a ma ama
Ka ọ na-eru narị afọ nke asatọ ma ọ bụ nke itoolu, akụkọ kọrọ na ịcha na ịkpụcha akwụkwọ pụtara na mpaghara West Asia na Turkey na narị afọ nke iri na isii
Ọmụma imepụta akwụkwọ eruteghị Europe ruo na narị afọ nke iri na atọ
Nke a meree eji ghọta na nka ịcha ma ịkpụcha akwụkwọ rutere ebe ahụ mgbe nke ahụ gasị
Dịka na ọmụmaatụ na obodo Switzerland na Germany, ọ bụ na narị afọ nke iri na isii ka ebidoro nka ịcha na ịkpụcha akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ scherenschnitte (leekwa onyinyo )
Jianzhi (剪紙), bụ ụdị omenala ịcha na ịkpụcha akwụkwọ n'ime China ọ malitekwara site ịcha n'ịkpụcha ihe eji achọ mma China ma emesịa mewe ya ka ọ bụrụ nka ọdịnala n'onwe ya
Emeela Jianzhi na China kemgbe opekata mpe narị afọ nke isii AD
Jianzhi nwere ọtụtụ ojiji dị iche iche na ọdịbendị China, ọfọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ọ na egosi naanị maka ahụike, ọganihu ma ọ bụ ebumnuche ịchọ mma
Uhie bụ ụcha nke a na -ejikarị eme ihe
Mbipụta ịcha n'ịkpụcha nke Jianzhi na enwekarị nkwanye ugwu siri ike na egosi mkpụrụedemede China na-anọchite anya akara kpakpando na anụmanụ ndị China

UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage Lists, nke a chịkọtara n'afọ 2009 ghọtara, gbakwụnyere ịkpụcha na ịcha akwụkwọ China wee depụta ya n'ihi na ọ nwere akụkọ ihe karịrị puku afọ ise ma na-anọchite anya ụkpụrụ ọdịbendị nke ndị mmadụ na China niile
Na China enwerekwa ihe nkiri ahụ akpọrọ Songs of War nke ejiri ụdị teknụzụ eji eme ihe nke na-agagharị mee na ngwa akpọrọ Blender
Mbipụta ịkpụcha na ịcha akwụkwọ na ụzọ ọgbara ọhụrụ etolitela ma bụrụ nka na ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa eji akpata ego
Ịcha na ịkpụcha akwụkwọ ka na-ewu ewu na China nke oge a, ọkachasị n'oge mmemme pụrụ iche dịka Afọ Ọhụrụ China ma ọ bụ agbamakwụkwọ
Na obodo Japan a na-akpọ nka ịkpụ na ịcha akwụkwọ Kirie ma ọ bụ Kirigami (nke pụtara n'ụzọ nkịtị ịkpụ ma ọ bụ ibe foto)
Ekwuru na ọmalitere mgbe narị isii na iri AD mgbe Doncho, onye mọnk Buddha si Korea wetara akwụkwọ Tesuki Washi, nke e mepụtara na China
Na oge ahụ akwụkwọ eji azụ ahịa nke ndị Japan ji aka mee na site na narị asatọ AD nka ha enweghị atụ
Ịba ụba nke washi ndị Japan pụtara na ịkpụ na ịcha akwụkwọ na mpụta dị ka Kamikiri (ịkpụpụta akwụkwọ na Edo Japan) mepere n'ike n'ike

Akwụkwọ a na-ejikarị n'ụwa niile taa maka nka ịkpụ na ịcha akwụkwọ, ijikọ akwụkwọ, teepu na ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ abụghị Tesuki washi kama ọ bụ akwụkwọ nke onye Japan Sekishu washi, mepụtara mgbe narị asatọ AD na mpaghara Sekishu (nke dị na Iwami, Japan na oge a) nke ndị UNESCO wepụtara dị ka Ngwongwo omenala a na-apughi imetụ aka (ma ọ bụ Intangible Cultural property na bekee) na afọ 2009
Mbipụta nka ịkpụ na ịcha akwụkwọ na -aga n'ihu taa na Japan n'ụdị dị ugbu a dị ka nka eserese, nrụnye ihe na ịkpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ eji akwụkwọ eme
Ndị omenkà ọdịnala China metụtara nka ọdịnala nke ndị Indoneshia
Batik bụ nka ọdịnala Indoneshia ya na ịkpụ na ịcha akwụkwọ
A na ahazi Batik na ụzọ dị iche iji kpughee nkọwa dị mgbagwoju anya nke nka ahụ
Ọtụtụ ọrụ aka ndị Philippine bu nke a na-eji ịcha akwụkwọ eme

N'oge ekeresimesi ndị Filipino, na oge mmeme parol (ụdị oriọna ọkụ ọdịnala ha) a na eji akwụkwọ nke achara-acha chọọ oriọna ọkụ mma n'ụdị nke dị iche iche dị ka iji ya see okooko osisi n'ihu, pom-pons na 'ọdụ' kpakpando nke ana etinye cha na oriọna ọkụ ahụ

Enwekwara nka nke pabalát (ọbọp), ebe a na -eji akwụkwọ nka nke achara-acha nwere agba dị iche iche nke ejiri mkpa wee bee were ezigbo nlezianya kpụchie ihe ndị dị iche iche di ka swiiti nke ọgbara ọhụrụ na nke omenala
A na eji kwa akwụkwọ nka nke achara-acha na n'emepụta banderitas (bunting) nke eji achọ ebe a na eme ihe mmeme mma
Ndị a nwere ike ịbụ akwụkwọ mpempe achara-acha sara mbara ma ọ bụ nke dị warara nke a na etinye n'okporo ụzọ n'oge mmeme
Sanjhi bụ aha India maka nka ịcha na ịkpụ akwụkwọ
A na -etinyekarị mpempe akwụkwọ achara-acha nke jupụtara na agba n'ala iji mee Rangoli
Ịcha na ịkpụ akwụkwọ abụwo ụdị nka ndị Juu na eme kemgbe ụwa emepechabeghị emepe, nke jikọtara na omenala na emumeha dị iche iche, oge ha ji enwe ezumike na omume ndụ ezinụlọ
Akwụkwọ achara-acha nke edoziri-edozi gunyere ketubot (nkwekọrịta alụmdi na nwunye), Mizrahs, na ihe ịchọ mma n'oge ememme dị iche iche
Otu akụkọ na-akọ banyere Rabbi Shem-Tov ben Yitzhak ben Ardutiel, onye mgbe ọ chọpụtara na ink oji eme edemede ya ajụwo oyi, gara n'ihu na-ede ihe odide ahụ site na ịbe mkpụrụedemede n'ime akwụkwọ
N'ihe dị ka narị afọ nke iri na asaa, nka ịcha na ịkpụ akwụkwọ aghọọla ụdị ihe ama-ama nke na ewu-ewu maka ịchọ mma na obere eserese ihe okpukpe dịka Mizrachs na Shavuot
Na narị afọ nke iri abụọ, nka nke ịkpụ na ịcha akwụkwọ ka ndị Juu si eme ya naghachiri azụ n'Izrel
Taa, a na-ejikarị ya eme maka mizrachs na ketubot
Papel picado bụ aha ndị Mexico na akpọ nka ịkpụ na ịcha akwụkwọ
A na eji mkpa ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ nke dị nkọ acha akwụkwọ n'adịghị arọ na usoro dị mgbagwoju anya; a na -ejikarị usoro a emepụta ọkọlọtọ nke achọrọ mma

A na -akpọ ọmarịcha nka ịkpụ na ịcha akwụkwọ nke ụdị ndị Slavic nke na ewu ewu na Belarus, Poland, na Ukraine Wycinanki ([vɨt͡ɕiˈnaŋkʲi]) na Poland ma ọ bụ Vytynanky (Витина́нки) na obodo Ukraine ma ọ bụ Vycinanki (Выцінанкі) na Belarus
Okoko osisi na ebumnuche ezumike na -abụkarị isiokwu nke ọrụ nka ndị a na enwu gbaa
Àtụ Circular reference

Ekeresimesi bụ mgbe ndị obodo Sweden na eji ụdị akwụkwọ achara-acha dị iche iche eme okooko osisi na ihe dị ọzọ na egosi mmeme ahụ gunyere ndị ejiri ekechi swiiti a na-akpọ crackers, na Ljuskrona nke ejiri akwụkwọ achara-acha ekpuchi, nke a na etinye na ụlọ ndị Sweden na Swedish-America na oge mmeme Ekeresimesi
Enwere ọdịnala na Switzerland nke na egosi ịcha akwụkwọ, ọkachasị na Pays-d'Enhaut
Silhouette ma ọ bụ onyonyo bụkwa ihe enwere ike ikwu na ọ bụ nka nke ịcha akwụkwọ ihe ndepụta ma ọ bụ eserese mmadụ site na akwụkwọ ojii
Ndị na-acha akwụkwọ n'oge a na-esokarị otu ma ọ bụ karịa n'ụdị 'ọdịnala' edepụtara n'elu, ebe ndị ọzọ amalitela ịgbasa nka n'ime ụdị, ebumnuche na atụmatụ dị iche iche
A na ejikọkwa imepụta nka ịcha akwụkwọ n'oge a na nka nke stencil, nke ya onwe ya na esite na usoro ejiri na eme eserese graffiti
Ojiji ejiri stencil nke aka na nka grafiti enwetawo nlebara anya mba ụwa n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya n'ihi ihe nka nke onye na-ese ihe bụ Banksy
Polluting Paradise (German , nkè a makwaara dị ka Garbage in the Garden of Eden) bụ ihe nkiri German nke afọ 2012 nke Fatih Akın duziri
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na ngalaba Special Screenings na 2012 Cannes Film Festival
Ọ na-elekwasị ányà n'obodo nta Turkey nké Çamburnu na Sürmene, nkè gọọmentị mèrè ka ọ bụrụ ébé a na-ekpofu ihe
Paraguay bu ala no n'ime obodo ukwu adi-kpo South Amerika

Parbati Barua (Assamese পাৰ্বতী বৰুৱা) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Assamese, onye na-ahụ maka nchekwa anụmanụ na Mahout (okwu India maka onye na-achịkwa ele na onye na-elekọta ya), A mụrụ ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ itoolu nke onye Prakritish Chandra Barua nke Royal Family Of Gauripur Prakritish bụ onye ikpeazụ nke Rajahs nke Gauripur nwere ike
Ọ bi na Guwahati ma bụrụkwa onye otu ndị ọkachamara elephant Asia, IUCN
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị Pratima Barua Pandey na nwa nwanne nwanyị nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Pramathesh Barua nke Devdas
A mụrụ Parbarti dị ka otu n'ime ụmụaka itoolu amụrụ n'oge Prakritish Barua, onye ikpeazụ n'ahịrị nke Rajahs nke Gauripur
Kemgbe ọ bụ nwata ọ nwere oke nghọta na mmasị na enyí wee soro nna ya nọrọ ọtụtụ oge n'ime ọhịa
Prakritish bụ dinta na-enweghị atụ ma nwee nghọta karịrị nke mmadụ ma nwee enyí 40 n'ụlọ anụ ụlọ ya

Ọ na-akpọrọ ezinụlọ ya gaa njem dị ogologo n'ime ọhịa na nnukwu ndị na-eso ya gụnyere ndị na-eje ozi, ndị na-esi nri na onye nkuzi onwe onye maka ụmụ ya na ezinụlọ ya nke nwere ndị nwunye ya anọ na ụmụ itoolu
Ọ bụ na njem ndị a ka n'okwu Parbati n'onwe ya, ọ zụlitere mmasị ya n'enyí
N'afọ 1970, mwepụ nke akpa nzuzo ahụ wụrụ Parbati na ezinụlọ ya nnukwu nsogbu
Ugbu a na-enweghị ikike maka ọchịchị ọ bụla na-enweghị ụtụ isi na ego e kenyere ha, usoro nke Rajahs nke Gauripur bịara na njedebe ma n'ihe gbasara ike na uru

N'ịbụ onye na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla fọdụrụ ma ọ bụghị obí ya na ụlọ anụ enyí ya, Prakritish ya na nwa ya nwanyị laghachiri n'ime ọhịa wee lanarị site n'ịre enyí na inye ọrụ ha na azụmahịa osisi ozugbo ma ọ bụ site na ngosi Sonepur
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, Barua jidere enyí ọhịa mbụ ya nke nna ya kelere ya
Kamgbe ahụ ọ mụtala nka n'ịchịkọta enyí na ijide ha ka a na-azụ ha
N'ime afọ ndị gafeworonụ, a na-akpọ ya ọtụtụ oge n'ime ọhịa, ahịhịa tii na ime obodo West Bengal, Odisha na nwa amaala ya Assam ijide ma ọ bụ na-elekọta enyí ọhịa
Parirenyatwa o bụ aha nna Zimbabwe
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Paris Kinsey (amụrụ 3 Septemba afọ 1993) a maara dịka Brother Of Color bụ comedian si USA
Kinsey bụ nwaafọ United States amụrụ ma zulite na San Diego, California
Na 2011, Kinsey malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye social media influencer
Na 2019, ọ sonyeere TikTok wee bụrụ onye ama ama mgbe otu n'ime vidiyo ya ebe ọ tụfuru ego ya n'oge nzọ ya na nwanne ya nwanyị wee viral, Ọtụtụ ndị ama ama biputere vidiyo a na Social Media ha
A kọwatara ụkpụrụ Paris na nzukọ izizi nke mba ụwa na ụlọ ọrụ mba maka nkwalite na nchedo nke ikike mmadụ nke emere na Paris na ụbọchị asaa rụọ ụbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1991
Ndị United Nations Human Rights Commission nakweere ha site na Mkpebi 1992/54 nke afọ 1992, na site na UN General Assembly na Mkpebi 48/134 nke afọ 1993
Na mgbakwunye na ịgbanwere echiche banyere ndokwa ndị dị ugbu a, ndị sonyere na ogbako ahụ depụtara usoro ndụmọdụ zuru oke banyere ọrụ, nhazi, ọnọdụ na ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ruuru mmadụ (NHRIs)

Ndị a wuru na ụkpụrụ ndị Geneva Seminar on National and Local Institutions for the Promotion and Protection of Human Rights' nke mepụtara 'Guidelines on the Structure and Functioning of National and Local Institutions for the Promotion and Protection of Human Rights'
Ụkpụrụ Paris nke 1993 na-achịkwa ọnọdụ na ịrụ ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ mba maka nchebe na ịkwalite ikike mmadụ nke a maara dị ka National Human Rights Institutions
Ụkpụrụ Paris depụtara ụfọdụ ọrụ na ibu ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ruuru mmadụ nke mba
Ịgbaso ụkpụrụ Paris bụ okacha mkpa n'si ihe achọrọ nke usoro nzere ntozu nke na-achịkwa ohere NHRI na United Nations Human Rights Council na ndị ọzọ
Nke a bụ usoro nyocha nke ndị ọgbọ nke kọmitii nke Global Alliance of National Human Rights Institutions (GANHRI) nke a na-akpọ Kọmitii na-ahụ maka nzere nzere
Kọmitii nta ahụ na-enyocha NHRIs n'ọtụtụ ụkpụrụ, na nnwere onwe site na steeti bụ akụkụ kachasị mkpa nke nyocha ya
Enwere ike igosipụta nnwere onwe site n'ịgbaso ụkpụrụ Paris, dị ka Kọmitii Na-akọwa ya na Ntụle ya

Nyocha nke Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ụkpụrụ Paris na-enyocha iwu NHRIs, nhọrọ na usoro nhọpụta maka idu ndú, nnwere onwe ego na nchịkwa, na ikike ikike mmadụ ha, na mgbakwunye na omume ha dị ka ndị na-akwalite ikike mmadụ na ndị na-echebe

Park Ye-eun (amuru May 26, 1989), onye amara aha ya dika Yeeun, Yenny, ma obu Ha tfelt, bu onye South Korea na-abụ abụ, onye na-ede abụ na onye na-ede egwú mara maka ọrụ ya dị ka onye bụbu onye otu nwa agbọghọ South Korea Wonder Girls
Na July 2014, o mere ya mpụta mbụ dị ka solo artist n'okpuru aha Ha tfelt na wepụtara ya solo EP Me?
Na mbido 2017, Wonder Girls kwụsịrị n'ihu ọha n'ihi njedebe nkwekọrịta
Mgbe nkesa gasịrị, Yeeun bịanyere aka na omenala Amoeba ka ọ gaa n'ihu n'ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe
Na Jenụwarị 2007, e kpughere Park dị ka onye nke ise nke Wonder Girls
Ndị otu a rụpụtara n'ihu ọha na ihe ngosi MBC ! Isi Egwu na Febụwarị 10, 2007
O dere egwu 'Ịsị M hụrụ gị n'anya' na 'maka ebube', wee mee ha ndụ n'otu n'ime ihe nkiri US Wonder Girls
O mekwara 'GNO (Ụmụ nwanyị Night Out)' site na album ha sophomore na Wonder World
Na 2012, Park dere egwu maka usoro ihe nkiri Korea nke Dream High 2, nke ewepụtara na February 14, 2012
O mechara mee ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ahụ iji mee egwu ahụ

Na Julaị 31, 2014, Park mere mpụta mbụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe n'okpuru pseudonym HA TFELT (mmekọrịta nke okwu ndị ahụ 'na-ekpo ọkụ' na 'obi sitere n'obi,' ịkpọ okwu Britain nke 'obi sitere n'obi') ya na mpụta mbụ ya EP Me? Agụnyere album a na ndepụta Billboard nke ọba K-pop iri kacha mma nke 2014

Na Jenụwarị 26, 2017, a mara ọkwa na Wonder Girls ga-agbasa mgbe mkparịta ụka mmeghari ọhụrụ nke nkwekọrịta na-aga nke ọma na ụfọdụ ndị otu ya gụnyere Yeeun n'onwe ya, onye kewara ụzọ na JYP Entertainment
Ndị otu ahụ wepụtara egwu ikpeazụ ha bụ 'Draw Me', nke Yeeun dere, na February 10
Egwu a jerekwara dị ka emume ncheta afọ iri nke otu ahụ kemgbe mpụtara ya
N'April 2017, Park bịanyere aka na Amoeba Culture, na-aghọ onye na-ese ihe nkiri nwanyị mbụ nke label na afọ iri na otu
Isi mmalite Korea Music Copyright Association
Àtụ Wonder Girls
Ọrià Parkinson (nke ha makwa ka Parkinsons, idiopathic parkinsonism, primary parkinsonism, PD, ma paralysis agitans) by ihe ọrià éréré uvúrè na ihe ọ dọrọ na àhú
Ó shì mgbe mkpuru-ọbàrà nwèrè dopamine nwürü na ime ya nke substantia nigra, ébé ètítì ọvuru; ha mághị ihe ne bido mgbugbu mkpuru ọbàrà nke
Na mbido ya, he zírí na àhúhú ndi ọn na rió bu ihe gbásárá éjìjè, dí ka mmàrube, áká ike, éjije nwányọ na íjé éjìjè arü dị
Mgbe ó mèzì, ihe gbasara àgwà madu nwèriki tyé nsogbu, ihe di ka dementia bu ihe oke ndi ọrià Parkinson nwère mgbe órià rùrù íshí ya
Nsogbu ndi ọzọr bu kwa ihe gbására ihe àhú ji a hu uwa, ihe ürá na ihe óbì mmadu
Ọrià Parkinson di na oke ndi íkèrémi, na ndi nwéré ya, ọ bu ndi kárá áfọr 50 kà Í nwe ya
N'ọnwa Nọvemba, na afọ 2017, otu ụlọ ọrụ na-emepe emepe ka onye nwe ụlọ gbara akwụkwọ n'ihi nnukwu idei mmiri nke kpatara site na nkwarụ
Na Mee, na afọ 2018, ụlọ nkwari akụ Sun Heaven meghere na Parkview Estate
N'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2018, e gburu onye isi oche nke Credit Switch Technology Chief Bademosi n'ụlọ ya na Parkview Estate
Parkview Estate nwere ókèala Gerrard Road na Banana Island
Obodo ahụ bụ ebe obibi, na ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ onwe ha nwere ọfịs na ụlọ ndị ọbịa na ala ahụ
A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ebe kachasị ọnụ iji biri na Lagos

Onye bụbu minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa nke steeti bụ Musiliu Obanikoro nwere ụlọ n'ụlọ ahụ, ya na onye nwere ọtụtụ ijeri ụlọ bụ Olu Okeowo na onye isi oche nke Nigerian Football Federation Amaju Pinnick
Obodo ahụ nwekwara ọtụtụ ụlọ nkwari dịka Pearl Court Residence & Hotels, Upperclass Suites na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Parkwa (Parəkwa), nke a na-akpọkwa Podoko, bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic nke Cameroon

Ndị Parekwa na-ebikarị na Parekwa massifs, nke dị na ọdịda anyanwụ na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Mora, Cameroon, na cantons nke Gouvaka, Godigong, na Oudjila (Mora commune, ngalaba Mayo-Sava, Far North Region)
Otú ọ dị, dị ka agbụrụ nile nke ugwu Mandara, Parekwa agbasawo na mbara ala na obodo ndị gbara ya gburugburu
Ha dị ihe dị ka puku ndị ọkà okwu 30,000

Paroniria bụ ọnọdụ ahụike nke na-agụnye oke nrọ na nrọ ọjọọ
A na-enyo Paroniria enyo na ọ nwere ọtụtụ ihe kpatara ihe nile nke ndi mádu ziri na ishi ọ bụrụ na ya, gụnyere egwu, nrụgide, ịda mbà n'obi, mkpasasị uche, na enweghị ụra, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọ pụkwara ịbụ mmetụta nke ndị antihistamines kpatara ya
Pascal Abikanlou (1936), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Benin
Ọ duziri ihe nkiri mbụ Under the sign of Vaudoun na 1974

Pascal Aka (a mụrụ na Ivory Coast, July 17, 1985) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Ivorian, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi vidio egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe, a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na 'Jamie na Eddie Souls of Strife (2007)', 'Evol (2010)',Double-Cross nke nwetara ọtụtụ nhọpụta na Ghana Movies Award nke afọ 2014
A mụrụ ya na Abidjan, Ivory Coast, Pascal Aka tolitere na Ghana

Ọ gara Mahadum Carleton nke dị na Ontario ebe ọ gụrụ 'ihe ọmụmụ ihe nkiri' na onye bụbu onye a na-azụ na Independent Filmmaker's Cooperative nke Ottawa, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi nchịkwa, onye isi oche nke Kọmitii dị iche iche na osote onye isi oche
O mepụtara ihe nkiri izizi ya 'Jamie and Eddie Souls of Strife' nke o mepụtara, duzie ma soro mee ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ 21
Mgbe afọ 9 gachara na Canada, Pascal laghachiri Ghana wee malite ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya akpọrọ 'Breakthrough Media Productions'

Pascal Atuma bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Canada-Nigeria, onye na'akwụkwọ ihe osise, Onye na -emepụta ihe ihe ngosi, na Onye isi / Onye Isi oche nke TABIC Record Label (akara ngosi nke a raara nye ndị nwere obere ohere ma nwee nkà na Africa)
A mụrụ Pascal na Ikwuano Umuahia, Abia State, Nigeria
Ọ gara Government College, Umuahia, wee gaa Mahadum Port Harcourt, Rivers State, Nigeria
Ọ gakwara KD Conservatory-College of Film & Dramatic Arts na Dallas, Texas, USA
E nyekwara ya asambodo na Entrepreneurship Specialization site na Mahadum Pennsylvania, na United States
Dị ka onye nduzi, ọ na-eduzi ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ya

Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọ mepụtara, yana ọrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere 'Sweet Revenge,(Winner 2018, Kevin Hart's Laugh Out Loud, Just For Laws Eat my Shorts' Lions Gate Competition)' “Bloodlines” “LAPD African Cops” “The Other Side of Love,” “My American Nurse” “Faithfulness” and 'Secret Past,' N'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọrụ Pascal gụnyere ihe nkiri ndị dị egwu dị ka My American Nurse 1& 2, Hurricane in the Rose Garden Only in America Okoto the messenger Who is the Man, Accidental life, and Life In NY
Pascal bụ onye na-ese ihe nwere ọtụtụ nkà na onye ngosi TV nke mepụtara ma gosipụta ihe omume 26 ya na 2005 - nke akpọrọ One- World with Pascal Atuma
Pascal achọpụtala ma metụta ọgbọ nke ndị na'eme ihe nkiri Nollywood nke taa

Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi ihe nkiri nke eduzila ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ụwa nke gụnyere Afro Australian Music & Movie Awards na Sydney Australia, South Sudanese Got Talent, Melbourne Australia, Oturkpo Got Talent, Benue State, Nigeria, wdg, ma eduzikwa ya
Ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ndụ na ndị ama ama African Music Superstars dị ka Awilo Logomba, Davido, 2Face Idibia, Timomatic, wdg
Ọ bụkwa onye ọbịa nke 'The Pascal Atuma Show' na ihe ngosi okwu YouTube a ma ama 'The House of Commons'
Oge izizi (ngalaba iri na ato) nke nnukwu nkwukọrịta Global Com's TV Series akpọrọ “Prọfesọ JohnBull”
Na 2018, ọ duziri ma mepụta ihe nkiri mbụ nke Canada- Nigerian nke akpọrọ 'Clash', setịpụrụ maka ntọhapụ n'ụwa niile na 2019
Pascal Gabriel Dozie gee ntị (help·info) (amụrụ ya na 9 Eprel 1939 na Owerri, Imo State) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye ọchụrụnta ego Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Diamond Bank na onye isi oche nke Mahadum Pan-Atlantic
A mụrụ Dozie na 1939 n'obodo Egbu nke Owerri, Nigeria
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ Charles Dozie onye bụ onye Katọlik na-akụzi katkizim
Dozie gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Our Lady's School Emeku ebe ọ nwetara asambodo mbụ ya (FSLC)
O mechara gaa Holy Ghost Juniorate Seminary na Holy Ghost College, Owerri, ebe o nwetara ule asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke West Africa
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara London ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara akụnụba na London School of Economics wee nweta nzere BSc na Economics
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara Mahadum City dị na Lọndọn ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nyocha ọrụ na injinia ụlọ ọrụ wee nweta nzere masta na Sayensị nchịkwa
Pascal Dozie malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na National Economic Development Office na United Kingdom
Ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi oge ụfọdụ na North Western Polytechnic, London
N'agbata afọ 1970 na 1971 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ akụ na ụba na African States Consulting Organisation na Uganda
N'afọ 1971 mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ ya na Uganda, ọ kwagara Naịjirịa na arịrịọ nne ya
N'afọ 1971 mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa, site na ahụmịhe ya na Econometrics na Injinịa Injinia Ụlọ Ọrụ, ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ mbụ ya, African Development Consulting Group (ADCG)
ADCG na ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị ka Nestle na Pfizer rụkọrọ ọrụ
Clement Isong, onye bụ Gọvanọ nke Central Bank of Nigeria n'oge ahụ, mechara were ya n'ọrụ iji mee ụfọdụ ọmụmụ ihe banyere Co-operative and Commerce Bank
N'afọ 1985, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Progress Bank, nke na-adịghịzi
Ka e mesịrị n'otu afọ ahụ, Dozie tinyere akwụkwọ maka ikikere ụlọ akụ iji nyere ndị ahịa nọ na South-Eastern Nigeria ndị nwere nsogbu ụlọ akụ aka
Nke a mere ka a mụọ Diamond Bank
Na mbido ya, òkè nke ụlọ akụ ahụ bụ Nde naira iri (dollar puku iri abụọ na asatọ) na naanị ndị òkè iri abụọ na otu nwere mmasị
N'afọ 1990, o mezuru ihe Central Bank of Nigeria chọrọ iji rụọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ dị mma na 1991 Diamond Bank malitere ọrụ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Diamond Bank site na 1991 ruo 2006 mgbe o nyefere nwa ya nwoke Uzoma Dozie
Dozie bụkwa onye isi oche nke Naịjirịa Stock Exchange n'otu oge
Ọ nwere òkè ugbu a na MTN Group ma bụrụ onyeisi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
O mechara hapụ arụkwaghịm dị ka onyeisi oche ma onye bụbu onye isi NCC Ernest Ndukwe nọchiri ya
Pascal lụrụ Chinyere Dozie ma ha nwere ụmụ ise
Pascal Karibe Ojigwe (amụrụ na 11 Disemba 1976) bụ onye Naijiria bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ, nke na-agba dịka onye na-echebe ebe azụ, ma ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe n'etiti
O nwekwara nwa amaala Germany
A mụrụ Ojigwe na Aba, NaịjirịaAkụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naijiria
Ojigwe gara ịgbazinye ego site na 1
FC Kaiserslautern gaa n'ọkwa nke abụọ 1
FC Köln maka 1999-192000 2
Oge Bundesliga

Ojigwe jụrụ ịlaghachi na klọb mbụ ya, ma kama ọ kwagara na onye sonyere na Champions League Bayer 04 Leverkusen, maka ego mbufe nke e kwenyere na ọ bụ, DM 35 nde (ihe dị ka € 175 nde) N'oge mbufe ahụ enwere nnukwu esemokwu ọha na eze n'etiti ndị njikwa Köln na Leverkusan, Johannes Linßen na Reiner Calmund
Pascal Tokodi (a mụrụ na 21 Eprel 1993), nke a maara dịka Pascalino Lpesinoi Lenguro Tokodi, bụ onye Kenya na-eti egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ihe ọchị na onye na-ede egwu
Pascal bidoro dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'afọ 2012 mgbe ọ gosipụtara na Citizen Tv's Makutano Junction gig, ọnwa ole na ole mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, na-arụ ọrụ nke Thomas
Ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi dịka Groove Theory (ihe nkiri TV Musical mbụ nke Africa), Pray and Prey, Machachari na Wrath na Selina (2018)
Egwú izizi ya bụ n'afọ 2016, ya na egwu, 'Sitaki' na 'Mama'
Pascal lụrụ nwanyị na mmemme nzuzo na onye na-ahụ maka TV na onye na-agụ egwu ozioma nke Kenya, Grace Ekirapa n'afọ 2020
N'afọ 2012, Tokodi sonyeere ndị ọkachamara na-eme ihe nkiri mgbe ọ gosipụtara na Citizen TV's Makutano Junction, ihe nkiri soap opera nke Kenya nke malitere n'afọ 2006
N'afọ 2013, Tokodi mere ihe nkiri na Kenya's first Musical TV Drama Series, Groove Theory, na-arụ ọrụ nke Guy, onye otu Victoria University Campus Choir
N'afọ 2014, Tokodi gosipụtara na Pray & Prey, ihe nkiri Kenya
N'afọ 2015, ọ pụtara na Fox Africa's Wrath
N'afọ 2016, o wepụtara egwu mbụ ya, 'Sitaki', mgbe o sonyere na asọmpi Tecno Own The Stage
N'afọ 2017, o wepụtara egwu na mmekorita ndị ọzọ
Otu n'ime ha bụ Hii si Kwaheri ft ndị enyi CEEL, Forget ft King Kaka (rapper)', Milele ft King Kaka (rapper), Asante Mama ft Rapper Phill, African Lady na Songa
N'afọ 2018, ọ pụtara na Maisha Magic East's riveting Swahili Telenovela nke akpọrọ Selina, ebe ọ mere Nelson
Pascale Marthine Tayou (amụrụ na 1967) bụ onye mba Cameroon na-ese ihe a mụrụ na Yaounde, Cameroon na 1967
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe na afo NDI 1990, ma mee ihe ngosi na Cameroon, Germany, France, na Belgium, tinyere ndị ọzọ
Ọrụ ya na-agwakọta usoro dị iche iche ma na-achọ ịkọwapụta ọdịbendị postcolonial ma na-ewelite ajụjụ banyere ụwa na ọgbara ọhụrụ
A maara ya dị ka Pascal Marthin Tayou, ọ gbanwere aha ya na Pascale Marthine Tayou na 1990s
A maara Tayou na mba na mba ụwa maka ọrụ nka ya
Ọ na-ejikọta ya na Douala-based doual'art association, nke nyere aka nke ukwuu n'ịkwalite onye na-ese ihe na mba ụwa

Ọrụ mbụ ya lekwasịrị anya na eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ nke gosipụtara nsogbu ọha mmadụ dịka ọrịa obirinajaochaN'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ na-ejikọta ọdịbendị ọhụụ na-ewu ewu na eziokwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya site na ụdị ejiji iji wuo nrụnye nke na-egosi ụdị ndụ ndị Afrịka na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọdịbendị nke oge a na mba dị iche
Tayou, onye na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a ma na-ebi na Belgium, agagharịala ọtụtụ ebe n'ụwa niile iji gosipụta ihe ngosi ya
Onye na-ese ihe na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka onye na-eme nchọpụta, onye na-agagharị n'ofe ụwa iji chọpụta nsogbu ndị a na-ahụkarị n'obodo nta zuru ụwa ọnụ
'Ọrụ ya na-emetụta kpọmkwem site na ihe nkiri ọ hụrụ na mba ndị ọ na-eleta
Ọ na-anakọta ngwa oru site na njem ya, gụnyere ụgbọ okporo ígwè na tiketi ụgbọelu, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na nnata ụlọ ahịa na akara ma ọ bụ ihe mkpuchi maka sọks, agụba, batrị na akpa plastik
Tayou na-ekwusi ike iji ihe ndị a eme ihe na-echetara anyị na ndụ nke oge a nwere njikọ na akụ na ụba, mbugharị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Tayou meriri na 2011 ARKEN Prize, nke Annie & Otto Johs nyere
Detlefs 'Philanthropic Foundation na Copenhagen, gosipụtara na 17 Machị 2011
Ihe nrite a nke DKK Otu puku bụ otu n'ime onyinye nka kachasị na Denmark
E nyere ya maka ikike ya ịmepụta ọrụ na-akpali akpali na ihe ịma aka nke metụtara nsogbu ndị dị mkpa na ụwa nke oge a, nke zuru ụwa ọnụ
Tayou ghọrọ 'onye nkwado nka' nke anọ nke milanese Velasca Football Club nke Wolfgang Natlacen hiwere na afo 2015
Pascale Marthine Tayou enyewo onyinye dị ukwuu n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mba ụwa na ihe omume nka gburugburu ụwa
N'afọ 2010, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe ise na mba ụwa (El Anatsui, Zarina Bhimji, António Ole, Yinka Shonibare) nke agbụrụ Afrịka ahọpụtara maka Berlin National Gallery
Berlin National Gallery bụ ngosipụta nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Germany n'oge gara aga na ugbu a na mmekọrịta ya na ụwa niile
Ụlọ ihe ngosi ahụ haziri ihe ngosi nke akpọrọ 'Onye ma echi' nke sitere n'ike mkpali sitere na ihe edere na obere bọs na Africa nke e sere foto na mberede
Nkwupụta ahụ bụ ngosipụta nke amaghi echi nke gbara ọdịnihu nke mmadụ gburugburu
Ebumnuche ya abụghị ịmepụta ihe nnọchi anya nke nka Afrịka, kama ọ bụ itinye ihe ncheta nke ọchịchị Germany n'oge gara aga na mmekọrịta dị ugbu a na kọntinent Afrịka
A họpụtara Tayou na mmadụ anọ ndị nke ọzọ dabere na ngosipụta ha nke njirimara, ụwa na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Maka 'Onye ma echi', Tayou tinyere ọkọlọtọ mba Afrịka iri ise na anọ na Neue Nationalgalerie
Akụkụ a, nke akpọrọ 'AfrodiziakAphrozidiaqueAfrosisiaque, gụnyekwara ọtụtụ ihe ọkpụkpụ polychrome nke sitere na ihe osise nke ndị Europe nke ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka mere n'oge ọchịchị
Ọrụ ahụ bilitere na nzaghachi maka okike nke African Union na 2002, ọ bụkwa ihe nnọchi anya mmekọrịta Afrịka na Europe tupu na mgbe narị afọ nke iri na itoolu gasịrị
N'afọ 2015, Pascale Marthine Tayou nwere ihe ngosi mbụ ya erere ere na London na Serpentine Galleries
Tayou sonyere n'ihe karịrị otu narị na iri abụọ n'etiti 1995 na 2012, na ihe ngosi iri abụọ n' Otu bu ihe ngosiputa Ndị O mere na n'etiti 2001 na 2011
Na ngụkọta, ka ọ na-erule ngwụsị afọ 2012, Tayou emeela ihe ngosi ọha na eze di Otu nari Na puku ano Na ano n'ụwa niile, ọtụtụ n'ime ha dị na Europe na United States
Pascale Obolo (amụrụ na abali asaa nke onwa Jenụwarị ago 1967) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-ese ihe si mba Cameroon

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Conservatoire Libre du Cinéma Français na Mahadum Paris nke Paris nke asatọ, amaara ya maka ihe nkiri gbasara nwanyị ya na-ndekọ ụmụ nwanyị na agba egwu ike na mpaghara French na omenala egwu Afrịka

N'afọ 2005, o wepụtara ihe nkiri izizi ya, Calypso na Dirty Jim's, ụri akwa maka calypso na Trinidad, nke nwetara ọtụtụ onyinye n'afọ 2006 gụnyere International Pan-African Film Festival nke Cannes na African Diaspora Film Festival na New York
N'afọ 2008, o mepụtara obere ihe nkiri La Femme invisible (Nwanyi na- adighi ahu anya)
Obolo so na ndị guzobere magazin nka Afrikadaa, ma sonyekwa na African Art Book Fair (AABF)
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Goethe Institute na Cameroon ruo ọtụtụ afọ na ihe ọ kọwara dị ka 'ọrụ ihe nkiri na-ezute mbipụta'
Pascale Quao-Gaudens (mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya Pascale Quau-Gauden Clavreuil) (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ onye edemede na onye na-ese ihe na Ivory Coast
A mụrụ ya na Abidjan, Quao-Gaudens gụrụ akwụkwọ na mba ya tupu ọ gaa France maka agụmakwụkwọ mahadum
Ọ họọrọ ịmụ nka plastik, wee gaa Paris na 1986, ebe ahụ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise maka ọtụtụ ndị nchịkọta akụkọ
O nwetakwara ọkwa dị ka odeakwụkwọ na onye nchịkọta akụkọ na Bordas
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ laghachiri Abidjan iji na-elekọta ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ na ebe ngosi nka
O bipụtara mpịakọta nke uri na akwụkwọ maka ụmụaka
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ala nna ya, a na-edekwa uri ya ma sụgharịa ya n'asụsụ Bekee
Pascaline Edwards (amuru na 1970) bu onye omee ihe nkiri Ghana, onye meriri ihe omere nwanyi kacha mma nke Ghana na 2002
A na-ewere Edwards dị ka diva na ihe nkiri Ghana, yana ihe karịrị narị ihe nkiri na-eto ya na ọrụ ọkachamara na-ewe ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ
O meela ihe n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood
Ugbu a, ọ na-ejikọta ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ijikwa ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzụzụ ihe nkiri, Usoro ihe nkiri, yana otu n'ime mgbatị ahụ dị elu nke Ghana, GeoDan Health and Fitness Center
Amụrụ na Lomé, Togo na 1970, Pascaline Edwards bịara Ghana na 1986 wee gaa Ghanatta Senior High School
N'oge na-eto eto, ọ nwetara nkà n'ọgbọ egwuregwu ya na mmalite 1990 dịka onye otu n'ime otu ndi omee ihe nkiri kachasị elu nke Ghana, Talent Drama Group
Ime ihe nkiri bịakwute ya ndammana, ọ meriri wee gosipụta dị ka onye ndu onye na-eme ihe nkiri na The Leopard Choice (1992)
Mgbe usoro mmepụta nke Ghana gasịrị, ọrụ ya nwetara nkwalite ọzọ mgbe ọ malitere ime nnukwu ọrụ na ihe nkiri Nollywood (Nigerian) na Journey of the Dead (2001)

Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri ndị a ma ama nke ọ gosiputara gụnyere A Stab in the Dark, Forbidden Fruit (2000), The mask, House Arrest, My Father's Wife (1998), Messages, Deadline for Asante, Without Her Consent, na Jewels
Edwards lụrụ Dan Badu, Kọmishọna nke TV3's Ghana's Strongest IV
Paschaline Alex Okoli bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria amara ofuma maka aha ya bu Cordelia na ihe nkiri Jenifa's Diary
Paschaline bu onye Anambra steeti, Orumba south lokal gọọmenti
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum steeti Imo ebe o nwetara nzere na French
Ọ bido ọrụ ihe nikiri ya n'afo 2010 na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Definition Of Love mana nnukwu oganihu biara ya mgbe ọ mere dika Cordelia na ihe nkiri jenifa's diary nke Funke Akindele kere

Paschaline, kwuru na ya nwere ike ịgba ọtọ ma ọ bụrụ na ọrụ e nyere ya chọrọ ka o mee ya na ọ bụrụ na ego a ga-enye ya dị mma
Agbanyeghị na n'ọtụtụ mba ụwa, nke a anaghị abụkarị esemokwu mana na obodo Naịjirịa ọ na-abụkarị ihe di iche

Pass the Peace (April 30, n'afọ 1986), bụ ịnyịnya na-agba ọsọ na-agba ịnyịnya na British
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị kachasị mma dị afọ abụọ nke ọgbọ ya na Britain na Ireland na 1988, mgbe ọ meriri agbụrụ anọ gụnyere Debutante Stakes na Cheveley Park Stakes
Mgbe o meriri Fred Darling Stakes na nke mbụ ya dị afọ atọ, ọ meriri ọzọ, ọ bụ ezie na etinyela ya na Poule d'Essai des Pouliches na Sun Chariot Stakes
O mechara bụrụ onye na-eme nke ọma
Pass the Peace bụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke John Kent zụlitere na Ireland
Ọ bụ Alzao, nwa Lyphard nke na-enwetụbeghị mmeri n'elu ọkwa nke atọ, mana ọ ghọrọ nwa ịnyịnya na-eme nke ọma, ụmụ ya gụnyere Alborada, Second Set na Shahtoush
Pass the Peace's dam Lover's Rose, bụ obere onye mmeri na obodo Ireland na nwanne nwanyị nke onye mmeri Geoffrey Freer Stakes Swell Fellow
Ọ bụ nwa nke Grace Dalrymple, nna nna nwanyị nke onye mmeri Australia Manikato
Dị ka nwa otu afọ, a na-enye Pass the Peace maka ire ere ma Brian Bell zụrụ ya
E bu ụzọ zigara nwa agbọghọ ahụ na Paul Cole na Whatcombe na Oxfordshire ka ọ zụọ ya
Richard Quinn nọ n'elu ya n'asọmjpi niile ma e wezụga otu n'ime agbụrụ ya
Pass the Peace mere nke mbụ ya n'ọsọ ọsọ na ọsọ ise na Salisbury Racecourse na 24 Mee
Ọ malitere 9/4 ọkacha mmasị, na-eduga maka ọtụtụ n'ime ụzọ wee merie site na Whisper the Wind
Ọ malitere ọkacha mmasị ọzọ na Acorn Stakes na Epsom Downs Racecourse na 4 June mana Waki Rainbow kụrụ ya ogologo anọ n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ
N'puta ya ọzọ, ọ meriri obere ihe omume na Windsor Racecourse na Julaị na-emeri Memphis Blues site n'ogologo, na oghere dị ogologo isii na ndị ọzọ na-agba ọsọ itoolu

Mgbe ahụ, e buuru Peace n'elu na klas wee zigara Ireland maka Group Three Debutante Stakes karịa furlongs isii na Phoenix Park Racecourse na 20 Ọgọstụ wee malite 8/1 nke atọ kachasị amasị ya n'azụ ndị Britain ibe ya Miss Secreto na Shyoushka
O dekọrọ nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma mbụ ya ka ọ meriri site na ogologo abụọ site na Blasted Heath na Miss Secreto ogologo dị na nke atọ
On 28 September Pass the Peace bara na njedebe nke season na Cheveley Park Stakes (then the only British Group One race restricted to two-year-old fillies) over six furlongs at Newmarket Racecourse

The undefeated Dancing Tribute started the odds-on favourite with Pass the Peace the 5/1 second choice in the betting, whilst the other five runners were Jaljuli, Mrs Jenney, Gloriella (Queen Mary Stakes), Konbola and Bocas Rose (St Hugh's Stakes)
Quinn settled the filly before overtaking the front-running Gloriella in the last quarter mile
She stayed on well in the closing stages to win by two lengths from Dancing Tribute with Jaljuli a length and a half away in third place
Pastoral Greenhouse Gas Research Consortium (PGGRC) na-eme nchọpụta iji chọta ụzọ isi belata gas na-ekpo ọkụ site na anụ ụlọ
Njikọ ahụ, nkè e guzobere n'afọ 2004, nwèrè Memorandum of Understanding na Gọọmentị New Zealand

Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọkara nke gas na-ekpo ọkụ na New Zealand bụ n'ihi ọrụ ugbo na ébé ọ bụ na gọọmentị New Zealand bịanyere aka ma kwado usoro Kyoto Protocol ka a na-achọ iji belata ikuku ndị a
N'afọ 2003, Gọọmentị nwara ịmanye ndị ọrụ ụgbọ ka ha kwụọ ụgwọ nyocha màkà mbelata ikuku ugbo mànà ọ gosipụtara na ọ bụghị ihe a ma ama ma hapụ atụmatụ ahụ
PGGRC bụ ụzọ ọzọ iji dozie ikuku ọrụ ugbo
Nnyocha onwé ya n'afọ 2006 chọpụtara na PGGRC na-emepụta nyocha na-eduga n'ụwa ma bụrụ ezigbo uru màkà ego
Ndị mmekọ nọ na njikọ ahụ bụ
Ndị otu ya bụ Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry, NIWA nakwa Foundation for Research, Science and Technology
AgResearch, DairyNZ, LIC na Mahadum Lincoln na-eme nnyocha
Paswan, nke a makwaara dị ka Dusadh, bụ obodo ndị Dalit si ọwụwa anyanwụ India
A na-ahụkarị ha na steeti Bihar, Uttar Pradesh na Jharkhand
The Urdu okwu Paswan pụtara nche ma ọ bụ 'onye na-agbachitere'

Isi mmalite nke okwu a, site na nkwenye nke obodo, bụ na nsonye ha na ọgụ ahụ megide Siraj-ud-daulah, Nawab nke Bengal na iwu ụlọ ọrụ British East India, mgbe nke a gasịrị, ha kwụrụ ụgwọ site na ọkwa nke Chowkidars na onye isi ego na-achikota ndi Zamindars
Ha na-agbaso ụfọdụ omenala dị ka ịgagharị n'ọkụ iji gosipụta ike ha
Ndị Paswans na-ekwu na mbido ha sitere na ọtụtụ akụkọ ọdịnala na ndị epic iji chọọ mbuli na ọnọdụ ha
Pasfọdụ Paswan kwenyere na ha sitere na Rahu, onye karịrị mmadụ na otu n'ime mbara ala dị na akụkọ ọdịnala ndị Hindu, ebe ndị ọzọ na-ekwu na ha sitere na Dushasana, otu n'ime ndị isi Kaurava
Nkwupụta sitere na 'Gahlot Kshatriya' na-adịgidekwa n'etiti ụfọdụ ndị na-eme ihe ngosi, mana ndị ọzọ na-ele nkwupụta dị otú ahụ anya nlelị, ebe ha achọghị ka ha na Rajputs na-akpakọrịta
O doola ụfọdụ ndị Bhumihars anya na ha bụ ụmụ nke alụm di na nwunye n'etiti ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị nwere ọkwa abụọ
Agbanyeghị, obodo Paswan jụrụ echiche ndị a ma na-arụ ụka na mmalite aha 'Dusadh' dị na Dusadh, nke pụtara 'o siri ike imeri'
E weere ha dịka obodo a na-apụghị imetụ aka
Na Bihar, ha bụ ndị ọrụ na-enweghị ọrụ, ndị ọrụ ugbo na akụkọ ihe mere eme kemgbe, ha bụ ndị nche obodo na ndị ozi
Tupu 1900, ha na-azụkwa ezì karịsịa na Uttar Pradesh na Bihar
Ndị Paswans na-agbachitere ọrụ nke ịzụ ezì site n'ikwu ya dị ka atụmatụ iji gbochie ndị Alakụba
Ha na-ekwusi ike na, iji chebe onwe ha pụọ n’aka ndị Alakụba, ụmụ agbọghọ Paswan na-eyi ọtụmọkpọ sitere n’ọkpụ ézì ma debe ézì n’ọnụ ụzọ ha, n’ihi ibu iro nke ndị Alakụba na ezì

Ebe ọ bụ na Rajputs nke Rajasthan zụlitere yana anụ ọhịa a na-achụ nta, a na-eji eziokwu a agbachitere ọrụ a nke na-egosi na mgbe ngwụcha usoro Zamindari, ọrụ ọdịnala nke ije ozi dị ka ndị nche enweghị ike ịnye nri ha
Ndị Paswans ejikọkwawokwa na akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọgụ na ọtụtụ lụrụ ọgụ maka behalflọ Ọrụ East India n'oge narị afọ 18 na Bengal Army
Na ọnụọgụgụ 2011 nke India maka Uttar Pradesh gosipụtara ndị Paswan, bụ nke a na-ahazi dị ka Oge Ezubere, dị ka 230,593
Otu ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ gosipụtara ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi na 4,945,165 na Bihar
Pat Arrowsmith (amụrụ na 2 March 1930) bụ onye edemede Bekee na-emepụta ihe na onye na-eme mkpọsa udo
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament na 1957
A mụrụ Arrowsmith n'ezinụlọ ndị ụkọchukwu na Leamington Spa dị ka nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ atọ
Nne ya bụ Margaret Vera Arrowsmith (née Kingham) na nna ya Reverend G
Arrowsmithi
N'afọ 1939, ezinụlọ ahụ gara Torquay, ebe Arrowsmith gụrụ akwụkwọ na Stover School, tupu ọ gaa Cheltenham Ladies College na Septemba 1944
Ọ gụrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na Newnham College, Cambridge, wee gụọ sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Mahadum Liverpool na Mahadum Ohio dị ka US UK Fulbright Scholar

Arrowsmith bụ onye na-eme mkpọsa udo ma rụọ ọrụ na mkpọsa maka i wepụ ngwá agha nuklia, njedebe nke agha Vietnam, i wepụ ndị agha Britain na Northern Ireland, njedebe nke Agha Gulf, na nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwanyị
Arrowsmith bụ onye guzobere Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị osote onye isi oche ya ugbu a
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ahazi njem Aldermaston mbụ
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị mbụ bịanyere aka na Kọmitii nke 100
Site na 1958 gaa n'ihu, ọ nọrọ mkpọrọ iri na otu maka ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya
N'afọ 1961, ọ bụ isiokwu nke ajụjụ ndị ome iwu mgbe a ma nyere ya inye nri mgbe ọ na-eme ngagharị iwe agụụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Gate side
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ maka òtù na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ Amnesty International ruo afọ 24 ruo 1994 ma bụrụkwa onye mkpọrọ mbụ nke akọ na uche na Britain

N'afọ 1974, a mara Arrowsmith ikpe maka mmebi iwu megide ngalaba 1 na 2 nke Incitement to Disaffection Act 1934, ma maa ya ikpe ọnwa 18 n'ụlọ mkpọrọ maka ịnye akwụkwọ mpịakọta na ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha Britain, na-agba ndị agha ume jụrụ́ ije ozi na Northern Ireland
Na Septemba 7, 1974, Arrowsmith pụrụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Askham Grange
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ ụlọ mkpọrọ, Arrowsmith kwuru okwu na ngagharị iwe megide ndị Fascist na Hyde Park ma bụrụ enyi ndị na-eso nwanyị na ndị na-eme enyi nwoke

Na ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ọrụ nyocha nke 5 Cally Road, Nettie Pollard (onye otu Gay Liberation Front), chetara Arrowsmith na-agwa ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe LGBT, 'Ọ dị mma, gịnị mere na anyị anaghị aga Housmans?' Ìgwè ahụ gara ebe nsọ na 5 Caledonian Road premises nke ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ Housmans na akwụkwọ akụkọ pacifist Peace News
Mgbe ha rutere, otu ahụ kpọrọ ndi Press Association iji kwuo, 'e nwere onye na-agba ọsọ na Housmans, 5 Caledonian Road'
Foto ha pụtara n'ihu akwụkwọ The Sunday Telegraph
Mgbe ndị uwe ojii na-ejide mmadụ pụtara n'ebe ahụ, Arrowsmith jụrụ ịga ala ma buru ya gbadaa steepụ atọ
N'afọ 1975, ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị ikpe jụrụ arịrịọ ya, na-akọwa omume ya dị ka 'ajọ' na 'ajọ'
Otú ọ dị, ọ kwadoro arịrịọ ya megide ikpe ahụ, belata ya ka a tọhapụ ya ozugbo
Arrowsmith tinyere akwụkwọ megide United Kingdom (Arrowsmith v
United Kingdom) na European Commission of Human Rights, n'azọrọ na nkwenye ya mebiri European Convention on Human Rights' nchedo nke ikike ya maka nnwere onwe na nnwere onwe nke nkwenye na nkwupụta
N'afọ 1978, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ chọpụtara na nkwenye ya bụ 'ihe mgbochi dị mkpa maka nnwere onwe ikwu okwu maka ọdịmma nke nchekwa mba na maka igbochi ọgba aghara', ya mere emeghị ka nkwekọrịta ahụ mebie
Arrowsmith bụ onye na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma nke Radical Alliance, otu CND, maka Fulham na ntuli aka 1966 na 1970

O guzoro dị ka onye na-azo ọkwa onye Socialist Independent, na-eme mkpọsa maka Troops Out of Ireland ma kwado ya site na Trotskyist Socialist Unity party megide prime minister nke oge ahụ, James Callaghan, na mpaghara ya nke Cardiff South-East na ntuli aka ndị ome iwu nke afọ 1979
N'oge okwu nnabata nke Callaghan na nghọpụta ọzọ, Arrowsmith nọgidere na-enwe esemokwu
Callaghan, na nzaghachi na-enweghị isi na mkparị ahụ, kwuru na ọ bụ oge mbụ ọ 'duet na-eweghachi vootu ekele, nakwa na ọ bụghị duet na-atọ ụtọ
' Mgbe ahụ, ọ tụrụ aro na a ga-akpọ Arrowsmith ka ọ gaa n'elu ikpo okwu, nke o mere, ebe ya, ndị na-akwado ya na ndị ọzọ niile hapụrụ ụlọ nzukọ ahụ
Ọ chọrọ ka ndị agha Britain si Ireland pụọ na ndị mmadụ nwere onwe ha
Arrowsmith so na onye na-eme mkpọsa udo, Wendy Butlin, onye bụkwa otu n'ime ndị mbụ bịanyere aka na Kọmitii nke 100
ọ bụ onye na-erughi eru maka ihe nketa nna ya ọ gwụla ma ọ lụrụ nwoke, Arrowsmith lụrụ onye na-ede uri Donald Gardner otu ụbọchị tupu a kagbuo alụmdi na nwunye ahụ
O wee nye ụfọdụ n'ime ego ahụ maka ihe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị iche iche, gụnyere Gay Pride Week 1979
Arrowsmith ebipụtala ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na ọrụ uri
A na-ede be ihe ndekọ ya na akwụkwọ nke onwe ya na Ọbá Akwụkwọ LSE na London
Pat Cullen (amụrụ n'afọ 1965) bụ onye nọọsụ Northern Irish na onye otu ọrụ
Kemgbe Julaị 2021, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Royal College of Nursing
A mụrụ Cullen na Carrickmore, County Tyrone ma bụrụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ asaa
Cullen rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nọọsụ obodo na ọdịda anyanwụ Belfast n'oge nsogbu ahụ
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Public Health Agency na Health and Social Care Board, tupu ọ banye na Royal College of Nursing na 2016
Na Mee 2019, ọ ghọrọ onye nduzi nke Northern Ireland Board nke RCN
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu na onye isi nchịkwa n'ọnwa Eprel 2021, a họpụtakwara ya dị ka ode akwụkwọ ukwu na onye nduzi nke RCN mba na Julaị 2021
Na ngwụcha afọ 2022, ọ duziri ọgbaghara nke National Health Service nke ndị nọọsụ Bekee na Welsh gbara ọsọ na nke mbụ ya n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke afọ 106 nke ndị nọn
N'ọnwa Eprel 2023, ndị otu ya kwupụtara ọgbaghara na ngwụsị izu ezumike ụlọ akụ nke Mee (30 Eprel ruo 2 Mee) mgbe ndị otu RCN jụrụ onyinye ụgwọ ahụ
Patronella Zingisa 'Pat' Lekker bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Onye otu African National Congress, ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Chief Whip nke Official Opposition na Western Cape Provincial Parliament
A mụrụ ya na Cape Town, Lekker ka bi na Cape Town ugbu a
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Sizamile Secondary
A mara ya nke ọma na mpaghara Dullah Omar nke ANC
A họpụtara Lekker ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Western Cape Provincial n'afọ 2014 wee malite ọrụ dị ka onye otu na 21 Mee, na afọ 2014
Ọ na-anọchite anya obodo Philippi nke obodo ukwu Cape Town na ndị omeiwu mpaghara
Maka Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Ise, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Nchebe Obodo
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchianya Kọmitii Na-anọgide na Mmepe Obodo na Transport na Ọrụ Ọha
Maka ntuli aka nke afọ 2019, ọ bụ onye mbụ na ndepụta ndị omebe iwu nke mpaghara
Mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, a họpụtara Lekker dị ka onye isi nke ndị mmegide
Pat Ward Williams (amụrụ n'afọ 1948) bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na-ese foto nke ọrụ ya na-etinyekarị aka na mgbagwoju anya nke agbụrụ, okike, na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Na mgbakwunye na obere foto ya na ntinye ya, o meela ihe osise ọha na eze atọ na Los Angeles
Williams nwere BFA na Moore College of Art and Design (1982) na MFA na Maryland Institute College of Art (1987)

Otu n'ime ọrụ Williams a maara nke ọma bụ Accused / Blowtorch / Padlock (1986), nke nwere ihe oyiyi nke nwoke ojii nke ejikọtara n'osisi (nke e bipụtara na mbụ na magazin Life n'afọ 1937 ma ọ bụghị onye na-ese foto kpọmkwem), nke ederede gbara gburugburu na-egosipụta mmeghachi omume onye na-ese ihe na foto a

E tinyela ebubo / Blowtorch / Padlock na ihe ngosi dị ka The Decade Show, nnukwu ihe ngosi mmekorita nke New Museum, Studio Museum na Harlem, na The Museum of Contemporary Hispanic Art, yana Art, Women, California n'afọ 1950– rụọ afọ 2000 Parallels and Intersections na San Jose Museum of Art
Williams so na Photo-Active Feminist Visiting Artists n'afọ 1998–99 Series, nke National Endowment for the Arts na Mahadum nke Michigan School of Art and Design and Women's Studies Program kwadoro

A họọrọ otu ndị na-ese ihe, nke gụnyekwara Paula Allen, Barbara Kruger, Susan Meiselas, Connie Samaras, Kathy Constantinides, Wendy Ewald, na Marilyn Zimmerman, maka itinye aka na nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọrụ ha wee gaa Mahadum Michigan iji gosi ụmụ akwụkwọ na obodo ọrụ ha
N'afọ 1992, Williams bipụtara katalọgụ ngosi Probable Cause, nke nwere ọtụtụ foto ndị e gosipụtara na Goldie Paley Gallery na Moore College of Art and Design
Ikike ndị nna na okwu ite ime bụ mmụba nke arụmụka ite ime na mmegharị ikike ndị nna
Ime ime na-aghọ ihe na-akpata nghọtahie na ikpe n'etiti ndị mmekọ
Iwu ndị Rom nyere ohere ime ime ma na-achịkwa ya n'ịtụle nna mụrụ ya
Eze Ukwu Septimius Severus chịrị n'ihe dị ka afọ 211 AD na nwanyị nke turu ime n'enweghị nkwenye site n'aka di ya kwesịrị ihu n'ala ọzọ maka na ọ nwụnahụrụ di ya

N'okwu ya Pro Cluentio, nke e nyere na 66 BC, Cicero na-ezo aka n'okwu ọ nụrụ banyere ya ebe a mara otu nwanyị si Miletus ikpe ọnwụ maka ime ime ya, mgbe ọ natara aka azụ site n'aka ndị guzoro iketa ala di ya ma ọ bụrụ na ọ mụtaghị onye nketa
Cicero kwuru na n'ime nke a, ọ 'bibiriwo olileanya nke nna, ncheta aha ya, ọkọnọ nke agbụrụ ya, onye nketa nke ezinụlọ ya, nwa amaala ezubere maka iji mba ahụ'

Onye edemede Gris nke narị afọ nke anọ BC si Alexandria, Egypt, Sopater, hotara onye ọka iwu Lysias, onye zoro aka na ikpe na Atens nke otu nwoke aha ya bụ Antigene boro nwunye ya ebubo na ọ napụrụ ya nwa nwoke site na ite ime
Ma nwoke nwere ikike iwu kwadoro iji kwalite ọdịmma onwe ya, ma ọ bụ maka ite ime, ịbụ nna, ma ọ bụ nkuchi, karịa nke nwanyị, dị iche site na mpaghara

N'afọ 2011, a kọrọ na Indonesia, Malawi, Syria, United Arab Emirates, Equatorial Guinea, Kuwait, Maldives, Morocco, South Korea, Saudi Arabia, Japan, Taiwan na Turkey niile nwere iwu nke chọrọ ka di nwanyị ahụ buru ụzọ nye ikike ite ime
Otú ọ dị, na mba ụfọdụ, enwere ike ịgafe ma ọ bụ merie iwu a ma ọ bụrụ na enwere ezi nchegbu maka ahụike nne
Kemgbe Roe v
Wade, ụfọdụ steeti na United States anwaala ịme iwu chọrọ nkwenye di na nwunye
Iwu ndị a niile akwadoghị iwu, nkwenye di na nwunye na mkpebi 1976 Planned Parenthood v
Danforth na mmata di na nwunye na mkpebi 1992 Planned Parenthood v
Casey
Na China, di nke nwanyị nke turu ime gbara akwụkwọ megide ya n'afọ 2002 n'okpuru iwu ezubere inye nha nhata mmekọahụ n'ihe gbasara ịmụ nwa na mkpebi mgbochi
Iwu ahụ kwuru na nwanyị enweghị ihe kachasị mkpa karịa di ya ma ọ bụ nwunye ya n'ikpebi ma ọ ga-amụ nwa
Ọtụtụ ikpe ikpe bilitere na mba ọdịda anyanwụ nke ụmụ nwoke gbalịrị igbochi ụmụ nwanyị ha na ha na-enwe mmekọahụ ime ime, ha niile kụrụ afọ n'ala
Banyere ụmụnwoke na-ekpebi ịjụ ịbụ nne na nna ma ọ bụrụ na ha dị ime n'atụghị anya ya ma rịọ maka ite ime ego
Ụmụnwoke ndị gbalịrị ịmanye nwanyị ite ime

Ndị na-akwado ikike nwoke itinye aka na mkpebi ọmụmụ nke nwanyị, na-arụ ụka na ọ bụ ihe ezi uche na-adịghị na ya na, mgbe ịmịchara ime, ụmụnwanyị nwere ọtụtụ ohere ịhapụ ime na ịbụ nne na nna n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro (dịka ụtụtụ mgbe ọgwụ, ite ime, nkuchi ma ọ bụ iwu nchekwa) ebe ụmụnwoke enweghị

Armin Brott ekwuola banyere nke a, 'Nwanyị nwere ike ịnapụ nwoke ikike ya ịghọ nne ma ọ bụ nna ma ọ bụ manye ya ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ụzọ megidere uche ya' Nwoke ahụ nwere ike inwe ọrụ nke ịbụ nna, dị ka nkwado ụmụaka, nke a manyere ya megide ọchịchọ ya
Nke a na-emetụta ọbụna ma ọ bụrụ na ịtụrụ ime enweghị ihe ọmụma ma ọ bụ nkwenye ya, dị ka imebi njikwa ọmụmụ, izu ohi sperm ma ọ bụ mwakpo mmekọahụ nke nwoke
N'afọ 2021, nyocha nzaghachi afọ ofufo sitere n'aka ndị ọrụ ebere na-emegide ịtụrụ ime bụ Care Net nyochara otu puku ụmụnwoke na United States bụ ndị tụụrụ nwanyị ime ime
Ihe ngosi ahụ jiri ọnụọgụgụ ma mee ka nsonaazụ ya dị ntakịrị iji nweta ihe ngosi onye nnọchi anya mba
Ọ bụ naanị ụmụnwoke ndị mmekọ ha gwara ha banyere ite ime ahụ ka a nyochara

Otu ajụjụ jụrụ 'Olee ọrụ ị kwenyere na ọtụtụ ndị ị maara na-atụ anya na ụmụnwanyị na ụmụnwoke ga-arụ na mkpebi ime ime?' 21% zara, 'Ọ bụ nhọrọ nwanyị na nwoke enweghị ọrụ ọ ga-arụ' 46% zara, 'Ọ bụ nhọrọ nwanyị, mana nwoke kwesịrị inwe ụfọdụ ntinye' 29% zara, 'Ọ bụ nhọrọ nke nwanyị na nwoke kwesịrị ime ọnụ na ntinye aka nhata' 4% fọdụrụnụ hụrụ nwoke ahụ nwere ọrụ ka ukwuu ma ọ bụ ọbụna ọrụ pụrụ iche na ikpebi, ma ọ bụ amaghị
Ndị na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụnwoke na ndị na-ahụ maka ikike ndị nna ekwuola na ụmụnwoke kwesịrị inwe ikike veto maka mkpebi ndị mmekọ ha ime
N'otu aka ahụ, ọkà ihe ọmụma George W
Harris dere na, ọ bụrụ na nwoke amụọ nwanyị ime na ebumnuche doro anya nke ịmụ nwa, n'ụzọ nkwekọrịta, mgbe ahụ ọ ga-abụ omume na-adịghị mma maka nwanyị ahụ ka o mechara tụba ime
Ndị na-ajụ ka ụmụnwoke nwee ikike itinye aka kpọmkwem na-arụ ụka na n'ihi na ọ bụ ahụ nwanyị na-ebu nwa a na-amụbeghị amụ, mkpebi ya maka ma ọ bụ megide ite ime kwesịrị ịbụ naanị otu

Marsha Garrison, onye prọfesọ na Brooklyn Law School, kwuru na ụlọ ikpe United States kwetara 'na nwa ebu n'afọ dị n'ime ahụ nwanyị, ọ dị n'ime ya ma enweghị ikewapụ ya na ya, ya mere ọ bụghị naanị mkpebi ya banyere ma ọ ga-amụ nwa, ọ bụ banyere ahụ ya
Na nyocha Gallup nke afọ 2003, 72% nke ndị zaghachirinụ kwadoro ọkwa nye di, na 26% megidere; n'ime ndị a gbara ajụjụ ọnụ, 79% nke ụmụnwoke na 67% nke ụmụnwanyị zara maka ọkwa n'ime di na nwunye

Bioethicist Jacob Appel ajụọla, 'ọ bụrụ na mmadụ enye nwoke ikike veto n'elu nhọrọ nwanyị ime ime n'ọnọdụ ebe ọ dị njikere ịkwụ ụgwọ maka nwa ahụ, gịnị mere ị gaghị enye ya ikike ịchọ ite ime ebe ọ na-adịghị njikere inye nwa ahụ?'

N'izo aka n'okwu ndị nne na-atụ anya na ụmụnwoke na-achọghị ịghọ nna ga-akwụ ụgwọ nkwado ụmụaka, Melanie McCulley, onye ọka iwu South Carolina, n'isiokwu ya nke afọ 1998, 'The Male Abortion The Putative Father's Right to Terminate His Interests in and Obligations to the Unborn Child,' wepụtara echiche nke 'nwoke abortion', nke ọ na-arụ ụka na ụmụnwoke kwesịrị inwe ike ịkwụsị ọrụ iwu ha nye ụmụ a na-achọghị

O nwekwara ike ime, kama iwere ọnọdụ na ụmụnwoke kwesịrị inwe nnwere onwe ịpụ na ibu ọrụ na ikike, iji were ọnọdụ na mmadụ ga-ahọrọ ịbanye ma kwenye ịrụ ọrụ ndị ahụ ka a manyere ya ịgbaso ha, na naanị site na ime nke a, nweta ikike ndị nne na nna
Nke a bụ ihe na-eme n'oge nkuchi

Patience Avre (amuru na ụbọchị nke iri nke ọnwa June na 1976) bu onye Naijiria bu onye gbagoro n'egwuregwu bọọlụ nke Naijiria gbaara otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na 1995 FIFA Women's World Cup, 1999 FIFA Women's World Cup na 2003 FIFA Women's World Cup yana 2000 Summer Olympics
Àtụ Nigeria squad 1995 FIFA Women's World Cup
Patience Ibekwe Abdullah (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ onye bụbu osote onye isi ndị uwe ojii na Naịjirịa
Tupu e bulie ya n'ọkwa osote onye isi ndị uwe ojii, ọ bụ osote onye osote onye ọka iwu ndị uwe ojii n'ọfịs onye ndụmọdụ nchekwa mba, onye isi ala, Abuja ebe o nyere aka n'ilekọta nchekwa mba
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii na steeti Ebonyi na Naịjirịa n'afọ 2015

Dị ka kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii, ọ kwụsịrị ebe ndị uwe ojii na-enyocha n'okporo ụzọ steeti na-esote mkpesa sitere n'aka ọha na eze na ndị uwe ojii nọ n'okporo ụzọ n'ebe ndị uwe ojii n'anọ n'arụ arụrụ ala
O webatara mmemme dị iche iche iji belata mpụ gụnyere ọrụ na-egosi ike na ọrụ na-ewepu mpụ
Ọ lara ezumike nká na ndị uweojii Naijiria na 28 Jenụwarị 2019
A mụrụ Abdullah na 7 Eprel 1963 n'obodo Odoje, Onitsha, Anambra State, dị na Naijiria
Nna ya bụ Mike Ibekwe, onye lara ezumike nká dị ka kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii na-elekọta steeti East Central nke ochie nke dị na Naịjirịa n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe Agha Obodo Naịjirị kwụsịrị n'afọ1970
E debanyere aha ya na ndị uwe ojii Naijiria n'afọ 1989 dị ka cadet ASP
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii na Ebonyi Steeti n'afọ 2015
Mgbe ọ bụ Kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii na steeti Ebonyi, o webatara mmemme dị iche iche iji belata mpụ gụnyere Ngosipụta ike na Mbelata mpụ
Ọ gbasasịrị ebe ndị uwe ojii na-enyocha n'okporo ụzọ steeti maka ọtụtụ ndị bi na ya mere mkpesa na ndị uwe ojii nọ ebe ha n'enyocha na eme arụrụ ala
Ndị na-agba ọgba tum tum na Ebonyi Steeti nyere ya aha njirimara 'NNE Oma (ezi nne) ' nke Ebonyi Steeti mgbe ọ na-eje ozi n'ebe ahụ dị ka Kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii
E mechara kpọga ya n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii Abuja dị ka Kọmishọna nke ndị uwe ojii na-ahụ maka Force Intelligence Bureau
Kọmishọn Ọrụ Ndị Uwe Ojii mechara kwado nkwalite ya na 27th Plenary Meeting nke Police Service Commission nke kwụsịrị na Abuja na Friday, 20 Eprel 2018
A kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye enyemaka Inspector General ndị uweojii ma ziga ya n'ọfịs nke National Security Adviser, The presidency, Abuja

Ọzọkwa na Nzukọ zuru ezu nke Kọmitii Ọrụ Ndị Uwe Ojii nke e mere na Abuja n'etiti 9 na 11 Ọktoba n'afọ 2018, Kọmitii ahụ kwadoro nkwalite nke ndị enyemaka ndị uwe ojii atọ ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi ndị uwe ojii na Patience Abdallah bụ naanị nwanyị n'etiti ndị uwe ojii

Dame Patience Faka Jonathan ( née Oba ) onye a mụrụ na 25 October 1957
Ọ bụ nwanyi mbụ gara aga nke Naijiria na nwunye onye bụ Gọvanọ Bayelsa steeti ma bụrụkwa onyeisiala Naịjirịa bụ Goodluck Ebele Jonathan
Ọ jere ozi dịka odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide na steeti Bayelsa mụrụ ya
Patience Jonathan onye a mụrụ na Port Harcourt, ebe ọ nwetara asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ ya na 1976, wee gafee ule asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ West African (WASCE) na 1980
N'afọ 1989, o nwetara Asambodo Nkụzi nke Mba (NCE) na mgbakọ na mwepụ na ihe ọmụmụ ihe si na Rivers State College of Arts and Science, Port Harcourt
Ọ gakwara na mahadum Port Harcourt wee mụọ maka BEed in Biology and Psychology
Enyere ya nzere doctorate site na mahadum Port Harcourt
Dame Patience Jonathan malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi na ụlọ akwụkwọ Stella Maris College, Port Harcourt na Sports Institute, Isaka
Ọ kwagara na ngalaba ụlọ akụ na 1997 ebe ọ jere ozi dịka onye njikwa ahịa nke Imiete Community Bank
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ malitere ụlọ akụ obodo mbụ na Port Harcourt nke a na-akpọ Akpo Community Bank
Ọ laghachiri na klaasị nwa oge ọzọ dị ka onye nkuzi
N'ikpeazụ, e zigara ya na Bayelsa State Ministry of Education, ebe ọ jere ozi ruo ụbọchị 29 May 1999, mgbe di ya ghọrọ osote gọvanọ steeti ahụ
Na 12 Julaị 2012, Henry Seriake Dickson họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide na Bayelsa steeti

Patience Nkunda Kinshaba nke e dekwara dị ka Patience Kinshaba Nkunda bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, onye omeiwu na onye nnọchi anya nwanyị nke ndị omeiwu maka mpaghara Kanungu na ndị omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Ọ nwere njikọ na National Resistance Movement (NRM)

Kinshaba meriri na ntuli aka NRM mgbe o meriri Elizabeth Karungi ma ọ ghọrọ ọkọlọtọ National Resistance Movement (NRM) na ntuliaka mba na afo puku abụọ na iri abụọ na otu O meriri nwanyị nnọchi anya ndị omeiwu maka mpaghara Kanungu
Kinshaba gosipụtara arịrịọ n'oge omebe iwu nke Uganda na-achọ ka gọọmentị nke Uganda nye ndị Uganda na-arịa ọrịa shuga na ọbara mgbali elu ọgwụ n'efu

Mana ndị omeiwu Uganda nwere nchegbu banyere ọnụ ahịa dị elu nke ọgwụ iji gwọọ ọrịa ndị a na-adịghị ebute ọrịa ma ha chọrọ ka gọọmentị nye ọgwụ ndị dị otú ahụ n'efu n'ihi ọnụ ala dị n'ụlọ ọgwụ ọha na eze
Onye omebe iwu nke Tororo Municipality bụ Apollo Yeri kwadoro atụmatụ Kinshaba bụ onye chọrọ ka Gọọmentị weghara site na National Medical Stores (NMS) iji nweta ọgwụ ndị ahụ n'efu

Kinshaba chọrọ ka gọọmentị Uganda nye nyocha na ọgwụgwọ n'efu maka retinopathy (nke na-akpata ìsì), nchịkwa abụba ọbara n'efu (iji chịkwaa ọkwa cholesterol) yana inye nyocha maka ihe ịrịba ama mbụ nke ọrịa akụrụ na ọgwụgwọ metụtara ọrịa shuga
Kinshaba rịọrọ gọọmentị Uganda ka ha zụta maka ndị Kanungu District ihe ndị ọzọ maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụike ha IV na-arụ ọrụ na otu generator nke na-enweghịkwa ntụkwasị obi
Kinshaba gara ihe omume maka inye iwu nke Ambulance nke Japan nyere ụlọ ọgwụ Bwindi Community Hospital na Kanungu District site na enyemaka enyemaka enyemaka nke Japan maka Grassroots Projects
Patience Oghre Imobhio bụ onye na-eme ihe fim ma n'itinye ihe nkiri na Naijiria
N’afọ 2015, Pulse magazine sirị na ọ sonyego n’etiti ụmụnwaanyị itoolu ama ama na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nollywood
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri na Mahadum Jos wee lụọ Mazị Stephen-Imobhio
N'afo 1995 ka Patience bido ọrụ dika onye ihe nkiri mana o kpebiri na ya nwere mmasị karị n'itinye fim
ozugbo o gụsịrị akwukwo na Mahadum Jos, ọ gakwara Lagos na nke ulo oru Zeb Ejiro ịrụ ọrụ
Amara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ itinye fim dika Dominos, Spider na Household ya na otutu ihe nkiri dika Dear Mother na Everyday People

Patience Okon George (amuru 25 Novemba n'afọ 1991) bu onye oso oso Naijiria
Ọ gbara asọmpi mita 400 na asọmpi egwuregwu ụwa nke afọ 2015 na Beijing, China na n'egwuregwu Ruo n'afọ 2016
George bụ onye nwetere ọla nrịba n'asọmpị Afrịka ugboro abụọ n'egwuregwu mita 400 n'otu n'otu
Ọ bụkwa onye mmeri nke mba Naijiria ugboro atọ na narị mita anọ
Na onwa abụọ Ọgọst n'afọ 2014, ọ gbara ụkwụ nke mbụ nke 4 × 400 m relay maka ndị otu Naijiria nke bịara nke abụọ n'azụ quartet Jamaica na Glasgow Commonwealth Games
Ọ gbakwara ọsọ na okpomọkụ nke 4 × 100 m relay maka Nigeria
Okon George nwetara ihe nrite ọla n'asọmpi Afrịka nke afọ 2014 na Marrakesh, n'azụ onye Naijiria ibe ya, Sade Abugan na Kabange Mupopo nke Zambia
O nwetakwara nrite ọla edo na mgbagharị 4 × 400 m ya na ndị otu egwuregwu Regina George, Ada Benjamin na Sade Abugan
N'afọ 2015, Okon George setịpụrụ PB ọhụrụ nke 5076 na 400 m na nzukọ Resisprint na obodo Switzerland nke La Chaux-de-Fonds
Nke a bụ oge mbụ ya n'okpuru mgbochi 51s
N'afọ 2015 World Championships in Athletics, o haziri PB ya na ọkara ikpeazụ nke 400 m ụmụ nwanyị ka o biputere oge nke 5087 s iji ruo eruo nke atọ kachasị na okpomọkụ ya
Mgbe e mesịrị n'ime afọ na All Africa Games, o nwetara ihe nrite ọlaọcha n'azụ Kabange Mupopo na ọhụrụ kacha mma nke 5071 s
Ọ meriri ihe nrite ọla nchara nke abụọ ya n'asọmpị Afrịka na 400 mita na asọmpi Durban n'afọ 2016
O debere nke atọ n'azụ Mupopo na Margaret Wambui
O mekwara ka onye Naijiria 4 × 400 m quartet ( Omolara Omotosho, Regina George, Yinka Ajayi, Patience Okon George ) nweta nrite ọlaọcha n'ụbọchị ikpeazụ nke asọmpi ahụ
Ọ gbachitere aha obodo ya nke ọma na 2016 wee mechie akara ya maka egwuregwu Olympic Rio
N'afọ 2019, George meriri ihe nrite ọla edo na ọsọ ọsọ ụmụ nwanyị 4 × 400 na egwuregwu n'afọ 2019 nke Africa emere na Rabat, Morocco
1 na-anọchite anya Africa
Patience Okoro (amụrụ na 10 Julaị 1984) bụ nwaanyi onye ọsọ egwurewgu
Ọ nọchiri Naijiria na asompi ụlọ ma na mba ọzọ
Ọ meriri ola edo na egwuregu nke 2008 Afrika emere na Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
Na ihe omume egwuregwu nke 2003 All-Africa ka o meriri ọla nchara ụwa mbụ ya
mechara gbata onye nke 1se na 2006 Africa Championships na onye nke anọ na egwuregwu 2011 All-Africa
Okoro meriri ọla ọcha na egwuregu nke 2007 All-Africa
Patience Ozokwor, // (na-ege ntị) (A amụrụ ya n'ụbọchị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ1958) ọ bụ onye Naijiria na-eti egwu, onye na-emepụta ejiji, onye na'agụ egwú gospel, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
O meriri ihe nrite Best Supporting Actress 2012 & 2013 na 10th Africa Movie Academy Awards
A maara ya maka ịrụ ọrụ nke nwanyị ọjọọ na ụfọdụ ihe nkiri ya
Patience Ozokwor so n'ime ndị Naijiria puku irí kachasị elu nke gọọmentị sọpụrụ iji mee emume njikọta nke mpaghara ugwu na ndịda n'afọ 2014
Patience Torlowei (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 24 n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1964) bụ onye Naijiria na-emepụta ejiji
Ọ bụ onye kéré 'Esther Dress', nke mbụ nke ejiji nke sonyere Smithsonian Institution's National Museum of African Art's permanent collection
A mụrụ ya na Enugu na nne na nna Ijaw, Torlowei gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba Textile Arts and Technology na Yaba College of Technology
Ọ kwagara Belgium n'afọ 1989
Dị ka onye na-emepụta ejiji, ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji mepụta uwe agbamakwụkwọ na akwa lingerie yana uwe dị njikere
O guzobere akara ejiji ya, Patience Please, n'afọ 2006
Uwe nke Torlowei, Esther, mere ugbu a bụ nke National Museum of African Art (NMAA) na Washington, DC; ọ bụ nke mbụ nke haute couture ịbanye na nchịkọta ihe ngosi nka
Ọ na-egosi ihe nkiri nke mmanụ na diamond na nke agha, a na-ejikwa ihe dị iche iche gụnyere ákwà ọla edo
E gosipụtara ibe a na mbụ na ihe ngosi ejiji na ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na 2014
E tinyere Torlowei na ihe ngosi 2019 'Abụ m
Contemporary Women Artists of Africa' na NMAA
Patrick Nnaemeka Okorie (amụrụ ya na 27 Mee 1990), nke eji aha ọgbọ ya bụ Patoranking mara, bụ onye regs nke Naịjirịa - onye otii egwu na onye na-ede egwu
Amụrụ ya ma zulite ya na Ijegun-Egba Satellite Town, Patoranking bụ onye Ọnịcha, Ebọnyị Steeti
Ọ malitere ọrụ iti egwu ya site na-ịrụkọ ọrụ n'okpuru ndị nka dịka XProject, Konga, Slam na Reggie Rockstone
Ọ binyere aka na ndekọ egwu na 'K-Solo's Igberaga Records' na 2010
Ọ wepụtara 'Up in D Club' n'okpuru ndị ahụ
Patoranking ghọrọ onye nkwado nke Dem Mama Records mgbe ya na Timaya rụkọchara egwu ya bụ 'Alubarika'
Na Febuwarị 2014, ọ bịanyere aka na ndekọ egwu ndị Foston Musik were wepụta 'Girlie O', nke mere ka ọ pụta ìhè
Na 9 Febuwarị 2015, Patoranking kwupụtara na Instagram na ọ bịanyere aka na ụlọ ọrụ ndị VP Records
Na Septemba 28 Patoranking wepụtara egwu aha ya bụ Abule nke ọ wepụtara tupu abọm were pụta n'oge na-adịghị anya na 2020
Na Disemba 2021, Patoranking lanarịrị ihe mberede ụgbọ ala na Nigeria
A mụrụ Patoranking ma zulite ya na 'Ijegun-Egba Satellite Town', mana o nwere mgbọrọgwụ ezinụlọ na Onicha, Ebonyi Steeti
Ọ gara 'Citizen Comprehensive Koleji' na Epe, Legọọsụ ma mesịa banye na 'Jibril Martin Memorial Grammar Sukulu' na Iponri
Patoranking malitere ịrụ ọrụ nkà ya dị ka otii egwu n'okporo ámá na ịgba egwu
N'ajụjụ ọnụ a jụrụ ya na 2012 na 'Entertainment Express', ọ sịrị na aha ọgbọ ya bụ onye Jamaica nyere ya na 'Alpha Beach' na Legọọsụ
Patoranking kpọrọ Buju Banton, Bob Marley, Fela Kuti, Lucky Dube, Chaka Demus, Majek Fashek, Blackky, Blackface, Tuface na Marvelus Benjamin dị ka ndị metụtara iti egwu ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ ndị 'Entertainment Express', ọ kọwara egwu ya dị ka ụzọ omume dị iche iche nke ịgba egwu were kwukwa na ọ na-arụtụ aka n'okwu metụtara mmekọrịta ọha na eze
Na Mee 2012, Patoranking wepụtara otu egwu akpọrọ 'Iya Bisi', nke ya na Qdot na Kbaj tiri
Egwu akpọrọ 'Drumphase' bụ ngwakọta nke dansịhọlụ na fuji
Patoranking gwara 'Entertainment Express' na Qdot na Kbaj nyere ya aka were dee egwu ahụ site na ha ichekorịta echiche ọnụ
Na 12 Septemba 2013, Patoranking wepụtara ọdịyo na vidiyo maka 'Alubarika' n'otu oge
Egwu ahụ na nsụgharị n'ụzọ nkịtị pụtara 'Ngọzi Chineke' ma gosipụta olu sitere na Timaya
Dika edemede nke Victor Akande nke , Patoranking kọwara egwu a dịka nchịkọta nke ndu ya dika onye egwu ma kwuo na o meghere ya ụzọ ịnwete ndị na-eso ya nakwa ndị egwu kwudosiri ike
Na Febuwarị 2014, Patoranking bịanyere aka na ndekọ egwu na Foston Musik wee mechie njikọ ya na Dem Mama Records
N'oge mkparịta ụka ya na Toolz na NdaniTV's The Juice, Timaya kwuru na Patoranking hapụrụ aha ya na ọ nweghị mgbe ọ bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ
Na 4 Febuwarị 2014, Patoranking wepụtara 'Girlie O', egwu nke WizzyPro mepụtara
A gbagburu vidio egwu maka abụ ahụ site n'aka Moe Musa; e wepụtara ya na 5 Febụwarị 2014
Na vidio egwu, Patoranking napụtara onye agbata obi ya na-esote esemokwu ụlọ site na igosipụta mmetụta ebumpụta ụwa ya
Foston Musik wepụtara 'Girlie O'(ntigharị) nke Tiwa Savage nyere ya aka were tie na 19 Mee 2014
Ọ pụtara na nke 9 na 'MTV Base 's Official Naija Top 10' chaatị
Tiwa Savage gwara Ehiz nke MTV Base n' egwu Patoranking na-amasị ya, ya mere o jiri were kpebie ịbịakwute ya ka ha were tigharịa egwu ahụ
Moe Musa wepụtara Vidiyo egwu a ma dụzie egwu a bụ'Girlie O' (ntigharị) na London
Joey Akan nke Pulse Nigeria kwuru, 'Na ntigharị ọhụrụ ahụ, na-atụfubeghị isi sekpụ ntị nke bụ mmeri
Ejigidere ha ma welite ha
Ha jigidere ụda egwu, ekwem ukwe na dayamizim nakwa nnukwu ọrha tinyere na lirikis'
Patoranking gosipụtara n'egwu Seyi Shay 'Murda' ya na Shaydee
Dokta Frabz mepụtara egwu a ma wepụta ya na 1 Eprel 2014
E tinyere vidiyo egwua “Murda” na 'Vevo' Meji Alabi nke 'JM Films' bụ ndị nduzi
Egwu Patoranking ndị a 'Daniella Whine' na 'My Woman, My Everything' pụtara na chaatịị egwu iri nọ n'elu na 'MTV Base Official Naija Top 10'
Nke mbụ gbara nke anọ na ọnwa Mee ma gbakwaa nke mbụ na ọnwa Juunu, ebe nke ikpeazụ 'My Woman, My everything' pụtakwara na chaatịị dịka nke abụọ
Na Jenụwarị 2016, e mere Patoranking dị ka otu n'ime ndị ikpe maka mbipụta nke asọmpi egwu The Voice Nigeria
Patoranking wepụtara abọm studio izizi ya 'God Over Everything' na 1 August 2016
O gosipụtara ndị egwu ọzọ n dịka Phyno, Wizkid, Sarkodie, Olamide, Elephant Man na Wasiu Ayinde Marshall
Abọm ahụ nọ nke 4 na chaatịị 'Billboard 'Reggae Albums'
Patoranking etinyela aka n'usoro ihe ọmụmụ maka ụmụaka Afrịka ndị na-enweghi ike inweta agụma akwụkwọ kwesịrị ekwesị
Na-agbanyeghị mmata a matara ya n'ụwa niile, onye na-eti egwuka a ka nwere mmasị n'ebe agụmakwụkwọ dị

Na 2019, O zutere onye guzobere mmemme agụmakwụkwọ ALU, ebe ọ bidoro mmemme iji zụọ ụmụaka iri obi na-anụ ọkụ ọkachasị na Ebute-Metta ebe ọ nọ were tolitere na ndị ọzọ enweghị ego ha nwere maka agụm akwụkwọ

Patrice Tlhopane Motsepe (amụrụ na 28 Jenụwarị 1962) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na-egwupụta ihe na South Africa
Kemgbe 12 Machị 2021, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Confederation of African Football
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke African Rainbow Minerals, nke nwere mmasị na ọla edo, ọla ferrous, ọla isi, na platinum
Ọ na-anọdụ n'ọtụtụ bọọdụ ụlọ ọrụ, gụnyere ịbụ onye isi oche na-abụghị onye isi oche nke Harmony Gold, ụlọ ọrụ Ngwuputa ọla edo nke iri na abụọ kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa, na osote onye isi oche nke Sanlam
N'afọ 2012, a kpọrọ Motsepe nwoke kasị baa ọgaranya na South Africa, na-ebute ndepụta Sunday Times' kwa afọ nke bara ọgaranya na atụmatụ akụ na ụba nke R2007 ijeri ($ 1 ijeri)
N'afọ 1994, ọ ghọrọ onye isi ojii mbụ na ụlọ ọrụ iwu Bowman Gilfillan - n'otu afọ ahụ a họpụtara Nelson Mandela dị ka onye isi ojii mbụ nke mba ahụ

Ka gọọmentị ọhụrụ malitere ịkwalite ikike ndị isi ojii na azụmaahịa; Motsepe hiwere Future Mining, nke nyere ọrụ nkwekọrịta nke gụnyere ihicha ájá ọla edo site n'ime olulu ogbunigwe maka Vaal Reefs Gold mine, ma mejuputa usoro ụgwọ ọrụ ndị ọrụ nke jikọtara ụgwọ ọrụ dị ala na ego ịkekọrịta uru
N'afọ 1997, na ọnụ ahịa ọla edo dị ala, ọ zụtara ebe a na-egwupụta ọla edo n'akụkụ site n'aka AngloGold n'okpuru usoro ego dị mma
AngloGold rere Motsepe oghere ọla edo isii maka $ 7,7million na-enye ya ohere ịkwụghachi ụgwọ ahụ site na ego a ga-enweta n'ọdịnihu nke ụlọ ọrụ a maara ugbu a dị ka African Rainbow Minerals
E kwughachiri nke a n'ọtụtụ nkwekọrịta ma Motsepe guzobere ụlọ ọrụ iji malite ịzụta ogbunigwe na-arụ ọrụ nke ga-abụ isi iyi nke akụ na ụba ya
N'afọ 1999, ya na ndị enyi ya abụọ jikọrọ aka wee mepụta Greene and Partners Investments
Iwu Black Economic Empowerment (BEE) nke e webatara mgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 1994 gasịrị enyewo aka n'ịkwalite ọnọdụ Motsepe na ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta ihe na South Africa
Azụmahịa ga-enwerịrị opekata mpe nke 26% nwe ojii ka a tụlee ya maka ikikere Ngwuputa
Kemgbe afọ 2004, ọ bụ onye isi na-abụghị onye isi nke Absa Group na Sanlam
N'afọ 2002 mgbe edepụtara ya na JSE Security Exchange, African Rainbow Minerals sonyeere Harmony Gold Mining Ltd
aha ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gbanwere na ARMgold
Motsepe bụkwa onye guzobere African Rainbow Minerals Platinum (Proprietary) Limited na ARM Consortium Limited, nke mechara kewaa nwe ya na Anglo American Platinum Corp Ltd
Site na 2005, Motsepe bụ onye isi oche nke Teal Exploration and Mining Incorporated
Motsepe bụkwa onye isi oche nke Ubuntu-Botho Investments, onye isi oche na-abụghị onye isi oche nke Harmony Gold Mining Co Ltd
na osote onye isi oche nke Sanlam Ltd
Motsepe abụrụla onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ South Africa
N'afọ 2003, Motsepe kere Ubuntu-Botho Investments (UBI) (na 2019 o nwere 55% nke ya)
N'afọ 2004, UBI banyere nkwekọrịta BEE na ụlọ ọrụ mkpuchi na ọrụ ego Sanlam
Nkwekọrịta ahụ kwụsịrị na 2014 mgbe a kwụrụ ụgwọ ahụ ma UBI nwetara 135% nke Sanlam mana UBI nwere 181% votu na Sanlam dị ka onye mmekọ BEE ya
UBI wee malite African Rainbow Capital (ARC), ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka nke UBI
Onye isi ndị isi ARC bụ Johan van Zyl, onye bụbu onye isi nke Sanlam

ARC nwere ihe karịrị ụlọ ọrụ iri anọ, gụnyere TymeBank, otu ụlọ ọrụ Afrimat, ụlọ ọrụ ugbo BKB, ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta Rain, ụlọ ọrụ okomoko Val de Vie, na obere osisi na Alexander Forbes, onye nchịkwa ego ezumike nká
Motsepe bụ onye nwe Mamelodi Sundowns FC otu klọb bọọlụ Premier
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2019, Motsepe zụtara 37% na Blue Bulls Co
Ndị ọzọ na-ekenye nnukwu ego bụ Remgro (37%) na Blue Bulls Rugby Union (26%)
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2020, o kwupụtara na ọ ga-abụ onye ga-abụ onye isi oche CAF

E boro ya ebubo ngwa ngwa na FIFA na-akwado ya nke ọma - n'agbanyeghị ọrụ ya nke nchekwa na nnọpụiche - na Onye isi ala ya Gianni Infantino, onye ga-achọ inweta votu nke Africa maka ntuli aka ọzọ n'ọdịnihu, a họpụtara Patrice Motsepe na 12 Machị 2021, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, mmadụ anọ ndị ọzọ niile na-azọ ọkwa ha

N'afọ 2011, a kpọrọ ya onye isi oche nke Black Business Council, ọ bụkwa onye otu ntọala na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke otu n'ime ndị na-akwado azụmahịa na ndị otu na-akwado azụmahịa na South Africa bụ Business Unity SA (BUSA)
Motsepe ritere ihe nrite kacha mma nke South Africa n'afọ 2002
N'afọ 2004, a họpụtara ya dịka onye nke iri atọ na itoolu n'etiti ndị South African Broadcasting Corporation's Great South Africans

N'afọ 2008, a kọrọ na ọ bụ onye nke 503 kasị baa ọgaranya n'ụwa, dị ka ndepụta Forbes 2019 nke The World's Billionaires si kwuo, mgbe ahụ ọ bụ onye nke 962 kasị baa ọgaranya n'ụwa, na onye nke atọ kasị baa ọgaranya na South Africa maka afọ 2019
N'afọ 2020, Forbes họọrọ Motsepe dị ka onye nke 1,307 kasị baa ọgaranya n'ụwa, na akụkọ akụ na ụba nke US $ 21 ijeri
Na Jenụwarị 2020, na nri abalị nke World Economic Forum na Davos, Patrice Motsepe gwara onye isi ala US Donald Trump n'ihu ọha na 'Africa hụrụ ya n'anya'
N'ihu mmeghachi omume iwe nke nkwupụta a kpalitere na kọntinent Afrịka niile, onye ijeri ahụ rịọrọ mgbaghara, na-akọwa 'Enweghị m ikike ikwu okwu n'aha onye ọ bụla ma e wezụga onwe m'
Motsepe lụrụ Dr
Precious Moloi, dibịa na onye ọchụnta ego ejiji
Ha nwere ụmụ atọ
Ọ bụ nwanne Tshepo Motsepe na Bridgette Radebe, na nwanne di nke onye isi ala Cyril Ramaphosa na Mịnịsta Jeff Radebe
Patricia Naomi Akwashiki (amuru 2 Novemba 1953) ka a hoputara Senator maka Nasarawa North Senatorial District nke Nasarawa State, Nigeria, were oru na 29 Mee 2007
Ọ bụ onye otu People's Democratic Party (PDP)
Akwashiki nwetara BA na Education na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria na 1982
Ọ banyere n'ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ, bụ́ ebe ọ ghọrọ onye isi nchịkwa
A hoputara ya na ogbako nke ise (2003-2007) nke Ulo Nnochi Anya n'elu ikpo okwu People's Democratic Party (PDP)
Ọ dara nhọpụta PDP maka e zọọ ọkwa nke abụọ, ma nyefee ya na All Nigeria Peoples Party (ANPP), nke ọ meriri ntuliaka n'afọ 2007 dị ka Senator ndi Nasarawa North

Ka ọ were oche ya na Senate na Mee 2007, a họpụtara Akwashiki na kọmitii na steeti & Local Government, Inter-Parliamentary Affairs, Communications, Banking, Insurance & Other Financial Institutions and Women and Youth
N'ime nyocha etiti oge nke ndị omebe iwu na May 2009, ThisDay kwuru na ọ kwadoro ụgwọ iji megharia Code of Conduct Bureau ma nye aka nke ọma na arụmụka na plenary na kọmitii ọrụ
N'ọnwa Jenụarị afọ 2010 ọ laghachiri na PDP, na-ekwu maka ikpe na-ezighị ezi na enweghị uche nke ndị odeakwụkwọ mba ANPP na esemokwu otu na mpaghara steeti nke pati ahụ dịka ihe kpatara ya
Na Maachị 2015, Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan họpụtara Senator Patricia Akwashiki ka ọ bụrụ onye minista mgbasa ozi

N'afọ 2018 Akwashiki kwuputara mmasị ịzọ ọkwa gọvanọ steeti Nasarawa na-ebu amụma na ọ ga-abụ nwaafọ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara na-achị Naijiria mana o wetaghị tiketi otu ya maka ịzọ ọkwa ọchịchị n'afọ 2019
