Patricia Era Bath (November 4, 1942 – Mee 30,afo 2019) bụ onye dibịa bekee nke America, onye mepụtara ihe, ọdịmma mmadụ na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ chepụtara ngwaọrụ ka mma maka ịwa ahụ cataract laser
A na-akpọ ihe mepụtara ya Laserphaco Probe, nke ọ kwadoro na afo 1986
Ọ ghọkwara nwanyị mbụ onye otu Jules Stein Eye Institute, nwanyị mbụ ga-eduzi mmemme ọzụzụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ophthalmology, na nwanyị mbụ họpụtara ịbụ onye ọrụ nsọpụrụ nke UCLA Medical Center
Bath bụ onye mbụ Africa-American jere ozi dị ka onye bi na ophthalmology na Mahadum New York
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ America-Afrika jere ozi na ndị ọrụ dịka dọkịta na-awa na UCLA Medical Center
Bath bụ dọkịta nwanyị America-America mbụ nwetara patent maka ebumnuche ahụike
Onye ji akwụkwọ ikike ise, o guzobekwara ụlọ ọrụ American Institute for Prevention of Blindness na Washington, DC anaghị akwụ ụgwọ
Amụrụ na afo 1942, na Harlem, New York, Patricia Bath bụ ada Rupert na Gladys Bath
Nna ya bụ onye si Trinidad kwabatara, onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye na- ere ahịa na-ere ahịa na onye isi ojii mbụ na-arụ ọrụ maka ụgbọ oloko New York City dị ka onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala
Nna ya kpaliri ịhụnanya o nwere maka ọdịbendị ma gbaa ya ume inyocha omenala dị iche iche
Nne ya sitere na ndị ohu Africa na ndị Cherokee Native America
N'ime oge ọ bụ nwata, ndị mụrụ Bath na-agwakarị ya ka ọ 'na-edozi ihe na-erughị [ya] kacha mma' na nkwado ha na agụmakwụkwọ ya gbakwara ya ume
Nne ya, na-agba ume nrọ ya na ịhụnanya sayensị, zụtara ya setịpụ kemistri mbụ ya
Ka ọ na-erule ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Bath abụrụla onye ọkà mmụta National Science Foundation
Nke a butere nyocha ọrịa kansa na-enweta atụmatụ ihu ihu na New York Times
Patricia na nwanne ya nwoke gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Charles Evans Hughes ebe ụmụ akwụkwọ abụọ ahụ mere nke ọma na sayensị na mgbakọ na mwepụ

Site n'ike mmụọ nsọ Albert Schweitzer 'ọrụ na nkà mmụta ọgwụ, Bath etinyere ma nweta a National Science Foundation Scholarship mgbe ọ na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị; nke a mere ka ọ rụọ ọrụ nyocha na Mahadum Yeshiva na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Harlem na-amụ njikọ n'etiti ọrịa cancer, nri na-edozi ahụ, na nchekasị
N'ime mmemme okpomọkụ a, nke Rabbi Moses D
Tendler na-edu, Bath amụwo mmetụta nke ihe fọdụrụ na streptomycin na nje bacteria
Site na nke a, o nwere ike ikwubi na ọrịa kansa, n'onwe ya, bụ ọrịa catabolic na uto tumor bụ ihe mgbaàmà
Ọ chọpụtakwara usoro mgbakọ na mwepụ nke a ga-eji buru amụma uto mkpụrụ ndụ kansa
Onye isi nke mmemme nchọcha ghọtara ihe nchoputa ya pụtara wee bipụta ya n'akwụkwọ sayensị
Ekekọrịtakwara nchọpụta ya na International Fifth Congress of Nutrition na ọdịda nke afo 1960
Na afo 1960, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, Bath meriri 'Award Award' nke magazin Mademoiselle maka ntinye aka na ọrụ ahụ
Bath nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Arts na kemistri na kọleji Hunter nke Manhattan na afo 1964
Ọ kwagara Washington, DC ịga Howard University College of Medicine
Afọ ọhụrụ ya na Howard dabara na Iwu ikike obodo nke 1964

O mebere otu Student National Medical Association wee bụrụ onye isi ala nwanyị mbụ ya na afo 1965 Na nyere ya onyinye nturu ugo nturu ugo gọọmentị mba ofesi maka ime nyocha na Belgrade, Yugoslavia, n'oge okpomọkụ nke afo 1967, ebe nyocha ya lekwasịrị anya na ịwa ahụ ụmụaka

Ihe pụtara ìhè nke emume nturu ugo bụ nzukọ Earl Warren, onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke United States, na Ụlọ Ọrụ Embassy US na Belgrade na nsọpụrụ na Mahadum Howard University College of Medicine na afo 1968
Enyere ya ihe nrite Edwin Watson maka Ọkachamma na Ophthalmology site n'aka onye ndụmọdụ ya, Lois A
Young
Ogbugbu nke Martin Luther King Jr, na afo 1968, mere ka Bath raara onwe ya nye iji nweta otu n'ime nrọ nke Eze, ya bụ inye ndị mmadụ ike site na mgbasa ozi ndị ogbenye
Ọ haziri ma duru ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụike Mahadum Howard n'inye ọrụ nlekọta ahụike afọ ofufo na mkpọsa ndị ogbenye na mbilite n'ọnwụ n'oge okpomọkụ nke afo 1968
Bath laghachiri na obodo Harlem ya wee banye na Harlem Hospital Center, bụ nke ka jikọtara na kọleji Mahadum Columbia nke ndị dibịa na ndị dọkịta na-awa ahụ
N'oge nkuzi ya, ọ hụrụ ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ndị kpuru ìsì na ụlọ ọgwụ Harlem ma e jiri ya tụnyere ndị ọrịa nọ na ụlọ ọgwụ anya nke Mahadum Columbia
Tupu ịmalite ọmụmụ akwụkwọ obibi ophthalmology ya na NYU na afo 1970, enyere Bath onyinye otu afọ site na Mahadum Columbia iji mụọ ma nye aka na ọrụ nlekọta anya na Harlem Hospital
Ọ malitere ịnakọta data gbasara kpuru ìsì na ọhụhụ na ụlọ ọgwụ Harlem, nke na-enweghị ndị dọkịta anya na ndị ọrụ
Ihe omuma ya na oke ochicho ya mere ka ndi prọfesọ ya si Columbia kwenye ka ha malite ịwa ndị ọrịa kpuru ìsì, na-akwụghị ụgwọ, na Harlem Hospital Center
Bath nwere mpako ịnọ na ndị otu Columbia bụ ndị rụrụ ịwa ahụ anya mbụ na Harlem Hospital na Nọvemba afo 1969
Bath jere ozi ebe obibi ya na ophthalmology na Mahadum New York, site na afo 1970 ruo afo 1973, onye America izizi mere ya
Ọ lụrụ di ma mụọ nwa nwanyị Eraka na afo 1972
Mgbe o mechara obibi ya na NYU, Bath malitere mmemme mmekọrịta Corneal na Mahadum Columbia, bụ nke lekwasịrị anya na transplantation corneal na ịwa ahụ keratoprosthesis (afo 1973 ruo afo 1974)
Mgbe ọ bụ onye ibe ya, ma UCLA Jules Stein Eye Institute na Mahadum Charles R
Drew kpọbatara ya ka ọ chọta usoro ebe obibi ophthalmology na Martin Luther King, Jr
Hospital
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Los Angeles, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ dọkịta anya na ngalaba na Jules Stein Eye Institute na UCLA
Mgbe a jụrụ ya onye onye ndụmọdụ ya, Bath zara site n'ikwu na mmekọrịta ya na dibia bekee Dr
Cecil Marquez kpaliri ya ịchụso ọrụ a kpọmkwem
A họpụtara ya osote onye isi nke King-Drew-UCLA Ophthalmology Residency Programme na 1974, ma bụrụ onye isi na afo 1983
N'ụlọ ọrụ abụọ a, Bath ruru n'ọkwa nke prọfesọ osote
Na UCLA, o hiwere Ophthalmic Assistant Training Programme (OATP) na afo 1978
Ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na OATP bụ ndị ọrụ dị mkpa iji nye nyocha, agụmakwụkwọ ahụike, na nkwado maka atụmatụ mgbochi kpuru ìsì
Mgbe na UCLA Jules Stein Eye Institute, Bath guzobere Keratoprosthesis Programme iji nye ọgwụgwọ ịwa ahụ dị elu maka ndị ọrịa kpuru ìsì
Mmemme a na-aga n'ihu taa ka ndị KPRO na ọtụtụ puku ndị ọrịa ejirila teknụzụ ọhụrụ eweghachite anya ha
Dabere na nyocha ya na mmezu ya na keratoprosthesis, a họọrọ Bath ka ọ na-eduzi ọmụmụ ihe mbụ nke keratoprosthesis nke mba na afo 1983
N'afọ 1983, a họpụtara Bath Onye isi oche nke Mmemme obibi Ophthalmology nke KING-DREW-UCLA, bụrụ nwanyị mbụ na US ga-eduzi mmemme obibi ophthalmology
Mgbe ọ nọ na UCLA, Bath chọrọ ịchụso nyocha, ọ bụ ezie na ụlọ ọrụ ahụike mba na National Eye Institute jụrụ inye onyinye na akụrụngwa
Ọ bụ mgbe ahụ ka o kpebiri ịchọkwu ụlọ nyocha kacha mma n'ụwa, iji kwado atụmatụ ya maka imepụta ihe ọhụrụ na ụwa nke ophthalmology
N'afọ 1986, Bath họpụtara ka ọ were ụbọchị izu ikele site na ọrụ nlekọta ahụike na nhazi yana itinye uche na nyocha
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa ya dị ka onye isi oche nke ophthalmology wee soro nchụso nyocha ya dị ka prọfesọ nleta na ụlọ ọrụ kacha mma na France, England na Germany
Na France, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye prọfesọ nleta na Rothschild Eye Institute of Paris na Onye isi, Daniele Aron-Rosa
Na England, ọ jere ozi dị ka prọfesọ nleta na Prọfesọ Emmony na Loughborough Institute of Technology
Na Germany, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye prọfesọ nleta na Mahadum Free Berlin na ebe nlekọta ahụike laser
Na afo 1993, Bath lara ezumike nká na UCLA, nke mechara họpụta ya nwanyị mbụ na ndị ọrụ nsọpụrụ ya
Bath jere ozi dị ka prọfesọ nke ophthalmology na Howard University's School of Medicine na dị ka onye prọfesọ nke telemedicine na ophthalmology na St
Georges University mmemme ọzụzụ ophthalmology
N'ịbụ onye na-akwadosi ike maka telemedicine, Dr
Bath akwadola mmepụta ihe ọhụrụ nke labs mebere, dịka akụkụ nke usoro ọmụmụ na mmemme ọzụzụ ụlọ obibi ophthalmology, iji nye ndị dọkịta na-awa ahụ ahụmahụ dị mma karị, mere site na 3D imaging
N'ime edemede nke Dr

Bath dere, na Journal of Cataract and Refractive Surgery, o gosila na site na ọzụzụ na nlekọta dị mma na mmemme ebe obibi, ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere ike nweta nsonaazụ dị mma na ịwa ahụ ha, na-eduga n'ọhụụ ka ukwuu
Bath agụọla nkuzi na mba ụwa wee dee akwụkwọ karịrị out Nari
Dabere na nlebanya ya na ụlọ ọgwụ Harlem, Bath bipụtara akwụkwọ sayensị mbụ na-egosi oke kpuru ìsì n'etiti ndị isi ojii
Bath chọpụtakwara na ndị Africa America nwere ọrịa glaucoma ji okpukpu asatọ karịa nke na-akpata kpuru ìsì

Dabere na nyocha ya, Bath sụrụ ụzọ ọzụzụ zuru ụwa ọnụ nke 'Ophthalmology Community' na afo 1976 mgbe nyochachara ọnụ ọgụgụ ọrịa na-efe efe nke kpuru ìsì n'etiti ndị na-enweghị ọrụ n'ime obodo mepere emepe na US yana ndị na-enweghị ọrụ na 'nke atọ- ụwa' obodo

A kọwara ophthalmology obodo dị ka ọzụzụ ọhụrụ na ọgwụ na-akwalite ahụ ike anya na mgbochi kpuru site na mmemme na-eji usoro ahụike ọha, ọgwụ obodo na ophthalmology iji weta nlekọta anya dị mkpa nye ndị mmadụ na-enweghị ọrụ
Enwere ike ịhụ mbọ enyemaka Bath bụ isi site na ọrụ ya na American Institute for Prevention of Blindness

Nkwekọrịta na afo 1976 ya na Alfred Cannon, onye America na-ahụ maka mgbaka na onye nhazi obodo, na Aaron Ifekwunigwe, onye na-ahụ maka ụmụaka na Naijiria mụrụ na onye na-akwado ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, e mebere nzukọ a n'ụkpụrụ bụ na 'anya bụ ikike mmadụ' Site na nzukọ a, Bath nwere ike gbasaa nlekọta anya n'ụwa nile site n'inye ụmụ amụrụ ọhụrụ ọgwụ anya n'efu, vitamin maka erighị ihe na-edozi ahụ, na ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa ndị nwere ike ịkpata kpuru ìsì, dị ka measles
Bath nwere ike iji oge ya dị ka onye nduzi na-eme njem n'ụwa na-eme ịwa ahụ, nkuzi na nkuzi na kọleji
Bath na-ekwu na 'oge kacha mma nke onwe ya' bụ mgbe ọ nọ na North Africa na iji keratoprosthesis, nwere ike iweghachi anya otu nwanyị kpuru ìsì ihe karịrị afọ iri ato
Site na nzukọ a, Bath gara Tanzania na afo 2005, ebe cataracts aghọwo ihe na-ebute kpuru ìsì nwata n'oge a
N'Africa, Ụlọ Ọrụ America Maka Mgbochi nke Ìsì nyere kọmputa na ihe ndị ọzọ dijitalụ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ na-ahụ anya, kpọmkwem na Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Mwereni maka ndị ìsì na Tanzania na St
Oda School maka ndị na-ahụ anya na Kenya
A makwara Bath maka ọrụ enyemaka ọ na-arụ na ngalaba nke ophthalmology site n'aka Onye isi ala Barack Obama
Na afo 2009, ya na President Obama nọ na ogbo ma tinye ya na ọrụ ya maka ịnweta dijitalụ maka ụmụaka kpuru ìsì

N'April afo 2019, Bath gbara akaebe na ntị a na-akpọ 'Trailblazers and Lost Einsteins Women Inventors and the Future of American Innovation' na Senate Office Building na Washington DC Ebe a, Bath gosipụtara ọdịiche nwoke na nwanyị na mpaghara STEM na enweghị ndị na-emepụta ihe nwanyị

Na afo 1986, Bath mere nyocha na ụlọ nyocha nke Danièle Aron-Rosa, onye nchọpụta ọsụ ụzọ na lasers na ophthalmology na Rothschild Eye Institute of Paris, na mgbe ahụ na Laser Medical Center na Berlin, ebe o nwere ike ịmalite ọmụmụ ihe mbụ
na ịwa ahụ cataract laser, gụnyere nnwale mbụ ya na fotoablation laser excimer site na iji anya akụ anya mmadụ

Bath chepụtara okwu ahụ bụ 'Laser phaco' maka usoro ahụ, nkenke maka laser PH oto A blative C ataract surgery, wee mepụta laserphaco probe, ngwaọrụ wepụahụike nke na-emeziwanye iji laser cataracts, na 'maka ịwa ahụ
na iwepu anya anya cataract
Bath mbụ nwere echiche maka ụdị ngwaọrụ a na 1981, mana etinyeghị akwụkwọ maka patent ruo ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị
Emechara ngwaọrụ a na 1986 ka Bath mechara nyocha na lasers na Berlin wee nweta ikike na afo 1988, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị America mbụ sitere na Africa nweta patent maka ebumnuche ahụike

Ngwaọrụ - nke ngwa ngwa na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na-enweghị mgbu na-agbaze cataract na laser, na-agba mmiri ma na-ehicha anya ma na-enye ohere ntinye oghere ọhụrụ dị mfe - a na-eji mba ụwa agwọ ọrịa ahụ
Bath gara n'ihu na-emeziwanye ngwaọrụ ahụ ma weghachite ọhụụ nke ọma na ndị na-enweghị ike ịhụ kemgbe ọtụtụ iri afọ
Bath nwere patent ise na United States
Atọ n'ime patent ise nke Bath metụtara nyocha Laserphaco
Na afo 2000, e nyere ya patent maka usoro maka iji ultrasound pulsed wepụ cataracts, na afo 2003 patent maka ijikọta laser na ultrasound iji wepụ cataracts
Bath nwụrụ na Mee 30, 2019, na Mahadum California, San Francisco Medical Center site na nsogbu metụtara ọrịa kansa, dị afọ 76

Bath abụrụla onye otu ndị American College of Surgeons site na 1976 ruo 1989, onye otu American Academy of Ophthalmology, yana onye otu American Society of Cataract and Refractive Surgery na Association for Research in Vision na
Ophthalmology
Bath ejirila mahadum abụọ sọpụrụ ya
Hunter College debere ya na 'ụlọ a ma ama' ya na 1988 na Mahadum Howard kwupụtara na ya 'Howard University Pioneer in Academic Medicine' na 1993
Patricia Bath' nke Julia Finley Mosca dere, nke ma National National kwuru
Ndị Nkụzi Sayensị Sayensị na Ndekọ Akwụkwọ Ọha nke Chicago nke akwụkwọ ụmụaka kacha mma nke afọ
Ọ bụkwa isiokwu nke obere egwuregwu, 'The Prize (banyere Dr
Patricia Bath)' nke Cynthia L
Cooper dere
Ayawavi Djigbodi Patricia Dagban-Zonvidé (amụrụ na ọnwa 17 Machị na afọ 1960 na Lomé) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke mba Togolese
Onye nwere nzere doctorate na akwụkwọ edemede Africa na nke ntụnyere, Dagban-Zonvidé bụ Minista maka ịkwalite ụmụ nwanyị na gọọmentị Arthème Kwesi Séléagodji Ahoomey-Zunu
Kemgbe afọ 2013, ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke atọ nke National Assembly of Togo
A mụrụ Patricia Dagban-Zonvide na ọnwa 17 Machị na afọ 1960 na Lomé ma gaa Tokoin High School
O nwere nzere bachelọ na masta na akwụkwọ ozi nke oge a site na Mahadum National nke Ivory Coast na nzere masta na mpaghara okpomọkụ site na Machị Benin
Site na afọ 1982 ọ kụziri na Moderne College na Dabou, Ivory Coast na ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwoke na Bingerville
Ọ laghachiri Togo mgbe afọ iri gachara mba ọzọ iji kụzie na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na International Center for Research and Language Studies (CIREL)
Ọ gụrụ maka nzere doctorate na akwụkwọ edemede Africa na nke ntụnyere na Mahadum Lomé ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ dị ka osote prọfesọ nke nka na ọdịmma mmadụ na mahadum ahụ
Dagban-Zonvide lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
A họpụtara Dagban-Zonvide ka ọ bụrụ Minista maka Ọganihu nke Ụmụ nwanyị na July 2012 na Faure Gnassingbé's Union for the Republic government
Ọ nabatara ọrụ ahụ n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro na 1 Ọgọstụ 2012, n'ememe iwu ya na minista na-apụ apụ Henriette Kouévi-Amédjogbé
Dagban-Zonvide nọ n'elu ndepụta nke Lomé maka ntuli aka July 2013 mana ewepụrụ ya n'ọkwa minista na Septemba nke afọ ahụ
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Eprel na afọ 2015 ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke atọ nke National Assembly
Patricia Olubunmi Foluke Etteh (a mụrụ na 17 August 1953) bụ onye isi oche nke ndị nnọchi anya ụlọ nke Naijiria site na June ruo Ọktọba 2007
Etteh, onye Yoruba, gara mmụta dika onye ọrụ n'edozi isi na mma
o mechara nweta nzere oka iwu na Mahadum Bukingham na United Kingdom
N'afo 2016 ka ọ banyere n'otu Ndi oka iwu nke Naijiria
Etteh na-anọchite ndị Ayedaade/Isokan/Irewole dị na steeti Osun
A họpụtara ya na 1999 dịka onye otu Alliance for Democracy (AD), mana ọ hapuru ha sonye ndi People's Democratic Party (PDP) mgbe ọ na-azọ ọkwa ọzọ na 2003
A họpụtara ya dika onye isi oche nke ndị nnọchi anya ụlọ nke Naijiria na June 2017
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị nwetụrụ ọnọdụ dị otú a na Naịjirịa

Na Septemba 2007, a kpooro ya na kọmitii nke ndị omeiwu maka ebubo na o nyere ikike ka e mefu nde narị naịra isii na iri abụọ na asatọ (ihe dị ka nde ise n'ego ndi Amerika) iji rụzigharịa ụlọ obibi ya na nke onye deputị ya, na ịzụrụ ụgbọ-ala gọọmentị iri na abụọ maka ulo ndị omeiwu na Naijeria
Ruo taa, enwetabeghị akwụkwọ iwu n'okwu a
Ndi PDP gara n’ihu ịkwado Etteh, mana ụfọdụ ndị otu, dị ka Isyaku Ibrahim, kwuru okwu megide omume ya
Onye edemede na agụmakwụkwọ bụ Wole Soyinka so na ndị kpọrọ oku ka ọ hapu ọkwa onye isi ndi oulo omeiwu, mana onye bụbu onye isi ala na onye otu PDP Olusegun Obasanjo gara n’ihu ịkwado ya
Na October 30, Etteh, na deputị ya gbara arụkwaghịm
Patricia Francourt bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ na Seychelles na-eje ozi dị ka Minista na-ahụ Maka Ọrụ na Ọha na Eze
Amurụ ya iyi n'ụbọchị 3 Nọvemba 2020
Patricia Fresen (amụrụ ya na 7 Disemba 1940) bụ onye odee South Africa, onye ọkà mmụta okpukpe Katọlik, na onye bụbu nọn
Ndị mụrụ ya si Jamanị na Ireland
Mgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ gasịrị, Fresen ghọrọ onye otu Dominican Order
Fresen gụrụ nkà mmụta okpukpe, nkuzi na asụsụ wee bụrụ onye nkuzi
E zigara Fresen na Rom ka ọ mụọ nkà mmụta okpukpe
O mechara rụọ ọrụ na Pretoria na ụlọ akwụkwọ seminarị Katọlik dị ka onye nkuzi na Homiletics, nkà mmụta okpukpe na usoro ime mmụọ
O wee kuzie ihe na St Augustine's Kọlegi na Johannesburg
Bishọp Romulo Antonio Braschi mere emume nchichi maka Fresen na Barcelona n'afọ 2003

Òtù Na-ahụ Maka Ozizi nke Okwukwe enyebuola iwu na 'mgbalị echichi ụmụ nwanyị' nke Romulo Braschi bụ ihe efu na, n'ihi ya, matara ntaramahụhụ nke ịchụpụ ya na ndị natara ya echichi n'ihi ihe ndị gụnyere gụnyere
'mgbalị ichichi' yana isonye na schism

Ya na ndị edemede German na ndị ọkà mmụta okpukpe Gisela Forster na Ida Raming, Fresen bụ onye isi nke nzukọ mba ụwa 'Roman Catholic Womenpriests International', nke na-akwalite ichichi ụmụ nwanyị dịka ndị ụkọchukwu Katọlik; A naghị anabata ichi ụmụ nwanyị ugbu a n'ime Ụka Katọlik

Patricia del Carmen George (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 18 n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1996) bụ onye Amerịka amụrụ na Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara otu Frauen-Bundesliga club SC Sand na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa bọọlụ
A zụlitere George na Chicago, Illinois
Nna mụrụ bụ onye Naijiria ebe nne ya bụ onye Venezuela
George gara Von Steuben Metropolitan High School na Chicago na Mahadum nke Illinois na Urbana-Champaign
George agbaala bọọlụ na BV Cloppenburg na SC Sand na Germany
Site na ọmụmụ na nzụlite, George ruru eru igwu egwu maka United States, Venezuela ma ọ bụ Nigeria

O mere nke mbụ ya maka nke ikpeazụ na 18 Febụwarị 2021 dị ka onye nnọchi nke ọkara nke abụọ megide klọb CSKA Moscow nke Russia na mbipụta afọ ahụ nke Turkish Women's Cup Ngosipụta mbụ ya na-eche ndị otu mba ọzọ ihu bụ ụbọchị abụọ ka e mesịrị megide Uzbekistan
Nwanne George nke tọrọ ya bụ Regina George bụ onye na-agba ọsọ Olympic maka Naịjirịa
Patricia Wangechi Kihoro (a mụrụ na 4 Jenụwarị 1986) bụ onye Kenya na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye redio na onye telivishọn
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe o sonyere na oge nke atọ nke Tusker Project Fame, ebe ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị ikpeazụ
N'ime ihe nkiri, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri obodo dịka ihe nkiri afọ 2011, Miss Nobody, nke mere ka a họpụta ya n'afọ 2012 Kalasha Awards maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ihe nkiri

Na mmepụta telivishọn, a họpụtara ya dịka onye ndu na Groove Theory, ihe nkiri egwu na dịka onye na-ahụkarị na Demigods, Changes, Rush na Makutano Junction Dịka onye na-egosi redio, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na One FM na Homeboyz FM
Patricia bụ onye okike ọdịnaya, onye na-emetụta na youtuber
Kihoro, onye a mụrụ na Jenụwarị 1986 ma zụlite na isi obodo Kenya bụ Nairobi, gara Shepherd's Junior Primary School maka ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya ma mesịa kwaga Moi Girls 'High School, Nairobi
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ọkwa O, ọ debara aha na Mahadum Moi na ụlọ akwụkwọ sayensị na akparamaagwa
Mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum Moi, ọ họọrọ nyocha maka oge nke atọ nke Tusker Project FamePatricia bụ onye youtuber nke ọ na-akọrọ ezigbo ahụmịhe ndụ ya nke njem njem na usoro ime ihe
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2009, Kihoro nyochara maka asọmpi ịbụ abụ Tusker Project Fame
N'afọ 2010, e gosipụtara ya na vidiyo egwu maka egwu Just a Band bụ Ha-he nke lekwasịrị anya na dike Makmende ma dọta uche ụwa
N'afọ 2011, ọ gbara Pet Nanjala na usoro ihe nkiri Changes N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri ahụ, Miss Nobody nke mere ka a họpụta ya na 2011 Kalasha Awards maka 'Lead Actress in Film'
N'afọ 2012, a họpụtara ya dịka otu n'ime ndị isi na ihe nkiri egwu Groove Theory
O gosipụtara Biscuit, Zamm's (nke Kevin Maina gosipụtara) mmasị ịhụnanya, na akụkọ nke gbara ndụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ise na Mahadum Victoria
N'afọ 2013, ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi The Fattening Room, nke mere ka ndị otu ya na ya nyochaa omenala na ọdịnala nke ndị Efik na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya dịka Nana, onye nchịkọta akụkọ dị afọ iri abụọ na asatọ na usoro, Rush Ọ gbara egwu ya na Janet Mbugua, Wendy Kimani, Wendy Sankale na Maryanne Nundo
N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara Kihoro dịka nwa nwanyị Maqbul Mohammed na usoro, Makutano Junction
N'afọ 2018, Kihoro rụrụ ọrụ nke Josephine, nwa ọhụrụ na-alụ ọhụrụ nke otu n'ime nna ndị isi, na ihe nkiri Rafiki a ma ama ma na-ese okwu
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ahụ maka redio
Patricia Kombo bụ onye na-eme ngagharị iwe maka ihu igwe na Kenya
A maara ya nke ọma maka atụmatụ ịkụ osisi ya dị ka akụkụ nke PaTree Initiative na-enweghị uru
Omume a akụwo ihe karịrị osisi 10,000 ka ọ na-erule afọ 2020
Maka ọrụ a, a na-akpọ Kombo United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification Land Hero
Kombo sitere na Mbooni, Makueni County
Kombo gụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na Mahadum Moi
N'afọ 2022, ọ gbara ndị isi ụwa aka n'oge mmeghe nke Nzukọ Ndị otu na Mgbakọ Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu Maka Ịlụso Desertification na Côte d'Ivoire
Patricia Lewis (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1967) bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn
E wepụtara abọm izizi nke Lewis, Don't Tempt Me n'afọ 1992
'Ek Is Lief Vir Jou' nke ewepụtara n'afọ 1997, nke nwetara ntepu ahịa otu puku narị na iri abụọ na ise
A kwụrụ Patricia ụgwọ dịka onye egwu nke mbụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke egwu South Africa nke nwere ike nweta ọnụ ọgụgụ ahịa dị otua
'Wie Sou Jou Kon Liefhê Soos Ek' ruru ọkwa ọla edo n'ụbọchị a tọhapụrụ ya n'afọ 1997
Lewis esonyela ọtụtụ ndị ama ama n'obodo mee ihe ngosi na mba ụwa, ndị gụnyere David Hasselhoff, Kurt Darren, Bles Bridges na Jim Reeves
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, abọm ya eruola ihe karịrị narị puku isii na ahịa niile
ọnwa Septemba afọ 2021 Patricia wepụtara egwu 'comeback' nke mbụ ya n'ime afọ iri na otu nke a na-akpọ Hello Hello, Ek het jou gemis nke ọtụtụ ajụjụ ọnụ nke redio na South Africa na Namibia sochiri
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ n'ịme ihe ngosi nlereanya, Lewis gara n'ihu na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn dị iche iche, yana ihe nkiri mba ụwa ya na Oliver Reed
O gosipụtala n' ihe omume telivishọn dị iche iche, dị ka SABC 2 reality series Blonde Ambisie na Toyota Top 20
Lewis bụ onye cheputara mmalite nke asọmpi egwu Supersterre, oge nke atọ nke gosipụtara n'afọ 2010
N'afọ 2009, a chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa kansa, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ lara ezumike nká
Mgbe afọ anọ gasịrị, Lewis laghachiri na telivishọn dị ka onye so asọ mpi na asọmpi na mbipụta ama ama nke MasterChef South Africa na mbido afọ 2015
Ọ bụkwa onye so sọọ mpi na asọmpi oge nke atọ nke Strictly Come Dancing n'afọ 2007
Patricia ga-abụ onye ọbịa na oge nke ise nke KykNET's Republiek van Zoid Afrika

A mụrụ Lewis na Transvaal, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mondeor High School n'afọ 1985, nke bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na-asụ Bekee nke dị na mpaghara ndịda nke Johannesburg, ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị a maara ọ gara bụ Aloe Ridge Primary na Mondeor Primary School Ọ bụbu onye na-eme egwuregwu mmega ahụ
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2003, Lewis lụrụ Mark Whitfield, onye ya na ya mụtara nwa nwoke, bụ Max
Patricia na ezinụlọ ya hapụrụ ndụ obodo ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike maka ndụ dị jụụ n'afọ 2007, o si Gauteng kwaga Ballito
Patricia kwụsịrị ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ ka ọ bụrụ nne nwere ohere nye nwa ya nwoke Max na uzo nkwado nye di ya Mark
N'afọ 2020, Patricia kpebiri na ọ chọrọ iwepụta abọm ọhụrụ maka nne ya nwụrụ anwụ Linda Lewis na nna ya Patrick Lewis mana mmechi ahụ mere na obere oge nne Patricia nwụnahụrụ ya n'ihi ọrịa Alzheimer
N'afọ 2021 Patricia, Mark na nwa ha nwoke Max ekpebiela n'ihi ọchịchọ a ma ama, oge eruola ka Patricia pụtakwa ọzọ n'ogbọ egwu ma ọ wuoro ya ụlọ studio ebe o dekọrọ egwu mbụ ya n'ime afọ iri na anọ
Patricia Mantey (amụrụ na 27 na onwa Septemba, na afọ 1992) o bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ dịka onye na-edebe goolu maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Ghana
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na 2014 African Women's Championship
Na klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Immigration Accra na Ghana
N'afọ 2020, ọ bịanyere aka na NWFL Premiership, Rivers Angels FC
Patricia Obo-Nai bụ onye injinia Ghana, onye Ghana mbụ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Vodafone Ghana
Nhọpụta ya na 19 February 2019 malitere na 1 Eprel 2019
Ọ bụ onye otu Ghana Institution of Engineers, (GHIE) na kọmitii onye isi nke Vodafone
Na Mee 2021, akpọrọ aha ya n'etiti ndị isi ụmụ nwanyị 50 kacha nwee mmetụta na Africa n'ime ụlọ ọrụ na azụmaahịa site n'aka Leading Ladies Africa
Patricia Poku-Diaby bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego Ghana, onye ahịa koko na onye isi oche nke Plot Enterprise Ghana Limited
N'afọ 2015, a kpọrọ ya onye nke asatọ kasị baa ọgaranya na Ghana na nwanyị kacha baa ọgaranya na Ghana, nwere ọnụ ahịa ruru nde nde dọla narị asaa na ịrị abụọ
Ọ bụ onye tọrọ ntọala ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke Plot Enterprise Group, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta koko na Ghana
Tupu Patricia Poku-Diaby amalite Plot Enterprise Group, ọ na-etinye aka na azụmahịa ezinụlọ ya (ịzụ ahịa na njem) tupu o guzobe Plot Enterprise Group na Ivory Coast, site na ụlọ ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ Ghana ya
Patricia Renee' Thomas (amụrụ n'afọ 1995) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ese foto, na ónyé nkụzi nka nke bi na Philadelphia
Patricia Renee 'Thomas gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Tyler School of Art
Ọ natara Masters ya na Fine Arts site na Mahadum nké Pennsylvania's Weitzman School of Design na asambodo na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọrụ mbụ Thomas na-enyocha isiokwu nke ịma mma na ihe osise ọdịda anyanwụ mgbè ọ na-ezo aka n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ojii
Ka ọrụ ahụ na-agbasawanye, Patricia na-ele ányà na ihe ndị ọ hụrụ na ihe nketa, na-akpọghachi nwa agbọghọ Black ya ka ọ degharịa ihe ncheta ma mepụta ohere màkà ntụgharị uche na ezumike
Ọrụ Thomas na-ezo aka na mgbasa ozi ogologo ógè nke iji oji na mmekọrịta ahụ na mmegbu akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị Africa America
Thomas bụ ónyé nkụzi na-ese ihe na eserese ugbu a na Mahadum Temple's Tyler School of Art and Architecture Continuing Education
Ọ bụkwa ónyé nkụzi nka màrà mma ugbu a na Church of the Advocate na North Philadelphia
Patricia Resnick bụ onye America na-ede ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe, mara maka ọrụ ya na fim dị ka 9 ruo 5, Okwu kwụ ọtọ, na Maxie
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ndụmọdụ ma ọ bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na usoro TV dị ka Mad Men na Ihe Ka Mma
Ọ zutere Robert Altman mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Southern California wee malite ọrụ ya na-arụ ọrụ na ya na fim 3 Women
Ya na Altman rụkọrọ ọrụ ọtụtụ oge, malite na ịzụlite ụmụ nwanyị 3
O mechara pụta dị ka onwe ya na otu n'ime ihe nkiri ya, The Player
Otu n'ime nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma ya bịara na 9 ruo 5 Resnick dere ihe nkiri nke mbụ, Jane Fonda tụbara onwe ya, Lily Tomlin, na Dolly Parton na ndị ndu, nke ikpeazụ na ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya
Resnick jere ozi dị ka onye edemede na ọtụtụ usoro ihie onyonyo, yana onye na-ahụ maka ndị na-emepụta ihe na oge ikpeazụ nke Mad Men
O nwetara nhọpụta Tony maka egwu nke 9 ruo 5, nke ya na Dolly Parton dere gbara ọsọ na Broadway na 2009 na nso a bụ nnukwu ihe egwu na West End na London
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na usoro nke 9 ruo 5 n'akụkụ Rashida Jones
Patricia S
Cowings (amuru Disemba 15, afo 1948) bu onye okachamara n'ime ikuku
Ọ bụ nwanyị America mbụ nke NASA zụrụ dịka onye na-enyocha mbara igwe; n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ onye ọzọ maka ụgbọ elu mbara igwe na afo 1979, ọ garaghị mbara igwe
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọmụmụ ihe ya na physiology nke ndị na-enyocha mbara igwe na mbara mbara igwe, yana inyere aka ịchọta ọgwụgwọ maka ọrịa ngagharị nke ndị mbara igwe
A mụrụ ma zụlite Cowings na The Bronx, New York City na Disemba 15, afo 1948
Ọ bụ naanị nwa nwanyị Sadie B
na Albert S
Cowings
Sadie bụ osote onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara
Albert bụ onye nwe ụlọ ahịa ihe nri
O nwere ụmụnne nwoke atọ ọzọ bụ́ ndị gara n'ihu ịghọ ọchịagha kpakpando abụọ, onye na-agụ egwú jazz, na onye nta akụkọ nwere onwe ya
Ndị mụrụ ya kwusiri ike na agụmakwụkwọ dị ka 'ụzọ isi na Bronx pụta'
Patricia chọtara ịhụnanya ya maka sayensị mgbe ọ ka dị obere
Patricia tinyere aka na ịgba egwu na steepụ nke Africa wee gụchaa nzere bachelọ na nka nka na Mahadum steeti New York na Stony Brook na afo 1970
Psychology na mgbe e mesịrị psychophysiology gosiri ya otú e si welie mmadụ ikike

'Olee ubi dị mma karịa ịmụ anụmanụ nke kere ubi ndị ọzọ niile? Ụmụ mmadụ!' Enyemaka ịhụnanya a gara n'ihu site n'aka nwanne nne ya ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ, bụ onye ọ chere na ọ bụ mkpali miri emi n'ihi na ọ nwetala PhD na Mahadum California na Davis na afo 1973
Ị nweta klas injinịa na ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ebe o so na-arụ ọrụ ụgbọ elu nyere aka malite ọchịchọ ya ịrụ ọrụ na ngalaba nke teknụzụ oghere
O mere ọtụtụ nyocha ya na NASA Ames Research Center

N'ebe ahụ, ọ malitere ma chepụta usoro ọzụzụ ahụike nke a na-akpọ Autogenic-Feedback Training Exercise (AFTE), nke na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka ịmụta njide onwe onye nke afọ 24 nzaghachi anụ ahụ n'ime awa isii
A nwalere ọrụ ya nke mbụ na afo 1985 maka (STS 51-b & STS 51c) Spacelab-3 na ọrụ ụgbọ ala DOD mbụ
Ọ nwalere usoro ọzụzụ AFTE ya na Space J-Lab Mission (ọrụ ụgbọ ala Japan mbụ), na-arụ ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya n'ikpochapụ ọrịa ngagharị nke onye na-enyocha mbara igwe
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ zụrụ ndị cosmonauts anọ iji chịkwaa ma ọrịa ngagharị na ọbara mgbali elu ka ọnwa isii nọrọ na mbara igwe n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu MIR

Ọ nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma na usoro biofeedback ya wee gaa n'ihu na-akụziri ndị mmadụ otu esi achịkwa ọrịa ngagharị, melite arụmọrụ nke ndị na-anya ụgbọ elu na-achọ & nnapụta, na ibelata mgbaàmà nke ọtụtụ ndị ọrịa na-ata ahụhụ site na ọgbụgbọ, dizziness na nkụda mmụọ
O nyerela di ya, Dr
William B
Toscano aka ode akwụkwọ ọtụtụ akwụkwọ
Ha nwere nwa nwoke, Christopher Michael Cowings Toscano, onye so ha na-eme njem ka ha na-azụ ndị ọrụ mbara igwe
Taa, ọ na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ya na-enyere aka igbochi ọrịa ngagharị maka ndị na-enyocha mbara igwe na mbara igwe, yana inye aka ịchịkwa ọrịa ngagharị maka ịlaghachi n'ụlọ ha
Ọ bụ onye isi nyocha nke Psychophysiological Research Laboratories na NASA Ames Research Center ma nweekwa prọfesọ ọzọ na Psychiatry na UCLA yana ma ahụike na ahụike ahụike na mahadum ọrụ edo edo
(ARC)

Patricia de Lille (née Lindt; Amụrụ na 17 Febụwarị 1951) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ọha na eze na akụrụngwa ugbu a na onye ndú nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Good
Ọ bụbu onye isi obodo Cape Town site n'afọ 2011 ruo afọ 2018, na Western Cape Provincial Minister of Social Development site n'afọ 2010 ruo afọ 2011
O guzobere ma duzie ndị Independent Democrats (ID), otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke o guzobere n'afọ 2003 n'oge windo na-agafe ala, mgbe ọ hapụrụ Pan Africanist Congress (PAC)
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2010, ID jikọtara ya na Democratic Alliance, ndị na-emegide South Africa, ma gbasaa otu ahụ n'ụzọ iwu n'afọ 2014
Site n'afọ 2015 ruo afọ 2017, ọ bụ onye isi mpaghara nke Democratic Alliance na Western Cape
Patrica N
Ndogu bu otu onye Pan-African Parliament shi na Nigeria
Patrick Awuah Jr
(amụrụ n'afọ 1965) bụ onye injinia Ghana, onye nkuzi, na onye ọchụnta ego
Awuah guzobere Mahadum Ashesi na 2002
Awuah enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite dịka onye ọ bụla na onye guzobere Mahadum Ashesi
Awuah tolitere na Accra, Ghana
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Achimota ebe ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ
Ọ kwagara United States n'afọ 1985 ịga Swarthmore College na agụmakwụkwọ zuru oke
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Engineering na Economics, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1989
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Awuah rụrụ ọrụ dị ka injinia ngwanrọ na onye njikwa mmemme maka Microsoft site na 1989 ruo 1997
Na Microsoft, ọ zutere nwunye ya n'ọdịnihu, injinia nyocha ngwanrọ Rebecca Awuah
N'afọ 1997, Awuah hapụrụ Microsoft na ebumnuche nke ịlaghachi Ghana iji kụziere ọgbọ ọzọ nke ndị isi Afrịka
Ọ debara aha na Haas School of Business na UC Berkeley, na-elekwasị anya n'ọrụ ya na ịkwadebe atụmatụ azụmahịa maka Ashesi
Awuah, Nina Marini, na ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Berkeley gara Ghana ime nyocha maka imeghe mahadum nkeonwe n'ebe ahụ
Awuah gụsịrị akwụkwọ na MBA ya na 1999
N'otu afọ ahụ, ya na ezinụlọ ya laghachiri Ghana iji chọta Mahadum Ashesi Awuah nọgidere na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Mahadum Ashesi
John Kufuor nyere Awuah Order of the Volta Award iji mata onyinye ya na agụmakwụkwọ dị elu na Ghana n'afọ 2007
N'afọ 2009, Awuah ritere ihe nrite John P
McNulty
N'afọ 2010, ụlọ ọrụ Fast Company nyere Awuah onye ọchụnta ego nke iri asatọ na asaa
N'afọ 2014, ọ natara The Elise and Walter A
Haas International Award, nke na-asọpụrụ ụmụ akwụkwọ UC Berkeley na ndekọ dị iche iche nke ọrụ na obodo ha
N'otu afọ ahụ, Schwab Foundation for Social Entrepreneurship kpọrọ ya onye ọchụnta ego kacha mma
N'afọ 2015, Fortune depụtara Awuah dị ka nọmba 40 n'ime ndị isi 50 kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa ma nye ya MacArthur Fellowship
N'afọ 2017, e nyere Awuah ihe nrite World Innovation Summit for Education (WISE), nnukwu onyinye agụmakwụkwọ zuru ụwa ọnụ
Àtụ External video

Patrick Chukwuka Onyejiaka (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ịrị na asaa n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 2000), onye a maara dịka Patrick Chuka ma ọ bụ ArtistChuka, bụ onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria nke jị icheku ọkụ na pen ballpoint na-arụ oru
Ọ na-ejikwa mmanụ, pastel na acrylic ese ihe, na-elekwasị anya na nka ya na eziokwu na akụkụ ụfọdụ nke hyperrealism
A mụrụ Chuka na Victoria Island, Lagos Steeti n'ime ezinụlọ mmadụ anọ, ebe ọ bụ nwa mbụ
Ọ bụ onye Abba, Nwangele, Imo State, Nigeria
N'ihi nsogbu ezinụlọ mgbe ọ na-etolite, ezinụlọ ya kwagara ọtụtụ ebe, na-amanye ya ịgbanwe site n'otu ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị gaa na nke ọzọ

Site na 2010 ruo 2011, ọ gara Federal Government College, Odogbolu, Ogun State, Nigeria maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, ọ kwagara Top Highflyer College, Isolo, Lagos State, site na 2012 ruo 2014, tupu ọ kwaga ọzọ na Weenoble International School, Ejigbo, Lagos State, ebe o mechara gụchaa na 2015
Ọ malitere ime nka mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ozugbo ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Chuka mechara kwaga United States ya na ezinụlọ ya na 2018
Ugbu a, ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ nke Berkeley City College, Berkeley, California, USA, ebe ọ na-amụ Biology
Chuka jị icheku ọkụ na pen ballpoint arụ ọrụ
Ọ na-ese ihe na mmanụ, pastel, acrylic ma na-akpụ ihe
Ọ dọọrọ uche gaa n'isiokwu ndị na-aga n'ihu dịka feminism, ikike alụmdi na nwunye maka ndị na-eto eto, ikike LGBTQ na ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na nka ya
N'afọ 2018, ọ kọwara ihe mere o ji ewe iwe mgbe ọ na-agụ Bible
Ọ katọrọ Solomọn maka ịrịọ Chineke maka Amamihe
Na 16 Jenụwarị 2018, Chuka nwere eserese ya a gụnyere na Brittle Paper na '14 An Anthology of Queer Art, Vol
2 The Inward Gaze'

Patrick Dougher bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, onye na-eti egwu, na onye na-agwọ ọrịa nka nke amụrụ na King's County Hospital ma zụlite na Brooklyn, New York, na-etolite na mpaghara Bushwick ruo mgbè ọ dị afọ 10
E gosipụtara ya na usoro Humans of New York
Dougher malitere ịkpọ ụbọ akwara mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na asaá ma rụọ ọrụ ma dekọọ dị ka ónyé na-akụ ụbọ
Ọ na-egwuri egwu na ndị egwu ska Boilers na Toasters, na-egere Sade, na-edekọ ya na Easy Star All-Stars, ma na-egwú na CBGB, Roxy, Webster Hall, na ebe ndị ọzọ
Dị ka ónyé na-agwọ ọrịa nka, Dougher na ụmụaka na-arịa ọrịa HIV na AIDS na King's County Hospital na mbido afọ 2000

Dị ka ónyé nkuzi, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ndị ntorobịa na Ngalaba Mmụta nke New York City na dị ka onye na-akụzi ihe na Project Reach na Studio na ụlọ akwụkwọ; ọ na-eje ozi dị ka ónyé nduzi nkụzi maka BRIC Arts Media
Dougher rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpà na 'Brooklyn 63,' nke Ping Chong 651 Arts mepụtara na 2014
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ede uri, na-eji uri ya akatọ mmepe nke mpaghara Brooklyn
Ọrụ nka Dougher malitere mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii na New York City, n'oge ngwụcha afọ 1970, dị ka ónyé na-enyere aka na SoHo
A maara ya nke ọma maka 'Art Cans' ya, nkè na-eji ite aluminum dị larịị ma na-adabere na nka ọdịnala Afrịka yana nka Xerox
Patrick Epaphra Ngowi bụ onye ọchụnta ego nke Tanzania, onye ọchụnta ego, onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, onye ndu mgbanwe ihu igwe nke Al Gore na United Nation's SDG 7 Pioneer
Patrick hiwere ma duzie ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ n'oge ọrụ ya
Ngowi malitere azụmahịa mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise mgbe ọ malitere ire akwụkwọ ikike kachasị elu maka ekwentị mkpanaaka na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Ngowi mere njem n'etiti China na Tanzania wee weghachite ekwentị ndị na-ewu ewu na ndị dị ọnụ ala, wee malite ịzụta ekwentị ndị dị ọnụ ala site n'aka ndị na-emepụta ọnụ ala ma na-ere ha n'ahịa Tanzania
Ọ debara aha na Mahadum Denzhou dị na China, na-amụ banyere ike ọhụrụ
Patrick Ngowi hiwere Helvetic Solar na 2007 iji nye ma wụnye ngwá ọrụ anyanwụ na Tanzania na United States
E nyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ KPMG's No
1 nke Top 100 Mid Sized Companies na Tanzania Award na 2012
Kemgbe ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ aghọwo otu azụmahịa dị iche iche, nke ọ bụ onye isi oche
Forbes gụnyere Ngowi na ndepụta ya nke 30 under 30 Africa's Best Young Entrepreneurs na ndepụta Forbes nke Young African Millionaires to Watch na 2013
E depụtara ya ọzọ na ndepụta 2014 nke ndị ọchụnta ego na-eto eto kachasị mma n'Africa site na Helvetic Group
Forbes na CNBC kpọkwara ya dịka onye isi azụmahịa na-eto eto nke East Africa nke afọ 2014
Ngowi enweela ọtụtụ ọrụ ikwu okwu na ihe omume mba ụwa ma na 2015 a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke United Nations Global Compact na Tanzania

Otu afọ ka e mesịrị, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations kwupụtara na Ngowi bụ otu n'ime United Nation's Sustainable Development Goals (SGDs) Global 10 Pioneers, ịbụ onye ọsụ ụzọ n'inye ohere ịnweta ike dị ọcha, SDG 7
Ngowi bụ onye guzobere Light for Life Foundation, ụlọ ọrụ na-abaghị uru nke na-elekwasị anya n'inye ndị ntorobịa na ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ime ime obodo na mpaghara Tanzania
Patrick Earl Hammie (amụrụ na úbọchị irí abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba, 1981) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nkírí na ónyé nkụzi nke a maara nke ọma màkà nnukwu ihe osise ya na ihe osise efu nke ihe atụ
Ihe osise Hammie na-ekwusi ike na mmegharị, agba, na agụụ mmekọahụ, na-esite na akụkọ nka na ọdịbendị anya iji nyochaa echiche metụtara ọdịbendị, nwoke, ịma mma, na mmekọahụ
Hammie bi na Champaign, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye nkuzi Prọfesọ na Mahadum Illinois Urbana-Champaign

A mụrụ Hammie na New Haven, Connecticut, ma zụlite ya na West Haven, nne ya bụ Carolyn (née Harrison), onye na-arụ ọrụ switchboard lara ezumike nká, na nnà ya bụ Ervin Hammie Jr, onye agha Vietnam, onye isi, na onye na-eli ozu
Dị ka nwatakịrị, Hammie malitere ịgba mgbá ma bụrụ ónyé North American Sports Karate Association họpụtara na mpaghara ya
Ọ zụlitere mmasị na nka anya mgbè ọ malitere ịdọrọ ihe odide site na akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị na ihe ngosi telivishọn
Nné na nnà Hammie kwadoro ya n'akụkụ abụọ ahụ, na-eweta ya na asọmpi karate ma na-agba ya ume ịgbasawanye ihe osise ya iji tinye ndụ na ala
Mgbè ọ dị afọ itoolu, Hammie na ndị mụrụ ya kwagara Hartsville, South Carolina
Nné na nnà ya kewara mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na atọ ma ya na nna ya laghachiri Connecticut ịga West Haven High School, ebe ọ na-egwu bọọlụ ma na-eme ihe na ndị ukwe
Nna Hammie nwụrụ na 1999, obéré ógè Hammie gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Hammie gara Coker College ma mụọ ihe osise studio, ébé ọ nwetara BA na 2004
Hammie rụrụ ọrụ n'onwe ya dị ka ónyé na-ese foto ruo afọ abụọ tupu ọ laghachi New England iji mụọ na Mahadum Connecticut, ébé ọ natara MFA ya na 2008
Ojiji Hammie na-eji ọnụ ọgụgụ, nkwupụta, na ihe na-emetụ n'ahụ na-echetara mmegharị ahụ nke ógè Baroque na Romantic
E jirila ụdị ya tụnyere nke Rubens

A na-akọwa ọrụ Hammie site na itinye aka na akụkọ ihe méré eme nkè eserese, ọkachasị iji ihe atụ mee ihe iji gosipụta usoro ike, usoro ajụjụ nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na ịkpa ókè nwoke na nwanyị, ma nyochaa otú ndị na-ese ihe nwoke si chee echiche na ndị gba ọtọ

Kemgbe ọ malitere na 2009, Hammie raara ọrụ ya nyé ihe osise ọdịnala, na-enyocha ihe osise, teknụzụ, na akụkọ nkè nka ọdịda anyanwụ, na-emepụta ihe osise nke na-enye nsogbụ na Canon dị ugbu a ma na-enyochaa akụkụ dị oke egwu nke okike na agbụrụ taa
Hammie na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa na studio, na-ese ihe site na ndụ na foto
Ihe Hammie na-elekwasị anya na-abụkarị onwé ya na ndị mmadụ na ndụ ya ndị enyi, ezinụlọ, na ndị na-ese ihe ibe ya
Egwú bụ isi na ọrụ okike ya
Ọ na-ekwu na Bjork, Oddisee, na Daft Punk dị ka òtù egwu ọ na-ege ntị mgbè ọ na-arụ ọrụ
E nyela Hammie ihe Nríte na onyinye site na Alliance of Artists Communities na Joyce Foundation, Indianapolis Art Center, Tanne Foundation, Mahadum Illinois, Wellesley College, na Zhou B Art Center
Patrick Mofokeng (a mụrụ na 15 June 1969) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Invictus, Who Am I? na Master Haroldand the Boys
A mụrụ ya na 15 June 1969 na Cape Town, South Africa
O mechara kwaga Johannesburg
Mana mgbe afọ ole na ole gasịrị, ọ laghachiri na Cape Town
Ọ gụsịrị diplọma na Drama na Speech na CAP Arts School na Cape Town
N'afọ 1997, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri TV Pride of Africa
N'afọ 1998, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Jackie Chan bụ Who Am I ebe ọ rụrụ obere ọrụ dịka 'Village Hunter'
N'afọ 2008, o mere ihe nkiri Surprise ma rụọ ọrụ 'Gerald Judge'
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ meriri Golden Horn Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na TV Drama maka ọrụ ya na The Provider n'afọ 2007
O nwetakwara ihe nrite maka ihe nkiri TV kacha mma maka usoro ihe nkiri When we were black
N'afọ 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'King Sibiya' na ihe nkiri telivishọn Zone 14
Ọrụ ahụ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama
Ewezuga nke ahụ, ọ pụtara na ndị ọbịa na usoro telivishọn Backstage na Yizo Yizo, Scandal!, na Isidingo
N'ihe nkiri Scandal! a ma ama, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Mlungisi Ngema'
O mekwara ihe nkiri nke abụọ The Good Provider n'afọ 2006, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka 'Solomon Sithole'
N'afọ 2011, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado nke 'Jimmy' na oge nke iri na otu nke usoro ihe nkiri SABC1 AIDS Soul City N'afọ 2020, ọ pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri Netflix nke South Africa Blood & Water

Patrick Oketch bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri nke a maara maka igwu Charlie na usoro ihe nkiri Citizen TV Mother-in-Law O gosikwara Field Ruwe na obere ihe nkiri afọ 2015 Intellectual Scum A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1981 na Mathare Slums, Patrick bụ onye nkuzi a zụrụ azụ ugbu a na-achọ nzere na Theatre Studies na Film Technology na Mahadum Kenyatta
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ede edemede na onye nchịkọta ederede maka ihe ngosi MaEmpress na Maisha Magic
Patrick Okonkwo (a mụrụ n'ọnwa Eprel 23, n'afọ 1998) bụ onye Amerịka na onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara Kalonji Pro-Profile bọọlụ ugbu a na United Premier Soccer League
A mụrụ Okonkwo na Lagos, Nigeria ma zụlite ya site n'aka nwanne nne ya na nwanne nna ya, tupu ọ kwaga Jamaica ma mesịa gaa United States ebe otu ezinụlọ nabatara ya na Suwanee, Georgia n'afọ 2013
Na June 17, 2017 a mara ọkwa na Okonkwo ga-edebanye aha na Major League Soccer n'akụkụ Atlanta United dị ka Home Grown Player na mmalite nke oge 2018
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2017, Okonkwo bịanyere áká na United Soccer League n'akụkụ Charleston Battery, USL nke Atlanta United na otu egwuregwu ọ nọrọ oge na 2016, ruo na njedebe nke oge 2018 ha
Mgbe ọ na-agbazinye ego site na Atlanta United, Okonkwo nyere ọkpụ isii maka Charleston Battery n'oge mkpọsa 2018 nke klọb ahụ
Atlanta hapụrụ Okonkwo na njedebe nke oge 2019 ha
Na Septemba 10, 2020, Okonkwo sonyeere USL League One n'akụkụ Chattanooga Red Wolves SC
Patrick Quarcoo, nke a maara dị ka PQ, bụ onye ọchụnta ego nke Ghana nke Kenya
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi ọrụ nke Radio Africa Group, nke bụ ihe mkpuchi nke n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Kenya na-ebipụta, dijitalụ, TV na redio
Nke a gụnyere KISS 100, Classic 105, Smooth FM, Radio Jambo, East FM, akwụkwọ akụkọ Star na KISS TV
Quarcoo na onye guzobere Radio Africa Group, William Pike nwekwara ụlọ ọrụ redio abụọ na Uganda, Capital Radio na Beat FM
Ọ bịara Kenya site na Reuters Uganda na 90s iji malite ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi
N'afọ 2012, e nyere Quarcoo onyinye nkwanye ugwu mba ụwa na Ghana UK-Based Achievement Awards
A mụrụ Quarcoo ogbenye na Cape Coast, Ghana
Radio Africa Group bụ ụlọ ọrụ redio, TV na akwụkwọ akụkọ na Kenya, ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ atọ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ redio ise kachasị elu na Nairobi
Patrick Robinson bụ onye America na-emepụta ejiji nke rụrụ ọrụ màkà Giorgio Armani, Anne Klein, Perry Ellis, Paco Rabanne na Gap
Ónyé gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Parsons School of Design, Robinson bụ ónyé otu Council of Fashion Designers of America (CFDA) kemgbe 1994 ma kpọọ ya otu n'ime 100 kpakpando na-eto eto nke Vogue
N'ime afọ ise ọ nọrọ na Armani, o jisiri ike mee ka akara 'Giorgio Armani Collezioni' na-arịa ọrịa bụrụ uru
Ọ ga-emesị nyéré Gap aka n'ịgbanwe ya

Taa, Patrick Robinson bụ ónyé guzobere na ónyé isi óche nke Paskho Community-Made, akara ejiji na-eme egwuregwu nke na-elekwasị anya n'ịlụ ọgụ megide mmetụta nke enweghị nhata agbụrụ na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Paskhas Community Made Initiative na-eweta ọrụ n'ọbọdọ ndị na-enweghị enyemaka nke ịrị elu nke mmepụta uwe n'ụsọ oké osimiri metụtara nke ukwuu

Mmeghe nke Community Made pod bụ mmekọrịta bara uru n'etiti ọbọdọ Makerãs na Paskho, na-eweta ọrụ na-akwụ ụgwọ dị elu n'ógbè ahụ ma na-egosi na omume na-adịgide adịgide na-abara ma ndị mmadụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-eji ha
A mụrụ Robinson n'ubochí asatọ n'ọnwa Septemba, 1966, na Memphis, Tennessee
Ọ tolitere na Orange County na Los Angeles, wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Fullerton, CA ma rụọ ọrụ nwa ógè na ụlọ ahịa Nordstrom na Cerritos mall
Mgbalị ejiji mbụ nke Robinson bụ obéré akara ejiji osimiri nke ya nke sitere n'ịhụnanya ya màkà ịnya ụgbọ mmiri
Ọ gàrà Parsons New School of Design na New York City, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1989
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na American College na Paris, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé enyemaka mbụ maka Patrick Kelly na ụlọ nhazi Albert Nippon na Herman Geist
Robinson lụrụ ónyé nduzi ejiji Global Virginia Smith, ma nwee ụmụ abụọ, nwa nwoke Wyeth na nwá nwanyị Kai
Ọ bi n'etiti NYC na ugbo ya nke Hudson Valley
Ónyé America a ma ama na-emepụta ihe nwere ihe karịrị afọ irí abụọ na isé nke ahụmịhe na ụlọ ọrụ ejiji na America, Europe na Eshia
Patrick Robinson na-eweta nghọta pụrụ ichè na ọhụụ ọhụrụ na atụmatụ ya na azụmaahịa ejiji
A mụrụ ya na Memphis, Tennessee, Robinson tolitere na Southern California ebe ọ malitere imepụta uwe maka ndị na-egwu mmiri ibe ya mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
Mgbè ọ kwagara New York ma gaa Parsons School of Design, Robinson ghọrọ ónyé na-enyere onye America a mụrụ Patrick Kelly aka na Paris na 1986
Ọ hapụrụ Paris iji rụọ ọrụ nwa ógè màkà Albert Nipon na New York, wee laghachi Europe dị ka ónyé nduzi nhazi màkà Giorgio Armani na Milan
Robinson gbanwere usoro Le Collezioni nke Giorgio Armaniʹs na-arịa ọrịa ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ejiji mba ụwa na-aba uru n'ime afọ anọ ọ nọrọ
Robinson, onye New Yorker n'obi, laghachiri na 1994, ka ọ bụrụ Ónyé isi osote onye isi oche nke Design, Merchandising na Marketing màkà Anne Klein
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1996, Robinson dị njikere ịpụ n'onwe ya wee malite nchịkọta nke ya, merie ọtụtụ ihe nrite ma kpọọ aha otu n'ime kpakpando otu narị kachasị elu nke Vogue na 1996
Neiman Marcus, Saks Fifth Avenue, Bergdorf Goodman na Barneyz na ndị ọzọ nwetara akara aha ụmụ nwanyị ya
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2003, Robinson ghọrọ ónyé nduzi okike nke Perry Ellis Womenīs Sportswear na 2005, a kpọrọ ya ónyé nduzi nka maka Paco Rabanne
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2013, e wèrè Robinson n'ọrụ dị ka ónyé nduzi okike zuru ụwa ọnụ nke Armani Exchange ma n'otu ọnwa ahụ hiwere ma nwalee Paskho ụdị ndụ dị elu na kickstarter
Patsha Bay bụ onye Congolese na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu ama maka Viva Riva! (2010) na Of Sentimental Value (2016)
Patasha Bay rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na Viva Riva! nke Djo Tunda wa Munga duziri n'afọ 2010, nke nwetara nhọpụta iri na abụọ ma merie onyinye isii na 7th Africa Movie Academy Awards
A họpụtakwara ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nrite Leading Role maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Of Sentimental Value n'afọ 2016

Patricia Ngozi Komlosy OBE (née Ebigwei ; amuru 3 May 1954), onye amara dika Patti Boulaye, bu onye British-Nigeria na- abụ abụ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ese ihe bụ onye bilitere n'ọkwa mgbe o meriri New Faces na 1978 wee so na ndị isi ojii Britain
ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na 1970 na 1980
Na obodo ya Nigeria, a na-echeta ya nke ọma maka ịgba egwu na mgbasa ozi Lux na Bisi, Nwa nke Osimiri, yana usoro nke ya, The Patti Boulaye Show
Ekwuru na aha ogbo ya sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Evelyn 'Boo' Laye

A mụrụ Boulaye mgbe nne ya batara n'ime ụgbọ tagzi nke na-agafe obodo abụọ dị na Mid-Western Nigeria ma zụlitere ya na ezinụlọ ndị Katọlik siri ike nke nwere ụmụ itoolu, gụnyere onye na-anya ụgbọelu Tony Ebigwei, onye nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọelu Nigeria Airways
nke 1978
Ọ bụ onye Igbo
Mgbe Boulaye dị afọ iri na ụma lanarịrị agha Biafra nke 1967–70 wee kwuo na o di ndu maka okwukwe ya siri ike

Mgbe ọ dị afọ 16 ọ hapụrụ Nigeria gaa United Kingdom ebe o kpebiri ịghọ onye nọn mana, n'oge njem nlegharị anya na London, Boulaye guzoro n'ahịrị maka ihe ọ chere na ọ bụ Madame Tussauds mana ọ ghọrọ ihe ngosi maka mmepụta ntutu nke London mbụ na n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ meriri otu akụkụ, nke malitere ọrụ ya na ịgụ egwu
Nna ya, bụ́ onye na-akwadoghị ịzụ ahịa ihe ngosi, gọnarụ nwa ya nwanyị ma mesịa gbaghara ya
Mgbe ntutu gasịrị, o gosipụtara na The Two Gentlemen of Verona, ma ruo ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka Yum Yum na Black Mikado n'okpuru aha ọmụmụ ya, Patricia Ebigwei

Na 1978, ugbu a na ọtụtụ afọ nke ahụmahụ ya, Boulaye pụtara na New Faces, ebe ọ bụ nanị onye na-asọmpi n'usoro nke a ga-enye ndị ọkàikpe isi ihe kachasị mma, ma mesịa merie All Winners Final Gala Show
Boulaye rụrụ akụkụ nke Charlotte n'ihu Lenny Henry na The Fosters, Dempsey na Makepeace, na Ụmụnna na Ụmụnna nwanyị
Na 1984, o nwere usoro nke ya, The Patti Boulaye Show na Channel 4
Ihe pụrụ iche Krismas, nke gosipụtara Cliff Richard, bụ ihe ịga nke ọma nke ọkwa na e wepụtara albom na njikọ na nyocha nke usoro
Na Julaị 2018, Boulaye chepụtara wee kwado usoro ihe ngosi nkata TV ya 'Life With Patti Boulaye' nke e dekọrọ ma na-agbasa Worldwide site na Disruptive Live TV
Ndụ na Patti Boulaye bụ nsonaazụ nke nchegbu Boulaye banyere ọnọdụ dị egwu nke ahụike uche na ọnụ ọgụgụ igbu onwe n'etiti ndị ntorobịa
Ndị ọbịa na ihe nkiri a sitere na ụdị ndụ dị iche iche, a na-agbakwa ha ume ịkọrọ ụfọdụ nsogbu ndị ha chere ihu na ịkọwa otu ha si merie ha
Boulaye mere ihe nkiri n'ime ihe nkiri Afrịka , Bisi, Daughter of the River (1977), bụ nke ekwuru na ọ bụ ihe nkiri Afrịka kacha enweta ego emere, na-agba na sinima na Naijiria afọ atọ
Ọ gbara The Music Machine- akwụ ụgwọ dị ka British Saturday Night Fever - na 1979, ma pụtakwara dị ka onye na-agụ cabaret na 1980 Helen Mirren nkiri Hussy
Onye Roman Katọlik ji okpukpe kpọrọ ihe, Boulaye nwere ụmụ abụọ na ụmụ ụmụ abụọ ya na di Stephen Komlosy
biography autobiography
Patusis, nke amakwa dịka ụkwara mkpogho maọbụ ụkwara otu narị ụbọchị, bụ ụkwara nke bụ nje n'efe
Na mbido ọ na-eyi ka ọbụ oyi, nke n'agba onye ọ na-eme imi, oyiọmụma n'obere ụkwara
Nke n'esochi ya bụ ụkwara nke ga-adịgịde ruo ọtụtụ izu ụka
'Mkpọtụ 'n'esochi mgbe onye ahụ n'eku ume
Ọ na-adịgịde ruo abalị 100 maọbụ izu ụka iri
Oge ụfọdụ onye ahụ n'akwasi ụkwara ike ruo mgbe obidoro gbọba agbọ, gbajie ngụgụ maọbụ nwee ike ọgwụgwụ n'ihi ya
Ụmụaka ndị erubeghị otu afọ nwere ike ịkwa ụkwara mana ọ na-eme na ha nwere ike ịkwụsị iku ume oge ụfọdụ
Ọ na-ewe ihe dịka abalị asaa ruo iri tupu ọpụtachaa nkeọma
Ndị nwere ya nwetagoro ọgwụgwọ nwere ike inwekwa ya ọzọ, mana ọnaghị esicha ike
Ihe n'akpata nje a bụ nke akpọrọ Bọdetela patusis
Esi na ikuku ebuta ya, mgbe onye nwere ya mara uzere maọbụ kwaa ụkwara
Onye nwere ya n'ebunye ya ndịọzọ mana ọ na-egosi mgbe ihe dịka izu ụka atọ gasịrị
Mana ndị ejị mkpụrụọgwụ emere maka ya gwọọ anaghị enwetakarị ya
Tupu eme nnyocha, a na-enweta ihe eji eme nchọpụta ma ọbụ ya ji mmadụ site n'azụ imi maọbụ akpịrị ma hapụ ya ọtụtụ ụbọchị iji nweta ihe achọrọ
A na-egbochikarị ya site n'ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi patusis
A na-atụ arọ ka agbaa ọgwụ a mgbe nwatakịrị gbara izu ụka isii na izu ụka asatọ ma hụụ n'enyere ya ugbo anọ mgbe ozuru afọ abụọ
Mana ka oge n'aga ike ọgwụ ahụ n'ebelata nke na a na-atụ aro ka ndị torola mmadụ gbaa ya site n'oge ruo n'oge
Ndị nwere nnukwu nsogbu ahụike na ndị nọ ebe ha nwere ike ibute ya kwesịrị iji mkpụrụ ọgwụ n'eme ihe site na mgbe ruo na mgbe
Ndị nwere ya bụ ọrịa, ọgwụ ahụ ga- arụ orụ maọbụrụ n'eji ya mee ihe mgbe ọ ka dị izu uka ato achọpụtasịrị ya, mana ọnaghị apụtacha ihie n'ebe mmadụ niile nọ
Nye ụmụaka n'erubeghị otu afọ na ụmụnwaanyị dị ime kwesịrị iji ya mee ihe mgbe ọka dị izu ụka isii obidoro
Ọgwụ ekwesirị iji mee ihe gunyere erotromisin, azitromisin, trimetoprin/sọfametosazol
Ihe n'egosi ka ọgwụ ahụ si rụọ n'ebe ụkwara nọ apụtachaghị ihie
Ụmụaka ndị erubeghị otu afọ kwesirị ka eburu ha gaa ụlọọgwụ
Ọrịa patusis n'emetụta ihe ruru nde mmadụ 16 n'uwa niile
kwa afọ
Ọ na-emekarị ndị bi na mba ndị n'emepe emepe nye onye ọbula n'agbanyeghị afọ ndụ onye ahụ
N'afọ 2013, ogburu mmadụ puku 61nke di ala karia nde 138 ogburu na 1990
Pasent 2 nke ndị ometụtara bụ ndị erubeghị otu afo bụ ndị ogburu
Ebu ụzọ nụ maka ya ọtụtụ narị afọ gara aga, mana achọpụtara nje n'ebute ya n'afọ 1906
