Paul Adeolu Adefarasin (amụrụ n'abalị 25 ọnwa Jenụwarị 1963) bụ Onye Ozi Ndị Kraịst, Onye Ozizi Bible na Televangelist

Ọ bụ Prelate nakwa Metropolitan Senior Pastor nke ụlọ ụka House on the Rock nke isi ya dị na Lagos, (Nigeria) nwere ngalaba n'ọtụtụ obodo dị iche iche na Nigeria gụnyere Port-harcourt, Abuja yana Johannesburg, South Africa & London, UK
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọkọ / onye nnabata nke The Experience (gospel concert)

A mụrụ Paul Adefarasin na 25 Jenụwarị 1963 n'ezinaụlọ Joseph Adefarasin, onye ọka ikpe nke ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke Naijiria si Ijebu Ode, na Hilda Adefarasin, onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị si Lagos Steeti
Ọ bụ nwanne Rev
Wale Adefarasin na Onyeozi Yemi Adefarasin, ha abụọ bụ ndị ozi Ndị Kraịst a na-akwanyere ùgwù
A zụlitere ya na Nigeria na United States
Adefarasin gara ụlọ akwụkwọ St Saviour dị na Ikoyi, na Igbobi College na Yaba
Agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya bụ na Haileybury College na England
Ọ gara n'ihu gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Miami, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Architecture
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Florida tupu ọ laghachi Naịjirịa
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na International Bible Institute of London ebe ọ nwetara diplọma na Christian Ministry
Adefarasin edeela, ma bipụta n'onwe ya ihe karịrị obere akwụkwọ iri abụọ na-akpali akpali nke Ndị Kraịst na ihe onwunwe multimedia
Ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na ndị na-ekesa akwụkwọ Ndị Kraịst ebipụtala atọ n'ime akwụkwọ ya

N'ọnwa June 1995, Adefarasin lụrụ Ifeanyi Adefarasin (amụrụ na Septemba 16th 1972), onye bụbu eze nwanyị mara mma ma ugbu a bụ onye ozi a na-akwanyere ùgwù na onye na-ekwu okwu ọgbakọ a maara nke ọma maka ozi doro anya na nke bara uru nke olileanya na ike
Ha mụrụ ụmụ atọ
Paul Ahyi (Amụrụ n'ọnwa Janụwarị 15, afọ 1930 – Janụwarị 4, 2010) bụ onye Togo na-ese ihe, onye na-akpụ ihe, onye na-ewu ụlọ, onye na-ese ihe, onye na-emepụta ime ụlọ na onye edemede
A na-eto Ahyi maka ịmepụta ọkọlọtọ Togo
A maara Ahyi maka nnukwu ihe osise ya n'èzí, ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ, gụnyere onyinye ya na Ncheta nnwere onwe na Lomé, nke na-echeta nnwere onwe mba ahụ site na France
Enwere ike ịchọta ihe ọkpụkpụ na ihe oyiyi ndị ọzọ dị n'èzí nke Ahyi na ụlọ na ogige ntụrụndụ na Togo, yana Vatican, Senegal, Benin, Côte d'Ivoire, Naịjịrịa na South Korea
O mekwara iberibe ya site na iji ọtụtụ ihe eji eme ihe gụnyere ọla, ite, ceramik na tapestries
Ọ bụkwa onye na-emepụta ime ụlọ nke mepụtara ihe ụlọ na ihe osise
A mụrụ Paul Ahyi nyere nne na nna ndị Togo n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 15, n'afọ 1930, na Abomey, French Dahomey Ahyi gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Dakar, Senegal, site na 1949 ruo 1952
Ọ kwagara France, ebe ọ debara aha na Fine Art School of Lyon malite na 1952
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na École nationale supérieure des Beaux-Arts na Paris na 1959 wee laghachi Togo, nke a na-akpọ French Togoland tupu nnwere onwe
E nyere Ahyi ọrụ ịmepụta ọkọlọtọ nke mba ọhụrụ nke Togo, nke nwetara nnwere onwe n'aka France na Eprel 27, 1960
Atụmatụ ya emechara, nke e kpughere n'afọ 1960, ka mba ahụ na-eji ya eme ihe
Ahyi jiri agba Pan-Africa nke uhie, odo na akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na ọkọlọtọ ya, nke e mere site na ọkọlọtọ Liberia site na iji akara kwụ ọtọ
Ogige uhie na-anọchi anya ọbara a wụfuru n'ọgụ maka nnwere onwe
Ọkọlọtọ ahụ na-acha odo odo na-anọchite anya ala, ebe akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na-anọchi anya ọhịa Togo na ọrụ ugbo
Ahyi gbakwunyere kpakpando ọcha, nke yiri ọkọlọtọ Liberia, na-anọchite anya ìhè, ọgụgụ isi na udo
Paul Aigbogun bụ onye njikwa bọọlụ Naịjirịa

Maka oge 2002, Aigbogun bịanyere aka na ụlọ ọgbakọ nke atọ nke America Northern Nevada Aces, tupu ya etinye oge n'egwuregwu ya na United States yana ndị otu egwuregwu Nevada Wonders na San Francisco Seals
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, o nwere mkpoputa abuo dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Warri Wolves na ọgbakọ elu Nigeria
N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Enyimba International, ndị otu Naijiria kacha nwee ọganihu
Site n'ebe ahụ, a họpụtara Aigbogun ka onye isi nchịkwa nke otu mba Naịjirịa na-erubeghị afọ iri abụọ
N'afọ 2019, e boro ya ebubo na ọ na-anata ihe iri ngo n'aka ndị egwuregwu a ga-ahọpụta maka otu mba Naịjirịa na-erubeghị afọ iri abụọ
Paul Marcel Berenger (a mụrụ na 26 Machị 1991), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Zimbabwe
A mụrụ Berenger n'abalị 26 ọnwa Machị afọ 1991 na Harare, Zimbabwe
Otú ọ dị, a manyere ya ịkwaga Australia n'okpuru ọnọdụ ala ọjọọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu, o nwere mmasị ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ hụrụ nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye n'elu nkwago n'egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị
Otú ọ dị, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ na-akwaga Australia
Berenger mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri 2008 Two Fists, One Heart
O mechara mee ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi dịka Brittany, Die Krankenhaus, The Army Within na Impasse
Paul Boujenah, (amụrụ na 20 Mee 1958 na Tunis) bụ onye French na Tunisian na-eduzi ihe nkiri ndị Juu
Ọ bụ nwanne Michel Boujenah na nwanne nna ụmụnne Matthieu Boujenah
Nwa ya nwoke Arthur Boujenah bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Paul Clavin bụ onye sayensị Frenchi na Mahadum Aix-Marseille, na-arụ ọrụ na ngalaba nke ọkụ na statistical mechanics
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Institute for Research on Nonequilibrium Phenomena (IRPHE)
Clavin jere ozi dika onyeisi oche nke mekanik nke ana ahụ anya na Institut Universitaire de France site na 1993 ruo 2004
Ọ natara YaB
Zeldovich Gold Medal site na The Combustion Institute na 2014 na onye otu The Combussion Institute
E mere ogbako akpọrọ Out-of-Equilibrium Dynamics na 2012 iji sọpụrụ ụbọchị ọmụmụ Clavin nke afọ 70
Ọ bụ onye natara onyinye Grand Prix site na French Academy of Sciences na 1998 ma nata onyinye Plumey site na Société Française de Physique na 1988
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya na ebe ana agụmakwụkwọ maka frenchi n'afọ 1997
Paul Lamar Collins (amụrụ na úbọchị irí nà otu n'ọnwa Disemba, 1936) bụ onye America na-ese ihe
A maara Collins màkà iji nkà ya mee ihe, ìhè, na nlebara ányà na nkọwa
African/American Indian/European
Nkà nke Paul Collins sitere na ọmụmụ ya, ogologo nnwale, na mkpebi siri ike
A mụrụ ya na Muskegon, Michigan wee kwaga Grand Rapids mgbè ọ dị obere
Paul gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Ada na Grand Rapids Michigan
A kwụsịrị ya ka ọ ghara iwere nka n'ụzọ siri ike n'ihi ikike ya yiri ka ọ 'na-abaghị uru' dị ka ọrụ n'ọdịnihu
Collins nọrọ n'oge ntorobịa ya na-etolite n'ógbè ndị isi ojii
Ọ chọtara agbamume na mmetụta site n'aka Randy Brown, ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ede uri gụrụ akwụkwọ nke si n'ebe ndịda bịa, mere ka o kwenye ịchụso ọrụ nka
Ụlọ ọrụ Brown dị nso n'ụlọ Collins, mgbè Paul ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọ na-eleta ya mgbe niile
N'ihe dị ka n'oge a, ọ gbalịrị ise ihe na mmanụ, ihe ọ na-ahọrọ ugbu a
Mmasị ya n'ihe gbásárá mmanụ mèrè ka ọ mụta ihe niile o nwere ike ịgụ banyere usoro na kemịkalụ nke ihe osise
Ọ nwalere ihe osise mmịrị na tempera ma nwalere obéré ógè na acrylics
Otú ọ dị, mmanụ na pensụl ka bụ ntọala nke usoro ya
Mgbe Collins gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ya na Brown malitere azụmahịa a na-akpọ Ran-Col
Ụlọ ọrụ ha na-emepụta ihe nyéré Collins ohere ịzụlite nkà ya maka imepụta, nhazi na mkpụrụ édémédé
Nnukwu super-graphics bụ ihe pụrụ iche nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Nke a mèrè ka Paul nwee ike ịnọgide na-enwe nkà na ụzụ ya
Ọ bụ n'otu ógè a ka Collins malitere ire ihe osise ya na ngosi nka
Ọ na-enye nsogbu mgbe niile site n'ụzọ a na-ahụkarị ndị isi ojii na-egosikarị egbugbere ọnụ buru ibu na anya na-apụta nke ọ họọrọ ise nnukwu ihe na-egosi ihu ojii
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ malitere njem afọ abụọ na West Africa iji see usoro ọdịbendị na-egosi akụkụ nke ndị nna nna ya
N'afọ 1969, Paul so nwa ya nwoke nke okenye Michael gaa West Africa, ebe Paul gụrụ akwụkwọ ma gosipụta ndị Senegal na ndị Gambia n'ógbè ha
E gosipụtara usoro a kpọrọ, 'Black Portrait of an African Journey' n'Africa, Europe na United States
Ndị nkatọ nabatara usoro ahụ nke ọma
Dị ka Detroit Free Press kwuru, 'Ihe si na njem Afrịka pụta ozugbo bụ nguzobe nke aha Collins dị ka ónyé na-akọwa ọhụụ ọhụụ ọhụụ banyéré ọnọdụ mmadụ
' E gosipụtara ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ndị ahụ na ihe nkiri akpọrọ 'Save the Children' nke Paramount wepụtara na 1972
Gọọmentị Senegal kpọrọ otu okporo ámá, Rue Monsieur Paul Collins, iji sọpụrụ ya
N'afọ 1975, e nyere Collins ọrụ ịmepụta ihe osise 18 x 8 ft
nke onye ọbọdọ Grand Rapids, Ónyé isi ala Gerald R
Ford
A na-egosipụta ihe osise ahụ na Gerald R
Ford International Airport, ma na-ekpughe akụkụ dị iche iche nke ndụ onwé ónyé Ford dị ka onye isi ala nke United States; onye na-eme egwuregwu, nna, na di
Ihe osise ahụ dọtara uche mba ma nweta otuto màkà 'ihe ngosi siri ike na nke dị ùgwù nke Gerald R
Ford'
A na-ebipụta ihe osise na ihe oyiyi n'otu n'otu na akwụkwọ, Gerald R
Ford- A Man in Perspective, (Eerdmans, 1976)
Afọ 1980
N'afọ 1981, Collins o mepụtara 'Ford Museum Commemorative Poster' iji sọpụrụ mmeghe nkè Gerald R
Ford Presidential Museum na Grand Rapids, Michigan
Afọ 1990 ruo ugbu a
Collins zaghachiri oku nke Pacific Rim, kwaga Omihachiman, Japan na 1994, nkè Amway Japan Corporation nyéré iwu
Site na imikpu ya na omenala ndị Japan, o mepụtara ihe osise ndị rụrụ ọrụ dị ka àkwà mmiri nke nghọta màkà anya ọdịda anyanwụ, na-enye ọhụụ banyere omenala, ememe, na nkwekọrịta nke ndị Japan
A kpughere nchịkọta ahụ na 1997 na Megaro Gajoun Museum na Tokyo, Japan ma gosipụta ya na Kawara Museum na Omihachiman, Japan

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé isi oche nke Greater Grand Rapids Fund ebe o nyere aka ịnakọta ihe karịrị puku dollar atọ na iri ise site na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche iji guzobe 'Teens Summer Jobs Program' na-emepụta ihe karịrị ọrụ narị isii n'oge ọkọchị
Collins sokwa ónyé isi oche nke Grand Rapids Youth Commonwealth Campaign na Onye isi ala Gerald R
Ford na Senator Glenn Steil na mkpọsa iji weghachite Seidman Youth Center dị ugbu a ma wuo ebe ọzọ gafee obodo ahụ
Ụwa

Dakar, Senegal; Nairobi, Kenya; Jerusalem, Israel; Lagos, Nigeria; Sarajevo, Bosnia; Freeport, Grand Bahamas; Omihachiman, Japan; Tokyo, Japan; Paris, France; Moscow, Russia; Old Havana, Cuba; Tel Aviv, Israel

New York; Washington, DC; Ohio; Illinois; Indiana; Virginia, Michigan, Louisiana, Delaware, Massachusetts; Pennsylvania; Maryland; Florida; Georgia; Kentucky; California; Tennessee; Arizona; New Jersey; Minnesota; South Dakota; Vermont

Paul Danquah, onye a mụrụ Joseph Paul Walcott (25 Mee 1925 - 13 Ọgọst 2015), bụ onye Britain na-eme ihe nkiri, nke a maara karịsịa maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri A Taste of Honey (1961), nke sitere na egwuregwu 1958 nke otu aha ahụ nke Shelagh Delaney dere
O mechara bụrụ onye ọka iwu na onye ndụmọdụ ụlọ akụ
Nna ya bụ onye ọchịchị Ghana J
Danquah
A mụrụ ya Joseph Paul Walcott na London, England, ebe o tolitere

Nne ya, Bertha May Walcott, bụ onye Bekee, nna ya bụ Joseph Boakye 'JB' Danquah bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana na onye isi ọdịnala; Paul bụ ọkpara n'ime ọtụtụ ụmụ ya site na alụmdi na nwunye abụọ na mmekọrịta dị iche iche
Danquah gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu ma a kpọọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka iwu na Inner Temple, yana na Ghana na Washington, DC

O mechara rụọ ọrụ dịka onye ndụmọdụ na World Bank ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 1986, mgbe ọ bi na Washington, ọ bụ enyi ndị na-arụ ọrụ nka nke Africa na America gụnyere Maya Angelou, James Baldwin, Roberta Flack na Nina Simone
Mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa akwụkwọ, Danquah mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri Britain A Taste of Honey (1961), nke gosipụtara ọrụ Jimmy
Ya na onye otu ya bụ Rita Tushingham susuru ọnụ, nke ọ na-ekwu na ọ bụ nsusu ọnụ agbụrụ mbụ na ihuenyo
Onye na-ese ihe bụ Francis Bacon na Danquah na onye ọrụ ibe Danquah bụ Peter Pollock biri (19 Nọvemba 1919 - 18 Julaị 2001) na ụlọ ha dị na Battersea site n'afọ 1956 ruo 1961
N'oge a, na ngwụsị afọ 1961, Danquah mere ndokwa ka Don Bachardy dọpụta Bacon
Danquah na Pollock kwagara Tangier, Morocco, na ngwụcha afọ ndị 1970
Na ngwụsị afọ ndị 1990, Danquah na Pollock chọpụtara akpa nwere eserese Bacon; Tate nwetara eserese ndị a n'afọ̀1996 ma gosipụta ya n'afọ̀ 1999
Danquah nwụrụ na Tangier na 13 August 2015 mgbe ọ dị afọ 90; dịka nwa nwanne ya nwanyị Meri Nana-Ama Danquah si kwuo, e liri ya na Boubana Cemetery, n'akụkụ Peter Pollock, dịka ọ rịọrọ na uche ya
Paul Emordi (amụrụ 25 Disemba 1965) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu Naịjirịa lara ezumike nka bụ onye gbara na asọmpi ogologo mwụli elu na mwụli atọ
Ọkacha mma nkeonwe ya na ogologo mwuli elu bụ 825 mita, ọ nwetara na June 1987 na Baton Rouge
Nke a mere ya ọkwa nke atọ n'ime ndị na-agba ogologo mwuli elu Naijiria, naanị n'azụ Yusuf Alli (827 m) na Charlton Ehizuelen (826 n'ime ụlọ)
Àtụ Footer All-Africa Champions Long Jump Men
Paul Farwell Keene Jr

(Ubochí irí abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst 1920 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2009) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé nkuzi nke Philadelphia nke ọrụ ya nyeere aka mee ka ndị na-ese Black American pụta ìhè
A mụrụ Keene n'ubochí irí abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1920 na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Ọ gàrà Philadelphia Museum School of Art, Tyler School of Art and Architecture, na Académie Julian
Na 1944 Keene lụrụ Laura Mitchell
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Tuskegee Airman n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Keene nwere ike ịmụ na Academie Julian na Paris n'okpuru GI
Bill
Mgbè ọ nọ na Paris, Keene bụ onye guzobere Galerie Huit
N'afọ 1952, Keene gàrà Haiti ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ma kụzie n'okpuru John Hay Whitney fellowship
N'afọ 1954 ọ laghachiri na United States wee malite ịkụzi na Philadelphia College of Art, ébé ọ kụziri ruo n'afọ 1968
Site na 1968 rụo 1985 Keene kụziri na Bucks County Community College
N'afọ 1966, Keene sere ihe osise na Mahadum HBCU Johnson C
Smith na Charlotte, North Carolina
N'afọ 1971, Keene mepụtara ihe enyemaka màkà Fifty Ninth Street Baptist Church na Philadelphia
O nwèrè mmekọrịta afọ iri abụọ na Brandywine Workshop ma bụrụ ónyé natara Van Der Zee Award ha na 1990
Keene nwụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ na isii Nọvemba, 2009, na Warrington, Pennsylvania
Ọrụ Keene dị na nchịkọta nke Philadelphia Museum of Art, Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts, na James A
Michener Art Museum
E tinyere ọrụ Keene na ngosi 2015 We Speak Black Artists na Philadelphia, 1920s-1970s na Woodmere Art Museum
Paul Garnet Henderson, CM OOnt (amụrụ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 28, afọ 1943) bụ onye Canada bụbu onye na-eme egwuregwu ice hockey

Onye na-agba ọsọ n'aka ekpe, Henderson gbara oge iri na atọ na National Hockey League (NHL) maka Detroit Red Wings, Toronto Maple Leafs na Atlanta Flames na ise na World Hockey Association (WHA) maka Toronto Toros na Birmingham Bulls
Ọ gbara ihe karịrị otu puku egwuregwu n'etiti nnukwu egwuregwu abụọ ahụ, gbaa goolu 376 na akara 758
Henderson gbara bọọlụ na NHL All-Star Games abụọ ma bụrụ onye otu Hamilton Red Wings nke meriri Memorial Cup dị ka onye na-eto eto
A maara Henderson nke ọma maka iduzi Team Canada na mmeri n'afọ 1972 Summit Series megide Soviet Union

Henderson gbara goolu mmeri n'egwuregwu nke isii, nke asaa na nke asatọ, nke ikpeazụ n'ime ha ghọrọ ihe a ma ama na Canada ma mee ka ọ bụrụ dike mba The Canadian Press họpụtara ya dị ka 'oge egwuregwu nke narị afọ' ma mee ka o nweta ọtụtụ otuto
A nabatara ya na International Ice Hockey Federation Hall of Fame n'afọ 2013
Onye Kraịst a mụrụ ọzọ, Henderson ghọrọ onye ozi, ọkà okwu na-akpali akpali na onye edemede na-agbaso ọrụ ịgba egwu ya
O so dee akwụkwọ atọ metụtara hockey ma ọ bụ ndụ ya
E mere Henderson onye otu Order of Canada n'afọ 2012 na Order of Ontario n'afọ 2014
Paul Igwe nti (amuru 27 Novemba 1977) bu onye isi ihe onyonyo Naijiria, odee, onye na-emeputa ihe, na onye okike, na onye isi oche nke Whitestone Cinema Limited
Ọ mepụtara ncha na-ewu ewu (usoro onyonyo) dị ka 'Clinic Matters', 'The Benjamin', 'Ojays', na 'Asunder'listen (help·info)'
N'afọ 2000, Paul Igwe malitere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke ya, Whitestone Cinema Limited ma eduzila ihe nkiri 20 na usoro telivishọn 8

Ọ debuted na 2000 dị ka onye nduzi na ihe nkiri 'Outrageous' na 2007; ọ bụ onye isi ike na usoro ihe nkiri TV nke 39, 'Ezinụlọ agbatịkwuru', na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi / onye na-emepụta ihe na-enye ndụmọdụ
Ọ malitere sitcom telivishọn nke ya 'Clinic Matters' na 2009, usoro nke meriri ọtụtụ onyinye na nhọpụta na mpaghara na mba ụwa gụnyere ihe nrite 2012 World Quality Commitment Award na Paris
Na February 2012, o wepụtara usoro ihe onyonyo nke abụọ ya 'The Benjamins' nke ahọpụtara na 2014 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards maka usoro ihe nkiri TV kacha mma Comedy/Drama
N'afọ 2015, ọ malitere ihe nkiri ezinụlọ ọhụrụ 'Ojays' nke a họpụtara maka onyinye Comedy kacha mma na Nafca Awards
Paul malitekwara ihe ngosi nri n'asụsụ Igbo nke a na-akpọ 'USEKWU IGBO' nke pụtara 'Igbo Kitchen'
Ihe ngosi ahụ meriri ihe nrite Best Indigenous Movie / TV Series na 2016 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards nke emere na Eko Hotel and Suites, Victoria Island, Lagos
N'afọ 2016, Paul malitere ihe nkiri ezinụlọ ọzọ a na-akpọ 'House 6' nke ezinụlọ ọzọ a kpọrọ 'Troubled Cottage' sochiri
Paul Igwe malitekwara usoro ihe nkiri nyocha ya, 'Asunder', n'ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ, nke na-elekwasị anya na ndụ alụmdi na nwunye nke ezinụlọ dị iche iche
N'afọ 2017, o mepụtara ihe nkiri ncha ọzọ nke Igbo 'Nkewa' nke gosipụtara na Africa Magic Igbo
O nyekwara ntụziaka 'Dance To My Beat', ihe nkiri nke Joseph Benjamin, Kehinde Bankole, Toyin Abraham, na Mary Remmy Njoku
Paul Kocin (amụrụ n'ubochi isii n'ọnwa Mee, 1955) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe na ọkachamara n'ogè oyi
Ọ tolitere na Long Island, New York ma nata BS
ya na Mahadum Cornell, MSc
ya na-esote na Mahaduma Pennsylvania State
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa ógè na NASA dị ka ónyé ọrụ ngo mgbè ahụ US National Weather Service were ya n'ọrụ na Hydrometeorological Prediction Center n'afọ 1989
Kocin rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri na The Weather Channel site n'afo 1998 ruo 2006
Ọ laghachiri na NOAA mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị, nke mbụ dị ka ónyé na-enyocha ihu igwe n'elu ma mesịa gaa na tebụl dị n'etiti, na-ebu amụma ihu igwe màkà Alaska ruo ụbọchị asatọ tupu ógè eruo
Ya na Louis Uccellini, Kocin mepụtara Northeast Snowfall Impact Scale, nké na-ekewa nnukwu snowstorms nke Northeest United States site na 'ihe a ma ama' ruo 'nke gabigara oke'
Ha mepụtara mpịakọta gbásárá Northeastern United States Snow Storms n'ogè afọ 1990s na 2000s
Paul Kodjo (a mụrụ n'afọ 1939) bụ onye Ivory Coast na-ese foto
A maara Kodjo nke ọma maka foto ya e sere na Abidjan n'afọ ndị 1970, na-esote nnwere onwe Ivory Coast pụọ n'aka ọchịchị mba France
A na-akpọ ya 'nna nke foto na Ivory Coast'
A mụrụ Kodjo na 1939, na Abidjan, Ivory Coast; nne ya bụ onye Ghana ebe nna ya bụ onye Ivory Coast
O nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka onye na-ese foto na Ghana
O mechara kwaga France, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ maka Fraternité-Matin, akwụkwọ Ivory Coast
N'oge a, ọ bụ otu n'ime naanị ndị ojii na-ese foto iji dekọọ ngagharị iwe ụmụ akwụkwọ na May 1968 na Paris
N'afọ 1970, Kodjo laghachiri Ivory Coast, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ foto
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, ma mepụta ọrụ foto efu dịka Photo-romans maka magazin Ivoire Dimanche
N'afọ ndị 1990 Kodjo kwụsịrị ise foto
O mechara nyefee foto ya n'aka onye na-ese foto Ananias Léki Dago
Dago na Goethe Institute rụkọtara ọrụ iji weghachite ihe ndị na-adịghị mma, ma nye aka n'inye nkwado ka ukwuu maka ọrụ Kodjo
A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Art Gallery nke Ontario
Paul Ikechukwu Obiefule (a mụrụ ya ụbọchị ịrị na ịse nke ọnwa Mee na afọ otu puku na narị itenanị na ịrị asatọ na isii na Owerri )
Ọ bụ onye Naịjirịa lara ezumike nká na egwuregwu fotu bọọlụ

Obiefule malitere ọrụ ya na obodo ya bụ Naịjirịa na- egwuru ndị Planners FC na ndị Heartland, ebe ọ nọrọ ọnwa abụọ tupu ndị Viborg FF nke Denmark ahụ ya, onye bịanyere aka na ya na afọ puku abụọ na anọ

N'oge ya na Viborg, ọ dọtara mmasị dị ukwuu site na ọtụtụ klọb ndị si mba ofesi mana na afọ puku abụọ na asaa ka ekwuputara na ọ bịanyela aka na nkwekọrịta otu afọ maka ụlọ ọgbakọ Norwegian klọb Lyn, na Septemba na afọ puku abụọ na asatọ ka ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ, nke a digidere ruo na njedebe nke afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu na ewee nyefeeya ọkwa Kapitin Band, nke a mere ya Onye Isi Ojii izizi nọ n' okwa Kapitin na Norwegian Premiership klọb, atugara Obiefule na otu ndị otu egwuregwu England na Watford bụ nke dị na Scottish Aberdeen na Norwegian Hønefoss Obiefule ji ọnụ kwenye ka ọnwa Disemba dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na anọ na afọ puku abụọ na itenanị maka nkwekọrịta afọ atọ maka Hønefoss n'ihi mmerụ nke ọ merụrụn' ikpere nke mere ka ọ ghara ịkwaga Scotland ma ọ bụ England

Obiefule kwetara na mgbazinye ọnwa isii maka Lillestrøm na ụbọchị abụọ nke ọnwa Ọgụstụafo puku abụọ na iri na otu wee debanye ya na egwuregwu megide Tromsø n'echi ya, na ụbọchị nke atọ nke ọnwa Ọgụstụ, na-enweghị ọzụzụ na onye otu ọhụrụ ya
Na Febụwarị puku abụọ na iri na abụọ, Obiefule bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta maka oge puku abụọ na iri na abụọ ya na ndị otu Finnish Veikkausliiga KuPS
Na ọnwa Nọvemba afọ puku abụọ na iri na abụọ , Obiefule laghachiri ọzụzụ na Viborg FF tupu ọ mezuo ebumnuche ya bụ ị gaakwuru ndị otu ndị China amaghi
Na ọnwa Ọgụstụ afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise, Obiefule kwetara maka nkwekọrịta ya na ụlọ ọrụ Danish Holstebro, mgbe ọ gụsịrị Møldrup / Tostrup
Ọ lara ezumike nká na afọ puku abụọ na iri na asaa
Obiefule bụ onye Naịjirịa azuru na mba ofesi ya mere ya mpụta maka Super Eagles na asọmpi LG na afọ puku abụọ na anọ
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị otu egwu bọọlụ Super Eagles nwetere ọla nchara n’Ijipt na afọ puku abụọ na isii
O turula ugo ugboro iri maka obodo ya
Obiefule nọ na-agụ akụ na ụba ọrụ ugbo na Mahadum dị elu nke Teknụzụ nke Owerri na Naịjirịa mana ọ hapụrụ ya ịchụso ịgba bọọlụ ọkachamara
Nwanne ya nwoke bụ Polycarp Obinna Obiefule, na-egwu egwuregwu ugbu a maka Mosta FC na Malta

Nwanne ya nwoke Pol mere ihe tụrụ na anya maka mgbaru ọsọ kachasị elu nke emetụtara na Maltese Premier League na agbata afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu na puku abụọ na iri na ka ọ nyere ọ kpulo kpụ goolu iri atọ na anọ
Onye bụbu onye otu Planners FC Owerri Imo Steeti nke Naịjiria
Paul Onsongo (a mụrụ na 21 Julaị 1948), bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye ama ama maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Mountains of the Moon, Küken für Kairo na The Flame Trees of Thika
A mụrụ ya n'abalị 21 ọnwa Julaị afọ 1948 na Mombasa, Kenya
N'afọ 1974, o mere ihe nkiri izizi na ihe nkiri Wilby Conspiracy N'afọ 1981, o mere ihe nkiri telivishọn mbụ na obere usoro The Flame Trees of Thika
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado nke 'Juma' na ihe omume anọ nke obere usoro
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri akụkọ ndụ Rise and Fall of Idi Amin ebe ihe nkiri ahụ meriri ihe nrite ise, gụnyere onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma, na Las Vegas International Film Festival
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ1985, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri na-akpali akpali Küken für Kairo nke ọ rụrụ obere ọrụ dịka 'Dealer'
N'afọ 1987, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Megitew na ihe nkiri telivishọn We Are the Children, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama
N'afọ 1989, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọjọọ nke Abdullah na ihe nkiri Cheetah
N'afọ 1990, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri akụkọ ndụ Mountains of the Moon na ọrụ 'Sidi Bombay'
Ọrụ ya ghọrọ ihe a ma ama

Paul LeRoy Bustill Robeson (Önwa anọ 9, 1898 – Önwa mbu 23, 1976) bu mgbé mbu onyé ùwà nílé na kwú bú ábù nke mmèmmé bass-baritone, onye oméka nke onyo-na-ga na nke ogbo, All-American na kwü na úkwú, ọdẹ ákwúkwó, onye òkà okwu nke ólúnólú, onye ómúmú na onye íkpe na onye ha mà ka onye na kwu okwu gbásárá ndi na tá áfúfú
Onye dị na íshí ọgeanírú íwú ndu, Robeson bu mgbe mbu onye áhiá ìgwè, onye íjè ụdó, ónyé ọtú Phi Beta Kappa, na onye tara ịta Ihe ine orü Spingarn na Ihe ine orü ụdó Stalin
Mádu màchàrà ya na ụwá màkà ihe nká ȯ méchàfùrù, na ihe okwu ȯ kwúfùtàrà na íshí ihe Jim Crow ndi Njikota Obodo Amerika tinyèrè màkà ndi ojié
Robeson merie ihe akadamiiki mfọn Rutgers University, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye na football All - American na klas valedictorian
Ọ natara ya LLB
si Columbia Iwu School, mgbe egwu na-akpọ ke National M Njikọ ( NFL )

Na Columbia, enye ama ọkwọ ete ye mere ngbanyụ - kampos nwetara ndien, ke ama okokụre ukpep, enye ama akabade edi soÚ na Harlem Renaissance na arụmọrụ ke Akwa Edidem Jones niile Chineke Chillun ọkọdọ Nku
Robeson butere ya mba nka malitegharịa na ihe nkiri udeme ke Great Britain, edozi na London nke na-esote ọtụtụ afọ ya na nwunye ya Essie
Robeson ọzọ pụtara ìhè dị ka Othello ke Savoy Ụlọ ihe nkiri tupu ghọọ mba ofesi cinematic kpakpando site na ọrụ ke Gosi ubom Sanders nke osimiri
Enye ama akabade edi esiwanye attuned kwupụta na ahụhụ niile omenala ma iche iche

Ndida megide ndụmọdụ , nke dọrọ aka ná ntị ya aku na uba n'iyi ma ọ bụrụ na ọ ghọrọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nọ n'ọrụ , ọ ewepụta ya nkiri ọrụ na -akwadokwa ọchịchị kpatara nke Republican agha nke Spanish Civil War
Ekem enye ama akabade edi ifịk ifịk ke Council n'Afrika Affairs (CAA)
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ , ọ na-akwado America agha mgbalị ma merie accolades ya portrayal nke Othello na Broadway
Otú ọ dị, akụkọ ihe mere eme nke na-akwado ya pro - Soviet atumatu ada nnyocha si FBI
Mgbe agha ahụ biri , ndị CAA ama enịm ke Attorney General si List nke ịgba mgba okpuru -ahazi (AGLOSO) na Robeson e nyochaworo ke ini ekedide isua McCarthyism
Ruru ya mkpebi ghara recant ya n'ihu ọha onwe nke pro - Soviet atumatu , enye ama gọrọ agọ a paspọtụ nke US State Ngalaba ya, ego , N'ihi ya, plummeted
Enye ama ọwọrọ aka Harlem bipụtara ma a n'oge ruo n'oge dị oké egwu nke United States na atumatu
Ya ikike njem e mesịrị e weghachiri eweghachi site na Kent nkeji Dulles , ma ọrịa ya mebiri
Ọ lara ezumike nká ma na o biri ndụ nke na- afọ nke ndụ ya naanị na Filadelfia
Paul S
Devrouax (Ọktoba 4, 1942 ruo Maachị 22, 2010) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Washington, DC
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ na-ese ihe owuwu nke Devrouex + Purnell, ma nyere aka mepụta Verizon Center, Nationals Park, Walter E
Washington Convention Center, na isi ụlọ ọrụ DC nke Freddie Mac na Pepco
O jikọtara aka mepụta ihe ncheta agha obodo nke Afrịka na Amerịka, ma nye mgbanwe nhazi na Martin Luther King, Jr
Memorial
A mụrụ ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1942 na New Orleans, Louisiana, nke Paul Devrouax, Sr
na Freddie Warner Devrouaj
O nwere ụmụnne nwoke abụọ, Edward na Charles, a zụlitere ya na New Orleans na Los Angeles, California
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1966 na nzere na ụlọ na Mahadum Southern dị na Baton Rouge, Louisiana
E debara aha Devrouax n'ime ndị agha United States, e mekwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi na 6th Armored Cavalry Regiment
N'afọ 1968, e zigara ya na Fort Meade na Maryland
N'Eprel 5, 1968, e zigara ndị otu ya na DC
iji weghachite usoro n'ihi ọgba aghara igbu ọchụ Martin Luther King, Jr
Devrouax lụrụ Brenda Stallworth na Septemba 9, 1972
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere nwa nwanyị, Lesley
Ya na onye Afrịka Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Marshall E
Purnell, hiwere Devrouax+Purnell Architects and Planners, PC, na 1978
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke National Organization of Minority Architects na 1980, na Washington Project for the Arts na 1988
N'afọ 1986, Devrouax chepụtara Frank D
Reeves Municipal Building maka gọọmentị obodo DC, ihe owuwu nke nyeere aka ime ka mpaghara akụkọ ihe mere eme nke U Street NW dịghachi ndụ
O mere mmezigharị nke ụlọ Reverend Jesse Jackson na Rittenhouse Building na LeDroit Park na Washington, DC, na 1990
N'afọ 1995, Devrouax+Purnell meriri atụmatụ maka otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ Freddie Mac na McLean, Virginia
Ha bụ ndị Afrịka Amerịka mbụ na-ewu ụlọ iji chepụta isi ụlọ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ Fortune 500
Afọ ise ka e mesịrị, Devrouax + Purnell ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ Afrịka Amerịka mbụ nwere iji mepụta isi ụlọ ọrụ na etiti Washington, DC, mgbe ha meriri asọmpi imewe maka ụlọ Pepco ọhụrụ

Devrouax nyekwara aka mepụta Verizon Center (ụlọ nke ndị otu egwuregwu basketball nke Washington Wizards na ndị otu ice hockey nke Washington Capitals), nke a rụchara na 1997, na Nationals Park (ụlọ nke otu egwuregwu baseball nke Washington Nationals), nke e mechara na 2008
O nyekwara aka iduzi otu imepụta ihe maka Walter E
Washington Convention Center, nke meghere na 2003
N'afọ 2009, atụmatụ Devrouax + Burnell bụ otu n'ime mmadụ isii ahọpụtara dị ka ndị ikpeazụ maka National Museum of African American History and Culture
Devrouax rụkwara ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe ncheta mba dị mkpa
Ya na onye na-ese ihe n'ala Edward D
Dunson chepụtara ebe ahụ maka Ncheta Agha Obodo Afrịka na Amerịka na 1998
N'afọ 2004, Devrouax nyere aka wuo Martin Luther King, Jr
Memorial na Washington, DC
Ya na ndị otu ya mere mmezi imewe na ncheta ahụ, mee ihe ngosi na ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị etiti na obodo na nkwado imewe maka ncheta ahụ
Devrouax nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi n'ụlọ ya na Washington, DC, na Maachị 22, 2010
Paul Mpagi Sepuya (amụrụ n'afọ 1982) bụ ónyé America na-ese foto na onye na-ese ihe
Foto ya na-elekwasị ányá na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ónyé na-ese ihe na isiokwu
Ọ na-enyocha mgbè niile ọtọ n'ihe gbasara mmekọrịta chiri anya nke foto studio
Ntọala nke ọrụ Sepuya bụ ihe osise
Ọ na-egosipụta ndị enyi na ndị na-eche echiche n'ọrụ ya nke na-emepụta mmekọrịta bara uru site na foto
Sepuya na-ekpughe ihe ndị ahụ na nka ya n'ime iberibe okpu, aka, ụkwụ, ma ọ bụ ụkwụ kama ahụ dum
Site na foto na-akpali akpali, Sepuya na-emepụta mmetụta nke agụụ na ịchọ ihe ndị ọzọ
Ọchịchọ a na-enye ndị na-ekiri ohere ijikọ ya na foto n'ụzọ bara uru
A mụrụ Sepuya na San Bernardino, California

Ọ kwagara New York nwa ógè iji nweta nzèrè bachelọ na Fine Arts na Photography & Imaging na Mahadum New York's Tisch School of the Arts na 2004 ma mesịa nweta nzèrè Master of Fine Arts na photography na UCLA Department of Art na 2016
E gosipụtara ọrụ sitere na nzèrè masta yá na UCLA MFA Exhibition #3
A maara Sepuya nke ọma màkà ihe osise ya
Portraiture bụ ihe nnọchianya nke ónyé na-ese ihe
Ónyé na-ese ihe na-eji ihe osise dị ka ihe, akara, ma ọ bụ agba iji gosipụta àgwà ma ọ bụ ọnọdụ mmadụ
site na iji foto nke ndị na-ese foto, ndị enyi ya na onwé ya
Akụkụ ọzọ dị mkpa nke ọrụ ya bụ nkewa
Ndị na-ekiri ihe nkiri nwéré ike ịhụ akụkụ ahụ na foto Sepuya
Site na nke a, ọ nwèrè ike ịmepụta mmetụta dị nso nke ịchọ ihe ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ agụụ a na-enye ndị na-ekiri ohere ijikọ ya na nka ya n'ụzọ miri emi
A na-egbutu foto ya, degharịa ya ma tinye ya na teepu iji mepụta ihe dị omimi nke ọdịbendị na-eme ihe ọ bụla yana mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na mgbanwe mmekọahụ
Foto ya na-egosi mmasị ya na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ihe osise na ịchọ ka foto ojii dịrị n'otu oge dị ka mkparịta ụka nke oge a
Ógè foto ya na-emekarị n'ụlọ ihe nkiri a ma ama dị ka nke ya ma ọ bụ ndị enyi ya iji gosipụta ọnụnọ ya na mmekọrịta ya na ndị mmadụ na foto ya

Usoro Sepuya Studio Work (2010X11) na-aga n'ihu na mmepe nke mmasị ya na-adịgide adịgide na foto na mmekọrịta chiri anya dị n'etiti ónyé na-ese foto na ónyé na-ewere foto na gbụrụ-gbúrụ ebe a na-achịkwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ogologo na obosara nke ọrụ ya na-enyocha ọ bụghị naanị àgwà na àgwà nke onyinyo ahụ kamakwa arụmọrụ onwé ónyé dị n'ime ụlọ ọrụ foto
Ụlọ ọrụ m bụ nke onwé, mànà ọ bụghị ebe mechiri emechi
Kama nke ahụ, ọ bụ ebe m biri ma megheere ndị gbara m gbụrụ-gbúrụ, ọ na-ekwu na ọ na-atụgharị uche na mmepụta nke ebe obibi studio na ndị a kpọrọ ka ha mee foto ha

Ọ na-enweta mkpali màkà nyocha nke oge a nke foto studio site na ọrụ Robert Mapplethorpe na ónyé na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na onye nkatọ Brian O'Doherty ónyé mbipụta ya 'Studio na Cube Na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ebe a na-eme nka na ebe a na'egosipụta nka' ha abụọ gosipụtara n'ụzọ pụtara ìhè n'ọrụ mbụ ya
O nweela ebe obibi na Studio Museum na Harlem ma tinye ọrụ ya na Leslie-Lohman Museum of Gay and Lesbian Art
Ndị na-akatọ nka na ndị na-anụ ọkụ n'obi na-eto ọrụ Sepuya n'ozuzu ya
Ọrụ ya dị iche n'echiche na ndị nkatọ kwetara na ojiji ya dị irè nke usoro ihe osise nkè ahụ
Paul Sika bụ onye na-ese foto ejiji na mgbasa ozi, onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe, onye amụrụ na 7 Jenụwarị 1985, na Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire
Ọ gụrụ maka injinia ngwanrọ na Mahadum Westminster, United Kingdom n'etiti afọ 2003 na 2007 wee ghọọ onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya na 2008
N'afọ 2009, e nyere ya onyinye Chinua Achebe Center Fellowship
Ọrụ ya nwere echiche dị egwu nke Africa na Technicolor- saturation, ha bụ n'ozuzu ha na-acha uhie uhie
N'ọrụ ya; ọ na-eji ndị na-eme ihe nkiri emepụta gburugburu ebe obibi a haziri nke ọma
Mgbe ọ chọpụtara onye America na-ese ihe Andy Warhol; ọ kpọrọ onwe ya nwa nwa Warhol
O kwuru Mgbe m hụrụ ọrụ LaChapelle, echere m, nke a dị ịtụnanya
Olee otú mmadụ ga-esi nwee echiche dị otú ahụ? Mgbe ị laghachiri n'akụkọ ihe mere eme, Andy Warhol duziri David LaChappelle
Ya mere, ọ bụ ihe na-ese ihe na nna, ọ bụ ya mere m ji kpọọ onwe m nwa nwa Andy Warhol
Dị ka CNN World dere; 'Onye na-ese ihe na Ivory Coast bụ Paul Sika abụghị onye na-ese foto nkịtị
Mmetụta nke nnukwu ihuenyo ahụ doro anya na foto Sika, nke yiri ihe nkiri sitere na ihe nkiri ultra-stylish, nke dị ntakịrị na Technicolor dị ebube
Paul Slabolepszy (a mụrụ n'afọ 1948), ma ọ bụ Paul 'Slab', bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ede egwuregwu na South Africa
A mụrụ Slabolepszy na Bolton, England
Nne ya bụ onye Bekee na nna ya bụ onye Poland gbara ọsọ ndụ
Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara South Africa
Ọ tolitere na Musina, Pietersburg na Witbank
Slabolepszy gara ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi ndị Katọlik, College of the Little Flower na Polokwane
Ebumnuche mbụ ya bụ ịghọ onye na-akọwa egwuregwu redio
Mgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-egwu bọọlụ, ọ ga-ekwu okwu ma dekọọ nkọwa maka igwu egwu mgbe e mesịrị
N'oge na-adịghị anya, nkọwa ndị a ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ
Slabolepszy wee gbasaa nke a iji mee akụkọ egwuregwu
Akwụkwọ akụkọ obodo ahụ nabatara ụfọdụ n'ime onyinye ya ya mere ọ ghọrọ onye nta akụkọ egwuregwu bipụtara mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
Na mbụ, ọ na-ezube ịchụso ọrụ na redio, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Bekee na Drama na Mahadum Cape Town
N'oge a, ọ hụrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya ma na-ejide ya na mkpọtụ na mmetụta nke ngwa ngwa
O wee kpebie ilekwasị anya n'ime ihe nkiri
N'afọ 1983, Paul natara Standard Bank Young Artist Award
O doro anya na ọ bụ onye edemede egwuregwu a ma ama na South Africa mgbe Athol Fugard gasịrị, Slabolepszy bụ onye edemedi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye guzobere The Space Theatre, ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ na-abụghị agbụrụ na South Africa, ya na Athol Fugard, Yvonne Bryceland na John Kani n'afọ 1972
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere The Market Theatre a ma ama n'ụwa niile na Johannesburg, ya na Mannie Manim na Barney Simon n'afọ 1976
Ọ bụ enyi ogologo oge na onye na-arụkọ ọrụ na onye na'eme ihe nkiri Bill Flynn
Slabolepszy enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, gụnyere ihe nrite ọ bụla nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma n'afọ 1993 maka ọrụ Eddie na akwụkwọ ya The Return of Elvis Du Pisanie
Ndị a gụnyere 1993 Vita, Fleur du Cap na Dalro Awards, Best New South African Play, Best Actor, Best Production, Best Director ♡ yana The Star Tonight IGI Life Vita Award for Comedy
A na-eme ihe nkiri ya na mba ụwa
Paul Stopforth bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke bi na United States ugbu a
Gọọmentị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gbochiri ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya n'ala nna ya wee gaa United States n'afọ 1988
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọkwa ya dị ka onye nkuzi na Visual and Environmental Studies na Director of Undergraduate Studies na Mahadum Harvard, ebe ọ malitere ịkụzi n'afọ 1996
Ọ bụ onye na-eleta ngalaba na School of the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston
Stopforth gụrụ akwụkwọ na Johannesburg College of Art na Royal College of Art dị na London
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugboro ugboro n'ihe gbasara mgbasa ozi ngwakọta na akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ South African National Gallery chịkọtara ya kpamkpam n'afọ 1979

N'afọ 1981 na 1983 Stopforth mere nnukwu ihe osise abụọ akpọrọ 'Elegy' na 'Interrogation Space #1-5' banyere Steve Biko, onye isi nke Black Consciousness Movement nke South Africa nwụrụ na 1977 site n'isi mgbe ọ nọ n'aka ndị uwe ojii

Mgbe ọnwụ Biko gasịrị, a na-ekesa foto nke onyinyo ozu ya n'ọtụtụ ebe, na-eme ka Biko ghara ịbụ mmadụ ma na-agbanwe ya ka ọ bụrụ arịa nke ndụ efu (n'iji okwu ahụ eme ihe, ahụ nke na-anọchite anya ọkwa ndụ dị ala na-abụghị nke mmepeanya, onye a napụrụ uru mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya niile ma nwee ike igbu ya n'enweghị mmetụta)
Karịsịa, ihe osise Stopforth 'Elegy' na-eme ka Biko bụrụ onye nwụrụ n'ihi okwukwe ya maka mmegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Paul Harris Yule (amụrụ n'afọ 1956) bụ onye nta akụkọ foto na onye na-eme ihe nkiri

Na mgbakwunye na foto ya, ọ duziri ihe karịrị ihe nkiri irí atọ na kọntinent isii, ọtụtụ ógè na isiokwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na-ese okwu, ọtụtụ n'ime ha enwetala nnukwu onyinye, gụnyere International Emmy (n'ihe banyere Damned in the USA - Berwick Universal Pictures, afọ 1990), onyinye sitere na Royal Television Society, Edward Morrow Prize, na Amnesty International[n 1][n 2][n 3] O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta Berwick Universal Pictures na London n'afọ 1980
A mụrụ Paul Yule na Johannesburg, South Africa na ezinụlọ ya kwagara England ógè ọ dị afọ asatọ
Ọ gara Aldenham School wee mụọ Philosophy, Politics and Economics (PPE) na Mahadum Oxford
Ebe izizi ọ na-ewepụta foto bụ na-arụ ọrụ n'ihe banyere magazin Mahadum Oxford Isis, ma na-edekọ ọrụ ihe nkiri izizi nke ndị oge ya Rowan Atkinson, Richard Curtis na ndị ọzọ nke ọgbọ ahụ
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Oxford n'afọ 1979, Yule gara Peru ọnwa asatọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto na The Cusichaca Project dị nso na Cusco

N'afọ 1980, ya na onye na-ese foto Chris Plytas guzobere Berwick Universal Pictures, na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ dị n'okpuru ala na Berwick Street, London, n'otu afọ ahụ, o mere foto na imewe maka Rowan Atkinson's Live in Belfast album

N'afọ 1983, mgbe ọtụtụ nleta gachara Peru, akwụkwọ ya The New Incas (nke John Hemming gosipụtara) ka The New Pyramid Press bipụtara ma gosipụta foto ndị ahụ n'ọtụtụ ebe, gụnyere na Side Gallery na Newcastle, Royal Geographical Society na The Photographers' Gallery na London
N'afọ 2021, e bipụtara akwụkwọ Limited-Edition nke foto ya, 'My Developing Eye'
Yule lụrụ onye na-ese nkiri Denise Dorrance ma nwee ụmụ anọ

Paul Johan du Toit (ụbọchị irí atọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1965 rụọ úbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2014) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa, na-arụ ọrụ na eserese, ihe ọkpụkpụ, akwụkwọ na mgbasa ozi ngwakọta
E gosipụtara ihe ngosi ya n'ụwa niile
Karịsịa, a họọrọ atọ n'ime ihe ọkpụkpụ ya màkà 2001 Florence Biennale
Otu n'ime ọtụtụ onyinye ọ natara bụ ihe nrite sitere n'obodo Florence na Biennale Internationale Dell'arte Contemporanea
A họpụtara ya màkà onyinye Daimler Chrysler Sculpture Award nke afọ 2002
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, a kpọrọ Paul ka ya na ónyé bụbu ónyé isi ala Nelson Mandela na ndị egwu mba ụwa rụọ ọrụ na mkpọsa 46664
A mụrụ Paul Johan du Toit n'ubochí irí atọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1965 na Johannesburg

Ọ tolitere na Mayfair Johannesburg ma oge ya nọrọ n'etiti nwanne nne ya na-ese ihe, Elizabeth van der Sandt, na ụlọ ọrụ nna ya, ebe ọ na-emepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ site na ngwaọrụ eletrik ebe nwanne nne ya kụziiri ya usoro eserese mmanụ

N'afọ 1984, Paul du Toit debara aha ya n'afọ 1985 ka e debara áhà ha na South African Air Force ebe o jiri oge ahụ rụọ ọrụ ịkwa nkà, rụọ ọrụ ọla nchara izizi ya nke ụgbọelu ma mụọ sayensị kọmputa nwa oge site na Pretoria Technikon
Mgbè ọ hapụrụ ndị agha ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme mmemme kọmputa N'afọ 1988, ụlọ ọrụ Paul du Toit na-arụ ọrụ na ya batara na liquidation ma ọ rụrụ ọrụ na-agwụ ike na ụlọ akụ iji nweta ego
N'oge a niile, ọ na-ese ihe n'abalị iji mee ka nkà nka ya dị ndụ
N'afọ 1992, nleta Florence na Ịtali ga-abụ ógè mgbanwe n'ọrụ nka Paul
Ọ bụ David nke Michelangelo kpaliri ya nke ukwuu nke na ọ laghachiri na-agba mbọ ime ọrụ nka ya
Mmetụta a ka ọ dịkwuo ike site na njem ha gara Paris afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ébé ikpughe otu ihe a tụrụ atụ nke e ji ụfụfụ polyurethane na plastik mee n'azụ Louvre, kpaliri ya n'ezie
Ọ laghachiri South Africa wee bido ime ihe ọkpụkpụ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ya, site na ihe ndị a tụfuru atụfu
Otu n'ime ndị a meriri ya 'Best Artist with No Formal Training' na Association of Arts na Bellville Cape
N'ime ụlọ ọrụ ya na Hout Bay, Paul bịdọrọ iji usoro impasto (ihe nkedo ụlọ ọrụ siri ike nke ọ na-etinye akara na ihe oyiyi) nke ga-aghọ ihe dị mkpà n'ụdị edemede ya na-akpaghị aka
N'oge a, o jikwa ihe ọmụma kọmputa ya mee ka ojiji ya nke ịntanetị dịkwuo mma ma jikọọ na ihe nkiri nka mba ụwa
N'afọ 2014, du Toit nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa
Ọ dị afọ iri anọ na asatọ
N'afọ 1997 Paul rere ihe osise mbụ ya n'ógbè ahụ
Ọ malitekwara ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ya ma ónyé nwe ụlọ ngosi ihe nkiri na Paris hụrụ ọrụ ya ma kpọọ ya ka ọ gosipụta ya na 1998
Paul kpebiri ime ihe osise ya ka ọ ghọrọ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi otu na Groot Constantia Art Gallery
1998 bụ afọ Paul gara na sekit mba ụwa na ihe osise ndị a na-egosi n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mba ụwa na mpaghara
Ọ pụtara na CNN International Art Club ma mee ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na Paris
Afọ 1999 gosipụtara na ọ gara n'ihu na mmasị obodo na nke mba ụwa na ihe ngosi na Moscow, Edinburgh na ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara na-azụta ụfọdụ ọrụ Paul
2000 bụ nnupụisi nye Paul ka Prọfesọ họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime irí asaá karịrị 2000 ː a dị ịrịba ama ihe
Nke a dugara n'ihe ngosi nke otu na otu na Cape Town yana ihe ngosi na Netherlands na France
2000 mara ọkwa mmalite nke ihe osise osisi Paul
N'afọ 2001, a họpụtara ya ka ọ gosipụta ọrụ ya na Florence Biennale of Contemporary Art ebe ọ meriri n'ọnọdụ nke ise na ngalaba ihe ọkpụkpụ
A họpụtakwara ya maka onyinye Daimler Chrysler maka ihe osise South Africa
O mere ihe ngosi abụọ n'onwe ya otu na Holland Art Fair na The Hague na nke ọzọ na Cape Town
Ihe ngosi PlanetPaul
Ezigbo njem, 2000, Acrylic on canvas, 2m x 2m, paul du toit
Balance, 2001, impasto, 120 x 140 cm, Paul du Toit

Paula Ingabire Bụ onye Rwandan ọkachamara na teknụzụ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye na-eje ozi dị ka Minista nke Ozi na teknụpụ nkwukọrịta na Innovation, na Cabinet nke Rwanda, kemgbe ụbọchị 18 Ọktoba 2018
Ingabire gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Rwanda, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta nzere Master of Science na Injinia na Nchịkwa, site na Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT)
Ọ bụ onye Systems Design & Management Fellow na MIT
Tupu nhọpụta ya ugbu a, Ingabire bụ Onye isi nke Kigali Innovation City initiative
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ nọ n'ọkwa Onye isi nke ICT na Rwanda Development Board
Paula Slier (amụrụ 26 Maachị) bụ telivishọn South Africa, redio na onye nta akụkọ ebipụta, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye nta akụkọ agha, onye dabere na Middle East
Ọ bụ etiti ọwụwa anyanwụ Bureau Chief maka RT, na onye nchoputa na onye isi nke Newshound Media International
A mụrụ Slier na Johannesburg, South Africa, ma bụrụ ọkpara n'ime mmadụ atọ, nwere ma nwanne nwoke na nwanne nwanyị tọrọ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Waverley Girls, na-esote nke ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum Witwatersrand, wee nweta akara ugo mmụta na mmekọrịta mba ụwa na nkà ihe ọmụma
Slier malitere ọrụ ya na nta akụkọ na telivishọn obodo South Africa

Nnukwu ezumike mbụ ya bịara mgbe, mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ abụọ na-akwụghị ụgwọ, e nyere ya ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri ụtụtụ ụtụtụ The Breakfast Club na South African Broadcasting Corporation, na njikwa na-ekwu, 'Ịhụ na ị rụsiri ọrụ ike maka anyị n'enweghị
a na-akwụ gị ụgwọ, chee echiche ka ị ga-esi arụ ọrụ ma ọ bụrụ na anyị akwụ gị ụgwọ' Mgbe ọ nọ na SABC, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ ukwu na nwanyị mgbakasị, na-agụ akụkọ abalị na SABC3
N'afọ 2002, o kpebiri ịgbalị ịbanye na akụkọ akụkọ mba ụwa wee gbaa arụkwaghịm wee jiri ego echekwara ya zụta obere igwefoto na laptọọpụ wee kwaga Middle East

Mgbe Yassar Arafat na-anwụ na 2004, ọ gara Ramallah iji kọọ akụkọ ahụ mgbe ọ kpọtụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ akụkọ mgbe ahụ nke Amụma Anya, Katy Katapodis, bụ onye tinyere ya n'ikuku mgbe mkparịta ụka 20 nke abụọ gasịrị, na-ekwu na ọ bụ ngwa ngwa o nwetụrụla
were onye ọ bụla n'ọrụ
Dị ka onye nta akụkọ na-akwụghị ụgwọ na Middle East o nyere aka na akụkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, Carte Blanche, na Reuters Africa
N'afọ 2005, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi Middle East Bureau Chief maka RT

N'afọ 2006, onye isi akụkọ SABC, Snuki Zikalala, nyere iwu ka a machibido akụkọ Slier kpamkpam n'ihi na 'ọ na-akatọ onye isi ala South Africa Thabo Mbeki', na 'dị ka Slier bụ onye Juu ọ na-akwado Israel'
Na mgbakwunye na RT, Slier na-achịkwa Newshound Media International nke o guzobere n'afọ 2008
Companylọ ọrụ ahụ na-emepụta ọdịnaya maka ọtụtụ netwọkụ mba ụwa, yana Slier na-ejikwa otu eriri gburugburu ụwa, ọkachasị na Africa na Middle East
Paula Wilson (amụrụ na Disemba 17, 1975) bụ ónyé Africa-America 'mixed media' na-ese ihe na-emepụta ọrụ na-enyocha njirimara ụmụ nwanyị site na oghere nke akụkọ ọdịbendị
Ọ na-eji ihe ọkpụkpụ, collage, eserese, ntinye, na usoro obibi akwụkwọ dị ka silkscreen, lithography, na woodblock
N'afọ 2007, Wilson si Brooklyn, New York, kwaga Carrizozo, New Mexico (ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 996), ebe ya na onye ọrụ osisi ya bụ Mike Lagg bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a
A mụrụ Paula Wilson na Chicago ma too na Hyde Park n'akụkụ ndịda nke obodo ahụ, ebe nnà ya, William Julius Wilson, bụ prọfesọ nkè mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Mahadum Chicago
Nné ya, Beverly Ann Wilson, bụ onye na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ede akwụkwọ
Paula Wilson gàrà Mahadum Washington (St
Louis, Missouri) site na 1994-1998, nweta BFA
ya ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ summa cum laude
Wilson nwetara MFA
ya na Mahadum Columbia (New York, New York)
A maara Wilson màkà nnukwu ọrụ ya na-emetụ n'ahụ na-akọwa akụkọ na gbụrụ-gbúrụ ebe obibi ndị dabara na ahụmịhe ya dị ka nwanyị ojii
Ọ na-echepụta ihe osise akụkọ ihe mere eme ma tinye nsụgharị nke onwé ya n'ime ala na Canon
Na-agbanwe n'etiti ihe osise na ihe osise, ọ na-ewu akụkọ site na ịdakpọ ụgbọ elu eserese
Ọrụ Wilson na-adabere na onyinyo onwe onye, óbìbì akwụkwọ, ntinye, na collage

Ọ na-ebipụta ihe oyiyi na blọk osisi, silkscreens, intaglio, na monotypes; akwa acrylic, mmanụ, na ágbá; na-ese vidiyo na-etinye ọrụ 2-D n'ime ala; ọ na-ebibi, na-agbakọta, na stitches iji mee ka ihe dị iche iche, nke jupụtara
Ọrụ ya na-agbakarị na mgbidi ma ọ bụ etiti ha, na-egosipụta nchịkọta nke ahụmịhe ndụ ojii na ọcha, ọbọdọ ukwu na ime obodo, ọdịnala na nke oge a, otu na otu
Wilson bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Carrizozo, New Mexico na onye mmekọ ya, onye ọrụ osisi Mike Lagg
E gosipụtara Wilson na akwụkwọ ndị dị ka Hyperallergic, Artforum, The New York Times, The Brooklyn Rail, na The New Yorker
Wilson natara onyinye nke Distinction site na Mahadum Washington Sam Fox School of Design & Visual Arts, St
Louis, Missouri, na 2019
E nyela ya ebe obibi na Fabric Working and Museum (2009-2010) Vermont Studio Center na Giverny Residency site na Art Production Fund na Giverni, France
O nwetakwala ọnọdụ na Short List, Joyce Alexander Wein Artist Prize, Studio Museum na Harlem, New York, New York
2007 na Milovich Award na Painting, School of Art, Mahadum Washington, 1998
Paulina Oduro bụ onye Ghana na-eti egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ọka ikpe na onye na-eme ihe omume nkwago
Ọ dị 7ft 8 n'ịdị elu nwanyị kachasị ogologo na Ghana
A mụrụ Paulina Oduro na Sekondi-Takoradi na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Ghana
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, ọ kwagara Japan nọọ afọ abụọ ya na nna ya, onye nnọchi anya, na nne ya, ma mụọ ịkpọ piano oge ochie ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu
Ya na nne na nna ya mere njem gaa London mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, ma sonye n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ, dị ka ime ihe nkiri na ịgba egwu
Ọ ghọrọ onye nọọsụ gutara ọnụ ya mgbe afọ iri gachara, mana mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ a iji gbasoo nka ma malite ịbụ abụ ọkachamara
Ọrụ ịbụ abụ Oduro gawara azụmahịa n'afọ 1980 mgbe ndị egwu na ndị otu ya na-akụ egwu, gụnyere David Rudder na Arrow, webatara ya na egwu soca na reggae
O so na otu nke Casanova reggae band n'afọ 1982 nke wepụtara otu egwu 'Loving You This Way' n'ime ọnwa isii
Oduro gara naanị ya n'afọ 1999, ma mehee abọm ya bụ Woman Power
A kọrọ na Oduro kwagara biri na Ghana n'afọ 2009 n'ihi nwa ya nwoke Raymond Charles's Jnr na-eme ka ihere mee ezinụlọ ya site n'iji ọhịa mgbanaka
Nwa nwa ya bụ Carter bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ ama ama na Wales, United Kingdom
Ọ na-ekwu na ọ bụ nne Teresa nke Ghana
N'ezie, a ka na ebo ebubo nkea
Oduro emela ọtụtụ nkwado ego na ihe omume ebere site na mmemme ya
Ihe omume ndị a gụnyere Love Your World 5000 for Autism awareness, Dream Child African Renaissance Project na Grand Ball nke MUSIGA
Oduro jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya mgbasa ozi Ama K
Abebrese malitere na July 2014 na-akwalite ọdịdị ụcha akpụkpọ anụ ahụ
Ọ na-esonyere ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ a ma ama na Ghana, gụnyere Hamamat Montia na Nana Ama McBrown, dị ka ndị na-ebute N'okwụ megide ntepu ụgha akpụkpọ ahụ na mgbasa ozi nke 'I love My Natural Skin Tone'
Pauline Nwere ike izo aka na
Pauline Cope (amụrụ 16 Febrụwarị 1969), onye aha ya lụrụ bụ Pauline Cope-Boanas, bụ onye England bụbu onye mgbaru ọsọ bọọlụ
Ọ meriri bọọlụ 60 maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị England n'etiti mpụta mbụ ya na 1995 na ezumike nka na bọọlụ mba ụwa na 2004
Cope bụ onye mgbaru ọsọ mbụ nke England na-ahọrọ na 1995 FIFA Women's World Cup na UEFA Women's Euro 2001
Ted Copeland, onye nchịkwa England na asọmpi mbụ, kọwara Cope dị ka onye na-eche nche nwanyị kacha mma n'ụwa
N'ịbụ onye malitere igwu egwu na Millwall Lionsses na obodo ya South London, Cope nọgidere ruo 1998
Oge ya na klọb gbakọtara na egwuregwu abụọ dị iche iche ya na Arsenal na oge ịgba bọọlụ na 1993 – 94
Ọ gara n'ihu na Croydon, onye bịara n'okpuru nkwado nke Charlton Athletic na 2000
Cope kwụsịrị ọrụ klọb ya na-egwu Charlton n'okpuru njikwa nke onye mmekọ na di Keith Boanas n'ọdịnihu, na-ala ezumike nká na 2006
Onye mmeri otu egwuregwu ugboro atọ, Cope meriri iko FA ụmụ nwanyị ugboro anọ ma bụrụ onye ikpeazụ meriri ugboro abụọ
Na ọkwa klọb Cope meriri iko FA Women's Cup na Millwall Lionesses, Arsenal na Croydon na na Mee 2004 gbara Charlton bọọlụ na mmeri ikpeazụ ha meriri Arsenal 3-0
Na ngwụcha iko iko ụmụ nwanyị FA nke afọ 2000 na Bramall Lane, Cope zọpụtara ntaramahụhụ n'aka onye otu ya na England bụ Karen Walker ka Croydon meriri Doncaster Belles 2–1

Ka Croydon na-eme ememe mmeri ha, Cope kpughere T-shirt nke nwere akụkọ akụkọ 'Ahụrụ m Keith m n'anya' N'izu na-esote Croydon meriri Aston Villa 6–0 iji merie otu egwuregwu wee nweta okpukpu abụọ nke ụlọ
Na 2003 Cope nwetara ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmepe ụmụ nwanyị oge niile na Charlton Athletic
Ọnọdụ ahụ nyere ya ohere imeziwanye ụzọ ọ na-azụ 'Anọ m n'ọnọdụ kacha mma na football ụmụ nwanyị na Europe
Ma eleghị anya, ọbụna ụwa, n'ihi na m ga-azụ ụbọchị-na ụbọchị-out na Dean Kiely, onye bụ otu n'ime ndị kasị mma na-echebe gburugburu
' Ọ gbara na mmeri Charlton 3–0 meriri Fulham ọkachamara oge niile na 2003 FA Women's Cup Final

N'abalị abụọ ka o nyere Charlton aka merie Arsenal 2–1 na 2006 Premier League Cup ikpeazụ, Cope dị afọ 37 rụpụtara ọmarịcha arụmọrụ na ọkara ikpeazụ nke iko iko FA mana Charlton meriri 2–1 n'otu ndị mmegide ahụ

N'ịbụ onye na-ekiri ya n'akụkụ akara a mbubreyo mmeri na mgbakwunye oge, Arsenal njikwa Vic Akers kwupụtara 'Pauline Cope bụ nnọọ pụtara ìhè' Cope lara ezumike nká na bọọlụ klọb na njedebe nke oge 2005–06

Mgbe egwuregwu ikpeazụ ya gasịrị, mmeri 1-0 na Everton nke nyefere Charlton n'ọkwa nke atọ na tebụl, onye isi klọb Casey Stoney kwuru banyere Cope 'Ọ bụrụ na m na-ekwu eziokwu, echeghị m na enwere ike dochie ya
Ọ bụ onye mgbaru ọsọ kacha mma m hụtụrụla'
Cope gbara ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị England agadi bọọlụ ugboro 60, na-eme mpụta mbụ ya na asọmpi enyi na enyi ya na Italy na Florence na 26 Jenụwarị 1995
Ka ọ na-erule oge 1995 FIFA Women's World Cup, nke emere na Sweden n'oge June 1995, ọ chụpụrụ onye otu egwuregwu Millwall mbụ Lesley Higgs dị ka onye mgbaru ọsọ mbụ nke England
N'asọmpi a, a kọwapụtara na ihe omume Cope mere na mmeri zuru oke nke Norway na Germany kwụsịrị 'ihere jọgburu onwe ya' maka ndị otu Bekee na-enweghị atụ
Onye nkuzi mba Ted Copeland kọwara ya dị ka 'onye na-eche nche kacha mma n'ụwa'
N'October 2000, onye na-elekọta ihe mgbaru ọsọ Rachel Brown na-egwuri egwu na UEFA Women's Euro 2001 qualification play-off na Ukraine mgbe Cope nwere mkpesa afọ n'ụtụtụ nke egwuregwu ahụ
E weghachiri Cope na otu maka asọmpi ikpeazụ wee gwuo egwuregwu atọ ahụ ka England na-apụ na ọkwa otu
Na Eprel 2004 Cope lara ezumike nká na-atụghị anya ya na bọọlụ mba ụwa
Na Septemba 2015 Cope sonyeere Gillingham Ladies dị ka onye nchịkwa mgbaru ọsọ
Cope bụ nwunye onye bụbu onye nkuzi otu ụmụ nwanyị Estonia Keith Boanas na nne di ya nye Sonny na Kari Boanas
N'agbanyeghị ogologo mkpakọrịta ya na ngalaba nwanyị Millwall, Cope ka bụ onye nkwado West Ham United
Pauline Ibeagha (amụrụ na 13 Mee 1978) bụ onye Naijirịa na-agba ọsọ lara ezumike ṅká
Ọrụ ya kachasị elu na 2002, ọ sonyere na 2002 Commonwealth Games, ruo ọkara ikpeazụ nke 100 na 200 mita ma mechie nke ise na 4 × 100 mita relay
Na 2002 African Championships ndị otu Naijirịa emeghị 4 × 100 mita relay, mana ha meriri ọlaọcha na 4 × 400 mita relay
Ibeagha mechara ruo mita 200 nke ọkara ikpeazụ na 2004 African Championships
Oge kachasị mma ya bụ 1138 sekọnd na mita 100, nke o nwetara na Machị 2002 na Enugu; na 2399 sekọnd n'ime mita 200, nke o nwetara n'egwuregwu Commonwealth nke 2002 na Manchester
Pauline Janet Smith (2 Eprel 1882 – 29 Jenụarị 1959)
Ọ bụ onye ode akwụkwọ ọgụgụ South Africa, onye edemede akụkọ dị mkpirisi, onye na-echeta ihe na onye na-ede egwuregwu
A mụrụ Pauline Smith na 2 Eprel 1882 na Oudtshoorn, South Africa, ma tolite na Little Karoo
Ọ bụ okenye nke ụmụnwanyị abụọ mụrụ Herbert Urmson Smith, onye dibia bekee, na nwunye ya bụ Jessie nke Scotland, onye si Aberdeen
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, e zigara ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ a na-ebi ebi na Scotland
Smith ebikwaghị ebi na South Africa na-adịgide adịgide ọzọ, n'agbanyeghị na n'oge ndụ ya niile ọ gara ọtụtụ nleta na mba ahụ
Nleta ogologo oge ya nke 1913–1914, na akwụkwọ akụkọ ọ debere, hibere ntọala nke ọtụtụ akụkọ nke The Little Karoo na akwụkwọ akụkọ ya The Beadle
Na 1908 ọ zutere onye England na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ Arnold Bennett, onye gbara ya ume ide akụkọ ifo banyere South Africa
N'ikpeazụ, o bipụtara ọrụ abụọ a kacha mara ya nchịkọta akụkọ The Little Karoo (1925), na akwụkwọ akụkọ The Beadle (1926)
Smith bụkwa enyi Frank Swinnerton
Ọ nwụrụ na 29 Jenụwarị 1959 na Dorset, England
A na-enwe nchịkọta akwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Cape Town

Pauline Kies (ubochí isé n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1918 Stellenbosch rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Jenụwari 1999 Mossel Bay) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe osise na ónyé na-ahụ màkà ihe ọkụkụ na South Africa nke a maara nke ọma màkà ọrụ ya 'Flowering Plants of the Southern Cape' (Still Bay Trust, 1986), na ːMore Flowering Plantes of the Southern Cabo (1995) n'okpuru aha 'Pauline Bohnen'
Ọ bụ nwá nwanyị nke prọfesọ
Charles Frederick Kies (ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktob 1885 Harrismith) na Hermine Krige (ubochí irí abụọ na ànó n'ọnwa Machị 1887 Stellenbosch)
[ihe odide gburugburu] egosi ónyé a dị ka ónyé edemede mgbè ọ na-ezo aka na botanical
Ihe ndịda ọ chịkọtara dị ihe dị ka otu puku, ọ bụkwa ndị sitere na mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Cape, Fauresmith na Pretoria
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Huguenot College dị na Wellington n'oge 1935 rụo 1939, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na MSc
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ otu afọ (1940) na Kirstenbosch National Botanical Garden, National Herbarium dị na Pretoria sochiri ya n'afọ 1941-43, mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị ọ malitere ọrụ nọọsụ na 1943-45
Ọ laghachiri na ndị ọrụ nke National Herbarium na 1946-50, n'oge ahụ (1948), ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ahụ màkà mmekọrịta na Kew

N'ubochí irí na asaá n'ọnwa Disemba 1949, na London, ọ lụrụ ónyé South Africa Hendrik Thomas Bohnen (ubochí irí abụọ n'otu n'ọnwa Eprel 1917 rụo ụbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2018), gbaa arụkwaghịm na Kew ọnwa isii ka e mesịrị wee laghachi Pretoria mgbè amuchara nwá ya nwanyị na 1952
Ọ kwagara Stilbaai na 1977, ma mesịa gaa Riversdale
A màrà ọkwa na Pauline Bohnen Nature Reserve na Stilbaai, mpaghara dị mkpa nke limestone fynbos, na 1982

Nna ya, Charles Frederick Kies, bụ ónyé a ma ama na chọọchị nke, mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka ónyé ozi ala ọzọ na Northern Rhodesia, jupụtara n'oche Prọfesọ nke nkà mmụta okpukpe na Huguenot College na Wellington
Ọ bụkwa onye otu kọmitii (1920 Xi32) nke e nyere ọrụ ịsụgharị Bible n'asụsụ Afrikaans, ma dee akwụkwọ dị iche iche gbasara nkà mmụta okpukpe na akwụkwọ maka ụmụaka
Ụmụ Pauline
Ụmụnne Pauline
Pauline Konga (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1970) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge lara ezumike nká
Na 1996 Summer Olympics ọ meriri ọlaọcha na mita 5000, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị Kenya mbụ meriri nrite Olympic
N'afọ 1990, ọ gbara nke 125 na 1990 World Cross Country Championships
N'afọ 1991, ọ gara n'ihu ruo na nke iri na ise na 1991 World Cross Country Championships, wee bụrụ onye nke iri na abụọ na 3000 mita na 1991 World Championships
Ọ ghọkwara onye mmeri Kenya na ịgba ọsọ na-agafe mba (ogologo oge)
N'afọ 1992, ọ gbara nke iri itoolu na asọmpi World Cross Country Championship nke afọ 1992, mana ọ gara nke asaa na asọmpi 1993 World Cross Country Championships, merikwara ọla edo na asọmpi otu
Konga sonyere na egwuregwu Olimpik mbụ ya na afọ 1992, na-enweghị ọganihu site na okpomọkụ na mita 3000
N'afọ 1996 ọ ghọrọ onye mmeri mita 5000 nke Kenya ma mechie nke atọ na 1996 Grand Prix Final
N'egwuregwu Olimpik nke afọ 1996 ọ meriri nrite ọlaọcha na mita 5000, na-aghọ nwanyị Kenya mbụ meriri nrọ Olimpik

Ihe kacha mma ya bụ 8 3776 nkeji na mita 3000, nke o nwetara n'August 1996 na Monaco; 14 4751 nkeji na mita 5000, nke o mere n'August 1997 na Köln; na 1 09 33 awa na ọkara marathon, nke o ruru na Jenụwarị na afo 1996 na Marrakech
A mụrụ ya na Baringo District
Ọ lụrụ Paul Bitok, onye ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na mita 5000 nke ụmụ nwoke na afọ 1996 Olympics
Pauline Mvele (a mụrụ n'afọ 1969) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi na onye na-ede ihe nkiri si Burkina Faso
A maara Mvele maka imepụta ihe ngosi, ma na-ebi na Gabon ugbu a
Ihe ndekọ ya na-elekwasị anya n'okwu ndị dịka HIV / AIDS na Africa, na mmeso ọjọọ nke ndị inyom di ha nwụrụ na ndị mkpọrọ na Gabon
N'afọ 2014, ihe nkiri ya meriri ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Burundi Film Festival
A mụrụ Pauline Mvele na Ivory Coast n'afọ 1969, a zụlitere ya na Burkina Faso
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Joseph Ki-Zerbo dị na Ouagadougou ebe ọ zutere di ya, n'afọ 1999 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere masta na akwụkwọ akụkọ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Mvele na di ya, onye bụ onye Gabon, kwagara Gabon
Mgbe ọ nọ na Gabon, ọ na-eche nsogbu ịchọta ọrụ ihu ma na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche tupu ọ chọta ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ na-ede maka magazin ụmụ nwanyị Amina
Mvele sonyere n'òtù mgbochi HIV / AIDS
A kpaliri ya ịmalite ọrụ ya na ime ihe nkiri mgbe o dechara edemede banyere ihe isi ike ndị inyom nwere nje HIV na Gabon na-eche ihu, ma hụ nzaghachi dị mma nke edemede ahụ nwetara
N'afọ 2009, Mvele duziri Accroche-toi! (English Hold On!), ihe nkiri ihe nkiri mbụ ya
Accroche-toi! nyochara ndụ ụmụ nwanyị ise na-arịa ọrịa HIV na Gabon, na ebumnuche nke ibelata ihere megide ndị nwere nje HIV na ịgba ndị nwere nje ume ka ha ghara ịkwụsị ndụ
O mepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na mmekorita ya na onye nduzi Gabonese Imunga Ivanga, ụlọ ọrụ Gabonese Institute of Image and Sound mepụtara ma kwado ihe nkiri ahụ

N'afọ 2011, Mvele duziri Non coupables (English Not guilty!), ihe ngosi nke na-akatọ mmegbu ndị inyom di ha nwụrụ na Gabon site n'aka ezinụlọ nke di ha nwụrụ anwụ, ọkachasị omume nke ịnapụ ndị inyom ndị di ha nwụrụ ihe onwunwe ha
N'afọ 2014, ọ duziri ihe ngosi Sans familie (English Without Family), nke kọwapụtara mmeso ọjọọ na ọnọdụ ibi ndụ dị njọ nke ndị mkpọrọ na Libreville Detention Center

Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2017, Mvele na-arụ ọrụ na ihe ngosi ọhụrụ akpọrọ 'Le Nganga blanc', nke na-agbaso ndụ Hugues Obiang Poitevin, onye France bi na Gabon ruo afọ iri anọ, ma mikpuo onwe ya na omenala Gabonese, ọkachasị Bwiti
Ihe ngosi ahụ meriri ihe nrite mbụ maka Best Concept site na Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou
Mvele jikọrọ aka hazie Third Urusaro International Women's Film Festival n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2018
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2019, ọ bụ onye otu East African Jury na Urusaro International Women's Film Festival
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2019, a mara ọkwa na Mvele ga-egosi ọrụ ihe nkiri ọhụrụ na Yaoundé Film Lab mbụ na Cameroon site na Nọvember ruo Disemba afọ 2019
Pauline Powell Burns (1872-1912) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na onye na-akpọ piano
Ọ bụ ónyé Africa America mbụ na-ese ihe na-egosi ihe osise na California na 1890
Powell bụkwa ónyé na-akpọ piano nke na-eme ihe ngosi gburugburu San Francisco Bay Area
A mụrụ Pauline Powell na 1872 na Oakland, California, na Josephine Turner na di ya, ónyé na-ebu ụgbọ okporo ígwè William W
Powell
Nnà nnà ya bụ Joseph Fossett, otu n'ime ndị ohu Thomas Jefferson bụ ónyé a tọhapụrụ site na iwu ya na 1826
Nne nne ya Isabella Fossett bụkwa ohu ma dị ka nwatakịrị e rere ya na Monticello na 1827 dị ka akụkụ nke ụgwọ ala, mgbè e mesịrị gbalaga Boston
Nne na nna Powell kwagara Oakland, ebe amụrụ nwa ha nwanyị Pauline na 1872, afọ nné nné ya Isabella nwụrụ
N'October 11, 1893, ọ lụrụ Edward E
Burns; ha enweghị ụmụ
Powell gosipụtara nkà egwu na nka n'oge ọ malitere ma mụọ piano na eserese
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị Africa America na-abanye na California School of Design n'oge ahụ, o yiri ka ọ bụ ónyé nkụzi onwe ya
Ọ na-eme ihe ngosi piano n'ihu ọha n'ógbè ahụ ma ọ dịkarịa ala otu ugboro bụrụ abụ n'otu quartet na Los Angeles; ónyé édémédé Bay Area toro ya dị ka ónyé na-egbuke egbuke nke steeti ya
A na-edebe ụfọdụ akwụkwọ metụtara ndụ Powell na Archives of California Art
