Smith bụkwa enyi Frank Swinnerton
Ọ nwụrụ na 29 Jenụwarị 1959 na Dorset, England
A na-enwe nchịkọta akwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Cape Town
Pauline Kedem Tallen OFR (amụrụ ya n' ụbọchị asatọ n' ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1959 )ọ bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria na Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na mmepe ọha na eze ugbu a

Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara ya n'afọ 2019 mgbe ọ jụrụ nhọpụta onye nnọchi anya n'afọ 2015 n'ihi na a gwaghị ya tupu ọkwa nke nhọpụta ahụ nakwa na ọ gaghị anabata onyinye maka nkesa ike n'etiti mpaghara atọ nke steeti ala ya n'ihi n'ihi ne o si n'otu gọọmentị dị ka Gọvanọ Simon Lalong
Pauline Ada Uwakweh bụ onye odee akwụkwọ na agụmakwụkwọ Naijiria
N'ịbụ onye na-ede dị ka Pauline Onwubiko, o bipụtara Running for Cover (1988), akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụaka na -enye anya nwatakiri agha obodo Naijiria
Ọ bụ ọka mmụta mgbakwunye nke bekee na ngalaba bekee na North Carolina A&T State University
Ọpụrụiche ya bụ edemede na akwụkwọ ndị Afrika sitere na ndị obodo Afrika, ọkachasị edemede ụmụ nwanyị
Uwakweh bụ ọka mmụta mgbakwunye nke akwụkwọ na ngalaba bekee
O nwetara PhD
sitere na Mahadum Temple, MA sitere na Mahadum Calabar, na BA sitere na Mahadum Port Harcourt
Ọpụrụiche ya bụ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka na ndị Afrịka mgbe ọchịchị gachara
Uwakweh bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ na-etinye aka na Diaspora Migration and African Families (2013), na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke African Women Under Fire Literary Discourses in War and Conflict (2017)
Ọrụ ya pụtara n'akwụkwọ dị oke egwu na akwụkwọ akụkọ gbasara akwụkwọ Afrika
Ọ bụ onye otu Carnegie Afrikan Diaspora Fellowship Programme
Pauline Onwubiko mụrụ na Uvuru, Aboh-Mbaise, Imo State
Ọ gara Owerri Girls Secondary School na 1982 ọ gụchara nzere BA na akwụkwọ na mahadum Port Harcourt
O nwetara nzere masta na bekee na mmuta mmuta site na mahadum Calabar, na PhD na mahadum Temple
Tupu ịkwaga North Carolina A&T, ọ kụziri na Department of African American Studies na Mahadum Cincinnati na Ngalaba English na Literary Studies na Mahadum Calabar
Ọ bụ onye Carnegie African Diaspora Fellow na 2016

Uwakweh edeela nkatọ agụmagụ na ọtụtụ ndị odee, gụnyere Toni Morrison, Chinua Achebe, Buchi Emecheta, Nawal El-Saadawi, Alice Walker, Gloria Naylor, Tsitsi Dangarembga, Cyprian Ekwensi, Ama Ata Aidoo, Chimarehen Knụmu Kẹyọmu
O deziri ma webata mkpokọta 2013 gbasara mbata na ọpụpụ na ezinụlọ ndị Afrika
Isi nke ya lere anya n'alụmdi na nwunye, ịbụ nne na mbata na ọpụpụ na ederede Buchi Emecheta na Chimamanda Adichie
Na 2017 o deziri ma webata mkpokọta agha na ụmụ nwanyị Africa, nke ntinye aka ya tụlere ihe ncheta Grace Akallo, Nwanyị nwanyị Soldier, na akwụkwọ akụkọ Susan Minot nke iri atọ
Pauline Vogelpoel MBE (24 Eprel 1926 na Lourenço Marques, Portuguese East Africa - 22 Disemba 2002 na Basle, Switzerland) bụ onye nchịkwa nka na South Africa
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Herschel Girls' School na Rustenburg Girls' School dị na Cape Town ma nweta nzere na Fine Art na Mahadum Cape Town
Ọ kweere onye Rhodesian, Buster St Quintin, onye na-enyere Gọvanọ Sir Godfrey Huggins aka
N'afọ 1950, ọ sooro nwanne ya nwoke Louis, onye na-ahụ maka ọrịa obi na ọkachamara ụwa na okooko osisi ọhịa na orchid aha ya, gaa London
Beatrice Janice mere ka ọ mata Art Institute nke Chicago ma nweta ya ọrụ na New York na-enyere Douglas McCaigie nke Museum of Modern Art aka
O sonyeere Contemporary Art Society dị ka odeakwụkwọ nhazi na 1954, wee bụrụ onye nduzi na 1976
N'afọ 1975, ọ lụrụ onye na-echekwa ego bụ David Mann
N'afọ 1982, ọ sonyeere ụlọ akụ onwe onye na Basle ma ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ya na Contemporary Art Society ka ya na ya kwaga Switzerland
Ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ Zürich nke magazin Harpers na Queen
N'afọ 1997, ọ sonyeere International Council nke Tate Gallery
O dekọrọ ihe ncheta ya maka ọrụ National Sound Archive's Artists' Lives na British Library Sound Archive
Ọ natara MBE na 1962
Ọ nwụrụ site na akpụ ụbụrụ na Basle na 22 Disemba 2002, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na isii
Pauline Jeanette Williams bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa lara ezumike nká
Onye otu African National Congress, a họpụtara ya na Northern Cape Provincial Legislature na 2004
Ọ hapụrụ ndị omeiwu n'afọ 2014, naanị ka ọ laghachiri n'afọ 2015
E mechara mee ya MEC maka Transport, Liaison na Safety na 2016
Williams hapụrụ ọrụ ahụ n'oge na-adịghị anya na Mee 2017
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2018, e mere ya MEC maka Mmekọrịta Gburugburu Ebe Obibi
Williams hapụrụ ndị omeiwu ọzọ na 2019
A mụrụ Williams na Springbok na mpaghara Cape Province nke South Africa
N'afọ 1978, ọ nwetara asambodo dị elu na Northern Paarl High School
Williams gụrụ maka nzere BA na Mahadum nke Western Cape n'etiti afọ 1979 na 1981
N'afọ 1982, ọ nwetara diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ ka elu na Mahadum South Africa O nwetara nzere BEd na UNISA n'afọ 1991
Williams mere Diploma na Financial Management na APAC n'afọ 2000
Site na 1983 ruo 1996, Williams bụ onye nkuzi na Van Wyk Senior Secondary School n'obodo ya
N'afọ 1996, ọ ghọrọ onye nhazi mpaghara Namaqua nke agụmakwụkwọ na ọzụzụ ndị okenye
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa a ruo n'afọ 2000, mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nduzi agụmakwụkwọ mpaghara
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ a ruo n'afọ 2004
N'ọnọdụ a, Williams bụkwa onye otu Management Team na Ngalaba Mmụta nke Northern Cape
N'agbata afọ 1995 na 1997, ọ bụ onye kansụl nke Springbok Transitional Municipality na Namaqua District Municipality
A họpụtara Williams ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu Northern Cape Provincial na 2004 dị ka onye otu African National Congress
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na kọmitii dị iche iche na ndị omeiwu
Williams bụ onye isi otu ANC
Ọ bụ onye ọzọ so na kọmitii na-ahụ maka mpaghara nke pati ahụ na Namaqualand n'oge ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na kọmitii na-ahụ maka ọchịchị nke mpaghara ahụ dị ka onye otu ex officio
Williams rụkwara ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke ANC Women's League regional structure na Namaqua
Ọ bụ onye otu ọzọ na osote onyeisi oche tupu ọ bụrụ onye isi oche mpaghara nke league ụmụ nwanyị
Williams rụkwara ọrụ na National Executive Committee (NEC) nke league ụmụ nwanyị
Mgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 2009 gasịrị, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Executive Council (MEC) maka Sport, Arts na Culture, na-anọchi Archie Lucas
A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'ọrụ a na 2013 site n'aka onye isi ala a họpụtara ọhụrụ, Sylvia Lucas
Maka ntuli aka nke afọ 2014, Williams nọ n'ọnọdụ nke 22 na ndepụta ANC
ANC meriri naanị oche 20, nke pụtara na Williams enwekwaghị oche ya
Otú ọ dị, ọ laghachiri na ndị omeiwu mpaghara na 27 Ọktoba 2015
N'ime mgbanwe nke kansụl na Machị 2016, a họpụtara ya dị ka MEC maka Transport, Liaison na Safety, na-anọchi Martha Bartlett
Tupu nnọkọ ntuli aka nke ANC na Mee 2017, ọ pụtara dị ka onye na-akwado mkpọsa Zamani Saul maka oche mpaghara
Na mgbede nzukọ ahụ, Lucas (nke bụkwa onye na-achọ ịbụ onye isi oche mpaghara) wepụrụ Williams na ndị isi
ANC katọrọ mkpebi Lucas
Na 1 June, Lucas kagburu mkpebi ya, weghachite Williams na kansụl ndị isi
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ MEC maka ihe gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi
Williams lara ezumike nká na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 2019
Williams bi na Springbok

Paulinus Igwe Nwagu // (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ na abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa isii n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri ise na iteolu (12 June 1959) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria bụbu onye nnọchi anya Ezza North / Ishielu nke Ebonyi Steetị, Naịjirịa na House of Representatives
Na ntuli aka mba nke ọnwa Anọ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu (Eprel 2011), a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Sịnetọ maka Etiti Ebonyi na-agba ọsọ na People's Democratic Party (PDP)
A mụrụ Nwagu na abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa isii n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri ise na iteolu (12 June 1959), na Ebonyi Steetị
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ maka Ezza North Local Government Council site n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu ruo na otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu na atọ (1990-1993) na onye isi oche nke Ezza North Regional Government Area site n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu na iteolu ruo na n'afọ puku abụọ na abụọ (1999-2002)
A họpụtara Nwagu dị ka onye otu House of Representatives maka mpaghara Ishielu nke Ebonyi's Ezzra North n'ime ọnwa anọ, n'afọ puku abụọ na asaa (Eprel afọ 2007), na ikpo okwu PDP

N'ụlọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya na kọmitii na-ahụ maka ndị ntorobịa na mmepe mmekọrịta ọha na eze, ndị na-azụ ahịa ọha, ndị uweojii, Petroleum Resources (Downstream), Environment and Emergency & Disaster Management
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke House of Representatives Committee on Rural Development

N'afọ puku abụọ na iteolu (2009), ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka mpụ na Naijiria, Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) jidere Igwe ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Kuje dị na Abuja maka ebubo ya na ọ na'ime aghụghọ eletrik nke onu ego ya pụtara ijeri ise na nde naira abụọ (N52), nde iri atọ na anọ na narị iri isii na isii ma atụgharia ya na onu ego dola ($ 3466)

Na ọnwa mbụ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu (Jenụwarị 2011) PDP primaries maka oche Ebonyi Central Sịnetorial, a mara Nwagu dị ka onye a họpụtara na PDP mgbe ndị ọzọ na-asọmpi kwụsịrị ọrụ maka ebubo na ọ bụghị ya, gụnyere iji akwụkwọ ntuli aka maka Kwara State iji mee ntuziaka Ebonyi Center
O meriri ntuli aka n'ọnwa anọ, n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu (Eprel 2011) na vootu iri puku ise na ise, na iri n'ise (55,016) na ikpo okwu PDP
Ugo Chima nke All Nigeria Peoples Party (ANPP) nwetara vootu iri puku anọ na otu, na iri ireolu na isii (41,096)
N'ọnwa ise n'afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ n'abụọ (Mee 2022), o kwupụtara mmasị ya ịzọ ọkwa gọvanọ na steeti Ebonyi

Mmadụ iri na anọ (14) na-achọ ịbụ ndị na'ebu ọkọlọtọ nke PDP maka ntuli aka gọvanọ nke afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ na atọ (2023); itoolu sitere na mpaghara Ebonyi North Senatorial gụnyere Nwagu, anọ sitere n'Ebonji Central na otu sitere ne Ebonayi South
Obinna Ogba si Ebonyi Central mechara merie na primaries
Paurina Gwanyanya Mpariwa (amụrụ n'afọ 1964), mgbe ụfọdụ a na-ede ya dị ka Paurine Mpariwa, bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu Pan-African si Zimbabwe
Mpariwa bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Akụna Ọha
Ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Zimbabwe, nke a họpụtara na afọ 2000 na ọzọ na afọ 2005, na-anọchite anya mpaghara Mukafose na Harare
Ọ bụ onye otu Movement for Democratic Change (MDC)
Na 10 Febụwarị na afọ 2009, Morgan Tsvangirai họpụtara Mpariwa maka ọkwa Minista nke Ọrụ na Ọdịmma Ọha dị ka akụkụ nke gọọmentị ịdị n'otu mba
Ọ bụ onye otu House of Assembly maka Mufakose (MDC-T)
Mpariwa bụkwa onye isi oche nke Women's Parliamentary Caucus, onye isi oche Women in Law and Development na Africa (WILDAF), onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba nke Zimbabwe Parliament Women Caucus
Onye isi oche nke ndị omeiwu Portfolio for Labour, onye isi nke ndị omebe iwu, onye na-ekwu maka ahụike, ọrụ na ọdịmma ọha na eze
A mụrụ ya na Mufakose na afọ 1964, Paurina Mpariwa zụrụ na njikwa ndị ọrụ, mmekọrịta ụlọ ọrụ, ọmụmụ azụmahịa, ọrụ iwu, ego ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na kọmputa
Ntinye aka na ndị ọrụ unionism malitere mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ahịa OK na mbido afọ 1990, na-arịgo ịghọ onyeisi oche nke ndị Commercial Workers Union of Zimbabwe
Pavel Alekseyevich Astakhov (Russian ) (amụrụ na 8 Septemba 1966 na mba Moscow) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Russia, onye ọka iwu ama ama na onye telivishọn
N'ụbọchị 30 Disemba n'afọ 2009 Dmitry Medvedev kpọrọ Astakhov dị ka Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụaka maka onye isi ala nke Russian Federation (ombbudsman ụmụaka)
Ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ahụ n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2016 mgbe ọ na-eche nkatọ siri ike n'ihi okwu ya banyere ọnwụ ụmụaka iri na anọ n'ihe mberede ụgbọ mmiri
Astakhov gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba iwu nke Dzerzhinsky KGB School na mba Moscow n'afọ 1991
N'afọ 2002, ọ natara Master of Laws na Mahadum nke Pittsburgh School of Law
N'afọ 2006, Astakhov natara Dọkịta nke Iwu na mba Russia

Nke mbụ bụ obodo Dissernet, mgbe ahụ, Ọbá akwụkwọ Steeti nke mba Russia nwalere akwụkwọ doctoral ya maka plagiarism ma chọpụta na ọ bụ naanị 068% nke ederede ahụ bụ ọrụ mbụ, ndị fọdụrụ na-edepụta site na isi mmalite ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-asụ Bekee, Swedish, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese na mba French yana mba Russian
Astakhov malitere ịrụ ọrụ iwu n'afọ 1991
N'afọ 1994, ọ ghọrọ onye otu mba Moscow Bar ma guzobe ụlọ ọrụ iwu nke ya, nke a maara kemgbe afọ 2003 dị ka 'Pavel Astakhov Lawyers Board'
Astakhov nọchitere anya ụfọdụ n'ime ndị ama ama na mba Russia, gụnyere onye isi obodo mba Moscow Yury Luzhkov, ụmụ nke usoro ndị eze Romanov, ọtụtụ ndị pop-stars mba Russia na ndị ọzọ
Ikpe mbụ nke mere ka Pavel Astakhov pụta ìhè bụ nke Edmond Pope

N'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2000, ndị ọrụ nchekwa ụgbọ mmiri nke mba Russia (FSB) jidere Pope, onye ọrụ nyocha nke US lara ezumike nká na mba Moscow mgbe ya na onye ọkà mmụta sayensị torpedo nke mba Russia kpọtụrụ
E boro Pope ebubo nledo, na-achọ atụmatụ maka bọmbụ VA-111 Shkval dị elu n'okpuru mmiri
Edmond Pope bụ naanị onye mba America nke abụọ n'ime afọ iri anọ ikpe maka nledo na mba Moscow
Nke mbụ, Francis Gary Powers, onye na-anya ụgbọelu nledo U-2 nke a gbagburu n'afọ 1960, gbanwere ya maka onye nledo Soviet a mara ikpe, Rudolf Abel
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2000, Astakhov tụrụ ụlọ ikpe ahụ n'anya site n'inye okwu mmechi ya n'amaokwu
Ọ gụpụtara abụ dị peeji iri na abụọ o dere na pentameters iambic, na-agba ụlọ ikpe ume ka ha tọhapụ Pope
Nkà uri nke Astakhov enweghị mmasị n'ụlọ ikpe ahụ ma Pope natara mkpọrọ afọ iri abụọ; Vladimir Putin mechara gbaghara ya ma jiri ụgbọelu laghachi mba US
N'afọ 2000-2001 Pavel Astakhov nyeere onye mgbasa ozi mba Russia bụ Vladimir Gusinsky aka ịgbanahụ ebubo aghụghọ abụọ

N'ụbọchị 13 Juun, n'afọ 2000, e jidere Gusinsky na ebubo izu ohi ihe onwunwe ruru ihe karịrị nde $ 10 site na ụlọ ọrụ 'Russian Video' nke steeti, mana ụbọchị atọ ka e mesịrị, mgbe Astakhov rịọrọ arịrịọ, a tọhapụrụ Gusinsky na mgbapụta
Mgbe e mesịrị, Astakhov na onye ọka iwu ọzọ a ma ama, Henri Reznik, jisiri ike kwụsị ikpe mpụ megide Gusinsky, onye jiri ụgbọelu gaa Spain
E mepere ikpe ọzọ n'ụbọchị 17 Septemba, na-ebo ebubo izu ohi nke nde $ 300 site na Gazprom, na 17 Nọvemba ndị ọkàiwu maliteghachiri ikpe mbụ
E jidere Gusinsky na mba Spain na akwụkwọ ikike njide mba ụwa na 12 Disemba
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba, a tọhapụrụ ya na mgbapụta nke otu ijeri pesetas ($ 55 nde)
Pavel Astakhov na ndị na-agbachitere Gusinsky kwuru na ebubo ndị ahụ bụ nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na 24 Eprel n'afọ 2001 onye ọka ikpe Spain bụ Baltasar Garzon jụrụ ịnyefe Gusinsky na mba Russia
N'ịgbaso ọrụ ya na ikpe Pope na Gusinsky, a kpọrọ Astakhov ka ọ gaa mba US isonye na tebụl gbara gburugburu nke US Congress haziri
Ọ nọrọ n'afọ sochirinụ na Pittsburgh na-emecha Master's in Law
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2003, Pavel Astakhov zigara ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya mba US na Moscow akwụkwọ ozi, na-adụ onye isi ala George W
Bush na onye nnọchi anya Alexander Vershbow ọdụ na ọ ga-achọ ịnọchite anya Saddam Hussein

Mgbe onye nta akụkọ jụrụ ya ma ọ dị njikere ịgbachitere Saddam Hussein n'efu, Astakhov zara, sị 'Echeghị m na onye bụbu onye isi ala Iraq ga-ekweta ịnakwere enyemaka iwu n'efu' Saddam Hussein, Otú ọ dị, enweghị ohere iji ọrụ Astakhov
N'afọ 2003 Astakhov ghọrọ onye na-elekọta Chas Suda (Hour of Judgment) nke gosipụtara na REN TV
Ọ bụ ihe ngosi mbụ nke onye ọka ikpe mba Russia
N'adịghị ka Onyeikpe Judy na mba US, ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-eme ihe nkiri na-eme ihe nkiri, Astakhov na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka ikpe
Ihe ngosi a ghọrọ ihe a ma ama ma Astakhov guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, Pravo TV, iji mee mmemme ndị ọzọ nwere isiokwu iwu
Astakhov bụkwa onye na-ede akwụkwọ nke ọma, na-ede banyere ahụmịhe ya na usoro iwu Moscow, yana ịmepụta usoro akwụkwọ akụkọ nke gosipụtara ndị ọka iwu
N'oge mbụ nke Vladimir Putin, Astakhov bụ onye nkatọ siri ike nke ndị ọchịchị Russia, na-ebo ha ebubo mkpagbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ndị ahịa ya, Vladimir Gusinsky na Edmond Pope
O kwuru banyere 'nleghara ikike mmadụ anya' ma kwuo na ndị ọkàiwu 'na-eme ihe ndị ọchịchị chọrọ'
Mgbe e mesịrị, Astakhov gbanwere ogo 180 na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya wee bụrụ otu n'ime ndị a ma ama na-akwado ndị isi ọchịchị mba Russia
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2007, ọ tọrọ ntọala ma duzie otu mba Za Putina (For Putin)
Na nzukọ ntọala, Astakhov kọwara ebumnuche nke mmegharị ọhụrụ ahụ dị ka ndị a 'Anyị ahọrọghị nna ukwu n'ụlọ? Ọfọn, ebe a ka anyị na-atụ aro ịchọta nna ukwu maka mba ahụ

N'ụbọchị 30, n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2009 Onye isi ala Medvedev họpụtara Astakhov dị ka Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụaka maka onye isi ala nke mba Russian Federation, ọkwa a na-akpọkarị ombudsman ụmụaka
N'oge a họpụtara ya, Astakhov bụ otu n'ime ndị ọka iwu onwe onye na mba Russia, mana ọ nweghị nzụlite ọdịmma ụmụaka
Onye bu ya ụzọ na onye mbụ nwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, Alexei Golovan, gbara arụkwaghịm na mberede na 26 n'ọnwa Disemba, naanị ọnwa ole na ole ka a họpụtara ya
(Golovan nọgidere na-etinye aka n'ihe gbasara ikike ụmụaka ma n'afọ 2012 tinye aka na mmepe iwu iji chebe ikike ụmụaka n'ụlọ ụmụ mgbei)
Ndị nkatọ Astakhov na mba Russia boro ya ebubo na ọ bụ onye na-achọ ohere na onye na-achọ mgbasa ozi
Ụfọdụ ndị otu na-akwado ụmụaka chọrọ ka ọ 'lebara anya n'ichebe ikike ụmụaka na mba Russia na obere PR maka onwe ya'
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010, Astakhov kọwara ndị otu na-akwado ụmụaka dị ka 'ụdị kachasị mma nke nkwado iwu nke obodo ndị na-ahụ maka ụmụaka'
Dị ka ombudsman Astakhov chọrọ ime ka a mara ọdịmma nke ụmụaka mba Russia nke ezinụlọ ndị mba ọzọ nakweere
Dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ gọọmentị mba Russia si kwuo, ngụkọta nke ụmụaka mba Russia iri na itoolu a nakweere anwụọla n'ụwa niile n'ihi iti ihe ma ọ bụ nleghara anya, kemgbe afọ 1991

Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-akatọ Astakhov boro ebubo na ọ na-elebara anya nke ukwuu n'okwu mmetọ ahụ mgbe a nakweere ya na mba ụwa ma ọ bụghị nke zuru ezu maka ikpe mmetọ ụmụaka na mba Russia n'onwe ya, ebe a na-egbu ihe dị ka ụmụaka 2,000 kwa afọ n'ihi mmetọ ụmụaka n'ụlọ
Onye isi ala Medvedev gwara Astakhov n'ọnwa Disemba 2011 'Echere m na anyị enweghị ike ime ọdịiche ọ bụla ebe a n'etiti ikpe na mba ọzọ na ikpe n'ụlọ
Ndị a niile bụ mpụ, mpụ dị egwu
Astakhov tinyere aka nke ukwuu na nkwadebe nke nkwekọrịta mba Russia na mba US banyere nnabata, nke onye odeakwụkwọ nke mba US na Mịnịsta mba ofesi nke Russia bịanyere aka na 13 Julaị n'afọ 2011
Nkwekọrịta a machibidoro nkuchi onwe onye nke ụmụ mba Russia, na-ahapụ nkuchi site na ụlọ ọrụ dị ka naanị nhọrọ
Ụmụ amaala America ndị chọrọ ịnabata nwa site na mba Russia site na ụlọ ọrụ ga-akwụ $ 40-50 puku ebe maka ụmụ amaala mba Russia usoro ahụ bụ n'efu
Ọzọkwa, ndị nne na nna nkuchi n'ọtụtụ mpaghara Russia na-enweta enyemaka ego site n'aka ndị isi mpaghara, nke mgbe ụfọdụ ruru RUR 300 puku (ihe dị ka $ 10 puku) kwa nwa
Onye isi ala Medvedev gwara Pavel Astakhov na 3 Disemba 2011 'Ọ dịghị ihe dị njọ na nnabata ụmụ anyị na mba ọzọ
eziokwu ahụ bụ na ụmụ amaala mba ọzọ na-eme ya anaghị emerụ ha n'ụzọ ọ bụla, ma n'ụzọ megidere nke ahụ na-egosi ọchịchọ ha inyere ụmụaka ndị a aka

' Otú ọ dị, izu abụọ ka e mesịrị, na nnọkọ ajụjụ na azịza Vladimir Putin na ọha na eze kwa afọ, na-agbasa ozi n'ofe mba Russia, Astakhov kwupụtara onwe ya dịka 'onye mmegide zuru oke nke nnabata mba ụwa' ma gwa Putin ka ọ gbanwee iwu ahụ ma machibido nnabata mba ụwa niile na Russia
'Anyị aghaghị, dịka o kwere mee, idebe ụmụ anyị na mba anyị,' Astakhov kwuru n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010

N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2012, Astakhov tụrụ aro na ụmụ amaala mba Russia kwesịrị itinye akwụkwọ ịnabata ụmụ US, ọ bụ ezie na a ka nwere ụmụ mgbei 665,987 na mba Russia n'onwe ya dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị ọhụrụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke nnabata na Russia na-ada kwa afọ kemgbe afọ 2007
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2012 Astakhov kwupụtara na n'ime afọ 5 na asatọ sochirinụ, a ga-emechi ọtụtụ ụlọ ụmụ mgbei na ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi ndị mba Russia, ndị ezinụlọ ndị mba Russia nakweere ndị bi na ha
O kwuru na a ga-ekenyekwu ego steeti maka ezinụlọ ndị na-elekọta ụmụaka' iji 'nye ume ọhụrụ nye ndị nne na nna na-elekọta nwa
Russia na-enweghị okwu ụmụ mgbei kwesịrị ịbụ otu n'ime ihe kachasị mkpa maka gọọmentị na ndị ọrụ ọhaneze
Ụfọdụ ndị ọkachamara, Otú ọ dị, kwuru na ịdabere na Astakhov na mkpali ego emeela ka ọnụ ọgụgụ na-arịwanye elu nke ụmụaka laghachi n'ụlọ ụmụ mgbei

Dị ka akụkọ nke onye isi oche nke kọmitii ndị omeiwu Russia na ezinụlọ na ụmụaka Yelena Mizulina si kwuo n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010, ndị nne na nna na-elekọta ụmụaka maka ego, ma mesịa jụ ha mgbe a kwụrụ ụgwọ enyemaka ego

Mizulina kwuru na ezinaụlọ ndị mba Russia na-elekọta, ndị na-elekọta ma ọ bụ ndị na-elekọta ụmụaka 30,000 n'ụlọ ọrụ n'ime afọ atọ gara aga 'Ndị ọkachamara na-akpọ ọganihu dị otú ahụ na nloghachi ọdachi enyemaka mmadụ'

N'agbanyeghi ọnụ ọgụgụ ụlọ ndị mba Russia dị egwu nke ọgba aghara nke nkuchi, Pavel Astakhov dọọrọ uche ndị mgbasa ozi gaa n'okwu banyere nwata dị afọ asaa, Artem Saveliev (Justin Hansen), onye nọọsụ Tennessee Torry Hansen nakweere n'afọ 2009, mana n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010 ka e zighachiri ya na mba Russia na akwụkwọ na-ekwu na ọ 'enweghị uche na-adịghị mma'
Astakhov jiri ikpe a kpọọ oku maka mmachi ndị ọzọ na nnabata mba ụwa na mba Russia
N'afọ 2015, Astakhov gbachitere alụmdi na nwunye nke onye isi ndị uwe ojii dị afọ iri anọ na asaa na Luiza 'Kheda' Goilabiyeva dị afọ iri na asaa na Chechnya

E nwere akụkọ zuru oke na a na-eyi Goilabiyeva egwu na a ga-atọrọ ya na ime ihe ike ma ọ bụrụ na ọ kwenyeghị ịlụ Nazhud Guchigov, ọ bụ ezie na o mechara gbaa ajụjụ ọnụ na LifeNews ebe o kwuru na ọ lụrụ Guchigov n'onwe ya

Ọ bụ ezie na alụmdi na nwunye ahụ megidere iwu ndị mba Russia banyere ịlụ karịa otu nwanyị na afọ iwu kwadoro nke okenye, Astakhov gbachitere alụmdi na nwunye ahụ, na-ekwu na 'ntozu okè mmekọahụ na-eme na mbụ [na Caucasus]' na 'e nwere ebe ụmụnwanyị na-ebelata mgbe ha dị afọ 27, na site na ụkpụrụ anyị, ha yiri ka ha dị afọ 50
' Okwu ya kpaliri ọtụtụ ụmụnwanyị itinye foto nke wrinkles ha n'okpuru hashtag #смор'енная'ен'ина (#wrinkledwoman)
Ebumnuche nke okwu a aghọwo alụmdi na nwunye ụmụaka, Astakhov na-ekwusi ike na 'ị gaghị echegbu onwe gị banyere alụmdi na nwunye n'oge
kama banyere ndụ mmekọahụ nke ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma
A ghaghị ichekwa ha abụọ
Romeo na Juliet rọrọ nrọ ịlụ di na nwunye, ọ bụghị mmekọrịta chiri anya
Pavelh Ndzila (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke 12 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1995) bụ onye Congo na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara Etoile du Congo bọọlụ
Na ọkwa ndị ntorobịa, ọ nọ na ndị otu maka 2011 FIFA U-17 World Cup, ọ bụ ezie na ọ gbaghị egwu
O mechara gbaa bọọlụ n'afọ 2015 African U-20 Championship yana ndị ruru eru ya

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2014, onye nkuzi Claude Leroy kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke ndị otu mba Congo maka 2014 African Nations Championship E wepụrụ ndị otu ahụ n'usoro ndị otu mgbe ha meriri Ghana, ha na Libya gbara ma merie Ethiopia
Pavlina Khristova (amụrụ na 6 Ọktoba 1968) bụ onye Bulgaria na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị anọ na 1988 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Paw Paw, Paw paw, ma ọ bụ pawpaw nwere ike ịpụta
Ofe Pawpaw bụ nri a ma ama nke otu n'ime agbụrụ Tiv nke Naijiria, ofe ahụ nwere flakes pawpaw kpọrọ nkụ, mmanụ nkwụ, anụ ehi na egusi
The soup is common to the Tiv tribe of Benue state whose slogan is 'Food basket of the Nation'
Ana eye beef na egusi,onion and seasoning cubes
The soup is allowed to cook for few minutes after which the unripe pawpaw flakes are added
A na-aṅụ ofe Pawpaw nke ọma na nnụnụ ndị dị ka yam, fufu, eba na semovita
Pe enwere ike kpọọ pe dịka Mmụta mgbasiahụike

Anwụrụ ọkụ ofe pea (nke a makwaara dị ka ofe pea, anwụrụ ojii ma ọ bụ anwụrụ ọkụ na-egbu egbu) bụ anwụrụ igwe ojii dị oke arọ ma na-acha odo odo, na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ ma ọ bụ na-acha oji nke mmetọ ikuku nke nwéré ihe ndị na-esi ísì ụtọ na gas sulphur dioxide na-egbu mgbu kpatara
Anwụrụ ọkụ a siri ike na-eme n'obodo úkwú ma na-esite na anwụrụ ọkụ nke ọkụ na-ere ọkụ màkà okpomọkụ ụlọ na usoro ụlọ ọrụ
Anwụrụ ọkụ nke ike a na-egbukarị ndị na-adịghị ike dịka ndị agadi, ndị na-eto eto (ụmụ ọhụrụ) na ndị nwéré nsogbu iku ume
A maara nsonaazụ nkè ihe omume ndị a dị ka London ma ọ bụ London fog; na ntụgharị nke okwu ahụ, 'London particular' ghọrọ aha màkà nnukwu ofe pea na ham
Site na mmalite n'ebe afọ 1200s, mmetọ ikuku bịara na-arịwanye elu, na nghọta kachasị na narị afọ nke irí na atọ bụ na anwụrụ ọkụ ga-emetụta ahụike mmadụ
Site n'etiti afọ ébé 1600, n'obodo ndị Britain, ọkachasị London, a na-ekwu na ọ bụ anwụrụ ọkụ coal sitere na anwụrụ ọkụ ụlọ na ụlọ ọrụ na-ejikọta na anwụrụ na alụlụ nke Ndagwurugwu Thames

Luke Howard, onye ọsụ ụzọ na ọmụmụ ihu igwe obodo, bipụtara The Climate of London na 18181820, ébé o ji okwu ahụ bụ 'obodo igwe ojii' ma kọwaa mmetụta agwaetiti okpomọkụ nke lekwasịrị ányà na mkpokọta anwụrụ ọkụ n'elu obodo ahụ

Ihe kachasị egbu egbu nkè anwụrụ ọkụ a na London mere na 1952 ma mee ka Iwu Mmiri Dị Ọcha 1956 na Iwu Mmiri Ịcha afọ 1968, nké a kagburu ugbu a ma jikọta ya na Iwu Mmụ Dị Ọcha afọ 1993, nké dị irè n'iwepụ sulphur dioxide na anwụrụ ọkụ, ihe kpatara anwụrụ ọkụ na-esi ísì ụtọ, ọ bụ ezie na a ejirila mmetọ ndị a na-adịghị ahụ ányà nke sitere na ụgbọala n'obodo ukwu dochie ha

A na-achọta ntinye aka na isi iyi nke anwụrụ ọkụ, ya na ojiji mbụ nke 'peas-soup' dị ka ónyé nkọwa, na akụkọ John Sartain bipụtara n'afọ 1820 banyéré ndụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na-eto eto, na-akọ ihe ọ dị ka
Swee n'ụlọ site na alụlụ dị arọ ma na-acha odo odo dị ka ofe pea nke ụlọ iri nri; laghachi n'ime ụlọ ihe osise gị

mgbe ị meghere windo gị mgbè ị na-apụ, iji hụ ísì nke ihe osise ahụ ka njọ, ma ọ bụrụ na o Kwèrè omume, site n'ọnụ ụzọ alụlụ, nke, ebe ọ bụ ihe sitere na nsị gas, oghere, anwụrụ ọkụ, ndị na-acha ihe na-acha ọbara, ụlọ ihe osisi, ụlọ ihe ọṅụṅụ, ụlọ ihe na-eme, nwéré ike iche n'echiche na ọ gaghị emezi ísì ụtọ!
Anwụrụ ọkụ ahụ kpatara ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ọnwụ site na nsogbu iku ume
Eze Edward nke Mbụ nke England machibidoro ọkụ nke coal-oké osimiri site na nkwupụta na London n'afọ 1272, mgbè anwụrụ ọkụ ya ghọrọ nsogbu
Ka ọ na-erule na narị afọ nke iri na asaa, mmetọ nke London aghọwo nnukwu nsogbu, ka n'ihi, karịsịa, ọkụ nke coal dị ọnụ ala, nke dị mfe

John Evelyn, onye ndụmọdụ Eze Charles nke Abụọ, kọwara nsogbu ahụ na mpempe akwụkwọ ya, Fumifugium Ma ọ bụ, Inconvenience of the Aer and Smoak of London Dissipated nke e bipụtara na 1661, na-ebo coal, 'ihe na-agbanye n'okpuru' nke nwéré 'ụdị ikuku na-egbu egbu ma ọ bụ arsenical nké na-esite na ya' màkà igbu ọtụtụ
Ọ tụrụ aro ka a kpọpụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'obodo ahụ ma kụọ nnukwu ogige nke 'flowers dị íchè ichè' iji 'na-eme ka ikuku dị mmá' ma si otú a kpuchie mmetọ ahụ

Ihe kachasị njọ e dekọrọ bụ Great Smog nkè afọ 1952, mgbè a kọrọ na mmadụ puku anọ nwụrụ n'obodo ahụ n'ime ụbọchị ole na ole, na ọnwụ puku asatọ metụtara ya, na-eduga n'ịgafe Iwu Mmiri Dị Ọcha nke 1956, nke machibidoro iji coal maka ọkụ ụlọ n'obodo ụfọdụ
A na-ekwere ugbu a na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị nwụrụ n'ihe omume ahụ dị ka puku iri na abụọ

Peace Anyiam-Osigwe (1969-2023), onye bụbu Peace Anyiam-Fiberesima MFR amụrụ n'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Maachi bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eme ihe nkiri na Onye isi ntụrụndụ nke akpọrọ 'eze nwanyị nke ihe nkiri Nollywood'
O bu onye hiwere emume ihe nkiri n’uwa niile bụ, Africa Movie Academy Awards
Akwụkwọ akụkọ The Guardian dere na ọ bụ ọsụ ụzọ na-egosi ihe nkiri Nollywood na mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa
Ọ duziri vidiyo egwu mbụ nke mmetụtara hip-hop bụ, P-Square
N’afọ 2012, gọọmentị Naịjirịa mere ya onye otu ‘Federal Republic ’ maka mgbalị ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri/ntụrụndụ
Ọ bụ onye otu TED
Anyiam-Osigwe amụrụ na abalị iri-ato nke onwa Maachi O sitere na ezi ama ama bụ ezi Osigwe Anyiam-Osigwe dị na Nkwerre, Imo Steeti
Ọ bụ naanị nwa nwanyị n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ụmụaka asatọ
O nwere asambodo Iwu na politikal sayensị na Mahadum Oxford Brookes
Anyiam-Osigwe guzobere Africa Film Academy, otu na-achịkwa emume ihe nkiri kemgbe afọ 2005
Emere nturu ugo a ka ọ bụrụ otu n’ime onyinye kacha nwee ùgwù nye ndị Afrika nọ n’ememe ihe nkiri
Na mbipụta nke iri, ọ rịturu dị ka onye isi nke AMAAs
Na 2015, ọ malitere atumatu AfricaOne iji cheta ndị Afrika ngalaba ọrụ ntụrụndụ
Anyiam-Osigwe bụ odee nke abụ ederede
O nwere akwụkwọ ato nyere ya nkwalite
N'ajụjụ ọnụ Alana Herro, ọ kọwara uri dịka otu n'ime ụzọ iji gosipụta nghọta ya na nghọta nke ihe gbara ya gburugburu
Tupu ọ banye mahadum, o bipụtara otu magazin akpọrọ, Clicks, nke edepụtara iji kwado ndị ojii na England
Ọrụ ya gbadoro ụkwụ na nkwado/nkwuchitere ọnụ
Ọrụ Anyiam-Osigwe na telivishọn malitere site na ihe omume mkparịta ụka bụ, Piece off my mind, nke na-elekwasị anya na mmeghachi omume ndị mmadụ na nsogbu obodo nke anaghị ahụkarị na mgbasa ozi
Okwu ngosi ya gbadoro ụkwụ n'okwu gbasara ịkwuchitere ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu ndị bụ ndị obodo anaghị elebakarị anya
O rụrụ aka n'usoro ihe nkiri Afrika, ịzụ ụmụaka na ịha nhatanha ụmụ nwanyị dịka mpaghara na-amasị ya na ihe nkiri na telivishọn
Na mbido egwu abụọ, ọrụ P-Square, Anyiam-Osigwe bụ onye lekọtara ha
Na 2016, o kwuru na ya na-anọchite Somkele Inyamah
Nwanne ya nwoke bụ, Michael, onye e gburu na 2014 bụ onye nhazi nchịkọta nke Osigwe Anyiam-Osigwe Foundation, otu na-anaghị achọ uru na-enyeghachi ndị Naijiria
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi, 'Afrika Institute for Leadership Research and Development” na kansul jeneral nke Malawi na Naịjirịa
Nne ya, Dorothy Chinyere Anyiam-Osigwe bụ onye nnata nke Office of the Order of the Niger site n’aka onye isi ala n’oge ahụ bụ, Olusegun Obasanjo maka ọrụ ebere ya na Naịjirịa
Ya na di ya kewapụrụ
Peace Ayisi Okyere bụ onye Ghana na nwanyị izizi onye nduzi nke African Development Bank Peace gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Wesley Girls 'Senior High School na Cape Coast
ọ bụkwa onye otu Fan Milk Limited - Ghana

Peace Ewomazino Efih (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2000) bụ onye Naijirịa na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti maka klọb Ligat Nashim nke Israel FC Kiryat Gat na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Edo Queens na Rivers Angels na Nigeria Women Premier League

Peace Regis Mutuuzo bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda nke na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka Bunyangabu District Ọ bụ Minista nke Steeti maka Mmekọahụ na Ọdịbendị na Kọmitii Ugandan
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 6 June 2016
A mụrụ ya na 2 Mee 1975, na mpaghara Rwimi, Bunyangabu, na Kabarole District, na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Uganda
Kemgbe ahụ, a gbanwere obodo Bunyangabu ka ọ bụrụ mpaghara Bunyangabo
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na St
Peter and Paul Primary School, Katikamu SDA Secondary School na Mpanga Secondary School dị na Fort Portal
Ọ bụ onye isi nwanyị mgbe ọ nọ na Mpanga
Ọ gara National Teachers College Kakoba (NTCK), nke bụzi akụkụ nke Mahadum Bishop Stuart na Mbarara, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Diploma na Secondary Education
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke ụmụ akwụkwọ na NTCK, mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ
Ọ sonyeere Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ochie na Uganda, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Environmental Science
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ nwetara Master of Public Administration and Management site na Uganda Management Institute na Kampala

Tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Give and Take nke John Sanyu Katuramu (na-eje ozi ndụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Luzira) ma mesịa na Ọfịs Onye isi ala, dị ka odeakwụkwọ onwe onye nke Onye isi ala nke Uganda
N'afọ 2016, ọ gbara ọsọ maka ọkwa onye nnọchi anya nwanyị maka mpaghara Kabarole, mana e meriri ya na ntuli aka nke National Resistance Movement
N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka Mmekọahụ na Ọdịbendị
Otu n'ime ọrụ mbụ ọ malitere n'ọkwa minista ọhụrụ ya bụ nsogbu ime ihe ike mmekọahụ
Ihe ọzọ dị na atụmatụ ya bụ atụmatụ mmepe, mmụba na imezigharị National Theater, nke e wuru na 1959 ma ugbu a pere mpe iji nweta nnukwu ndị na-ege ntị
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement

Peace Uko (amụrụ na 26 Disemba1995) bu onye egwuregwu ejiri ọsọ 100 mita maara nke ọma
ọ meriri egwurewgu nke 100m na memme egwuregwu mba Naijiria
Uko gbara ọsọ nke mbụ ya, 4 × 100m, na-afo 2013 na asompi mba ụwa emere na Moscow
Emechara kapụ aha ya na ndi otu ya n'asompi a n'ihi na ihe mkpishị eji agba ọsọ dapụrụ n'aka Patience Okon George na Stephanie Kalu
Ọzọkwa ọ merie ọsọ nke 200m n'ihu Patience Okon George
Nke a nyeere mahadum ya aka, Mahadum Port Harcourt merie egwuregwu nke ugboro ise
Na asompi ọsọ mba uwa na Nassau, ọ gbara ọsọ nke 4 x 100m maka Naijiria maa gbaa onye nke asaa
n'afo 2015, ọ mere ndekọ nke 1127s na egwuregwu ahụ bụ NTC Pure Athletics Sprints Elite Meet na Clermont, Florida, United States
Na asompi emere na Naijiria n'afo 2016, o gbara nke onye abụọ n'azu Blessing Okagbare-Ighoteguonor, mana n'ihu Gloria Asumnu
Peace Uzoamaka Nnaji (amụrụ na abali iri-abuo n’ime onwa iri- n’ise n’afo 1952 n’Enugu Steeti ) bu onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi nke Naijiria
A hoputara ya na ikpo okwu nke ndi Democratic Party na 2007 ma nwee njem nke abuo ya na 2011 n’ulo ndi nnochite anya Naijiria
O nwere diploma na Social Work na Mahadum nke Nigeria, Nsukka
A họpụtara Nnaji na mbụ n ’ụlọ ndị nnọchi anya Naịjirịa n’afọ 2007 ma họpụta ya ọzọ na 2011
Ọ nọchitere anya Nkanu East / Nkanu West na Ụlọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya site na 29 Mee 2011 - 29 Mee 2015
Vanguard kwụrụ na Nnaji bụ otu n'ime 'Ụmụ nwanyi ga-agbanwe ọnọdụ na- Seventh National Assembly '
N'isiokwu ahụ, ọ tụlere ịchọrọ 'iji ahụmịhe nke mmebe iwu ya na - adọta ọtụtụ ọrụ na mpaghara ya na ihe omume na Ụlọ ahụ'
O so n’ime ụmụnwaanyị iri na otu a họpụtara n’afọ 2007 bụ ndị a họpụtara ọzọ n’afọ 2011 mgbe ụlọomeiwu nta fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nwoke 95%

Ụmụnwaanyị ndị ọzọ a họpụtara gụnyere Mulikat Adeola-Akande, Abike Dabiri, Nkiru Onyeagocha, Uche Ekwunife, Nnena Elendu-Ukeje, Olajumoke Okoya-Thomas, Beni Lar, Khadija Bukar Abba-Ibrahim, Elizabeth Ogbaga na Juliet Akano
A họpụtara ya dika Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị na Mmepe Ọha na Enugwu steeti n’afọ 2015
Nri ahụekere ma ọ bụ nri ahụekere, nke a na-akpọkwa maafe (Wolof, mafé, maffé, maffe), sauce d'arachide (French), tigadèguèna ma ọ bụ domoda, bụ nri a na-eri n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka
O sitere na ndị Mandinka na Bambara nke Mali
Aha kwesịrị ekwesị maka ya n'asụsụ Mandinka bụ domodah ma ọ bụ tigadegena (n'ụzọ nkịtị
'nri ahụekere', ebe tige bụ 'nri, dege bụ 'mkpụrụ', na na bụ 'nsi ahụ') na Bamanankan
☁Domodah bụkwa sauce's ndị Gambia jikwa ya, ebe e si na asụsụ Mandinka gbaziri
Na Senegal, domodah ma ọ bụ domoda na-ezo aka na ofe ma ọ bụ stew nwere ntụ ọka, nke dị iche na nke mafe nke na-eji mmado ahụekere
Ọ bụ nri na-amasịkarị n'etiti ọtụtụ agbụrụ Senegal na Gambia
Site na mgbasawanye nke ịkụ mkpụrụ osisi n'oge oge ọchịchị, Maafe aghọwokwa nri na-ewu ewu n'ofe West Africa, ọbụna na mpụga West Africa dị ka Cameroon na France
Ụdị nri ahụ na-apụta na nri nke mba dị iche iche na West Africa na Central Africa
Ọ dị nnọọ ka ofe mkpụrụ osisi
O nwere ike ịbụ na e ji nwa atụrụ, anụ ehi, anụ ọkụkọ, ma ọ bụ na-enweghị anụ, a na-esi maafe na ofe dabere na mkpụrụ osisi, ọkachasị ahụekere butter / paste, na tomato
Na Ghana, a na-ejikarị fufu eri nri a
Ntụziaka maka stew dịgasị iche iche, mana ọ na-agụnyekarị ọkụkọ, tomato, yabasị, galik, cabbage, na akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ nri mgbọrọgwụ
Nsụgharị ndị ọzọ gụnyere okra, ọka, karọt, sinamọn, ose ọkụ, paprika, ose ojii, turmeric, cumin, na ihe ndị ọzọ na-esi ísì ụtọ

A na-ejikarị osikapa ọcha (na Senegal, Mauritania na Gambia), fonio ma ọ bụ to (mkpụrụ ọka) na Mali, buwo ma ọ bụ tuo omo (mkpụrụ osikapa ma ọ bụ millet) na Northern Nigeria, Niger, na Northern Ghana, couscous (dị ka West Africa zutere Sahara, na mba Sahelian), ma ọ bụ fufu na poteto na mpaghara ndị ọzọ na-ekpo ọkụ, dị ka Ivory Coast
Um'bido bụ ụdị dị iche iche na-eji akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, ebe a na-esi maafe nke Ghana na àkwá e siri esi
Ụdị stew, 'Virginia peanut soup', ọbụna soro ndị ohu Africa gaa North America
Domoda bụ ụdị nri a na-etinye n'ime ala nke a na-ahụ na Gambia
A na-akwadebe Domoda site na iji ahụekere, ma ọ bụ ahụekere, anụ, yabasị, tomato, galik, akwụkwọ nri na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ
A kọwawo ya dị ka otu n'ime nri mba nke Gambia
A na-ejikarị Domoda n'elu osikapa, a na-ejikwa ya mgbe ụfọdụ n'elu findi, ọka nke yiri couscous n'usoro
Nri a na-esi n'ọkụ nke e ji ihe a na-akpọ groundnut paste, azụ̀, àkwá na mmanụ nkwụ na-ekpo ọkụ mee ka a na-eme nri a na-eri n'ọkụ
Domoda e ji osikapa mee
Àtụ African cuisine

Pearl Modiadie (amụrụ na Disemba 29, 1987) bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi igwe onyonyo na South Africa, DJ redio, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri nke ndị na-ege ntị na TV maara nke ọma maka igosi ihe ngosi okwu egwu SABC1 Zaziwa
Pearl Nkrumah, (amụrụ c
1980), bụ onye Ghana, onye na-arụ n'ụlọ akụ, nwanyị ọchụnta ego, onye ọka iwu na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ, onye bụ onye isi na Access Bank Ghana Plc, ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa, malite na February 2022
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ jere ozi n'ọnọdụ ahụ, ebe ọ bụ na ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa tọrọ ntọala na 2009
A mụrụ Nkrumah na Ghana na 1980s
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị na mpaghara ha, tupu etinye ya na Mahadum Ghana, mahadum ọha kachasị na nke kacha ochie na mba ahụ
Ọ gụchara ma nweta nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na nchịkwa azụmahịa
Ugo mmụta ya nke abụọ, Master of Business Administration, bu nke o nwetara n'otu mahadum ahụ
O nwekwara nzere bachelọ nke iwu, nke ụlọ ọrụ Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration nyere
Ọ malitere ọrụ ụlọ akụ ya gburugburu 2004, dịka onye na-akwụ ụgwọ ụlọ akụ na Standard Chartered Ghana
N'ime afọ ndị sotere, e nyere ya ọrụ ndị ọzọ, o wee bilie n'ọkwa dị ka osote onye njikwa alaka nke ụlọ akuaku ahụ wee bụrụ onye njikwa mmekọrịta azụmahịa
Na 2012, mgbe ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ itoolu na Standard Chartered Ghana, ọ hapụrụ ụlọọrụ ahụ, ụlọọrụ Stanbic Bank Ghana wee were ya n'ọrụ
Na Stanbic Bank Ghana, Nkrumah gara n'ihu na-ebili n'ọkwa, site na onye njikwa mmekọrịta na ụlọ akụ azụmahịa ruo onye isi nke azụmahịa ọhụrụ, ruo onye isi ụlọ akụ SME
N'oge ọ hapụrụ Stanbic, ọ bụ onye isi ahịa, onye na-ahụ maka ire ahịa, nyocha, nyiwe ụlọ akụ, mmekorita na mmepụta ihe ọhụrụ
A na-akwado ya maka iguzobe 'Youth Banking Desk' na Stanbic Bank Ghana, 'ihe ọhụrụ iji kwalite ntinye ego n'oge ntorobịa'
N'ọkwa ya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa na Access Bank Ghana, Pearl Nkrumah sonyere na bọọdụ ndị isi ma bụrụ onye otu ndị isi njikwa nke ụlọ akụ azụmahịa ahụ
Sithembile Xola Pearl Thusi (amụrụ na 13 Mee 1988) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nlereanya, na onye ngosi
The No
1 Ladies 'Detective Agency, Dayana Mampasi na ABC thriller Quantico na Samkelo na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Catching Feelings
N'afọ 2020, ọ pụtara na ọrụ nke Netflix mbụ Usoro izizi nke Africa , Queen Sono
Pearlena Igbokwe bụ onye isi n'ụlọ ọrụ Universal Television, bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ nke ndi NBCUniversal Television Group
Ọ bụ nwaanyị izizi si n'agbụrụ ndị igbo Nigeria di na mba Africa bụnụgoro onyeisi n'ụlọ ọrụ onyonyo kacha na mba America
A mụrụ Igbokwe na Lagos, Nigeria n'afọ 1960s mgbe an-alụ agha

Ya na ezinaụlọ biri n'ime obodo bụ nke ụgboelu nke na-agba ogbunigwe gbariri nke a mere ka ya na ezinaụlọ ya chekwube ụgboelụ na-ebute nri nye ndị agha metụtara mgbe Nigerian Civil War Ya na Ezinaụlọ ya kwajere mba America ka ọ dị afọ isii Ọ nwetara nzere digiri na Arts site na Mahadum nke Yale, ọ nwetakwara ọzụzụ nke MBA site na Mahadum nke Columbia
Igbokwe bidoro ọrụ imepụta ihe nkiri Showtime ebe ọ nọrọ n'ọkwa di iche iche gbasara ihe mmepụta na ngosipụta di iche iche
Ọ lebara anya na nhazi nakwa uto ihe nkiri ndị a kpọrọ Dexter, Nurse Jackie, The Big C, nakwa Masters of Sex
N’afọ 2012,E nyere ya ọkwa dika nnukwu osote onyeisi maka mmepụ na nhazi uto egwuregwu n'ụlọ ọrụ NBC
Ụfọdụ egwuregwu mere nke ọma gụnyere The Blacklist, Blindspot, Chicago Med, Shades of Blue, This Is Us, Timeless, nakwa Taken
N’afọ 2016, e nkyekwara ya okwa dika onye isi n'ụlọ ọru ’Universal Television, nke mab Amerika, nke a mere ya nwaanyị agbụrụ asụsụ Igbo nke mbụ ga anọ n' ụdị ọkwa a
A kpọrọ Igbokwe dika otu n'ime bọọdụ dairectọ nke HRTS n'afọ 2017
N'otu afọ ahụ o sonyekwara na otu bọọdụ NATPE
Pearlie Kennedy Pettway (1920-1982) bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ákwà
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme akwa akwa nke Gee's Bend
Ọrụ ya dị na Metropolitan Museum of Art
A mụrụ Pearlie Kennedy na Boykin, Alabama (Gee's Bend) na 1920
O nwèrè nwanne nwoke, Herman Kennedy
Ọ lụrụ Horace Pettway, ónyé bụ nwanne nwunye nwanne ya nwoke, Mary Elizabeth Pettway
Pettway mepụtara ihe mkpuchi Triangles ya n'ihe dị ka afọ 1960
A na-eji ihe owuwu eme ihe, nkè a makwaara dị ka Triangles Creating Squares-within-Squares (Housetop) Motif, nkè a na-akpọ ihe owuwu
A gụnyere ya na nchịkọta nke Metropolitan Museum of Art, onyinye nke Souls Grown Deep Foundation na 2014
Ozugbo a na-enweghị ike idozi uwe, Pettway ga-eji ihe sitere na uwe mkpuchi, uwe, na uwe elu iji mepụta akwa
A na-eji ogho na denim rụọ ihe owuwu ya, nke e mere n'ihe dị ka n'afọ 1950,
Dị ka nwa ya nwanyị Florida Irby si kwuo, Pettway na-ejikwa akpa ntụ ọka na ákwà 25 lb
ọ nwetara na Camden, na-eji ákwà fọdụrụ iji mee akwa
Pettway nwụrụ na 1982 na Boykin

Rosemary Patricia ' Pebe ' Sebert ( /ˈp iː b i PEE -bee / -ərt ; _ _ amuru Maachị 17, 1956) bu onye America na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede abụ sitere na Brentwood, Tennessee, na nne nke onye ọbụ abụ na onye na-agụ abụ Kesha
Sebert nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ-otu hits maka Dolly Parton, Pitbull, na Kesha, nwa ya nwanyị
Sebert na Kesha edeela egwu iri na otu ebipụtara ọnụ
Egwu Sebert dere maka ndị na-ese ihe ndị ọzọ ejikọtala ahịa nke ihe karịrị nde 8 na United States naanị
Na 2013, Sebert pụtara dị ka onye na-emekarị ihe ngosi eziokwu Kesha My Crazy Beautiful Life, nke kpakpando Kesha na-ese onyinyo ya na nwa ya nwoke Lagan sere ya
A mụrụ Sebert na March 17, 1956, na Michigan City, Indiana, ma nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'ugbo nne na nna ya
Nna ya sitere na German na nne ya bụ onye Hungarian
Pebe malitere ịbụ abụ na ịmepụta abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 4 ma na-abụ abụ n'ihu ọha mgbe ọ dị afọ isii, ọ zụrụ azụ dị ka onye na-agụ egwú ma kpọọ piano na guitar
Sebert bụrụ abụ n'ìgwè, ìgwè, na dị ka onye na-ese ihe
Ọ banyere na Interlochen Arts Academy a ma ama mgbe ọ dị afọ 15, bụ ebe o sonyere na otu ndị Madrigal pụrụ iche, nke na-aga site na òkù na Europe
Ọ gakwara njem nlegharị anya dị ka soprano ya na ndị ntorobịa America na Symphony na Choir
Ọ malitere igwu ụlọ kọfị na Chicago na Europe n'oge ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị
N'afọ ndị 1970, Sebert dere ' Ochie ọkụ enweghị ike ijide gị kandụl ' ya na di mgbe ahụ Hugh Moffatt maka onye ọbụ abụ mba America bụ Joe Sun maka album ya Old Flames
N'oge na-adịghị anya nsụgharị Sun ghọrọ ihe egwu, na-arị elu na Nke 14 na chaatị Billboard Hot Country Songs
Dolly Parton tinyere mkpuchi nke egwu na album 1980 Dolly, Dolly, Dolly afọ abụọ ka ewepụtara ụdị Sun
Ụdị Parton ghọrọ nnukwu ihe egwu, ruru Nke 1 na chaatị Billboard Hot Country Songs
'Old ọkụ enweghị ike ijide gị kandụl' mechara kpuchie ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe, gụnyere ada Sebert Kesha maka egwu agbatịkwuru Deconstructed na album studio nke atọ ya Rainbow
Na 2004, Sebert gbazinyere ụda olu ya na album ezumike mpụta mbụ nke X-Mas Balls, Ọ Hapụrụ M Maka Rudolph, na-abụ abụ 'Ọ bụrụ na m bụ mmụọ ozi' na Ned McElroy na Jerry Williams
Na May 2005, Sebert na ụmụ ya abụọ Kesha na Lagan gbara egwu na ihe omume nke usoro eziokwu The Simple Life nke gbara Paris Hilton na Nicole Richie
N'ime ihe omume May 12, 2005 'Onye Nhazi Wedding,' Sebert na-ahapụ Hilton na Richie ka ha nọrọ n'ụlọ ya ka ha na-agbalị ịhazi agbamakwụkwọ ma mesịa gbalịa, site n'enyemaka Kesha, ịtọ Sebert n'ụbọchị

N'afọ 2010, Sebert dekọtara egwu egwu nwa ya nwanyị Kesha bụ ' Ịhụnanya Gị Bụ Ọgwụ M ', nke ghọrọ Top 10 na-alụbeghị di na mba itoolu wee rute platinum atọ na US N'afọ ahụ, Sebert na Kesha nyere egwu 'Asọ oyi' onye na-agụ pop pop Miranda Cosgrove maka album mbụ ya, ma nye aka na egwu egwu maka mpụta mbụ nke Miley Cyrus EP, Oge nke Ndụ Anyị
Na 2012 Sebert kwadoro 'Warrior', 'Dirty Love', 'Wonderland', 'Gold Trans Am', na 'Out Alive' maka Kesha nke abụọ album Warrior
Sebert nyekwara ụda nkwado maka egwu 'Dirty Love', nke gosipụtara Iggy Pop, na 'Gold Trans Am'
N'April 2013 Sebert pụtara na Kesha's reality show Kesha My Crazy Beautiful Life nke nwa ya nwoke Lagan Sebert mere ihe nkiri wee gbasaa na MTV
Oge mbụ (Eprel 23, 2013 - Mee 28, 2013) dekọtara ndụ Kesha ka ọ malitere njem nlegharị anya mbụ ya wee rụọ ọrụ na album nke abụọ ya, Warrior
Oge nke abụọ gosipụtara Kesha na-etinyekwu oge n'ụlọ na-ewe ezumike dị oke mkpa, ma gosipụta nwa Sebert nke ọdụdụ na nwanne Kesha nke ọdụdụ, Louie, onye na-apụtabeghị na oge mbụ
Oge nke abụọ sitere na Ọktoba 30 ruo Disemba 18, 2013
Na 2013, Sebert kwadoro Kesha na American rapper Pitbull 's hit single ' Timber ', nke e wepụtara na October 2, 2013, wee ghọọ a Top 10 otu na 28 mba na 1 na 12 mba
Na Disemba 31, 2013, Kesha wepụtara vidiyo egwu maka 'Dirty Love', nke Sebert dekọrọ na nke o nyere aka n'olu
N'afọ 2017, Sebert rụpụtara Kesha's backback album Rainbow nke gosipụtara egwu ọhụrụ abụọ nke ndị duo dere ('Hymn' na 'Mụta Ka Go'), yana duet nke 'Ọkụ Ochie enweghị ike ijide kandụl
nye Gị', n'etiti Kesha na Parton
Sebert so Kesha na nwa ya nwoke Louie dee duet ' Safe ', bụ ndị mere ya na onye rapper Chika
Sebert lụrụ Hugh Moffatt, onye o dere 'Old ọkụ enweghị ike ijide gị kandụl', ruo afọ asaa, kewapụrụ na 1984
Ha nwere otu nwa ọnụ, Lagan Sebert
Ọ na-azọrọ na mgbe ịgba alụkwaghịm ahụ gasịrị, ya na Lagan bi na ụgwọ ọdịmma na stampụ nri
Na 1987, Sebert mụrụ nwa nwanyị Kesha Rose Sebert
Sebert na-ebutekarị Kesha na ụmụnne ya n'ebe a na-edekọ ihe ma gbaa Kesha ume ka ọ bụrụ abụ
Ọ kwagara ezinụlọ ahụ na Nashville, Tennessee na 1991 mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nkwekọrịta mbipụta ọhụrụ maka ide abụ ya
N'October 12, 1999, a mụrụ nwa nwoke nke abụọ Sebert, Louis Sage 'Louie' Sebert, n'agbanyeghị na a nabatara ya
Ọ pụtara na ihe omume nke usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn Victorious n'akụkụ Kesha
Site na Lagan, Pebe nwere ụmụ ụmụ abụọ

Mgbe Sebert na Kesha kwuchara na ha amaghị onye nna Kesha bụ, Bob Chamberlain gakwuru Star na 2011 na foto na akwụkwọ ozi, na-ekwu na ha bụ ihe akaebe na ya na Kesha na-akpakọrịta mgbe niile dị ka nna na nwa nwanyị tupu ọ dị afọ 19

Sebert nyochara na Timberline Knolls Residential Treatment Center na Lemont, Illinois, maka rehab na January 2014, na-azọrọ na ya nwere nsogbu nrụgide post-traumatic site na trauma nke Kesha na-awakpo ya site na ndekọ ndekọ ya na Dr
Luke
Sebert kwetara na ya bụ onye ọgwụ ọjọọ riri ahụ na onye aṅụrụma ma kpọọ Kesha gaa nzukọ Alcoholics Anonymous kemgbe Kesha dị otu afọ
BMI Pop Music Awards
Pedro Arrojo-Agudo bụ onye sayensị, onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba, onye na'ihe gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi, na prọfesọ na Mahadum nke Zaragoza

E nyere ya Goldman Environmental Prize na 2003, maka onyinye ya na nchekwa mmiriEmere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnochite anya pụrụiche nke United Nations na ikike mmadụ maka mmiri ọ drinkingụ andụ dị ọcha na ịdị ọcha na Ọktoba 2020
Pedro J

Déniz Acosta (amụrụ n'afọ 1964, na Santa Brígida, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Canary Islands, Spain) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Spain nke mepụtara ọrụ nka na ahụmịhe sitere na nka ihe na nka ntinye, site na foto nka na nka vidiyo, ịzụlite ntinye aka nka, nka arụmọrụ, uri anya na eserese
N'afọ 1998, ọ malitere ọrụ La Puente, nke na-anọchite anya oge mgbanwe n'ọrụ ya, na-emeghe ọwa nkwurịta okwu na ọrụ nka site na ịmalite karama na ịdị elu nke ozi efu nke ndị omenkà dị iche iche mere
N'afọ 2002, ihe ngosi mbụ ya na Hall nke San Antonio Abad site na Centro Atlántico de Arte Moderno, CAAM
N'otu afọ ahụ, gosipụtara ya na onye na-ese ihe Mounir Fatmi arụmọrụ Power line - Imagen y poder na Espacio C Contemporary Art, Camargo, Santander

Ndị omenkà abụọ ahụ jikọtara aka ọzọ otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị na Second International Contemporary Art Hybrid Spaces, Osorio, Teror, Gran Canaria na arụmọrụ Hybrid Space, omume abụọ ahụ bu n'uche itinye onye na-ekiri ya n'ọnọdụ ntụgharị uche na esemokwu ọdịbendị

Dị ka akụkụ nke Performando, nzukọ nke ihe ngosi ndị e mere na Las Palmas de Gran Canaria na-agba ọsọ arụmọrụ Paper Memories site na iwu mgbidi site na iberibe akwụkwọ akụkọ iji jụọ ozi anyị na-ewepụ mgbasa ozi
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2003, a gụnyere ntinye foto a na-akpọ Welcome in Contemporary African Photography Biennale, 5èmes Rencontres Africaines de la Photographie, Bamako, Mali
N'otu afọ ahụ, Dulce-sal gosipụtara ntinye foto dabere na nsogbu mbata nke a gụnyere na ọrụ nchịkọta nke Aula del Mestizaje, Mahadum Las Palmas de Gran Canaria

Onye na-ese ihe Ricardo Basbaum (Brazil), Robin Rhode (South Africa) na Pedro Déniz gosipụtara ihe ngosi otu a na-akpọ 3 Scenarios, ntinye ahụ sitere na Maachị ruo Eprel na Hall nke San Antonio Abad del Centro Atlántico de Arte Moderno CAAM na 2005
Otu n'ime uri anya ya ahọpụtara maka ihe ngosi Ekwenyeghị
Banyere nka, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọha na eze na Spanish State, ngalaba uri nnwale na Barcelona Museum of Contemporary Art MACBA
N'otu afọ ahụ, o gosipụtara vidiyo ya n'ụbọchị Mee n'ihe gbasara 6th Biennial Photography na Bamako, Mali
N'ime ọnwa Eprel na Mee 2006 sonyere na akụkụ nke abụọ nke Violencias Urban(istic)a na MAPFRE Foundation na Las Palmas de Gran Canaria na Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Gọọmentị Canary Islands
N'afọ ahụ gosipụtakwara na Biennial nke Dakar ọrụ ya Ajuy n'ime ọrụ multimedia Meeting Point

Ọktọba ruo Disemba 2007 gosipụtara na Gallery nke Mahadum Metropolitan Autonomous (UAM) na Mexico City Transit, ókèala nke eziokwu na ndị na-ese ihe Jose Domingo Diaz na Luzardo na-achọ ịma ọrụ ya aka na echiche nke eziokwu nke ọdịbendị kachasị
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2008, o sonyere na arụmọrụ Jappy New Year na Circo Project, ihe omume mba ụwa na Audiovisual Performance, Havana, Cuba
N'okpuru Nzukọ Mmekọrịta nke Gran Canaria Espacio Digital haziri na-ewebata arụmọrụ ya Transit/Blindness ebe ọ na-enyocha mfu nke ihe kpatara ya site na mbata
N'afọ 2009, o gosipụtara na 10th Havana Biennial interactive installation Trench of thought ebe Déniz gosipụtara site n'ọrụ ya adịghị ike nke echiche dị iche iche
N'afọ 2016, Galerie St
Gertrude, Hamburg, mere ngosi mbụ na Germany, na mmekorita ya na onye na-ese ihe ahu
Pedro Manuel Barata de Macedo Lima (20 Eprel 1971 20 June 2020) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Portuguese-Angolan, na-apụta na telenovelas na mba Portugal
Ọ bụkwa onye na-egwu mmiri Olympic
Ọ nọchitere anya Angola n'afọ 1988 na afọ1992 na Summer Olympics
Lima sonyere n'ọtụtụ asọmpi igwu mmiri mana ọ nweghị mgbe ọ gara n'ihu na mbido
N'afọ 1988, a chụpụrụ ya na 50m freestyle nke ụmụ nwoke, ọ bụ onye nke 62 na 100m freest style nke ụmụ nwoke
N'afọ 1992, Lima mechara nke 43 na Men's 50m freestyle na nke 53 na Mens 100m butterfly
Lima nwetakwara ihe nrite ọla edo na ọla nchara n'afọ 1991 All-Africa Games, ọ ritere ihe nrite ego edo na 50m freestyle nke ụmụ nwoke na ọla nchọcha na 100m butterfly nke ụmụ nwoke
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2018, Lima nwere ihe ndekọ mba abụọ maka Angola ihe ndekọ 50m freestyle setịpụrụ n'afọ 1991 All-Africa Games nke 2398 sekọnd na ihe ndekọ 100m azụ nke 5930 sekọnd

Mgbe a kpọrọ ya ka ọ kwado ihe ngosi TV banyere ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Magacine, ọ nwere ọrụ na ihe nkiri ncha Portuguese dịka O Último Beijo, Ninguém como Tu, Fala-me de Amor, Ilha dos Amores na A Outra
O mekwara ihe nkiri na 2009 Second Life
Lima bụ onye mmekọ nke ihe nlereanya Anna Westerlund, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ anọ
O nwekwara nwa nwoke toro eto site na mmekọrịta ya na Patrícia Piloto
N'abalị 20 ọnwa June afọ 2020, a chọtara ozu Lima na Abano Beach [pt] na Cascais, n'ihe yiri ka ọ bụ igbu onwe ya
A kọrọ na o zigara ozi ekele nye ndị enyi abụọ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya n'ụbọchị a

Peggie Lois Hartwell, (amụrụ n'afọ 1939) bụ ónyé na-emepụta ihe na ónyé nkụzi nke ọgbọ nke anọ nke ndị Africa America
Ọ bi na Summerville, South Carolina ugbu a, ébé ọ bụ onyeisi oche nke Summerville Chapter nke Women of Color Quilters Network
Ihe ha na-elekwasị anya bụ ịkụziri ụmụaka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nka na omenala nke ime akụkọ
Peggie Hartwell tolitere n'ugbo nwéré nnukwu ezinụlọ
A mụrụ ya na 1939 na Springfield, South Carolina
Ụmụ nwanyị bụ ndị na-eme akwa, ndị ikom bụkwa ndị na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma na ọdịnala ógè ochie nke ịkọ akụkọ
N'ime afọ 1940 na 1950, ndị ọrụ ugbo ndịda Afrịka-Amerịka kwagara n'ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu n'ọbọdọ ndị dị n'ebe ugwu
Hartwell gụsịrị akwụkwọ na New York City
Hartwell mụụrụ ónyé nkụzi ịgba egwú Syvilla Fort nke New York City
Ọ nọrọ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ asatọ na-eme Jazz, Modern Primitive na Modern dance techniques na Europe na Middle East
Mgbè ọrụ arụmọrụ ya kwụsịrị, ọ nwetara ọkwa n'otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-ere ahịa kachasị ichié, Tanenbaum Harber Co
nke New York City

Peggy, the Will O' the Wisp bụ ihe nkiri ihe nkiri America furu efu nke 1917 nke Tod Browning duziri
Dị ka akọwapụtara na nyocha magazin ihe nkiri, Neil Dacey (Carrigan) hụrụ Peggy Desmond (Taliaferro) n'anya
Terence O'Malley (Sack), nwa nwanne Squire O'Malleys (Ryan), na-achọsi ike imeri Peggy
Terence na nwanne nna ya nwere esemokwu n'ihi na Terence enweghị ike imeri Peggy, e gbukwara squire ahụ
Terence ji égbè Neil gbuo ya, n'ihi ya, a na-ejide Neil maka ogbugbu ahụ
Peggy, iji zọpụta onye ọ na-alụ, na-eyi uwe dị ka will-o'-the-wisp, nke a na-eme ka nkwupụta nke Terence
Àtụ Tod Browning
Peggy Duff (8 Febụwarị 1910 - 16 Eprel 1981) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Britain nke malitere ọrụ ya site na mkpesa megide mmeso a na-emeso ndị agha Germany na Britain mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị
A maara ya nke ọma maka enyemaka ya na udo dị ka onye na-ahazi mkpọsa maka nkwụsị nuklia
Noam Chomsky, enyi ya, kọwara Duff dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị gbanwere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke oge a n'ezie'
A mụrụ Duff dị ka Margaret Doreen Eames, na Chiswick, Middlesex
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke okenye na nwa nke etiti nke Frank Eames, onye odeakwụkwọ nke onye na-ere ahịa, na Evelyn Rose Eames (née Pitman)
Site na afọ 1921, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Hastings maka ụmụ nwanyị; na ntinye aka nke afọ 1929 site n'aka onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ kọwara ya dị ka onye 'mmụọ ọha na eze'
Ọ gara Bedford College, Mahadum London, ebe ọ gụrụ Bekee
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ ma lụọ Bill Duff na 1933, onye nta akụkọ ibe ya
E gburu ya n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ mgbe ọ na-akọ akụkọ mwakpo ụgbọelu America na ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Burma maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị agha
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na nwa nwoke (onye nta akụkọ foto Euan Duff)
Duff malitere itinye aka na mkpọsa udo na ngwụcha afọ 1930
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ sonyeere Common Wealth, otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke dị n'aka ekpe nke Labour, nke Sir Richard Acland guzobere

Mgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 1945, nke Common Wealth nyere ndị otu Labour Party vootu ya, otu Victor Gollancz na-akpọ Save Europe Now were Duff n'ọrụ, nke zigara nri na uwe na Germany na Austria site na Britain, ma mee mkpọsa maka ịlaghachi ndị a tụrụ mkpọrọ n'agha
Site na 1949, ruo 1955 ọ bụ onye njikwa azụmahịa nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Tribune, mgbe ahụ achụpụta, ya na ndị na-akwado Labour MP Aneurin Bevan

N'ịrụkọ ọrụ na Gollancz ọzọ, Duff ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ nke National Campaign for the Abolition of Capital Punishment, nke e guzobere n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1955, n'akụkụ ụfọdụ dị ka nzaghachi nye ọtụtụ ogbugbu na-ese okwu (gụnyere nke Ruth Ellis)
N'afọ, 1956, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Labour nke St Pancras Borough Council, ebe ọ ghọrọ Chief Whip maka otu Labour
Duff bụ onye kansụl na Camden London Borough Council, maka mpaghara Camden, site na 1964 ruo 1968

Ọ kwadokwara, ikike nke ndị bi n'ụlọ ndị kansụl, mana n'ime nke a, o nyere ìhè na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ maka mmezigharị ụlọ na-ese okwu na mmemme mkpochapụ nke a na-ewere na ọ mebiri ngalaba ọ jere ozi
[citation needed]
Na Nzukọ nke Labour Party na afọ 1957, Aneurin Bevan, onye bụ odeakwụkwọ mba ọzọ n'oge ahụ, tụrụ ndị na-akwado ya n'anya site n'ịkatọ ihe achọrọ maka nkwụsị nuklia

N'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ ahụ, Duff zaghachiri site n'ịgwakọta ya na ndị ọzọ iji guzobe Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament (CND), nke ebumnuche ya bụ ime ka Britain 'kwụsị iji ma ọ bụ mepụta ngwá agha nuklia n'enweghị ihe mgbochi ma jụ ikwe ka ndị ọzọ jiri ha mee ihe na nchekwa ya'
Duff ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ nhazi maka mkpọsa ahụ, ndị na-akwado ya makwaara ike ya na ume ya nke ọma
Canon John Collins, Onye isi oche nke CND, kwuru na ọ dịghị mgbe o nyere echiche nke ịrụ ọrụ nke ọma 'ma yie ka ọ na-agbaji kpamkpam', mana na ọrụ ya nwere nsonaazụ dị egwu
Ọ haziri Aldermaston Marches nke abụọ na nke sochirinụ site na 1959 ruo 1963
N'afọ 1965, Duff malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka International Confederation for Disarmament and Peace, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke CND n'afọ 1967
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na Labour Party na 10 Mee n'afọ ahụ, n'ihi nkwado Praịm Minista Harold Wilson maka United States na agha Vietnam na ịjụ ịkatọ ọchịchị aka ike nke Gris nke 'ndị Colonel'
O mechara dee akụkọ ndụ ya, Left, Left, left (Allison & Busby, 1971)
Duff dezigharịrị ma dee akụkụ nke Agha ma ọ bụ Udo na Middle East? (1978), ebe ọ rụrụ ụka maka 'ọ dịghịzi akwụkwọ ndọrọ ego efu maka Israel'
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa ara na University College Hospital, mgbe ọ dị afọ 71, e lie ya na Hampstead Cemetery
Noam Chomsky kpọrọ Duff 'otu n'ime ndị dike a na-amaghị ama, n'ihi na o mere ọtụtụ ihe,' ma kwuo na 'ọ kwesịrị inweta Nobel Peace Prize ihe dị ka ugboro iri abụọ'
Ọ kọwara ya dị ka 'onye ndu', na CND na ndị na-emegide Agha Vietnam

Camden London Borough Council guzobere ihe ncheta na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na 11 Albert Street, Camden Town, London, iji kwanyere ya ùgwù, na-agụ 'Peggy Duff, 1910 意 1981, odeakwụkwọ ukwu mbụ nke Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament na onye kansụl mpaghara, biri ebe a

Peggy Antoinette Vidot (Amụrụ n'afọ 1958 n'afọ 1959) bụ onye nọọsụ Seychelles na onye na-amụ nwa
Kemgbe ụbọchị 3 Nọvemba 2020, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka Minista nke Ahụike
Vidot bụ onye na-amụ nwa nke Luton na Dunstable School of Midwifery, na onye nọọsụ edebanyere aha na Bath School of Nursing
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere masta na nlekọta ọrụ ahụike na Mahadum Manchester
N'afọ 1977, ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi nọọsụ na School of Nursing na Seychelles
N'afọ 2003, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ ahụike maka Secretariat Commonwealth na London
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Seychelles n'afọ 2012, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche nye Minista ahụike, ma jee ozi ruo n'afọ 2016
Peignoir (/ˈp Hollyːr, ˈpeɪn-/, kwa US /-ˈwɑːr/; French pronunciation [pɛɲwaːʁ]) bụ uwe ogologo maka ụmụ nwanyị nke na-adịkarị ọcha ma jiri chiffon maọbu ákwà ọzọ na-egbuke egbuke mee ya

Okwu a sitere na Frenchi peigner, iji kpụzie ntutu (site na Latin pectināre, site na pecten, pectin-, comb) na-akọwa uwe ana-eyi mgbe ị na-asa ntutu mmadụ, na mbụ na-ezo aka na uwe elu ma ọ bụ uwe asa ahụ

Ana-ere peignoirs dị elu mgbe ụfọdụ na ihe mgba na aka di ogologo na sọks ndị e ji otu ahụ mee dị ka peignoir n'onwe ya maka iyi ya n'àkwà maobụ n'oge aga-ahụ onye na-eyi ya n'uwe abalị ya, dị ka ileta maọbu mgbe ọ na-ekerịta ebe obibi n'oge njem n'etiti narị afọ nke 19 ruo n'etiti nke 20
Peju Alatise (a mụrụ n'afọ 1975) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe, onye na-ede uri, onye edemede, na onye otu na National Museum of African Art, akụkụ nke Smithsonian Institution
Alatise nwetara ọzụzụ dị ka onye na-ewu ụlọ na Mahadum Ladoke Akintola dị na Oyo Steeti, Naịjirịa
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ afọ iri abụọ dị ka onye na-ese ihe na studio
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na mbipụta nke iri ise na asaa nke Venice Biennale, nke isiokwu ya bụ Viva Arte Viva (Long Live Art)
Alatise, ya na ndị omenkà Naịjirịa abụọ ọzọ, Victor Ehikhamenor na Qudus Onikeku, bụ ndị Naịjirịa mbụ pụtara na ngosi nka ahụ
Ọrụ ya bụ otu ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ndụ dabere na ndụ nke nwa agbọghọ na-eje ozi
A mụrụ Alatise n'afọ 1975 na Lagos, Naijiria
Ya na ụmụnne ya asaa tolitere n'ezinụlọ ọdịnala ndị Alakụba
Alatise bu ụzọ were nka dị ka ọrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise mgbe ọ lere ihe ngosi nke onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria bụ David Dale
Mgbe Alatise kwupụtara atụmatụ ya ịghọ onye n, nna ya jụrụ echiche ahụ, na-eche na nka bụ oge efu
Ọ chọrọ ka nwa ya nwanyị họrọ ọrụ nke nwere akụ na ụba
Otú ọ dị, nne ya kwadoro ọrụ nka nke Alatise, dịka onye mgbaasị buru amụma na otu ụbọchị Alatise ga-aba ọgaranya
N'agbanyeghị na ọ kwadoghị ya na mbụ, nna ya mechara nweta echiche ahụ tupu ọ nwụọ
Tupu ọ na-achụso nka, Alatise gụrụ ihe owuwu na mahadum, na-eji ụzọ o si kụziere ya ịhụ na iche echiche n'ụzọ ezi uche dị na ya
N'oge ọ nọ na kọleji, Alatise malitere inyocha mmasị ya na nka site na ileta Jakande, ahịa ọrụ aka na Lagos
N'ebe ahụ, ọ na-eme mgbasa ozi dị iche iche, gụnyere eserese, ịkpụ ihe, na ime ọla
Ọ malitere ọrụ nka ya na eserese, wee gbasaa ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ese ihe na multimedia, na-eji beads, ákwà, resin na ihe ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na ihe ọkpụkpụ, na-eji nka ya ekwu okwu banyere nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ebe ọ na-etinye akwụkwọ, ihe nnọchianya na akụkọ ọdịnala Yoruba n'ime ọrụ ya
Alatise jikwa mgbasa ozi dị ka ịme bead, ndụmọdụ nka ọhụụ, edemede okike, imepụta ihe eji emepụta akpụkpọ anụ, na imepụta ime ụlọ

Dị ka Vogue si kwuo, “Alatise na-akọwa ọrụ nka ya dị ka ịchọ eziokwu na iji mezuo nke a, ọtụtụ ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na ụmụ nwanyị na Naịjirịa na okwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na okpukpe dị n'obi mba ahụ
N'ikwere n'ụzọ siri ike na onye na-ese ihe kwesịrị igosi ụwa ọ bi na ya, Alatise na-agbasi mbọ ike iji anya nke uche hụ nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ahụmịhe onwe ya

N'iburu n'uche echiche mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya siri ike banyere ọrụ nwoke na nwanyị na Naịjirịa, ọ bụghị ihe ijuanya na ọtụtụ ihe osise Alatise na-elekwasị anya na enweghị nhata nwoke na nwanyị na ikike ụmụ nwanyị
N'iji nka ya kwuo okwu banyere nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, Alatise na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwado mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya site na nka
Ọrụ Alatise na-agbasawanye echiche Afro-feminist site n'ịgbawa ọdịdị nwoke nke ọdịbendị Afrịka nke oge a
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, ọrụ Alatise emeela ka ya na ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ a ma ama na Naijiria dị ka Nike Davies Okundaye, Lara Ige-Jacks, na Ndidi Dike
Ọ bụ ezie na Alatise malitere ọrụ nka ya site n'inyocha echiche efu atọ n'elu akụkụ abụọ, ọ na-emepụta site na akwụkwọ
A na-egosipụta ịhụnanya a jikọtara nka na akwụkwọ n'otu n'ime ihe ndị kachasị mma ya, 'Flying Girls'

E gosipụtara na Venice Biennale, ibe a nwere ụmụ agbọghọ asatọ nwere nku, na, dị ka ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ejiji na ntụrụndụ BellaNaija si kwuo, 'dabere na akụkọ nke nwa agbọghọ dị afọ iri nke na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta ụlọ na Lagos mgbe ọ na-arọ nrọ nke ala ebe ọ nweere onwe ya, onye na-abụghị nke onye ọ bụla ma e wezụga onwe ya, ma nwee ike ife efe
' Bella na-ekwukwa na ibe a 'na-ekwu maka ikpe na-ezighị ezi nke ugbu a, mana site n'ọhụụ nke ọdịnihu dị nchebe, ọkachasị maka ụmụ agbọghọ' Ọzọkwa, ọrụ a na-edozi nsogbu nke ọrụ ụmụaka
Peju edeela akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ nke mbụ ya nke a na-akpọ Orita meta ma bụrụ olu na-eduga maka ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka n'oge a
O jirila ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi na olu iji dozie nsogbu ọha na eze ma na-agbanwe akụkọ na echiche
Peju Alatise bụ onye otu na National Museum of African Art, akụkụ nke Smithsonian Institution
E rere ọrụ Alatise nke afọ 2011 nke akpọrọ 'Ascension' na nde N44 na Nigeria's Art Auction, nke a mere ka ọrụ ya bụrụ nke kachasị ọnụ ahịa n'etiti ndị na-ese ihe na-apụta
Alatise natara 2017 FNB Art Prize na mmalite nke 10th installment of FNB Joburg Art Fair
Ihe ngosi nka a dị na Johannesburg, South Afrịka
Nchegbu ya kachasị ọhụrụ gụnyere ịmepụta ebe obibi ndị na-ese ihe na Morocco na Turkey
Ndị a bụ ebe ndị na-ese ihe nwere ike ibi ma rụọ ọrụ na ọrụ nka ha dị iche iche mgbe ha nọ nso ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe nwere mmasị yiri nke ahụ
N'ụzọ dị otú a, Alatise na-elekwasị anya n'ịkwado ndị Omenkà na-abịa
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Aljazeera, Alatise kọwara ihe mgbaru ọsọ ya n'okwu ndị a 'Mgbe m lere anya n'ụkpụrụ m chọrọ ka ọrụ m bụrụ, ana m ele ihe na-eme n'ụwa niile anya
Ndị Omenkà na-akpali m bụ [ndị] ọrụ ha na-etinye aka n'ụzọ na-agwa gị ma ọ bụ na-akpali gị, [nke] na-ekwu maka ezi isi nke mmadụ n'ime gị ma achọrọ m ka ọrụ m mee otu ihe ahụ
Peju hiwere ANAI Foundation ntọala na-abaghị uru nke raara onwe ya nye mmepe nke nka ọhụụ na Naịjirịa, na-enye mmemme ọzụzụ maka ndị Omenkà
Peju Layiwola bụ onye ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na onye na-ese ihe ana-ahụ anya sitere na Naijiria na-arụ ọrụ n'dị ihe mgbasa ozi dị iche iche
Amụrụ Adepeju Olowu, Layiwola bụ ada Babatunde Olatokunbo Olowu na Princess Elizabeth Olowu (née Akenzua )
Nna nna ya bụ nnukwu onye ọchụnta ego bụ onye guzobere sirima na mbipụta akwụkwọ mbụ na Benin na mpaghara Delta na steeti Midwestern ochie
Nna nna ya, ka ọ dị ugbu a, bụ Oba Akenzua II, eze Benin, onye chịrị site na 1933 ruo 1978
Ọ bụkwa nwa nwanne DJ P Tee Money (amụrụ Thompson Iyamu )
Layiwola ewulitela n'ọdịnala nka nke nne ya, Princess Elizabeth Olowu, nwanyị mbụ kpuru ọla nchara na Nigeria, ọkwa o nwetara site na nkwụsi ike n'ọdịbendị bụ nna ochie
Ihe nketa Yoruba abụọ na Edo na akụkọ ihe mere eme emeela ka ọ rụọ ọrụ ọkachamara
Layiwola nwetara BA (Metal Design) na Mahadum Benin na 1988, yana MA na PhD (Visual Arts) na Mahadum Ibadan, Nigeria na Afo puku abụọ na anọ
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa nke Ụmụ nwanyị na ndi na-eto eto Nkà Ntọala, nzukọ kwadoro inyere ụmụ nwanyị, ụmụ agbọghọ na ndị ntorobịa aka site na nka
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi na juri Nkà
Layiwola, onye malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ọla, ugbu a na-enyocha usoro mgbasa ozi dị iche iche na-etinye aka na akụkọ ihe mere eme, ncheta na ịkwapụ omenala
Ihe lekwasịrị anya ya bụ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke onwe na nke obodo ya na alaeze Benin dị ka ebe mgbaba na ọnọdụ ya abụọ dị ka ma oge ochie na nke ọgbara ọhụrụ
Okwu ndị a niile na-arụ ọrụ ya

N'ihe ngosi solo ya kacha adọrọ adọrọ, Benin1897com Art and the Restitution Question (2010), Layiwola lọghachiri na njem ntaramahụhụ na Benin na 1897 na ịkwakọrọ ihe ndị dị oké ọnụ ahịa nke omenala sitere n'ọnụ ụlọ nke nna nna ya na-achịkọta akụkọ onwe ya na nke obodo ya
Ọrụ ọhaneze ya na-emekọ ọnụ, Onye Centenary nke onye? (2014) na-akọkwa site na akụkọ ihe mere eme na ebe nchekwa
O nyere okwu na Rhode Island School of Design na 2019, na otu na CAA-Getty International Programme na 2018 na ọrụ ya
N'ime ọrụ ya na mkpali ya, ọ na-ekwu 'Enwetara m ọtụtụ mkpali sitere na nne m, ebe m hụrụ ya dị ka nwatakịrị nwanyị na-agbanye ígwè
Ya mere, ahọpụtara m maka imepụta ígwè na Mahadum Benin, bụ nke sara mbara karịa ihe ọ gụrụ n'ihi na ọ na-eme ihe nkedo ígwè n'okpuru ọkpụkpụ
Mana m bụ ọkachamara n'ichepụta igwe, nke gụnyere mmepụta ọla, nkedo ígwè wdg'
A kọwapụtala ọrụ nka na mmemme nkuzi Layiwola dị ka emetụtara ọgbọ ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe na gburugburu Naijiria
Layiwola malitere ọrụ ya na Mahadum Benin na 1991 wee gaa na Mahadum Lagos na 2002
Ọ gbagoro n'ọrụ onye isi nke Creative Arts na Mahadum Lagos site na 2013 ruo 2015 yana onye isi site na 2017 ruo 2020
Ọ kwadoro ka emegharia na usoro ọmụmụ ma dezie akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ nke ngalaba ahụ
N'okpuru ọchịchị ya, e hiwere ụlọ ọrụ Lagoon ka ọ bụrụ usoro njikọ aka obodo na Mahadum Lagos
Peju nwetara ihe nrite ngalaba na Applied Arts na 1987, nwa akwụkwọ kacha agụsị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Benin Art School na 1988, NYSC Merit Award Lagos State1989
Ndị na-eme nchọpụta pụrụ iche ngalaba nke Arts, Mahadum Lagos 2007

Na mba ụwa, Peju meriri African Multiple Cluster of Excellence, Mahadum Bayreuth Grant, 2020; Ọkà mmụta Tyson na Crystal Bridges Museum, Bentonville, USA (2019) Ọkà mmụta nleta pụrụ iche na Mahadum Arkansas (2019-2020) wee bụrụ onye a họpụtara dị ka onye nnọchi anya onye nnọchi anya 2020 nke ihe nrịba ama sitere na steeti Arkansas
Enyere ya onyinye Terra Foundation a ma ama maka Art American na 2018; Onyinye CAA-Getty Alumni (2018), ahọpụtara na US International Leadership Programme (IVLP) 2011
Ya na Bronx Museum of the Arts esorola na Hillary Clinton US State Department SmARTpower mmemme na 2012; Ọ meriri US Lagos State Consulate Grant 2017 na US Alumni Exchange Award 2018
Enyekwara ya onyinye Goethe Resident Artist, (KNW) na Düsseldorf na 2017
Layiwola ebutela nkwado ọha maka nlọghachi ọrụ nka ndị e zuru na Benin n'oge njem nlegharị anya ntaramahụhụ nke 1897
Peju Ogunmola bụ onye omere ihe nkiri Yoruba nke na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood nke Yoruba
Nna ya bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ochie bụ Kola Ogunmola
Ọ bụ nwunye Sunday Omobolanle, onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị, onye na-ede egwuregwu, onye nduzi ihe nkiri, na onye mmepụta ihe
Ọ bụ nne nnochi anya Sunkanmi Omobolanle bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Pelu Awofeso bụ onye nta akụkọ Naijiria, onye edemede njem na ede ihe omenala, nke bi na Lagos, Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke CNN / Multichoice African Journalists Awards na Tourism Category
A na-akọwakarị ya dị ka 'onye edemede njem kachasị na Naijiria'
Ọ bụkwa Onye edemede ebipụtara
Awofeso na-ekwu na ya nwere mmasị na njem mgbe ọ gara obodo Jos na Plateau Steeti nke Naịjirịa na 1998

Nzute ahụ, nke gụnyere ịma mma nke obodo ahụ na-atụ egwu yana ịbịakwute 'edemede site n'oge gara aga site n'aka ndị Britain' bụ ndị dere njem ha n'oge ha bi na Naịjirịa dị ka ndị ọchịchị, kpaliri ya ịmalite njem dị ka ihe omume ntụrụndụ
Ahụrụ m ihe oyiyi site na 1930s, 1940s, 1950s; ha siri ike nke ukwuu ọ dị m ka m na-ahụ oge ahụ
Mgbe ha hapụrụ, echeghị m na ọtụtụ ndị na-eme nke ahụ ọzọ
Nzute ndị ahụ mere ka m chọọ ịgbaso nzọụkwụ ha, ịga njem dị ukwuu na Naịjirịa ma dekọọ ihe m hụrụ
O mere ka m nwekwuo mmasị na Jos nakwa na njem, idekwa banyere ebe a mara mma ndị mmadụ dere ihe dị ka afọ iri ise gara aga
Achọrọ m ide ihe nwere ike ịbara ọha mmadụ uru n'ezie
Ekwesịrị m iche echiche ide banyere Naịjirịa n'ụzọ ndị mmadụ ga-enwe ekele maka mba ahụ
Ọ bụghị naanị ndị na-ege ntị na mba ọzọ, kamakwa ndị Naijiria
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ gara ihe karịrị steeti iri atọ na abụọ n'ime steeti iri atọ na isii nke Naịjirịa ma dee banyere ọtụtụ n'ime ha
N'afọ 2010, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka 234Next, Awofeso meriri CNN / Multichoice African Journalist of the Year Award na Tourism Category

Awofeso bụ onye na-ebipụta magazin njem n'ịntanetị nke a na-akpọ Waka About Ọ bụkwa onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Route 234, akwụkwọ akụkọ njem a kọwara dị ka 'nchịkọta akụkọ sitere n'aka ndị nta akụkọ Naịjirịa na-akọwapụta ahụmịhe onwe onye mgbe ha na-eme njem na mpụga Naịjirịa' Ihe ọ na-anọchite anya ya, 'n'ozuzu ya, bụ ntinye aka na ohere ebe a chọrọ mgbalị dị ukwuu nke ụdị a

N'afọ 2010, o bipụtara Tour of Duty, akwụkwọ 'nke na-edekọ ọnwa iri na-eme njem n'obosara na nke Naịjirịa, ma na-akọ akụkọ banyere ndị mmadụ na ebe ọ na-ezute n'ụzọ, site na ndị na-ere ájá nke Yenagoa ruo ndị na-achụ nta na Osogbo
E bipụtara akwụkwọ nke atọ ya bụ White Lagos n'afọ 2017, ọ na-elekwasị anya n'emume Eyo nke na-ewere ọnọdụ na Lagos n'ụdị ememme
Pembélé o bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Mkpịsị akwụkwọ bụ ngwa eji ede ihe nke na-etinye ink n'elu elu, na-abụkarị akwụkwọ, maka ide ma ọ bụ eserese

Mpempe akwụkwọ ndị mbụ dị ka mkpịsị ahịhịa amị, mkpịsị akwụkwọ, mkpịsị akwụkwọ na mkpịsị akwụkwọ na-achị achị nwere obere ink na nib ma ọ bụ n'obere oghere ma ọ bụ oghere nke a na-ebufe kwa oge site n'itinye ọnụ ọnụ mkpịsị akwụkwọ ahụ n'ime inkwell
Taa, ndị dị otú ahụ pensụl na-ahụ nanị ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke pụrụ iche ojiji, dị ka ihe atụ na calligraphy
A na-eji mkpịsị mgbịrịgba bọọlụ, pensụl bọọlụ, pensụl isi mmiri na pensụl seramiiki dochie anya mkpịsị ahịhịa amị, pensụl quill na pensụ mmiri, bụ ndị e ji ede ihe
E jiri pensụl teknụzụ dị ka Rapidograph dochie mkpịsị akwụkwọ nchịkwa, bụ nke ejiri maka ịse nka na eserese
Mkpịsị akwụkwọ ọgbara ọhụrụ ndị a niile nwere ebe nchekwa ink dị n'ime, nke na ọ dịghị mkpa ka etinye ha na ink mgbe ha na-ede ihe
Penange Dogon bụ asụsụ Dogon a na-asụ na Mali
Ọ dị nso na Ampari
Prokhorov kọwara asụsụ ka ọ dị iche n'afọ 2011
Penda Bah (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1998) bụ onye Gambia na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti ma bụrụ onye isi otu ụmụ nwanyị Gambia
Tupu oge 2019 NWPL, Bah bịanyere aka na otu egwuregwu ọhụrụ nke Nigeria Women Premier League, Dream Stars FC

Penelope ('Penny') Heyns OIS (amụrụ na 8 Nọvemba 1974) bụ onye South Africa bụbu onye na-egwu mmiri, onye a maara nke ọma maka ịbụ naanị nwanyị n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke egwuregwu Olympic nke meriri ma 100m na 200m breaststroke - na 1996 Atlanta Olympic Games - na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye mbụ South Africa nwetara ọla edo nke South Africa mgbe South Africa nabatara ọzọ n'egwuregwu ahụ na 1992
Ya na onye mmeri Australia Leisel Jones, a na-ewere Heyns dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-egwu mmiri kacha ukwuu
Heyns bụ onye kachasị nta n'ime ndị otu egwuregwu Olympic nke South Africa na 1992 Summer Olympics na Barcelona
Ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị otu South Africa na 1994 Commonwealth Games, ebe o ritere ọla nchara na ihe omume 200m breaststroke
Heyns mebiri ihe ndekọ ụwa mbụ ya, 100m breaststroke, na Durban na Machị 1996

Heyns bụ akụkụ ọzọ nke ndị otu egwuregwu Olympic nke South Africa na Atlanta na 1996, ebe ọ meriri ihe nrite ọla edo maka 100m breaststroke (na-emebi ihe ndekọ ụwa maka ihe omume ahụ) yana ihe nrite ego maka 200m breast stroke (na na-emebikwa ihe ndekọ Olympic maka ihe omume)
Nke a mere ka ọ bụrụ naanị nwanyị n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke egwuregwu Olympic nke meriri ma 100m na 200m breaststroke
N'oge 1998 Goodwill Games na New York, Heyns setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ ụwa nke 50m breaststroke
N'afọ 1999, Heyns setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ ụwa iri na otu n'ime ọnwa atọ, na-egwu mmiri na ihe omume na kọntinent atọ dị iche iche
Nke a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye nwere ise n'ime ihe ndekọ ụwa isii nwere ike ime n'otu oge, ihe a na-enwetụbeghị n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke igwu mmiri
Magazin Swimming World kpọrọ Heyns aha dị ka Female World Swimmer of the Year na 1996 na 1999
Ọ bụkwa onye otu egwuregwu Olympic nke South Africa na 2000 Olympic Games na Sydney
O ritere ọla nchara na 100m breaststroke
Heyns lara ezumike nká na asọmpi igwu mmiri n'afọ 2001
N'afọ 2004, Heyns bụ onye otu ndị na-eme egwuregwu nke International Swimming Federation (FINA)
Ọ bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego, ọkà okwu na-akpali akpali na nke ọha na eze, na onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn
O mechaala akụkọ ndụ onwe onye
A họpụtara Heyns dị ka onye nke 52 na Top 100 Great South Africanans na 2004
Peng Liyuan ( nke amụrụ na ụbọchị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba na afọ 1962) bụ onye na -agụ egwu ndị China nke oge a ma bụrụ kwa nwunye onye isi ala China na onye isi kachasịna obodo ahụ
Peng Liyuan n'alụ onye ode akwụkwọ ukwu nke otu Kọmunist n'China na Onye isi ala Xi Jinping ugbu a
N'ime afọ 2012 ruo n'afọ 2017, Peng bụ onye isi oche nke Academy nke Art nke ndị mmadụ n'oge ahụ
Site kwa na afọ 2005 ruo n'afọ 2010,ọ jere ozi dị ka osote onye isi otu ndị ntorobịa na China

Peng wuru ewu dị ka onye na -agụ egwu ọnụ ya na ari elu (nke a na akpọ Soprano n'asụsụ bekee) site na ngosi ya mgbe niile na mmeme CCTV New Year's Gala, bụ nke mmemme nyonyo China nke a na -ahụkarị n'oge Afọ Ọhụrụ nke obodo ahụ
Peng emeriela ọtụtụ asọmpi ma nweta nsọpụrụ na ihe nrita n'asọmpi ịbụ abụ na mba niile
Egwu Peng ndị ama ama gụnyere 'Ndị obodo anyị' ( 《父老乡亲》 ), 'Zhumulangma' ( Ugwu Everest ; 《珠穆朗玛》 ) na 'N'ọhịa Olileanya' ( 《在希望的田野上》 )
Peng gụkwara abụ isiokwu nke ọtụtụ ihe usoro ejije a n'eme na onyonyo ndị nke ama ama, dị ka The Water Margin (n'afọ 1998)
Ọ sọkwara na -eme ihe nkiri maka ịgụegwu

Na afọ 1986, ọ nwetara nnukwu ihe nrita akpọrọ Plum Blossom Award, nke bụ onyinye nturu ugo kachasị elu nke China, maka ọrụ ejije nke ọ mere onye ka gosipụta ihe na Nwa Nwanyị Nwere Ntutu Ọcha (nke a na akpọ The White haired Girl n'asụsụ bekee)
Peng bụ onye nkịtị nke ndị agha nnwere onwe nke ndị China, ma nwee ọkwa nkịtị nke dị ka Major General tupu ahọpụta ya dị ka onye isi nke Art Academy, nke mere enye ya ọkwa ọfụma
A maara ya n'ime China maka echiche ejiji ya nke na adị iche, nke a na -ekenye onye ọrụ ya na akwara ya akwa a na akpọ Ma Ke
Na afọ 2014, akwụkwọ akụkọ Forbes depụtara Peng dị ka nwanyị nke iri ise na asaa kachasị nwee ike n'ụwa
Peng Liyuan bụ onye obodo Yuncheng County,nke dị nampaghara Shandong
Peng sonyeere ndị agha ntọhapụ ndị mmadụ na afọ 1980, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, wee malite dị ka onye agha nkịtị
N'ihi ikike olu ya, Peng mechara mee njem nlegharị anya iji kwalite mmụọ ndị agha n'oge esemokwu oke ala nke Sino-Vietnam
Peng buru ụzọ rụọ ọrụ na mba niile China wee bụrụ onye ama ama n'oge izizi site na mmeme CCTV New Year's Gala na afọ 1982, mgbe osoro na ejije On the Plains of Hope
Peng na Xi Jinping alụọla dị na nwunye ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ
Ha nwere otu nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Xi Mingze (习明泽) onye nke amụrụ na afọ 1992, aha ya bụ Xiao Muzi (小木子)
Enwere ike ikwu na akụkụ ka ukwuu nke mmekọrịta ha, Peng enwela ezigbo aha n'ime China, nke gafere nke dị ya bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

Kemgbe dị ya ghọrọ onye ode akwụkwọ ukwu nke ndị Kọmunist ( ya bụ onye isi otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị) na ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2012, na Onye isi ala China ( de jure head of state ) na ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2013, akwụkwọ akụkọ America n'akpọ ya nwanyị mbụ nke China
Ndị enyi Xi na Peng bụ ndịmere ka ha mara onwe ha dị ka osi mee ọtụtụ di na nwunye ndị China na oge afọ 1980
Xi bụ onye a ma ama na agụmakwụkwọ n'oge mbido enyi ha, ọ jụkwara ajụjụ maka usoro ịbụ abụ
Xi bụ nwa nwoke onye ama ama na China Xi Zhongxun onye na ekwu si okwu ike na na akwado mgbanwe
Ezinụlọ Peng doro nabatara mmekọrịta ahụ n'ụzọ dị mfe, n'ihi omume ya Xi na ndi be ha nke ama ama
Mgbe ha nwetara nkwenye nne na nna, ha lụrụ di na nwunye na ụbọchị mbụ na ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1987 na Xiamen, Fujian
Ụbọchị anọ ka e mesịrị nke a, Peng Liyuan laghachiri n'Beijing ka ọ soro ma pụta na mmeme National Art Festival, ozugbo nke a gasiri, ọ gawara United States na Canada ebe ọ soro ma pụta na mmeme
Kemgbe ahụ, Xi na Peng n'ebi ndụ dị iche iche, ebe Peng na anọ nke ukwuu na Beijing, di ya na anọ nke ukwuu na Fujian
Emesịa, ọna anọ n'obodo Zhejiang
Peng na -etinye aka na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ bụkwa onye otu Kọmitii Mba nke iri na otu nke Ọgbakọ Ndụmọdụ Ọchịchị nke Ndị China
Peng bụ onye nnọchite anya ihe ọma nke WHO maka ụkwara nta na HIV/AIDS kemgbe afọ 2011
Na ụbọchị nke iri abụọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2014, Mahadum Massey nke dị na obodo New Zealand nyere Peng asambodo Doctorate na nkwanye ugwu maka onyinye mba ofesi ya na nka, ahụike na agụmakwụkwọ
Peng bụrụ abụ ma gba egwu na afọ 2007 nke egosi na nyonyo na China, nke gosipụtara ndị Tibet ebe ha na-ekele ndị agha China maka ịtọhapụ ha
Ozugbo ngagharị iwe Tiananmen Square nke 1989 mechara na ọwa June n'afọ 1989, Peng Liyuan bụrụ abụ maka ndị agha na edesa iwu

Foto na-egosi ebe ahụ Peng, yi uwe ndị agha na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, na-abụ abụ na ndị agha nwere okpu agha ehe ha nọ na ahịrị na n'ahịrị na Tiananmen Square Beijing, ehichapụ foto nke ahụ ngwa ngwa na ntanetị China tupu ọ nwee ike mepụta mkparịta ụka n'ịntanetị
Agbanyeghị nke a, foto ahụ - nke ọtụtụ mmadụ hụrụ ma kerịta site n'aka ndị na -ekiri ihe nọ na mpụga China tụtere ncheta nke onye ndu zọdara ndị China
Ihe eserese ahụ sitere n'azụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị agha dị n'ihu ọha nke mbipụtara n'afọ1989 nke akpọrọ People's Liberation Army Pictorial

N'ọnwa June n'afọ 2013, akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ofesi nke America bipụtara akụkọ akpọrọ 'Gịnị kpatara Michelle Obama ekwesịghị izute Peng Liyuan' nke kwadoro nhọrọ nke First Lady Michelle Obama na ọchoghị izute Peng Liyuan
Ka o sina dị, Michelle Obama mechara zute Peng n'ọtụtụ nlegharị anya nke ekwuru maka ya nke ukwuu na Beijing na Washington, DC
