Penka Metodieva (Bulgarian; amụrụ na 12 Ọktoba 1950 na Pernik, Bulgaria) bụ onye Bulgaria bụbu onye na agba bọọlụ basketball nke sonyere na 1976 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ na 1980 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Penka Stoyanova (Bulgarian; 21 Jenụwarị 1950 16 Ọgọst 2019) bụ onye Bulgaria na agba bọọlụ bọọlụ nke sonyere na 1976 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ na 1980 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Penka Stoyanova mụrụ na Karlovo January 21, 1950
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ na Plovdiv
N'afọ 1966, e tinyere ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba maka ụmụ agbọghọ, na January 1967, mgbe ọ dị afọ 17, ọ banyere n'òtù ụmụ nwanyị mba
Stoyanova sonyere na ngụkọta nke asọmpi basketball 8 nke Europe
O ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na asọmpi ahụ na Varna, Bulgaria, na 1972 na ọla nchara na Clermont Ferrand na 1976
Na mgbakwunye na nke a, o nwetakwara ọnọdụ nke abụọ na Ụwa Mbụ Basketball Ememme na Lima, Peru, na 1973 na egwuregwu ụwa nke asọmpi 'R
Jones' (William Jones Cup) na Taipei, Taiwan, na 1983 na ndị otu nke abụọ nke Ịtali

Penka Stoyanova bụ onye mmeri ugboro atọ nke Bulgaria na 'Maritsa' (Plovdiv) na onye nkuzi Tencho Nachev na 1971, 1973, na 1974 na ugboro anọ, onye nwetara ọlaọcha na ọla nchara na asọmpi basketball nke Bulgaria
Ya na klọb ụlọ ya, ọ bụkwa onye ikpeazụ ugboro abụọ maka Lilyana Ronketti Iko - na 1979 na 1980
Maka ndị otu mba Bulgaria, Stoyanova gbara bọọlụ 580
Ọ bụ onyeisi ndị otu mba niile, site na 1974 ruo 1981, ọ bụ onyeisi ndị nnọchiteanya nke ndị otu mba ụmụ nwanyị, nke sonyere na nke mbụ ya na Iko Mbaụwa na Prague, Czechoslovakia, na 1967
Stoyanova bụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke mbụ nke Bulgaria na-egwu basketball ọkachamara na mba ofesi
Site na 1981 ruo 1983, ọ bụ onye egwuregwu nke Italian 'Roma'
A gụnyere ya na ihe nnọchianya ise na Europe site na akwụkwọ akụkọ Corriere Dello Sport
N'afọ 1969, Onye isi ala Ịtali nyere ya ihe nrite n'onwe ya na nnukwu asọmpi mba ụwa na Avellino
A họpụtara ya ugboro abụọ maka onye na-eme egwuregwu nke 1 nke afọ na Plovdiv
N'afọ 1985, iji sọpụrụ ya, a haziri egwuregwu uru na nke mbụ ya n'etiti ndị otu mba Bulgaria na ndị otu mba na Europe
A mara ya dị ka nwa amaala nsọpụrụ n'obodo Karlovo na 1985 na obodo Plovdiv na 2000
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na ebu ọkụ ọkụ Olimpik maka egwuregwu ahụ na Athens, Gris, na 2004
A gụnyere ya na ndepụta FIBA na 2007 (mba ụwa Basketball Federation ) nke ndị egwuregwu 35 nyere aka n'ịmepụta basketball ụwa na 1950s
Site na arụmọrụ ya n'ọgbọ egwuregwu, na ọnụ ọchị ya, na nkwenye na ndụmọdụ ya, ọ na ahapụ nnukwu akara n'obi ndị na akwado basketball na Bulgaria, Europe, na ụwa
Mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa ogologo oge, ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 69 na Ọgọst 16, 2019
Àkù-ñkịtị nke Pennsylvania bụ nkeji obodo no nà ímé Olìlé ọwụwa na ámá Etítì Atlantic ímé Njikota Obodo nke Amerika
Nà ákùkù yá bụ Delaware na Maryland na nleda ya, West Virginia na nleda odida ya, Ohio na odida ya, New York na Ontario ímé Kanada na nlélé ya, na New Jersey owuwa ya
Ama ukwu nke kárírí ndi mádụ bụ Philadelphia, Pittsburgh, Allentown na Erie
Íshí oche ya bu Harrisburg
A mụrụ Busetto na Durban, South Africa, ma tolite na Cape Town
Ọ kwagara Ịtali mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, bụ́ ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ma lụọ
Ọ laghachiri na Cape Town n'afọ 1996, ebe ya na nwa ya nwoke bi

Ọ ugbu a na-achụso ya doctorate na English na akparamaagwa, na ekwuputala na aha njirimara nke ya mpụta mbụ akwụkwọ, Anna P, bụ ihe sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ Anna O, otu n'ime ndị mbụ na-enweta psychoanalysis
Penny Ford (nke a makwaara dị ka Pennye Ford, amụrụ na June 11, 1964) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu na-ede egwu, ónyé na-egwu ọtụtụ ngwá egwu, na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Cincinnati, Ohio, ọ ghọrọ ónyé a ma ama na 1980s mgbè ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Total Experience Records ma wepụta abọm mbụ ya Pennye
Abọm ahụ wepụtara egwu 'Change Your Wicked Way' na 'Dangerous', nke Ford mepụtara ma dee
Ọ nwetara aha mba ụwa dị ka ónyé na-agụ egwú nke otu Eurodance Snap!

N'ịbụ ndị Michael Münzing na Luca Anzilotti na-achịkwa ma mepụta, otu ahụ wepụtara abọm izizi ha World Power na 1990, nke rere ihe karịrị nde 7 n'ụwa niile ma ghọọ otu n'ime abọm ịgba egwu kachasị mmá ruo ugbu a
Abọm ahụ nwere egwu 'The Power', 'Ooops Up', 'Cult of Snap', na 'Mary Had a Little Boy', nké rere ihe karịrị nde ndekọ itoolu
Snap!'s hiatus hụrụ ntọhapụ nke abọm nke abụọ nke Ford, Penny Ford (1993), nke guzobere ya dị ka onye na-ese egwu n'onwe ya n'ụwa niile ma gosipụta egwu 'Daydreaming' na 'I Lose Control'
Ford bụkwa ónyé otu Klymaxx na Soul II Soul
N'afọ 2006, ọ laghachiri na Snap! wee soro ha gaa njem nlegharị ányà n'ụwa niile
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, Ford ereela ihe karịrị nde iri na isii
A mụrụ Penny Ford na Cincinnati, Ohio, n'aka Carolyn Griffith (née Ford), ónyé na-ezisa ozi ọma, na Gene Redd, Sr, ónyé isi ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ na onye na-emepụta ihe
Nwanne nwanyị Penny nke okenye, Sharon Redd, bụkwa ónyé na-agụ egwu
Ford attended St
Mark Catholic School in Cincinnati, where she enrolled in dance and music classes
In 1979, she snuck into a local club where she landed a job as a background singer for electro-funk group Zapp as part of a Parliament-Funkadelic World Funk Tour at age 14
After graduating from high school at age 16, she traveled to Los Angeles, where she auditioned at a studio for Motown and was given a job as a demo singer

Penny Kissi, nke a makwara dị ka kissy ma ọ bụ kisi penny ma ọ bụ nke a maara dị ka guenze, koli, na kilindi, bụ ego ígwè e mere na Sierra Leone nke a na'ọtụtụ na nso nso ebe mmepụta ya n'etiti Gbandi (Bandi), Gola, Kissi, Kpelle, Loma, Mandinka na Mende na ndị obodo ọzọ nke bụ Liberia, Sierra Leone, na Guinea-Cryonak
Ndị West Afrika si n'ógbè Liberia na Sierra Leone nke oge a ejirila ígwè dị ka ihe ahịa na ụkpụrụ nke uru ruo ogologo oge
Ọrụ ígwè emeela na mpaghara ahụ site na 600 BC ma bụrụ nke dị oke mma
Ọbụna n'oge mmalite nke oge a, ígwè na ígwè nke West Afrika gafere ogo nke ígwè Europe n'ụzọ dị mfe
Otú ọ dị, ụkọ mmanụ dịnụ pụtara na ígwè West Africa dị oke ọnụ ma e jiri ya tụnyere ígwè nke obodo Europe
N'ihi azụmahịa na ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri nke ndị bi n'ógbè ahụ, ọkachasị mkpụrụ ego Kru kissi gbasara n'ụsọ oké osimiri nke West na Central Africa
Ihe ndekọ akụkọ ihe mere eme adịghị arịba ama iji ego a tupu afọ ikpeazụ nke narị afọ nke iri na itoolu (c
1880) na ha nọgidere na-eji dị ka ego ruo mgbe ejiri nwayọọ nwayọọ dochie anya ego colonial, ma dị ka mbubreyo dị ka 1940 na Sierra Leone na ọbụna dị ka mbubreyo ka
1980s na Liberia

Ọbụna mgbe a kwụsịrị iji ha mee ihe dị ka ego, a nọgidere na-eji mkpụrụ ego kissi eme ihe na ọha mmadụ nke mpaghara ahụ, dịka ọmụmaatụ, dị ka akara nke ịmecha ememe na oha mmadu nke Poro na Sande; dị ka akụ na ụba, yana itinye ya n'ili na ili, ebe ha kwenyere na ha ga-eduzi mkpụrụ obi nke ndị nwụrụ anwụ

N'oge ụfọdụ, ego ahụ nwetara akụkụ ime mmụọ, ikekwe n'ihi iji ya eme ihe n'ili, n'ihi ya kwa, mgbe otu penny mebiri emebi, a na-ewere ya dị ka ihe na-abaghị uru ruo mgbe Zoe, ma ọ bụ ọkà mmụta okpukpe, rụziri ya n'ememe pụrụ iche
Ọ bụ ihe a mere ka a na-akpọ ya 'ego nwere mkpụrụ obi'
Penny Siopis (amụrụ n'ubochí isé n'ọnwa Febụwarị 1953) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa si Cape Town
A mụrụ ya na Vryburg na mpaghara North West site n'aka nne na nna ndị Gris bụ ndị kwagara mgbè ha ketara ụlọ achịcha site n'ebe nna nna Siopis nọ
Siopis gụrụ Fine Arts na Mahadum Rhodes dị na Makhanda, mechaa nzere masta ya na 1976, mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị ọ gara akwụkwọ na Portsmouth Polytechnic na United Kingdom
Ọ kụziri Fine Arts na Technikon Natal na Durban site na 1980 rụọ 1983
N'afọ 1984, ọ bịdọrọ ịkụzi ihe na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand na Johannesburg
N'oge a, ọ na-eleta onye nyocha na Mahadum Leeds (1992X93) na nleta Prọfesọ na Fine Arts na Mahadim Umeå na Sweden (2000) dị ka akụkụ nke mgbanwe interinstitutional
Site na Doctorate Honorary site na Mahadum Rhodes, Makhanda São Siopis bụ Prọfesọ Honorary ugbu a na Michaelis School of Fine Art, Mahadum Cape Town
Ọ bịara bụrụ ónyé a ma ama na mmalite afọ 1980 site na ihe osise 'cake' ya, nke na-edepụta ihe márá mmá nke ụmụ nwanyị n'elu ihe osise mmanụ impasto
Ọrụ ndị a sochiri 'ihe osise akụkọ ihe méré eme', nke a kọwara dị ka ụdị nguzogide megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Omume interdisciplinary ya kemgbe nnwere onwé mbà nke mbà ya enyochawo nnọgidesi ike na adịghị ike nke ncheta, echiche nke eziokwu na mgbagwoju anya nke akụkọ ihe méré eme' nke onwé na nke otu

N'inwale ihe na usoro dịgasị iche iche, ọ na-atụgharị uche na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ahụ, iru uju na ihere, nkewa, ịkwaga na nso nso a mmekọrịta dị n'etiti mmadụ na ndị na-abụghị mmadụ n'ime ọnọdụ mgbanwe ihu igwe

Nnyocha ya niile na-ekwusi ike na ihe onwunwe na usoro dị ka ihe a na-apụghị ikewapụ iche na echiche, yana ojiji ya na-ejikarị usoro na-enweghị atụ na nke na-enweghị ohere na-aghọ ihe nnọchianya nke mmasị ya na 'abụ abụ nke adịghị ike'

Griselda Pollock na-ekwu, 'Penny Siopis bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà ole na ole n'ụwa taa nke nwere ike ịkpa ákwà nke akara, mmegharị aka, olu, okwu, chọtara ihe ma see ihe iji jikọta ike obi ọjọọ nke akụkọ ihe méré eme' na eriri dị nro nke adịghị ike mmadụ'

Siopis guzobere onwé ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe kachasị nwee nkà na ihe ịma áká na South Africa na n'èzí, site n'ịrụ ọrụ gafee ihe osise, nrụnye na ihe nkiri, na-ejikọta ihe odide na ihe dị iche iche n'ụzọ na-emetụta ókèala ịdọ áká ná ntị na binaries
'Site na mmalite, àgwà ya n'ihe osise abụwo n'otu ógè nke ógè a na nke na-emegide ógè a na mgbagwoju anya ya na-adịghị asọpụrụ ịdị ọcha nke ihe okike na ihe nkịtị
Siopis bịdọrọ ịrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri na 1994 na ihe nkiri ya Per Kind Permission Fieldwork
Otú ọ dị, na 1997 Siopis chọtara niche ya na ime ihe nkiri site na ọrụ My Lovely Day
Ọ gàrà n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri n'oge niile ọ na-arụ ma na-akọwa vidiyo dị ka montages, cut-and-paste ihe oyiyi na-agagharị ma na-agbasa ka ógè na-aga
Gwakọta ya na ederede na egwu, ihe nkiri na-enye oghere magburu onwé ya màkà akụkọ

Otú ọ dị, a na-ebo ebubo na mmechi ahụ nwere akụkụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ebe ọ bụ na onye bụbu gọvanọ Ayodele Fayose nwe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, onye kwuru na mmechi bụ ihe na-eme ka ntuli aka dị n'ime ụlọ na All Progressives Congress
Ụlọ ahụ na ihe onwunwe ndị ọzọ Fayose nwere bụ nke ụlọ ọrụ Economic and Financial Crimes Commission mechiri
A na-eji ya eme ihe na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na iwu ọ bụ okwu na-ezo aka n'ìgwè ma ọ bụ obodo nke otu agbụrụ, mba, na ọha ma ọ bụ ọha mmadụ nke otu ọchịchị
N'ihi nke a, ọ bụ echiche nke iwu ikike mmadụ, iwu mba ụwa yana iwu iwu, nke a na-eji maka nkwupụta nke ọbụbụeze a ma ama
Isi nke Mbụ, Nkeji edemede nke Otu nke Charter nke United Nations na-ekwu na 'ndị' nwere ikike ikpebi onwe ha

Ọ bụ ezie na ọnọdụ dị ka ndị mmadụ na ikike nke mkpebi onwe onye, dịka ọmụmaatụ n'ihe gbasara ụmụ amaala (ndị, dịka n'etiti ụmụ amaala niile, ọ bụghị naanị ụmụ amaala nile dị ka n'etiti ndị ụmụ amaala), anaghị enye onwe ya na-akpaghị aka maka ọbụbụeze onwe ya ma yabụ nkewa

Ma Roman Republic na Alaeze Ukwu Rom jiri okwu Latin Senatus Populusque Romanus, (Senate na ndị Rom)
A na-eme ka okwu a dị mkpirikpi (SPQR) na ụkpụrụ ndị agha Rom, ọbụnakwa mgbe ndị eze ukwu Rom nwetara ọnọdụ nke onwe ha zuru oke, ha nọgidere na-eji ike ha n'aha Senate na ndị Rom
Okwu a bu People's Republic, nke a na-eji kemgbe oge a, bụ aha steeti na-eji eme ihe, nke na-akọwapụta ụdị ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Na iwu mpụ, na ikike ụfọdụ, a na-eweta ikpe mpụ n'aha ndị mmadụ

Nkwupụta ndị na-abụghị ikike ndị a na-ekwu okwu na-ejikarị aha steeti dochie aha steeti maka okwu 'Ndị mmadụ' na nkọwa ikpe
Steeti anọ Massachusetts, Virginia, Pennsylvania, na Kentucky na-ezo aka n'onwe ha dị ka Commonwealth na nkọwa ikpe na usoro iwu
Steeti ndị ọzọ, dị ka Indiana, na-akpọkarị onwe ha dị ka Steeti na ederede ikpe na usoro iwu
N'èzí United States, a na-ekpe ikpe mpụ na Ireland na Philippines n'aha ndị obodo hana obodo ha dị iche iche

Echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke na-akwado usoro a bụ na a na-eweta ikpe mpụ n'aha onye ọchịchị; ya mere, na steeti US ndị a, a na-ekpe 'ndị mmadụ' ikpe ịbụ onye ọchịchị, ọbụlagodi na United Kingdom na mpaghara ndị ọzọ na-adabere na British Crown, a na'eweta ikpe ikpe mpụ na aha Crown
'Ndị mmadụ' na-akọwa ahụ dum nke ụmụ amaala nke ikike nyere ikike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma ọ bụ gbakọta maka ebumnuche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Peoples Daily bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ di naNigeria
Ewepụtara ya dị ka kwa izu na Nọvemba 2008, ọ ghọrọ kwa ụbọchị na Nọvemba 2009
E weputara Peoples Daily n'usoro n'ememe n'Abuja na Maachị 2010
Onye isi oche nke Board of Directors bụ Malam Wada Abdullahi Maida
Na emume a, Malam Ismaila Isa mere ka o doo anya na, n'agbanyeghị asịrị a na-ekesa, Peoples Daily abụghị nke onye bụbu osote onyeisiala Atiku Abubakar
Kama, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ihe karịrị ndị ọkachamara mgbasa ozi iri anọ
Na Disemba 2009, ndị ọrụ nke State Security Service nwụchiri onye nchịkọta akụkọ akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, Malam Ahmed Shekarau, n'ihi akụkọ banyere ahụike nke President Umaru Yar'Adua na-arịa ọrịa
Shekarau mechara hapụ Peoples Daily banye dịka onye isi njikwa
Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) bu otu n'ime otutu otu ndoro ndoro ochichi no n'ime gomenti Naigeria
Ndi na ruru ukwu na ya
Obu ha meriri na ndoro ndoro ochichi gara aga 2007
Umaru Yar'Adua bu onye nke ha
Ndi People's Democratic Party merikwara na ntuli aka ochichi 1999 na 2003
Pep Williams bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto n'okporo ámá, onye nduzi, onye ọchụnta ego, na onye bụbu ọkachamara skateboarder nke tolitere na South Central Los Angeles, California
Ọ gara ụwa niile na-emepụta ihe maka ihe ngosi foto ya
Ọ bụ otu n'ime naanị ndị na-ese foto ka e nyere ohere ịbanye na California State Prison System ebe o mepụtara usoro ihe osise ndị mkpọrọ akpọrọ, Behind Bars
Williams arụla ọrụ oge ụfọdụ na ụlọ ọrụ egwu na-arụ ọrụ na ngalaba A&R na akara ndị dị ka Death Row Records na Interscope Records
Mgbe e mesịrị ịbanye na foto, nzụlite azụmahịa egwu ya mere ka ọ dị mfe ịgbanwe n'ime onye na-ese foto dị ka ndị na-ese foto dịka; Chris Brown, Nick Cannon, Offset, na Suicidal Tendencies
E bipụtala ya n'ọtụtụ magazin ejiji, egwu, na ndụ dịka W magazine, Thrasher Magazine, Inked Magazine, Breaks, One West, Mass Ink, Urban Ink Magazine, wdg
E gosipụtala ihe oyiyi ya na ụlọ ngosi na Japan, Portugal, Brazil, Germany, na United States ma ọ na-ejikọta ya na òtù ọrụ ebere dị ka The Art of Elysium

Ọgbọ nke atọ Dogtown skater, Williams malitere egwu skatị n'afọ 1975 mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ ma site na ntorobịa ya, ndị California skaters dị mkpa n'oge ahụ metụtara ya dịka; ezigbo ndị enyi Jay Adams, Christian Hosoi, Aaron Murray, Natas Kaupas, Julien Stranger, Eric Dressen, na Kareem Campbell
Williams n'onwe ya gara n'ihu bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka skateboarder n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, na-apụta na mkpuchi 1991 nke Thrasher Magazine, na ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi na ọtụtụ magazin na mgbasa ozi
Pepi Sonuga (amụrụ Stephanie Sonuga, [ihe dị Septemba 8, 1993), bụ onye Naijiria na-American na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ dị ka Lacey Emery na Starz horror-comedy series usoro ihe nkiri ntoọchi dị ụjọ bụ Ash vs Evil Dead (2016) na Tangey Turner na Freeform drama series Famous in Love (2017–2018)
A mụrụ Sonuga site na nna si Yoruba na nne si Igbo nọ na Lagos, Naijiria,wee kwaga Los Angeles, California mgbe ọ dị afọ iri
Na mgbanwe ahụ, Sonuga kwuru, 'O siri ike ime mgbanwe
Amaghị m ọtụtụ ihe banyere America n'ezie, o doro anya na enwere m nnukwu olu ndị
Ọ na-esiri m ike dịka a na-emegbu m
' Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, Sonuga sonyeere n'mmemme ma akpọrọ ya Miss Teen Los Angeles
Ọ malitekwara ịme ihe ngosi maka ụdị dị ka Forever 21, Hot Topic, na Skechers Ọ gara Culver City High School na California
Peppadew bụ aha akara ahịa nke ụlọ ọrụ nri ndị obodo South Afrika Peppadewe International (Pty) Ltd
maka ụdị ose Juanita

Peppadew International na-emepụta ma na-ere ngwaahịa nri dịgasị iche iche n'okpuru akara Peppadews, gụnyere ose jalapeño, ose Goldew, yabasị, sauces ọkụ, nri agworo agwo na nke ana akpo 'relishes', mana a maara ya nke ọma maka ose piquanté na-atọ ụtọ (ụdị Capsicum baccatum) nke a na-akụ na mpaghara Limpopo nke South Africa
E hiwere Peppadew International na akara Peppadewa na 1995 mgbe onye guzobere Johan Steenkamp chọpụtara ose piquanté na-atọ ụtọ na Eastern Cape nke South Africa
Mgbe a chọtara ose ahụ, a na-etinye ikike ndị na-azụ osisi ma nweta ya na Ngalaba Ọrụ Ugbo, Ọhịa na Azụmaahịa South Africa iji chebe ụdị ahụ
Johan Steenkamp malitere ịzụlite na nhazi ose na mpaghara Tzaneen nke South Africa, ebe ụlọ ọrụ Peppadew International ka dị taa
Steenkamp mechara ree mmasị ya na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 2004
Peppadew International bụ ndị mbụ na-ere ụdị ose a
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-akọwa ose mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka ngwakọta n'etiti ose na tomato, nkọwa a abụghị nke ziri ezi, ma na-ezo aka naanị na ọdịdị na agba dị n'etiti osikapa na tomato cherry
[citation needed]
N'afọ 2011, Bon Appetit bipụtara ntụziaka maka Pimento Mac & Cheese na-akpọ Peppadews, mgbe ahụ, ọ ga-agba ọsọ na-esote na-agwa ndị na-agụ ya otu esi achọta ose
N'afọ 2016, akwụkwọ akụkọ Baltimore Sun kọrọ na e nwere ahịa ojii maka mkpụrụ ose
A na-akụ mkpụrụ osisi peppadew n'ime mkpụrụ osisi site na mkpụrụ ahọpụtara aka maka izu isii ruo asatọ
A na-ebufe ha na ndị ọrụ ugbo na-arụ ọrụ nke na-akụ ose n'okpuru nduzi nke ndị ọrụ ugwo nke Peppadew International
A na-ewepụta ose ndị a na-esighị esi ma zigara ha na ụlọ ọrụ nhazi nke Peppadew International ebe a na-ewepụ mkpụrụ ose, na-edozi ya ma na-etinye ya na brine pụrụ iche
[citation needed]
Àtụ Chili peppers
Pepper Sound Studios bụ onye mbụ na-emepụta egwu redio ma malite n'oge ụfọdụ na afọ 1957
Ọ malitere dị ka ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ nke onye ọchụnta ego John Pepper na onye na-ede egwu Floyd Huddleston mepụtara
Huddleston dabeere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na ihe nlereanya nke Capitol Records ma ọbụna kpọbata Johnny Mercer dị ka onye ndụmọdụ
A were ndị na-ede egwu Al Rinker na Willard Robison n'ọrụ, ruo mgbe e mechara wepụ njedebe ndekọ ahụ, na afọ 1964, Pepper Studios ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ Jingle Commercial
Egwú mbụ ha bụ maka ụlọ ọrụ John Pepper Everdry Deodorant, nke Burke Hall Paint na ọtụtụ narị ndị ọzọ sochiri
William Tanner bụ onye na-ere ahịa maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ma rụọ ọrụ ngwa ngwa ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị nwe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, Pepper na Tanner rụkwara Floyd Huddleston
A maara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka Pepper-Tanner n'ihe dị ka afọ 1967
Na afọ 1972, Bill Tanner rụrụ John Pepper n'otu ụzọ ahụ o nwere Huddleston, a gbanwekwara aha ahụ ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ The William B
Tanner Company, ma ọ bụ naanị Tanner maka mkpirikpi
See Na afọ 1982, Media General, onye nwe akwụkwọ akụkọ yana ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn cable, zụrụ ụlọ ọrụ William B
Tanner maka ego
David L
Jordan, osote onye isi oche nke Media General, kwuru na ọ nwere mmasị na Tanner n'ihi nka ya na mpaghara mmemme
Ụfọdụ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ndị nyere Pepper Tanner jingles bụ WPOP, WLIF, WLS, WOLF, WVLK na WPGC
E mechara wepụ ya na afọ 1988 ma TM Studios nwetara ID jingles, syndication reels na ọbá akwụkwọ mmepụta nke Media General Broadcast Services
E mechiri ọrụ mgbasa ozi na Memphis ma tinye egwu nkwado na ọbá akwụkwọ ụda n'ime igbe ma zigara ya na ụlọ ọrụ TM dị na Dallas
A tụfuru ihe ndekọ niile maka ID Jingles na ọbá akwụkwọ mmepụta ahaziri ahazi na mgbasa ozi na Memphis
TM Studios etinyela reels ndị a n'aka Media Preservation Foundation, ọ bụ ezie na TM Studios na-ejigide ikike nwebisiinka

A na-ahọrọ ọbá akwụkwọ mmepụta ma tinye ya n'ọbá akwụkwọ TM Studios dị iche iche ka na-ere ruo taa site na TM na, ruo ọnwụ ya (Jenụwarị 9, na afọ 2013, na Plano, Texas, afọ 63), site na Ben Freedman Productions
Peppersoup bụ ofe sitere n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke West Africa, ọkachasị Naịjirịa nke a na-akwadebe site na iji anụ dị iche iche, ose chili na nọtmegi dị ka isi, ihe
Ọ bụ ofe na-esi ísì ụtọ nke nwere ọdịdị dị mfe, nke mmiri
Aha ahụ bụ aha na-ezighi ezi n'ihi na a kọwaghị ofe ahụ site na profaịlụ ụtọ na-aga n'ihu―nri ahụ dị mgbagwoju anya karịa, ya na nutty, ilu, osisi, na ihe ederede okooko osisi, yana okpomọkụ
Ụfọdụ ndị nọ n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka na-ewere ya dị ka nri dị ụtọ, ụfọdụ ndị West Afrịka kwenyere na ofe ahụ nwere ụfọdụ àgwà ọgwụ
Peppersoup bụ mmiri na-atọ ụtọ, na-atọ ọchị
E nwere ọtụtụ ụdị nri na Western Africa
Enwere ike iji anụ dị iche iche, dị ka azụ, shrimp, eriri afọ, ọdụ ehi, ọkụkọ, egwuregwu, ewu, anụ ehi ma ọ bụ akpụkpọ ehi
A na-akwadebe ya mgbe ụfọdụ site na iji ọtụtụ anụ n'ime ite ahụ
Ihe ndị ọzọ nwere ike ịgụnye tomato, yabasị, yabasik na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, galik, ose na-atọ ụtọ, ginger, cloves, cinnamon na mmiri lime
Fufu, nri e siri esi ma mesịa sie cassava ma ọ bụ tubers ndị ọzọ, na-eji ya eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ, nke na-eme ka ofe sie ike ma na-enyefe ụtọ
Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-enye ya na nri ndị dị ka osikapa ma ọ bụ tubers e siri esi, ma ọ bụ na-enye n'elu ihe ndị a
N'ụsọ oké osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ nke Africa, a na-esikarị ya n'èzí n'ime ite
A na-ewere Peppersoup dị ka nri dị ụtọ n'etiti ndị bi n'osimiri na Western Africa
Ọ bụ ofe a ma ama na Naijiria, na mba ndị ọzọ na-asụ Bekee na Western Africa gụnyere Liberia, Sierra Leone, Gambia na Ghana
Ụfọdụ ndị West Africa kwenyere na ose ose e ji ọkụkọ mee nwere àgwà ọgwụ, a na-ejikwa ya eme ihe iji melite ọnọdụ ahụike nke ndị ọrịa
Ndị nne ọhụrụ na-eri ose mgbe ụfọdụ, n'ihi na ụfọdụ kwenyere na ọ na-enyere ha aka na mmiri ara
A na-aṅụkarị ya mgbe ememe agbamakwụkwọ gasịrị, dị ka ụzọ isi weghachite ahụike
Pepsi Football Academy bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ egwuregwu bọọlụ nke Naijiria
Kashimawo Laloko guzobere Pepsi Football Academy na Nọvemba 1992
N'ịbụ nke dị na Lagos, atụmatụ ahụ nwetara nkwado zuru ezu nke Pepsi na 1994 nke mere ka a na-akpọ ya Pepsi Football Academy kemgbe ahụ
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, ọ mepụtara ma too n'otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ bọọlụ kachasị ewu ewu na Naịjirịa

Taa, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ nwere ihe karịrị ụmụ akwụkwọ pụkụ atọ edebanyere aha n'agbata afọ isii na afọ irí na asatọ ma na-arụ ọrụ n'afọ niile site na ụlọ ọzụzụ ịrị na anọ dị iche iche na ndị nkuzi ịrị ịse na anọ na gburugburu Naịjirịa
Ndị na-agba bọọlụ malitere ọrụ ha na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ gụnyere Mikel John Obi, Sunday Mba, Dominic Chatto, Echiabhi Okodugha, Joseph Akpala, Elderson Echiéjilé, Soga Sambo na Yinka Adedeji
N'afọ 2006, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ guzobere atụmatụ agụmakwụkwọ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, e nyela ndị egwuregwu ịrị na atọ ohere agụmakwụkwọ na England
Atụmatụ echekwa ezumike nka onye ọ bụla - PERIN
Ekele dịrị PER, jikere maka ezumike nka gị mgbe ị na-ebelata ụtụ isi gị
Kedu ihe bụ PER ma ọ bụ a na-akpọkwa PERIN?
The PER, (Perin) Atụmatụ nchekwa ezumike nka onye ọ bụla, mkpụrụ nke iwu nkwekọrịta abanyela n'ike na October 1, 2019
Ọ na-anọchi Perp yana iwu Madelin
Kedu ihe kpatara ị ga-eji wepụta nkwekọrịta nchekwa ego ezumike nka n'otu n'otu?

N'iburu na ezughi oke nke atụmatụ ezumike nka ịkwụ ụgwọ ị na-aga, atụmatụ ichekwa ego ezumike nka n'otu n'otu na-enye ụmụ amaala niile ohere, ma ị bụ ọrụ na-emesapụ aka, tns, onye njikwa ụlọ ọrụ ma ọ bụ onye ọrụ, ịchekwa yana wulite mgbakwunye ego
ma ọ bụ isi ego maka ezumike nka, site na ịkwụ ụgwọ oge nke ị nwere ike iwepụ na ego ị na-atụ ụtụ isi
Site n'otu n'otu na-ebelata ụtụ isi ego gị site na 45%
Kedu ụdị mmepụta nke Per?
Ụdị mmepụta kwa
N'isi obodo n'otu ụzọ, site na otu ịkwụ ụgwọ
Isi obodo na-apụ apụ na nkeji nkeji
Ụzọ ọpụpụ akụkụ na isi obodo ahụ ndị fọdụrụ na ndụ annuity
Annuity ndụ
Percelle Ascott (a mụrụ na 10 June 1993) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye edemede nke Britain na Zimbabwe
Dịka mmadụ atọ, Ascott so Joivan Wade na Dee Kaate rụkọọ ọrụ na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị Mandem on the Wall (2011X2013), usoro E4 Youngers (2013X2014), na ihe nkiri The Weekend (2016)
A mụrụ Ascott na Bulawayo, Zimbabwe ma soro ezinụlọ ya kwaga England mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ ebe ọ tolitere na Penge, South London
O bu ụzọ chọpụta ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu site na mmepụta ụlọ akwụkwọ nke The Jungle Book
Onye nkuzi ihe nkiri Ascott na Woodcote High School nyeere ya aka ịbanye na BRIT School mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
Ọ bụ ebe a ka Ascott zutere onye ya na Mandem on the Wall Joivan Wade
N'afọ 2010, Glen Murphy nke Twist na Pulse bịakwutere Ascott na Wade ka ha mee ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị n'otu n'ime ihe ngosi abụọ ahụ
N'ebe a, ha zutere onye ọzọ Dee Kaate, onye ha na ya mepụtara usoro weebụ Mandem on the Wall
A tụbara mmadụ atọ ahụ na usoro E4 Youngers na Mandem on the Wall ha na-etinye n'akụkọ ahụ
Mandem on the Wall rụzuru na ihe ngosi na Hackney Empire n'afọ 2015
O mere ihe nkiri izizi ya dịka Mike na egwu egwu Beat Girl nke afọ 2013
Mgbe ahụ, o nwere ọrụ nkwado dịka Ben na ihe nkiri X + Y
Ya na Wade na Kaate sonyeere maka The Weekend na mmekọrịta na ntanetị sci-fi Genesis
Ascott pụtara n'afọ 2018 Netflix supernatural usoro The Innocents n'akụkụ Sorcha Groundsell na Guy Pearce
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ pụtara na Doctor Who episode 'The Battle of Ranskoor Av Kolos' na web trilogy Rapman Shiro's Story with Wade
Ascott mere Cleveland na Julian Kostov's The Dare and Jesse na usoro 3 nke usoro ndị uwe ojii Sky Atlantic Tin Star
Ascott nwere ọrụ ihe nkiri na-abịanụ na I Came By, Inner Bull, na Kukeri
Wom ([w̃ɔ̃̀m]), ma ọ bụ Perema, bụ asụsụ Leko nke Nigeria

Àtụ MedalTableTop
Peres Jepchirchir (amụrụ na 27 na onwa Septemba na onwa1993) bụ onye Kenya ọkachamara na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge na onye nwetara ọla edo nke Olympic nke na-asọmpi karịsịa na asọmpi ịgba ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ
Ọ bụ onye nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo na IAAF World Half Marathon Championships na afọ 2016 na onye nwetara ihe nkiri ọla edo ọzọ na asọmpi ahụ na afo 2020
Oge kachasị mma ya maka ọkara marathon nke 1 05 06, nke e debere na 10 na onwa Febụwarị na afọ 2017 na UAE, bụ ihe ndekọ ụwa nke ọkara maraton
Ọ mebiri ihe ndekọ ụwa nke ya na World Athletics Half Marathon Championships na Gdynia, Poland na afọ 2020, na-agafe akara na 1 05 16
Jepchirchir gbara ọsọ mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ma ihe Mary Keitany rụzuru, onye bụ onye mmeri ọkara marathon n'ụwa n'oge ahụ, kpaliri ya

Ọ malitere ịsọ mpi na asọmpi okporo ụzọ n'afọ 2013, malite na mmeri abụọ na 10K na South Africa, mgbe ahụ ọ gafere n'ọkwa nke atọ na Kisumu Marathon na obodo ya Kenya, na-agwụcha anya ahụ na awa 2 47 33
Ọ tụgharịrị gaa na-agba ọsọ na mba na mbido afọ 2014 wee nwee ike iwere ọnọdụ nke abụọ na Faith Kipyegon na asọmpi asọmpi asọmpị mba Kenya
Ndị otu Gianni Demadonna hụrụ nkà ya wee malite inweta akwụkwọ ịkpọ òkù maka asọmpi okporo ụzọ dị elu na Europe
O meriri agbụrụ atọ na-aga n'ihu na France na ngwụcha afọ 2014, merie Le Lion Half Marathon (na ndekọ nke 69 12 nkeji), Marseille-Cassis Classique Internationale, mgbe ahụ Corrida de Houilles
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Janet Kisa na njedebe afọ BOclassic 5K
O mere ihe ngosi kachasị elu ya na 2015 London Marathon, mana o nweghị ike iwulite na ihe ndị ọ rụzuru n'ebe dị mkpirikpi, ebe ọ na-enweghị ike ịmecha ebe zuru ezu
Otú ọ dị, ọ malitere iru n'elu okporo ụzọ na-agba ọsọ na 10K na ọkara marathon n'afọ ahụ

Ihe kacha mma ya nke nkeji 30 55 na Prague Grand Prix bụ nke abụọ kachasị ọsọ n'ụwa niile maka oge ahụ na otu izu mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ nke nkeji 67 17 iji merie Ústí nad Labem Half Marathon oge nke mere ka ọ bụrụ nke asaa na ndepụta kachasị elu n'afọ
Ọ gbachitekwara aha ya na Marseille n'ọnwa Ọktoba
Jepchirchir setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma nke nkeji 66 39 na afọ 2016 Ras Al Khaimah Half Marathon

N'agbanyeghị oge ngwa ngwa, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ nke iri na atọ na ndepụta oge niile, ike dị omimi nke ọsọ ahụ hapụrụ ya na nke anọ n'azụ onye mmeri Cynthia Cherotich Limo ebe ụmụ nwanyị isii gbara ọsọ karịa nkeji 67 (nke mbụ maka egwuregwu ahụ)
Ọrụ a mere ka o nweta ọnọdụ na ndị otu Kenya maka afọ 2016 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships
Ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị ise ahụ butere mmalite nke asọmpi ahụ, na Netsanet Gudeta na Genet Yalew nke Ethiopia na-ese okwu
Ka asọmpi ahụ na-aga n'ihu, a na-ebelata nke a na ndị Kenya atọ nke Jepchirchir, Limo na Mary Wacera Ngugi, nke a mechara mee ka Limo na Jepchir kwụsị ọsọ ọsọ

N'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-enweghị ahụmahụ na ndị a maara nke ọma n'ime otu Kenya, ọ bụ Jepchirchir bụ onye pụtara dị ka onye mmeri ụwa, na-emecha ọsọ ahụ na nkeji 67 31 ma na-eduga ụmụ nwanyị Kenya na aha otu na ikpo okwu na Limo na Ngugi
Ihe ndekọ ọmụmụ bịara na Yangzhou Jianzhen International Half Marathon n'ọnwa Eprel, na ọsọ ya nke 67 21 nkeji
Na afọ 2017 RAK Half Marathon ọ mebiri ihe ndekọ ụwa abụọ
O were sekọnd atọ site na Florence Kiplagat's half marathon record na 65 06 nkeji wee setịpụ 20K world record na 61 40 nkeji
Ọnọdụ ya dị ka onye kachasị mma n'ụwa adịteghị aka, dịka Joyciline Jepkosgei (nke atọ na asọmpi RAK) mebiri ihe ndekọ ụwa ya abụọ n'ọnwa na-esote
Na afọ 2020 Summer Olympics, ọ meriri nrite ọla edo n'oge nke 2 2720, nke Thomas Bach nyere ya
O meriri na afo 2021 New York City Marathon na oge nke 2 22 39, na-aghọ onye mbụ meriri nrite ọla edo Olympic na New York City marathon n'otu afọ ahụ
O meriri na afọ 2022 Boston Marathon na oge nke 2 21 02
Perfect Picture bụ ihe nkiri Ghana nke Shirley Frimpong-Manso mepụtara ma dee na 2009
N'ihe dị ka ndụ zuru oke, ụmụ nwanyị atọ mara mma bụ ndị na-akwagharị iri atọ na-agbalịsi ike ịgbanwe ndụ ha ọbụlagodi mgbe akara aka na-egwu egwuregwu ya na ha

N'alụmdi na nwunye nke yiri ka ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ ghara ibibi site na mmalite, na mmekọrịta ya na onye a na-atụghị anya ya na ịchụso ịhụnanya na-adịghị agwụ agwụ, ndị enyi atọ ga-amụta ihe mmụta siri ike nke ndụ, ihe ịma aka nke alụmdi na nwunye, ọnwụ nke ịdaba n'ịhụnanya na ụgwọ ọrụ nke ndụ
na-achị ọchị nke ukwuu n'ime alụlụ iru uju
Perfect Picture na-enye nghọta mara mma na nke ọchị n'ime ụwa ebe ihe niile zuru oke dịka ndụ gị na nke ndị enyi gị
N'ọnwa Maachị afọ 2013, Lockheed Martin kwupụtara na ọ na-emepụta ezinụlọ nke membranes e ji graphene mee, n'okpuru akara ahịa Perforene
Mmetụta kachasị mma bụ mmiri nnu ewepuru ụtọ nnu dị na ya
Na oghere dị obere dị ka otu nanometer n'obosara, membranes ga-ejide sodium, chlorine na ion ndị ọzọ, ka ha na-enye ohere ka mmiri na-agafe n'ụzọ dị mfe
Atụmanya arụmọrụ (nke metụtara ojiji nke osmosis membranes) gụnyere
Na mgbakwunye na ụlọ ọrụ iwepu nnu dị na mmírí ńnú, Lockheed Martin na-eme atụmatụ ire ụdị Perforene dị iche iche na mpaghara ndị a
A tụghị anya na a ga-ewepụta ngwaahịa ahụ ruo n'afọ 2020
Bruce Sterling kwuru maka Wired, 'ọ bụrụ na ihe a na-arụ ọrụ n'ezie, anyị ga-agbaghara Lockheed Martin maka ihe niile ha mere na ma eleghị anya ọbụna nye ha obí Nobels na McMansion n'ọzara ochie

Peri-peri (/ˌpɪri ˈpɪri/ PIRR-ee-PIRR-e, mgbe mgbe nkewa ma ọ bụ dị ka otu okwu, yana mkpụrụ okwu dị iche iche piri-piri, piripiri ma ọ bụ pili pili) bụ ụdị Capsicum frutescens sitere na malagueta pepper
Ọ bụ ndị nchọpụta Portuguese mepụtara ya na mpaghara ndịda Afrịka Portugal, ọkachasị Mozambique na mpaghara ya na South Africa, wee gbasaa na mpaghara ndị ọzọ Portuguese
Pilipili na Swahili pụtara 'pepper'
Romanizations ndị ọzọ gụnyere pili pili na Democratic Republic of the Congo na peri peri peri na Malawi, sitere na ịkpọpụta okwu ahụ n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke ndị na-asụ Bantu n'Africa
Peri peri bụkwa mkpụrụ okwu a na-eji dị ka okwu mgbazinye na ụfọdụ mba ndị na-asụ Portuguese n'Afrịka, ọkachasị n'obodo Mozambican
A na-ahụkarị mkpụrụ okwu peri-peri na Bekee, dịka ọmụmaatụ na-ezo aka na ụdị chili nke Africa, mana na Portuguese ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na a na-asụ ya piri-piri

Akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu Oxford nke Bekee na-edekọ peri-peri dị ka okwu mba ọzọ nke pụtara 'a very hot sauce made with red chilli peppers', ma nye ya mmalite ikpeazụ dị ka okwu maka 'pepper' (ma eleghị anya n'echiche ụmụ amaala Africa) n'asụsụ Ronga nke ndịda Mozambique, ebe ndị nchọpụta Portuguese mepụtara otu ụdị nke a site na malagueta pepper
Osisi na-adịkarị oke ọhịa ma -eto n'ịdị elu ruo ogugu 45120 cm (1847 in) na akwụkwọ 4 7 cm (1+1⁄23 in) ogologo na 1315 cm (1⁄29⁄16 in) n'obosara
A na-ejikarị mkpụrụ osisi ahụ eme ihe ruo n'ókè dị nro ma na-atụle ihe ruru cm (3⁄41+1⁄4 in) n'ogologo
Agba na-eto eto bụ akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, agba tozuru etozu bụ ọbara ọbara ma ọ bụ purple
Ụfọdụ ụdị chili anya nnụnụ na-atụle ihe ruru 175,000 Scoville heat units

Dị ka ose chili niile, piri piri sitere na osisi ndị si Amerịka, mana ọ na-eto n'ọhịa n'Africa ruo ọtụtụ narị afọ ma na-akụ ya ugbu a maka azụmahịa na MBA Zambia, MBA Uganda, MBA Malawi,MBA Zimbabwe, na MBA Rwanda
Ọ na-eto karịsịa na Malawi, Zambia, South Africa, Ghana, Nigeria, Zimbabwe, Mozambique na Portugal
A na-akụ ya maka nhazi nri azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ
Ịzụ piri piri na-ewe ọrụ siri ike

N'ịbụ nke ndị Portuguese mepụtara na Southern Africa (a ka nwere arụmụka ma ndị Portuguese na-emepụta ya na Angola ma ọ bụ Mozambique), a na-eji peri-peri chilis (nke a na-eme dị ka ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ ma ọ bụ marinade) mee ofe ahụ

E wezụga Portugal na mpaghara ndịda Afrịka (Angola, Namibia, Mozambique na South Africa) ebe a mụrụ ya, a maara ofe ahụ nke ọma na United Kingdom n'ihi ihe ịga nke ọma nke ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ South Africa Nando's
Ntụziaka dịgasị iche site na mpaghara gaa na mpaghara, na mgbe ụfọdụ n'ime otu mpaghara ahụ dabere na ojiji a chọrọ (ihe atụ, isi nri vs
ihe na-atọ ụtọ na tebụl) mana isi ihe bụ chili na galik, nwere mmanụ ma ọ bụ acidic
Ihe ndị ọzọ a na-ahụkarị bụ nnu, mmụọ (ya bụ whisky), citrus peel, yabasị, ose, akwụkwọ bay, paprika, pimiento, basil, oregano na tarragon

Pericoma Okoye
Aha Omumu
Chief Pericoma Mezuo Okoye bu onye egwu Naijiria, onye ode egwu na onye odinaala
Enwekwara ike isupe aha nke mbu ya 'Pericoma' dika 'pericomo' 'Perry-Coma' na Perry-Koma'
A maara ya nkeoma n'ala igbo nile site na udi egwu o na-agu na okwukwe siri ike na omume nke okpukpe odinaala ndi'igbo a na akpo Obeah
Amụrụ Okoye na Naịjirịa, ọkachasị na steeti Imo, mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ndị Igbo bụ Naịjirịa biri
Amuru ya na obodo ana akpo Arondizuogu, obodo ndi nwere ochichi ime obodo ato Ideato North, Okigwe na Onuimo
Okoye bụ Onye isi ala nke obodo Arondizogu dị na steeti Imo ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 2017
E nwere ike ịkọwa ụdị egwu ya nke ọma dị ka 'ịtọpụta omenaala, ilu, yana ọdịnaala ndị Igbo'
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Lion Of Africa n'akụkụ Nollywood, Pete Edochie
Okoye bu onye kwenyesiri ike na onye na-eme okpukpe ọdịnala ndị Igbo, Obeah
Okoye bụ nna nke onye na-ahụ maka ịntanetị na Nigeria na onye na-egwu egwu Speed Darlington
Pericoma Okoye mgbe ọ dị ndụ bu onye amoosu ama ama ma ọ bụ 'onye dibịa' dịka ọ bụ onye egwu dịka ụlọọrụ ntaakụkọ Naịjirịa kọwara, Legit
Aha Otutu ya 'Arusi Makaja' nwekwara ike ịkọwa nke a, dịka 'Arusi' mgbe atụgharịrị ya n'asụsụ Bekee pụtara 'chi' ma ọ bụ 'ibu'
N'oge emume Ikeji e kwuru na ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ihe arụ nke megidere ọtụtụ iwu nke ihe ndi bekee kporo physics
Oke dị mma nke ndị mmadụ si Arondizuogu, obodo ya, kwenyere na ọ bụ obere chi
Otutu ngosipụta nke “ike karịrị nke mmadụ” ma ọ bụ “ịgba afa” dịka a na-akpo ya, na mmeri agbanweghi agbanwe na asọmpi niile, mere ka aha ya bụrụ 'Ọdụm nke Africa'
Okoye bụ onye ama ama na Naịjirịa dịka onye isi ala ọdịnala n'Imo steeti
Ọ bara oke uru ma ruo oru pụtara ìhè na mmepe nke emume Ikeji emere na obodo ya
Emume a nke a na-eme n'onwa nke ano n'afo ọ bụla bụ ebe obodo Naijiria si enweta ego site na mba ofesi, dika ọ na-adọta ndị njem si n'akụkụ ụwa niile
Ubochi iri na isii n'ọnwa nke abuo dị n’afọ 2017, a kọrọ na ọ nwụọla

Perpetua Ijeoma Nkwocha (amụrụ 3 Jenụwarị1976) bụ nwaanyị Naijiria na agba bọl, ma bụrụ koochi nke Clemensnäs IF na Swedish Women's Football Division 2, na mbụ, ọ na-agbara ndi Swedish club Sunnanå SK
Ọ bụkwa onye otu na onye bụbu onye isi otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị na Naịjirịa
Nkwocha na ndi na-anochiri Naijiria n'egwuregwu esonyela na asompi nke CAF (n'afo 2002, 2004, 2006, 2008, 2010, 2012 and 2014), o meriri ise n'ime ha (2002, 2004, 2006, 2010 na 2014)
Na asompi nke umu nwaanyi Afrika n'afo 2004, o nyere goolu Najiria jiri merie Cameroon ma merie asompi ahu

O setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ site na ịtụle ihe mgbaru ọsọ itoolu niile n'oge asọmpi ahụ, wee kpọọ ya onye ọgba bọl kachasị mma nke asọmpi ahụ A họpụtara Nkwocha ka ọ bụrụ onye mmeri nke ụmụ nwanyị Africa na 2004, 2005, 2010 na 2011 site na mkpakọrịta ndi Futbọl na Afrika CAF)
Nkwocha esonyela na FIFA Women's World Cup ( 2003, 2007, 2011 na 2015 ), yana asompi Olympic nke Sydney 2000, Athens 2004, na Beijing 2008
Ọ gbara bọl maka otu klọb Sweden nke bụ Sunnanå SK di na ngalaba otu ( Damallsvenskan) na nke abụọ ( Elitettan) site na 2007 ruo 2014
N'afo 2012, ọ ka na-agba bo na ngalaba nke abụọ di na Sweden
Na-afọ bọl 2015 ka Nkwocha hapụrụ Sunnanå ịbanye na otu obere klọb a na-akpọ Clemensnäs IF dịka onye na-egba bọl na onye koochi
Oge gara aga, ọ kụziri klọb ụmụ nwoke Nigeria wee mesịa gaa Sweden mgbe ọ natara asambodo nwa amaala obodo Swedish
Nkwocha na-agba bọl na Çanakkale Dardanelspor , otu klọb egwuregwu di na Turkey
HụPersis Princess Namuganza (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1984) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na Minista Steeti maka Ala, Ụlọ na Mmepe Obodo (Ala) na Cabinet nke Uganda
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 6 June 2016
Namuganza na-eje ozi n'otu oge ahụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya a họpụtara nke Bukono County na Namutumba District, na 10th Parliament (20162021)
A mụrụ ya na Namutumba District na 5 Ọktoba 1984 n'ezinụlọ Anglican
Mgbe ọ gachara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ógbè ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mount Elgon High School na Mbale, maka asambodo agụmakwụkwọ Uganda ya nke ọ gụsịrị na 1999
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Luweero District, ebe ọ nọdụrụ maka asambodo agụmakwụkwọ Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education na afo puku abụọ na ato
N'afọ 2006, ụlọ ọrụ Makerere Business Institute nyere Namuganza diplọma na Accounting (nke na-esoghị na Mahadum Makerere)
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ banyere Mahadum Kyambogo, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2009 na nzere Bachelor of Social Work and Social Administration
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cavendish Uganda na nzere masta na mmekọrịta mba ụwa
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na 2009 na Anti-Corruption Coalition Uganda, otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị (NGO), ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmemme site na 2009-2010
A kpọfere ya na Pearl of Africa Research and Accountability, otu NGO ọzọ, na-eje ozi dị ka onye ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze na onye nchịkwa site na 2010 ruo 2012
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onyeisi oche Busoga Youth Forum site na 2010-2011
A họpụtara ya dị ka osote Resident District Commissioner (RDC) maka Luweero District, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ site na 2012 ruo 2015
Persis Princess Namuganza bụ nnukwu onye na-akwado arụmụka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, njem, njem, igwu mmiri, ige egwu Gospel, ikiri ihe nkiri, ikiri bọọlụ
Ihe na-amasị ya pụrụ iche gụnyere itinye aka na nhicha gburugburu ebe obibi n'ozuzu ya, Mmetụta Obodo na okwu ụfọdụ dị ka nchekwa, ahụike, ịdị ọcha wdg
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2018, ndị otu 32 nke ndị omeiwu Busoga zutere ma tie vootu ịchụpụ Persis Namuganza, na caucus, maka 'omume na-adịghị mma'

Caucus na-ebo Namuganza ebubo iyi egwu yana ịkpali ndị na-atụ vootu ya imerụ ahụ, imerụ mmadụ ahụ ma mebie Kyabazinga William Gabula Nadiope IV na Onye isi oche Rebecca Kadaga na nzukọ o mere na Ivukula na Namutumba District, n'oge ọkara mbụ nke Machị 2018
Na Mọnde 12 Machị 2018, Daily Monitor kọrọ na Inspector General of Government, Irene Mulyagonja na-enyocha Namugaza, maka enweghị nzere agụmakwụkwọ dị mkpa iji jide ọfịs ọha na eze ọ na-arụ ugbu a
A malitere nyocha ahụ, na-esote onye mkpesa iwu kwadoro, nke otu 'ndị nwere nchegbu' si Busoga, mpaghara obodo ya, tinyere na 7 Machị 2018
Persis William-Mensah (amụrụ na 15 na onwa isii, na afọ 1996) bụ onye Ghana na-eme egwuregwu
O sonyere na asọmpi 4 × 100 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 2019 World Athletics Championships
N'afọ 2019, ọ nọchitekwara anya Ghana na 2019 African Games nke e mere na Rabat, Morocco
O meriri na 100 mita ụmụ nwanyị

Peruth Chemutai (amụrụ na Julaị 10, 1999) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ steeplechase nke Uganda
O meriri ihe nrite ọla edo na 2020 Summer Olympics na Tokyo na asọmpi 3000 mita steeplechase nke ụmụ nwanyị, na-aghọ nwanyị Uganda mbụ meriri ihe nkiri Olympic
N'ịbụ onye si na Bukwo District, ọ malitere ịgba ọsọ na 2013 mgbe ọ gachara District Athletics Championships na Bukwo dị ka onye na-akwado ya
Na 2015 Commonwealth Youth Games na Apia, ọ meriri ọlaọcha na mita 1500 na mita 3000
O mekwara asọmpi na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na 2017 IAAF World Cross Country Championships na Kampala, na-agwụ na 7th ebe
N'afọ 2016, ọ gwụchara n'ọnọdụ nke asaa na ngwụcha nke ihe omume steeplechase nke ụmụ nwanyị 3000 mita na 2016 IAAF World U20 Championships nke emere na Bydgoszcz, Poland
Na 2016 Summer Olympics oge ya nke 9 3103 na okpomọkụ emeghị ka ọ ruọ eru maka nke ikpeazụ
Na 2018 World Junior Championships nke e mere n'etiti ọnwa Julaị, o kwụrụ na ọ nwetara ihe nrite ọlaọcha dị ịrịba ama na 3000m steeplechase
Otu izu mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, na Monaco diamond league, o setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ mba na oge nke 9 0794
N'afọ 2019, o sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị ndị okenye na 2019 IAAF World Cross Country Championships nke emere na Aarhus, Denmark
Ọ mechịrị na nke ise
Na 2020 Tokyo Olympics, Chemutai sonyere na 3000 mita steeplechase
Ọ meriri ndị ọkacha mmasị tupụ agbụrụ dị ka Beatrice Chepkoech na Hyvin Kiyeng Jepkemoi iji mechie na oge nke 9 0145, ndekọ mba, ma merie ọla edo
Chemutai ghọrọ nwanyị Uganda mbụ meriri ihe nrite Olympic na egwuregwu ọ bụla
Tobechukwu Victor Okoh (amụrụ na 5 Disemba na afọ 1989), nke a maara dị ka Peruzzi, bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri

Ọ malitere idekọ egwu mgbe ya na Rodney malice rụkọrọ ọrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ asaaỌ bụ ezie na a na-arụrịta ụka banyere mbinye aka ya na DMW nke Davido n'oge ụfọdụ, Peruzzi bụ onye otu n'ihu nke 30 Billion Gang nke a makwaara dị ka 30BG, otu nke gụnyere ọtụtụ ndị enyi Davido dịka Blacktycoon, Tunegee, B-Red wdg
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe e gosipụtara ya na egwu nke onye akụkọ egwu Naịjirịa bụ 2Baba na egwu a na-akpọ 'Amaka'
Peruzzi malitere ọrụ egwu ya na Golden Boy Records na afọ a 2016, tupu ọ banye na Davido Music World na afo 2018
Peruzzi's afo 2018 single Majesty, off his Heartwork EP featured a video appearance by 2018 Big Brother Naija runner up Cee-c
Tupu ntọhapụ nke Majesty, ọtụtụ ndị na-eji mgbasa ozi ọha na eze na Naịjirịa na-ekwutọ onye na-agụ egwú ahụ bụ ndị kwuru na onye na-agụ egwú ahụ na-enwu naanị na abụ ndị a ma ama
O gosipụtara na egwu Tu-Face 'Amaka'
Perruzzi bụ nwa nwanne nna Davido, Chioma
Sahrawi peseta (Arabic, Spanish) bụ ego nke Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic
E kewara ya na 100 céntimos, n'agbanyeghị na e depụtabeghị mkpụrụ ego nwere ụlọ ọrụ a, ebipụtabeghịkwa akwụkwọ ego
E mepụtara pesetas Sahrawi mbụ n'afọ 1990, mana a nabataghị ha dị ka mkpụrụ ego mba nke Western Sahara ruo n'afọ 1997

Dị ka ókèala a na-achịkwa Morocco, ego a na-ekesa n'akụkụ ahụ nke mba ahụ bụ Moroccan dirham, na dinars Algeria na ouguiyas Mauritanian na-agbasa n'akụkụ Sahrawi peseta na ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ Sahrawi na akụkụ SADR na-achị
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụghị ego gọọmentị ma ọ bụghị na-agbasa, ọnụego mgbanwe abụghị ihe ezi uche dị na ya
N'agbanyeghị nke a, a na-ejikọta peseta Sahrawi na peseta Spanish, mgbe e wepụrụ nke ikpeazụ maka euro, ọnụego ahụ ghọrọ € 1 maka 166386 Pts
A na-ewere mkpụrụ ego na-abụghị nke ncheta maka mgbasa
A na-eme ha site na cupronickel
Nzukọ ndị a bụ 1, 2, 5, 10, 50, 100, 200 na 500 peseta
E nweela ihe ncheta na ọla kọpa, ọlaọcha na ọlaedo, dịka ụfọdụ n'ime ndị egosiri ebe a
Àtụ Notelist
Petate [peˈtate] bụ ihe ndina a na-eji eme ihe na Central America na Mexico
Aha ya sitere na okwu Náhuatl petlatl
A na-akpa petate site na eriri nke nkwụ nke petate (Leucothrinax morrisii)
Royal Spanish Academy na-akọwa ya dị ka àkwà
N'ozuzu, a na-akpa petates ndị mere eme ìhè nke dị ka ndị ọzọ n'ụdị quadrangular, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị na nha ọ bụla
Isi ihe eji eme ihe bụ maka ihi ụra
Enwere ike ịgbatị ya n'ala maka nsogbụ ụra akpa ndị mmadụ n'ihe dị ka idina ala ma ọ bụ ihi ụra
N'ehihie, petate na-agbanye ma na-akwụnye na mgbidi, na-eme ka ohere dị n'ime ụlọ ahụ
N'ebe ndị na-ekpo ọkụ, a na-eji ya na-ehi ụra n'èzí
A na-ejikwa ya eme ka mkpụrụ, ọka, tortillas, na ihe oriri ndị ọzọ kpọọ nkụ n'anyanwụ, iji gbochie ha imetụ na ụdị nke ụra ihe dị ka ala aka
Ihe ndị ọzọ e ji eriri nkwụ mee bụ ndị a maara dị ka 'artesanias de petate' (ọrụ nkwarụ e ji eriri nke nkwụ mee) gụnyere ihe egwuregwu, ụmụ bebi, ihe nkpuchi, okpu, na nkata
Ụdị dị iche iche na ojiji nke petate emeela ka ọtụtụ okwu Spanish mara mma
Àtụ Bedding
Chief Pete Edochie, MON (amụrụ ya n' ụbọchị asaa n'ime ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1947) bụ nwa afọ Igbo onye Naịjirịa na-eme ihe nkiri

A na-ele Edochie anya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na - eme ihe nkiri mara mma nke Afrịka, na - asọpụrụ ebe enye goro ya Industry Merit Award nke Afrịka Magic na Lifetime Achievement site n'aka Afrịka Film Academy Ọ bụ ezie na nwa amadi bụ onye nchịkwa na onye mgbasa ozi no oge gara aga, Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na 1980s mgbe Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Okonkwo na mmegharị akwụkwọ Chinua Achebe nke bụ akụkọ nkahasị mma oge niile akpọrọ Things Fall Apart
Edochie bụkwa onye Katọlik
N'afọ 2003, Onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo kwanyeere ya ugwu dị ka onye otu Order of the Niger
Ọ banyere ịgbasa ozi na igbe okwu redio na 1967 mgbe Ọ dị afọ iri abụọ dị ka onye nọ na obere ọkwa na akụkụ akpọrọ programmers
Emesiri bulie ya elu n'ọkwa nke Onye isi ngalaba ahụ
Agbanyeghị na ọ bụ onye isi na ngalaba programmes, ọ na arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnochite anya onye isi njikwa kachasị ma ọ bu onye osote ya
Ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ na ABS n'ihi na gọọmentị oge ahụ kpebiri iwebata ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ụlọ ọrụ FM, n'ihi nke a agwara ndị ọrụ njikwa niile ka ha pụọ, tinyere ya
Ọ bu Edochie kwesiri ịbụ onye ga-anọchi onye isi njikwa kachasị ozugbo mana ọ hapụ ọrụ ahụ ma sonye n'ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri
Tupu mgbe ahụ, O sonye na ngosipụta nke Things Fall Apart ma nwee mmeri na nturu ugo nke mba uwa niile
N’ọnwa Septemba afọ 2017, Edochie kwadoro Wikimedia na Naịjirịa site na nsonye ime ihe nyonyo vidiyo iji mee ka amata maka uru dị na Wikipedia n’etiti ndị agadi

N'afọ 2005, ndị nchikota ndị ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa akpọrọ Actors Guild of Nigeria debere Pete Edochie na ọtụtụ ndị omee ihe nkiri, gụnyere Genevieve Nnaji, Omotola Jalade Ekeinde, Nkem Owoh, Ramsey Noah, Stella Damasus Aboderin, na Richard Mofe Damijo na mmachibido iwu otu afọ n'ihi maka ekwuru na ha na-anakọta nnukwu ego site n’aka ndị na - emepụta ihe nkiri maka ọkwa ha dị ka ndị ama ama nnukwu na ihe nkiri
N'oge ahụ iwu a machibidoro ndịa na - eme ihe nkiri dịka mbibi na ọrụ fim ndị Naịjirịa, mana ugbu a, ndịa alọghachitela azụ na ọrụ ha
N’afọ 2009, a tọọrọ Edochie ma mesịa hapụ ya n’aka ndị jide ya n’enweghị nsogbu maọbu mmerụ ahụ ọ bụla
Prọfesọ Peter Bridgewater (amụrụ ya na 31 Disemba 1945) bụ onye Australia na-echekwa ihe
Bridgewater gụsịrị nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na botany na Mahadum Durham n'afọ 1967
Ọ nọgidere na-emecha nzere doctorate n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

Bridgewater bụ onye isi mmụta sayensị nke UK Nature Conservancy Council 1989-1990 na onye isi nchịkwa nke Australian Nature Conservation Agency na onye nduzi nke National Parks and Wildlife Service (1990-1997)
Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke UNESCO's Man and the Biosphere Programme na onye nduzi nke ngalaba ya nke sayensị gburugburu ebe obibi afọ 1999 ya n'afọ 2003
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke International Whaling Commission site n'afọ 1995 ruo 1997
Site n'afọ 2011 ruo afọ 2014 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ nleta na Mahadum United Nations na Japan
Peter Buchanan (amụrụ n'afọ 1942, na Malawi) bụ ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, onye na-eme atụmatụ obodo, ónyé edemede, ónyé nkatọ, ónyé nkuzi na onye na-ahụ màkà ihe ngosi
A maara ya nke ọma màkà usoro edemede ya dị oke egwu màkà The Big Rethink nke The Architectural Review bipụtara na màkà akwụkwọ ya gbasara ihe owuwu

Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Zimbabwe, Buchanan gụrụ ihe owuwu na Mahadum Cape Town, mgbè ọ gụsịrị akara ugo mmụta ya na 1968 ya na ndị na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Cape Town rụkọtara ọrụ, nke mbụ ya na Gabriel Fagan wee ruo 1971 ya na Revel Fox
N'ikpeazụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na ónyé na-emepụta Ọbọdọ na Africa, Europe na Middle East
N'afọ 1979, Buchanan malitere ịrụ ọrụ na The Architect's Journal na The Architecteural Review, na 1982 ghọrọ osote ónyé nchịkọta akụkọ The Architectural Review
Kemgbe afọ 1992 ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nweere onwe ya
Buchanan haziri ihe ngosi na-agagharị agagharị Renzo Piano Building Workshop Selected Projects and Ten Shades of Green màkà Architectural League of New York
Akwụkwọ ya gụnyere ọrụ sitere na ihe ngosi ndị a mpịakọta ise nke Renzo Piano Building Workshop Complete Works na Ten Shades of Green
Buchanan arụwokwa ọrụ dị ka ónyé ndụmọdụ na ọrụ ime obodo na mbipụta
'The Big Rethink' Usoro nke The Architectural Review (AR)
Akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ e bipụtara n'oge na-adịbeghị ányá

Peter Cartwright (30 Ọgọstụ 1935 - 18 Nọvemba 2013) bụ onye South Africa a mụrụ na Britain na-eme ihe nkiri nke mere ọtụtụ narị ihe nkiri na telivishọn, ihe nkiri na redio ma rụọ ọrụ nke ukwuu na ihe nkiri, ma na mpaghara na West End nke London
A mụrụ Cartwright na Krugersdorp, Gauteng, South Africa, ma gụọ akwụkwọ na St
Andrew's College na Grahamstown
Ọ bịarutere Britain na 1959 wee gụọ akwụkwọ na RADA
A maara ya nke ọma na South Africa maka usoro mgbasa ozi telivishọn nke ọ bụ ihu Charles Glass, onye guzobere South African Breweries na onye na-emepụta mmanya nke na-emepụta Castle Lager
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa n'ụlọ ya na London na 18 Nọvemba 2013, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na asatọ
Softly, Softly Taskforce, Z-Cars, Rumpole of the Bailey, Danger UXB, Yes Prime Minister, Casualty, Shackleton, Longitude, The Vicar of Dibley, Doctor Who
Ọ pụtara n'ihe ngosi Britain Emmerdale na-eme dika George Postlethwaite bishọp akụkọ ifo nke Skipdale
Na Harry Potter na Order of the Phoenix, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye dibịa afa, Elphias Doge, akụkụ nke Order of the phoenix, na-eduga Harry na Grimmauld Place
Sleuth (Fortune Theatre, West End), Habeas Corpus (Theatre Royal, Windsor), Don Carlos (Royal Exchange, Manchester),
Peter Clarke (2 Jụn 1929 na Simon's Town, South Afrịka - 13 Eprel 2014 na Ocean View, Cape Town) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Afrika na-arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi
Ọ bụkwa onye edemede na onye na-ede uri
A mụrụ Clarke na Simon's Town dị nso na Cape Town, na 1929
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya sitere n'obodo nta ahụ dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri ebe ọ biri ruo 1972, mgbe a manyere ya ịkwaga Ocean View n'okpuru Group Areas Act

Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 1944 ma bụrụ onye ọrụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ruo 1956 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na asaa, n'oge ezumike ọnwa atọ na Tesselaarsdal, obere obodo ugbo dị nso na Caledon na South West Cape, ọ malitere ọrụ nka ya
Site n'enyemaka nke enyi ya, onye na-ede uri James Matthews, Clarke mere ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke akwụkwọ akụkọ The Golden City Post na 1957
O kwuru, sị, 'Tupu ngosi m, abụ m naanị nwoke ọzọ nwere agba
Ndị anyị weere ya dị ka ihe efu na ọ bụ naanị ndị ọcha nwere ike ime ihe ndị dị otú ahụ
Ugbu a, ha na-amata eziokwu ahụ bụ na anyị nwekwara ike ime ihe ndị a; na anyị bụ mmadụ [Nke a kwuru chọrọ ntụnye]
A maara Clarke nke ọma maka ihe osise ya, ọkachasị osisi ya, na afọ ndị sochirinụ, ọ kwagara na collage
Ọ na-ejikwa akpụkpọ anụ, iko, ihe achọtara na mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ agwakọta
Ọrụ nka ya karịrị iri afọ isii ma mepụta ọtụtụ ọrụ ma pụta n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi
N'ịbụ onye a kọwara dị ka 'onye na-ede akụkọ ihe mere eme dị jụụ', ọrụ ya na-enye nkatọ nke akụkọ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Afrịka karịa afọ iri isii
O nwetara ihe nrite mba isii na mba isii maka nka ya na edemede ya, ma nwee ihe karịrị ihe ngosi iri asaa kemgbe 1957 na South Afrịka, Naijiria, Kenya, Australia, USA, Norway, Israel, Austria na UK
O nwekwara ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu na South Afrịka, Yugoslavia, Germany, Brazil, Austria, Italy, USA, Argentina, Norway, Botswana, Japan, Switzerland na France
N'afọ 2005, onye isi ala Thabo Mbeki nyere ya Order of Ikhamanga (Silver), ma nata onyinye Lifetime Achievement Award n'afọ 2010
Ihe ngosi ya nke afọ 2011 bụ Listening To Distant Thunder
Nnukwu ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya, Wind Blowing on the Cape Flats, mere na London n'afọ 2013

N'ime nsọpụrụ Clarke natara bụ onyinye mba ụwa iri abụọ na asaa na edemede na nka (Ịtali, USA na Taiwan), gụnyere Honorary Life Membership of the Museum of African American Art, Los Angeles (1984); onyinye isii nke South Afrịka maka edemede na nka, gụnyere atọ kemgbe 2000 - ọkachasị Order of Ikhamanga, klas ọlaọcha (2005); na Molteno Award (2000) maka ọrụ na nka ọhụụ, site na Cape Tercentenary Foundation
Ọrụ Clarke dị na nchịkọta ndị na-esonụ nke A
Arnold Becher Museum, SA; Baerum Kommune, Sandvika, Norway; Caledon Museum, Caledon, SA; Cape Town City Library, SA; Community Arts Project, SA; Dennis W

Koles, Kiama, NSW, Australia; District Six Museum, CT, SA; Durban Art Museum, SA; Fisk University, Nashville, Tennessee, US; Fuba Collection, Johannesburg, SA; Hymie and Jean Berndt, Kenilworth, SA; Johnson Publishing Co, Chicago, US; King George VI Art Gallery, PE, SA; Kunsthalle Museen der Stadt Bielefeld, Germany; Library of Congress, Washington DC, US; Livingstone High School, Claremont, SA; Municipal Collection, Fish Hoek, SA; Municipal Museum, Simon's Town, SA; Museum of African American Art, LA, US; Museum of Contemporary Art, Skopje, Yugoslavia; Natal Technikon, Durban, SA; National Museum and Art Gallery, Gaborone, Botswana, PAM; Nasou Publishing Co,, CT, SA; National Art Gallery, Gaborone, Botswana, Pentech, Bellville, SA; Pretoria Art Museum, Pretoria, SA; SA Fine Worsted Co, CT, SA; Sasol Collection, Stellenbosch, SA; Stichting Afrika Museum, Berg en Dal, Holland; South African National Gallery; University of Fort Hare, Alice, SA; University of the North-West, SA; University of Stellenbosch, SA; University of the Western Cape, SA; University of Zululand, SA; William Humphreys Art Gallery, Kimberley, Sand the B; Bruce Campbell Smith Collection
N'afọ 2016, a kpọrọ Peter Clarke Art Centre, nke a na-akpọ Frank Joubert Art Centre, aha ya
Peter Dubé bụ odee sị Canada, onye bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ, akụkọ mkpirikpi na edemede ndị ọzọ
O sitere na Montreal, ọ nwetara nzere MA site na Concordia University's Creative Writing Program
N'igbakwunye n'ọrụ nke o bipụtara, Dubé edepụtakwala ọtụtụ akwụkwọ edemede nke akwụkwọ nwoke na nwoke
E depụtara nchịkọta uri ya nke afọ 2020 The Headless Man maka ReLit Award maka uri na 2021
Peter Eastman (amụrụ n'afọ 1976) bụ Ónyé na-ese ihe nà South Africa bị nà Cape Town
A mụrụ Eastman n'afọ 1976 ọ mà too nà South Africa
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eweghachi ihe ochie na London, United Kingdom
Ọ gakwara ụlọ akwụkwọ Michaelis nke dị na Mahadum Cape Town
N'afọ 2014, ọ bịdọrọ ilekwasị anya na ihe osise nke ihe osise ọhịa na ikuku
A makwaara Eastman màkà ụdị monochromatic pụrụ iche

Ihe oyiyi ndị e debere n'ihe ngosi ndị na-adịghị omimi na-anọgide na-abụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụ anya ruo mgbè ónyé na-ekiri ya nọ n'ọnọdụ ziri ezi maka ìhè iji tụba ihe oyiyi ahụ n'ime relief, na-egosipụta ụda na agba na-agbanwe agbanwe
O yikarịrị ka e ji usoro a mee ihe nke ọma n'ihe osise ya bụ ŌHorse, n'afọ 2005
N'afọ 2007, Eastman gosipụtara 'Supernature' na gallery whatiftheworld nke Cape Town
Usoro íhé osise enamel na acrylic dị na mpempe aluminum, gosipụtara íhé osise nke ụdị nnụnụ dị iche iche metụtara isiokwu nke nkwenkwe ụgha na ihu ọma
N'afọ 2010, Eastman gosipụtara usoro foto ojii na Primo Marella gallery na Milan, Ịtali, nkè Yacouba Konaté haziri
A họpụtara Eastman n'akụkụ ndị omenkà mbà ụwa iri na asaá iji mepụta ihe ngosi màkà 2010 FIFA World Cup na South Africa
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, a na-ere ọrụ ahụ na Phillips de Pury na New York City
