Chief Peter Fatomilola (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 16, 1946) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme fim, onye na-ede uri na onye na-ede egwuregwu
A mụrụ Fatomilola na 16 Jenụwarị 1946 n'obodo Ifisin-Ekiti na mpaghara Ido-Osi nke Ekiti State, Nigeria, nye Chief Abraham Ojo Fatomilole na Mrs
Elizabeth Fatomilola Ọ bụ nwa nke onye ịsị nchụaja nke Ifa, nke a maara dị ka Oluwo (Olu-awo, nke pụtara Onyenwe nke oracle), nke e kwenyere na ọ metụtara ọrụ ya na fim Naijiria
Nne ya si n'obodo Isare-Oge na Kwara Steeti
N'afọ 1967, ọ sonyeere otu ihe nkiri Olokun n'okpuru nkuzi nke Prọfesọ Ola Rotimi nwụrụ anwụ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama na onye na-ede ihe nkiri na Mahadum Ife, ugbu a Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo
Ọ bụkwa onye otu agụmakwụkwọ nke Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo, ebe ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Theatre Arts na 1978
Ọ bụ Papa Ajasco mbụ, onye isi na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke Wale Adenuga mepụtara
O gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naijiria ama ama dị ka Sango, ihe nkiri Afrịka nke Obafemi Lasode mepụtara, nke Wale Ogunyemi dere na 1997
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ onye ụkọchukwu n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Yoruba
Ọ lụrụ ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị nke gụnyere otu onye na-ere ihe ọṅụṅụ na ahịhịa ọgwụ (Iya Fat) n'ahịa na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo
O nwere ụmụ iri na otu
Na mgbakwunye, o nwere ọtụtụ echichi ndị isi gburugburu ala Yoruba nke gụnyere Oluwo n'obodo ya nke Ifisin-Ekiti na Amuludun na Ile-Ife
Peter John Henry Elliott (14 June 1930 - Disemba 2016) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Britain, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-agba egwu, onye a na-eme ihe ngosi na onye na-egosi na 5elivishọn
Elliott anọwo na-egwu mmiri kemgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ na ọdọ mmiri Marshall Street mgbe Sid Dalton, onye nkuzi Olympic bịakwutere ya
Ọ zụrụ nke ọma ma nọchite anya Britain na egwuregwu Olympic nke 1948 na 1952, na London, England
Elliott mechara bụrụ onye na-agụ egwu pop ma bụrụ onye na-agụ egwu ballad na ATV's Oh Boy!
O dere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na-aga nke ọma, abụọ n'ime ha enwetala ihe nrite na Cannes Film Festivals
Peter Magubane (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ1932) bụ onye na-ese foto na South Africa
A mụrụ Peter Sexford Magubane na Vrededorp, ugbu a Pageview, mpaghara Johannesburg, ma too na Sophiatown
Ọ bịdọrọ iji igwefoto Kodak Brownie dị ka nwa akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1954, ọ gụrụ otu Drum, magazin a maara n'ihe banyere akụkọ ya màkà ndị isi ojii bi n'obodo ukwu na mmetụta nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
'Ha na-emeso nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke metụtara ndị isi ojii na South Africa
Achọrọ m ịbụ akụkụ nke magazin ahụ'
Ọ bịdọrọ ọrụ na Drum dị ka onye ọkwọ ụgbọala
Ógè ọnwa isii nke ọrụ na-adịghị mma gasịrị, e nyere ya ọrụ foto n'okpuru nduzi nke Jürgen Schadeberg, onye isi na-ese foto
Ọ gbaziri igwefoto wee kpuchie mgbakọ ANC nke afọ 1955
'M laghachiri n'ọfịs na nsonaazụ dị mma ma eleghị anya azụ'
Ịnọ n'ọrụ n'afọ ndị izizi adịghị mfe, dịka ọ chetara 'A naghị ekwe ka anyị buru igwefoto n'èzí ma ọ bụrụ na ndị uwe ojii etinye aka, yabụ m na-ezochi igwefoto m ógè niile iji nweta foto m chọrọ
N'oge ụfọdụ, m zoro igwefoto m n'ime Bible nwere oghere, na-agbapụ na eriri na akpa m

N'oge ọzọ, n'oge ikpe na Zeerust nke a machibidoro ndị nta akụkọ iwu, zoro m Leica 3G m n'ime achịcha oghere ma mee ka m na-eri nri mgbe m na-ese foto n'ezie; ógè achịcha ahụ dara, zụrụ m mmiri ara ehi wee zoo igwefoto ahụ na katọn
M wee gbapụ na ya
Ị ga-eche echiche ngwa ngwa ma dịrị ọsọ iji dịrị ndụ n'ụbọchị ndị ahụ'
Magubane sere foto ọtụtụ n'ime oge akụkọ ihe mere eme nke South Africa, dị ka Sharpeville n'afọ 1960 nakwa ikpe Rivonia nke Mandela n'afọ 1964
O mechara cheta, sị 'Ahụtụbeghị m ọtụtụ ndị nwụrụ anwụ'
Onye nchịkọta akụkọ ya chọrọ ịmara ihe mere na o jighị foto ọ bụla mee ihe
Magubane wee 'kpebie na agaghị m etinye aka na mmetụta uche, ma ọ bụ ma ọ dịkarịa ala ọ gaghị etinye aka ruo ógè m mechara ọrụ m'
Ọ hapụrụ Drum ka ọ bụrụ onye na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya
N'afọ 1967, Rand Daily Mail were ya n'ọrụ
N'afọ 1969, e zigara ya ka ọ see foto ngagharị iwe n'èzí ụlọ mkpọrọ Winnie Mandela
E jidere ya, gbaa ya ajụjụ ọnụ ma tinye ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ naanị ya
E wepụrụ ebubo ndị ahụ n'afọ 1970
Otú ọ dị, a machibidoro Magubane ise foto ruo afọ ise
N'afọ 1971, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ọzọ ma nọrọ ụbọchị iri itoolu na asatọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ naanị ya wee nọrọ ọnwa isii n'ụlọ ikpe
Ógè a tọhapụrụ ya, e kenyere Mu bat ka ọ kpuchie ọgba aghara Soweto nke mere site n'ọnwa Juun ruo ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1976
E jidere ya, tie ya ihe ma gbajie imi ya
N'ikpeazụ, a tọhapụrụ ya na ngwụcha afọ 1976
Usoro foto ndị o weere mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama na mba ụwa
N'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1977, ọ ga-emeri ihe nrite dị mma na akụkọ, nke Stellenbosch Farmers' Winery kwadoro ma Walter Cronkite gosipụtara
Magubane akwụsịla ịrụ ọrụ na foto journalism ma ugbu a na-elekwasị anya na foto nka
Ọ na-edekọ ụzọ agbụrụ ndị dị ndụ na South Africa mgbe ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị na agba
E bipụtara foto ndị a n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ African Heritage Series

Peter Maker Manyang (amụrụ ya na 1 Jenụwarị na afọ 1994), nke a maara dị ka Peter Maker, bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na mba South Sudan nke na-agba dịka onye na-eme egwuregwu n'etiti maka klọb Zambia Super League ZESCO United FC
na onye isi ndị otu mba South Sudan
Mahadum nke Oxford
Mahadum nke Lagos Steeti
Ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa Lagos
Nigerian Law School
Peter Ndubuisi Mbah // (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ na 17 Machị 1972) bụ onye ọka iwu ụgbọ mmiri Naijiria, onye nyocha ego, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ Onye nchoputa na onye isi nchịkwa nke Pinnacle Oil and Gas Ltd
Mbah bụ nwa afọ Owo na Nkanu East Local Government Area (LGA) nke Enugu steeti, Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye otu Certified Institute of Public Administration and Management (CIPM), onye otu Nigerian Institute of International Affairs na Nigerian Bar Association
A mụrụ Peter Mbah na Enugu n'ezinụlọ Chief Gilbert Ekete Mbah si Ashishi Owo, Nkanu East LGA nke Enugu State
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụaka ndị agha, Bori Camp, Portharcourt na Owode High School, Owode Egba Ogun State
Mbah gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu na Mahadum nke East London, UK, nweta nzere bachelọ nke iwu n'afọ 2000
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu Naịjirịa ma kpọọ ya ka ọ gaa n'ụlọ ikpe Naịjirị
O nwere nzere masta na Iwu Maritime na azụmahịa nke Mahadum Lagos State nyere ya n'afọ 2004
Mbah nwere MBA site na Ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa IESE, Mahadum Navarra, Barcelona Spain, na Post Graduate Diploma na Strategy na Innovation na Ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa Saïd, Jami'ar Oxford
E nyere ya nzere doctorate na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site Mahadum Godfrey Okoye, Enugu, n'afọ 2021
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Dr
Peter Mbah sonyere na National Youth Service Corps na ụlọ ọrụ iwu Udeh na Associates na Lagos
Dị ka onye ọchụnta ego, o guzobere Peter Mbah Investments Limited na 1992, onye na-enye ọrụ na ngalaba mmanụ na gas
Ọ bụ onye guzobere GILPEL Industries Ltd, onye na-ebubata ngwongwo n'ozuzu n'etiti afọ 1993 na 1997, ma guzobe FOCUS International Schools na steeti Lagos
Mbah bụ naanị onye nnọchi anya International Oil Corporation, ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ na gas nke USA nke dị na Fresno, California
Ọ bụ onye guzobere / CEO nke Pinnacle Oil and Gas Ltd
Ntọala a rụzuru mmepe nke Single Point Monitoring (SPM), Conventional Buoy Mooring (CBM) na ebe nchekwa na Lekki Free Trade Zone na 2021
A họpụtara Dr
Mbah ka ọ bụrụ Chief of Staff na 2003 ma mesịa bụrụ Kọmishọna maka mmepe Ego na Akụ na ụba site n'aka Gọvanọ, Chimaroke Nnamani
Ọ bụ onye otu Federal Accounts Allocation Committee, Executive Council nke Enugu Steeti yana onye otu State Security Council
Ọ bụ onye otu Peoples Democratic Party (PDP)

Na ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na ise Mee, n'afo 2022, Peter Mbah pụtara dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke steeti Enugu nke Peoples Democratic Party n'ihu ntuli aka nke Naịjirịa n'afọ 2023, na-esote ntuli aka mbụ e mere na Nnamdi Azikiwe Stadium, Enugu, na ngụkọta nke votu 790 n'ime 807 nke ndị nnọchiteanya nyere
Dr Peter Mbah bụ Gọvanọ Enugu steeti a họpụtara na-esote ntuli aka gọvanọ nke 2023 nke e mere na ụbọchị nke iri na asatọ Machị n'afọ 2023

Peter Mbah bụ onye guzobere Peter Mbah Foundation (PMF), otu na-abụghị maka uru na nke na-abụghị nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke na-achọ imeziwanye ọnọdụ ibi ndụ n'ime ime obodo na mmepe nke isi obodo mmadụ
Peter Mbah lụrụ Nkechinyere Mbah, ha nwere ụmụ anọ

'Peter Mensah (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 27 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1959) bụ onye Ghana na-England na-eme ihe nkiri, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Tears of the Sun, Hidalgo, 300, na usoro telivishọn dịka Starz Spartacus Blood and Sand, Spartacus Gods of the Arena, na Spartacus Vengeance
A mụrụ Mensah na Chiraa, Ghana, ma si n'ezinụlọ agụmakwụkwọ

A mụrụ ya nye nne na nna ya sitere na mpaghara Brong Ahafo, wee kwaga Hertfordshire, England, ya na nna ya, Peter Osei Mensah, onye injinia, nne ya, onye edemede, na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ tọrọ ya mgbe ọ dị obere
Mensah malitere ịme nka ọgụ mgbe ọ dị afọ isii
Ọ na-esokwa na obere ihe nkiri The Seed, nke DJ Joe Hahn nke Linkin Park mepụtara ma duzie
Ọ pụtara na telivishọn na Star Trek Enterprise, Tracker, Witchblade, Blue Murder, Relic Hunter, Earth Final Conflict, Highlander The Raven, na La Femme Nikita
Ọ bụ onye otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke usoro A&E Network A Nero Wolfe Mystery na Terminator The Sarah Connor Chronicles
O mere olu na ọdịdị nke Sgt
Zach Hammond na egwuregwu vidio EA Dead Space
Mensah mere Oenomaus na Spartacus ma nọrọ na Spartacus Panel na Comic Con afọ 2009 na 2011
O nwere ọrụ ugboro ugboro na oge nke ise nke True Blood
Ọ bụ olu Predaking, onye ndu yiri dragọn nke Predacons na Transformers Prime
Peter King Nzioki Mwania (a mụrụ na 25 Mee 1978), nke a maara dịka Peter King, bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri The Constant Gardener, The Fifth Estate na Sense8
A mụrụ Nzioki na 25 Mee 1978 na Nairobi, Kenya
Nna ya Michael David Mwania, jere ozi na ndị agha Kenya na nne ya na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ndị agha
Mgbe ọ dị afọ isii, ọ sonyeere mmepụta ụlọ ụka na Lang'ata Barracks
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Lang'ata High School na Nairobi
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ibe ya bụ Tess King
O mere ihe nkiri izizi n'wfọ 2000 na Kenya National Theatre ruo afọ atọ n'okpuru nduzi Joab Kanuka
N'ụlọ ihe nkiri, ọ gbara 'Iago' na mmepụta Phoenix Players nke ọdachi Shakespeare Othello
N'afọ 2005, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na obere ọrụ na The Constant Gardener nke Fernando Meirelles duziri
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ pụtara dịka 'Barman' na ihe nkiri telivishọn Transit
N'afọ 2016, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri na-akpali akpali The CEO ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Jomo'
O mere ụfọdụ ngosipụta dịka 'Mkwajo' na egwu Mo Faya nke Eric Wainaina duziri; di na nwunye na FaceBook na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị rụrụ arụ 'Mzito' na Ni Sisi

Mgbe ọ rụchara ọtụtụ ọrụ ọjọọ, ọ natara ọrụ dịka nna nna na usoro MTV Shuga 2, mgbe ahụ dịka onye nkuzi bọọlụ na-akpali akpali na The Inside Story nke a na-egosi na Discovery Channel; nakwa onye nkwusa na The Knife Grinder's Tale
N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya maka ọrụ dịka onye isi mpụ Kenya 'Silas Kabaka' na usoro Netflix Sense8https //enwikipediaorg/wiki/Sense8 Ọrụ ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri telivishọn na Kenya
Peter Gregory Obi CON (amụrụ na 19 Julaị 1961) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria nke jere ozi dị ka Gọvanọ nke Anambra Steeti ugboro atọ dị iche iche site na 2006 ruo 2014
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2022, ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchiteanya nke Labour Party maka onye isi ala nke Naịjirịa na ntuli aka onye isi ala a ga eme n'2023
A mụrụ ya na Onitsha na 1961, Obi gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Naịjirịa na 1984
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ banyere azụmaahịa na ụlọ akụ, n'ikpeazụ, ọ rịgooro n'inwe ọtụtụ ọkwa dị elu na ụlọ akụ
Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ 2000, Obi bụ onyeisi oche nke Fidelity Bank tupu ọ hapụ ọnọdụ ahụ ịbanye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Obi gbara ọsọ maka gọvanọ n'afọ 2003, dị ka onye otu All Progressives Grand Alliance mana a kpọsara onye mmegide ya n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị
Mgbe afọ atọ nke agha iwu gasịrị, a mara Obi dị ka onye mmeri na 2006 wee malite ọrụ na Machị, 2006
A chụpụrụ ya n'ọnwa Nọvemba ahụ tupu a kagbuo ya ma ọ laghachiri n'ọfịs na Febụwarị 2007
Ọzọkwa, e wepụrụ Obi mgbe e mere ntuli aka ọhụrụ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2007 mana ndị ọka ikpe batara ọzọ ma kpebie na a ga-ekwe ka ọ mezue afọ anọ zuru ezu
N'afọ 2010, ọ meriri nhọpụta ọzọ maka oge nke abụọỌganihu na ego steeti, agụmakwụkwọ, na nlekọta ahụike gosipụtara okwu Obi
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ n'afọ 2014, Obi nwetara ọnọdụ ọhụrụ dị ka onye na-akwado ezi ọchịchị na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba mgbe ọ kwụsịrị na Peoples Democratic Party n'afọ 2014
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye osote onye isi ala na ntuli aka onye isi ala n'akụkụ Atiku Abubakar, mana onye isi ala nọ ugbu a bụ Muhammadu Buhari na osote onyeisiala Yemi Osinbajo meriri ya
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2022, Obi gbara ọsọ maka onye isi ala n'onwe ya, nke mbụ na PDP ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ LP na Mee 2022
A mụrụ Peter Obi na 19 Julaị 1961 na Onitsha Ọ gara Christ the King College, Onitsha, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
A nabatara ya na Mahadum Naịjirịa, na 1980, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na BA
(Hons) na nkà ihe ọmụma na 1984

Peter Obi gara Lagos Business School, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Chief Executive Program, Harvard Business School,ebe ọ gụsịrị nnukwu mmemme abụọ, London School of Economics, Columbia Business School, na International Institute for Management Development ebe ọ natara asambodo na Senior Executive Program na Chief Executive Officer Program
Ọ gakwara Kellogg School of Management nke Mahadum Northwestern, Saïd Business School nke Mahaduma Oxford na Judge Business School nke Маhadum Cambridge
Peter Obi bụ onye ọchụnta ego tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Dị ka Peter Obi si kwuo, ọ malitere ndụ ya dị ka onye azụmahịa, a mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ na-azụ ahịa tupu ọ banye n'ụwa ụlọ ọrụ
O nwere ọkwa ndị isi na ụlọ ọrụ ụfọdụ nke onwe

Ụfọdụ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọ jere ozi gụnyere Next International Nigeria Ltd, Onye isi oche na onye nduzi nke Guardian Express Mortgage Bank Ltd, Guardian Express Bank Plc, Future View Securities Ltd, Paymaster Nigeria Ltd, Chams Nigeria Ltd, Data Corp Ltd na Card Centre Ltd
Ọ bụ onye isi oche kachasị nta nke Fidelity Bank Plc

Peter Obi sonyere na ntuli aka Gọvanọ nke Anambra Steeti dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa maka otu All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA) na 2003, mana onye mmegide ya, Chris Ngige nke People's Democratic Party, bụ onye Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) kwupụtara na ọ bụ onye merịrị
Mgbe ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ atọ nke ikpe gasịrị, ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị ikpe ka mmeri Ngige kwụsịrị na 15 Machị 2006
Obi malitere ọrụ na 17 Machị 2006

N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2006, ụlọ omebe iwu steeti chụpụrụ ya mgbe ọnwa asaa gachara n'ọchịchị ma jiri Virginia Etiaba, onye osote ya dochie ya n'echi ya, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ gọvanọ nwanyị mbụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naịjirịa
Obi nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịgba aka na ihe gbasara ịwepụt ya ma weghachite ya dị ka gọvanọ na 9 Febụwarị 2007 site n'ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị ikpe nke nọ na Enugu
Etiaba weghachiri ya ike mgbe ụlọ ikpe kpebiri
Peter Obi hapụrụ ọrụ ọzọ na 29 Mee 2007 mgbe General Elections gasịrị, nke ndị otu ntuli aka kwupụtara Andy Uba dị ka onye mmeri
Obi laghachiri n'ụlọ ikpe ọzọ, n'oge a na-ekwu na afọ anọ ọ meriri na ntuli aka 2003 malitere ịgba ọsọ mgbe ọ malitere n'ọkwa na Machị 2006
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2007, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naịjirịa kwadoro arụmụka Obi ma weghachite Obi n'ọkwa

Nke a mere ka oge onye nọchiri Obi, Andy Uba, kwụsị na mberede, onye ụlọ ikpe kachasị elu mere na ntuli aka n'April 14, 2007 ka ọ ghara ịdị irè n'ihi na afọ anọ Obi kwesịrị ịnọgide na-enweghị nsogbu ruo na March 2010

Na ụbọchị asaa n'ọnwa Febụwarị 2010, Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) kwupụtara na Peter Obi bụ onye mmeri ntuli aka gọọmentị steeti Anambra nke afọ 2010, ebe ọ meriri Prọfesọ Charles Chukwuma Soludo, onye bụbu gọvanọ, CBN
Mmeri ntuli aka a nyere Gọvanọ Obi afọ anọ ọzọ dị ka gọvanọ nke Anambra Steeti
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2014, Peter Obi jere ozi nke abụọ ya ma nyefee Willie Obiano ọchịchị gọvanọ
Mgbe ntuli aka 2015 gasịrị, Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan họpụtara Peter Obi dị ka onyeisi oche nke Naịjirịa Security na Exchange Commission (SEC)
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2018, a kpọrọ Peter Obi dịka onye nke abụọ Atiku Abubakar, onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Peoples Democratic Party na ntuli aka onye isi ala Naịjirịa 2019
Ndị otu ya bịara nke abụọ

Na 24 Machị 2022, Peter Obi kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịpụtaị maka ọkwa onye isi ala nke Naijiria n'okpuru ikpo okwu nke Peoples Democratic Party, mana o mechara pụọ ma kwupụta na ọ ga-agba ọsọ n'okpuru usoro Labour Party kama
Dị ka Peoples Gazette si kwuo, Peter Obi degaara ndị isi nke Peoples Democratic Party akwụkwọ na 24 Mee ka ha gbaa arụkwaghịm
A kọrọ na Obi mere mkpesa banyere nnukwu iri ngo nke ndị nnọchiteanya na ịzụta vootu na ntuli aka nke pati, na-ekwu maka ịdị adị nke otu pati na-arụkọ ọrụ ịmegide ya
Ọgbọ ndị na-eto eto n'okpuru afọ 30 gosipụtara na ha bụ ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-akwado Obi, na-egosi nkwado ha site na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta na ngagharị iwe na ngagharị n'okporo ámá
Ndị a bụ ụfọdụ n'ime onyinye ndị a ma ama nke Peter Obi
Nsonaazụ nke Pandora Papers na-agbapụta, Premium Times kọrọ banyere itinye aka Obi na ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri na ebe ndị a na-atụ ụtụ isi dị ka British Virgin Islands

N'afọ 2010, Obi nyere Access International aka ka o guzobe ma jikwaa Gabriella Investments Limited, ụlọ ọrụ dị na British Virgin Islands nke aha ya bụ aha nwa nwanyị Obi nwere ndị isi dị ka ndị nduzi iji zere itinye aka Obi; otu n'ime ndị nduzi bụkwa onye nduzi nke ụlọ ọrụ shell dị na Belize nke e nyere òkè 50,000 na Gabriella Investements
N'afọ 2017, Obi haziri ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'okpuru aha PMGG Investments Limited ma mepụta ntụkwasị obi a na-akpọ The Gabriella Settlement nke ghọrọ naanị onye nwere òkè na PMGG Investements Limited
Mgbe mkpughe ahụ gasịrị, ndị otu ọha na eze gbara mbọ maka nyocha banyere Obi ka ndị nta akụkọ jụrụ EFCC ma kọmitii ahụ ga-amalite nyocha Obi
Ụbọchị ole na ole mgbe akụkọ ahụ gasịrị, Obi zaghachiri site n'ikwu na ọ mebighị iwu ọ bụla ma mee ka o doo anya na ego nke akaụntụ ahụ sitere n'oge ya dị ka onye ọchụnta ego
EFCC kpọrọ ya maka ajụjụ n'ikpeazụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2021 mgbe Buhari nyere iwu ka ụlọ ọrụ niile na-emegide nrụrụ aka nyochaa ndị a kpọrọ aha na mgbapụta ahụ
Otú ọ dị, ọ dịghị ikpe mpụ e tinyere megide Obi ka ọ na-erule June 2022
Peter Obi lụrụ Margaret Brownson Obi (onye a mụrụ Usen) n'afọ 1992
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ, otu nwa nwoke na otu nwa nwanyị
Obi bụ onye Katọlik nke si n'agbụrụ Igbo
Peter Kofi Sedufia bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Ghana
Sedufia gara National Film and Television Institute of Ghana, na-agụ akwụkwọ na nduzi ihe nkiri
Mgbe o duziri ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi, ọ wepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Keteke
Peter Gary Tatchell (a mụrụ na 25 Jenụwarị 1952) bụ onye Britain na-eme mkpọsa maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, sitere na Australia, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ndị LGBT
A họpụtara Tatchell dịka onye nnọchiteanya nke Labour Party maka Bermondsey n'afọ 1981
Mgbe ahụ, onye isi otu Michael Foot katọrọ ya maka ịkwado ihe ndị ọzọ na-abụghị ndị omeiwu megide gọọmentị Thatcher
Labour mechara nye ya ohere iguzo na ntuli aka Bermondsey na Febụwarị 1983, nke pati ahụ tụfuru oche na Liberals
N'afọ ndị 1990 ọ gbara mbọ maka ikike LGBT site n'otu ọrụ kpọmkwem OutRage!, nke ya na ya guzobere

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mkpọsa dị iche iche, dịka Stop Murder Music megide okwu egwu a na-ekwu na ọ na-akpali ime ihe ike megide ndị LGBT ma na-ede ma na-agbasa ozi gbasara ikike mmadụ dị iche iche na ikpe ziri ezi
Ọ nwara ijide onye isi ala Zimbabwe bụ Robert Mugabe n'afọ 1999 na ọzọ n'afọ 2001
A mụrụ Tatchell na Melbourne, Australia
Nna ya bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ na lathe na nne ya na-arụkọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ biskit
Nne na nna ya gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ na nne ya lụrụ di ọzọ n'oge na-adịghị anya
O nwere nwanne nwanyị na ụmụnne nwoke
Ebe ọ bụ na ego ezinụlọ ahụ nwere nsogbu n'ihi ụgwọ ahụike, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii n'afọ 1968
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-ede akara na onye na-edozi windo na ụlọ ahịa ngalaba
Tatchell na-azọrọ na o tinyewo ihe nkiri nke ihe ngosi ndị a n'ime ọrụ ya
N'ịbụ onye a zụlitere dị ka Onye Kraịst, Tatchell na-ekwu na ọ 'kwụsịrị okwukwe [ya] ogologo oge gara aga' ma bụrụ onye na-ekweghị na Chineke

A na-akọ n'ọtụtụ ebe na Tatchell bụ onye na-eri nri; Otú ọ dị, Tatchell n'onwe ya na-ekwu na ọ naghị eri anụ, mana ọ na-eri àkwá, cheese, na, dịka Richard Fairbrass si kwuo, salmon ọhịa, nke pụtara na Tatchells bụ Pescetarian
Ọ malitere inwe mmasị n'ihe omume ndị na-eme n'èzí dịka ịnya ụgbọ mmiri na ịrị ugwu
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tatchell malitere na Mount Waverley Secondary College, ebe n'afọ a 1967 ọ malitere mkpọsa iji kwado ndị Aborigine Australia
A họpụtara Tatchell ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nke Kansụl Na-anọchite anya Ụmụ akwụkwọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
N'afọ ikpeazụ ya n'afọ 1968, dịka onyeisi ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ butere ụzọ n'ịmepụta atụmatụ agụmakwụkwọ maka ndị Aborigine ma duzie mkpọsa maka ikike ala Aboriginal
Ihe omume ndị a mere ka onyeisi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ kwuo na ndị Kọmunist na-achịkwa ya
Peter Yarrow (a mụrụ na Mee 31, 1938) bụ onye America na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu nke nwetara aha ọma maka ịbụ onye nọ na ndị mmadụ atọ nke afọ 1960 Peter, Paul na Mary
Yarrow so dee (ya na Leonard Lipton) otu n'ime egwu ndị a ma ama, 'Puff, the Magic Dragon'
Ọ bụkwa onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma kwado ihe ndị sitere na mmegide na Agha Vietnam na nkwado maka mmemme mgbochi mmegbu ụlọ akwụkwọ
A mụrụ Peter Yarrow na Manhattan, nwa Vera Wisebrode (née Vira Burtakoff) na Bernard Yarrow
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị Ukraine ndị Juu gụrụ akwụkwọ, ndị ezinụlọ ha biri na Providence, Rhode Island
Bernard Yarrow (1899-1973) gara Mahadum Jagiellonian (Kraków, Poland) na Mahadum Odessa (Odessa, Ukraine), tupu ọ kwaga United States n'afọ 1922 mgbe ọ dị afọ 23

Ọ sụgharịrị aha nna ya site na Yaroshevitz gaa na Yarrow, nweta nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Mahadum Columbia n'afọ 1925 ebe ọ sonyeere Phi Sigma Delta fraternity, na 1928 gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Columbia Law School
Mgbe ahụ, ọ nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ iwu onwe onye na New York City ruo afọ 1938, mgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye ọka iwu distrikti n'okpuru onye ọka iwu mpaghara n'oge ahụ, Thomas E
Dewey
N'afọ 1944, a nabatara ya n'ọfịs nke Strategic Services, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụzọ dị iche
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, Bernard Yarrow sonyeere Sullivan na Cromwell, ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọka iwu nke ụmụnne Dulles
Ọ bụ onye otu ntọala nke National Committee for a Free Europe, otu na-emegide ndị Kọmunist
N'afọ 1952, ọ ghọrọ osote onye isi oche nke CIA-kwado Radio Free Europe, otu o nyere aka guzobe
Yarrow natara onyinye Allard K
Lowenstein n'afọ1982 maka 'mgbalị dị ịrịba ama ya n'ịkwalite ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, udo, na nnwere onwe'
N'afọ 1995, ndị Miami Jewish Federation kwetara na Yarrow na-aga n'ihu na-agba mbọ site n'inye ya Tikkun Olam Award maka òkè ya n'inyere aka 'idozi ụwa'
E nyere Yarrow Kate Wolf Memorial Award site na World Folk Music Association n'afọ 1993
N'afọ 2003, mkpebi ndị omeiwu nabatara ihe Yarrow rụzuru na nke Operation Respect
Petkana Makaveeva (Bulgarian; amụrụ nụbọchị nke anọ nọnwa Ọktoba nafọ 1952) bụ onye Bulgaria bụbu onye na agba bọọlụ bọọlụ nke sonyere na 1976 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ na 1980 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Petra Karin Kelly (29 Nọvemba 1947- c
1 Ọktoba 1992) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị German Green na onye na-ahụ maka ọdịmma ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bụ onye guzobere German Green Party, òtù Green mbụ na-etolite ma na mba Germany ma n'ụwa niile
N'afọ 1982, e nyere ya onyinye Right Livelihood Award maka 'ịmepụta na itinye n'ọrụ ọhụụ ọhụrụ na-ejikọta nchegbu gburugburu ebe obibi na nkwụsị agha, ikpe ziri ezi na ikike mmadụ'
A mụrụ Petra Karin Lehmann na Günzburg, Bavaria (n'oge ahụ American Zone of Occupation, Germany), n'afọ 1947
Ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Kelly mgbe nne ya lụrụ John E
Kelly, onye ọrụ US Army
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ebe obibi ndị nọn Roman Katọlik dị na Günzburg ma mesịa gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ na Georgia na Virginia mgbe ezinụlọ ya kwagara United States n'afọ 1959
Ọ biri ma gụọ akwụkwọ na United States ruo mgbe ọ laghachiri West Germany na 1970
[citation needed] Ọ nọgidere na-abụ nwa amaala West Germany n'oge ndụ ya niile
Kelly nwere mmasị na Martin Luther King Jr, ma mee mkpọsa maka Robert F
Kennedy na Hubert Humphrey na ntuli aka US nke 1968
Ọ gụrụ sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na School of International Service na Mahadum America (Washington, DC), ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1970 na nzere bachelọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na European Institute na Mahadum Amsterdam na 1971 na nzere masta
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na European Commission (Brussels, Belgium, 1971), Kelly sonyere n'ọtụtụ mkpọsa udo na gburugburu ebe obibi na Germany na mba ndị ọzọ
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ afọ abụọ na European Commission, ọ kwagara n'ọkwa nchịkwa na Kọmitii Economic and Social, ebe ọ kwadoro ikike ụmụ nwanyị
Kelly bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Die Grünen, German Green Party na 1979
N'afọ 1983, a họpụtara ya na Bundestag site na ndepụta ntuli aka dị ka onye otu Bundestag na-anọchite anya Bavaria
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na 1987 na oke votu dị elu
N'afọ 1981, Kelly sonyere na ngagharị iwe nke mmadụ 400,000 na Bonn megide ngwá agha nuklia
N'afọ 1982, Gerhard Schröder dere onyinye na Die Zeit maka akwụkwọ Prinzip Leben, nke Kelly na Jo Leinen dezigharịrị, nke tụlere nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi na agha nuklia nwere ike
N'otu afọ ahụ, Kelly natara Right Livelihood Award '
maka ịkpụzi na itinye n'ọrụ ọhụụ ọhụrụ na-ejikọta nchegbu gburugburu ebe obibi na nkwụsị agha, ikpe ziri ezi, na ikike mmadụ

Na ụbọchị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1983, Kelly, Gert Bastian na ndị otu Green Bundestag atọ ndị ọzọ wepụtara ọkọlọtọ na Alexanderplatz na East Berlin, nke kwuru 'The Greens 意 Swords to Ploughshares'
Mgbe e jidere ha obere oge, ha zutere ndị otu mmegide nke East Germany
Ndị ọchịchị East Germany nabatara nke a ebe ọ bụ na West German Greens jụrụ mkpebi NATO Double-Track
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1983, Erich Honecker, onye ndú nke German Democratic Republic, zutere Petra Kelly, Gert Bastian na ndị ọzọ Greens
Kelly yi uwe elu nwere okwu 'Swords to Ploughshares' na ya
Ọ chọrọ ka a tọhapụ ndị mkpọrọ niile nke East German peace movement ma jụọ Honecker ihe mere o ji gbochie ihe na GDR nke ọ kwadoro na West
Kelly dere akwụkwọ Fighting for Hope n'afọ 1984, nke South End Press bipụtara
Akwụkwọ ahụ bụ oku ngwa ngwa maka ụwa na-enweghị ime ihe ike n'etiti North na South, ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị, onwe anyị na gburugburu anyị

N'ime afọ ndị ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya, Kelly nọgidere na-ekewapụ onwe ya n'ebe ọtụtụ ndị otu ya nọ n'ihi mgbanwe ndị Greens mere n'oge ahụ, ebe ọ nọgidere na'ihu na-emegide njikọ ọ bụla ya na ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọdịnala

N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1992, ndị uwe ojii hụrụ ozu Kelly na onye mmekọ ya, onye bụbu ọchịagha na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Green Gert Bastian (amụrụ n'afọ 1923), n'ime ụlọ ihi ụra nke ụlọ ya na Bonn ha natara oku site n'aka nwunye Bastian [mgbe akọwapụtara dị ka?] na nne nne Kelly nke kọrọ na ha anụbeghị Bastian ma ọ bụ Kelly ruo izu ole na ole
Ndị uwe ojii kpebiri na Bastian gbagburu Kelly mgbe ọ na-ehi ụra, onye gburu onwe ya
Ọ dị afọ iri anọ na anọ, ọ dị afọ iri isii na itenanị
Oge ikpeazụ onye ọ bụla nụrụ banyere di na nwunye ahụ bụ na 30 Septemba 1992 mgbe Kelly zigara nne nne ya ngwugwu
Ndị uwe ojii mere atụmatụ na ọnwụ ndị ahụ nwere ike ime na ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba mana enweghị ike ịkọwa kpọmkwem oge ọnwụ ahụ n'ihi igbu oge ịchọta ozu na ọnọdụ ire ure ha
E liri Kelly na Waldfriedhof (ebe ili ozu ọhịa) na Würzburg, nso obodo Heidingsfeld na Lower Franconia, Bavaria
Petronella Tshuma (amụrụ na 13 Jenụwarị 1990) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a mụrụ na Zimbabwe
O meriri onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na 10th Africa Movie Academy Awards
O gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn South Africa nke gụnyere Scandal, Hustle, Mzansi Love, Sokhulu & Partners na 90 Plein Street
Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri Pearl Genaro ugbu a na etv's Rhythm City
A mụrụ Tshuma na Zimbabwe ma ọ kwagara South Africa mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
Ọ bụ na chọọchị dị n'etiti Johannesburg na 1997 ka ọ hụrụ ime ihe nkiri n'anya, na-enweta ọrụ mbụ ya n'egwuregwu ọmụmụ Jizọs
Ka ịhụnanya ya maka ịkọ akụkọ na-eto, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na mpaghara Yeovill, Hillbrow na Berea
N'afọ 2001, Petronella kwagara United Kingdom ka ya na nna ya biri na Bristol
Ọ gara Filton High School ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri, na-egwu Carmen na mmepụta nke Fame ma nata BTECH na Acting site na ngalaba SWADA nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ

Petrosalam bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmekọ ọnụ n'etiti Gọọmenti Arab Republic of Egypt, Egyptian General Petroleum Corporation (EGPC) na Arabian Oil Company (AOC) maka nchọpụta, mmepe na mmepụta mmanụ n'ime Northwest October Development Lease
Pfungwa Dziike (a mụrụ n'afọ 1972) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Mutare, nne na nna Dziike nwụrụ mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị mana ọ bụ nne nne ya Shona zụlitere ya
O mere ite ụrọ, nke ọ malitere inye aka na ya
Ka ha na-arụ ọrụ, ọ na-agwa ya akụkọ shona
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị agụmakwụkwọ ya, Dziike kwagara Harare ka ya na nwanne nne ya biri
A kpọbatara ya n'otu ndị na-akpụ nkume bụ ndị kpọrọ ya ka ọ sonye na mmekorita a na-akpọ 'Art Peace', nke dị na Silveira House mission nke obodo ahụ
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ nọrọ afọ ise dị ka onye enyemaka Amos Supuni, onye kụziiri ya ọtụtụ ihe banyere ịkpụ nkume
O mechara soro Collin Sixpence na Royal Katiyo rụọ ọrụ na Chapungu Sculpture Park
Dziike bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Mabvuku
Phantom Plague How Tuberculosis Shaped our History bụ akwụkwọ edemede na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nke afọ 2022 banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụkwara nta sitere n'aka onye nta akụkọ ahụike Vidya Krishnan

Ọ na-ekpuchi akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụkwara nta sitere na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, iri abụo, na mmalite nke iri abụọ na otu, site n'ịghọta mmalite ọrịa ahụ ruo na ahụike ọha na-eze nke oge a na ntinye aka ọgwụ
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-enyocha etu ọrụ ebere na'ụzọ na na - adịghị mma, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, na okwu na 'ịkpa oke agbamume'
Akwụkwọ ahụ etoola ya site na New York Times, na nyocha nke Kirus
Krishnan dere akwụkwọ bụ Phantom Plague ihe karịrị afọ asaa, ya mere tupu na n'oge ọrịa COVID-19
Phantom Plague na-ekpuchi akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụkwara nta na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu na mba New York City slums ruo n'oge India

Ọ na-emegide mgbasa nke ụkwara nta site na obodo ndị jupụtara n'obodo ukwu, mana ọ na'ekwukwa banyere ndị ọrịa ụgbụgbọ ụbụrụ bara ọgaranya dị ka Mazi George Orwell, Franz Kafka, Eleanor Roosevelt, Frédéric Chopin, na ụmụnne nwanyị Brontë
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-edekọta ọgwụgwọ ndị mmadụ n'oge gara aga, ịnwa usoro ahụike ọha na eze, na ịrị elu nke ngwọta sayensị
Ọ kpọtụrụ ọrụ Ignaz Semmelweis, Robert Kock, Joseph Lister, na Louis Pasteur aha iji kwalite nghọta mmadụ banyere ọrịa ndi na efe efe
Ọ na-edekọ ịrị elu nke echiche nje, ojiji na iji ọgwụ nje eme ihe n'ụzọ na'ezighị ezi na mmetụta ọrịa na ọnọdụ ụlọ jupụtara na mgbasa ọrịa dị iche iche
Ọ na-ekwu na atụmatụ nke World Health Organization na 25% nke ụwa nwere ụkwara nta

Phillip Kayode Moses (onye amụrụ na Juunu 5, 1994) nke amara nke oma dịka Pheelz, bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na Naịjirịa na onye na-ede egwu ya ọtụtụ ndi na eme ihe egwu na ndi egwu, dịks Olamide, Tiwa Savage na ndi nile no n’etiti
Amụrụ ma zụlite ya na Legọọsụ, ekwere na Pheelz mepụtara egwu niile nanị otu egwu ka ọ na-ewepụtaghị na abọm Olamide Baddest Guy Ever Liveth
Pheelz bụ onye Ogun steeti mana a mụrụ ya ma tolite na Ojo, okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Lagos Steeti
Ọ malitere egwu dị ka onye na-agụ egwú na afọ iri na chọọchị
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị na ajangbandi afromedia
Pheelz gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Ideal Comprehensive high school ms mechaa ruo n'okpuru ID Cabassa na Coded Tunes, akara ndekọ ebe ọ zutere Olamide
N’afọ 2011, o gosipụtara olu n’abụ egwu Olamide Rapsodi abọm akpọrọ “I 'm going in'
Ọganihu ya dị ka onye na-edekọ ndekọ bịara na 2012, mgbe o mepụtara otu egwu Olamide akpọrọ 'First ofAll' na 'Fucking with the Devil' site na abọm YBNL ya
Na 2013, Pheelz pụtara na NotJustOk ' ndị ndekọ egwu iri nọ n'elu na Naịjirịa'
O mepụtara egwu niile naanị ka ọ emepụtaghị na Olamide 'Baddest Guy Ever Liveth' abọm, mmegharị nke mere ka o kwudosịa ike n'ụlọ ọrụ egwu nke Naịjirịa ma merie na nhọpụta nke The Headies 2013
Na 2014, ahọpụtara dịka 'onye mmepụta egwu nke Afọ' na 2014 mbipụta nke The Headies na na '2014 Naịjirịa Entertainment Awards'
Pheelz agafeela wee mepụta ma tinye aha ya na egwu na ọba egwu ama ama gụnyere The Chairman nke MI, Ghetto University site na Runtown na Seyi ma ọ bụ Shay nke Seyi Shay
Na 2014, Pheelz rụkọrọ ọrụ ya na COPILOT Music and Sound na mkpuchi Carlinhos Brown 'Maria Caipirnha (Samba da Bahia)'
Nhazi a
ahụ gosipngwa a eji egwu na ụdịNịjirịaigeria maka Visa 'of the Worldae 'wa', mkpọsa dijitalụ maka 2014 FIFA World Cup
Pheoris West (Ubochí irí na asaá n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1950 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 2021) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe
Ọ bụ Associate Professor Emeritus Ohio State University College of the Arts, ébé ọ sonyeere ngalaba na 1976
A mụrụ West na 1950 na Albany, New York
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts, wee nwéta nzèrè Master of Fine Arts na Mahadum Yale
Ebe ndị West nwere nka bụ eserese na eserese, eserese kọmputa, na imewe
Mmetụta ndị dị mkpà na mmepe nka mbụ ya gụnyere ọrụ Romare Bearden, Henry Ossawa Tanner, na ndị Black arts collective AfriCOBRA nkè afọ 1970
E gosipụtara nka ya na ngosipụta nka dị ichè ichè kemgbe afọ 1970
A na-enwe ihe atụ nke ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Studio Museum na Harlem, New York, Museo Civico Diaoarts Contemporaneo Di Gibilina, Palermo, Italy, na Contemporary Arts Center, Cincinnati
O sonyere na ihe ngosi njem mba ahụ bụ iji chekwaa ihe nketa American Art from Historically Black Colleges and Universities
Ọ bụ onye nlekọta maka 1999 'HOMAGE TO JAZZ' na Martin Luther King Center na Columbus, Ohio
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na National Endowment of the Arts Expansion Arts Panel, International Juror National Exhibition of Zimbabwe, na Ohio Arts Council
West weere onwé ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe Afrocentric
Ọ naghị eso ndị na-ese ihe nkè ógè a ma ọ bụ nke ógè a
Ọ na-ahọrọ ijikọta mkpà nke ọha mmadụ nwèrè omume ọma siri ike na omenala ọdịnala
Afrịka bụ isi iyi maka ọdịnala nka oge ochie na ọdịbendị Afrịka na America na-akpali ihe oyiyi ya
Ọ na-anọchi anya ozi zuru ụwa ọnụ site na iji akụkọ ọdịnala, akụkọ ifo na okpukpe
Isiokwu ya kachasị bụ nwanyị ojii
O weere ya dị ka ihe nnọchianya maka Nne Ụwa, maka ọmụmụ nke ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ
Ọ na-anọchite anya ihe akaebe kachasị ochie nke mmadụ a chọtara n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na Etiopia
N'ọrụ ya bụ The Garden, ọ na-ese Iv dị ka nwanyị ojii mara mma
Ihe osise ahụ na-emepụta ike ime mmụọ site na ọkwa nke ihe oyiyi na nguzozi nke agba na ọdịdị
Ihe ngosi nke onwe ya Urban Warriors A Retrospective nà Shot Tower Gallery na Fort Hayes, na-egosipụta ike nà ike nke ọrụ ya
West kụziri na Mahadum steeti Ohio ruo mgbè ọ dara ọrịa strok na Machị 2016
Na Mee 2019, bụ ihe ngosi Start at Home Influence, Commitment, Integrity na Urban Arts Space na Mahadum Ohio State
E nwere ihe osise 143 nke H
Ike Okafor-Newsum, Robert J
Stull (1935-1994) na Pheoris West, bụ ndị niile kụziri na ngalaba nka ma ọ bụ ọmụmụ ojii nke steeti Ohio
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ naghịzi ese ihe, West gara ihe ngosi ahụ ma kelee ndị na-akwado gallery
Philip David Ochs (/ˈoʊks/; December 19, 1940 -Eprel 9, 1976) bụ onye America na-ede egwu na onye na-agụ egwu mkpesa (ma ọ bụ, dịka ọ họọrọ, onye na-abụ abụ)
A maara Ochs maka ọgụgụ isi ya, ọchị, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ịbụ abụ abụ, na olu pụrụ iche
O dere ọtụtụ narị egwu n'afọ ndi 1960s na 1970s wee wepụta abọm asatọ
A mụrụ Phil Ochs na Disemba 19, 1940, na El Paso, Texas, nwa Jacob 'Jack' Ochs, onye dọkịta a mụrụ na New York na August 11, 1910, na Gertrude Phin Ochs, a mụrụ na February 26, 1912, na Scotland
Nne na nna ya zutere ma lụọ di na nwunye na Edinburgh ebe Jack nọ na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike
Mgbe ha lụsịrị di, ha kwagara na United States
Jack, onye e debara aha ya n'ọrụ agha, e zigara ya mba ofesi na njedebe nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ebe ọ gwọrọ ndị agha na Agha nke Bulge
Ahụmahụ agha ya metụtara ahụike uche ya ma nata nkwụsị ahụike dị ùgwù na Nọvemba afọ 1945
N'ịbụ onye na-arịa ọrịa uche na ịda mbà n'obi mgbe ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ, Jack enweghị ike ịmepụta ọrụ ahụike na-aga nke ọma ma rụọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọgwụ gburugburu mba ahụ

N'ihi ya, ezinụlọ Ochs na-akwaga ugboro ugboro na Far Rockaway, New York, mgbe Ochs bụ onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma; mgbe ahụ na Perrysburg na ọdịda anyanwụ New York, ebe ọ malitere ịmụ egwu; wee gaa Columbus, Ohio
Ochs tolitere na nwanne nwanyị tọrọ ya, Sonia (nke a maara dịka Sonny, a mụrụ na 1937), na nwanne nwoke nke obere, Michael (a mụrụ n'afọ 1943)
Ezinụlọ Ochs bụ ndị nọ n'etiti na ndị Juu, mana ha abụghị ndị okpukpe
Nna ya nọ n'ebe dị anya site na nwunye ya na ụmụ ya, a kpọgakwara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ maka ịda mbà n'obi; ọ nwụrụ na Eprel 30, 1963, site na ọbara ọgbụgba ụbụrụ
Nne ya nwụrụ na Machị 9, 1994

Philip Emeagwali (mụrụ 23 August 1954) bụ a Nigerian computer scientist
He won the 1989 Gordon Bell PrizeNigerian kọmputa ọkà mmụta sayensị
maka ịrụ ọrụ ọnụ ahịa na ngwa kọmpụta nwere arụmọrụ dị elu, na ngụkọ ihe atụ nke ebe nchekwa mmanụ site na iji usoro mgbakọ na mwepụ mgbakọ na mwepụ ọhụrụ
A maara ya maka ikwu ebubo arụmụka banyere mmezu ya nke ndị sayensị na -agbagha
A mụrụ Philip Emeagwali na Akure, Nigeria na 23 Ọgọst 1954
A zụlitere ya na Onitsha na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria
Akwụsịre ụlọ akwụkwọ mmalite ya na 1967 n'ihi agha obodo Nigeria
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atoi, o jere ozi n'usuu ndị agha Biafra
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, ọ gụchara nha ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị site n'ọmụmụ ihe onwe onye
Ọ gara mba Amerịka ka ọ gụọ akwụkwọ n'okpuru ohere agụmakwụkwọ ka ọ gụchara akwụkwọ ozi na mahadum London
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Oregon State na 1977
O mechara kwaga Washington DC, na -enweta nzere masta na Mahadum George Washington na oke osimiri na injin ụgbọ mmiri, yana nna ukwu nke abụọ na mgbakọ na mwepụ sitere na Mahadum Maryland
Next magazine aro na Emeagwali kwuru na ihe ọzọ degrees
N'ime oge a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka injinia na Bureau of Rec Recation Land in Wyoming
Emeagwali gụrụ maka PhD
nzere site na Mahadum Michigan site na 1987 ruo 1991
Kọmitii nke ndị nyocha nke ime na mpụga anabataghị akụkọ ya, yabụ enyeghị ya nzere ahụ
Emeagwali gbara akwụkwọ ikpe ụlọikpe, na -ekwupụta na mkpebi a bụ imebi ikike ruuru ya na mahadum ahụ kparịkwara ya n'ụzọ dị iche iche n'ihi agbụrụ ya
A kagburu ihe ịma aka ụlọ ikpe, yana ịrịọ arịrịọ n'ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị nke steeti Michigan
Emeagwali natara 1989 Gordon Bell Prize maka ngwa nke kọmputa CM-2 nke nwere oke nha
Ngwa ahụ jiri mgbanye mmiri kọmpụta kọmpụta maka ịdo mmiri mmanụ
Ọ nwetara ihe nrite na ụdị 'ọnụahịa /arụmọrụ', yana ọnụ ọgụgụ arụmọrụ ya ruru 400 Mflops /$ 1M
Onye meriri na otu 'arụmọrụ', bụkwa onye meriri na ụdị ọnụahịa/arụmọrụ, mana enweghị ike ịnata ihe nrite abụọ
Mobil Research and Machines Machines, jiri CM-2 maka nhazi data seismic wee nweta ogo dị elu nke 500 Mflops/$ 1M
Ndị ọka ikpe kpebiri n'otu nrite maka ntinye ọ bụla
Usoro ya gụnyere microprocessor ọ bụla na -ekwurịta okwu na ndị agbata obi isii
Nmepụta Emeagwali bụ mmemme izizi itinye usoro oge maka ịse ihe nchekwa mmiri
Bill Clinton hotara ya dịka ọmụmaatụ nke ihe ndị Naịjirịa nwere ike nweta mgbe enyere ohere ma na -egosipụtakarị ya na akụkọ mgbasa ozi ama ama maka Ọnwa Ọchịchị Black
Emeagwali ekwuola ọtụtụ ebubo arụmụka gbasara ihe ọ rụzuru nke ndị sayensị na -agbagha

Nkwupụta ya nke ịbụ nna nke ịntanetị, nke mepụtara igwe njikọ, nke nwere ihe nrịba ama iri anọ na otu, nke inweta 'Nobel Prize of Computing' na ịbụ 'dọkịta' na/ma ọ bụ 'prọfesọ' abụrụla nke ejikọtara ọnụ
ihe akaebe edepụtara nke ọma

N'ikwu okwu n'oge nleta Switzerland na Eprel 2009, Maazị Emeagwali kwuru na ọ bụ ya bụ onye mbụ butere hypercube “iji dozie nnukwu ihe ịma aka akọwapụtara dị ka nsogbu mgbanaka ọla edo iri abụọ na kọmputa
Nchọpụta a, n'otu akụkụ, kpaliri mweghachi nke ndị isi kọmputa dị ka ịntanetị
” Ọ na -ekwu na site na mbọ ya, na ya nwere ike ịtọ ndekọ ụwa atọ ma melite na Iwu nke Motion nke Abụọ nke Newton
Philip Kwame Apagya (amụrụ n'afọ 1958) bụ onye Ghana na-ese foto nke na-ahụ maka ihe osise studio nwere agba na ihe osise
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Shama, Ghana
A mụrụ Philip Kwame Apagya na Sekondi, Ghana, n'afọ 1958, dịka nwa nwoke nke onye na-ese foto, a mụtara ya n'ụlọ ọrụ nna ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata nwoke
Apagya gụrụ maka foto journalism na Accra School of Journalism, tupu ọ mepee ụlọ ọrụ nke ya na Shama, n'ụsọ oké osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ Ghana, n'afọ 1982
A maara ya taa maka ihe osise studio ya nke ọ na-eji agba mee
Ọrụ Apagya dị na The Contemporary African Art Collection (CAAC) nke Jean Pigozzi
E gosipụtara ọrụ Apagya na Museum of Contemporary Photography na Chicago, Sheldon Art Galleries na Nebraska, na Philadelphia Museum of Art, nakwa ebe ndị ọzọ
Foto ya dị n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta, nke gụnyere Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York City, NY, na Studio Museum na Harlem, New York, NY
A na-anọchite anya Apagya Fifty One Fine Art Photography na Antwerp, Belgium
Apagya mara usoro ọdịnala aka n'ime ihe osise ya nke ihe osise studio ma webata echiche ọhụrụ n'ụdị foto
A mụrụ ya n'ọgbọ mbụ nke Ghana ka ha nwechaara onwe ha, o wetara àgwà ọgbara ọhụrụ nke ịzụ ahịa n'ime nka ya site na nzụlite ya

Apagya na-ese elu uko na telivishọn na ndị ọkà okwu nwere aha dị ụkwụụ, dị ka Sony, na friji jupụtara na nri n'azụ ya nke ebe dị n'ime, na maka ebe ndị dị n'èzí ọ na-ese okporo ámá ndị a ma ama na ndị bara ọgaranya nke Ghana yana ọdụ ụgbọ elu Accra International
Apagya jikọtara ihe ọdịnala ọdịbendị Afrịka na ụwa nke oge a nke ọdịda anyanwụ site na ijupụta ihe onwunwe ya na ihe ngosi nke ọdịda anyanwụ, yana ime ka ndị ọ na-achị nọgide na uwe ọdịda anyanwụ
Philip Mountbatten, Duke nke Edinburgh, amụrụ na June 10, 2021 wee nwụọ Eprel 9, 2021 na Windsor, bụ di Elizabeth II, Queen nke United Kingdom na nke mpaghara ndị ọzọ nke Commonwealth
Philip Simmons (ubochí itoolu n'ọnwa Juun, 1912 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Juun, 2009) bụ ónyé America na-arụ ọrụ áká na onye na-akpụ ihe na-ahụ màkà ọrụ ígwè
Simmons nọrọ afọ iri asaá na asatọ dị ka ónyé na-akpụ ihe, na-elekwasị anya n'ọrụ ígwè ịchọ mma
Mgbè ọ malitere ọrụ ya, ndị na-akpụ ihe na Charleston mere ihe ndị dị mfe, ihe ndị dị n'ụlọ kwa ụbọchị, dị ka akpụkpọ ịnyịnya
Ka ọ na-erule ógè ọ lara ezumike nká afọ iri asaa na asaa ka e mesịrị, a na-ewere ọrụ ahụ dị ka ụdị nka kama ịbụ ọrụ bara uru
Enwere ike ịhụ ihe atụ nke ọrụ Simmons, gụnyere ọnụ ụzọ ámá ígwè, n'ọbọdọ Charleston, South Carolina, yana mpaghara ndị ọzọ nke South Carolina Lowcountry
A na-egosipụta ihe osise ya na Smithsonian Museum, South Carolina State Museum, Paris, France, na China
A mụrụ Philip Simmons n'ubochí itoolu n'ọnwa Juun, 1912, na Daniel Island, South Carolina
Ọ bụ nné na nnà ya zụlitere ya, tupu e zigara ya Charleston na 1920 ka ya na nné ya biri mgbè ọ dị afọ asatọ
Simmons biri na Vernon Street ma banye n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na Buist Elementary School, nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Buist Academy
Ka ógè na-aga na ndụ ya, Simmons ga-emepụta ma mepụta ogidi ígwè nke guzo ugbu a n'elu ọnụ ụzọ mbata ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Simmons malitere inwe mmasị na ndị ọrụ aka bi n'ógbè ya, n'oge na-adịghịkwa ányá ọ malitere ileta ụlọ ọrụ dị ichè ichè dị nso n'ụlọ ya
Karịsịa, Simmons malitere inwe mmasị na ónyé na-arụ ọrụ na Charlotte Street nke Peter Simmons na-achị, onye na-enweghị njikọ Philip
Philip Simmons hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ n'oge na-adịghị ányá wee malite mmụta na Peter Simmons, ónyé bụbu ohu, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na àtó
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-akpụ ihe zuru oke mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ afọ ise
E mepụtara ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ya n'ụlọ ya na Blake Street

John Michael Vlach, ónyé édémédé na prọfesọ nke ọmụmụ America na Mahadum George Washington, dèrè akụkọ ndụ Simmons na ọrụ ya n'akwụkwọ 1981 akpọrọ Charleston Blacksmith The Work of Philips Simmons E wepụtara akwụkwọ ahụ ọzọ dị ka mbipụta nke abụọ, nke emelitere afọ iri na otu ka e mesịrị

N'otu édémédé dị íchè a kpọrọ, 'The Buildings of Charleston,' Vlach mechara dee banyere ọrụ Simmons, 'Na mbido ọrụ ya ọ natara iwu; ugbu a ọ na-enye haN'etiti azụmahịa oge ya na ọbụna mgbe ọ na-echekwa ọdịdị akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Charleston, ọ ka bụ nwoke nke ya
Ọ chọtara ngosipụta onwé ya na óménàlà ọbọdọ
National Endowment for the Arts nyere Simmons National Heritage Fellowship na 1982
N'oge okwu nnabata ya n'ememe ahụ, nke Simmons nyere mgbè otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri gasịrị, Simmons kwuru, 'Ngwá ọrụ m bụ anvil
Echere m na ụfọdụ n'ime unu anụla m ka m na-akpọ
otu egwu na anvil, egwu ochie nke ónyé na-akpụ ihe
Enwere m obi ụtọ màkà ihe mgbochi ahụ, obi dị m ezigbo ụtọ
Anvil ahụ nyere m nri mgbè agụụ na-agụ m, anvil ahụ na-eyi m uwe mgbè m gba ọtọ
Akpụkpọ ụkwụ ahụ na-etinye akpụkpọ ụkwụ n'ụkwụ m'
Simmons si n'ụlọ ya kwaga Bishop Gadsden Retirement Community na Charleston n'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 2008
Ọ nwụrụ n'ebe ahụ na June 22, 2009, n'elekere itoolu nke ehihie mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu na asaá
Simmons bụ ónyé natara National Heritage Fellowship nkè 1982 nkè National Endowment for the Arts nyèrè, nke bụ nsọpụrụ kachasị elu nke gọọmentị United States na nka ọdịnala na ọdịnala
Mmekọrịta nke afọ ahụ bụ nke mbụ NEA nyere
N'ubochí irí àtó nà otu n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 1994, a nabatara ya na South Carolina Hall of Fame
Gọvanọ South Carolina David Beasley nyèrè Order of the Palmetto, nsọpụrụ kachasị elu nke steeti ahụ, na Simmons na 1998
E mechara nye ya ònyínyé Elizabeth O'Neill Verner Governor's Award maka 'Lifetime Achievement in the Arts' na Mee afọ 2001
Ndị omeiwu South Carolina kwanyeere ya ugwu màkà ọrụ ya
Philippa Hobbs bụ ónyé na-akọ akụkọ ihe méré eme nke South Africa, ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-anakọta ihe osise
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1955 ma gụọ akwụkwọ na St Andrew's School n'afọ 1972
Ọ gụrụ nka na Johannesburg College of Art tupu ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Arts (Philadelphia)

Ọ gàrà n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya site na Mahadum nke South Africa (UNISA) na Technikon Witwatersrand Hobbs bụ prọfesọ dị elu nke akụkọ ihe méré eme nke nka na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand na Johannesburg site na 1988 ruo 1993
A maara ya màkà enyemaka ya na nka (nke nwere ihe ngosi mbà na nke mbà ụwa), agụmakwụkwọ nka, nyocha na, n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, [mgbe?] mmepe ọbọdọ site na nka
Hobbs na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye na-ahụ màkà nchịkọta nka MTN na nka na ọdịbendị
A kpọrọ Hobbs ka ọ nye áká na ọrụ Images of Human Rights na 1996, nke gụnyere ndị na-ese ihe na-eme ihe ngosi nke akụkụ ọ bụla nke Bill of Rights nke South Africa
Akụkụ ahọpụtara nke Hobbs bụ Akụkụ nke asatọ Nnwere Onwé ikwu okwu, ébé osisi ya bụ 'Na-enweta site n'asụsụ' na-egosi nguzozi dị nro n'etiti ikike ikwu okwu na ihe ndị na-eso ya
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ nkè Hobbs gụnyere 'Dracunculus and Cat's Cradle, ihe e ji osisi dee na 1993, na Spiritus Candelabrae, ihe e sere osisi na agba abụọ e mepụtara na 1992
Hobbs gàrà klas na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe site na ụlọ ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ nke ya, Foot Print Studio
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere iji nye ọzụzụ ányà na nduzi obibi akwụkwọ màkà ndị na-amalite na ndị na-ese ihe dị elu

Hobbs sò Elizabeth Rankin bipụta Printmaking in a Transforming South Africa na 1997 (David Philip Publishers), nke na-atụle otú obibi akwụkwọ si 'gafee nkewa nke nka South Africa' ma kọwaa ihe ndị dị na nkà na ụzụ na ihe ngosi nke óbíbí akwụkwọ, ka ọ na-enyocha ọrụ ọ rụrụ dị ka ụdị nguzogide n'oge ọgụ nnwere onwé
Philippe Lacôte bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri si Côte d'Ivoire

A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 2014 bụ Run, nke bụ ihe nkiri a họpụtara maka Lumières Award maka Best French-Language Film na 20th Lumières Awards, na ihe nkiri ya na 2020 Night of the Kings (La Nuit des rois), nke bụ onye mmeri nke Amplify Voices Award na 2020 Toronto International Film Festival

A họpụtakwara ihe nkiri abụọ ahụ dị ka ihe Côte d'Ivoire nyere na Academy Awards maka Best International Feature Film Oscar, Run for the 88th Academy Awards na 2016 na Night of the Kings maka 93rd Academy Awards na 2021
N'afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu ndị ọka ikpe maka ngalaba asọmpi mba ụwa nke 74th Locarno Film Festival nke emere site n'ụbọchị nke anọ ruo ụbọchị nke ịrị na anọ nke ọnwa Ọgọst
Philippe Lando Rossignol, bụ onye na-edekọ egwu na onye na-eti egwu, na mba Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC)
Ọ bụbu onye otu soukous band TPOK Jazz, nke François Luambo Makiadi duziri, nke na-achịkwa egwu Congo site n'afọ 1950s ruo n'afọ 1980s
Rossignol bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere otu ahụ n'afọ 1956

Philippe Mory bụ onye Gabonese na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi, a mụrụ n'afọ 1935 wee nwụọ na 7 June afọ 2016 na Libreville, Gabon
A maara ya maka ime ihe nkiri The Cage, One Does Not Bury Sunday (1960) na iduzi Les tam-tams se sont tus (1972)
Philippe Mory malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'etiti afọ 1950 site na ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi Afrique-sur-Seine nke Paulin Soumanou Vieyra duziri
Ọ bụ onye isi ntụgharị nke ihe nkiri Michel Drach bụ Do not Bury Sunday, nke meriri Louis-Delluc Prize n'afọ 1959
Ọ laghachiri Gabon, ebe ọ bụ onye edemede na otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke The Cage nke Robert Darène duziri
E mepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ ma gbaa ya na Gabon ma họrọ ya maka Cannes Film Festival n'afọ 1963
A tụrụ ya mkpọrọ afọ atọ site n'afọ 1964 ruo afọ 1967 n'ihi òkè ọ sonyere na nnupụisi megide Leon Mba, onye isi ala mbụ nke Gabon
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya, o sonyere n'ịmepụta Pan African Federation of Filmmakers (FEPACI) n'afọ 1970
O tinyekwara aka na ntọala nke National Center of Gabonese Cinema (CENACI)
O meriri Golden Unicorn maka Career Achievement na Amiens International Film Festival n'afọ 2011

Phillipine Mtikitiki, bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na South Africa, onye bụ osote onye isi oche ngalaba South Africa nke Coca-Cola International, malite na 1 Jenụwarị 2021
Tupu nke ahụ, site na June 2019 ruo Disemba 2020, ọ bụ onye isi njikwa mpaghara na-ahụ maka ikike aha ụlọ ọrụ Coca-Cola na mpaghara East na Central Africa
Ọ dabeere na Nairobi, Kenya
A mụrụ Philippine n'otu obodo dị nso Mbombela, na Mpumalanga Province, South Africa, n'afọ 1970
N'oge a mụrụ ya, a maara Mbombela dị ka Nelspruit

A nabatara ya na University of KwaZulu Natal, ebe o nwetara nzere nke Bachelor of Business Administration
Ka e mesịrị, e nyekwara ya nzere Master of Business Administration site n'aka Henley Business School South Africa

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kpọgara ya site na usoro nlekọta kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ

Ọrụ ya dị iche iche ma jiri nwayọọ nwayọọ mụbaa
N'oge ọ nọ na Coca-Cola, ọ gụchara nzere Master of Business Administration
Tupu nhọpụta ya, Phillipine bụ osote onye isi oche nakea onye isi njikwa maka mpaghara East na Central Africa
Tupu nke ahụ, site na 2017 ruo 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Regional Franchise Manager of Coca-Cola Southern and East Africa Business Unit (SEABU), maka mba Botswana, Mozambique, Namibia, na Zambia
Na ngalaba South Africa, ọ nọchiri Luis Avellar onye ahọpụtara onye isi ọrụ na Latin America
Ọ dabeere na Johannesburg, na South Africa
Phillipine Mtikitiki bụ nne lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ atọ, sitere na afọ iri na asatọ wee ruo afọ atọ, dịka nke August 2018

Ọ pụtara na Oge 13 nke Shark Tank wee nata ego $200,000 n'aka Emma Grede, onye nchoputa Good America na Lori Greiner

Ọ na-esiri Akin ike ime mgbanwe n'ụzọ dị n'ime obodo Ọ na-arịọ ezinụlọ ka ha nye ya ndụdụ na ngaji ka oji rie nri 'olulo' ha na-achị ya ọchị, Ọ naghị enwe ike ịrahụ ụra na ndị ọzọ n'elu akwa ọ wee hie ụra na ihụ mpụta ụlọ

Mary gwara Akin ka ọ gwa Cynthia okwu n’aha ya n’ihi na o chere na Cynthia ga-ege ya ntị maka Cynthia dika ọ nabatara ya
Akin rịọkwara Mary ka ọ gaa mme mme ụlọ ọrụ n'aha ya
Ọ gwara ya na naanị ihe ọ ga-eme bụ inye onyeisi oche ozi dị na kaadị ebe nchekwa ekwentị ya
Akin na-agwa Cynthia okwu, ọ kweere ịkpa àgwà n'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị na nzukọ ezinụlọ na ịmalite ịkpa àgwà ọma n'ụlọ iji chekwaa ọdịnihu nke ụmụ ya
Na nzụkọ ahụ ọ gbuuru ikpere n'ala nye ndị okenye ma rịọ onye ọ bụla n'ihi na ọ nọ na ọnọdụ uche ma mechaa bewe ákwá
Mary na-akwado maka oriri nke Kike haziri na-egosi na o nweghị ihe ọ ga-eyi, ya mere o kpebiri ịkwa ákwà Alexis nyere ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ
N'ụzọ dị mwute, ọ na-ezute onye nwe uwe ahụ na nnọkọ ahụ; na nchegbu ya ịgbapụ, ọ dabara n'ọdọ mmiri
O mechara kwe onye ahịa ahụ nkwa ịme uwe ọzọ maka onye ahịa n'okpuru ahịrị uwe ya
Akin na Mary malitere ịkpọ ibe ha ugboro ugboro
N'oge a na-akpọ na ekwentị, Mary gwara Akin banyere Gina na-akpọ ya na-ebo ya ebubo na ọ napụrụ enyi ya nwoke
Akin zara site n'ịsị 'Ọ ga-amasị gị ịbụ?' ma ha abụọ bịaruru nso site n'oge ahụ
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ nke mmemme ụlọ ọrụ, Mary matara onye isi oche ọhụrụ bụ Kike
Ọ gwara Mary na ya nwetara òkè ndị ahụ iji nweta uche Akin
Ọ na-añụkarị mmanya, nke ahụ mebiekwara ụlọ ya, nke ahụ bụ isi ihe mere Akin achọghị ka ya na ya nwee mmekọrịta ọzọ
Mary gwara ya na ozugbo Akin chọpụtara na ọ bụzi onyeisi oche, ọ ga-agba arụkwaghịm, ọ dụrụ ya ọdụ ka ọ kpọọ ya kama gwa ya okwu
Nne Akin gere ndụmọdụ ahụ wee kpọọ Akin

Akin chere na ọ bụ Mary wee gwa ya ka ọ ghara inye onyeisi oche ozi ahụ ọzọ - Ọ nụrụ olu nne ya wee nwaa ipiyu ekwentị, mana nne ya malitere ịrịọ mgbaghara maka ihe niile o mere, obi ruru ya ala ka nne ya malitere ito ya
Mary kpọrọ Alexis ka ọ gwa ya na uwe ahụ mebiri emebi wee gwa ya na ọ na-agba arụkwaghịm
Akin zutere Mary n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu Lagos
Ha abụọ na-amụmụ ọnụ ọchị ma nyeghachi ibe ha ekwentị ha
Akin na-enyere Mary aka iburu akpa ya wee lee ya ọmarịcha anya
Ha abụọ banyere n'ụgbọ ala Akin ka kredit na-apụta
Atụrụ ime Phone Swap bidoro mgbe obere oge sitere na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, bụ ndị na-ewere atụmatụ n'aha Samsung imepụta ihe nkiri ga-ebipụ afọ 15 ruo 45
Ndị mmadụ na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche webatara edemede iri, mana edemede Afolayan mechara merie asọmpi ahụ
N'agbanyeghị na Samsung mechara kwụsị ọrụ ahụ, Kunle Afolayan gara n'ihu ịrịọ ego n'aka ndị isi ndị ọzọ na-akwado ya n'ihi na ọ chọsiri ike imechi ọrụ ahụ
Afolayan kwenyere na n'agbanyeghị na ihe nkiri ahụ abụghị 'arty' dị ka The Figurine, ọ nwekwara ike ime nke ọma na igbe igbe n'ihi na ọ bụ ihe nkiri azụmahịa
Otú ọ dị, Afolayan kpebiri ịpụnarị ihe nkiri slapstick, bụ nke ghọrọ omenala maka ụdị ntọ ọchị na Nollywood

O kwukwara na nlegharị anya ndị nta akụkọ nke ihe nkiri ahụ na Legọs na nhọrọ nke ụdị egwuregwu na-atọ ọchị dabara n'ọkwa a na-achọ ime ka ụlọ ọrụ ya na-emepụta ihe dị iche iche; ihe nkiri abụọ gara aga sitere na Golden Effects Studios abụwo ihe na-akpali akpali, yabụ na Phone Swap bụ iji gosi na ụlọ ọrụ ya anaghị agba ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ otu ụzọ
Kemi Adesoye na Afolayan chepụtara echiche akụkọ maka ihe nkiri ahụ; na usoro edemede na-ewe ngụkọta oge nke afọ abụọ
Kunle Afolayan kwuru na ndị ọchụnta ego adịchaghị anabata atụmatụ azụmahịa ya
Otú ọ dị, ihe nkiri ahụ mesịrị nweta nkwado ego site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi dị ka Globacom na BlackBerry
A na-abịakwutekwa ụfọdụ ụdị ka ha sonye na mmepụta na ụfọdụ n'ime ha mere ntinye ngwaahịa
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị otú ahụ gụnyere Meelk Properties, IRS Airlines, Seven-up Bottling Company, Berrys' Couture, Honeywell Flour Mill na Maclean
Nke a nyere aka weta ego nke ihe nkiri ahụ site na iri atọ ruo iri anọ

Onye ndu nwoke, Akin weere na mbu maka Joseph Benjamin mana o mechara wetuo ya mgbe achọpụtara na nso nso a ka ejikọtara ya dị ka di na nwunye ya na onye ndú ihe nkiri Nse Etim bịanyere aka na ya maka Mr
na Mrs, ihe nkiri nke a na mmepụta n'oge ahụ ma wepụtakwa ya na March 2012
Akpọrọ Jim Iyke ka ọ rụọ ọrụ a mana ọ nọghị n'oge ahụ - agbapụ ụgbọ elu ikpeazụ na Abuja, ya mere Wale Ojo mechara bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ọhụrụ
Edere agwa nna Mary maka Sam loco Efe
Otú ọ dị, onye na-eme ihe nkiri nwụrụ na 7 August 2011 n'ihi ọrịa Asthma tupu e mee ihe nkiri na Chika Okpala bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ iji dochie onye omee ahụ nwụrụ anwụ
A kwanyere Sam Loco ugwu site n'ịrara ihe nkiri ahụ na ncheta ya na kredit mmeghe nke ihe nkiri ahụ

Ada Ameh, bụ onye Benue na Nse Ikpe Etim nke Akwa Ibom ga-amụ asụsụ Igbo nke Owerri ruo ọnwa isii tupu mmalite nke foto isi ka ọ dabara na mkpụrụedemede Cynthia na Mary; bụ ndị e gosiri na ha abụọ bụ ụmụafọ Owerri
Etim n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ Leadership nwere kwuru sị 'Abụghị m onye rookie ma a bịa n'asụsụ Igbo mana ruo mgbe a na- eme Phone Swap, ọ dịghị m mkpa ịsụ asụsụ Igbo dịka nwa afọ
M ga-ekweta na ọ siri m ike, n'ihi na aghaghị m ịmụta otu olumba
Enwere m obi ụtọ maka ahụmịhe ahụ, n'agbanyeghị
Asụsụ Igbo bụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ nke ukwuu, ọ na-atọkwa m ụtọ nke ukwuu na usoro mmụta ya'
Director, Afolayan, nwere nnukwu esemokwu ya na Globacom, gbasara ihe nkedo Hafeez Oyetoro na ihe nkiri ahụ
Ka ọ hụchara ndezi nke mbụ nke ihe nkiri ahụ, Mike Adenuga rịọrọ ka chụpụ Oyetoro n'ahịrị nkedo, na ihe nkiri ka agbawee ya na onye ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri
Nke a bụ n'ihi na Oyetoro bụ onye nnochite anya aha maka Etisalat Nigeria n'oge ahụ, bu isi asọmpi n'ahịa mgbasa ozi Naijiria
Otú ọ dị, Afolayan jụrụ, na nkwenye na ịhapụ Oyetoro 'ga-egbu' ihe nkiri ahụ
N'ihi nke a, Globacom wepụrụ ego ya na ihe nkiri ahụ ma emezigharịghị nkwekọrịta nnọchi anya Afolayan na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

Dị ka Afolayan si kwuo, ịse ihe nkiri a kacha sie ike bụ ịrụzi ime ụgbọ elu na ọdụ ụgbọ elu nke a esere n'awa iri abụọ na anọ n'enweghị nkwụsịtụ; Pat Nebo na ndị otu ya rụgharịrị ụlọ ụgbọ elu na studiyo
N'Eprel 2012, Golden Effects Pictures weputara ụda egwu mbụ nke Phone Swap maka nbudata dijitalụ
Ụda egwu Phone swap mejupụtara egwu atọ mbụ nke Truth deputara, Adekunle 'Nodash' Adejuyigbe na Oyinkansola, Truth mebere ya na Oyinkansola na egwu oge ochie nke Eze Sunny Adé wepụtara
Egwu na akara bụ Truth mere ya na iji ukwe na udu ọdịnala ndị Naijiria na-ejikarị maka akara ndabere ihe nkiri
Egwu ndị a gụnyere obere egwu, egwu na-ewelite ngwa ngwa na egwu ọdịnala, mana ewedara ya ka ọ bụrụ obere ihe na-akụ nwayọ nwayọ na mpaghara ụfọdụ
Otu n'ime egwu ' Fate ' bụ otu ọrụ mbụ sitere na onye na-emepụta egwu, Truth

A tọhapụrụ ụgbọala na-adọkpụ nke mbụ nke ekwentị Swap na 1 Disemba 2011 na nke abụọ a tọhapụrụ na 22 February 2012
E gosiputara ihe nkiri a n'ememme ihe nkiri dị iche iche tupu ya emechaa pụta na EXPO hall, Eko Hotels and suites, Lagos na 17 Maachị 2012
A tọhapụrụ ya na mba na 30 Maachị 2012, nwere ihe ngosi Ghana na 5 Eprel 2012 ma emesịa wepụta ya mba ụwa na 10 Nọvemba 2012
A tọhapụrụ ya n'ahịa ndị na-abụghị omenala dị ka Japan, Germany, India, Brazil na Athens
Ọ bụ ezie na ewepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na United Kingdom na 10 Nọvemba 2012, ọ megharịrị malite na 16 ruo 24 Maachị 2013
A zutere ihe nkiri ahụ na nyocha kachasị mma
Nollywood Reinvented toro osise ihe nkiri, ihe ọchị aghụghọ na ịhụnanya

Ọ bụ ezie na o kwuru na ihe nkiri ahụ gosipụtara ọnọdụ na-ezighị ezi, o nyere ọkwa 68% wee kwubie 'Otu ihe dị ukwuu banyere ihe nkiri ahụ bụ njikọ mmetụta uche ọ na-emepụta n'etiti ndị na-ekiri ya na 'di na nwunye', ndị na-ekiri na ndị na-agụ akụkọ n'otu n'otu, na agwa onye ọ bụla na ọ bụghị naanị Mary na Akin
Na njedebe nke ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ naghị adị gị ka ị hụla ihe nkiri ọzọ
Ọ nwere mmetụta na-adịgide adigide nke naanị ihe nkiri ole na ole nwere ike ịmepụta

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ihe nkiri ndị ahụ ga-eme ka ị na-alọghachi na ya site n'oge ruo n'oge' Augusta Okon nke akwụkwọ 9aija na ihe nkiri tokwara osise ihe nkiri, ojiji asụsụ, imepụta ihe, ndezi na ụda ụda mana ọ gbadara n'ala maka mgbasa ozi pụtara ìhè na ihe nkiri ahụ

O nyere ihe nkiri ahụ ọkwa nke 4 n'ime 5 kpakpando ise wee kwubie 'Phone Swap bụ ihe na-enweghị mgbagha bụ ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị na Nollywood, na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri n'oké osimiri nke dị iche na ọgụgụ isi, na nnukwu ọrụ ya na-eti mpako n'ikuku ma na-atụ aka na ya
Otu eziokwu… O welitere ụlọ ihe nkiri na Nollywood ọzọ!'

Kemi Filani toro osise ihe nkiri, ndezi, mmepe agwa, edemede na nkwado nke ihe nkiri ahụ; o kwubiri, 'Phone Swap jupụtara na oke ịchị ọchị ma na-egosi otú ndị na-atụghị anya na ndị mmadụ nwere ike ime mgbanwe n'ọnọdụ na ọnọdụ ndị a na-atụghị anya ya
Ọ bụ ihe na-atọ ọchị, ọ dị akọ, ọ na-ihe na emetụta obi na ihe ndị ọzọ
' Dami Elebe nke Connect Nigeria toro ntụzịaka na ịdepụta ihe nkiri ahụ wee sị 'Obi abụọ adịghị ya, nke a bụ ihe nkiri ị ji mpako gosi
Ọ bụ ihe nkiri mere nke ọma na anyị enweghị ike ichere maka mmekorita ọzọ site n'aka ha (ndị na-eme ihe nkiri) n'ọdịnihu'

Andrew Rice nke akwụkwọ akụkọ The New York Times kwuru, sị 'Kunle Afolayan chọrọ imenye gị ụjọ, ọ chọrọ ime gị obi ụtọ, ọ chọrọ ime ka ị chịa ọchị, mana nke kachasị, ọ ga-achọ ka ị kwụsịtụ ekweghị ekwe gị - na nkata ya, nke na-adịkarị n'elu, kamakwa banyere ihe ga-ekwe omume na Africa' Shari Bollers nke Afridiziak kwuru, 'Ekepụtara ihe odide niile iji mee ka ndị na-ege ntị nwee mmasị na ha na iso ha chịa ọchị
Site n'ịgbanwe asụsụ abụọ nke obodo na Bekee, ọ dị mfe ịgbaso
Ọ bụ ihe nkiri nke gụnyere mmadụ niile wee mee ka anyị nwee ọchị

Ma onye Naijiria ma ọ bụ na ọ bụghị, ị ga-ahụ ihe nkiri a na-atọ ọchị' Caitlin Pearson nke The Africa Channel kwuru, sị 'Ihe na-eme atụmatụ nke Phone Swap na- etinye aka bụ ihe ngosi sitere na ndị n'ime ihe nkiri ámá ámá, na ihe ngosi dị na sinima ya nke na-enye anyị ohere ịhụ Nigeria karịa ihe nkiri Nollywood ọ bụla nwere ike ịtụ anya ya
Francis McKay nke Flick Hunter nyere kpakpando 3 n'ime 4 ma kwubie 'Kunle Afolayan mere ihe nkiri a na-ekiri nke ọma nke nwere akụkọ ọma na ihe nkiri nke ndị omere abụọ nwere nkà duziri
Kemi Filani kwuru banyere ihe ngosi dị mma nke ụmụ nwanyị na ihe nkiri ahụ 'Ahụrụ m ụzọ e si egosipụta ụmụ nwanyị
Maka mgbanwe, ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria siri ike, mara ihe ma maa mma

Ọ bụ ezie na ndị inyom nọ na ihe nkiri a nwere ntụpọ, dị ka mmadụ ọ bụla ọzọ, e gosikwara na ha dị mma ma maa mma' Dami Elebe toro nkà ime ihe nkiri nke ndị isi abụọ ahụ na fim ahụ 'Nse Ikpe-Etim ruru ọrụ ihe nkiri a ofụma, ịkpọ okwu zuru oke na klas
Wale Ojo abụghị onye ndu Nollywood
Ọ bụghị nwa okorobịa na-ekpo ọkụ nke anyị na-achọkarị ilegide anya, kama ọ bụ ezigbo nwoke tozuru okè anyị na-achọkwa ịnụ

Ọ gbakọtara n'ọrụ ya nke ọma wee gosi na ọ bụghị otu ihe nkiri dị ịtụnanya kama ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke ga-adịru ndụ na Nollywood' Caitlin Pearson kwuru banyere nka nka nke Wale Ojo site n'ikwu, sị 'Ojo na-amasi n'ezie n'ichegharị ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'ịrụ ọrụ a, ma na-achịkwa àgwà ọjọọ nke Akin na mmetụta ọmịiko'
O tokwara agwa Hafiz Oyetoro mma site n'ikwu na 'ọrụ kacha na-atọ ọchị na nke na-atọ ụtọ bụ nke Hafiz Oyetoro bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ enyemaka Akin Alex
Àgwà Alex dị n'ezigbo nguzozi n'etiti ndị na-erubere isi na ndị na-adịghị mma bụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ ikiri'
Phone Swap nwere ihe ịga nke ọma nke ukwuu n'ụlọ ọrụ igbe
O tolitere chaatị ahụ n'izu mbụ nke ntọhapụ ya na Naijiria site na ị nweta ₦20,713,503, etipu ihe nkiri dị ka Wrath of the Titans na John carter
Ekwuru na nke a bụ n'ihi ọnụ ọgụgụ ngosi oge enyere na Phone Swap na-egosi ugboro 6 na ụbọchị na ulo ihe nkiri
A kọkwara na ihe nkiri ahụ nwere ọtụtụ nyocha maka ụlọ ọrụ na ụdị
Ọzọkwa, ihe nkiri ahụ nwetara nhọpụta na Africa Movie Academy Awards obere oge tupu ewepụtara ihe nkiri izugbe
O mechara nweta ihe nrite maka Achievement in Production Design

Ọ natara nhọpụta kachasị na 2012 Best of Nollywood Awards na nhọpụta iri wee nweta ihe nrite maka Best Production Set; Nse Ikpe Etim nwetakwara ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma n'ihe nkiri bekee

Phone Swap nwetakwara ọtụtụ nhọpụta na ọtụtụ mmeri na 2013 Nollywood Movies Awards na ngụkọta nke iri na abụọ nhọpụta wee nweta ihe nrite maka ihe nkiri kacha mma, Onye n'ime ihe nkiri kacha na-akwado ọrụ nke Hafeez Oyetoro, Onye n'ime ihe nkiri nwanyị kacha akwado ọrụ nke Ada Ameh, onye kacha ese ihe nkiri, Ihe onyonyo izizi izizi na ihe nkiri kacha elu nke afọ
A họpụtara ya maka ihe nrite asatọ na 2013 Golden Icons Academy Movie Awards, ebe Kunle Afolayan meriri ụdị onye isi kachasị mma
N'Ogustu 2012, a mara ọkwa na OHTV enwetala ikike TV maka Phone Swap
A tọhapụrụ ya na nyiwe VOD; gụnyere OHTV, Ibaka TV, na Demand Africa
E wepụtara ihe nkiri a na DVD na 15 Disemba 2014

G-Media na-ekesa DVD, na-egosipụtakwa ihe efu dị ka 'otu asi mee ihe nkiri' na 'Ime nke
