Phophi Constance Ramathuba (amụrụ n'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1973) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na dọkịta South Africa
Ọ bụ onye Limpopo MEC (Member of the Executive Council) maka ahụike na onye otu Limpopo Provincial Legislature kemgbe Mee 2015
Ramathuba bụ onye otu African National Congress
A mụrụ Ramathuba na 15 Ọgọstụ 1973 na Elim Hospital, Waterval ma too na Mashamba, mgbe ahụ akụkụ nke Transvaal Province nke South Africa
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ ise
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mbilwi Secondary School ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Sefako Makgatho Health Sciences University (nke a maara dị ka MEDUNSA), ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke ọgwụ na nzere bachelụ nke ịwa ahụ
Site na Mahadum Pretoria, ọ nwetara nzere masta na ọgwụ ọgwụ
Ramathuba emezuru ọmụmụ ihe gbasara ahụike na idu ndú azụmaahịa
Ramathuba malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Mokopane
Tupu a họpụta ya na gọọmentị mpaghara Limpopo, ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ ọgwụ Voortrekker na onye isi oche nke SA Medical Association
Ramathuba bụ onye otu African National Congress ogologo oge
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu kọmitii na-ahụ maka mpaghara nke pati ahụ
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2015, a ṅụrụ Ramathuba iyi dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Limpopo Provincial, na-anọchite anya ANC
N'otu ụbọchị ahụ, onye isi ala Stanley Mathabatha họpụtara ya dịka onye otu Executive Council for Health, na-anọchi Maaria Ishmael Kgetjepe
Mgbanwe ndị ahụ malitere ozugbo
A họpụtara Ramathuba ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mpaghara na ntuli aka mpaghara Limpopo nke 2019 nke e mere na 8 Mee
Na 22 Mee 2019, Mathabatha kwupụtara na ọ ga-anọgide dị ka MEC Ahụike
Na Jenụwarị 2022, a katọrọ Ramathuba maka ịgwa ụmụ akwụkwọ nwanyị nọ na Gwenane Secondary School na Sekgakgapeng ka ha 'meghe akwụkwọ gị ma mechie ụkwụ gị'
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2022 okwu Ramathuba gwara onye ọrịa Zimbabwe nọ n'àkwà na Bela-Bela, gbasara
Na vidiyo ahụ, ọ boro ndị mba ọzọ ebubo na ha na-eji ihe onwunwe gọọmentị e kenyere ndị mba South Africa eme ihe n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi na-ekwu, sị 'A na-egbu usoro ahụike m'
Mgbe unu na-arịa ọrịa, ị gafere Osimiri Limpopo, enwere MEC n'ebe ahụ nke na-elekọta ngalaba ọrụ ebere
Ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka EFF MP Mbuyiseni Ndlozi na Mmusi Maimane katọrọ Ramathuba maka imenye onye ọrịa ihere ma kpọọ ka a kagbuo ikikere ahụike ya
Ramathuba nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2020, Mathabatha kwupụtara na Ramathuba nwere COVID-19
Phosca Nekesa Kasisi (ka amụrụ n'afọ 1993) bụ nwanyị Kenya na-egwu volleyball nke na-agbara Kenya Commercial Bank bọọlụ
Ọ nọ na otu egwuregwu volleyball nke ụmụ nwanyị Kenya dị ka onye isi nke ndị otu volleyball n'ụsọ osimiri na 2020 Summer Olympics na Tokyo
Kenya enwetụbeghị ndị otu volleyball n'ụsọ osimiri na Olimpik
A mụrụ Kasisi na 1993 na Nairobi
Kasisi ghọrọ onye isi ndị otu volleyball n'ụsọ osimiri
Ndị otu ahụ nwetara nzere Kenya maka asọmpi Olimpik nke afọ 2020 na Kasisi, Brackcides Agala, Yvonne Wavinya na Gaudencia Makokha
Ha ruru eru mgbe ha meriri na African Continental Cup Finals na Morocco na 2021
Ya na Wavinga meriri Tochukwu Nnoruga na Albertina Francis 2-0 ebe Agala na Makokha meriri Francisca Ikhiede na Amara Uchechukwu 2–1
Ndị na-agba volleyball n'ụsọ osimiri nke Kenya nọ na ndị mmeri anọ nke Continental Cup na Argentina, Cuba na China (ndị nwetarala nzere Olympic)
Kenya enwetụbeghị ndị otu volleyball n'ụsọ osimiri na Olimpik
Ndị egwuregwu anọ ruru eru ga-abụ ndị otu egwuregwu volleyball nke Kenya nke onye nkuzi Sammy Mulinge họpụtara
Phumeza Theodora Mpushe bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye bụ onye African National Congress Member nke National Assembly of South Africa kemgbe August 2020
Ọ bụbu onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Eastern Cape Provincial Legislature
A họpụtara Mpushe ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Eastern Cape Provincial na ntuli aka mpaghara 2014 dị ka onye otu African National Congress
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke kọmitii ọrụ ọha na eze
Mpushe bụ onye nke iri abụọ na ndepụta ANC nke ndị omeiwu si Eastern Cape maka ntuli aka 2019 O nwetaghị oche na ntuli aka ahụ, n'ihi arụmọrụ ntuli aka nke ANC na Eastern Cape
Mgbe ọnwụ nke Eastern ANC MP Zamuxolo Peter na July 2020, ANC họọrọ Mpushe ka ọ nọrọ n'oche ya na National Assembly
A ṅụrụ ya iyi na 14 Ọgọst 2020
Kemgbe ọ ghọrọ onye omeiwu, Mpushe jere ozi na Kọmitii Portfolio na Tourism na Standing Committee on Auditor General
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Phumzile Khanyile (amụrụ n'afọ 1991) bụ onye na-ese foto na South Africa, bi na Johannesburg
Usoro Plastic Crowns ya bụ màkà ihe banyere ndụ ụmụ nwanyị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mmekọahụ

E gosipụtara usoro ahụ n'ihe ngosi otu na Palace of the Dukes of Cadaval na Evora, Portugal; Iziko South African National Gallery n'ime Cape Town; na National Gallery of Victoria na Melbourne, Australia; ọ bụkwa onye mmeri nke CAP Prize for Contemporary African Photography
A mụrụ Khanyile na Tladi, Soweto, South Africa
Ọ gụrụ foto na Market Photo Workshop site n'afọ 2013
Plastic Crowns bụ usoro foto onwe onye ógè ọ na-eyi uwe nne nne ya, onye ya na ya bi
Usoro a na-emetụta ahụmịhe nwanyị nke mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị, n'ihe banyere ike

Ọ bụ 'nnyocha nke ihere, na iwepụ atụmanya Khanyile ketara n'aka nne nne ya màkà ihe ọ pụtara ịbụ nwanyị' echiche echiche banyere okike, mmasị mmekọahụ na ihe ndị metụtara ya na mkpa ha dị na ọha mmadụ nke oge a'
Ọ na-eji ihe mara mma, 'dị ka a ga-asị na ha sitere na akwụkwọ akụkọ onwe onye', 'na-enweghị isi na nke na-adịghị elekwasị anya [
] dị ka ihe sitere na foto album ezinụlọ dị ka ihe mara mma nke foto ndị Japan na-esote agha'
Plastic Crowns bịara site na Khanyile na-etinye oge dị ukwuu n'ime ụlọ, ebe ọ 'na-atụ egwu ịhapụ ụlọ ya ebe ọ bụ na a wakporo ya n'okporo ámá'
Khanyile na Nkosinathi Khumalo na-eduzi oghere ọrụ Johannesburg Zulu Republik
Mlambo-Ngcuka jere ozi dị ka osote onye isi ala South Africa site na 2005 ruo 2008, dị ka nwanyị mbụ ji ọkwa ya na n'oge ahụ nwanyị kachasị elu na akụkọ ihe mere eme South Africa
N'ime oge ya dị ka osote onye isi ala South Africa, ọ na-ahụ maka mmemme iji luso ịda ogbenye ọgụ na ịhụ na ndị ogbenye na-erite uru na uru nke akụ na ụba na-eto eto
Phuthi bụ asụsụ Nguni Bantu a na-asụ n'ebe ndịda Lesotho na mpaghara ndị dị na South Africa dị n'akụkụ otu ókèala ahụ
Onye ikwu kacha nso nke Phuthi bụ Swati (ma ọ bụ Siswati), nke a na-asụ na Eswatini na mpaghara Mpumalanga nke South Africa
Ọ bụ ezie na enweghị mmekọrịta mmekọrịta ọha na eze ma ọ bụ nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Phuthi bụ akụkụ asụsụ nke asụsụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na Swati

Asụsụ Sesotho na Xhosa gbara ya gburugburu na-emetụta Phuthi nke ukwuu, mana ọ na-ejigide isi okwu na ụtọ asụsụ dị iche iche a na-adịghị ahụ na Xhosa ma ọ bụ Sesotho, ma chọta naanị akụkụ na Swati n'ebe ugwu
Enwere ike ị nweta akwụkwọ akụkọ sitere na Phuthi na Bourquin (1927), mana na ntụaka ndị ọzọ oblique karịa 100 afọ site ugbu a (Ellenberger 1912)
Ruo n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, edekọbeghị asụsụ a nke ọma gbasara njirimara asụsụ ya
Naanị ihe ọmụmụ dị ịrịba ama na mbụ (mana nwere data na-enweghị isi, yana echiche asụsụ nwere oke) bụ Godfrey Mzamane (1949)
E mere atụmatụ na ihe dị ka mmadụ 20,000 na South Africa na Lesotho na-eji Phuthi dị ka asụsụ ha, mana ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ nwere ike ịdị elu karịa
Enweghị data ọnụ ọgụgụ banyere ndị na-asụ Phuthi sitere na South Africa ma ọ bụ Lesotho
Asụsụ ahụ nọ n'ihe ize ndụ n'ezie

A na-asụ Phuthi n'ọtụtụ (ma eleghị anya ọtụtụ) nke obodo ndị gbasasịrị n'ókè dị n'etiti ebe ugwu Eastern Cape zutere Lesotho site na Herschel n'ebe ugwu na n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ, na mpaghara Matatiele nke ugwu ọwụwa Anyanwụ Transkei; na n'ofe ndịda Lesotho, site na Quthing na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ, site na mpaghara ndịda anyanwụ nke Ugwu Moorosi, ruo n'obodo ugwu ugwu nke Qacha (Qacha's Nek)
N'ime Phuthi, enwere ma ọ dịkarịa ala mpaghara asụsụ abụọ, dabere na njirimara asụsụ Mpapa / Daliwe vs
mpaghara ndị ọzọ niile
Nchịkọta a dabere na otu (ma ọ dị oke mkpa) akara ụdaume (ọnụnọ / enweghị egbugbere ọnụ nke abụọ)

Mpapa na Daliwe (Sesotho Taleoe [taliwe]) bụ obodo nta dị na ndịda Lesotho, n'ebe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ugwu Moorosi, n'okporo ụzọ ájá na-eduga na Tosing, wee gaa Mafura (n'onwe ya obodo na-asụ Phuthi), na n'ikpeazụ Mpapa / Daliwe

Ebe ndị ọzọ na-asụ asụsụ Phuthi (nke niile e nyere na orthography Sesotho) gụnyere Makoloane [makolwani] na Mosuoe [musuwe], nso Quthing, na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Lesotho; Seqoto [sińɔtɔ] (Xhosa Zingxondo, Phuthi Sigxodo [siɡńɔdɔ]); Makoae [makwai] (Phuthi Magwayi) n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ; na ọtụtụ obodo nta n'ebe ugwu na ọdịda anyanwụ nke Qacha's Nek
(Qacha bụ isi obodo ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ na Lesotho, na Qacha's Nek District)

Ebe ndị na-asụ asụsụ Phuthi (ya bụ, ihe nketa) gụnyere obodo Transkei dị n'ebe ugwu nke Gcina [g /ina] (n'okporo ụzọ na-aga n'ókè Tele Bridge) na Mfingci [mfiŋ / i] (n'ofe Osimiri Tele, n'ihu Sigxodo, ihe dịka)
Onye ndú Phuthi a ma ama n'akụkọ ihe mere eme bụ onye isi dị ike, Moorosi (amụrụ na 1795)

O yiri ka ihe dị ka ala ndịda nke Osimiri Orange na Lesotho nke oge a na-asụ asụsụ Phuthi n'oge onye kachasị ukwuu n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị Basotho, Moshoeshoe I ♡ naanị afọ asaa karịa ikike Moorosi ♡ na 1830s, Otú ọ dị, ọ bụghị ikpuchi mpaghara Lesotho nke ugbu a
Ruo 1820, e nwere naanị 'obodo nta ole na ole dịpụrụ adịpụ nke Basotho, na obere ezinụlọ nke Baphut[h]i, nke Moshoeshoe gosipụtara ọchịchị a na-akọwaghị nke ọma'
Ọtụtụ Phuthis, na Moorosi, nọ n'ebe ndịda Thaba Bosiu, n'ebe Ndịda Osimiri Orange, n'ụzọ Moshoeshoe
Moorosi ga-anwụ n'ọnọdụ a na-amaghị ama na Ugwu Moorosi (Sesotho Thaba Moorosi) na 1879, mgbe ndị Britain nọchibidoro ọnwa itoolu, Boer (ya bụ
Ndị ọrụ ugbo Afrikaner) na ndị agha Basotho (gụnyere ntinye aka agha nke Cape Mounted Riflemen)
A na-akpọkarị nnọchibido a 'Mgbaghara Moorosi'
Okwu nke kpatara nnọchibido ahụ bụ ebubo ohi anụ ụlọ na mpaghara Herschel
Mgbe nnọchibido ahụ gasịrị, ndị Phuthi gbasara n'ọtụtụ ebe n'ebe ndịda Lesotho na mpaghara Transkei nke dị n'ebe ugwu, iji gbanahụ mmeri nke ndị na-achị ala

Ọ bụ n'ihi nke a, a na-eche, na obodo nta Phuthi (gụnyere Mpapa, Daliwe, Hlaela, Mosifa na Mafurańall n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ugwu Moorosi, na Lesotho) na-ahụkarị na mpaghara ugwu dị otú ahụ, nke ndị si n'èzí nwere ike ịnweta naanị nnukwu isi ike)
[citation needed]
Mgbe nnọchibido nke 'nnupụisi Moorosi' gasịrị, e jidere ọtụtụ ndị Phuthi, ma manye ha iwu àkwà mmiri ahụ (ugbu a, àkwà ụgbọ mmiri ochie) na Aliwal North nke gafere Senqu (Orange River)
Tupu 1879, o yiri ka a na-ewere Moorosi n'ụzọ ụfọdụ dị ka onye na-asọmpi na-eyi egwu na Chief Moshoeshoe I
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-anọchite anya ya ugbu a na gọọmentị Lesotho na Maseru, mgbe nnupụisi nke 1879 gasịrị, ndị Phuthi na-apụ n'anya site na akụkọ mere eme nke Lesotho na Eastern Cape nke oge a
[citation needed]
Phuthi bụ asụsụ Bantu, n'ụzọ doro anya n'ime mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ S (cf
Guthrie 1967 na 1971)

Mana n'ime ndịda Afrịka, a na-ele Phuthi anya dị ka asụsụ Nguni ma ọ bụ asụsụ Sothozwana, n'ihi ọkwa dị elu nke ngwakọta gosipụtara na usoro niile nke ụtọ asụsụ (lexicon, phonetics, phonology, morphology, syntax)
[citation needed]
Mana Phuthi na-ejikọta ya na Zulu, Hlubi, Xhosa, ugwu na ndịda Ndebele, na Swati n'ezie asụsụ Nguni
Ya mere, a ga-agụnye ya na otu S40 n'ime mpaghara S, na-agbaso nhazi Guthrie

Ọzọkwa, n'inye ọnụọgụ nke okwu, ụdaolu na ọbụna mmetụta ụdaolu dị ala nke yiri ka ọ na-ekerịta fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ naanị Swati, enwere ike ịhazi Phuthi n'enweghị mgbagha dị ka asụsụ Tekela Nguni, ya bụ, na akụkụ nke Nguni nke gụnyere Swati, ụfọdụ nsụgharị nke Southern Ndebele, na asụsụ ndị fọdụrụ n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Cape, Bhaca na Hlubi
[citation needed]
Akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu nke oge a na ọdịdị nke Phuthi na-akwado nkwupụta ọkọlọtọ (dịka
Godfrey Mzamane 1949) na Phuthi na-egosipụta njikọ siri ike na mmetụta dị larịị site na ogologo oge ya na Sesotho (maka oge ma eleghị anya karịa narị afọ atọ)
Enwere, dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọkwa dị elu nke 'lexical doublets' maka ọtụtụ ihe, maka ọtụtụ ndị ọkà okwu, dịka -ciga 'iche echiche' (Nguni-isi iyi), na -nakana 'iche echiche' (Sesotho-isi iyi)
Ntinye aha klas Phuthi fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ụdị CV- (ya bụ, ha na-agbaso ọdịdị ụdaume Sesotho, ọ bụghị ọdịdị Nguni VCV- n'ozuzu)
[citation needed]
E nwere ụdaume abụọ superclose, nke a na-ahụkwa n'asụsụ Sesotho
Na orthography Phuthi, a na-egosi ha na circumflex diacritic, ya mere
Phuthi Mahanyele-Dabengwa, (amụrụ c
1971) bụ onye isi azụmaahịa South Africa na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Naspers South Africa
Ọ bụbu onye jibu ọkwa onye nhazi na onye isi ọrụ na Sigma Capital na CEO nke Shanduka Group

Mahanyele-Dabengwa gụnyere na akwụkwọ akụkọ Wall Street Journal nke 'Ụmụ nwanyị iri ise kacha elu n'ụwa ị ga-elekwasi anya na 2008', bụ ndị Africa Investors hutara dị ka 'Nwanyị Na-eduga n'Azụmaahịa' na 2012, wee kpọọ ya dị ka ForbesWoman Africa 'Nwanyị azụmahịa nke afọ' na 2014
Ihe nrite 'The All Africa Business Leaders Awards' (AABLA) kpọrọ ya “nwanyi azụmahịa' nke afọ 2019
A mụrụ Mahanyele-Dabengwa na Meadowlands, Soweto, South Africa
Nna ya, bụ onye nwụrụ na 2012, tolitere na ezinụlọ nke 'ụmụnne iri ma ọ bụ iri na otu' ma kwụọ ụgwọ akwụkwọ nke ya
Nne Mahanyele-Dabengwa nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa
N'ajụjụ ọnụ 2013, o kwuru maka ntinye aka nne na nna ya tinyere iji wee hụ na ya na nwanne ya nwanyị nwere agụmakwụkwọ kachasị mma na atụmanya na ọ ga-arụ ọrụ na mpaghara azụmahịa
Ka nne ya nwụsịrị n'oge ọ dị afọ iri anọ na abụọ, Mahanyele ekwuola na ọ bụụrụ ya ihe mmụta ka ọ ghara igbu oge ma ọ bụ were ya gwurie egwu
Ọ hapụrụ Johannesburg, South Africa mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa ịga Douglass College na Mahadum Rutgers na United States
Ọ gụsịrị wee nweta nzere bachelọ na Economics na 1993
Na 1996 ọ nwetara MBA na Mahadum De Montfort
N'afọ 2008, Mahanyele-Dabengwa gụchara Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Kennedy school of Government na Harvard University Executive Education program 'Global Leadership and Public Policy for the 21st Century'
Mahanyele-Dabengwa sonyeere Fieldstone Private Capital Group na New York City, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka itinye ego na mba ofesi ọkachamara na mmepe akụrụngwa
O mechara bụrụ osote onye isi ala na Fieldstone dị na New York, ma mesịa wega ya n'ụlọ ọrụ South Africa nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi Project Finance South Africa na Development Bank nke South Africa
N'ihe banyere nlọghachi ya na South Africa site n'ọrụ na-aga nke ọma na United States, nke ụfọdụ chere na ọ bụ ihe ọhụrụ, ọ sịrị 'olee ebe ọzọ n'ụwa ka ọ ga-abụ ihe ezi uche ka nwanyị ịsị ojii nọdụ?'
O sonyeere Shanduka Energy na 2004 dị ka onye isi njikwa wee bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Shanduka Group nke onye isi ala South Africa, Cyril Ramaphosa hiwere ma duzie ya
Na 2016, Mahanyele-Dabengwa gbara arụkwaghịm na Shanduka Group wee guzobe Sigma Capital
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2019, a họpụtara Mahanyele-Dabengwa onye isi oche nke Naspers South Africa, bụrụ onye isi ojii mbụ na nwanyị mbụ iji ọkwa ahu

N'afọ 2012, Mahanyele-Dabengwa gwara ndị ogbako ndị isi ụmụ nwanyị, na-ekwusi ike na ọrụ dị ukwuu maka ụmụ nwanyị na-azụ ahịa dị mkpa, ọ bụghị nanị iji dozie ikpe na-ezighị ezi nke ọha mmadụ ma, nke ka mkpa, n'ihi na e nwere 'ihe gbasara akụ na ụba na azụmahịa dị mkpa' iji mee ihe
nkà nke ụmụ nwanyị iji dozie nsogbu ndị ụwa na-eche ihu
Mahanyele-Dabengwa ka a họpụtara dịka onye ndu ntorobịa zuru ụwa ọnụ site na ọgbakọ World Economic Forum na 2007
Ọ na-etinye aka na atụmatụ 'Dignity Day' nke World Economic Forum, ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche maka Global Dignity for South Africa

Na US-Africa Summit Summit na Washington DC na 2014, Mahanyele-Dabengwa bụ nanị nwanyị Africa na panel maka 'Expanding Opportunities there The New Era For Business In Africa', onye bụbu onye isi ala US Bill Clinton kwadoro
Ọ bụ onye ntụzi aka nke Vodacom, Gold Fields na Discovery Indure
Ọ na-eje ozi na bọọdụ ndụmọdụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa nke Stellenbosch University, na ọ bụ onye na-akwado National Education Empowerment Trust (NEET)
Phylis Jepkemoi Bartoo bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kenya
Ọ bụ onye otu United Democratic Alliance party (UDA) na onye otu ndị omeiwu maka Moiben Constituency

Bartoo duru onye isi ngalaba nka nka na sayensi ọha na mahadum Egerton Ọ gara n'ihu n'agụmakwụkwọ ya na mahadum Kenyatta ebe ọ nwetara nzere BEdArts, na nzere masta na Medical Physiology Ọ gara mahadum Egerton Kenya, ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta MA na asụsụ na asụsụ Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na South Africa University of Witwatersrand ebe ọ nwetara PhD na linguistics Tupu aghọọ Ọkammụta Ọkammụta na linguistics, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke ngalaba nke akwụkwọ, asụsụ, na asụsụ Ọ bụbu onye prọfesọ na Mahadum Egerton kemgbe afọ iri na ise gara aga
N'oge a niile, o bipụtara ọtụtụ isiokwu na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọkà mmụta n'onwe ya na ndị ọzọ, yana ilekọta ọtụtụ ụmụ akwụkwọ postgraduate
Ọzọkwa, ọ na-eje ozi na bọọdụ nke Institute of Women and Gender, Egerton University Radio, Nakuru Town Campus, na CODESRIA
Phyllis Altman (25 Septemba 1919 – 18 Septemba 1999) bu otu na ime ndi ahia na onye na-akwado apartheid na South Africa
Altman bụ onye ọrụ South Africa Congress of Trade Unions (SACTU)
Ọ bụkwa onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke International Defense and Aid Fund (IDAF), na onye ode akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo
Phyllis Miriam Altman (née Sachs), bụ ada nke ndị Juu kwabatara na Lithuania Morris na Beile Sachs
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Jeppe maka ụmụ agbọghọ
Altman, dị ka ụmụ agbọghọ ndị ọzọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, na-akwa akwa 'maka ndị ogbenye ojii' na Thursday
Altman gara Mahadum Witwatersrand na mbinye ego sitere na Ngalaba Mmụta Transvaal nke kwuru na ọ na-akụzi mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ

N'oge ọ nọ na mahadum, o so na ihe ngosi ụmụ akwụkwọ na -eme mkpesa na ' Greyshirts na bulldozing nke Sophiatown' O nwetara akara ugo mmụta mahadum wee gụchaa nzere Honors na History tupu ọ nọrọ otu afọ na kọleji Ọzụzụ Ndị Nkụzi na Johannesburg

Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ịchụpụ ya na Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Ọzụzụ Ndị Nkụzi n'ihi mkpali ya, mana ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nọrọ afọ atọ nkuzi na 'ụlọ akwụkwọ ocha niile' Mgbe ọ kụzichara ihe, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka ndị agha na-emegide fascist Springbok Legion
Na Springbok Legion, o nyere aka na-akwado ndị bụbu ndị ọrụ agba, ebe ọ nwere ike ịhụ 'mmetụta jọgburu onwe nke usoro Apartheid na ụmụ nwoke Afrika'
Ruo afọ atọ, Altman na di ya bụ́ Ray Altman, bụ́ onye na-arụkọ ọrụ n’ịzụ ahịa South Africa, biri na London
Na 1952, o bipụtara Iwu nke Vultures
Akwụkwọ ahụ dabere na ahụmịhe ya na ndị agha Springbok na-arụkọ ọrụ
N’oge na-adịghị anya ka e bipụtasịrị ya na ezigbo nnabata ndị mba ụwa, otu prọfesọ na Mahadum Witwatersrand kpọrọ akwụkwọ ahụ “na-emebi iwu,” nke mere ka ọtụtụ ndị na-ere akwụkwọ weghachi akwụkwọ ahụ
Altman sonyeere South Africa Congress of Trade Unions (SACTU) na 1956 wee banye ngwa ngwa na nzukọ a
Altman bụ naanị onye ọrụ na-akwụ ụgwọ oge niile nke SACTU n'etiti afụ 1956 na 1963, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye enyemaka odeakwụkwọ ukwu
N'oge a, ọ nọgidere na-akpakọrịta na ndị otu South Afrika na òtù mba ụwa, ha abụọ
Nkesa ihe ọ na-ekesa na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọbá akwụkwọ na otu ndị ahịa na gburugburu ụwa nyere aka idobe ihe ndị bụ isi metụtara SACTU
Altman nọchitere anya SACTU na Congress nke anọ nke World Federation of Trade Unions (WFTU) na 1957
N'oge mkpochapụ gọọmentị na 1960, nke mere ka ndị mmadụ ghọọ 'ndị eji eji mberede,' Altman gbagara na Swaziland
A machibidoro ya na afọ 1964 n'okpuru Iwu Suppression of Communism nke gbochiri ya ịkụzi na ịrụ ọrụ na ndị otu
Ọ hapụrụ South Afrika na 1964
Altman ka na-enyere SACTU aka, na-arụ ọrụ na ndị ọzọ na London
Mgbe Solly Sachs hapụrụ International Defense and Aid Fund (IDAF) na 1967, John Collins goro Altman ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara nhazi
Altman bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke ihe a maara dịka Mmemme 1, bụ nke nyere aka na nzuzo nye ego maka ndị ọka iwu gbachitere na South Afrika
Ọ nọ na nzuzo nke ukwuu banyere usoro ahụ, na-eji koodu nzuzo na kọntaktị ya na usoro siri ike ịgbawa
Altman nwekwara ike mebie mgbalị South Afrika nledo Craig Williamson mere, ịbanye IDAF
Altman dezikwara akwụkwọ maka IDAF n'okpuru aha Akwụkwọ Kliptown
Collins nwụrụ na 1982, ma Altman nọrọ mgbe nke a gasịrị ogologo oge iji hụ na nhazigharị ahụ 'e guzosiri ike,' wee lara ezumike nká
Altman sokwa na mmemme gụrụ akwụkwọ 'Ndị ojii Rhodesian etinyere n'ogige' Ọkara nke ndị minista Robert Mugabe nwere ogo ha nwetara site n'enyemaka Altman
Ọrụ Altman na-arụ ọrụ na IDAF bịara mara mgbe a tọhapụrụ Nelson Mandela
Altman nwụrụ na 18 Septemba afọ na 1999 na London
Phyllis Wakiaga bụ onye ọka iwu Kenya na kwá onye isi ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ jere ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke otu ndị na- emepụta ihe na Kenya, kemgbe 2015
A mụrụ ya na Kenya, ihe dịka 1982
Ọ gụrụ iwu na Mahadum Nairobi, ebe ọ gụrụchara wéré nweta nzere bachelọ iwu na 2005
Emechara , otu mahadum ahụ nyere ya Master of Laws, isi na International Trade na Investment Law
O nwere diplọma abụọ; nke mbụ bụ diploma na iwu, nke sitere na Kenya School of Law, nke ọzọ bụ diploma na Human Resource Management, site na Kenya Institute of Human Resources Management
Nna ya ukwu nke nchịkwa azụmahịa, nwetara site na Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology
Ọ gụkwara akwụkwọ na Swedish Institute of Management, ọ bụkwa alumnus nke mmemme ha na 'Sustainable Business Leadership and Corporate Social Responsibility'
Na 2007, ọ bidoro ọrụ ya na Kenya Airways (KQ), dị ka 'onye isi mmekọrịta ndị azụmahịa', na-eje ozi n'ikike ahụ rụọ afọ atọ
A họpụtara ya onye nhazi ọchịchị na ihe gbasara ụlọ ọrụ na KQ
Mgbe e mesịrị ọ ghọrọ onye njikwa nke Government na Industry Affairs Division na ụgbọ elu
Na 2013, ọ hapụrụ KQ wee sonye Kenya Association of Manufacturers (KAM), dị ka onye isi nke amụma na-ahụ maka nyocha na nkwado
Na 2015, a họpụtara ya onye isi ọrụ na KAM
Ọ kọwara usoro ndu ya dị ka 'ngbanwe na ọnọdụ'
Ọ na-ekwusi ike màkà mmadụ ịbụ 'onye ọkpụkpọ otu', dị ka ihe dị mkpa mèrè ka ọchịchị yá gaa nkè ómá
Ọ sịrị, 'Ihe ịga nke ọma chọrọ mgbakọ ọnụ'
Phyllis Wakiaga, bụ nne lụgoro dí nwere ụmụ anọ
Ọ bụ onye okwukwe Adventist nke ụbọchị asaa, na ọ na-akuziri ụmụaka ọmụmụ Bible na nkuzi egwu n'ụlọ ụka ya
Ijeoma Josephina Otabor (amụrụ na 2 June 1997) nke a maara dị ka Phyna bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nlereanya, nwanyị na-eme ka mmadụ na onye na-eme TV
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke oge 7
Phyna si Edo State, mana a mụrụ ya na Lagos State
Ọ tolitere na Edo State ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Injinia na Auchi Polytechnic
Tupu ọ banye n'ụlọ Big Brother Naija, Phyna bụ onye na-ere ahịa, onye malitere ọrụ ya na kọleji ma ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe bịanyere aka na ya
Phyna banyere n'oge nke asaa nke Big Brother Naija (Level Up) dị ka onye nke iri na 23 Julaị 2022

N'oge ngwụcha oge nke ihe ngosi ahụ na 2 Ọktoba 2022, a mara ya dị ka onye mmeri na-enweta 4074% nke votu ikpeazụ n'ihu Bryann na 2674% nke ngụkọta vootu a tụbara ma nwee ikike inweta nnukwu ihe nrite nke Ō100 000 000 (otu narị nde naira), na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị nke abụọ meriri ihe ngosi ahụ, afọ atọ mgbe Mercy Eke meriri ya
Chibuzor Nelson Azubuike (amụrụ 9 Ọktoba 1986), a kacha mara amara dị ka Phyno, onye ala Naijiria bu onye ọbụ abụ, na onye na-edekọ ihe
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya dị ka onye na-emepụta egwu na 2003, ma ama maka rapping n'asụsụ Igbo
Album mbụ ya No Guts No Glory bu nke ewepụtara na 2014
Singles anọ kwadoro ya 'Ghost Mode', 'Man of the Year', 'Parcel' na 'O Set'
Phyno rụrụ ọrụ na nka dị ka Timaya, flavor, Ruggedman, mgbodo, J
Martins na Mr Raw
N’agbanyeghi na obu onye amuru na steeti Anambra, Chibuzor Nelson Azubuike amuru ma zulite ya na Enugu State
Aha ogbo ya, nke otu n'ime ndi enyi ya ulo akwukwo sekondiri nyere ya, sitere na okwu onu
Phyno zụlitere mmasị maka imepụta egwu n'oge ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
O buru ụzọ chọọ ịbụ onye ọkwọ ụgbọ mmiri, mana a gwara ya na ọ ga-abụ dọkịta
N'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị niile, ọ mụtara ịkpọ ụbọ na piano
Ọ mụtakwara ike ịhazi usoro nke ọ bụla ọ nụrụ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nchịkwa ọha na Institute of Management na Technology na Enugu, ma malite irite uru na egwu n'oge nke abụọ ya ebe ahụ
Phyno gwara Ifeoma Onoye na Mr Raw bụ otu n’ime mmadụ ole ọ lepụrụ anya
Phyno bidoro ịkụ mmiri na 2010 wee kwaga Lagos iji gaa n'ihu n'ọrụ ịkụ egwu ya
Phyno bidoro idekọ album studio mbụ ya akpọrọ No Guts No Glory na 2012
Ndekọ ahụ gosipụtara ngosi ndị ọbịa sitere na Stormrex, Omawumi, Olamide, Efa, P-Square, Timaya, Flavour N'abania, Mazi Raw, MI, Ice Prince na Runtown
Edere ya na mbu n'asụsụ Igbo na Pidgin nke ala Nigeria
Na 25 Septemba 2012, o wepụtara Olamide-aka 'Ghost Mode' dị ka onye na-eduzi album otu
Ọ meriri Best Collabo na ntanetị nke 2012 na Headies Awards na 2013 Nigeria Entertainment Awards
Muski video maka 'Mọ Mode' e wepụtara na 7 December 2012
Ọ bụ Clarence Peters gbara ya ma duzie ya na Lagos
Sputnet Records wepụtara nke abụọ album 'Man of the Year (Obago)' na 23 Mach 2013
Abụ ahụ meriri Best Rap Single na 2012 The Headies Awards
The music video maka 'Man of the Year (Obago)' e uploaded jidesie YouTube on 20 August 2013
Agbanyekwara na Clarence Peters gbara na Abakpa Nike gbagburu ya, ma gosipụta ngosipụta sitere na Illbliss
N’ọnwa Septemba afọ 2013, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Naịjirịa machibidoro ịgbanye vidiyo egwu ahụ
Nke atọ album 'Parcel' ahụ ewepụtara na 11 October 2013
Ebu ụzọ kpọọ ya 'Parcel (BIG Nwa)'
Egwu vidiyo maka 'Parcel' nke Clarence Peters gbara ma wepụta ya na 19 February 2014
E wepụtara 'O Set' dị ka album nke anọ na anọ na 4 Mach 2014
WizzyPro mepụtara abụ ahụ na ụda olu sitere na P-Square
Ejiri vidiyo egwu maka egwu ahụ bụ Jud Engees Okoye duziri ya
Na 22 Mee 2014, Phyno wepụtara vidiyo egwu maka 'Alobam', nke Clarence Peters duziri
Onye mepụtara Major Bangz, abụ a bụ slang ndị Igbo maka 'My Guy'
Na 2 Septemba 2014, Phyno wepụtara vidiyo maka abụ 'Authe (Authentic)' na Flavour
Na 7 Ọktọba 2014, o wepụrụ Major Bangz nke mepụtara 'Yayo'
Ọ depụtara na ọnụ ọgụgụ 8 na eserese Pulse Music Video

Egwu vidiyo nke Clarence Peters nyere maka abụ ana - amalite na 5 nke ọnwa Jenụwarị 2015 Opeoluwani Akintayo nke Daily Times nke Nigeria nyere vidiyo ahụ ọkwa 8 nke kpakpando iri nke 10, na-aja mma maka iji props
Phyno jikọrọ ọnụ na Olamide, akpọrọ 2 Ndị Eze, ka ahapụrụ na 1 Eprel 2015
Rappers umụ nwoke abụọ ahụ gara na mgbasa ozi na-elekọta mmadụ iji kwupụta atụmatụ maka ntọhapụ album ahụ
Na June 2013, Phyno rụrụ nkeji iri abụọ na ise na Owerri dịka akụkụ nke njem Star Music Trek
Ọ gara D'banj, Burna Boy, Chidinma, Vector, Pucado, Seyi Shay, Gosi Dem Camp, Kay Switch na Sean Tizzle dị ka ihe na-akwado ọrụ na 2013 Hennessy Artistry Club Tour
Ọ rụrụ na mbipụta nke 2014 Music Star Trek tour na Nsukka, Enugu State
Na Machị 2019, Phyno kwupụtara atụmatụ maka mwepụta nke album studio nke atọ Deal With It
Otu olulu abuo akwadoro ya 'Agu' na 'The Bag'
Ndekọ a gosipụtara ngosi ndị ọbịa sitere na Olamide, Falz, Davido, Don Jazzy, Zoro, Runtown na Teni
Ndi nnyocha na ihe gbasara
Ntụrụndụ na Naijeria họpụtakwara Phyno dika otu onye n'ime ndi na akụ egwu, n'ime mmadu iri ndi egwu ha kacha ada-ụda na ọgụ afọ iri (2010s)
Ọ gwara ndị Nigerian Tribune na ọ na rap na ala Igbo n'ihi na ọ na-akwanyere omenala ya n'anya ma na-ahụkwa onwe ya n'anya
Agbanyeghị na o raps na mbụ na ala Igbo, ọ jikọtara ntakịrị Pidgin Naịjirịa na egwu ya
Phyno kwenyere na usoro egwu na-eme ka ọ bụrụ enweghị oke
N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ Punch 2014, Phyno gọrọ agọ banyere akụkọ ituwa otu nwanyị aha ya bụ Rita Edmond ime

Ọ̀mụ̀ntụdị bu ihe nmuta eji a muzutara ihe chi kezutara na uwa
Obi nmetuta ya gbara mbara, ka o metuluelu nkpulu nke npedebe di ka electrons na subatomic particles nke ndi ozo we metulue ihe di ukwu ka kpakpando na galaxies na oba nbudebe
Ihe nchu na ọ̀mụ̀ntụdị bu i kedozue ihe nile nke chi kezutara na uwa na otu ama
Otu e site a mara ije nke anwa di na mathematics na echezute logic
Ka anyi nyote otu nke a Na ọ̀mụ̀ntụdị, e nwe ife a kporo electromagnetism
Onye jide magnet were nodu igwe nso, o ga nute force ga soro ya
O ga kwute kwaa ya nso, o ga nyoputa na force soro ya ga elite kwaa enu
O masiri Physicists i chotara otu ozuzu force soro igwe na magnet zuputara, ka o si bulu na ndi oge ochie chotara na(Maka Magnetism nkiti)
Otu equation nke a si putara bu na force F bu nke jikote igwe na magnet,
guzute oke turu igwe na B bu oke turu magnet
Ọmụ̀ntụdị kezutere na uzo onu ogugu ise nke ezughi ezu
nkezutere ya buru
Classical Mechanics buru otu ọ̀mụ̀ntụdị nke ezi ya bidoputara na oge ochie
Ndi ezigbo ukwu nwoke
kwachigara ya na nke nbido buru ndi otu Isaac Newton, William Rowan Hamilton, Joseph Lagrange na
ndi ozo, ma na ezigbote nna ya(nke classical mechanics) buru Issac Newton
Oo Nya nwa biguzutara
obi nzutara equations e ji a zutara classical mechanics
Otutu ihe n'ime classical mechanics di ka
Ihe soro ya bu na F bu force, m buru mass na v buru velocity
Nya buru na
Force na kwaga ihe soro acceleration
e so
Nke a buru nke bu Newtons 2nd law of motion na o bu kwa nkpuru Classical Mechanics
Ihe nile ha zugutara na classical mechanics kwesiri soro Iwu Newton nke abuo ma Oo bughi ezi ihe nsoro ya
E sitere na Iwu nke abuo, ti zubata ozuzu momentum buru
na ozuzu energy buru
, ha zuta ihe nile noro n'ime obi classical mechanics
Classical mechanics nwere ike nzugutara i zuguta otu ije kpapando na planets lue oke nke obele di ka ugbo ana na football, mana na oke nine putasi ya otu anwa, o zughi ezu
Statistical Mechanics buru ọ̀mụ̀ntụdị e ji a zugutara ngbakote ihe rikpo nne, luelu otu ha ga enwe ike i guzuta ya ka oburu ka o
Ebe t bu ogugu oge,T buru Temperature na E buru Energy
Na equation nke a ka iwu thermodynamics nke abuo(2nd law of thermodynamics) site were puta, ebe ya abuzughi oke equation agusozue statistical mechanics
Nke anwa buru
Nke ofu buru na T ga gbadata ma oburu na entropy a gbalite(ma obu na system gbachiri a gbachi)
Nke ibuo buru na entropy kwesiri i gbalite(ma obu na system gbachire a gbachi)
P buru Pressure, V buru volume,
buru chemical potential na N buru onu ogugu nkpuru ya(particle)
Obu na V na N no odu na ofu ebe, Nya ga buru na ife di oku na chokali i gbatute oyi, nke anwa buru Thermodynamics nke onye obuna masiri
Quantum Mechanics buru ezi nguzuchita nke soro ihe chi kezutara na uwa
Umunna zubiputara quantum mechanics soro na
ndi otu Albert Einstein, Max Planck, Niels Bohr, Erwin Schrodinger, Werner Heisenberg na ndi ozo
Isi mbiputa nke quantum mechanics noro na ihe gbasara izu blackbody radiation

Phytolacca dodecandra, nke a maara dị ka endod, gopo berry, ma ọ bụ African soapberry, bụ obere osisi ma ọ bụ onye na-arị ugwu nke sitere na Tropical Africa, Southern Africa, na Madagascar
Ọ bụ dioecious, na okooko osisi nwoke na nwanyị na osisi dị iche iche
N'ọdịdị, ọ na-agbanwe agbanwe nke ukwuu
Endod (dị ka a maara ya na Amharic ma ọ bụ shibti na Tigrigna) bụ nke ndị Afrịka ahọrọla ma zụlite kemgbe ọtụtụ narị afọ, ọkachasị na Etiopia na Eritrea
A na-eji ya eme ihe dị ka ncha na shampoo yana nsí iji mee ka azụ maa jijiji
Endod na-egbu egbu na snails - eziokwu nke ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị Etiopia chọpụtara - ma nwee ike ịchịkwa schistosomiasis

Mgbe Aklilu Lemma, onye ọkà mmụta sayensị Etiopia, gosipụtara ike endod nye ndị ọkà mmụta sayentị America, ha wepụtara patent, na-enwe olileanya ire endod dị ka njikwa ihe ndị dị ndụ maka Zebra mussel, ihe na-egbu egbu na Great Lakes nke US na Canada

Na Etiopia, a maara ụdị abụọ nke 'endod' (Phytolacca dodecandra) ka ha na-etolite, ọ bụ ezie na mgbọrọgwụ osisi ahụ bụ mgbọrọgwụ na-egbu egbu ma ọ bụrụ na a na-eri ya, ndị obodo ejirila akwụkwọ na mkpụrụ osisi ahụ mee ihe n'oge ochie na-asa ákwà
Ụdị abụọ bụ ụdị Arabe, nke nwere mkpụrụ osisi na-acha pinki na ọbara ọbara; na ụdị Ahiyo, nke nwere okooko osisi na-eji odo odo na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ
Ụdị Arabe nwere ọdịnaya saponin dị elu na ọrụ molluscicidal ka mma karịa ụdị Ahiyo (Lugt, 1977)
Ụdị ise nke 'endod' dị na Etiopia, mana ịdị irè nke saponins a hụrụ na mkpụrụ osisi anọ n'ime osisi ndị ahụ kacha mma mgbe ejiri ha mee ihe na ọnọdụ ọhụrụ ha
Otu osisi na-amị mkpụrụ osisi ndị dị irè ma ọ bụ na ha dị ọhụrụ ma ọ bụ kpọrọ nkụ ma na-ere ha n'ahịa ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ
A na-ebu ụzọ egwepịa akwụkwọ na mkpụrụ osisi endod ka ọ bụrụ ntụ tupu etinye ya n'ihe ịsa ákwà
Mgbe a gwakọtara ha na mmiri, ha na-emepụta lather bara ọgaranya
A na-eme ka ákwà ndị a na-asa n'ime ihe ngwọta ahụ dị nro ma na-esi ísì ụtọ
Piastre ma ọ bụ piaster (Bekee /piˈæstər/) bụ nke ọ bụla n'ime ọnụọgụ ego
Okwu a sitere na Ịtali maka 'efere metal dị mkpa'
Ndị ahịa Venetian nọ na Levant tinyere aha ahụ na Spanish na Hispanic American iberibe asatọ, ma ọ bụ pesos, na narị afọ nke 16
Ndị ahịa n'ọtụtụ akụkụ ụwa nabatara pesos ndị a, bụ́ ndị a na-egwute mgbe nile ruo ọtụtụ narị afọ

Mgbe mba ndị dị na Latin America nwetasịrị nnwere onwe, pesos nke Mexico malitere isi n'ụzọ azụmahịa na-abanye, wee bụrụ nke ọma na Far East, na-ewere ọnọdụ nke akụkụ Spanish nke asatọ nke ndị Spanish webatara na Manila, na site na ya
ndị Portuguese na Malacca
Mgbe ndị France na-achị Indochina, ha malitere iwepụta piastre Indochinese ọhụrụ (piastre de commerce), nke dabara na pesos Spanish na Mexico maara nke ọma
N'Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman, okwu piastre bụ aha mkparịta ụka Europe nke Kuruş
Mgbanwe ego na-aga n'ihu belatara uru nke piastre Ottoman site na ngwụcha narị afọ nke 19 ka ọ bụrụ ihe ruru penny abụọ (2d) sterling
N'ihi ya, aha piastre na-ezo aka n'ụdị mkpụrụ ego abụọ dị iche iche n'akụkụ abụọ dị iche nke ụwa, ha abụọ sitere na mpempe akwụkwọ asatọ nke Spain
N'ihi uru ndị dị ala nke piastres na Middle East, piastres ndị a ghọrọ ndị enyemaka maka Turkish, Cypriot, na Egyptian pound
Ka ọ dịgodị, na Indochina, piastre gara n'ihu n'ime afọ 1950 ma mesịa bụrụ riel, kip, na dong na Cambodia, Laos na Vietnam
A na-akpọ ego ụlọ akụ mbụ na mpaghara ndị na-asụ French na Canada na piastres, okwu ahụ gara n'ihu na-eji ya eme ihe ruo oge ụfọdụ dị ka okwu maka dollar Canada
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, nsụgharị French mbụ nke Iwu Iwu Canada nke 1867 na-ezo aka na ihe achọrọ na ndị omeiwu nwere ihe onwunwe d'une valeur de quatre mille piastres
A ka na-eji okwu ahụ eme ihe n'ụzọ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na Quebec, Acadian, Franco-Manitoban, na asụsụ Franco-Ontarian dị ka ihe na-ezo aka na dollar Canada, dịka ndị na-asụ Bekee na-ekwu 'bucks'
(Okwu French maka dollar Canada nke oge a bụ dollar) Mgbe ejiri okwu ahụ mee ihe n'ụzọ a, a na-akpọkarị okwu ahụ ma dee ya 'piasse' (pl
'piasses')
Ọ bụ otu ihe na 6 New France livres ma ọ bụ 120 sous, otu ụzọ n'ụzọ anọ nke bụ '30 sous', nke ka na-ejikwa slang eme ihe mgbe ọ na-ezo aka na 25 cents
Piastre bụkwa okwu French mbụ maka dollar United States, nke e ji mee ihe dịka ọmụmaatụ na ederede French nke Louisiana Purchase
Ịkpọ dollar US a piastre ka bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'etiti ndị na-asụ Cajun French na New England French
French nke oge a na-ejikwa dollar maka ego a
A ka na-eji okwu ahụ eme ihe dị ka slang maka dollar US na agwaetiti Caribbean na-asụ French, ọkachasị Haiti
Piastre bụ aha ọzọ maka kuruş, 1⁄100 nke lira Turkish
A ka na-eji piastre eme ihe na Mauritius mgbe a na-ere ahịa na ire ere, n'otu ụzọ ahụ a na-eji guineas eme ihe na ire ere ịnyịnya nke Britain
Ọ bụ otu ihe na 2 Mauritian rupees
A na-ezo aka na 'Piaster' na egwu Steely Dan Dr

With which are incorporated treatises on bullion and plate, counterfeit coins, specific gravity of precious metals, etc, with recent statistics of the production and coinage of gold and silver in the world, and sundry useful tables

Pienaar bụ aha nke nna Afrikaans a ma ama, nke sitere na French Pinard
Ndị Huguenot bi na na mba Dutch East India Company wetara ya South Africa na afo 1688
Ndị nne na nna nke ezinụlọ Pienaar bụ Jacques Pinard, ọkwá nkà si Eure-et-Loir, na Esther Foucher (onye amụrụ Suèvres, Orléanais)
Mgbe Esther nwụsịrị, Pinard mechara lụọ Marthe le Fèbre, onye obodo Paarl
ZJ (Sakkie) Pienaar chịkọtara usoro ọmụmụ dị ukwuu nke ezinụlọ Pienaar na mba South Africa, ma bipụta ya na nzuzo dị ka 'Die Pienaars in Suid-Afrika'
Christo Viljoen, onye nne ya bụ Pienaar, chịkọtara nsụgharị ọhụrụ nke usoro ọmụmụ Pienaar, dị ka 'Pienaar Familieregister' ma bipụta ya site na Huguenot Society nke South Africa
Ụfọdụ n'ime ụmụ nke ndị nna Pienaar gụnyere ndia
Pierra Makena (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 11 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1981) bụ onye Kenya na-egwu egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye TV
O ritere ihe nkiri kachasị mma maka ọrụ ya na When Love Comes Around na Nollywood na African Film Critics Awards kwa afọ na Los Angeles
A mụrụ Makena na 11 Eprel 1981 na Meru, Kenya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Chogoria Girls High School
Ọ gara n'ihu na Kenya Institute of Mass Communication ebe ọ gụrụ maka mmepụta redio
Ọ bụ ezie na Makena malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na TV nke Kenya n'afọ 2010
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ emume ma nweta ihe nrite
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri ndị o mere ka ọ nwee ọganihu n'ime ihe nkiri gụnyere Kisulisuli, Tausi, Tahidi High na Changes
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-edekọ akụkọ na onye nta akụkọ na onye na-emepụta ihe na KBC, onye mgbasa ozi mba Kenya
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye mgbasa ozi na Radio Waumini na YFM, ugbu a Hot 96
Ọrụ ya dịka onye na-egwu egwu malitere n'afọ 2010 mgbe ọ hapụrụ Scanad Kenya Limited iji nyere aka guzobe ụlọ ọrụ redio One Fm
Ugbu a, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Kenya kachasị achọ ma na-akwụ ụgwọ dị ukwuu
Ọ pụtago na mmemme mba ụwa na Burundi, Ghana, Nigeria na America
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ihe omume Park na Chill na ọtụtụ ụgbọala na Africa
Ọ bụ nne nke otu nwa
Pierre Bernard, Jr
bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe osise na onye na-eme ihe ọchị, nke a ma ama màkà ọrụ ya na Late Night na Conan O'Brien, The Tonight Show na Conan U'Brien
O nwèrè ihe osise a na-akpọ 'Pierre Bernard's Recliner of Rage', ebe ọ ga-eme mkpesa banyéré okwu ndị na-emetụta ya mgbè ọ nọ ọdụ n'ebe a na-ehi ụra
Okwu ndị ọ na-eme mkpesa banyéré ha na-abụkarị ihe omimi na ọdịdị ma na-emekarị akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị, anime, eserese ma ọ bụ akụkọ sayensị

Na mbido ọrụ ya, Bernard mèrè akwụkwọ édémédé na-atọ ọchị maka ndị isi na-ebipụta akwụkwọ, gụnyere Marvel Comics, DC Comics, Heavy Metal, Gold Key Comics, Playboy, Warren Publishing, na Blackthorne Publishing
Bernard rụrụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi na ahịa màkà ndị ahịa dị ka DFS Dorland Worldwide, McCaffrey & McCall, Inc, na magazin Newsweek na-eme akụkọ na ngosi comp
Na Prudential Securities, o mèrè broshuọ dị iche iche ma mesịa weghara magazin ha n'ụlọ
N'ime afọ iri na ise gárá aga, Bernard anọwo na-eme ihe osise màkà Late Night, yana ịme ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na ihe ngosi ahụ, gụnyere 'Pierre Bernard's Recliner of Rage'
Ọ bụ naanị Bernard n'onwe ya dere akụkụ ndị ahụ, na nyocha ụfọdụ site n'aka ónyé édémédé ibe ya bụ Brian Stack
Bernard bụ ónyé bi na Ewing Township, New Jersey
N'otu akụkụ, Bernard mèrè mkpesa na a kwụsịrị ụdị mkpịsị akwụkwọ ọ na-enwe mmasị na ya
N'akụkụ ọzọ, Pierre na-anakọta ụdị okpu karama Snapple maka ọrụ nka, naanị iji chọpụta na okpu ahụ agbanweela na imewe
Bernard mere mkpesa n'otu akụkụ banyéré ọnụ ọgụgụ na-arịwanye elu nke Robotech DVDs
Nke a kpaliri 'azịza' site na robotechcom banyéré mkpesa ahụ na onyinye iziga Bernard nchịkọta zuru ezu nke DVD n'efu
Akụkụ a na-ahụ Bernard na-eme mkpesa banyere ọnụ ọgụgụ omume Justice League Unlimited
Pierre apụtala n'oge ndị ọzọ na Late Night na Conan O'Brien, ma dị ka onwe ya ma na-eme ihe nkiri
O gosipụtara Whoopi Goldberg, onye X-Men jụrụ Velcroeto, na onye kwesiri ịbụ naanị onye isi ojii na-akwado John Mayer

Dị ka onwe ya, n'otu n'ime ngosipụta mbụ ya (ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị nke mbụ), ọ pụtara na eserese ebe Conan kpọọrọ ya, onye ọrụ ibe ya ọzọ, na onye mgbasa ozi Joel Godard na mmefu ego na New York City, na-agbaso aro na ịzụ ahịa bụ ihe kachasị mma mmadụ nwere ike ime iji nyere obodo ahụ aka ịgbake mgbe Septemba 11 gasịrị
N'akụkụ ọzọ, nke NBC's The More You Know segments, Bernard na-adụ ndị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ọdụ ka ha were onye na-eso ha n'ọrụ iji zere nchegbu nke ịchọta ụbọchị ịgba egwú
Otú ọ dị, ọ dọrọ aka ná ntị, tupu ya emebie ego ahụ, iji jide n'aka na o nweghị penis
N'ọhụụ ọzọ mbụ, a kpọpụtara Pierre iji kwado ọdịdị ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ NBC ma ọ bụ Rockefeller Center na-ekwu nraranye ya na ahụike
Pierre Brizon (16 Mee 1878 ruo 1 Ọgọst 1923) bụ onye nkuzi French, onye nnọchi anya mba, onye mba ụwa na onye na-eme udo
A wakporo ya n'ụzọ dị egwu na ndị nta akụkọ na ndị omeiwu maka ikwu okwu megide ọgụ n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ
A mụrụ Pierre Brizon n'ụbọchị 16 Mee n'afọ 1878 na Franchesse, Allier, n'ezinụlọ ogbenye na-arụ ọrụ ugbo
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ nwere onyinye, ma ruo eruo dị ka onye nkuzi, na-esi n'otu ọkwa nkuzi gaa na nke ọzọ na mbido ọrụ ya
Ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọkachamara nke mba, a họpụtara ya n'ọkwa na Armentières, ngalaba Nord
N'ebe ahụ, ọ sonyeere otu ndị Socialist
Ọ kwadoro ọgụ nke ndị ọrụ, ma dee isiokwu dị iche iche maka akwụkwọ ndị Socialist

N'afọ 1905, o dere iji too ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri nke agha Potemkin, ma nata akwụkwọ ozi sitere n'aka Bienvenu Martin, minista nke agụmakwụkwọ ọha na eze, na-abara ya mba maka o jighị asụsụ echekwara nke ndị ọrụ ọha na eze chọrọ, ọkachasị nke ndị nkuzi
N'oge a, o dekwara akụkọ ihe mere eme dị ogologo nke ọrụ
Ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi na ụlọ akwụkwọ mmepụta ihe nke Rennes
Na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 1906 ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa na Grenoble na ikpo okwu nke Socialist Party (SFIO, Section Française de l'Internationale Ouvrière)
A họpụtabeghị ya, ikekwe n'ihi na o nweghị njikọ na mpaghara ahụ
N'afọ 1907, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye kansụl na mpaghara Bourbon-l'Archambault, Allier
O mechara bụrụ onye isi obodo nke obodo ya
A họpụtara Brizon ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya mba maka Allier n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1910 na ikpo okwu nke ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ chọrọ ụgwọ ezumike nká maka ndị ọrụ, mba nke mkpuchi, ebe a na-egwupụta ihe, ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè na ụtụ isi na-aga n'ihu
A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'afọ 1914
A maara ya maka ịgbachitere ikike nke ndị ọrụ ugbo na-akwụ ụgwọ
Mgbe Agha Ụwa Mbụ tiwapụrụ (July 1914 - November 1918) Brizon sonyeere union sacrée nke ndị otu ya kwetara imekọ ihe ọnụ na gọọmentị, dị ka ndị otu Socialist niile
O mechara megide union sacrée, wee sonye na pacifist Committee pour la reprise des relations internationales (Komiti maka iweghachi mmekọrịta mba ụwa)
A haziri nzukọ mba ụwa na Kienthal na Switzerland maka ngwụcha Eprel n'afọ 1916, ihe na-esote Nzukọ Zimmerwald nke afọ 1915

A na-atụ anya na ndị isi Confédération générale du travail (CGT, General Confederation of Labor) Alphonse Merrheim, Albert Bourderon na Marie Mayoux ga-anọchite anya mba France, mana a jụrụ ha paspọtụ ha chọrọ iji gaa njem
Ndị nnọchiteanya atọ sitere na SFIO nke Alexandre Blanc duziri nwere ike ịga dị ka ndị nnọchiteanya nwere nnwere onwe ndị omeiwu
Brizon na Jean Raffin-Dugens sonyeere Blanc
Ha atọ bụ ndị nkuzi site na ọrụ
Na nzukọ ahụ, Brizon agaghị anabata na ebumnuche kwesịrị ịbụ ịmepụta nke atọ International
O kwuru na ihe dị mkpa bụ ịmanye International Socialist Bureau ka ha rụọ ọrụ maka udo
Mgbe ha si Switzerland lọta, ndị nnọchi anya atọ ahụ bụ ndị a na-elekwasị anya na mkpọsa mgbasa ozi na-eme ihe ike nke a na-ebo ha ebubo na ha bụ ndị mmeri, ndị sabo na ndị nledo
Ndị isi nke otu Socialist jụrụ ha
Na 24 Juun n'afọ 1916 Brizon, Blanc na Raffins-Dugens jụrụ ịtụ vootu maka ego agha
N'okwu ya n'oge ahụ, Brizon kwanyere 'ndị nwere obi ike ole na ole nke ndị Socialist Germany ùgwù'
O kwuru na ya na ha nọgidere na-ekwesị ntụkwasị obi na mkpebi ochie nke ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba ụwa, na ọ bụrụ na agha tiwapụrụ ọ bụ ọrụ nke ndị ọrụ ịnwa ịkwụsị ya ngwa ngwa
N'ihi mmegide ya megide agha ahụ, a kwụsịtụrụ Brizon na ndị omeiwu n'afọ 1916
Mgbe ọ laghachiri n'oche ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya, ọ kwụsiri ike n'ọkwa ya ma rịọ maka ntuli aka nzuzo na okwu agha ma ọ bụ udo
Ọ rịọkwara ka e nyochaa ọnọdụ gọọmentị were banyere iziga ndị nnọchiteanya na Nzukọ Zimmerwald nke Atọ, nke e mere n'afọ 1917 na Stockholm

N'ọnwa Febụwarị 1917, Kọmitii maka Nweghachi nke Mmekọrịta Mba Nile kewara, na Brizon, Raffin-Dugens na Bourderon sonyeere ndị SFIO ole na ole nke Jean Longuet duziri, ebe ndị Socialist Fernand Loriot, Charles Rappoport, Louise Saumoneau na François Mayoux weghaara kọmitii ahụ
Merrheim lara ezumike nká iji lekwasị anya n'ọrụ ndị otu
Brizon malitere onye na-ahụ maka udo La Vague (The Wave) na Jenụwarị 1918
Ọ hapụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ a, mana o mechara bipụta Bloc des rouges (Red bloc)
A họpụtaghị Bizon ọzọ na ntuli aka mba nke 16 Nọvemba 1919, ebe ọ gbara ọsọ dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'ọnwa na-esote, ọ gbara ọsọ maka ntuli aka dịka onye isi obodo Franchesse, Allier, mana ọ meriri ọzọ
Ọ sonyeere French Communist Party mgbe e guzobere ya na Disemba 1920 na Tours Congress, mana a chụpụrụ ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1922
A na-ebo ya ebubo na ọ bụ 'onye na-emebi ihe n'aka nri'

N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1922, ya na ndị ọzọ na-emegide ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kọmunist na-enupụ isi megide Moscow guzobere Union fédérative socialiste (Federal Socialist Union)
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu Central Committee na Political Committee
Brizon nwụrụ na Paris na 1 August 1923
Ọ dị afọ iri anọ na ise

Pierre Cérésole (17 Ọgọst 1879 - 23 Ọktoba 1945) bụ onye na-ahụ maka udo na onye injinia na mba Switzerland, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka onye malitere ogige ọrụ na onye guzobere otu udo Service Civil International (SCI)
A mụrụ Pierre Cérésole na Lausanne n'ụbọchị 17 Ọgọọst 1879, nwa Paul Cérésole, onye otu Swiss Federal Council na onye isi oche nke Swiss Confederation
Ọ gụrụ injinia
Site n'afọ 1910 gaa n'ihu ọ gara ogologo njem ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka injinia na United States na Japan
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1914, ọ laghachiri Switzerland n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ malitere
O kpebiri ịbụ Onye Kraịst na-ajụ ịjụ n'ihi akọ na uche ma na-emegide ụdị ọrụ niile ma ọ bụ imekọ ihe ọnụ na ndị agha
Dị ka onye na-eme udo, n'afọ 1917 ọ jụrụ ịkwụ ụtụ isi e ji nweta ngwá agha
Ọ nọrọ oge n'ụlọ mkpọrọ n'ihi nke ahụ
N'afọ 1919, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ya dị ka injinia ma nyefee ndụ ya n'ịgba mbọ udo

O sonyere na Nzukọ Bilthoven nke ndị na-eme udo mgbe Agha Ụwa Mbụ gasịrị na n'oge nzukọ nke abụọ, o kpebiri ịmalite ọrụ ebe ndị mmadụ si mba Europe dị iche iche ga-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji wughachi obodo Esnes-en-Argonne na France, nke e bibiri n'oge agha ahụ
A na-ewere ọrụ a n'afọ 1920 dị ka ogige ọrụ mbụ ma bụrụ onye na-akpali ọrụ afọ ofufo nke mba ụwa

Ya na nwanne ya nwoke Ernest na ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo ndị ọzọ guzobere nzukọ Service Civil Organisation ma hazie ọtụtụ ọrụ afọ ofupo ọzọ n'afọ ndị na-abịanụ, karịsịa dị ka enyemaka enyemaka mgbe ọdachi ndị na-emere onwe ha gasịrị, dịka na Liechtenstein, Switzerland na France
N'afọ 1931, Ceresole zutere Mahatma Gandhi na Lausanne, mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ Romain Rolland na Geneva mgbe ọ sonyere na Nzukọ Round Table na London
Ceresole sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke echiche Gandhi, mana ọ kwenyeghị na akụkụ nke usoro ya na-adịghị arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ
Ọ bụ ezie na ha kwetara ịjụ ịkwado ọrụ agha ọ bụla site na gọọmentị ọ bụla, Ceresole dị njikere iso gọọmentị rụkọọ ọrụ n'agbanyeghị echiche ha n'ihe ndị ọzọ
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 1933, Ceresole gafere ókèala dị n'etiti Switzerland na Germany iji zute Adolf Hitler iji jụọ maka ọnọdụ dị na Germany, ọ bụ ezie na nzukọ ahụ emeghị
Site n'afọ 1934 n'afọ 1937, Cérésole na ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo atọ ndị ọzọ na Europe na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ịrụzigharị akụrụngwa na Bihar na India mgbe ala ọma jijiji mere na Nepal n'afọ 1934 gasịrị
Na India ọ sonyeere ndị Quakers
Onye America na-eche echiche bụ William James kpaliri Cérésole
Cérésole n'aka nke ya kpaliri Kees Boeke
Mgbe Cérésole nwụsịrị, enyi ya na onye na-ahụ maka udo, Hélène Monastier, bipụtara akụkọ ndụ ya na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ya
A họpụtara Ceresole maka Nobel Peace Prize na 1938 na 1939
Pierre Fakhoury (amụrụ na Dabou, Côte d'Ivoire ) bụ onye Lebanon na Ivory Coast na-ewu ụlọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na School of Architecture na Tournai, Belgium
Ọrụ ya a ma ama gụnyere Basilica of Our Lady of Peace na Yamoussoukro, Côte d'Ivoire
Kemgbe afọ 1983, Fakhoury etinyela aka na mbugharị nke isi obodo Côte d'Ivoire site na Abidjan gaa Yamoussoukro
Pierre Moutouari (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1950) bụ onye Soukous na-agụ egwu si Republic of Congo
Moutouari bụ onye na-ewu ewu ma na-aga nke ọma n'oge ọdịbendị agha obodo nke afọ ndị 1970, Moutouari bụ otu n'ime mmadụ ole na ole nọ n'oge Soukous ka na-arụ ọrụ taa
Moutouari malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1968 na The Super Band (nke e mechara kpọwa Orchestre Sinza) ya na nwanne ya nwoke, Kosmos Moutouari
Pierre sonyeere Sinza n'ọnụ ụzọ nke ịrị elu nke ndị otu ahụ, na usoro zuru ezu nke ihe ngosi gburugburu etiti Afrịka na ntinye aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Pathé-Marconi
N'otu afọ ahụ, o ritere ihe nrite mbụ na asọmpi ịbụ abụ nke Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị n'oge ahụ haziri, si otú a mee ka ọ bụrụ kpakpando na-abịanụ
N'afọ 1973, Moutouauri ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na Festival de Tunis, ma n'afọ 1975 guzobere otu Les Sossa
N'afọ 1979, Moutouauri kwagara Paris iji malite ọrụ naanị ya, sonye n'ọkwa nke akara egwu Safari Ambience

Na mmekorita ya na Jacob Desvarieux na onye na-egwu egwu Master Mouana Congo, Moutouari wepụtara ọtụtụ abọm n'ime afọ ole na ole sochirinụ gụnyere Le Grand Retour de Pierre Moutouari, Toute Bouge na Dans Tremblement de Terre Toute Bouge bụ ma eleghị anya ọrụ ya kachasị mkpa, na-emepụta egwu ndị dị ka 'Aissa' na 'Saile'

N'afọ 1986, Moutouari laghachiri mba a mụrụ ya, na-ekpebi itinye uche na mmepe nke talent na-eto eto, ọkachasị nke nwa ya nwoke Michel Moutouari, na-ewepụta abọm Heritage, Monument na Mbolo dị ka duets
Moutouari gbakwara mbọ n'ịkwalite na nkesa egwu Congo n'etiti afọ 1993 nakwa n'afọ 1999
N'afọ 2005, Moutouari wepụtara abọm Songa Nzila, n'afọ 1996 ọ bịanyere aka na labelụ One1shuttle
Pieter-Dirk Uys (/ˈeɪs/; a mụrụ na 28 Septemba 1945) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye edemede, onye na-ede ihe mkparị, na onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama bụ dịka Evita Bezuidenhout, onye Afrikaner socialite
A mụrụ Uys na Cape Town n'abalị 28 ọnwa Septemba afọ 1945, nye Hannes Uys, nna Calvinist Afrikaner, na Helga Bassel, nne onye Juu a mụrụ na Berlin
Hannes Uys, onye South African nke anọ nke Dutch na Belgian Huguenot stock, bụ onye na-eti egwu na onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara na ụlọụka ya
Bassel bụ onye na-akpọ piano na Germany, onye ndị Nazi chụpụrụ na Reichsmusikkammer n'afọ 1935 dịka akụkụ nke mkpọsa ha iji chụpụ ndị na-ese ihe ndị Juu
O mechara gbalaga South Africa ma soro ya buru nnukwu piano ya, nke ọ kụziiri nwa ya nwanyị, Tessa Uys (b
1948), onye na-akpọ piano ugbu a na London
Bassel gwara ụmụ ya obere ihe banyere oge ndị Juu ya
Ọ bụ naanị mgbe o gburu onwe ya ka ha chọpụtara na ọ bụ onye Juu kpamkpam
Uys na nwanne ya nwanyị zụlitere NG Kerk na nne ha gbara ha ume ịnakwere omenala Afrikaner
Uys nwetara BA
na Mahadum nke Cape Town ebe ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị egwu dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'okpuru nkuzi nke Rosalie van der Gught, Mavis Taylor na Robert Mohr, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
O mechara gaa gụọ akwụkwọ na London Film School n'oge mmalite afọ 1970
Ọ bụ n'otu n'ime nkiri ụmụ akwụkwọ ya, mgbasa ozi maka mmiri ara ehi, ka o mere na drag na nke mbụ ya (dịka onye na-enye mmiri ara ehi)
Ọ malitere oge n'ọrụ ya dị egwu dị ka onye na'ihe nkiri

E mere ọtụtụ n'ime ihe nkiri ya na Space Theatre, Cape Town, na egwuregwu ya nke afọ 1979 Paradise is Closing Down na London, na Edinburgh Festival (nke William Burdett-Coutts so mepụta), ma mesịa mepụta ya maka Granada Television n'afọ 1981
O mechara gbanwee ka ọ rụọ ọrụ otu onye n'oge oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
A maara Uys nke ọma maka àgwà ya Evita Bezuidenhout (nke a makwaara dị ka Tannie Evita, Afrikaans maka 'Auntie Evita'), onye ọcha Afrikaner na-eme ihe na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Akara a sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke onye Australia na-eme ihe ọchị Barry Humphries bụ Dame Edna Everage
Evita bụ onye bụbu onye nnọchi anya Bapetikosweti bụ Bantustan ma ọ bụ ala nna ojii nke dị na mpụga ụlọ ya n'ime obodo ndị bara ọgaranya, nke bụbu ndị ọcha na-anọghị na Johannesburg
A na-akpọ Evita Bezuidenhout iji sọpụrụ Eva Perón
N'okpuru ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, Uys jiri usoro ọchị na ihe ọchị katọọ ma kpughee nzuzu nke iwu agbụrụ nke gọọmentị South Africa
A katọghị ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya, na-egosi nkwado doro anya nke echiche ya site n'aka ọtụtụ ndị otu na-achị achị, ndị na-enweghị obi ike nke na ha anaghị ekweta mmejọ ma katọọ iwu ahụ n'onwe ha
Ruo ọtụtụ afọ, Uys kwara ọchịchị South Africa na ndị isi ya emo, yana àgwà ihu abụọ nke ndị ọcha
Otu n'ime ihe odide ya, kugel (nwaanyị ndị Juu na-arịgo n'ọkwá) kwuru n'otu oge, 'E nwere ihe abụọ na-adịghị mma na South Africa ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke otu na ndị isi ojii nke ọzọ'
E mechara kwuo na nke a bụ Uys n'onwe ya
Pieter Hugo (amụrụ n'afọ 1976) bụ ónyé na-ese foto na South Africa nke na-arụ ọrụ na foto
Ọ bi na Cape Town
Hugo ebipụtala akwụkwọ anọ

O nweela ihe ngosi onwé ya na Museu Coleção Berardo, Lisbon (2018), Museum für Kuns und Kulturgeschichte, Dortmund, Kunstmuseum Wolfsburg, Germany, National Portrait Gallery, London, Ludwig Museum, Budapest, Institute of Modern Art, Brisbane, Multimedia Art Museum, Moscow na South African National Gallery, Cape Town
[citation needed] A gụnyere ya na ngosi otu na National Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art na Seoul, Rijksmuseum, Netherlands, Tate Modern, London, DeVosette Art Museum, Michigan
A mụrụ Hugo na Johannesburg, South Africa
Ọ bịdọrọ ọrụ ya na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na Cape Town, tupu ọ malite obibi afọ abụọ na ụlọ ọrụ nyocha Fabrica, Treviso, Ịtali
Hugo ebipụtala akwụkwọ anọ Pieter Hugo The Hyena and Other Men (2008), Pieter Hugo, Selected Works (2009), This Must Be the Place (2012), na Pieter Hugo
O mepụtara ihe osise ejiji màkà Arena Homme Plus, Re-Edition Magazine, Document Journal, System Magazine na AnOther Man
Ya na Louis Vuitton na Hood By Air rụkọkwara ọrụ na mbipụta
Ọrụ Hugo na-achịkwa usoro nkuzi onwé ónyé màkà foto
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọgbọ nke ndị na-ese foto mgbè ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị nke na-achọ ịlụso akụkọ ihe méré eme' nke foto nke na-anọchite ányá ndị a na-akparaghị ókè na ndị na-enweghị ike
Ọrụ ya na-ezube ịma echiche ndị dị na nnọchiteanya nke ìgwè ndị mmadụ 'ndị ọzọ' aka na ụkpụrụ Western Europe
Ọrụ mbụ Hugo bụ Looking Aside (2006) na-egosi foto nké ndị mmadụ 'nke ọdịdị ha na-eme ka anyị lelee ányá n'akụkụ' ndị kpuru ìsì, ndị nwere albinism, ndị agadi, ezinụlọ ya na onwé ya
Nke ọ bụla n'ime ihe osise ndị a nwèrè isiokwu a na-etinye n'ime ụlọ ihe nkiri na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla, n'okpuru ìhè na-egbuke egbuke na ndabere na-enweghị ntụpọ
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2013, Hugo lụrụ ónyé nchịkọta ihe nkírí bụ Tamsyn Reynolds, ónyé ya na ya nwèrè ụmụ abụọ
Pieter Hugo Naudé, ónyé a makwaara dị ka Hugo Naudé (n'afọ 1869) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nà South Africa
Pieterse bụ aha nke nna ndi Dutch na ndi Afrikaans
A na-eji aha nna ahụ mee ihe na Netherlands tupu oge ọchịchị
Mgbe ndị Dutch guzobere ógbè na Cape of Good Hope, ndị nwere aha nna Pieterse kwagara n'ógbè ahụ ma n'ihi ya, Pieterse bụ aha nna nke Afrikaans
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Àtụ Peter-surname
Pietersen bụ aha nke nna nke ndi Dutch na ndi Afrikaans nke pụtara 'nwa Peter'
E nwere mkpụrụ okwu ndị ọzọ
Pietersen bụ aha a na-adịghị ahụkebe
Ndị nwere aha nna Pietersen gụnyere ndia
Àtụ Peter-surname
Pikolin bụ onye na-emepụta matarasị na Spain nke nwere isi na Zaragoza (Aragon)
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1948 ma mechaa mepee alaka na Portugal, France, Italy na Malaysia

Ọ nwere ngụkọta nke ụwa họrọ site na iji bịa na ímé ihe kwa afọ nke € 183 nde na 2005, ma were ndị ọrụ dị n'etiti 1,500 na 1,600 n'ọrụ, dabere na mkpa mmepụta (ihe dị ka 1,000 mmadụ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ya na Zaragoza 900 na mmepụta na 100 na nchịkwa na ọrụ ndị ọzọ)
A họpụtara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka onye nkwado gọọmentị nke Expo Zaragoza 2008
Pilar Buepoyo Boseka bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Equatoguinean
Ọ bụ onye otu Pan-Afrika Parliament maka Equatorial Guinea
Ọ bụ osote minista nke ahụike na gburugburu ebe obibi site na arụ 1999 rụo na arụ 2001
Pillow ọgụ Njikọ (PFL) bụ egwuregwu egwuregwu na-arụ ọrụ na Toronto nke na-elekwasị anya na ọgụ pillow ọha na eze
A kwadoro egwuregwu ụmụ nwanyị na-eme ihe ọchị n'ọgbọ ọgụ, dị ka ịkụ ọkpọ ma ọ bụ ịgba mgba
Ọ bụ PFL Commissioner Stacey P
Case, na Honorary PFL Commissionor Craig Daniels guzobere Njikọ ahụ na Febụwarị 2004
Njikọ a malitere izi ndị anyị na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ụmụ ndị ogbi na ụlọ mmanya Goth nke Canada a na-akpọ The Vatican na etiti Toronto
A kwadoro ihe omume na Montreal, Quebec na New York City, mana isi oche nke Njikọ ahụ nọgidere na Toronto, Ontario
Agha n'ime Njikọ ahụ gosipụtara ma ọ bụ ụmụ agbọghọ abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ, nke ikpeazụ a na-akpọ mmebi atọ, na usoro iwu
Ndị na-alụ ọgụ na-enwekarị ọkpụkpụ, ihe mkpofu na mmerụ ahụ
E nwekwara mmerụ ahụ siri ike karị, gụnyere mgbagwoju anya, anya ojii, ezé furu efu, egbugbere ọnụ gbawara agbawa, uru ahụ dọwara agbawa na akụrụ merụrụ ahụ

Njikọ ahụ sitere na ihe omume abụọ dị ndụ nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri si n'òtù burlesque nke Canada 'Skin Tight Outta Sight' mere na arụmọrụ nke Maazị Case (nke akpọrọ aha bibles tijuana) na New Year's Eve 2004 na 2005
Nke ikpeazụ gosipụtara ihe atụ mbụ nke nnwale ndụ maka ndị na-ege ntị

Ihe mere n'oge ochie nakwa n'oge kwesịrị ekwesị nke kasị mma maka nsogbụ ụra akpa dị ka onye omume ndị sochiri na 2006 na Vatican malitere usoro ihe omume ọhụrụ nke Njikọ kwadoro nke lekwasịrị anya na ọgụ ịlụ ọgụ

Onye nwere ike ịkpata ego maka ndị guzobere ya, Njikọ ahụ hụrụ ikike telivishọn na 2007 site n'aka ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri telivisheneng na Eddie October (onye na-emepụta Tommy Lee Goes to College na The Roseanne Show) na Al Berman (onye na'emepụta The Biggest Loser and Survivor)
Yvonne Nk stars 'Pinky' Phosa (amụrụ na 4 Septemba 1956) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa onye jere ozi dị ka onye otu National Assembly maka African National Congress site na 2014 ruo 2019
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Nkwado nke ndị omeiwu site na 2016 ruo 2019
Tupu a họpụta ya na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na gọọmentị mpaghara Mpumalanga
Phosa bụ nwunye onye bụbu onye isi akụ nke ANC na onye bụbu praịm nke Mpumalanga Mathews Phosa
A mụrụ Phosa na 4 Septemba 1956
O nwetara nzere BA na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Mahadum nke North na 1990
N'afọ 1988, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Damelin Business School ma nweta asambodo na njikwa azụmahịa
O nwetara nzere masta ya na nchịkwa ọha na eze na Mahadum Pretoria n'afọ 1998
N'afọ 2006, Phosa nwetara asambodo na ego ọha na eze na Mahadum nke South Africa
Site na Wits Business School, ọ nwetara asambodo na ọchịchị na idu ndú na 2012 na diplọma na ọchịchị na ndu na 2013
Phosa bụ onye otu African National Congress
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Nelspruit Transitional Council site na 1993 ruo 1999
Na ntuli aka 1999, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu Mpumalanga Provincial
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote ọkà okwu nke ndị omeiwu
A kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ ọkà okwu mgbe ntuli aka 2004 gasịrị
A họpụtara David Mabuza ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala na ntuli aka Eprel 2009
Ọ họọrọ Phosa ka ọ bụrụ MEC (Member of the Executive Council) maka ego
O mechara kpọga ya na ngalaba Economic Development, Environment and Tourism na Febụwarị 2013
Mgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 2014 gasịrị, a ṅụrụ Phosa iyi dị ka onye otu National Assembly
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Portfolio Committee on Higher Education and Training tupu a họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke Standing Committee on Appropriations na Mee 2016
A họpụtabeghị Phosa dị ka onye omeiwu ANC maka ntuli aka 2019
N'ihi ya, ụbọchị ikpeazụ ya dị ka onye omeiwu bụ na 7 Mee 2019
Na Machị 2022, a họpụtara Phosa dị ka onye nnọchi anya South Africa na Cuba na Dominican Republic
Phosa lụrụ Mathews Phosa, onye bụbu onye isi ala nke Mpumalanga na onye bụbu nnukwu onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba nke ANC
Ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na otu nwa nwoke
Nwa nwanyị mbụ Phosa nwụrụ na Jenụwarị 2020
Joanna Marie ' Pinky ' Pagaspas Webb (amụrụ ya na June 11, 1970)o bụ onye nte akụkọ mgbasa ozi Filipina na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a maka CNN Philippines
Ọ bụ ada Freddie Webb na nwanne Jason na Hubert Webb
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Colegio San Agustin ebe ya na Kris Aquino bụ ụmụ klas ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum De La Salle ebe o buru ụzọ were AB Psychology wee kpebie ịbanye na AB Management
Ọ malitekwara ọmụmụ ihe ole na ole na UCLA na Cal State Long Beach na akwụkwọ akụkọ maka otu semester

N'oge ọrụ ya na ABS-CBN, Webb bụ arịlịka ozi mbụ nke ANC Primetime News (1999-2004) na Dateline Philippines (2004-2014) yana onye ọbịa nke Umagang Kay Ganda, XXX Exklusibong, Explosibong, Exposé (site na 2008 ruo mgbe ihe ngosi ahụ kwụsịrị) na TV Patrol Weekend
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado redio Radyo Patrol Balita Alas Kwatro na mmemme nkọwa redio Tambalang Failon na Webb na ụbọchị izu ya na Ted Failon na DZMM
Na Mee 9, 2015, The Philippine Star kọrọ na Webb agbahapụla na ABS-CBN
Webb sonyeere CNN Philippines na 2016
Netwọk ahụ gosipụtara mmegharị ya na tweet
Ya na CNN Philippines gbara arụmụka na Eprel 4, 2016 dị ka arịlịka mbụ nke mgbasa ozi asụsụ Filipino ya,
Na Septemba 26, 2016, Webb kpọrọ aha dị ka onye ọbịa maka mmemme mmemme ọhụụ kwa ụbọchị nke akpọrọ Isi Iyi
Xxx
Pinyin bụ asụsụ Grassfields nke ihe dị ka mmadụ 27,000 na-asụ na Northwest Region nke Cameroon
Mgbọrọgwụ niile nke aha na ngwaa na-amalite na ụdaume; ụdaume mbido bụ prefixes
Naanị /a, ɨ/ na-apụta na prefixes ma ọ bụ na mmalite nke okwu, ọ bụkwa naanị //ə// na-eme na suffixes
//ɨ, y/, y/ anaghị apụta na njedebe nke okwu
Udaume ogologo niile amaara nwere ike ịpụta n'etiti etiti ma ọ bụ na nsọtụ okwu, ọ nweghị nke na mbido, n'agbanyeghị ogologo /ɛ, y/ anaghị agba akaebe
A na-ede ụdaume ogologo okpukpu abụọ aa, əə, ii, ‿ɨɨ, oo, uu
Diphthongs ie, iə, ʉə, ɨə, uə were otu ụda
Ụda dị elu, etiti, dị ala, na-ebili, na-ada
E dere ha dị ka na IPA, ewezuga ala, nke a na-edeghị á ā a ǎ â
Ụda dara ada bụ nke ukwuu na suffixes, na ụda ịrị elu dị ụkọ, a na-ahụ naanị na aha ole na ole dị ka tǎ 'nna'
Piotrowice bụ otu ama no n'otu ala ocha nke ana kpo Poland
Ha no na county nke ana-kpo Otwock County, nke no n'ime Gmina Karczew

Pip Freedman (14 Julaị 1925 - 19 Mee 2003) bụ onye na-eme ihe ọchị na redio na South Africa na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri ma bụrụ onye a maara nke ọma maka arụmọrụ ya na SABC's Springbok Radio na ihe ngosi ahụ, The Pip Freedmann Show
Ọrụ ya, malite na 1950s, were afọ iri isii ruo 2002
A mụrụ ya Philip Maurice Freedman na Swellendam, Cape Province na 1925
Ọ lụrụ nwanyị ugboro abụọ
Ọ zutere nwunye ya nke abụọ Pat na 1967 wee lụọ ya na 1973
O nwere ụmụ abụọ site n'aka nwunye mbụ ya Jeremy na Gayle Freedman na Jonathan na Samantha Freedman site n'aka nwunye ya nke abụọ, Pat
Ọ nwụrụ na Life Kingsbury Hospital, Cape Town site na ọbara na-akpụ akpụ n'ụkwụ ya
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Starlight Theatre na Sea Point, Cape Town
Ọ sonyere SABC n'afọ ndị 1950s

Cecile Whiteman kpọbatara ya ma dochie Gabriel Bauman na ihe ngosi ahụ, Snoektown Calling Ọ ga-eme ihe ngosi redio Next Stop Makouvlei site na 1969 ruo 1972, ihe ngosi nke Pieter van der Bijl mepụtara na nke a gbanwere ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri nke otu aha ahụ
Ihe ngosi redio nke ya bụ The Pip Freedman Show, nke a na-agbasa na Springbok Radio site na Jenụwarị 1968 ruo 1985 mgbe ụlọ ọrụ redio mechiri maka oge ikpeazụ
N'ime ihe ngosi ahụ, ọ ga-ewepụ omume, ọchị na olu nke agbụrụ dị iche iche nke Western Cape n'ejighị mkparị ma ọ bụ enweghị nkwanye ùgwù
Pisit Charnsnoh, onye si Trang Province, Thailand, so guzobe Yadfon Association na 1985
E nyere ya Goldman Environmental Prize n'afọ 2002, maka mbọ ọ na-agba n'ichebe gburugburu ebe obibi dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri nke Thailand
Charnsnoh nọ na bọọdụ nke International Mangrove Action Project nke dabeere na Seattle, ma jikọtara ya na Industrial Shrimp Action Network
Pistis Ghana bụ ụdị ejiji ndị Ghana nke dabere na Accra
Ọ bụ di na nwunye Kabutey na Sumaiya Dzietror tọrọ ntọala ya na 2008 ka ha gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Joyce Ababio 's Vogue Style School of Fashion and Design
Pistis pụtara 'okwukwe' n'asusu Grik
Ha bụ ndị a ma ama maka imepụta ihe maka nwanyị nke abụọ Ghana, Samira Bawumia, na uwe Kente nke oge a

N'afọ 2008, Sumaiya Mohammed na Kabutey Dzietror, bụ ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nso nso a na Joyce Ababio College of Creative Design (Vogue Style), tọrọ ntọala Pistis mgbe ọ chọtara ihe jikọrọ ha n'ejiji na imewe dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ
Ụlọ ejiji ahụ malitere na East Legon dị na ezinụlọ Kabutey Dzietror ma mgbe afọ abụọ gachara ha hiwere ụlọ ahịa n'ihu iji dọta ndị ahịa
Pistis Ghana ghọrọ onye ama ama maka uwe alụmdi na nwunye ha nwere aka na ntinye nke akwa wax Africa na kente n'uwe maka nwanyị Ghana
Na 7 Jenụwarị 2017, Samira Bawumia gara nraranye nke Nana Akufo-Addo wee yiri uwe Northern Kente site na Pistis nke na-agbasa gburugburu mba ahụ
Uwe ahụ wee gbasaa na ịntanetị nke mere ka anya nke ndi mba ọzọ dị n'ụlọ ọrụ nwere onwe ya
Ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-akwa akwa malitere ịkopị nakwa imeputa oyiri ya
Nhazi ọzọ nke gosipụtara ihe nketa Fulani Bawumia n'ụbọchị nnwere onwe Ghana adọtala mmasị dị ukwuu

Ha emebekwara maka ọtụtụ ndị a ma ama, ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ na ndị ọha na eze nke gụnyere Naomi Campbell, Charlotte Osei, Naa Ashorkor, Eve, Josleyn Dumas, Yvonne Okoro, Valerie Lawson, Berla Mundi, na nwunye onye ịsị ala nke Ghana ugbu a, Rebecca Akufo-Addo
Pistis bụ akara ejiji ndị Ghana izizi gosipụtara na Runway Dubai Season III
Ha egosikwala atụmatụ ha na Glitz Africa Fashion Week 2013, Radiance Bridal Show na Vlisco Fashion Show na Ghana
Ha so na ihe ngosi ejiji Africa na Geneva
Na mgbakwunye, Pistis enweela ohere iji ejiji nke ndị ikpeazụ maka Miss Malaika Ghana maka oge 2012, 2013, na 2014
Na nleta Prince Charles na Camilla, Duchess nke Cornwall bịara na Ghana, gọọmentị Ghana haziri oriri eze na ihe ngosi ejiji maka nsọpụrụ ha
A họpụtara Pistis dị ka otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị Ghana na Britain iji gosi ihe na ọgbakọ ngosi ahụ
N'oge ọnụ ọgụgụ kasị elu nke ọrịa COVID-19, Pistis na Naa Ashoorkor nyere ndị na-ebu ụzọ na Madina ihe mkpuchi ihu otú pụkụ dị ka nke sonyere n'ọrụ mmekọrịta ya
Onye Mmebe Kapeeti Uhie nke Afọ - Glitz Style Awards
Onye nrụpụta ETV Ghana nke afọ 2016
Pistorius ma ọ bụ Pistor (site na Latin pistor nke pụtara onye na-egwe ihe ma ọ bụ onye na-eme achịcha bekee) bụ aha nke nna Latinized, kwekọrọ na Dutch Bakker ma ọ bụ German Becker
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Àtụ Baker-surname
Pithole, ma ọ bukwa Pithole City, by ámá mmuo nọr na ime Cornplanter Township, na Venango County, ime nkeji obodo US nke Pennsylvania
Ó rùrù mile 6 shí Oil Creek State park na Drake Well Museum, ébé mmanu crude bụzor fụtá na áhiá na ụwa nile
Otu mádu na ime Pithole shi tó bukwa òtù ọgụgụ ha shi da
Na otu Pithole nọr ka ébé òlìlé ihe ngwa-áhiá mmanu crude mèrè ka oke ndi madu shi ma ya
Pitika Ntuli (amụrụ 1942, na Springs, Gauteng) bụ onye South Africa ọkpụkpụ, onye na-ede uri, onye edemede na agụmakwụkwọ onye nọrọ afọ 32 nke ndụ ya na ndọrọ n'agha na Swaziland na UK
O nwere MFA site na Pratt Institute na New York na MA na Comparative Industrial Relations na Industrial Sociology
Mgbe ọ nọ na UK, ọ kụziri na Camberwell College of Art, Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design, London College of Printing, Middlesex University na University of East London
Kemgbe ọ lọghachiri South Africa ọ kụzirila ihe na Wits na UKZN
Pitika Ntuli egosila n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nke otu na nke otu n'ọtụtụ mba na Europe na US, ma hazie ọtụtụ ihe omume nka na ọdịbendị mba ụwa na Britain
Ihe ọkpụkpụ ya dị n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta onwe onye n'ụwa niile, gụnyere nke Paul Simon, Phuthuma Nhleko, na Edward na Irene Akufo-Addo
Enwere ike ịchọta ụfọdụ ihe ọkpụkpụ ọha ya na Swaziland National Bank, St
Mary's Catholic Church na Lobamba, COSATU House, Johannesburg, na Dieploof, Soweto
Ruo n'afọ 2010, ọ gosighi na mba nke ya
O nwere ihe ngosi mbụ ya na South Africa na Museum Africa, Johannesburg na 2010, sochiri ihe ngosi na Durban Art Gallery na UNISA Gallery, Pretoria na 2011
'The Scent of Invisible Footprints the Sculpture of Pitika Ntuli' ka UNISA bipụtara iji soro ngosi ya na Museum Africa
O mesịkwara gosi ihe ngosi na Constitutional Hill na Melrose Arch na Johannesburg na Oliver Tambo Cultural Center dị na Ekhuruleni
Pitika Ntuli bụ ọkachamara na usoro ihe ọmụma ụmụ amaala Afrịka
Ọ bụ onye na-akọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọdịbendị na TV na Redio

Ọ bụ onye a ma ama na-ede uri na ọkà okwu bụ onye bụ onye isi okwu n'ọtụtụ ihe omume dị elu ma gụọ uri ya n'ọtụtụ forums na mba na mpaghara ahụỌ na-abụ onye ọbịa ugboro ugboro na TV na Redio na karịsịa n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ SABC African Language Radio, ma sorokwa n'ọtụtụ mba na ógbè dị iche iche na ndụmọdụ ndị minista
Ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe maka onyinye akwụkwọ akụkọ Sunday Times (2009)
O bụ onye isi oche ndị ọrụ 2010 Task Team nke dụrụ Minista nke Arts na Culture ndụmọdụ gbasara mmemme omenala jikọtara ya na iko mba ụwa, gụnyere mmemme mmeghe na mmechi
Pitika lụrụ Antoinette Ntuli; ha nwere ụmụ nwoke anọ, ụmụ nwaanyị abụọ na ụmụ ụmụ anọ

Pius Okigbo (onwa Febụwarị isii n'afọ 1924 ruo 2000), bụ onye Naijiria a ma ama na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba si n'obodo Ojoto, isi ụlọ ọrụ nke Idemili South mpaghara ọchịchị obodo di na Anambra Steeti; ọ bụ nwanne nwoke nke onye na-ede uri Christopher Okigbo
N'inweta agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Christ the King College, Onitsha, Pius gafere ule asambodo nke ulo akwukwo Cambridge na klaasị nke mbụ n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1940 na mwepụ site na Mahadum nke London
N'afọ 1941, ọ banyere na Ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum nke ugwu di na Yaba Lagos, maka ọmụmụ diplọma na nka (1941-1942)

N'ihi ntụgharị nke Yaba College ka ọ bụrụ ebe ndị agha maka Royal West African Force n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, na 1942 a kpọfere ya na Achimota College dị na Accra, Gold Coast (nke bụ Ghana ugbu a), ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya na Latin, Grik, akụkọ ihe mere eme, asụsụ Bekee, na akwụkwọ na asambodo diplọma na 1943
O nwetakwara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na akụ na ụba site na ọmụmụ onwe ya, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara Mahadum Northwestern, ebe ọ nwetara MA na PhD na akụ na akụ naụba
[mkpa nhota] Dị ka onye ọkà mmụta, o nyere aka nke ukwuu n'ịkwalite okwu agụmakwụkwọ, ụzọ ọhụrụ maka idozi nsogbu akụ na ụba Afrịka

Dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba nke nwere mmetụta maka mgbanwe akụkọ ihe mere eme, Okigbo mere nchọpụta ma dee banyere mmalite, evolushọn na mgbanwe nke nnukwu iwu akụ na ụba ma bụrụ ihe bara uru na nchọpụta ya na itinye n'ọrụ echiche ndị na-asọmpi nke mmepe nke o chere na ọ dị mma maka eziokwu nke akụ na ụba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Naijiria n' Afrika
O nwetara otuto agụmakwụkwọ na Naijiria mgbe o bipụtara akwụkwọ gbasara ụkpụrụ ndekọ ego nke Naijiria
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye ndụmọdụ akụ na ụba nye gọvanọ nke mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa

Dị ka onye ọkà mmụta na-ahụ maka ego ọha na eze, o nyere ọrụ ya na agụmakwụkwọ ọha na eze na iwu, ọ bụ onyeisi oche n'ọtụtụ kọmitii Naijiria, ọkachasị ndị na-ahụkarị maka ntụziaka akụ na ụba nke mba ahụ

N'afọ 1994, dị ka onye isi oche nke kọmitii na-enyocha ọrụ ụlọ akụ etiti nke Naijiria, o wepụtara akụkọ na-akatọ ọrụ gọọmentị na-arụ n'ịchịkwa ijeri dollar 124 nke ego mmanụ na-enweta na akaụntụ abụọ pụrụ iche
A maara akụkọ kọmitii ahụ nke ọma dị ka akụkọ Okigbo
Piya-Kwonci (Piya, Pia, Wurkum) bụ asụsụ ndi obere obodo West Chadic nke Naijiria gụnyere ndi Piya na Kwonci
Aha ndị ọzọ mmadụ na-akpọ onwe ha bụ Ambandi

Pizza obi ( English Pizza obi) nke American nri ngwa ngwa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na nwere alaka n'ọtụtụ mba na-Almo restaurant oriri na-edozi ọkachamara Pizza nile di iche iche, ma ọ bụ Okhrykma ọ na-enye njikọ mpụga ọrụ ngwa na mgbakwunye na-ekwe omume nke na-eri na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ
Ịmepụta ihe bụ iwepụta ya site na isi iyi ya ma nyefee ya dị ka nke gị
Plagiarism bụ ụdị aghụghọ
Ọ bụ izu ohi nke ọrụ ma ọ bụ echiche onye ọzọ
Ịkwa ebubo nwere ike ịgụnye egwu egwu, uri, akwụkwọ akụkọ, akụkọ magazin, ibe weebụ, ihe nkiri TV, ihe nkiri, ihe osise, ma ọ bụ ihe ọ bụla n'okpuru nchebe nwebisiinka
Plagiarism nwere ike ịdị nwayọọ ruo na nke siri ike
Mgbe ụfọdụ, ndị omekome na-agbalị ịnara otuto maka ọrụ onye ọzọ ma nyefee ya dị ka nke ha
N'ọnọdụ ndị ọzọ, ndị mmadụ nwere ike ghara ịma maka Plagiarism nke na ha anaghị aghọta na ihe ha na-eme adịghị mma
Mgbe ị na-ede akwụkwọ maka ụlọ akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ na-arụ ọrụ na oru ngo maka ụlọ ọrụ gị, ị ga-eji isi mmalite kwado isi ihe gị wee nye onye mbụ dere akwụkwọ ndị ahụ otuto
Ọ bụrụ na ị nyeghị onye ahụ chepụtara echiche mbụ ma ọ bụ mepụta mpempe akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ nka bụ Plagiarism otuto
Enwere ọtụtụ ụdị Plagiarism
Ụfọdụ na-adị mfe achọpụta karịa ndị ọzọ
Plagiarism na-apụta mgbe ị tụgharịrị na chịkọta echiche ma ọ bụ okwu onye ọzọ
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ị ​​na-eji ọtụtụ asụsụ mbụ karịa nke gị
Ide otu okwu ezughị iji gbanarị Plagiarism
Ọ ga-enyere gị aka ma ọ bụrụ na ị degharịa echiche ahụ n'okwu nke aka gị ma na-edobe ihe mbụ pụtara
Iji kọwapụta nke ọma, soro usoro ndị a
1) Gụọ akụkụ niile nke ịchọrọ ịkọwa
2) Gụgharịa ya, na-eme ka isi ihe pụta ìhè
3) Dee ụdị isi ihe ndị a kapịrị ọnụ na mpempe akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ okwu dị iche
4) Iji nsụgharị gị, dee akụkụ ahụ n'okwu nke aka gị, gbanwee ọtụtụ okwu dị ka o kwere mee
5) Tulee ụdị ọhụrụ gị na nke izizi wee hụ na i depụtabeghị nkebiokwu ma ọ bụ ahịrịokwu ọ bụla site na ederede izizi

Mosaic Plagiarism na-eme mgbe ị gbaziri echiche ma ọ bụ nkebiokwu site na ebe ọzọ wee tinye ha n'ọrụ gị n'enweghị njirimara kwesịrị ekwesị
Ọ bụ ụdị ihe odide patch nke onye ode akwụkwọ na-agwakọta okwu nke ha na nke onye ọzọ na-edoghị anya na-agbanweghị usoro ahịrịokwu mbụ ma ọ bụ jiri akara ngụ
Nke a na-emepụta mmetụta 'mosaic', nke ederede ikpeazụ mejupụtara nke isi mmalite na ederede ọhụrụ
Mosaic Plagiarism nwere ike ịbụ nke a na-amaghị ama, dịka mgbe ndị ode akwụkwọ aghọtaghị nke ọma iwu mgbagwoju anya nke nhota na njiri mara
Ma ọ pụkwara ịbụ nke a kpachapụrụ anya, karịsịa mgbe a na-arụgide ndị edemede ka ha mepụta edemede ngwa ngwa ma ọ bụ mgbe ha enweghị obi ike na ha nwere ike ịkọwa echiche dị mgbagwoju anya n'onwe ha
Ntọhapụ onwe onye bụ omume nke ịmegharị ọdịnaya nke edere ede na mbụ na-enyeghị nkọwa nke ọma
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ị dere blọgụ biputere na webụsaịtị gị
Ị wee jiri otu ọdịnaya ahụ na webụsaịtị dị iche na-ekwupụtaghị onwe gị dị ka onye edemede mbụ
A na-ewere nke a dị ka ihe na-emerụ emerụ ma ọ bụrụ na ị na-eji ọdịnaya ọzọ eme ihe n'ụzọ e chere na ọ dị mma
Ịkwado onwe onye nwekwara ike ime mgbe ị na-eji ọrụ nke gị ebipụtara na mbụ na ọrụ ọzọ maka klaasị ọzọ
Ọ bụrụ na ị kọwaghị onwe gị, mgbe ahụ ọ bụ Plagiarism
Ọ bụrụ na ị mere saịtị ahụ n'onwe gị, mgbe ahụ ọ dị mma! N'okwu a, ịchọrọ ijide n'aka na ị ka nwere nnukwu ọdịnaya ọhụrụ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ gị
Ma ọ bụghị ya, ị nwere ike ịgbasawanye ọrụ mbụ gị ka akụkụ abụọ ahụ dị nnọọ iche
Plagiarism mberede na-eme mgbe ị zuru ọdịnaya na mberede
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ị na-eme mkpesa ma ọ bụrụ na idetuo na mado ihe sitere na webụsaịtị n'ime ọrụ gị n'ekwughị ya
Otú ahụ ka ọ dịkwa n'ịkọwapụta ma ọ bụ idegharị echiche onye ọzọ n'okwu nke aka gị mana ọ bụghị ịkpọ ha aha
Ọbụlagodi na ị chọghị izu ohi ọdịnaya, ma ọ bụrụgodi na ị maghị na ihe ị na-eme adịghị mma, ọ ka bụ Plagiarism
Plagiarism mberede na-eme mgbe niile maka ọtụtụ ihe kpatara ya
Mgbe ụfọdụ ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere ike ha agaghị ama ka esi akọwapụta isi mmalite ma ọ bụ ghọta Plagiarism nke ọma
Ụfọdụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na-eche n'ụzọ hiere ụzọ na a na-anakwere idepụta ihe sitere n'ebe ọzọ ma ọ bụrụ na ha ekwughị na ọ bụ echiche ha
N'ọnọdụ ndị ọzọ, ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere ike ọ gaghị aghọta oke ọrụ ha mgbe ha na-eji ihe nyocha ma ọ bụ na-arụ ọrụ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ
Otu ụdị Plagiarism a na-ahụkarị na-eme mgbe nwa akwụkwọ jigharịa ọrụ ha n'amaghị ama
dịka ọmụmaatụ, nwa akwụkwọ na-ede edemede na-eji ihe sitere na isiokwu mbụ n'otu isiokwu ahụ na-akọwaghị ọrụ mbụ-n'otu aka ahụ, ụmụ akwụkwọ na-arụ ọrụ na ndị ọzọ na oru mgbe ụfọdụ

Plato bụ ọkàọmụ̀ma na ọdọ-mgbakọ na Greece Ogeègboo

Plato bụ nchoputavi nke Academy n'Atens, ewumewu mbu nke mmụta kacha elu na ụwa Ọdịdaanyanwụ , ọfọrọnta atụlewo ụwa-ni (ly) dika onye kasị mkpa na-ịzụlite nkàọmụma (philosophy), tumadu n’menala Ọdịdaanyanwụ
Ngbakọ-ede (canon) ya etisaghị ihe karịrị 2500 afọ-vo (s), na ọ bụ ya bụ achọghị ịzụ otu nke kasị ukwuu, ọ bụghị n'onye kasị ukwuu, ọdọ-ede nọ na ngbakọ-ede Ọdịdaanyanwụ dum
Tinyere ọdọ-nkụzi ya, Socrates, na amụrụvi kasị ama, Aristotle, Plato tọrọ nnọọ ntọala nke nkàọmụma na nkàmmụta Ọdịdaanyanwụ
Alfred North Whitehead si otu mgbe kwuru 'nke kasị dịrị nchebe n'ozuzu ndona-agwa nke ọdịnala nkàọmụma Europe bụ na ọ na mejupụtara nsorosoro nke ededeala (footnote) maka Plato

' Tụkwasị n'ịbụ mmadu ntọala maka nkàmmuta Ọdịdaanyanwụ, nkàọmụma, na nkàmgbakọ (mathematics), ha tukwara Plato aka dịka otu n'ime mbidovivo nke ọnọdummụọ Ọdịdaanyanwụ, tumadu ọnọduKraịst, nke putara na Friedrich Nietzsche, n'etiti ndị ọzọ ọkà mmụta, kpọrọ 'Platoomi ọha’
Nrubeime Plato n’elu elulo Christian, ha cheworo na ọ gbugbowo (mediated) na nke metukachara Saint Augustine nke Hippo, otu n'ime ndị kasị mkpa ọkàọmụma Christian na ọdọ-okpukpe na-ogegaraga
Plato bụ ngbanwevi (the ‘vi’ stands for ‘er’ or ‘or’) nke Nkpakọrita na zizavo (forms), nkàechiche na nkàọmụma, nke sitere na ya

Plato bukwara nchoputavi nke nkàọmụma ndọrọọchịchị Ọdịdaanyanwụ , ya na Ọchiotutu (Republic), na Iwu n’etiti nkpakọritavo ndị ọzọ , na-enye ụfọdụ n'ime ndị mbụ agwọọrịa nke ajụjụvo ndọrọọchịchị ndị si na nkàọmụma anya-disi (perspective)
Plato bụ Atenvi nke ọmumu eze; ghọrọ amụrụvi Socrates
Ọ buwo nchekwube ọdọejije tupu ya abịa n'okpuru ndunihu Socrates, nakwa ọ ga-enye olu n’ọnwụ nke Socrates na-ejijeogi (dramatic) zizavo (forms) na Ngbahalu na Nkpakọrita yiriwo na isi oge kacha

E mesịrị, Plato jere ozi dị ka onye nkụzi nke Aristotle ihe karịrị afọ 20 tupu Aristotle putara ka ọ chọpụtara onwe ya ulọ-akwọ, Lyceum, nakwa ọ mmetụtakacha ọfọrọnta ulọ-akwụkwọ ọ bụla nkàọmụma Grik, na ndị Stoik, na Ọhurueplatovivo; ọzọkwa ikekwe ọ metukachara ha nile na elulo

Plato bụkwara onyenkụzi ọchigbovi nke Daịọnisiọs Syracusevi, na onye ọ nwara ikpe ihu ọma na-ahụ ka ọ mejuputa nkàọmụma okweizivo (principles) na omume, n'ihi na ọ dikwara emowo site Epicurus, onye kwuru si ọ dị ka 'Dionysiokolakes', maọbụ ‘okwuireụtọvi nke ọchigbo’

Ndị ọzọ n'oge bu ndi ilo nke Plato buwo Ngwooruvi (Materialist), Nkpurivi (Atomist) Democritus, onye ahaọma-ni Plato ledaworo ukwuu nke ọ ga-anakọta dị ka ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ nwere ji kpọọ ha ọkụ, na Diogenes nke Sinope, ma ọ bụ Diogenes na Cynic, onye Plato na-akpọ 'otu Socrates puwo ara', na onye, kọrọwo-ni, mgbe Plato gwara Diogenes na ọ gaghi eji aka ya asa onwe ya akwọnriba (salad) ma ọ bụrụ na ọ mụtara e nyewo Daịọnisiọs nsọpụrụ , zaghachiri na, ọ bụrụ na Plato mụtara na-asa ya onwe ya akwọnriba, ọ 'ga-enweghị-abụ ohu nke Daịọnisiọs'

Nke a na-emekarị ka a na-ahụkarị ihe na-eme ka 'buoy-dominated' na mbụ ghọọ 'momentum-domined' (a na-ekwukarị na mgbanwe a bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ na-enweghị akụkụ a na-akpọ ọnụ ọgụgụ Richardson)

Mgbe a na-ejighị ya eme ihe, a na-echekwa ha n'akụkụ ụlọ ụka ahụ, na-agbakọta ha n'ụzọ ga-eme ka akụkụ ndị ruru unyi na-emetụ ibe ha aka na akụkụ ndị dị ọcha na-emetụta naanị akụkụ ndị ọzọ dị ọcha
Ụfọdụ Ndị Kraịst Mmụọ (Dukh-i-zhizniki, Pryguny na Molokane) na-eweta akwa nke ha maka emume ikpere ala yiri nke ahụ, nke a na-emekarị n'ala dị ọcha mgbe ha na-ejide kerchief
Mgbe ala nwere ike ịdị unyi, a pụrụ ikpere ala dị ka ikpere ala n'ejighị aka ma ọ bụ isi metụ ala aka
Ábu bu ótụ nká édémédé bu na asụsụ di njide Í nye ihü ọma na í metu madu ọbí na ime, ma Í shi fwüo, ihe ọ bụ
Ábu gi di bya kwa ka akwukwu, ma ábu nzuzö, ma ó nweríkí bya ka nká ndi ozọr, di ka Ábu oméka, ábụ nsö, édemede ábu, ma ábu ndi bekee kpòrò 'prose'
O di na akwukwo nsem (nke kachírí Í di ichiè bu Poetry na Oxford Poetry), mpákota ndi mádu na mpákota saráasa
Ábu, na okwu gbasara ya, nwèrè mbú di ogologo
Mgbembu mgbè ndi madu chọrí si ihe ábu bu, di ka Aristotle, lèrè na otù ha shi ẹ jí ya na ókwú ime ókwúnókwú, oméka ábu, na ihe óchị
Na mgbe óge gáfèrè, hé lèrè akwu mmẹkwásí, okwu nkeji na okwu dárá na ntị nke ómá
Shi ogẹ nnari 20, nke etiti ya, ha si ábu bu ihe nká asụsụ
