Quasimodo (site na Quasimodo Sunday) bụ onye akụkọ ifo na onye isi na akwụkwọ akụkọ The Hunchback of Notre-Dame (1831) nke Victor Hugo
A mụrụ Quasimodo na-enwe azụ azụ ma ndị obodo na-atụ egwu ya dị ka ụdị anụ ọhịa, mana ọ chọtara ebe nsọ na ihụnanya na-agaghị ekwe omume nke na-emezu naanị na ọnwụ

Ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-arụ ọrụ Quasimodo na ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri, gụnyere Lon Chaney (1923), Charles Laughton (1939) na Anthony Quinn (1956), yana Tom Hulce na 1996 Disney animated adaptation, na nso nso a Angelo Del Vecchio na Notre Dame de Paris revival

Na afọ 2010, onye nchọpụta Britain chọtara ihe akaebe na-egosi na e nwere onye na-ese nkume nke na-arụ ọrụ na Notre Dame na otu oge ahụ Victor Hugo na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ma ha nwere ike ọbụna mara ibe ha
A na-akọwa Quasimodo nwere nkwarụ dị ka 'ihe jọgburu onwe ya' na 'ihe okike nke ekwensu'
A mụrụ ya na nnukwu oghere azụ, na nnukwu ogwu nke kpuchiri anya aka ekpe ya
A mụrụ ya na gbụrụ Gypsy, mana n'ihi ọdịdị ya dị egwu, a gbanwere ya n'oge ọ bụ nwa ọhụrụ na nwa agbọghọ nwere ike, Agnes

Mgbe a chọtara ya, nne Agnes chụpụrụ Quasimodo (onye kwenyere na ndị Gypsies riri nwa ya) wee kpọga ya Paris, ebe a chọtara ọ gbahapụrụ ya na Notre Dame (na àkwà ụmụntakịrị, ebe a hapụrụ ụmụ mgbei na ụmụaka a na-achọghị maka ọrụ ebere ọha na eze) na Quasimodo Sunday, Sunday mbụ mgbe Ista gasịrị, site na aka Claude Frollo, Archdeacon nke Notre Dame, onye nabatara nwa ahụ, aha ya mgbe ụbọchị a chọtara nwa ahụ gasịrị, ma kpọlite ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-akpọ mgbịrị mgbịrịgba nke katidral ahụ
Na ihi ụda mgbịrịgba, Quasimodo ghọkwara onye ntị chiri na-eme ka Frollo kụziere ya asụsụ ndị ogbi
Ọ bụ ezie na a kpọrọ ya asị maka nkwarụ ya, a kpughere na ọ nwere obiọma na obi
Ọ bụ ezie na Quasimodo na-eme ihe ike na akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, a na-eme nke a naanị mgbe ndị ọzọ nyere ya ntụziaka
N'ịbụ onye ndị Paris na ozuzu ha lere anya dị ka anụ ọhịa, ọ kwenyere na Frollo bụ naanị onye na-elekọta ya, ọ na-esokwa ya mgbe Archdeacon na-apụ na Notre Dame
Frollo nwere mmasị n'ebe nwa agbọghọ Gypsy mara mma aha ya bụ Esmeralda nọ, ma tinye Quasimodo na i gbalị ịtọrọ ya
(E mechara kpughee na ọ bụ Agnes, a gbanwere nwa Quasimodo) Captain Phoebus de Châteaupers rutere iji kwụsị ntọrọ ahụ ma jide Quasimodo, na amaghị na Quasimodo na-agbaso iwu Frollo
Onye ọka ikpe ntị chiri Florian Barbedienne mara ya ikpe otu awa nke ịpịa ya ụtarị na otu awa ọzọ nke mmechuihu na pillory
Phoebus kechiri Quasimodo ma mee ka Pierre Torterue tie ya ụtarị n'ihu ìgwè mmadụ na-akwa emo
Mgbe Quasimodo kpọrọ ya maka enyemaka, Frollo kwere ka a taa Quasimodo ahụhụ dị ka ntaramahụhụ maka ọdịda ya
Mgbe Quasimodo kpọrọ maka mmiri, otu nwatakịrị tụbara ya ákwà mmiri
Na ihụ akpịrị ịkpọ nkụ ya, Esmeralda gakwuuru ụlọ ahịa ọha na eze ma nye ya ihe ọṅụṅụ mmiri
Ọ zọpụtara ya ma ọ na-ejide obi ya
Christopher Rosser, ónyé a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Quay Global, bụ ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ America
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na onye na-eti egwu Lil Baby
Enwere ike ịmata ọrụ ya site na mkpado mmepụta 'Cook that shit up, Quay!'
Rosser malitere imepụta egwu mgbè ọ dị afọ itoolu
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Columbia
Rosser mere aha màkà onwé ya site n'ịmepụta egwu 'My Dawg' nke Lil Baby, nke e depụtara na Hot 100 ma RIAA kwadoro Platinum
Mgbe 'My Dawg' hụrụ ihe ịga nke ọma, N'Quay bịanyere aka na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ nke Atlanta Quality Control Music n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2017
Egwú ndị ọzọ a ma ama nke Lil Baby mepụtara bụ 'Life Goes On', 'Pure Cocaine', na 'Woah', nke niile gosipụtara na Hot 100, nke ikpeazụ nké ruru n'ọkwa 15
Al Qubaisi (Al Qubaisiat) (Arabic القبيسي (القبيسات)) bụ ebo Bani Yas, nke Abu Dhabi, na Bani Yas nke Abu Dhabi nwere njikọ chiri anya
Ezinụlọ Al Qubaisi na-ekekọrịta mmekọrịta chiri anya na ndị isi ezinaụlọ nke United Arab Emirates site na Salama bint Butti Al-Qubaisi nne Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan, onye guzobere UAE
Qudsi (a asụgharịkwara ka Kudsi; Arabic قدسي) bụ onye Jerusalem, ọkachasị onye Palestine
Ọ nwekwara ike na-ezo aka
Quebec (/ k (w)ɪˈbɛk/ k(w)ih-BEK;[lower-alpha 1] French Quebec [kebɛk] (￼gee ntị)) bụ otu n'ime ógbè na ókèala iri na atọ nke Canada
Ọ bụ mpaghara kachasị ukwuu site na mpaghara yana nke abụọ kachasị site na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bi n'obodo mepere emepe n'akụkụ Osimiri St
Lawrence, n'etiti obodo kacha nwee mmadụ, Montreal, na isi obodo, Quebec City
Quebec bụ ebe obibi nke mba Quebec

N'ịbụ nke dị na Central Canada, mpaghara ahụ nwere oke ala na Ontario n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ, Newfoundland na Labrador n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ, New Brunswick na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ, yana ókèala dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri na Nunavut; na ndịda ọ gbara Maine, New Hampshire, Vermont na New York na United States
College, Lagos, bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị (ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọrị) nke gọọmentị nwere ụlọ obibi, nke dị na Yaba, Lagos, Naijiria
A na-akpọkarị ya 'sister college' nke King's College, Lagos, e hiwere ya na Ọktoba 10, 1927, mgbe Naịjirịa ka bụ mpaghara Britain
Naịjirịa nwere usoro agụmakwụkwọ isii -atọ -atọ- anọ
Queen's College na-ewere ụmụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'etiti usoro abụọ
E nwere ìgwè afọ isii, ma ọ bụ akara; otu afọ ọ bụla nwere ihe dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ narị isii kewara n'ọtụtụ ogwe
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọnụ ọgụgụ klas belatara ruo nkezi nke iri anọ na klas ọ bụla
Ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ niile maka nnọkọ 2006/2007 bụ ụmụ akwụkwọ puku abụọ na narị na iri isii

Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ enwetala nsonaazụ kachasị mma na mba niile na West African Senior School Certificate Examination (WASSCE) nke West African Examinations Council (WAEC) duziri ugboro asaa kemgbe 1985 ma a na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ kachasị elu na Naịjirịa, yana otu n'etiti ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị kachasị elu na kọntinent Afrịka
Ụkpụrụ iwu nke Queen's College bụ 'Pass On The Torch'
N'iwepụta ihe kachasị mma na agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwanyị, ọhụụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ bụ 'ịmepụta ọgbọ nke ụmụ nwanyị ga-eme nke ọma, sọọ mpi n'ụwa niile ma nye aka n'ụzọ bara uru n'iwulite mba'
E guzobere Queen's College na October 10, 1927, na ndebanye aha ụmụ akwụkwọ iri abụọ, onye isi na ndị nkuzi asatọ na-arụ ọrụ nwa oge
A họpụtara Sylvia Leith-Ross ka ọ bụrụ 'Lady Superintendent of Education' n'afọ 1925 ma o nyere aka guzobe Queen's College dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị
Queen's College etoola ruo ụmụ akwụkwọ puku atọ, na ndị ọrụ nke ihe karịrị ndị nkuzi oge niile narị atọ
Queen's College enyewo agụmakwụkwọ maka ụmụ agbọghọ na Naịjirịa - na-emepụta ohere nwoke na nwanyị hà nhata maka ha n'ọhịa ọkachamara
A na-enye ụmụ agbọghọ ohere ịchụso ọmụmụ na sayensị, ọgwụ, injinia, iwu, ụkpụrụ ụlọ, nka, wdg
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ na ọkwa abụọ obere na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ụdị kachasị ala, JS I ruo JS III, mejupụtara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị ala
Ụmụ akwụkwọ nọ n'ụdị ndị ahụ na-amụ maka ule asambodo Junior School nke National Examination Council (NECO) duziri ma were ya na ngwụcha afọ nke atọ ha
Nnyocha ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị okenye bụ ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke ụmụ akwụkwọ nọ n'ụdị dị elu
Ndị otu ule abụọ bụ West African Examinations Council na National Examinations Board nwere ike ịme ule nke ngwụcha ọmụmụ ihe n'otu n'otu ma ụmụ akwụkwọ ga-abanye maka ule abụọ ahụ
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị okenye na ndị nke obere dị iche na ọrụ ha
Mmiri ọ bụla nke JS 1 site na SS 3 nwere ihe dị ka klas iri na otu nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dịgasị iche iche nke ụmụ akwụkwọ
Maka njikwa nke ngalaba abụọ ahụ, onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, onye a họpụtara PQC (Principal Queen's College) bụ onye isi anọ na-enyere aka
Usoro mmụta nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-ekpuchi sayensị, sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, nka - na isiokwu ọrụ aka yana ọrụ co-curricular
N'ikwekọ na usoro agụmakwụkwọ 6-3-3 4, e meela ka ohere ahụ gbasaa iji nye agụmakwụkwọ sara mbara na isiokwu ndị nwere ike iduga na ọmụmụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ tertiary
Ndị ọrụ na ndị ndụmọdụ nduzi iri na abụọ dị iji nyere ụmụ akwụkwọ aka n'ịmụta ihe, na nhọrọ ọrụ ha, mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, yana ọdịmma ha
Ihe ọmụmụ a na-enye na ụlọ akwụkwọ Junior na Senior bụ
Ụmụ agbọghọ na-etinye aka na egwuregwu na egwuregwu
A na-emekarị asọmpi egwuregwu n'etiti ụlọ kwa afọ n'oge nke abụọ nke oge agụmakwụkwọ
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ nwere ụlọ isii na-asọmpi na egwuregwu ụlọ, ya bụ Dan-Fodio (Red House), Obasa (Blue House), Obi (Yellow House), Emotan (Green House), Efunjoke (Purple House) na Obong (Orange House)
Queen bu ndï onye London
Ihe ọkpụkpụ Eze Nwanyị Amina bụ ihe ọkpụkpụ na-agba ịnyịnya iji sọpụrụ Eze Nwanyie Amina, Eze Nwanyị nke Zazzau
Ọ bụ Ben Ekanem chepụtara ihe ọkpụkpụ ahụ na 1975 n'oge emume nke abụọ nke Black na African Festival of Arts and Culture ma tinye ya n'ọnụ ụzọ nke National Arts Theatre na Lagos State
E bibiri ya na 2005 n'ihi ihu igwe mana onye na-ese ihe na-enweghị akara mepụtara ya na 2014
Queen Amina bụ nwa nwanyị mbụ nke Queen Bakwa Turunku, onye guzobere ala eze Zazzau
Ọ bụ eze nwanyị Agha Hausa nke Zazzau nke chịrị na mmalite narị afọ nke iri na isii
E mere ihe oyiyi Queen Amina iji cheta obi ike na ike ya
Ihe ọkpụkpụ Eze Nwanyị Amina bụ nnukwu ọla nchara na ihe a tụrụ atụ
Ọ na-egosi Queen Amina ji mpako na-eburu mma agha ya mgbe ọ na-agba ịnyịnya guzo ọtọ
Queen Brooks (amụrụ n'afọ 1943) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe si Columbus, Ohio, nke a maara nke ọma màkà ihe pụrụ iche ya, nke e sere n'ụzọ na-egbuke egbuke, nke a na-akpọ osisi ọkụ
The Columbus Dispatch akọwaala Brooks dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị omenkà Africa-America a ma ama n'Ohio,' na ónyé nduzi Columbus Museum of Art Nannette Maciejunes dị ka 'ónyé okenye nka na obodo anyị'
Brooks bụ ónyé nduzi nwere mmetụta nke ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe, gụnyere onye na-ese onyinyo uche April Sunami
Ọ bụ ónyé mmeri gàrà aga nke Lila Wallace, Reader's Digest International Artist Award, nke nyèrè ya mkpakọrịta na Abidjan, isi ọbọdọ nke mba West Africa nke Côte d'Ivoire

N'afọ 2012, otu a maara dị ka The HistoryMakers gbara Queen Brooks ajụjụ ọnụ màkà nchịkọta akụkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke vidiyo Africa na America, nke na-ezube ịzụlite 'ihe ndekọ nke akụkọ ihe mere anya America'

Brooks zụlitere dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe site n'aka otu ndị na-ese foto ojii nwèrè mmetụta na mpaghara Columbus, nke gụnyere Bill Agnew, ónyé na-akpụ osisi a ma ama na mba Elijah Pierce, onye na'èzí na-ese 'Grandpa Smoky' Brown, MacArthur Fellow Aminah Robinson, na ndị nduzi onwe Brooks, ónyé na ónyé na-ewere foto Kojo Kamau, na onye na onye mgbasa ozi Barbara Chavous
Ọ malitere ọrụ nka ya na-akụzi nka na ọrụ aka na J
Ashburn Jr
Youth Center na 1980, nke bụ ebe mbụ ọ zutere pyrography (ọkụ osisi)
Mgbè ọ natasịrị MFA ya na Mahadum steeti Ohio, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Abidjan, Ivory Coast, West Africa dị ka onye natara 1993 Lila Wallace, Readerz Digest International Artist Award

Queen Celestine (amụrụ ya na 18 Machị n’afo 1992) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe na onye isi nri nke e kpuwere okpueze nke kachasị mma na Nigeria Universe 2014 ma nọchite anya Naijiria n'asọmpi Miss Universe 2014
Queen bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Madonna na onye bụbu onye nnọchi anya Edo na Naịjirịa
Queen sonyere na asọmpi Miss Nigeria 2013 ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ
Queen meriri Miss Amity ma kpuwe ya okpueze dị ka MGBN Universe (Most Beautiful Girl in Nigeria) 2014 na July 19, 2014
N'otu ihe omume ahụ, e kpuwere ya okpueze ya na onye mmeri mbụ e kpuwere okpuezi dị ka MGBN World 2014, Iheoma Nnadi
Queen sonyere na asọm mpi Miss Universe 2014 wee merie dịka Miss Congeniality
Mkpurụ okwu sélénsé
'BDana Elaine Owens (amuru March 18, 1970), onye amara dika Queen Latifah, bu onye obodo America, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na onye ọbụ abụ

Amụrụ ya na Newark, New Jersey, ọ bịanyere aka na Tommy Boy Records na 1989 wee wepụta album mbụ ya All Hail the Queen na abalị iri abụo na asatọ na onwa November, na afọr 1989, na-egosipụta otu egwu ana akpo 'Ladies First'
Nature of a Sista (1991) bụ album ya nke abụọ na nke ikpeazụ ya na Tommy Boy Records
Queen Latifah gbara egwu dị ka Khadijah James na Fox sitcom Living Single site na afor 1993 ruo 1998

Ndekọ ya nke atọ, Black Reign (1993), ghọrọ album mbụ nke onye na-agụ nwanyị solo nwetara nzere RIAA, wee wepụta otu ' UNITY ', bụ nke nwere mmetụta n'ịzụlite mmata banyere ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị na ebumnuche nke Mmekọahụ nwanyị ojii
Ihe ndekọ ahụ meriri Grammy Award na ọnụ ọgụgụ kasị elu na Nke 23 na Hot 100
O mechara bụrụ onye ndu nke Set It Off (1996) wee wepụta album ya nke anọ, Order in the Court, na June 16, 1998 na Motown Records
Latifah nwetara otuto na ọrụ ya nke Matron 'Mama' Morton na ihe nkiri egwu Chicago (2002), na-anata nhọpụta maka Academy Award for Best Support Actress
Latifah weputara album nke ise ya The Dana Owens Album na 2004
Na 2007 na 2009, o wepụtara album ọzọ na studio – Trav'lin' Light na Persona
O kere ihe ngosi okwu ụbọchị ehihie The Queen Latifah Show, nke sitere na 1999 ruo 2001, na ọzọ site na 2013 ruo 2015, na syndication

Ọ pụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, dị ka Bringing Down the House (2003), Taxi (2004), Barbershop 2 Back in Business (2005), Beauty Shop (2005), Ikpeazụ Holiday (2006), Hairspray (2007), Joyful Noise (2012), 22 Jump Street (2014) na Girls Trip (2017) ma nye ọrụ olu na usoro ihe nkiri Ice Age

Latifah nwetara nkwanye ùgwù dị egwu maka ihe ngosi ya nke onye na-agụ egwú blues Bessie Smith na ihe nkiri HBO Bessie (2015), nke o mebere, na-emeri Primtime Emmy Award for Outstanding Television Movie
Site na 2016 ruo 2019, ọ gbara egwu dị ka Carlotta Brown na usoro ihe nkiri egwu Star
Na 2020, o gosipụtara Hattie McDaniel na miniseries Hollywood
Akpọrọ Queen Latifah dị ka ' Queen of Rap ' site n'ọtụtụ akụkọ mgbasa ozi, yana 'rap's first feminist'
Latifah ghọrọ onye omenkà hip hop mbụ nwetara kpakpando na Hollywood Walk of Fame (2006)
Ọrụ Latifah na egwu, ihe nkiri na telivishọn enwetawo ya Grammy Award, Emmy Award, Golden Globe Award, atọ Screen Actors Guild Awards, abụọ NAACP Image Awards, na Academy Award nomination
A mụrụ Dana Elaine Owens na Newark, New Jersey, na Maachị 18, 1970, wee biri na East Orange, New Jersey
Ọ bụ ada Rita Lamae (née Bray; d
2018), onye nkuzi na Irvington High School (Latifah's alma mater ), na Lancelot Amos Owens, onye uwe ojii
Ndị mụrụ ya gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe Latifah dị afọ iri
A zụlitere Latifah na okwukwe Baptist
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Katọlik na Newark, New Jersey na Essex Catholic Girls High School na Irvington, mana ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Irvington High School
Mgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị gasịrị, Queen Latifah gara klas na Borough of Manhattan Community College
Ọ chọtara aha ogbo ya, Latifah ( لطيفة laţīfa ), nke pụtara 'dị nro' na 'ụdị dị ukwuu' n'asụsụ Arabic, n'akwụkwọ nke aha Arabic mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
Ogologo oge niile, 5-foot-10-inch (178 m) Latifah bụ ike na-aga n'ihu na otu egwuregwu basketball nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ rụrụ nọmba ' Ụlọ ' site na egwu The Wiz na egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ ụtọ asụsụ

Ọ malitere ịkụ ọkpọ maka òtù hip-hop Ladies Fresh na bụ onye mbụ so na Flavor Unit, nke, n'oge ahụ, bụ ndị ọrụ MC na-agbakọta gburugburu onye mmepụta DJ King Gemini, bụ onye mere ihe ngosi ngosi nke Queen Latifah's rap Princess nke Posse
O nyere Fab 5 Freddy, onye ọbịa Yo! MTV Raps
Egwu ahụ nwetara nlebara anya nke onye ọrụ Tommy Boy Music Dante Ross, bụ onye bịanyere aka na Latifah na 1989 nyere otu mbụ ya, 'Wrath of My Madness'
Ndị na-ese ihe na-adịbeghị anya, dị ka Ice Cube na Lil 'Kim, ga-aga n'ihu na-atụ egwu egwu Latifah na egwu ha, 'Wrath of Kim's Madness' na 'Ị pụghị igwu egwu na My Yo-Yo' n'afọ ndị ọzọ
Latifah nwere oke olu-octave abụọ
A na-ewere ya dị ka onye contralto, nwere ikike nke ma rap na ịbụ abụ
Latifah mere akara ya na hip-hop site n'ịkọ banyere okwu gbasara ịbụ nwanyị ojii
Egwu ya kpuchiri isiokwu gụnyere ime ihe ike n'ụlọ, mmaja n'okporo ámá, na nsogbu mmekọrịta
Freddy nyeere Latifah aka ịbanye na Tommy Boy Records, bụ nke wepụtara Latifah album mbụ All Hail the Queen na 1989, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu
N'afọ ahụ, ọ pụtara dị ka Referee na UK label Music of Life album 1989 – Mgbakọ ndị Hustler (dị ndụ)
Ọ natara onyinye nturu ugo Candace site na National Coalition of 100 Black Women na 1992
Otu 'Ladies First' nke gosipụtara Monie Love ghọrọ egwu mbụ na-arụkọ ọrụ nke ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na-agụ egwú na-abụghị otu

Na 1993, o wepụtara album Black Reign, bụ nke enwetara ikike Gold na United States wee mepụta abụ mmeri nke Grammy Award ' UNITY ' Na 1998, Ro Smith mebere ya, ugbu a CEO nke Def Ro Inc, o weputara album hip-hop nke anọ ya Order in the Court, nke Motown Records weputara
Latifah bụkwa onye otu hip-hop mkpokọta asụsụ obodo
Latifah rụrụ na Super Bowl XXXII ihe nkiri ọkara, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye mbụ rapper ime ya
Mgbe Order na Courtlọikpe gasịrị, Latifah gbanwere n'ụzọ bụ isi na-abụ egwu mkpụrụ obi na ụkpụrụ jazz, nke o jirila obere oge na ndekọ ndekọ hip-hop ya gara aga
Na 2004, o wepụtara ụkpụrụ mkpụrụ obi / jazz The Dana Owens Album
Na Julaị 11, 2007, Latifah bụrụ abụ na Hollywood Bowl a ma ama na Los Angeles dị ka isi okwu na egwu egwu jazz dị ndụ
N'ihu igwe mmadụ karịrị 12,400, ndị otu egwu egwu dị ndụ 10 na ndị na-akụ azụ azụ atọ kwadoro ya, bụ nke akwụ ụgwọ dị ka Queen Latifah Orchestra
Latifah mere nhazi ọhụrụ nke ụkpụrụ gụnyere ' California Dreaming ', nke mbụ emere na 1960 akara ngosi Mamas & Papas na -ewu ewu
Mgbe e mesịrị na 2007, Latifah wepụtara album akpọrọ Trav'lin' Light
Jill Scott, Erykah Badu, Joe Sample, George Duke, Christian McBride, na Stevie Wonder mere ndị ọbịa anya
Ahọpụtara ya maka Grammy na ngalaba 'Best Traditional Pop Vocal Album'
Na 2009, Latifah, tinyere NJPAC Jubilation Choir, dekọrọ egwu egwu na album Oh, Happy Day An All-Star Music Celebration, na-ekpuchi egwu nke Edwin Hawkins Singers mere na-ewu ewu na 1969
Azụlitere na East Orange, New Jersey, Latifah abụrụla onye bi na Colts Neck, New Jersey ; Rumson, New Jersey ; na Beverly Hills, California
Egburu nwanne Latifah nke tọrọ, Lancelot Jr
na 1992 na ihe mberede metụtara ọgba tum tum Latifah zụtara ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ 2006 kpughere na Latifah ka na-eyi igodo ọgba tum tum n'olu ya, na-ahụ anya n'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ na sitcom Living Single
O nyekwaara ya ọchịchị ojii
N'akwụkwọ akụkọ onwe ya nke 1999, Ladies First Mkpughe nke nwanyị siri ike, Latifah kwurịtara otú ọnwụ nwanne ya si mee ka ịda mbà n'obi na ịṅụ ọgwụ ọjọọ eme ihe, bụ nke o mesịrị gbakee
Na 1995, a tara Latifah n'ụgbọ ala, nke mekwara ka e gbaa enyi ya nwoke, Sean Moon
N'afọ 1996, e jidere ya ma bo ya ebubo inwe wii wii na inwe egbe aka juru
Na 2002, e jidere ya maka ịkwọ ụgbọ ala n'okpuru mmetụta na mpaghara Los Angeles
E tinyere ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ afọ atọ ka e kpechara ya ikpe
Na Machị 21, 2018, nne ya, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Rita Owens, nwụrụ n'ihi nkụchi obi, okwu ọ nọ na-alụ kemgbe 2004

Ogologo oge Latifah jụrụ ịkọ nkọ banyere mmekọahụ na ndụ onwe ya, na-agwa New York Times na 2008 na 'Ọ dịghị m ka m kwesịrị ịkọrọ ndụ m, ọ dịghịkwa m ịma ma ndị mmadụ chere na m bụ nwoke nwere mmasị nwoke ma ọ bụ ọ bụghị'
Na BET Awards 2021, n'oge okwu nnabata ya maka onyinye onyinye ndụ ndụ, o kwuputara n'ihu ọha onye ibe ya Eboni Nichols na nwa Rebel maka oge mbụ, mechie okwu ahụ na ' Nganga obi ụtọ!'
Akpọrọ Queen Latifah dị ka ' Queen of Rap ' Kpọpụta njehie Invalid tag; refs with no name must have content na 'Queen of Hip Hop' site n'ọtụtụ akụkọ mgbasa ozi
Dinitia Smith dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka magazin (1990) kpọrọ ya 'Queen of Rap' na akụkọ profaịlụ ya
N'akwụkwọ bụ Notable Black American Women, Jessie Carney Smith weere ya 'onye mbụ nwanyị rap' na 'otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole na-eme akara na mpaghara egwu rap na-achịkwa nwoke'

Ụdị dị iche iche kpọrọ ya 'otu n'ime ndị isi ụzọ maka ụmụ nwanyị na hip-hop ọgbara ọhụrụ,' na The Guardian weere ya 'onye ọsụ ụzọ nke rap nwanyị' Onye edemede AllMusic Steve Huey kwuru na Latifah abụghị 'n'ezie ọ bụghị nwanyị mbụ rapper, mana ọ bụ onye mbụ ghọrọ ezigbo kpakpando' Latifah ghọrọ onye mbụ solo rapper nke enwetara asambodo RIAA maka album ( Black Reign ), ọganihu azụmahịa nke onye nchịkọta akụkọ AllMusic tụlere na nke mepụtara ụzọ maka 'ndị ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ nkà nke ụmụ nwanyị rapper iji mee onwe ha ụzọ na chaatị dị ka 90s gara n'ihu'
Ọganihu ya nyekwara aka idobe New Jersey na maapụ hip hop

Dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ African American Review si kwuo, vidio egwu ụmụ nwanyị na-ekpo ọkụ nke afrocentric maka 'Ladies First' gosipụtara 'oge telivishọn' ma mebie ọganihu nke mmekọahụ na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke na-achịkwa vidiyo egwu n'oge ahụ
Edepụtara egwu a na egwu 500 nke Rock and Roll Hall of Fame nke Shaped Rock and Roll, wee bụrụ otu n'ime ederede izizi iji lebara ụkpụrụ ndakpọ nke mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị na ndụ obodo

Onye edemede Tricia Rose kwupụtara na ọ 'nyere hip-hop maka mmepe nke pro-nwanyị pro-black diasporas nsụhọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị' N'ihi ya, Okla Jones kwuru na egwu ' UNITY '-nke egwu na-eche mkparị megide ụmụ nwanyị na omenala hip-hop ma na-eleba anya n'ụdị enweghị nkwanye ùgwù ndị ọzọ-mepụtara ụzọ maka ndị na-egwu egwu nwanyị n'ọdịnihu ka ha bụrụ 'ezigbo onwe ha'
Magazin ya dị ka nwanyị mbụ rapper gafere na TV & ihe nkiri, dị ka onye na-ese ihe “mebiri ihe mgbochi ma setịpụ ụkpụrụ” maka ụmụ nwanyị ojii na egwu ịgbaso, wee kpọọ ya dị ka “Nwanyị mbụ nke hip
-Hop'

Na 2020, onye nchịkọta akụkọ Vogue Janelle Okwodu lere ya anya dị ka akara ngosi ejiji nke 'nyere aka ịmalite mkparịta ụka gbasara onyonyo ahụ na-aga n'ihu ruo taa', na-eto ya n'etiti ndị mbụ na-ese ihe bụ ndị sụrụ ụzọ 'ọnọdụ ihu igwe nke mkpokọta nha na ihe ngosi nke ụdị niile'

Queen Latifah ghọrọ mmetụta na R&B, mkpụrụ obi, na ndị na-ese hip-hop, dị ka Eve, Da Brat, Lil'Kim, Fugees, Jill Scott, Lauryn Hill, Missy Elliott, Remy Ma, Ivy Queen, Foxy Brown, Nwada Dynamite, Naughty site Nature, Rapsody, Megan Thee Stallion, yana ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Michael K
Williams, Keke Palmer, Vin Diesel, na onye edemede Jason Reynolds
Onye na-egwu egwu Lin-Manuel Miranda ekwuola na Latifah kpaliri ihe ngosi nke Angelica Schuyler na egwu Hamilton
Queen Latifah ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-edekọ ihe nkiri hip-hop ka ahọpụtara ya maka Oscar
N'afọ 2003, Harvard Foundation nyere Queen Latifah Artist of the Year
Na 2006, Latifah ghọrọ onye mbụ na-ese hip-hop nwetara kpakpando na Hollywood Walk of Fame, ma kpọbakwara ya n'Ụlọ Nzukọ nke New Jersey na 2011
N'ọrụ egwu ya, Queen Latifah erela ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nde abụọ na US
Mgbọrọgwụ ahụ họọrọ ya na nọmba 35 na ndepụta mgbọrọgwụ 100
Na 2017, American Black Film Festival kwanyere Latifah ihe nrite ihe ngosi ihe ngosi
Na 2018, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta Dọkịta nke Fine Arts site na Mahadum Rutgers
Na 2019, Mahadum Harvard nyere Queen Latifah nrite WEB Du Bois maka onyinye omenala

Ọ bụ onye nnata nke Grammy Award site na nhọpụta isii, onyinye Golden Globe, abụọ Screen Actors Guild Awards sitere na nhọpụta ise, abụọ NAACP Image Awards sitere na nhọpụta iri na atọ, otu Primetime Emmy Award site na nhọpụta atọ, na Academy Award nomination
N'afọ 2021, ọ natara ihe nrite BET Lifetime Achievement Award
Albums Studio
Latifah, Jill Scott na Erykah Badu sonyeere imepụta na nwe ikike nke Sugar Water Festival Tour, LLC
Ndị na-abụ abụ atọ niile gbakọrọ ọnụ mgbe ha na-akpọ egwu duo Floetry na 2005 na onye na-agụ egwú Kelis na 2006 dị ka mmeghe
Onye ọchị ọchị/onye na-eme ihe nkiri Mo'Nique jere ozi dị ka onye ọbịa maka njem mmiri mmiri nke 2006

Elizabeth Angela Marguerite Bowes-Lyon (4 August 1900 30 March 2002) bụ Eze Nwanyị nke mba United Kingdom na Dominions nke ndi British Commonwealth site na 11 Dicemba 1936 ruo 6 February 1952 dị ka nwunye nke Eze George nke Isii
Ọ bụ eze nwanyị ikpeazụ nke India site na nna ya n'afọ 1936 ruo mgbe a gbasara British Raj n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1947
Mgbe di ya nwụsịrị, a maara ya dị ka Queen Elizabeth The Queen Mother, iji zere mgbagwoju anya na nwa ya nwanyị, Queen Elizabeth nke abua
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ ndị isi mba Britain, Elizabeth ghọrọ onye a ma ama na 1923 mgbe ọ lụrụ Duke nke obodo York, nwa nwoke nke abụọ nke Eze George V na Eze Nwanyị Mary
Di na nwunye ahụ na ụmụ ha nwanyị Elizabeth na Margaret gosipụtara echiche ọdịnala nke ezinụlọ na ọrụ ọha na eze
Duchess mere ihe dịgasị iche iche n'ihu ọha ma bụrụ onye a maara maka ihu ihu ya na-atọ ụtọ
N'afọ 1936, di Elizabeth ghọrọ eze na mberede mgbe nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye, Edward nke asatọ, hapụrụ ọchịchị iji lụọ onye mba America gbara alụkwaghịm bụ Wallis Simpson
Elizabeth wee bụrụ eze nwanyị
Ọ sonyeere di ya na njem nnọchiteanya na France na North America tupu mmalite nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
N'oge agha ahụ, mmụọ ya yiri ka ọ na-enweghị nchịkwa nyere nkwado omume ọma nye ndị mba Britain
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, ahụike di ya kara njọ, ọ ghọkwara di ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 51
Nwa ya nwanyị nke okenye, nke dị afọ 25, ghọrọ eze nwanyị ọhụrụÀtụ Notelist
Queen Nwokoye' (amuru na 11 August n'afọ 1982) bu nwa ada naijiria nke na eme ihe nkiri na ónyonyò
Akacha amaraya maka na ono na ime ihe nkiri nke obu onye isi na ndi otu ka ha so mee ihe egwuregwu na ime 2014 nke ana akpo Chetanna
Queen bu onye amuru na obodo Lagos State na ime ezi na ulo Catholic ma na obu onye Anambra State
Oguchara akwukwo sekondiri na Queen's College, nke di na Enugu tupu owee gawa mahadum nke Nnamdi Azikiwe ebe nke ono wee guo akwukwo ana akpo 'Sociology and Anthropology'
Obu uzo buru na obi ka ogu akwụkwọ ima iwu nke ana akpo onye ikpe

ke mgbe oguchara egwu na afo 2004 na ime ihe onyonyo nke ana kpo Nna Men, Queen garaniru ibu onye gbara na ime otutu ihe nkiri egwu nke ndi Naijiria,nke oji otutu itu ugo na nhoputa maka itu ugoChidumga Izuzu (11 August 2015)
Queen Nwokoye ihe ise Ana anya ị maghị maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri
pulseng
Retrieved on 22 Mee 2016
Victoria (Alexandrina Victoria; 24 Mee 1819 – 22 Jenụarị 1901) bụ Queen nke United Kingdom nke Great Britain na Ireland site na 20 June 1837 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1901
Ọchịchị ya nke afọ 63 na ọnwa asaa dị ogologo karịa ọchịchị Britain ọ bụla gara aga
eze ma mara ya dị ka oge Victoria
Ọ bụ oge mgbanwe nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, sayensị na agha n'ime United Kingdom, ma nnukwu mgbasawanye nke Alaeze Ukwu Britain mara ya
Na 1876, ndị omeiwu Britain kpebiri inye ya aha ọzọ nke Empress nke India
Nne eze nwanyị (nke a na-akpọkwa Queenmother) bụ okwu a na-eji akọwa ụfọdụ ndị ọchịchị ọdịnala nwanyị na ọdịbendị Afrịka

Ọ bụ ezie na enweghi nkọwa zuru oke banyere 'nne eze nwanyị', dịka ọrụ ha dịgasị iche site na ọha mmadụ, ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na ọdịbendị, ha na-arụkarị ọrụ dị mkpa na gọọmentị ime obodo ma 'na-ejide ike na mmetụta ọha na eze'

Ha bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na ọdịbendị gafee kọntinent Afrịka ndị Akan, dịka ọmụmaatụ, ghọtara ha dị ka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị mkpa ma na-achọpụta ihe nketa site na ha n'ụzọ nne; ebe na Uganda, enwere ike iji okwu ahụ kọwaa ụmụ nwanyị na-achị kpamkpam
Ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ndị nne eze nwanyị na-achị ugbu a ebelatawo kemgbe oge ndị ọchịchị na-achị ala ọzọ, ọ bụ ezie na narị afọ nke 21 ahụla ka mmetụta ha na-eto n'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ
Ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị otu African Queens and Women Cultural Leaders Network, otu ọrụ afọ ofufo
Ndị nne eze nwanyị bụbu ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị mkpa bụ ndị nyere iwu nkwanye ùgwù tupu oge ọchịchị

Otú ọ dị, ndị nnọchiteanya nke ọrụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị a dịgasị iche iche n'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ, a na-ewere ha dị ka ndị na-achị onwe ha, na ndị ọzọ, ha nwere ikike kpọmkwem maka okwu 'ụmụ nwanyị' (ma ọ bụ okwu metụtara ma nwoke na nwanyị ọnụ, dị ka idina mmadụ n'ike)
ịkwa iko na esemokwu alụmdi na nwunye), n'ebe ndị ọzọ ka, ha bụ nanị nne nkịtị nke ndị a ma ama, ma nwee ọnọdụ niile dị na ya
Ndị na-achị ala si Europe, n'ihi ịkpa ókè nwoke na nwanyị nke ha, na-ekwurịta okwu naanị na ndị ikom nwere aha na mpaghara ha na-arụ ọrụ
Ndị nne eze nwanyị n'Africa, n'ụzọ bụ isi, a maghị ha dị ka ndị dị mkpa ma na-akpọkarị ha n'akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị ọchịchị / ozi ala ọzọ dị ka 'ụmụnne nwanyị' nke ndị ikom nọ n'ọchịchị

Ịgọnahụ ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị ndị a chere ihu mere ka ọ dịrị ha mfe ịla n'iyi - ya mere, n'okpuru ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị, ndị nne eze nwanyị, dị ka ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ nọ na kọntinent ahụ, tụfuru 'ihe ùgwù na ikike mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, okpukpe, iwu, na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị'
Queeneth Agbor (amụrụ na Calabar) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye mgbasa ozi
A zụlitere ya na Calabar, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na microbiology na Mahadum Calabar
Ọ kwagara Lagos, mgbe ọ nwetasịrị mmetụta na ndị mmadụ na-enye ya ' nrụgide' ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Kemgbe ahụ, a maara ya maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Nollywood dịka Painful Kingdom ya na Olu Jacobs, Hooked ya na Francis Duru na The Movement
Quentin 'Dragon' Chong bụ onye South Africa ọkachamara na-eme egwuregwu, onye na-enye ọzụzụ / onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri America, usoro TV mpaghara, mgbasa ozi na magazin
A mụrụ Quentin Chong, onye a na-akpọ 'Dragon', n'afọ 1972, na Gaborone, Botswana
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụnne atọ
Ọ tolitere na Cape Town, South Africa, ebe ọ ka bi
Dị ka nwatakịrị, mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, ọ nwetara ọzụzụ na Chinese Kung Fu na Hong Kong

Na nleta ọ gara Thailand na mbido afọ 1990 ọ malitere ọzụzụ na Muaythai (nke a makwaara dị ka Muay Thai), egwuregwu ọgụ a ma ama nke Thailand, n'okpuru Manop Maswichean, onye bụ onye mmeri ụwa na ụdị ịdị arọ nke egwuregwu a
N'afọ 2001, a mara ya aka n'ọgụ World Muaythai n'ọkwa dị n'etiti, na Chumphon, Thailand, megide Saroonsak
O meriri World Champion Title ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịgbachitere ya na 2002 na Cape Town, South Africa, megide Nokweit Davies (Nokweed Devy), onye bụkwa onye mmeri ụwa na ụdị ịdị arọ dị n'etiti
O meriri iri na asatọ n'ime iri na itoolu ọgụ ndị ọkachamara
Agha ya na 2002, megide Davies, bụ ọgụ ikpeazụ ya
Mmekọrịta ya ugbu a na egwuregwu ahụ bụ dịka onye isi oche, onye nkuzi na onye njikwa nke South African Amateur Muaythai Foundation
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a na Executive Board nke International Federation of Muaythai Amateur

Quentin apụtala na usoro telivishọn na ihe nkiri dị iche iche dị ka Wake of Death, Death Race 2 na Number One Girl(2005) ma egosipụtala ya na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dị ka Jean-Claude Van Damme, Pat Morita na Vinnie Jones

A wara ya ahụ iji dochie ntutu isi na-acha nchara nchara mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ South Africa, magazin, mgbasa ozi telivishọn na ihe ngosi dịka Top Billing, usoro telivisheneng South Africa 'Way of the Warrior' na usoro telivisọn mba ụwa 'Strikeback' Ọ zụrụ ndị agha ndị ọzọ a ma ama na mba ụwa dịka Randy Courture ma na-elekwasị anya ugbu a na ọzụzụ ndị agha na mmega ahụ nke ya a na-akpọ Dragon Power Muaythai, MMA na Fitness Centre , nke dị na Cape Town

Mgbalị enyemaka ya gụnyere itinye aka na Amy Biehl Foundation Trust yana otu ya na-enweghị uru nke a na-akpọ South African Muaythai Against Drugs Association, nke na-agụnye ọzụzụ nka ọgụ, ịkụ ọkpọ Africa na ịgba egwu ọdịnala maka ụmụaka sitere na obodo ndị dị gburugburu Cape Town
Quil Lemons (amụrụ n'afọ 1997) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Philadelphia Museum of Art na International Center of Photography
N'afọ 2021, ọ ghọrọ onye kachasị nta na-ese foto nke e ji mee ihe n'ihu Vanity Fair
Lemons tolitere na South Philadelphia
Ọ gara Charter High School for Architecture and Design na Philadelphia na The New School na New York
N'afọ 2017, Lemons wepụtara usoro foto a na-akpọ GlitterBoy E gosipụtara foto ya na akwụkwọ gụnyere The New York Times, Variety, na Vogue
E ji foto Lemons nke Billie Eilish mee ihe na mkpuchi ọnwa Maachị afọ 2021 nke Vanity Fair, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye kachasị nta na-ese foto mkpuchi magazin ahụ
Ọ bụ onye na-ese foto maka mkpọsa mgbasa ozi nke Savage X Pride Collection na-eme emume LGBT Pride site na Rihanna's Savage X Fenty fashion label
A gụnyere Lemons n'akwụkwọ The New Black Vanguard Photography Between Art and Fashion nke Antwaun Sargent
Lemons bi na Brooklyn, New York
Ihe mkpuchi nke Gee's Bend bụ ihe mkpuchi nke otu ụmụ nwanyị na ndị nna nna ha bi ma ọ bụ biri n'ọbọdọ nta ndị Africa America dịpụrụ adịpụ nke Gee'S Bend, Alabama n'akụkụ Osimiri Alabama
Ihe mkpuchi nke Gee's Bend so n'ime ihe kachasị mkpa ndị Afrịka na America na-ahụ ányà na ọdịbendị nyèrè aka na akụkọ ihe méré eme nke nka na United States
Arlonzia Pettway, Annie Mae Young na Mary Lee Bendolph so n'ime ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-eme akwa akwa akwa a ma ama na Gee's Bend
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bi n'ọbọdọ ahụ nwere ike ịchọta ndị nna nna ha laghachi azụ na ndị ohu si na Pettway Plantation
Arlonzia Pettway nwere ike icheta akụkọ nne nne ya banyéré ndị nna nna ya, ọkachasị nke Dinah Miller, onye e ji ụgbọ ohu kpọbata na United States na 1859
N'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Selma, na Black Belt nke Alabama, Gee's Bend (nke a na-akpọ Boykin) bụ ọbọdọ dịpụrụ adịpụ, nke dị n'ime ime obodo nke ihe dị ka narị mmadụ asaa
A na-akpọ mpaghara ahụ aha Joseph Gee, ónyé nwe ala nke si North Carolina wee guzobe ubi owu na 1816 ya na ndị ohu ya iri na asaá
N'afọ 1845, e rere ubi ahụ na Mark H
Pettway
Ọtụtụ ndị ọbọdọ ahụ ka na-ebu aha ahụ
Mgbè nnwere onwe gasịrị, ọtụtụ ndị ohu a tọhapụrụ na ndị ezinụlọ nọgidere n'ugbo ahụ dị ka ndị na-ekere òkè
Omenala akwa akwa na Gee's Bend laghachiri azụ karịa narị afọ nke iri na itoolu ma nwee ike ịbụ na ọ nwèrè mmetụta n'akụkụ ụfọdụ site na akwa ndị American Indian na akwa ndị Africa
Ụmụ nwanyị Africa-America jikọtara akwa akwa iji mee ihe mkpuchi àkwà

N'ime afọ ndị agha gachara na narị afọ nke irí abụọ, ụmụ nwanyị Gee's Bend mèrè akwa iji mee ka onwe ha na ụmụ ha na-ekpo ọkụ n'ụlọ ndị na-enweghị okpomọkụ nke na-enweghị mmiri, ekwentị na ọkụ eletrik
N'ụzọ ha mepụtara ụdị pụrụ iche, nke a maara màkà ihe ndị dị egwu na ịdị mfe geometric
Ọtụtụ n'ime akwa akwa akwa bụ ihe dị iche na ime akwa akwa ógè ochie, na-eme ka anyị cheta àgwà dị mfe
Nke a nwekwara ike ịbụ n'ihi ikewapụ ha, nke chọrọ iji ihe ọ bụla dị n'aka, na-emekarị ka ha jiri uwe ochie na akwa ochie mee ihe
N'afọ 2003, ndị na-eme akwa irí isé guzobere Gee's Bend Collective, nke ụmụ nwanyị Gee's bend nwèrè ma na-arụ ọrụ
Akpụkpọ anụ ọ bụla Gee's Bend Quilt Collective na-ere bụ ihe pụrụ iche ma na-emepụta n'otu n'otu
N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, ndị otu Collective emeela njem na mba niile iji kwuo màkà akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Gee's Bend na nka ha
Ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ahụ aghọwo ndị a ma ama maka ọgụgụ isi ha, àgwà na-adọrọ mmasị na, n'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ, ikike ịbụ abụ

N'afọ 2015, ndị na-eme akwa akwa Gee's Bend Mary Lee Bendolph, Lucy Mingo, na Loretta Pettway bụ ndị jikọrọ aka nweta National Heritage Fellowship nke National Endowment for the Arts nyèrè, nke bụ nsọpụrụ kachasị elu nke gọọmentị United States na nka ọdịnala na ọdịnala

Quincy Sumbo Ayodele, nke a maara dị ka Quincy, bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka iji mkpọrọgwụ na mkpaakwụkwọ were agwọ oria, onye ọchụnta ego, onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụgwọ ahịhịa na nlekọta anụ ahụ na onye isi oche nke Quincy Herbals, onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka nlekọta ahụike ahịhịa
Ọ bụ onye kọmitii ọkachamara nke Òtù Ahụ Ike Mba Ụwa na mmepe nke ọgwụ ọdịnala na omume Africa
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado maka ntinye ọgwụ ọdịnala Africa n'ime usoro nlekọta ahụike
Quincy bụ onye guzobere Herbal Slimmers and Weight Loss Association of Nigeria na ode akwukwọ nke mbu nke otu National Association of Nigerian Traditional Medicine Practitioners (NANTMP)
O hibere otu a na-adịghị akwụ ụgwọ a kpọrọ Self-Employed Women Association of Nigeria (SEWAN), nke gbadoro anya na ịzụ ahịa ụmụ nwanyị
Tupu e hiwe Quincy Herbals, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ na Societe Generale Bank Nigeria Limited ebe o mechara bụrụ onye enyemaka nke onye isi ụlọ akụ ahụ
Amuru ya n'Abeokuta, isi obodo Ogun State, Nigeria n'ime ezinaụlọ nke Chief Amos Oluwole Sodimu
Ọ nọrọ na nọrọ nne nna ya, Mabel Osunmi Sodimu n'ime obodo Olorunsogo mgbe nne na nna ya kwagara United Kingdom bụ onye ọ mụtara nkà ọgwụ mkpọrọgwụ na mkpaakwụkwọ n'aka ya

Ọ gara African Church Primary School dị na Yambi Village na Comprehensive High School, Ayetoro nke di kwa na Ogun steeti tupu ọ gaa Ogun State Polytechnic maka nzere mana ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ tupu ule ikpeazụ ịga Pitman's Central College, London, ebe ọ nwetara nzere diploma
n'ọchịchị odeakwụkwọ
Ọ laghachiri Naijiria, sonye n'ọrụ Societe Generale Bank Nigeria Limited dịka odeakwụkwọ, ma mechaa bụrụ onye enyemaka nke onye isi ụlọ akụ ahụ
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm ka o jere ozi ihe karịrị afọ iri na abụọ na ngalaba ụlọ akụ, o mere nke a ka o wee guzobe azụmahịa nke ya

Tupu o hiwe Quincy Herbals, o nwetara diplọma na nkà mmụta ọgwụ sitere na Nigerian College of Natural Medicine, ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbakwunye nke Federal Ministry of Science and Technology, Victoria Island, Lagos
Ọ gụkwara akwụkwọ gbasara ọrịa naturopathy na United States wee gaa ọtụtụ ọmụmụ ihe gbasara ọgwụgwọ ọdịnala na China
O ji pụkụ naira ise wee hiwe Quincy Herbals (dọla iri na asatọ na 6 Julaị 2016)
A na-enweta ụfọdụ n'ime ego ahụ site na ire puff-puff
Quincy bụ onye kọmitii ọkachamara na otu World Health Organisation na mmepe nke ọgwụ ọdịnala na omume Africa
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado maka ntinye ọgwụ ọdịnala Africa n'ime usoro nlekọta ahụike

Ọ bụ onye guzobere Herbal Slimmers and Weight Loss Association of Nigeria na onye ode akwukwọ nke mbu nke National Association of Nigerian Traditional Medicine Practitioners (NANTMP) O guzobekwara otu nzukọ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ, Self-Employed Women Association of Nigeria

Quinn L
Cummings (amuru Ọgọst 13, 1967) bụ onye ọchụnta ego America, ode akwụkwọ, onye ọchị ọchị, onye mepụtara ihe na onye bụbu onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Cummings na Los Angeles, California
Nna ya, Sumner, bụ onye ọchụnta ego nwụrụ mgbe ọ ka bụ nwata
Nne ya, Jan, bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ

Cummings bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama dị ka nwatakịrị na-eme ihe nkiri, na-egwu Lucy McFadden na Neil Simon 's The Goodbye Girl, nke a họpụtara ya maka ihe nrite Academy Award for Best Support Actress, yana ọrụ ugboro ugboro dị ka Annie Cooper na usoro telivishọn ezinụlọ
Kemgbe ọ kwụsịrị ime ihe nkiri, ọ ghọrọ onye ọchụnta ego, ma bipụtala ọtụtụ akwụkwọ
Cummings malitere ọrụ ya mgbe onye cinematographer James Wong Howe chọtara ya
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ malitere ọrụ ọdịda n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi telivishọn, mechaa merie ọrụ nke ada Marsha Mason, Lucy McFadden, na ihe nkiri 1977 The Goodbye Girl
Ahọpụtara arụmọrụ Cummings maka ihe nrite Academy maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-akwado kacha mma yana onyinye Golden Globe maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-akwado kacha mma - Foto Motion
Na 1978, Cummings nwere ọrụ ugboro ugboro na usoro ihe nkiri Ezinụlọ
Na 1985, Cummings pụtara na obere oge ABC sitcom Hail to the Chief dị ka ada nke nwanyị mbụ onye isi ala United States, nke Patty Duke na-egwuri
N'ime ngwụcha 1980s, Cummings na-eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ wee rụọ ọrụ dịka onye nnọchi anya nkedo
Ọ gara UCLA afọ abụọ ma nwee ndị na-ede akwụkwọ na-ede akwụkwọ iji bipụta akụkọ dị mkpirikpi n'ịntanetị
Ọrụ ikpeazụ ya mere bụ ihe omume 1991 nke Blossom
N'ịbụ onye sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ mụọ nwa ya nwanyị, Cummings kere HipHugger, ngwaọrụ ụdị èbè maka iburu nwa
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ HipHugger tupu ere ya na 2006
Akwụkwọ mbụ Cummings, Notes from the Underwire Adventures from My Awkwad and Lovely Life, bipụtara na July 2009
Akwụkwọ ya nke abụọ, The Year of Learning Dangerously, nke na-enyocha ọnọdụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ugbu a na America, bụ Perigee Books bipụtara na August 2012

Pet Sounds, nchịkọta akụkọ na-atọ ọchị gbasara anụmanụ na anụ ụlọ ka ewepụtara n'oge okpomọkụ nke 2013 N'afọ malitere pọdkastị 'Quinn Cummings na-enye ndụmọdụ ọjọọ ' nke ọ na-aza ajụjụ ndị na-ege ntị na isiokwu ndụmọdụ ọ bụla, na-eme ka eziokwu ahụ pụta ìhè na ọ nweghị ihe ọmụma ma ọ bụ ọkachamara na isiokwu a na-ewelite
Cummings kwuru okwu wee dee otu akụkọ na 2017 gbasara mmegbu mmekọahụ na Hollywood, karịsịa mmetọ ụmụaka na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ 2000, Cummings mụrụ nwa nwanyị, Anneke DiPietro, site na onye òtù ọlụlụ ya Donald DiPietro

A na-ahụ nsụgharị n'ọtụtụ mba nke ụwa Arab, na ụdị na ntụziaka dị iche iche
Na Maghreb na Ijipt, a na-ejikarị tii Libya, kọfị Arabic ma ọ bụ tii mint Maghrebi
Ghoriba anọwo na mpaghara Nnukwu Syria, Iraq na mba ndị Arab ndị ọzọ kemgbe oge ochie
Ha yiri polvorones si Andalusia

Kurabiye pụtara na nri Ottoman na narị afọ nke iri na ise

E nwere arụmụka ụfọdụ banyere mmalite nke okwu ndị ahụ
Ụfọdụ enyeghị mmalite ọzọ maka okwu Turkish kurabiye karịa Turkish, ebe ndị ọzọ enyewo Arabic ma ọ bụ Persian
N'etiti ndị ọzọ, onye ọkà mmụta asụsụ Sevan Nişanyan enyewo mmalite Arabic, n'akwụkwọ ya nke 2009 nke Turkish etymology, site na ġurayb ma ọ bụ ğarîb (nke dị iche)

Otú ọ dị, ka ọ na-erule 2019, akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu n'ịntanetị nke Nişanyan ugbu a na-enye ihe ndekọ mbụ a maara na Turkish dị ka ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri na asaa, nke sitere na gulābiya nke Persian, kuki e ji mmiri rose mee, site na gulāb, nke metụtara okooko osisi
Ọ na-ekwu na okwu Arabic nke Siria nwere ike isite na mbaTurkey
Ghribia (Algerian Arabic)
Khourabia (Armenian) bụ nsụgharị Armenian mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya n'asụsụ Bekee dị ka kuki bọta Armenia ma ọ bụ kuki achịcha mkpụmkpụ Armenia
A na-eji ihe atọ eme Khourabia bọta, shuga, na ntụ ọka ma na-adịkarị ka achịcha, ntị ọka wit, ma ọ bụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ ịnyịnya nke na-egosi ahụike, akụ na ụba, na ọganihu
A na-erikarị ya n'oge emume Ista, Krismas, na Afọ Ọhụrụ
Ka oge na-aga, a gbakwunyere ihe ndị ọzọ, dị ka àkwá, sinamọn, na ukpa
Kurabii aha nke nri ndị Bulgaria na ọtụtụ ụdị kuki, ụdị dị ụtọ a ma ama
Karịsịa n'oge ezumike, a na-akpọ ụdị jam dịgasị iche iche a na-emepụta site na afọ ọhụrụ na kuki shuga na-acha ntụ ntụ nke e ji ọdịdị mara mma chọọ mma maslenki
[Isiokwu dị mkpa]
Nsụgharị Grik, nke a na-akpọ kourabiedes ma ọ bụ kourabiethes (Grik κουρα 97/έδες; otutu nke kourabies κουρα 97/ti) yiri achịcha dị mkpirikpi, nke a-ejikarị almond eme
A na-eji brandy eme Kourabiedes mgbe ụfọdụ, ọ na-abụkarị Metaxa, maka ịnụ ụtọ, ọ bụ ezie na vanilla, mastika ma ọ bụ mmiri rose na-ewu ewu
N'ógbè ụfọdụ nke Gris, a na-eji otu clove zuru oke nke na-etinye na biskit ọ bụla chọọ kourabiedes Krismas mma
A na-eme Kourabiedes ma ọ bụ na crescents ma ọ bụ bọọlụ, mgbe ahụ na-eme ya ruo mgbe ọ dịtụ ọla edo
A na-agbakarị ha na shuga ice mgbe ha ka na-ekpo ọkụ, na-emepụta ihe na-ekpuchi shuga na bọta
Kourabiedes na-ewu ewu karịsịa maka oge pụrụ iche, dị ka Krismas ma ọ bụ baptizim
ọ bụ ezie na ha na-ewu eto n'afọ niile
Okwu Grik kourabiedes sitere na okwu Turkish kurabiye, nke nwere njikọ na qurabiya, ezinụlọ kuki nke Middle East
Na Tabriz, a na-eji ntụ ọka almọnd, shuga, ọcha àkwá, vanilla, margarine na pistachio eme ha
A na-enye ya tii, nke a na-etinye n'elu tii iji mee ka ọ dị nro tupu a rie ya

A na-eji ntụ ọka eme Ghriba mbụ ma tinye ya na oroma ma ọ bụ oroma zest na sinamọn, a na-ejikarị ihe ụtọ a eme oriri, tinyere tii mint ma ọ bụ kọfị

Qureshi (nke a makwaara dị ka Qureyshi, Quraishi, Qurayshi, Qureshy, Quraishy, Qoraishi, Qoreshi, Koraishi, Kureshi, Kureshy, Kureishi, Coreish) bụ aha ezinụlọ ndị Alakụba
Na asụsụ Bekee, ọ nwere ọtụtụ mkpụrụ okwu, na asụsụ Arabic, a na-asụ 'قريشي', nke pụtara akụkụ nke Ezinụlọ Quraish (Arabic قريش)
A na-ejikọta aha ahụ na ezinụlọ Muhammad
Ọ bụ aha nna a na-ahụkarị na South Asia na akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Western Asia, ọkachasị mpaghara Arab
Ọtụtụ ndị na-ebu aha ahụ, ruo ugbu a, nọ na Pakistan (82% 1,210,000, n'ime 1,470,000 n'ụwa niile), ebe ọ bụ aha nke itoolu a na-ahụkarị
India nwere nke abụọ kachasị (11% 162,000), Saudi Arabia (25% 36,300), England (065% 9,580) na Iran sochiri
Ndị Quraish na mbụ megidere ozizi Muhammad ma kwuo na ha kpagburu ya na ndị na-eso ụzọ ya, mana na oge ọnwụ ya, ha amalitela ịtọghata okwukwe ọhụrụ ma rụọ ọrụ dị mkpa na iweta Arabia na Islam

Dị ka M Naushad Ansari, onye bụ onye nduzi nke Centre for Dissemination of Universal Message, Delhi ọhụrụ, si kwuo, 'Na agbanyeghị nke ahụ, na oge na-adịghị anya, ụfọdụ n'ime ìgwè ndị Alakụba a haziri ma nye onwe ha aha ndị Alakụga
Ha matara ma jikọta onwe ha na ndị Alakụba
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ndị Qasai ma ọ bụ Qasab ma ọ bụ ndị na-egbu anụ kpọrọ onwe ha Qureshi; ndị na-akpa ákwà dị ka Ansari
Qwara, ma ọ bụ Qwareña (a na-akpọ 'Falasha' (Hwarasa) n'ebe ụfọdụ ochie), bụ otu n'ime olumba abụọ Agaw, nke otu obere ndị Beta Israel (ndị Juu Etiopia) nke mpaghara Qwara na-asụ
Ọ bụ olumba Qimant
Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ nwụọ
Ọtụtụ ihe odide Falashan mbụ, na-eji mkpụrụ akwụkwọ Ge'ez, dị; N’oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ na ndị njem na-edekọ asụsụ ahụ, malite na Flad na 1866
Asụsụ ahụ nọ na-adalata ná mmalite narị afọ nke 20, ebe ọ bụ na e ji Amharic dochie ya
N'oge a na-arụ ọrụ Solomon, e bugara ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-ekwu okwu ya n'ụgbọelu gaa Israel, ebe ọ na-aga n'ihu na-efunahụ ya na Hibru
R'Bonney Gabriel (amuru Maachị 29, 1994) bu ihe nlere America-Filipino na eze nwanyi mara mma, onye meriri n'asọmpi Miss USA 2022

'Rọ nrọ maka ndụ' bụ ihe omume nke iri anọ (ihe omume nke ise nke oge nke atọ) nke usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn The Twilight Zone
N'ihe omume a, otu nwanyị di ya nwụrụ na onye di ya nwụrụ n'ụlọ obibi enyere aka na-ekerịta otu nrọ ọjọọ ahụ
Onye di ya nwụrụ bụ Roger Leeds bi n'ụlọ obibi a na-enyere aka mana ọ jụrụ iso ndị ọzọ bi na ya na-emekọrịta ihe

Ọ na-ata ahụhụ site na ọnwụ nwunye ya na nrọ ọjọọ na-eme ugboro abụọ igbu ndị na eme ka anyị si egosi ịhụnanya n'ebe nile site n'aka ndị na eme ka ugboro ebe nwanyị na-arịọ ya ka ọ gbochie ihe ịbịa site n'ọnụ ụzọ
Enyi Roger bụ Frank, onye isi mgbaka lara ezumike nká, na-anwa ímé nwanne nwoke ka ọ meghee ma na-akpakọrịta, na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
Otu nwanyị aha ya bụ Laurel Kincaid na-akwaga
Roger matara ya dị ka nwanyị nọ na nrọ ọjọọ ya, mana Frank gwara ya na ọ nọwo na-enweghị isi dị otú ahụ na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ụmụ ndị ogbi na ụlọ kemgbe di ya nwụrụ afọ iri gara aga
Frank chọtara Roger na-enweghị obi iru ala n'otu abalị, ha na-echeta banyere nwunye Roger na nke mbụ ya
Ọ na-eme ka Roger na-ebe ákwá
Mgbe ọ nọsịrị n'àkwà, Roger nwere nrọ ọjọọ ahụ
Ka ọ na-agba mbọ ịpụ na Laurel, ọ na-akwagharị ya n'ime kandụl na-enwu ọkụ
Ọ na-eteta na akara ọkụ
Roger na-agwa Laurel okwu banyere nrọ ọjọọ ahụ, mana ọ naghị emeghachi omume
Ọ na-ekwu maka ihe mgbu nwunye ya nwere mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Roger gwara Laurel na ya enweghị ike ichebe ya pụọ n'ihe ọ bụla dị n'azụ ọnụ ụzọ n'ihi na ọ pụghị ịzọpụta nwunye ya
N'abalị ahụ, ọ na-arọ nrọ ọjọọ mana n'oge a ọ na-anwa imechi ọnụ ụzọ
Na mberede, ọ na-eche na Laurel anaghị edebe ihe, kama ọ na-edebe ihe n'ime, ya mere Roger na-emeghe ọnụ ụzọ
Di Laurel nwụrụ anwụ batara ma gwa ya na ọ ga-anabata ọnwụ ya
Ọ na-ekwu na ọ bụ ya na-akpọ ya, ọ bụghị Laurel
Roger jụrụ ihe kpatara ya, ọ wee sị 'Echere m na ị maara'
Roger tetara ma gbadaa soro Laurel kwurịta okwu
Ọ malitere ikwu okwu, na-arịọ mgbaghara maka aka ya ọkụ
Ọ kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa rie nri ụtụtụ
Ha na-amụmụ ọnụ ọchị ma banye n'ime
Àtụ The Twilight Zone (1985 TV series) episodes
Repair Café bụ nzukọ nwèrè ébé ndị e debere iji nye ndị mmadụ ebe ha ga-ezukọta ma rụọ ọrụ na idozi ihe ndị dị ndụ kwa ụbọchị, dị ka ngwá electronic, ngwaọrụ igwe, kọmputa, ịnyịnya ígwè, na uwe

A na-ejikarị ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na-arụzi ihe n'ebe ndị dị na obodo gụnyere ụlọ ụka, ọbá akwụkwọ, na ụlọ akwụkwọ kọleji ébé ngwaọrụ dị na ndị nwe ngwaọrụ nwéré ike idozi ngwongwo ha mebiri emebi site n'enyemaka nkè ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo
Repair Café bụ akụkụ nkè mmegharị nké na-achọ ibelata ihe mkpofu, oriri gabigara ókè, na atụmatụ mmebi iwu
Ọ nwèrè ike ịmaliteghachi mmụọ ime ya ọnụ ma 'mee ya n'onwe ya' ma mee ka ịdị n'otu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya sie ike

Ónyé nta akụkọ Dutch Martine Postma ónyé chọrọ ịkwaga nkwado mpaghara gosipụtara Repair Café na Amsterdam, Netherlands, n'afọ 2009 n'ubochi irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2009, e mèrè Repair Café mbụ na Fijnhout Theater, Amsterdam-West
N'ubochi abụọ n'ọnwa n'afọ 2010, e guzobere Repair Café Foundation
E guzobere ntọala ahụ iji kwado ndị otu mpaghara gburugburu ụwa n'ịmepụta ụlọ nkwari akụ nke ha
Kemgbe ahụ, ọnụ ọgụgụ nke Repair Cafés amụbaala ngwa ngwa

N'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2016 Postma debanyere aha ihe karịrị otu puku Repair Cafés n'ụwa niile, narị atọ na iri abụọ na asaa na Netherlands, narị atọ na itoolu na Germany, iri abụọ na abụọ na UK, 21 na US, 15 na Canada, anọ Australia na otu na India
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2018 ọnụ ọgụgụ nke Repair Cafés rịgooro ihe karịrị 1,500, na 2021 ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ ruru 2,000
N'afọ 2017, Repair Café Foundation mepụtara ngwá ọrụ n'ịntanetị na-enyere ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo aka ịnakọta ma kesaa ihe ọmụma n'ihe banyere data nrụzi site na nchekwa data
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2018, etinyela ozi gbasara ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nrụzi puku anọ n'ime usoro a, na-ezube ịkwalite nrụzi na ogologo ógè nke ngwaahịa
Repair Café nwèrè ike inye echiche nghọta na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na agụmakwụkwọ màkà ọdịda na post-growth paradigm dị ka ihe mgbochi na omume megide akụrụngwa
N'agbanyeghị eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọtụtụ ndị na-ekwu na nrụzi anaghị eme ka akụ na ụba nke isi obodo mara aka n'otu n'otu, ma, Repair Café nwere ikike zuru oke nke ịmepụta akụ na ụba ọzọ
Repair Café nwèrè ike inwe mmetụta na mbelata na ibelata ntinye akụ na ụba na mmepụta gbasara ike, isi ọbọdọ mmadụ na ihe ndị gbara gburugburu ebe obibi
Ọ na-akpụzi mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ndị na-emepụta na ndị ọrụ n'ụzọ na-abụghị nke na-enweghị ọkwa ma na-ejikọghachi ndị ọrụ na ụzọ mmepụta
Nnwere onwe na Open Technologies
Omume màkà ịbawanye nrụzigharị na-achọ nchịkwa onwe ónyé na nke mepere emepe na teknụzụ na-akpọ maka mgbanwe usoro nke mmepụta teknụzụ
Nke a na-ama mmekọrịta ike dị ugbu a n'etiti ndị na-emepụta na ndị ọrụ aka
N'echiche a, ọtụtụ na-arụ ụka na ihe omume nke nrụzi bụ ike na-emegide ọchịchị ónyé kwuo uche ya na ọchịchọ màkà nnwere onwe
Ihe omume nke Repair Café na repairable bụ nkatọ megide usoro mmepụta ihe nke na-eme ka ndị mmadụ na ọbọdọ ghara inwe ike
Ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta kwenyere na nkatọ nke Ivan Illich kwuru
Nnukwu nnwere onwe, dị ka Illich na-akpọ ya, bụ ụdị mmepụta ụlọ ọrụ nke na-amanye ndị na-azụ ahịa ịzụta ngwaahịa ndị ọzọ
A na-enweta nke a site n'ịchịkọta ihe ọmụma na ozi na ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke ndị ọkachamara na ngalaba ha
N'ihi ya, a na-ewepụ nhọrọ ndị ọzọ karịa ngwaahịa ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na-akpaghị aka ma ndị mmadụ ga-adabere naanị na ngwaọrụ ụlọ ọrụ dị mgbagwoju anya
Nnukwu nnwere onwe na-emepụta ịdabere na ngwaahịa ndị mmadụ na-enweghị ike ịjụ iji
Nrụzi Café na nrụzi ihe na-emebi ịdabere a ma mee ka nhọrọ onwe ónyé na ngwaahịa

N'ime ọha mmadụ na-emebi emebi, nnwere onwe n'ihe ndị mmadụ na-eji, na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ndị na-emepụta ihe na ndị ọrụ dị mkpa iji bulie nnwere onwe na ngwaahịa yana nnwere onwe site na ịdabere na ngwaahịa ụlọ ọrụ nke na-anapụ ndị mmadụ ihe okike
N'aka nke ọzọ, ọha mmadụ na-agbadata na-akwado nnwere onwe n'echiche ịhapụ ịdabere na uru mgbanwe na echiche ọrụ ugbu a nke a ghọtara dị ka okike nke uru mgbanwe

RA Thorburn onye amụrụ na Jenụwarị 10, 1974,eji aha nkwago bụ RA the Rugged Man mara ya
Ọ bụ onye Amerịka na- agụ egwu rap ma n'arụpụtakwa egwu
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ,site n'iwuli nka ọ nwere n'egwu na mpaghara ụlọ
Thorburn bịanyere aka na aJive Records bụ egwu nke gbagotara mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ mana ewepụtaghị efere egwu ya nke mbụ bụ Night of the Bloody Apes

Kemgbe ahụ ọ rụrụ na nkwado nke Mobb Deep, Wu-Tang Clan, Kool G Rap, and Notorious BIG, gbakwunyere ndị mmepụta egwu dị ka Erick Sermon, Trackmasters, DJ Quik, The Alchemist, J-Zone, and Ayatollah Ọ pụtara na albọm atọ niile kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ nke Rawkus gbakwunyere nrepu otu ma ọ bụ abụọ nke albọm WWF AggressionKa otuCapitol Records weturu obere ezumike( nke ọ nwere ohere ya dekọ albọm n'ewepụtaghị bụ, American Lowlife), Thorburn bịanyere aka nkwekọrị́ta na labeelụ nọọrọ onwe ya bụ Nature Sounds ma wepụta ọrụ mbụ ya bụ, Die, Rugged Man, Die
Na 2013, Thorburn wepụtara albọm nke abụọ bụ, Legends Never Die, site n'aka ọrụ Nature Sounds

Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ hip họp ya, Thorburn nọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike dị ka onye na-ekwu okwu njikwa egwuregwu ịkụ ọkpọ na onye na-enyocha ihe nkiri O nyela aka na , Rides, XXL, The Source, The Ring na ndị ọzọ
O dere ma mepụta ihe nkiri otu nzuzo Bad Biology, ma na-akwadokwa websaịtị 'Film School' na MTV 's Filmcom
N’afọ 1992, Thorburn sonyere Jive Records, n’ime etiti afọ ndị 1990,O binyere aka na priority Records / EMI
Omechara nwee nkwekọrịta njikọ ya na Capitol Records mana ọ malitere ndekọ onwe ya na mmalite 2000

Ya na ndị MC rụkọrọ ọrụ bụ ndị dịka The Notorious BIG￼￼, Mobb Deep, na Chuck D Ọ pụtara na albọm atọ niile kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ nke Rawkus, gbakwunyere nrepu otu nde ma ọ bụ abụọ nke WWF Aggression,n'emere Chris Jericho isi egwu
N'egwu olu nke mbụ,Ishu nke atọ, The Notorious BIG kwuru na-asị, 'Echere m na m bụ onye ka ịdị njọ,' mgbe ọ na-ekwu maka Thorburn
na 2004, Thorburn wepụtara albọm mbụ ya bụ Die, Rugged Man, Die site na akara ngosi sitere na Brooklyn Nature Sounds
O nweela ọtụtụ vidiyo vgụnyere Havoc si Mobb Deep I am the Boss, Sadat X ' Throw the Ball na Masta Killa ' Old Man na- egosi RZA na Ol' Dirty Bastard
Íshuu Ọktoba 2006 nke The Sourcegosipụtara amaokwu Thorburn naUncommon Valor A Vietnam Story dị ka 'Hịp-họp ọ kwoturu' nke ọnwa ahụ na HipHopDX agụrụ aha dị ka 'Amaokwu nke Afọ'

AllHipHopcom na-ekwu na 'A ga-echeta ndekọ a maka akparamagwa robot nke RA na-akọ akụkọ nna ya n'agha mgbe ọ n'akụpụ nkwa' Mgbe a na-enyocha egwu ya 'On the Block', Vibe Magazine kwuru, 'Ahụrụ m egwu a n'anya
Ọ na-awụm akpatoyi
Ọ bụ nnọọ nchepụte echepụtara nke ọma '

N'ịgbakwunye na ọrụ hip hop ya, Thorburn dere otu kọlụm ihe nkiri kwa ọnwa maka akwụkwọ Mass Apppeal Magazine , bụ onye na-enye aka na akwụkwọ ndétu rap Ego Trip na(N'ụlọ mbipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ St Martin ) na akwụkwọ gbasara ikpaoke agbụrụ nke Ego Trip nke(HarperCollins), ma dee ọtụtụ isiokwu maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọzọ gụnyere , Rides, XXL na The Source
Dị ka onye ihe nkiri na-atụ ụjọ masiri, Thorburn edeela ihe ngosi atọ gbakwunyere onye nduzi ihe nkiri Frank Henenlotter bụ odee na onye mmepụta ihe nkiri Henenlotter Bad Biology
Thorburn na-arụ ọrụ ntuziaka mbụ ya, ihe nkiri sitere gbasatara ezinụlọ ya, Chineke Were, Chineke Nye

Ewepụtara albọm studịo nke abụọ nke Thorburn bụ Legends Never Die n'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Eprel,2013 Ndị ọbịa gosipụtara na ya bụ Brother Ali, Masta Ace, Tech N9ne, Talib Kweli, Hopsin, Eamon, and Krizz Kaliko
Sịngụl ya nke mbụ na albọm a bụ'The Peoples Champ', nke abụọ bụ 'Learn Truth' feat
Talib Kweli

Upon release the album debuted at number 1 on the US Billboard Ka ewepụtara albọm a, ọ gbara dịka nke mbụ n'ọnụ ọgụgụ na igbe ịma ọkwa nke US nke Heatseekers Albums chart, ma bụrụ nke iri na asaa na isi igbe ịma ọkwa nke Top R&B/Hip-Hop Albums chart, ma nọrọ na nke otu narị na iri atọ na otu na 200
N'afọ 2016, onye rap German bụ Kool Saves gosipụtara Thornburg na albọm studịo bụ Essahdamus n'egwu akpọrọ 'Wahre Liebe'
Ewepụtara albọm nke atọ nkeThorbun, All My Heroes Are Dead, na Eprel 17, 2020
O gosipụtara ndị nka dịka Ghostface Killah, Eamon, Atmosphere, Ice-T, Vinnie Paz, Brand Nubian, Chino XL, MOP na Onyx

A họpụtara ha n'afọ 2013 BET Awards

Ha wee gaa n'ihu wepụta 'I Dey Mad', nke gosipụtara egwu Unda
Egwu a nọ n'elu ọtụtụ chaatị egwu redio nke Ghana ruo ọtụtụ izu
N'afọ 2010, R2Bees wepụtara 'Kiss Your Hand' dị ka egwu nke atọ ha

N'afọ 2009, R2Bees wepụtara abọm egwu iri na asaa Da Revolution nke ewepụtala egwu; 'Yawa Girl', I dey Mad', 'TEMA', 'Kiss Your Hand' na egwu ọhụrụ; 'Radio, 'One more Chance' na 'Africa' na mmepụta site na KillBeatz (Joseph Addison) yana ndị ọbịa si Wande Coal, Sarkodie, Samini, Kwaw Kese na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
E wepụtara abọm studio nke abụọ ha, Refuse To Be Broke - Da Revolution II, na 29 Machị 2013
Abọm ahụ nwere ndị ọbịa sitere na Wizkid, Sherifa Gunu, Davido, Tinchy Stryder na Voicemail
Ọ bụ KillBeatz na-ahụ maka mmepụta abọm ahụ
R2Bees wepụtara egwu mbụ ha maka afọ 2014, 'Lobi'
E wepụtara vidiyo egwu highlife na 25 Septemba 2014
R2Bees na-abụkarị abụ ma na-eti egwu n'asụsụ obodo Twi na Pidgin
R2bees bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eweta ihe kachasị elu nke Ghanaian hip pop subgenre hiplife, nke na-agwakọta rap na ụda nke hi-life (egwu pop nke Africa) na reggae
N'afọ 2012, e gosipụtara R2Bees na ndepụta Forbes nke 'ndị ama ama n'Afrịka ga-ekiri n'afọ 2013'
R2Bees emeela n'otu ogbo ya na ndị egwu mba ụwa dịka ndị na-agụ egwu R&B nke America bụ Mario na J Holiday
ROCAD Construction Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ na Naijiria, nke R&R Group
A maara ya maka iwu ụfọdụ akụrụngwa, okporo ụzọ na àkwà mmiri nke Naịjirịa
ROCAD Construction Limited webatara 2002, ndị otu ntọala Ronaldo Minaise na Roger Farajallah
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2002, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ rụrụ ọrụ owuwu mbụ ya na Nigeria - ịrụ akwa akwa Kudaru nke jikọtara Kano na steeti Kaduna
ROFOR bụ usoro màkà ịkọ akụkọ ihu igwe
ROFOR bụ mkpirisi màkà 'Route Forecast'
Dị ka aha ahụ na-egosi bụ amụma ihu igwe nke ụzọ ụgbọ elu ọ bụla ga-efefe n'ụzọ ahụ

ROFOR nwèrè ozi dị íchè íchè gbasara ụbọchị na ógè nke amụma, ntụziaka na ọsọ nke ifufe, koodu ụgbọ elu ICAO nke a na-eme amụma màkà ya, ọkwa igwe ojii na ọkwa oyi (icing), ọgba aghara na ozi ikuku kwụ ọtọ
Ihe atụ nke akụkọ ROFOR

Raúl Augusto Leiro Correia Mendes (1949 - 2015) bụ onye nta akụkọ telivishọn na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Angola
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Televisão Pública de Angola (TPA) dị ka onye na-ese foto, onye nchịkọta akụkọ, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Raúl Correia Mendes na Septemba 3, 1949, na Luanda
Ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta telivishọn na TVA na 1972, na-arụ ọrụ na egwuregwu, egwu na mmemme akụkọ
N'afọ 1974, ọ sonyeere Televisão Pública de Angola, ma bụrụkwa otu n'ime ndị otu mere mgbasa ozi telivishọn mbụ na Angola
Ọ nwụrụ na Luanda na Maachị 2015
Minista na-ahụ maka nkwukọrịta ọha na eze n'Angola, José Luís de Matos, wepụtara nkwupụta ọha na eze na ncheta ya
RaFia Santana bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, na-eti egwu, na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri nke bi na Brooklyn, NY

Ọrụ ya sitere na ònyìnyé ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na foto onwé ónyé, vidiyo, na arụmọrụ na uwe edere edere na egwu elektrọnik na-enyocha gentrification, echiche puku afọ, ahụike uche, na ahụmịhe ndị isi ojii
Ha na-eji ịntanetị dị ka ihe na-akọrọ ọrụ nka ha, na-enye ndị ojii na ndị na-acha nchara nchara ike, ma na-agbagha echiche nke ịdị n'otu na njikọ aka

O nwéré ihe ngosi na / ma ọ bụ ihe ngosi na Eyebeam, AdVerse Fest, SleepCenter, Times Square Arts, International Center of Photography, Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture, Babycastles, Museum of the Moving Image na Museum of Contemporary African Disaporan Arts, Roots & Culture n'etiti ọtụtụ ebe ama ama
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na akwụkwọ ndị dị ka Huffington Post, HyperAllergic, Rhizome, ArtFCity, Vogue, Teen Vogue na Salon

O sonyere na panel, arụmọrụ na mkparịta ụka dịka Cultured Magazine, 'Late at Tate Britain', Creative Tech Week NYC, Afrotectopia na Google NYC, NYU, 'Black Portraitures IV The Color of Silence' na Mahadum Harvard na International Center for Photography
A na-ewepụta egwu ha site na Never Normal Records
A mụrụ Santana ma zụlite ya na Brooklyn, NY
N'ịbụ ónyé sitere n'ezinụlọ ndị na-emepụta ihe ebe nne ya, Marilyn Nance bụ ónyé na-ese foto na nnà ya bụ ónyé na'eme ihe nkiri, a gbara Santana ume ime ihe osise ka ha na-etolite
Ha gụrụ foto na Purchase College
N'oge niile ha na-arụ ọrụ, a kpọrọ Santana ka ọ nye ònyìnyé na ihe osise na ihe ngosi na akwụkwọ ntanetị dịka Body Anxiety, 'Bitrates' na Shiraz Art House
The New Inquiry, Vice, Blavity na ArtFCity enyochaala ọrụ gif ya
Banyéré ọrụ gif ya, Paddy Johnson na Rea McNamara nke ArtFCity ekwuola na 'Santana bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe dijitalụ na-adịghị ahụkebe na-enyocha asụsụ agbụrụ, mgbasa ozi na omenala pop
N'ịbụ nke Rhizome Microgrant nyéré iwu na 2015, 'RaFia's World' bụ ebe nrụọrụ weebụ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ebe nchekwa nke ọrụ na eserese ederede site na nwata Santana
Na profaịlụ ya na Rhizome, Santana gwara Cepeda, 'Ụwa Rafia n'ụdị mbụ ya dị na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nne m

RAFiAX WORLD ọhụrụ bụ nchịkọta nke ihe osise m mere màkà ọrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na ntụrụndụ nke gafere afọ asatọ, na-agbaso uto m dị ka nwata na ónyé na-ese ihe
