Rabab Cheddar (amụrụ na 7 Machị na afọ 1991) bụ onye Morocco na-akụ ọkpọ
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 2020 Summer Olympics
Rababe Arafi (Arabic رباب عرافي, amụrụ na 12 na onwa Jenụwarị, na afọ 1991) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti etiti si Morocco, onye ọkachamara na mita 1500
A mụrụ ya na Khouribga, ọ bụ onye nwetara ihe nrite ugboro atọ na African Onyenmeri na Athletics, ebe ọ bụ onye mmeri kọntinent na afọ 2012 na ndekọ mmeri nke 4 0580 nkeji
O nwere ihe ndekọ mba Morocco na ọsọ kilomita na 1500m (3 5884 nkeji - abalị iri na isii na onwa nke isii, na afọ 2019 - Rabat - Diamond League)
Arafi so na ndị otu Morocco maka afo 2016 Summer Olympics ma bụrụ onye ikpeazụ 1500m
Ọ nọchitere anya Morocco na Isompi nke Ụwa na Athletics na afọ 2013, 2015 na 2017, gụnyere nke asatọ na 1500 m na 2017 World Championships na Athletics
Arafi bụ onye nwetara ọla nchara na afọ 2014 IAAF World Indoor Championships na 1500 m, mana e mechara wepụ ya n'ihi na ya na Heather Kampf kpọtụrụ ya nke mere ka Kampf daa
O mekwara isọmpi na IAAF World Cross Country Championships na afọ 2007, mana o nweghị ike ịmecha ọsọ ahụ
O ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na 1500m na Arab Athletics Championships (2013), Islamic Solidarity Games (2013 na 2017) na Jeux de la Francophonie (2013 na 2017)
1A na-enweghị ike iru eru na nke ikpeazụ
Àtụ Footer African Champions women's 1500 metres
Rabah Aït Ouyahia bụ onye Algeria-Canada na-eme ihe nkiri

A maara ya nke ọma dịka onye a họpụtara ugboro abụọ na Jutra / Iris maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma, na-enweta nods na 4th Jutra Awards n'afọ 2002 maka Tar Angel (L'Ange de goudron) na 24th Quebec Cinema Awards n'afọ 2022 maka A Revision (Une révision)
Ọ bịara Canada n'afọ 1996 dịka onye gbara ọsọ ndụ site na Agha Obodo Algeria
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ ọ na-eme gụnyere ihe nkiri Montreal, White City (Montréal ville blanche) na Kinship, usoro telivishọn L'Imposteur, na mmepụta nke Bashir Lazhar n'afọ 2017
Rabah Driassa (19 Ọgọstụ 1934 Ọktoba 8, 2021) bụ onye Algeria na-ese ihe na onye na-agụ egwu na-akọwa egwu ọdịnala
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'etiti afọ 1950 ruo afọ 1980 ebe ọtụtụ egwu ya ('Hizia', 'Nejma Qotbia', 'El Goumri') ghọrọ egwu wuru ewụ na mba Algeria
A mụrụ Drissa na 1934 na Blida
Nne ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, nna ya nwụkwara mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
N'ịbụ nwa mgbei nwere ụmụnne ise ọ ga-enyere aka, ọ malitere ọrụ ya site n'ịkpụ ihe na iko ma na-arụ ọrụ na obere ihe
Mmalite ya n'ụwa egwu mere n'afọ 1953, mgbe mgbasa ozi redio na Khaldoun na Algiers gwara ya ka ọ bụọ abụ nke ya
Rabah Driassa nwere ihe ndekọ dị mma nke a chịkọtara kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ site na ọrụ ya
N'etiti ihe ndị a ma ama ya

Rabia Salihu Sa'id (a mụrụn'ụbọchị nke 21 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1963) bụ onye dibia bekee nke Naịjirịra, bu prọfesọ ihe gbasara mbara igwe na ihu igwe, na onye nnyocha na Mahadum Bayero nke Kano Ọ na-eme nnyocha mbara igwe na ihu igwe, patịkụl fiziks, na ihe gbasara elektrọnik
Sa'id bụ onye nkwado na onye ndụmọdụ maka ụmụ agbọghọ nọ na sayensị na Visiola Foundation na Peace Corps ; o so hiwe Nigeria's Association of Women Physicists
Ọ bụ onye nkwado na onye ndụmọdụ nke sayensị, teknụzụ, injiniariịn, na mgbakọ na mwepụ (STEM) nakwa onye mmezi nke British Council's Active Citizens' Programme
Sai'd enwetela onyinye ọrụ mmekọrịta sitere na Institute of Physics Applied na Bern,dị na Suwizalandị na Ford Foundation wee bụrụ onye otu African Scientific Institute (ASI)
N'afọ 2015, ọ natara Elsevier Foundation Award for Women Scientists in the Developing World
Ndị British Council nyekwara ya onyinye nhubaama n'afọ 2015 maka ọrụ mwulite obodo ya

A mụrụ Rabia Sa'id na Wangara, obodo dị na okpuru ọchịchị obodo Gezawa nke Kano Steeie, na mgbago ugwu Naịjiria, ebe ụmụ agbọghọ nwere ohere agụmakwụkwọ ole na ole, ọtụtụ na-alụrụ di na nwunye mgbe ha dị afọ iri na ụma, a na-atụkwa anya na ụmụ nwanyị ga-anọ n'ụlọ
Kosiladị, nna ya chọrọ ka ọ bụrụ dọkịta
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị agha Naịjirịa nwere nwunye abụọ ma mụta ụmụ iri
Sa'id gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị agha ma bụrụ onye mdụ na klaasị ya
Ọ họọrọ ịlụ di mgbe ọ dị afọ 18, ozugbo ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleeji
Ọ bụ nne nye ụmụ isii

Ụmụ ya abụọ chọrọ nlekọta ahụike (otu n'ime ha bu ụkwụ gbara ngọ pụta ka a mụrụ ya, nke ọzọ bu ọrịọ́ sịkụl sel ka a mụrụ ya), nke gbakwunyere na ihe ịma aka nke ya onwe ya i nweta ogo mmụta agụmakwụkwọ ka elu
Sa'id malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 29 were nwee ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara iji kwụọ ụgwọ maka agụmakwụkwọ ya
O nwere akara ugo mmụta bachelọ na sayensị, nzere mastas na PhD na Fiziks nke ọ gụrụ na Mahadum Bayero dị na Kano
Na Septemba afọ 1999, ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye na-enyere aka na nkuzi na Mahadum Bayero
N'afọ 2002, na agụmakwụkwọ n'efu International Fellowships Program (IFP) nke Ford Foundation, ọ gụrụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na mmepe n'ogo mastas na Madadum nke Reading na Yunaịted Kịndọm
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ n'afọ 1999 na Mahadum Bayero ma bụrụkwa prọfesọ ndị ogo bachelọ na ogo mmụta dị elu n'ihe gbasara ihe gbasara mbara igwe na ihu igwe
Site n'afọ 2015, ọ bụ onye na-esote Diin na ngalaba na-ahụ maka ụmụakwụkwọ nke Mahadum
Ọ natara ọkwa nnyocha na mahadum, ebe ọ na-eme nyocha mbara igwe na ihu igwe, patịkụl fiziks, na ihe gbasara elektrọnik
Ọ na-eme nnyocha ya iji dozie nsogbu ndị metụtara gburugburu ebe obibi nke Naịjirịa

Iji belata ọnụ ọgụgụ nke osisi a na-egbutu maka nkụ, dịka ọmụmaatụ, otu nnyocha e mere bụ iji obere iberibe osisi sitere n'ọrụ ịkwa osisi mee ihe dịka mmanụ ọkụ, were si otú a belata ọnụego nke oke ọhịa nke obodo
Ọ na-achịkọtakwa ahịrị gbasara mbara igwe ma na-amụ banyere mmetụta nke igbu osisi na uzuzu erosọl na ọnọdụ ihu igwe
Ebumnuche ya bụ ị kwalite ndabere dị elu na Naijirịa n'ebe ike ọkụ ndị ọzọ e megharịrị ọhụrụ dịka ike ifufe, ike anyanwụ, na ike mmịrị - ndị na-anaghị emerụ gburugburu ebe obibi ahụ ka mmanụ ọkụ mma
N'afọ 2010, ya na Dọkịta C
Matzler rụkọrọ ọrụ, bụ onye sayensị nke na-ahụ maka ihe omimi na mbara igwe, na Institute of Applied Physics, Mahadum nke Bern,dị na Suwizalandị dị ka onye nnyocha sayensị ọbịa ihe ruru ọnwa anọ
Na Jenụwarị afọ 2013, e mere ya African Scientific Institute (ASI) Fellow of Physics, nke bụ mkpakọrịta na-asọpụrụ ma na- eche echiche nke ndị mmụta, ndị nnyocha, na ndị ọchụnta ego
Sa'id na-arụ ọrụ na sayensị, teknụzụ, injiniarịn, na mgbakọ na mwepụ (STEM)

O so na ndị hiwere Association of Women Physicists nke Naijirịa n'afọ 2011, nke na-agba ụmụ nwanyị ume ka ha bụrụ ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na fiziks, na-achọ imeziwanye agụmakwụkwọ fiziks n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ma na-enye ụmụ agbọghọ onyinye nturuugo
Sa'id gbakwara ndị ntorobịa ume isonye site na ịdụ ha ọdụ na mmemme sayensị obodo na nke mba, ọrụ efu Peace Corps Nigeria Alumni Foundation na Visiola Foundation

Ọ na-ekwu na ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mgbasa ozi STEM n'ihi na e nwere nrụgide otu na ihe mgbochi ụmụ agbọghọ, ọkachasị ndị nọ na mgbago ugwu Naijirịa, ga-emerịrị iji chụso agụmakwụkwọ na ọrụ na mpaghara ndị a

Na mgbakwunye, 'ọtụtụ ụmụ agbọghọ na sayensị ga-apụta na azịza nke sayensị na-enye abụghị naanị maka mkpa otu ndị' Na mgbakwunye, e nwere nnukwu ekele maka ọrụ ebe e nwere ngwa bara uru, dịka ọrụ ụlọakụ na ọgwụ
N'afọ 2015 ọ bụ onye natara otu n'ime onyinye ise Elsevier Foundation maka ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na ụwa na-emepe emepe
E gosipụtara na mmekorita ya na (OWSD) na The World Academy of Sciences (TWAS), ihe nrite afọ ahụ bụ maka fiziks na mgbakọ na mwepụ, yana onyinye Sa'id na ngalaba nke fiziks nke mbara igwe

Ọ natara onyinye a maka oru ya banyere nsogbu gburugburu Naijirịa, nke e mere n'ụbọchị 14 ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2015 na nzukọ kwa afọ nke American Association for the Advancement of Science (AAAS) na San Jose, dị na Kalifoniya
N'afọ sochirinụ (2016) e gosipụtara ya na magazin ịntanetị The Nigerian Academia na ndepụta nke ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria ndị a ma ama na sayensị

Na mgbakwunye na ndụmọdụ ọ na-eme na Peace Corps na Visiola maka mgbasa ozi STEM, ọ bụ onye nhazi na British Council Active Citizens' Programme, bụ onye na-agba ndị na-eto eto ume ị zụlite usoro nkwukọrịta udo maka nkwado mmepe obodo ha

Ọ bụ otu n'ime mmadụ itoolu a kwanyeere ugwu dịka 'ụmụ nwanyị na-akwado na ndị mmeri' na Naịjirịa na Machị afọ 2015 dịka akụkụ nke site n'aka ndị British Council na abụọ nke mmemme mmepe ya, Nigeria Stability and Reconciliation Programme (NSRP) na Justice for All (J4A) Programme
Àtụ Notelist
Rabiatou Serah Diallo (amụrụ na 31 Disemba 1949, Mamou, Guinea) bụ onye otu ọrụ aka nke Guinea
Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke National Confederation of Guinean Workers (Confédération Nationale des Travailleurs de Guinée, CNTG)
Diallo gara akwụkwọ odeakwụkwọ na Ecole des Cadres Techniques na Conakry site na 1964 ruo 1966
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka nchịkwa gọọmentị n'oge ọchịchị Ahmed Sékou Touré site na 1966 ruo 1979

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ iwu pụrụ iche na Institut Polytechnique de Conkry (1975-1978), ọ ghọrọ 'onye na-arụ ọrụ na Ministrị Ikpe Ziri Ezi (1979-1980), odeakwụkwọ ụlọ ikpe na Ụlọikpe Ógbè nke Conakry I (1980-1984), osote onye isi ikpe na Ụlọ ikpe Ụmụaka (1984-1985), onye majie na Ụlọikpe Ọrụ Ọrụ Ikpe Ziyara Ezi (1997), na onye ọrụ na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na Ministrụ Ụmụaka (1997)
Ọrụ ya dị ka onye otu ọrụ malitere n'oge
N'afọ 1966, 'a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọrụ nke Onye isi ala nke Republic'

Diallo bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Kọmitii Ndị Ọrụ Mpaghara na Conakry site na 1981 ruo 1984, onye otu Kọmitii Nchịkwa nke Confédération Nationale des Travailleurs de Guinée (CNTG), na odeakwụkwọ ukwu ya nke CNTG, nke mbụ a họpụtara na 2000
Site na Febụwarị 2010 ruo Jenụwarị 2014, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke National Transitional Council
Ọ natala ọtụtụ nsọpụrụ na ihe nrite
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2006, Diallo laghachiri Guinea mgbe ọ gachara ogologo oge
E gburu Kanfy Camara, onye yiri ya nke ukwuu, n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ihe omume nke ICFTU lere anya dị ka mgbalị na-agaghị aga nke igbu Diallo
Rabigh 2 IPP (R2IPP) bụ ọrụ Combined Cycle Power Station nke ka na-aga n'ihu n'ụsọ ikpere osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ nke Saudi Arabia, kilomita 150 n'ebe mgbago ugwu Jeddah
R2IPP ga-enwe ikike mmepụta eletrik nke megawatts 2,060 iji nye mpaghara Makkah ike eletrik
Ọrụ ahụ ga-enye Saudi Electricity Company n'okpuru Power Purchase Agreement ọkụ eletrik nke nwere oge afọ 20 site na ụbọchị ọrụ azụmahịa a haziri na June 2020

Ọrụ ahụ ga-eji Natural Gas dị ka isi mmanụ ya na Arabian Super Light (ASL) dị ka mmanụ ndabere yana itinye n'ọrụ Combined Cycle Power Station na nhazi nke blọk atọ, nke ọ bụla nwere Gas Turbines abụọ nke arụmọrụ dị elu, Heat Recovery Steam Generators abụọ na otu Steam Turbine nwere nrụgide ụzọ atọ nke ga-ebelata oriri mmanụ, mmetụta na okpomọkụ mmiri dị n'osimiri na mgbasa ikuku carbon na gburugburu ebe obibi
R2IPP nwere blọk ike 4 yiri onwe ha, nke ọ bụla na-emepụta ike mgbakọta dị 6865 MW
Maka nke ọ bụla n'ime nkeji ndị a, Siemens na-enye SGT6-5000F gas turbines ụdị abụọ, otu ụdị SST6-5000 HI-L steam turbine, na igwe ọkụ eletrik SGen6-1000A-series
Ọ ga-abụ IPP nke izizi nwere nnukwu arụmọrụ okpomọkụ nke 588% na ọnọdụ ebe ntụaka
Ọdịdị ndị nwere òkè nke Al Mourjan For Electricity Production Company gunyere ndị a
A họpụtala ụlọ ọrụ Samsung C&T dị ka onye ọrụ EPC
Ntinye aka na nkwekọrịta December 25, 2013 Njedebe June 25, 2020
Rabilu Musa, onye a maara nke ọma dị ka Dan Ibro (12 Disemba 1971 - 9 Disemba 2014) bụ onye Naijiria ọkachamara
Ọ bụ onye Hausa na-eme ihe ọchị, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na'eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
Dan Ibro gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Danlasan, nke dị na Warawa ma mesịa kwaga na Government Teachers College Wudil niile na steeti ọmụmụ ya
Ọ sonyeere ndị ọrụ ụlọ mkpọrọ Naịjirịa na 1991 wee rụọ ọrụ na ọrụ gọọmentị
Dan Ibro hapụrụ ọrụ gọọmentị ma mesịa sonye na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri mbụ ya 'Yar Mai Ganye nke kwalitere ọrụ ya
Ọrịa nkịta bụ nke n'efe efe nke n'akpata ya bụ mgbawa nke ụbụrụ n'ebe mmadụ n'anụmanụ nwere ọbara n'ekpo ọkụ nọ
Na mbido ọ na-eji oke ịba n'otuto abịa
Ihe ndịọzọ eji ama onye nwere ya bụ ịga ije ngwa ngwa, inwe oke obiụtọ, enweghị ike megharịa ahụ, mgbagwoju anya, na-elegideghị anya n'ihe ruo ogologo oge
Mgbe ihe a eji ama ya pụtasịrị, onwụ n'esochi onye nwere ya
Oge eji enweta nje a na mgbe oji apụtasị nkeọma n'abụ ihe dịka ọnwa atọ
Mana onwere ike ịdị ala karịa otu izu ụka maọbụ ruo otu afọ
Oge ndị akpọtụrụ uche n'adabere na mgbe oji gazue onye nwere ya n'ahụ ya niile
Mmadụ n'enweta nje a site n'ahụ anụmanụ
A na-enweta ya mgbe ọbụla onye nwere ya metụrụ maọbụ taa mmadụ maọbụ anụmanụ nwere ya
Asọmmiri onye nwere ya nwekwara ike ime ka mmadụ nweta ya maọbụrụhaala n'enwere mmekọrịta n'etiti onye nwere ya n'onye enweghị ya
Ihe n'akpatakarị mmadụ inweta nje a bụ mgbe nkịta taara mmadụ
Ihe karịrị pasent 99 nke nsogbu rabis si na mba nkita ndị nwere ya nọ
Na mba ndị dị na Amerịka, ụsụ bụ ihe n'ebufekarị ọrịa rabis nye ndị mmadụ
Ihe dị ala karịa pasent 5 si n'aka nkịta
Anụmanụ ndị n'awụgharị n'ọhịa anaghị ebutekarị rabis
Nje rabisn'abanye n'ụbụrụ na awara ime ahụ
Enwere ike ime nnyocha maka ya mgbe ahụrụ ihe n'egosi n'ọbụ nje ahụ
Igbochi ọtụtụ anụmanu n'ịgba ha ọgwụ enyela aka belata rabis nke nkịta n'atanye mmadụ n'ahụ n'akụkụ ụfọdụ n'ụwa
Inye ndị mmadụ ọgwụ tupu ha enweta ya ga-enyeaka karịsịa nye ndị nọ ebe ha nwere ike ibute ya ngwa ngwa
Ndị a gụnyere ndị n'arụ ọrụ ebe enwere ụsụ maọbụ ndị n'anọkarị ebe enwere nje rabis
Nye ndị nọ ebe enwere rabis, ọgwụ rabis n'oge ụfọdụ imunoglobin n'enyeaka igbochi nje a tupu ọpụtacha nkeọma
Iji mmiri na ncha kwọọ aka nkeọma ihe ruru minit 15, povido ayọdin, maọbụ mmiri ncha, n'ihina ha ga-egbu nje ndị a ma gbochie mgbasa ya
Naanị mmadụ ole na ole nwetarala ngwọta mgbe achọpụtasịrị na ha nwere nje a
Eji ọgwụgwọ ndị bụ ọkpọka ya nke amaara dịka Mịlwaụkii protokọlmee ihe
Ọgwụ mgbochi rabis bụ ọgwụ eji egbochi ọrịa rabis
Enwere ọtụtụ ndịọzọ dị mma maka iji gbochie ya
Ha dị mma iji gbochie nje rabis ruo ogologo oge mgbe ụsụ maọbụ nkịta taara mmadụ
Mgbochi a n'anọ ogologo oge mgbe ejisịrị ya mee ihe ugbo atọ
A na-eji ntụtụ agbanye ya n'ime ahụ maọbụ anụ ahụ
Mgbe agbasịrị ọgwụ ndị a, a na-eji ọgwụ rabis bụ imunoglobin eme ihe
A na-enye ntụziaka ka ndị nwere ike ibute nje a gba ọgwụ mgbochi tupu ha gaa ebe ha nwere ike ibute ya
Ọgwụ ndị a n'arụ ọrụ n'ahụ mmadụ na anụmanụ
Ịgba nkịta ọgwụ ga-enyeaka ka mmadụ ghara inweta ya
Agbaala ọtụtụ nde mmadụ ọgwụ rabis n'ụwa niile
Nke a echekwala ndụ mmadụ puku narị 250 kwa afọ
Onye ọbụla nwere ike iji ya mee ihe
Ihe dịka pasent 35 ruo 45 nke ndị mmadụ egosila ihe dịka ọbara na mgbu n'akụkụ ebe a na-agba ha ọgwụ
Ihe dịka pasent 5 ruo 15 nwere ike inwe ahụọkụ, isiọwụwa,maọbụ ịgbọ agbọ
Mgbe rabis jidesirila mmadụ, onweghịzi mkpa ọdị iji ọgwụ ndị ahụ eme ihe
Ọgwụ ụfọdụ enweghị timerosal
Ọgwụ ndị emere maka ụbụrụ n'ime ahụ nke eji emekarị ihe na mba Eshia na Latịn Amerịka, anasịghị arụ ọrụ k'esi chọọ
Nke mere na ndị Wọld Helt Ọganaịzeshọn ekwughị k'ejiri ya n'eme ihe
N'afọ 2014, ọnụego ya nọ n'ihe dịka 44 na 78 dọla maka iji nye ọgwụgwọ
Mana na mba Unaịted Steeti ọ na-ewe ihe karịrị 750 dola maka ọgwụ rabis
Rabis n'egbu ihe dịka puku 26 ruo 55 kwa afọ n'ụwa niile
Pasent 95 nke ọnwụ ndị a bụ na mba Eshia na Afrịka
Rabis nọ na ihe karịrị mba 150 n'ụwa ma ewezụga Antatika
Ihe karịrị ijeri 3 bi na akụkụ ụwa ebe enwere rabis
N'ebe ụfịọdụ na urop na Ọstrelia, naanị ụsụ nwere ike ibufe rabis
Mba ndị dị obere bi n'etiti mmiri enweghị rabis maọlị
Rabo Kabara Saminou Gado (bu onye amụrụ na 23 Mee 1986 na Agadez ) bụ onye Nigerien na-agba bọọlụ na FUS Rabat
Ọ bụkwa onye otu mba Niger

Saminou malitere ọrụ ya na Niger na Sahel SC ma nye naanị goolu ya na SuperCup ikpeazụ 2006 megide AS-FNIS Mgbe afọ atọ gasịrị na ndị otu mbụ nke Sahel SC na Championnat national de première division sonyeere na Jenụwarị 2007 na klọb kachasị elu na Naijiria Enyimba International FC
Ọ gbara egwuregwu iri abụọ na atọ ya maka Enyimba International FC ma bịanye aka na Jenụwarị 2010 maka Cotonsport Garoua
Ọ nwere ụkwụ aka nri, 182 cm n'ogologo, ma nwee kilogram 79
Saminou apụtawo ọtụtụ ugboro maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger, na-eme nke mbụ ya n'afọ 2006
Rachael Aladi Ayegba (amụrụ na 25 June 1986) bụ onye bụbu onye Naijirịa na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị na-agba dịka onye na-edebe goolu
Na klọb, ọ gbara bọọlụ maka ọtụtụ klọb ndị Finland n'etiti afọ 2005 na 2016
Ayegba bụ onye ọkwọ ụgbọala bọs ugbu a na London
Na Na Naijirịa, Ayegba gbara bọọlụ maka Oladimeji Tigress, Ufouma Babes, FCT Queens nke Abuja, na Edo Queens
N'afọ 2005, Ayegba kwagara Finland, ebe ọ gbara bọọlụ afọ iri na otu
N'oge 2007 FIFA Women's World Cup, ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Kokkolan Palloveikot na Finland
Na Finland, ọ gbakwara Kuopion Palloseura, GBK Kokkola na PK-35 Vantaa bọọlụ
O meriri na 2010, 2011 na 2012 Naisten Liigas na PK-35 Vantaa, yana 2012 na 2013 Finnish Women's Cups
Ayegba mere nke mbụ ya maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Naijirịa na egwuregwu 2001 megide Namibia
Ọ hapụrụ 2003 All-Africa Games n'ihi mmerụ ahụ
Ayegba nọchitere anya Naijiria na 2007 FIFA Women's World Cup, yana 2006 na 2008 African Women's Championships, na 2007 All-Africa Games
Ayegba lara ezumike nká na bọọlụ n'afọ 2016
O mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi, wee kwaga London na 2018
Ka ọ na-erule 2021, Ayegba rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala na-azụ maka Go-Ahead London
Rachael Kaki Nyamai bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kenya
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu maka mpaghara ndịda Kitui na Kitui County n'okpuru Jubilee Party
A mụrụ Nyamai n'afọ 1976 na Kitui county
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịm Kyatune na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndndrị Muthale Girls maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndary ya
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Kenyatta ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na agụmakịa na nzere masta na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
N'agbata afọ 2006 na afọ 2009, ọ gara Mahadum Aarhus na Danish School of Education na Denmark iji mụọ Doctor of Philosophy (PhD)

Ọ bụ onye nkuzi na Mahadum Kenyatta na kọleji South Eastern University nke Kitui A họpụtara ya na nzuko omeiwu nke iri na otu na 2013 na tiketi pati NARC na na 2017 ọ meriri ntuli aka ọzọ na pati Jubilee
Ọ bụ onye otu nzuko omeiwu ugbu a maka mpaghara Kitui South (maka afọ 7), yana onye so na Kọmitii Mmekọrịta Mba na Ụlọ Ọrụ Azụmahịa Ụlọ
Ọ lụrụ Titus Mavui Ngumu na ụmụ
O weputara egwu gospel ya na Justus Myello
Ọ bụkwa Onye Kraịst kwenyesiri ike na onye okenye ụka
Rachael Ray Kungu, onye na-eji aha egwu DJ Rachael, (amụrụ c1978), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri diski na Uganda, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye na-edekọ egwu, onye ọrụ ya karịrị afọ 25
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Femme Electronic na onye nwe Scraych Rekords, ụlọ ọrụ na-ege ntị nke onwe
Na June 2017, Vice Magazine zoro aka na Rachael Kungu, dị ka 'nwanyi DJ mbụ nke East Africa'
A mụrụ Rachael Kungu na Uganda n'ihe dị ka afọ 1978, ọ tolitere n'ógbè dị elu a na-akpọ Muyenga, na Makindye Division nke oge a, n'ime isi obodo Uganda bụ Kampala
N'afọ ndị 1990, Hotel International Muyenga bụ ihe a ma ama maka oriri ya n'ehihie nke ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na-agakarị
Rachael bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma gara nnọkọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ
Ọ ghọrọ akụkụ nke Muyenga Youth Club
Mgbe Rachael dị afọ iri na atọ, ọ na-ekiri na vidiyo Deidra Muriel Roper (DJ Spinderella), nwanyị American deejay na onye na-eti egwu na-eme ihe ma ọ na-atọ ya ụtọ
Onye America na-ese ihe nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ebe nwa okorobịa ahụ nọ n'afọ iri na ụma nọ
Na klọb ahụ, Rachael matara ndị ama ama mba ụwa dị ka Salt-n-Pepa, Roxanne Shante, MC Lyte, Run-DMC yana Kid N Play
Ọ malitere iṅomi ụzọ ndị a na-eme ihe nkiri mba ụwa si eme ma buru n'isi otú ha si rap nke nkà mere ka o nweta ebe na igbe deejay n'obodo ahụ
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ ka dị afọ iri na ụma, nwanne nna ya sooro ya gaa Club Pulsations, ebe DJ Wasswa Junior kụziiri ya otu esi eji turntable
Ọ na-etinye DJ Alex Ndawula maka ịkụziri ya nkà ụfọdụ
Ndị nkuzi ndị ọzọ gụnyere DJ Berry nwụrụ anwụ
DJ Rachael malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agba diski na afọ 1995 ma mgbe o mechara nwee ike iguzo naanị ya, ndị nwe klọb ndị ọzọ malitere inye ya ohere ịrụ ọrụ na klọb ha
Ọ hapụrụ Club Pulsations wee sonye na Club Silk ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ asatọ dị ka onye ọrụ na onye ọkachamara na-agba diski
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, o nwere oge iji mezuo nkwekọrịta igwu egwu na oriri ọha na eze na nke onwe
Ọ nwetara nkwanye ugwu na-abawanye ma nata nkwekọrịta ọ ga-egwu na Club Sombreros na Jinja wee nọrọ na Club Florida na afọ 2000 na Club Carnival, ma na Nairobi na Stone Club na Mwanza
Ihe ngosi redio nke Uganda Saturday Night Mix Show ghọtara mkpa DJ Rachael dị na egwu eletrọnịkị Uganda
Ọ rụrụ n'ememme Nyege Nyege na afọ 2017
2000 na Club Carnival, ma na Nairobi na Stone Club na Mwanza
Ihe ngosi redio Ugandan Saturday Night Mix Show ghọtara mkpa DJ Rachael dị na egwu eletrọniki Ugandan
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Nyege Nyege Festival na afọ 2017

Site na mmata dị ukwuu, a kpọrọ DJ Rachael ka ọ sonye na mmemme mba ofesi, gụnyere WOMEX World Music Expo 2016 na Spain, mmeghe nke Impact Hub, oghere nka na Florence, Ịtali na afọ 2017 na ihe omume DAPHNE nke Marea Stamper, na Chicago, Illinois, United States na Jenụwarị, na afọ 2017
Kungu agbasawokwa na mmepụta egwu, ọzụzụ na ntụziaka ndị ọzọ iji bulie nkà ya
Kemgbe afọ 2016, ọ na-eme ọmụmụ ihe kwa ọnwa maka ụmụ nwanyị 25 na-ekere òkè
Ihe omume ya, Femme Electronic, malitere na afọ 2016 iji kwado ndị DJ nwanyị na ndị na-emepụta egwu egwu electronic
N'afọ ahụ, o nwere ogbako na Goethe-Institut na Santuri East Africa
N'afọ 2017, Dazed kwetara na DJ Rachael bụ otu n'ime '5 ndị egwu East Africa ị chọrọ ịma' na DJ Mag dere banyere ọrụ ya iji gbanwee ihu nke egwu elektrọnik
N'afọ 2018, OkayAfrica depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị egwu ụlọ 10 kachasị elu na Kenya na Uganda na Electronic Beats kọrọ banyere otu DJ Rachael si agbanwe ọha mmadụ Ugandan site na egwu
Rachael Kungu bụ onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ikike nke obodo LGBT +
Rachael Magoola bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, onye a na-agba egwu, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu Afrigo Band
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu, dịka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị na Bugweri District, maka National Resistance Movement
Njem egwu malitere n'ụlọ ebe nna ya, onye nwụrụ anwụ Nicholas Magoola, bụ onye nkuzi egwu na ọtụtụ kọleji dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Uganda
Dị ka nwa agbọghọ, ọ bụrụ abụ n'òtù ukwe chọọchị ma kpọọ ngwá egwú n'ụlọ
Na Senior Two, a chụpụrụ ya na Tororo Girls School maka ịrụ ọrụ n'òtù egwu mgbe ọ nọ ezumike ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1983, Magoola sonyeere Namasagali College ma mesịa 'Kaliro Teacher Training College' ebe ọ zụrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọkachamara na egwu na asụsụ
Ọ kụziri na Namasagali College ruo 1993 mgbe ọ hapụrụ Mahadum Kyambogo ebe ọ gụrụ nzere na agụmakwụkwọ, na-agụ akwụkwọ na Music
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ kachasị mma na klas ya, Magoola zụghị akwụkwọ n'ihi na a kwụsịrị ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ya maka ịgba ọsọ mgbe ọ gara njem na Afrigo Band
O dekọrọ Obangaina na London na Afrigo Band ma abụ ahụ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama ozugbo
Magoola laghachiri na Mahadum Kyambogo na 2012 iji mezue ma nweta akara ugo mmụta ya
Magoola sonyeere Afrigo ebe ọ haziri ọtụtụ egwu na ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2001, Rachel guzobere ma malite otu nke ya nke dekọrọ abọm atọ Inhaife, Tyenda Wundi na Tonyiiga
N'afọ 2003, ọ hapụrụ Afrigo band na Uganda, maka United Kingdom
Na South Bank nke London, ọ duziri otu 'Women of Kampala' na London's African Music Festival ma soro onye na-afụ opi South Africa Claude Deppa rụkọọ ọrụ
N'afọ 2009, Rachel na ndị otu ya rụrụ ọrụ na mmemme Sauti za Busara na Zanzibar
Ihe ndị o dere nwere akụkụ nke asụsụ na ụda ọdịnala sitere na mpaghara niile nke Uganda, yana reggae na zouk
Magoola nwere ngụkọta nke abọm isii Inhaife (1997), Tyenda Wundi (1998), Tonyiiga (2000), Atubembe (2001), Songs from the Source of the Nile (2005) na Eisadha (2008)

Nnenna Rachael Okonkwo (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'onwa Mee n'afọ 1987) Onye ama ama dịka Nkoli Nwa Nsukka bụ Nigerian film actress
A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe nkiri ahu nwe otu aha ahụ

Rachael Okonkwo bụ onye Ukpata na Uzo Uwani Lokal gọvamentị nke Enugu State, nke dị na South East (Nigeria)Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ bụ nwata, mana n'ihi Ọ naghị enweta ọrụ, ọ gbanwere ọrụ ya n'ịgba egwu
Ọ sonyeere Nollywood n'afọ 2007 na-eme obere ọrụ
N'afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Nkwado nye Ini Edo na Van Vicker na Royal War 2, ma n'afọ 2010 n'akụkụ Patience Ozokwor na John Okafor na Open and Close 1 & 2
Isi ọrụ ya ma bụrụ kwa ihe nkiri mepere ya ụzọ pụtara n'afọ 2014, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ kachasị na Nkoli Nwa Nsukka dị ka Nkoli
Nne ya nwụrụ n'afọ 2020
Rachael Okonkwo n'ụzọ nke ya na inyeghachi ndị mmadụ, na-akwado emume a na-eme kwa afọ nke ebumuche ya bụ inye ụmụaka onyinye n'efu na nturundu nye ndị mmadụ
O kwuru na ọ na-enyere ya aka iso ndị na-akwado ya na-emekọrịta ihe
N’afọ 2015, Rachael gwadoro mmemme izizi nke Children Easter Carnival maka inye ụmụaka onyinye n'efu n'oge mmemme Ista n’Enugwu
N'afọ 2016, na-emume nke abụọ nke emere na Onitsha nwere ndị bịara ọfụma dịka ya na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Ken Erics na ndị ọzọ so ya gaa mmemme ahụ

N'oge emume nke 2017 nke emere n’obodo ebe amụrụ ya bụ Nsukka, chikọtara ndị mmadụ karịrị puku ise n'ọnụọgụ, ma nwekwa ọtụtụ ndị ama ama dịka Angela Okorie, Nonso Diobi, Slowdog, Ken Erics, Nani Boi, Eve Esin ma nkwado site na ụdị kacha elu mere ka ọ bụrụ nnukwu mmemme karịa ndị bu ya ụzọ
Rachael Yamala (a mụrụ n'ubochi12 n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afo 1975) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa onye gbara boolu di ka onye ọnọdụ etiti otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa
O so n'òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ iko mba ụwa nke umu nwanyi FIFA n'afọ1991
N'ọkwa klọb, ọ gbaara Kakanfo Babesbọọlụ na Naịjiria
Racheal Ekoshoria bụ onye Naịjiria na-eme egwuregwu i buli igwe
O na -asọ mpi n'ogo klaasị umu nwanyi 58kg
Racheal sọrọ mpi na 2010 Summer Youth Olympic Games na Sịngapọ n'egwuregwu ndị erughị 58 kg, ma nweta ihe nrite ọla nchara
N'egwuregwu asọmpi 2016 African Weightlifting Championships na Yaoundé, Kameruun, o meriri ma nweta ọla ọcha n'ihe na -erughị 58 kg ma jiri mpụtara 192 kg

Racheal Kundananji (amụrụ na abalị atọ na ọnwa isii 2000) bụ onye Zambia ọkachamara na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu maka Spanish Primera División club SD Eibar na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Zambia
Kundananji nọchitere anya Zambia na afọ2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations
Ntinye na nsonaazụ depụtara ihe mgbaru ọsọ Zambia nke mbụ

Racheal Nachula (amụrụ na 14 Jenụwarị na afọ 1986) bụ onye Zambia bụbu onye na-agba ọsọ nke na-ahụ maka mita 400 na onye na-egwu bọọlụ nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu maka klọb Segunda División Pro nke Spain Zaragoza CFF na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Zambia
O meriri ọla nchara na 2008 African Championships, na oge kachasị mma nke 5139 sekọnd
O sonyere na afọ 2006 Commonwealth Games, na afọ 2006 World Junior Championships, afọ 2008 World Indoor Championships, na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics na-enweghị iru eru maka agba ikpeazụ
O meriri nrite ọlaọcha na 400m na afọ 2009 African Junior Athletics Championships, na-edekọ oge nke 5334 sekọnd
O nwekwara 2342 sekọnd na mita 200, nke o nwetara na ọnwa Mee na afọ 2007 na Gaborone

Racheal Njoroge bụ onye ọkachamara IT nke Kenya, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ, onye bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke mpaghara South Africa nke Cummins, nke dabeere na Johannesburg, South Africa, dị irè n'ubochi 1 September 2018
N'ikike a, ọ na-arụ ọrụ azụmahịa na mba ofesi na South Africa, Angola, Botswana, Lesotho, Madagascar, Malawi, Mauritius, Mozambique, Namibia, Swaziland, Zambia na Zimbabwe
A mụrụ Racheal Njoroge na Kenya
O nwere nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na sistemu njikwa njikwa, sitere na Winona State University, na Winona, Minnesota, United States, nwetara na 2002
Nzere ya nke Master of Business Administration, na-elekwasị anya na azụmaahịa bụ Miller College of Business, na Mahadum Ball State, na Muncie, Indiana, na United States, na 2006
N'ime otu afọ na ọkara, Nwada Njoroge rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-enyere aka na usoro nkwukọrịta na Madison Insurance Kenya Limited, nke dị na Nairobi, isi obodo Kenya, ruo Disemba 2004
O jiri ọnwa iri na asatọ sochiri ya rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka gụsịrị akwụkwọ
na Bureau of Business Research nke University Computing Services nke Ball State University, dabere na Muncie, Indiana, United States, ruo Mee 2006
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere masta na nchịkwa azụmahịa, Cummins goro ya n'ọrụ, na Mee 2006, buru ụzọ rụọ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ ha na Columbus, Indiana, United States, dị ka IT Intern
Mgbe obere oge gasịrị na ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara South Africa, Njoroge laghachiri na Columbus wee rụọ ọrụ dịka onye nyocha usoro maka afọ atọ na-esote
A kwaliteziri ya ka ọ bụrụ Strategy IT & Planning Leader, na-arụ ọrụ na ikike ahụ ruo March 2011
A bufere ya n'ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara South Africa, n'April 2011, na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche, sitere na IT Team Leader for Africa, New Entity Execution & Facilities Director, na Director Of Operations
N'ọnwa Septemba 2018, mgbe afọ iri na abụọ gachara ọrụ, na Cummins, a họpụtara ya onye isi njikwa na onye isi oche mpaghara mpaghara South Africa, na-ahụ maka mba iri na abụọ na Sub-Saharan

Rachel Cecilia Adams (amụrụ n'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1963) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Mba South Africa sitere na African National Congress
Ọ bụ onye otu ndi National Assembly nke South Africa site na Northern Cape
Rachel Carey George (1908-2011) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A na-ejikọta ya na ndị Gee's Bend quilting collective, n'akụkụ nwanne nné ya Delia Bennett
A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Museum of Fine Arts, Houston
A mụrụ Reverend William Carey na Mariah Pettway Carey na Mitchell Hill, Alabama, Rachel Carey George bụ ónyé isi ezinụlọ ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugbo niile n'ihe onwunwe ya ruo mgbè ọ gbara afọ iri itoolu
O nwèrè otu nwa nwanyị, Annie Mae Carey, ụmụ ụmụ atọ, na otu nwa nwa
Ọ dịrị ndụ ruo mgbè ọ dị afọ 103
Nwa ya nwanyị chetara n'ajụjụ ọnụ na ọ ' nọgidere na-eyi akwa' ruo ọgwụgwụ ndụ ya
Rachel Sabiha Johnson (amụrụ 3 Septemba 1965) bụ onye nta akụkọ Britain, onye na-egosi ihe onyonyo na onye ode akwụkwọ dabere na London
Na Jenụwarị 2018, ọ sonyere na usoro 21st nke Celebrity Big Brother ma chụpụrụ ya nke abụọ
Ọ bụ onye isi ndoro-ndoro ochichi Change UK maka mpaghara South West England na ntuli aka nzuko omeiwu Europe 2019
Johnson bụ nwa nke onye bụbu Conservative MEP Stanley Johnson na onye na-ese ihe Charlotte Johnson Wahl ( née Fawcett)

Ọ bụ nwanne nke obere Boris Johnson, Prime Minister nke United Kingdom na Conservative MP maka Uxbridge na South Ruislip ; na nwanne nwanyị nke okenye Jo Johnson, onye bụbu MP Conservative maka Orpington

N'akụkụ nna ya, Johnson bụ nwa nwa Ali Kemal, onye nta akụkọ Circassian-Turkish na-emesapụ aka na onye na-ahụ maka ime obodo na gọọmentị Damat Ferid Pasha, Grand Vizier nke Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman, bụ onye e gburu n'oge agha Turkey nke nnwere onwe na 1922
N'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, a ghọtara nna nna ya na nne nne ya dị ka ndị Britain ma were aha nne nne ha bụ Johnson
N'akụkụ nne ya ọ bụ nwa nwa Sir James Fawcett, onye ọka iwu ama ama na onye isi oche nke European Commission of Human Rights
Aha etiti Johnson, Sabiha, pụtara 'ututu' na Arabic ma na-ejikarị dị ka aha enyere na Turkey
Ọ bụ aha nwunye nke abụọ nke nna nna ya Ali Kemal, onye bụ ada Zeki Pasha
Stanley Johnson mere enyi nna nna ya nwoke Zeki Kuneralp, nwa Sabiha, mgbe Kuneralp bụ onye nnọchianya Turkey na Ụlọikpe St James na 1960

Agụrụ ya akwụkwọ na Winsford First School na Exmoor, Primrose Hill Primary na Camden, north London, European School of Brussels, ụlọ akwụkwọ Ashdown nọọrọ onwe ya na East Sussex, Bryanston School na Dorset na St Paul's Girls' School
Na 1984 ọ nọrọ ọnwa atọ dị ka onye ọrụ afọ ofufo kibbutz wee gaa New College, Oxford, ịgụ Classics ( Literae Humaniores ); n'ebe ahụ ọ deziri akwụkwọ Isis nke ụmụ akwụkwọ wee jiri 2 1 gụchaa
Na 1989 ọ sonyeere ndị ọrụ nke Financial Times, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ, ebe o dere banyere akụ na ụba
Ọ nọrọ otu afọ na nke abụọ na ndị ọrụ na-eme atụmatụ amụma ụlọ ọrụ Ofesi na 1992–93
O deela ogidi kwa izu maka Sunday Telegraph, Daily Telegraph, Standard Night na ogidi ndị ọzọ mgbe niile maka Easy Living and She magazines, yana Financial Times
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Spectator na ruo mgbe 2009 bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa izu na Sunday Times na Evening Standard, n'etiti akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ
Ugbu a, ọ na-ede otu kọlụm kwa izu na Mail na Sunday, kọlụm maka nnukwu mbipụta na kọlụm maka Oldie
Ọ na-anọdụ na bọọdụ nke Bright Blue, Tory na-eche echiche nke ọma, na Intelligence Squared, ọgbakọ arụmụka mba ụwa
Ọ bụ onye na-ekwurịta okwu na ihe ngosi arụmụka Sky News 'kwa izu, ahụ
Na Septemba 2009, Johnson ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke itoolu nke The Lady, akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa izu nke e guzobere na 1885
Ọnwa ole na ole mbụ ya bụ isiokwu nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Channel 4 nke isiokwu ya bụ The Lady and the Revamp ; A họpụtara nke a maka onyinye Grierson ya dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ na Jenụwarị 2012
Johnson's Shire Hell meriri 2008 Mmekọahụ Ọjọọ na Nrite akụkọ ifo, nke ọ kọwara dị ka 'nsọpụrụ zuru oke'
Johnson bụ onye otu Conservative Party site na 2008 ruo 2011, ma emesịa sonye na Liberal Democrats n'oge ntuli aka izugbe nke 2017 n'ihi nkwado Conservative maka Brexit
Johnson tụleziri ịbụ onye ndọrọndọrọ Lib Dem n'oche na West Country, mana amachibidoro ya n'okpuru iwu pati ahụ, ebe ọ bụ onye otu n'ihe na-erughị otu afọ
N'April 2019, ọ sonyeere ndị otu mgbochi Brexit Change UK ma bụrụ onye isi na ndepụta pati na South West England na ntuli aka nzuko omeiwu European 2019

O mechara kwara arịrị maka mkpebi a, na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka 'oke wụsara n'ụgbọ mmiri na-emikpu' ma katọọ àgwà otu ndị isi otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-elekwasị anya na nhazi mkpebi ma gbakwunye na Change UK bụ aha 'egwu'
Dị ka nke February 2021, ọ na-anọgide na-depụtara na Board of directors of Bright Blue, n'agbanyeghị na ọ hapụrụ Conservatives na 2011
Johnson lụrụ Ivo Dawnay, onye sitere na William Dawnay, 7th Viscount Downe, na nwa nwa nne nke Patrick Boyle, 8th Earl nke Glasgow
Dawnay bụ onye nduzi na onye ndụmọdụ na National Trust
Ha nwere ụmụ atọ
Johnson bi na Notting Hill na London na Exmoor, Somerset
Rachel Mwanza bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri si Democratic Republic of the Congo, nke a maara nke ọma maka arụmọrụ ya dịka Komona na ihe nkiri 2012 War Witch (Rebelle)
Tupu a tụba ya na ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ nweghị ebe obibi ma biri n'okporo ámá Kinshasa
A mụrụ Mwanza n'afọ 1997 na Mbuji-Mayi, nke atọ n'ime ụmụnne isii, ma nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Kasai Province
Nna ya zigara nne ya na ụmụnne ya na Kinshasa mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, na-ekwe nkwa ịgakwuru ha mgbe e mesịrị
N'ebe ahụ, ụmụaka ahụ anaghịzi aga ụlọ akwụkwọ, nne ya kwupụtara na ọ bụ ya kpatara ọdachi ezinụlọ ahụ mgbe onye amụma ụgha kwuru na Mwanza bụ onye amoosu
Ọ boro nne ya ebubo maka ịnwa ịchụpụ mmụọ ọjọọ iji wepụ Mwanza na amoosu, mana emesịrị chụpụ ya n'okporo ámá
Mwanza nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ na-ebi dịka nwatakịrị n'okporo ámá na Kinshasa tupu a kpọọ ya na ihe nkiri Canada War Witch (Rebelle)
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri 2013 Kinshasa Kids nke Marc-Henri Wajnberg dere ma duzie
O mechara kwaga Montreal, ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị École Lucien-Pagé ma soro ezinụlọ Anne-Marie Gélinas biri, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri maka War Witch
A tụbara Mwanza na Rebelle mgbe onye nduzi Kim Nguyen na ndị na-emepụta Pierre Even na Marie-Claude Poulin hụrụ ya na ihe nkiri na ụmụaka okporo ámá nke Kinshasa
N'ihi enweghị agụmakwụkwọ ya, ọ maghị otú e si agụ ma ọ bụ dee mgbe mbụ e mere ya na fim ahụ; ndị na-eme ihe nkiri emeela ndokwa ịkwụ ụgwọ maka agụmakwụkwọ na ụlọ ya ruo mgbe ọ gbara afọ 18
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2013, e nyere ya visa iji nye ya ohere ịga Academy Awards, ebe ọ bụ ntinye Canada maka Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film
Nleta ahụ jikọtara ọnụnọ na onyinye ahụ yana ọrụ nkwalite maka Rebelle mgbe ọ nọ na United States

Ọrụ Mwanza na Rebelle nwetara ihe nrite ya gụnyere Silver Bear maka Best Actress site na Berlin Film Festival, Tribeca Film Festival na Vancouver Film Critics Circle n'afọ 2012, yana ihe nrite maka Best Acpress na 1st Canadian Screen Awards na Québec Cinéma
Mwanza mechara dee akwụkwọ akpọrọ Survivre pour voir ce jour, na-akọwa oge ọ bụ nwata na ahụmịhe ya na olileanya na ọ ga-akpali ndị na-eto eto ma na-adọta uche ụmụaka 20,000 bi n'okporo ámá Kinshasha

Rachel Oniga (amụrụ n'onwa Mee n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na ato n'afọ 1957) bụ Omee ihe nkiri na Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye Eku, Delta steeti nke Southern Naijiria
Ha muru ya na abali 23(iri abụọ na ato) n'onwa Mee na afọ 1957 na Ebutte Metta, Lagos Steeti
Ọ bidoro ime ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 1993, obere oge ka ọ gbasachara alụmdiya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na nkenke na Ascoline Nigeria Limited, ụlọ ọrụ Dutch Consultant tupụ o mee ihe nkiri nke mbụ ya akpọrọ Onome na ihe onyonyo nke mbụ ya e gosipụtara na yoruba bụ Owu Blow
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, o meela ihe onyonyo ndị ama ama na Naijiria, dika Sango, ihe nkiri nke Wale Ogunyemi dere, nke Obafemi Lasode mepụtara ma dozie
O sokwa eme usoro ịhe onyonyo Wale Adenuga akpọrọ super story
Rachael ghọrọ nne nne mgbe nwa ya nwaanyị bu Georgia mụrụ nwa

Rachel Pinney (11 Julaị 1909 - 19 Ọktoba 1995) bụ dọkịta ahụike Britain bụ onye sụrụ ụzọ usoro ọgwụgwọ maka mmepe ụmụaka n'afọ ndị 1960 nke ọ kpọrọ 'Ntị ihe okike' na 'oge awa ụmụaka' Site na 1927 ruo 1934 ọ bụ onye otu Ferguson's Gang zoro ezo, otu ndị na-ahụ maka ọdịmma mmadụ na-enye onyinye ego na National Trust na mkpesa nchekwa ime obodo ndị ọzọ N'ime mgbanwe ya dị ka Red Biddy, Pinney, kpuchiri mkpuchi na mkpuchi, nyefere onyinye mbụ Ferguson's Gang n'ụlọ ọrụ ntụkwasị obi nke mba n'afọ 1933
A kọrọ na nnyefe nke £ 100 na ọlaọcha maka onyinye nke Shalford Mill na National Trust
Pinney na-abụghị onye ọtọdọks n'ọtụtụ ụzọ, o kwere nkwa ịgbachi nkịtị na Wednesday, ọ bụkwa onye na-ahụ maka udo
Nna ya, Reginald Pinney, bụ onye isi agha na ndị agha Britain
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta n'ihe gbasara ahụike ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ala ruo n'afọ 1961, yana ịrụ ọrụ dịka dọkịta na-awa ndị uwe ojii
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na onye na-agwọ ụmụaka Dr
Margaret Lowenfeld, mana ọ dịghị mgbe ọ zụrụ ya
Ọ malitere 'usoro maka nghọta esemokwu' nke ọ kpọrọ 'Creative Listening' na 'Children's Hours', nke mbụ e debanyere aha dị ka ụlọ ọrụ nwere oke n'afọ 1967
Ọ gara Britain na mbido afọ 1960 na-akpọ ndị mmadụ ka ha kesaa echiche ha n'okwu ndị na-ese okwu dịka mgbanwe iwu nwoke idina nwoke na agha nuklia ka ọ na-eji usoro ige ntị ya
Ndị ọkachamara na-arụ ọrụ maka ụmụaka na-eji usoro ụmụaka ya eme ihe n'ọtụtụ ebe
Na September 1970, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ọnwa itoolu n’ihi mmejọ nke idobe na ilekọta nwa n’England megidere uche nne ya, mgbe o zigasịrị nwa nwoke dị afọ 14 ibi na Canada n’enwetaghị ikike nne ya
N'afọ 1977, Pinney gara New York ma gwọọ nwa nwoke dị afọ anọ nwere autism
Nke a mere ka o bipụta Bobby, Breakthrough of an Autistic Child (1983)
Ọ lụrụ Luigi Cocuzzi nwa oge nke ya na otu nwa nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke abụọ Ọ bụ onye Quaker na onye so na Mgbasa Ozi Maka Mgbasa Ngwá Agha Nuklia site na 1961
O kwuputara n'ihu ọha na onwe ya dị ka nwanyị nwanyị nwere mmasị nwanyị na 1989
Ọ nwụrụ na 19 Ọktoba 1995 mgbe ọ dị afọ 86
Rachel Windvogel bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke jere ozi dị ka onye otu Western Cape Provincial Parliament kemgbe Mee 2019
Windvogel bụ onye otu African National Congress
Ọ bụ onye MEC onyinyo nke ANC maka ahụike ka ọ na-eje ozi na Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ahụike na ndị omeiwu
Àtụ Members of the Western Cape Provincial Parliament
Rachel Wolfe-Goldsmith (amụrụ na úbọchị irí nà atọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 1991) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke bi na Oakland, California
A maara ya màkà nnukwu mgbidi ya, ọ bụkwa ónyé nduzi okike nke Bay Area Mural Program

N'oge opupu ihe ubi na ógè okpomọkụ nke afọ 2020, mgbè ogbugbu George Floyd gasịrị, Wolfe-Goldsmith so n'ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na-ese mgbidi na nzaghachi màkà ogbugbu ahụ na iberibe osisi na-ekpuchi ụlọ ahịa na etiti obodo Oakland
A na-akpọ akụkụ ya na 15th St

We Can Breathe N'oge a, Bay Area Mural Program, na Wolfe-Goldsmith dị ka ónyé nduzi okike, na African American Arts & Culture Complex haziri Black Lives Matter mural na San Francisco, nke gbara màkà mpaghara ọbọdọ atọ
Otu She Will Rise, nke na-arụ ọrụ iji nweta nwanyị ojii na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke United States, nyèrè Wolfe-Goldsmith ọrụ ise ihe osise na Washington, DC
Emechara ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, ọrụ ahụ gosipụtara ndị ọka ikpe na ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2020, a màrà ọkwa na Wolfe-Goldsmith ga-ese ihe osise na-elekwasị ányà na ikpe ziri ezi nke ọha na eze na onye ọrụ ibe ya Joshua Mays
Kaiser Permanente na ABG Art Group nyere iwu ka e see ihe osise ahụ, ma gosipụta ya n'èzí ọfịs Kaiser na etiti ọbọdọ Oakland tupu a mee atụmatụ ịkwaga Liberation Park
Ọzọkwa n'etiti obodo Oakland, Wolfe-Goldsmith eseela ihe osise atọ nke ónyé na-ese ihe Stoney Creation na ihe nlereanya Yanni Brump

N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2021, ónyé nwe ụlọ na onye nlekọta nke West Oakland bụ Jilchristina Vest nyèrè Wolfe-Goldsmith iwu ka ọ see ihe osise nke ụmụ nwanyị na Black Panther Party n'akụkụ ụlọ ya na Center na 9th Streets
Ihe osise irí atọ nke ụkwụ dabeere na ọtụtụ foto Stephen Shames sere ma gosipụta Delores Henderson, Angie Johnson, Lauren Williams, na nwa nwanyị Williams Mary
Ihe osise ahụ ugbu a gosipụtara aha ihe karịrị ụmụ nwanyị narị atọ, a na-eme atụmatụ na ọ ga-abụ square mita Puku abụọ mgbe emechara ya
A gwara ónyé isi Black Panther Ericka Huggins màkà ọrụ ahụ
Rachel Zadok bụ onye odee South Africa na onye akpọrọ Whitbread First Novel Award (2005)
Ọ bụ onye dere akwụkwọ akụkọ Gem Squash Tokoloshe na Nwanna Nwanyị
A mụrụ Zadok na South Africa n'afọ 1972 nye nne South Africa na nna Israel wee tolite na Kensington, mpaghara ndị ọcha etiti na Johannesburg
O mechara mụọ Fine Art wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe na-ese ihe
Ya na di dọkịta ya kwagara London, England n'afọ 2001 ebe ọ nọ na-echere nwa oge wee rụọ ọrụ maka ọrụ ebere ụmụ mgbei
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Asambodo na akwụkwọ akụkọ na Mahadum City, London
Ọ bụ na London ka Zadok malitere ide Gem Squash Tokoloshe, akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ e debere na obodo ya South Africa
N'afọ 2004, Zadok banyere n'asọmpi 'Otu esi ebipụta' na Channel 4's Richard & Judy Show, ruru ise ikpeazụ n'ime mmadụ puku iri anọ na isii batara
Pan Macmillan mechara nye ya nkwekọrịta mbipụta
Gem Squash Tokoloshe bụ onye ahọpụtara maka onyinye Whitbread Book Awards First Novel na ihe nrite John Llewellyn Rhys, yana edepụtala ya ogologo oge maka onyinye akwụkwọ edemede Dublin International
Ndị ọka ikpe Whitbread mara ọkwa, sị “Gem Squash Tokoloshe masịrị anyị na mkpali ya siri ike nke ilere anya nwata n'ime ime obodo South Africa masịrị anyị
Rachel Zadok na-esetịpụ ihe nkiri nzuzo nke ezinụlọ na-emebi emebi megide ndabere nke mba na-agbanwe agbanwe wee mepụta ọnọdụ egwu egwu'
Zadok laghachiri South Africa n'afọ 2010 ma ugbu a ya na di ya na nwa ya nwanyị bi na Cape Town
Na The Guardian nke iri na asatọ November 2005 Zadok kwuru, sị 'Ọ dị m ka enweghị m ike ịgbanarị ya (South Africa) ma biri ebe ọzọ
M ga-akwụ ụgwọ m, nyeghachi obodo nyere m nke ukwuu
Zadok ekwuola maka ọchịchọ ya iguzobe ọrụ maka ụmụ mgbei HIV/AIDS na obodo ya South Africa
N'afọ 2011, ọ malitere Short Story Day Africa, atụmatụ iji gosipụta akụkọ ifo dị mkpirikpi nke Africa
O bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke abụọ, Nwanna Nwanyị-nwanyị, ya na onye mbipụta South Africa Kwela Books na 2013

Rachid Baba Ahmed (Arabic; 20 August 1946 15 February 1995) bụ onye Algeria na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, onye na-ede egwu, na onye na-agụ egwu na mpaghara a maara dị ka raï E nyere ya otuto maka mgbasawanye mba ụwa nke ụdị ahụ na 1976, site na pop raï ọhụrụ, ya na ngwakọta dị nro na nke dị mgbagwoju anya nke ngwá electronic
A makwaara ya maka mmepe nke pop raï n'oge 1970s na 1980s, ndị na-eme ya ka a na-akpọ cheb ma ọ bụ chaba
Rachid Baba mepụtara abọm nke akpọrọ Rai Rebels, n'etiti ọtụtụ aha egwu ndị ọzọ a na-akwanyere ùgwù ewepụtara na United States na ebe ndị ọzọ
E deputara ka ọ na-ekwu, n'ihe gbasara nyocha egwu egwu na egwu ndị dị na albums iji mee ka ha kwesị ekwesị maka ndị na-ekiri Islam na-ekiri ya, 'Na mmalite, m na-ahapụ cheb na-abụ okwu dị ka ọ chọrọ
Ugbu a, m na-akwụ ụgwọ
Mgbe ọ na-abụ abụ rụrụ arụ, m na-ekwu kwụsị
Ọ bụrụ na ọ naghị erube isi, m na-ebipụ ya n'oge ngwakọta' Baba nyeere ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri aka, gụnyere Chaba Fadela na Cheb Sahraoui
Egwu iri abụo na anọ ọgbara ọhụrụ nke Ahmed dị na Tlemcen mepụtara pop-ra nke Algeria
N'oge Agha Obodo Algeria, ndị Alakụba gburu ya na Febụwarị 15, 1995, n'èzí ụlọ ahịa ndekọ ya na Oran, Algeria
Ọ bụ onye a na-elekwasị anya ogologo oge maka òtù ndị Alakụba n'ihi itinye aka na mmepụta nke egwu nwere isiokwu nke ịhụnanya na ndụ kwa ụbọchị
Rachid Ben Ali (a mụrụ n'afọ 1978, Taza, Morocco) bụ onye na-ese ihe si Morocco na Dutch
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, nne na nna ya zigara ya Netherlands
Ọ bụ autodidact
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gara Polytechnic of the Arts na Antwerp, Belgium
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Amsterdam na London
N'afọ 2001 na 2003 o nwere ihe ngosi na Tanya Rumpff Gallery na Haarlem, Stedelijk Museum na Amsterdam na Wereldmuseum na Rotterdam
Queen Beatrix họọrọ otu n'ime ihe osise ya iji webata ihe ngosi na Stedelijk Museum
N'afọ 2003, o ritere ihe nrite KunstRAI maka ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe, na 2005 e gosipụtara ịrị anọ n'ime ihe osise ya kachasị ọhụrụ na Cobra Museum of Modern Art na Amstelveen, dị nso na Amsterdam
Ọrụ ya akpalitewo iwe na iyi egwu site n'aka ndị agha Alakụba na Netherlands
Ọ gara zoo mgbe iyi egwu ọnwụ metụtara ihe ngosi nke na-egosi bọmbụ 'ịkpọ imams asị'
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ chọrọ ndị nche, nke Cobra Museum na-akwụ ụgwọ ya
Rachid El Ouali (Arabic, a mụrụ n'April 3, 1965) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye nduzi na onye na-elekọta TV na mba Morocco
El Ouali malitere ime ihe nkiri na ngwụcha afọ 1980
O gosipụtara nkà na ọrụ ya dị mkpa na ihe nkiri TV Flock of Pigeons (سرب الحمام, Serb Al Hamam)
Ọ pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn a ma ama Hossein & Safia (الحسين و الصافية, El Hossein w Safia) ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Samia Akariou
N'afọ 2006, Rachid El Ouali rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri TV Al Mostadaafon(المستضعفون,The Underdogs) ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Rajae Imran

O mekwara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na-aga nke ọma dịka Obsessions After Midnight (هواجس بعد منتصف traffic, Hawajes bood montassaf el leil), ihe nkiri egwu nke ihe nkiri ebe ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Majida Benkirane na-eduzi
E wezụga ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya, ọ duziri ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na sitcoms dịka Ninni ya Moummou, Nass El Houma, L'Aube, na La mouche et moi
Ihe omume TV
'Mkpúrù èdè íke'
Rachid Ksentini (November 11, 1887 August 4, 1944) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ọchị
A mụrụ Rachid Ksentini Rachid Belakhdar n'abalị 11 ọnwa Nọvemba, afọ 1887 na Casbah nke Algiers
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ n'oge ọ dị obere iji soro nna ya rụọ ọrụ dịka ọkwá nkà na-amụta ọrụ na Bab El Oued ruo n'afọ 1914
Na mbido Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ọ debanyere aha dịka onye ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri na ụgbọ mmiri ahịa wee gaa France
Ụgbọ mmiri ọ banyere n'ụgbọ mmiri ahụ bụ nke ndị agha mmiri Germany gbagburu
Ndị Royal Navy napụtara ndị lanarịrịnụ, nke e zigara na Marseille
site na ọrụ ya dịka onye ọkwọ ụgbọ mmiri, ọ gara Europe, North America, China, na India
Ọ laghachiri Algeria mana maka obere oge tupu ọ laghachi France
n'afọ 1925, ọ laghachiri n'ala nna ya wee zute n'otu afọ ahụ na kọfị, Ali Sellali aka
Allalou onye gwara ya ka ọ sonye n'òtù ihe nkiri ya Ezzahia
Njikọ ha na-arụpụta n'etiti ihe ndị ọzọ site na ngosi nke egwuregwu Zaouadj Bouaklin n'ọnwa October 26, afọ 1926, nke na-egosi mpụta mbụ nke Ksentini n'elu ikpo okwu
Njikọ dị n'etiti ndị ikom abụọ ahụ na-aga n'ihu na mgbanwe nke Allalou nke usoro sitere na Otu puku na otu abalị, ebe Rachid Ksentine nwetara ọrụ mbụ
N'afọ 1927, ya na Djelloul Bachedjerrah mepụtara, ndị otu El Djazaïr gbasara n'oge na-adịghị anya
Rachid Ksentini pụtara karịsịa na ihe nkiri
mana n'otu oge ahụ, ọ na-etinye onwe ya n'abụ ndị na-atọ ọchị na-enwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

Ọtụtụ n'ime abụ ya bụ mkpuchi ma ọ bụ interpolation nke sitere na egwu egwu nke mba, dịka ọmụmaatụ na Ach men âr alikoum ya bnaïn ennas, nke sitere na Ach men Âr Alikoum ya rdjal Meknes (amaokwu sitere na uri nke Kaddour El Alamy)
E mere usoro TV a raara nye onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ n'afọ 2005, nke Boualem Aďssaoui duziri site na ihe nkiri nke Rachid Soufi
Usoro ahụ nwere akụkụ iri na abụọ nke nkeji iri atọ ọ bụla
Hachlaf (2001)
Anthologie de la musique arabe, 1906-1960 (in French)
Algiers Éditions Anep
Rachid Ksentini nwụrụ n'August 4, 1944
Rachid Taha (Arabic; iri na asatọ nọwa Septemba 1958- iri na abụọ nọwa Septemba 2018) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe ike nke bi na France nke a kọwara dị ka 'onye na-eme njem'
Egwú ya nwere mmetụta dị iche iche gụnyere rock, electronic, punk na raï
A mụrụ Taha na 1958 na Sig, Mascara Province, Algeria, ọ bụ ezie na isi mmalite nke abụọ na-atụ aro na a mụrụ ya n'obodo Oran dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri Algeria
Obodo a bụ 'ebe a mụrụ egwu raï', na 1958 bụ afọ dị mkpa na ọgụ Algeria maka nnwere onwe megide ikike France
Ọ malitere ige egwu Algeria n'afọ ndị 1960, gụnyere egwu egwu a na-akpọ chaabi
Tụkwasị na nke a, egwu sitere na mpaghara Maghreb bụ akụkụ nke ịzụlite ya
UYa na ndị mụrụ ya kwagara France mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, biri n'obodo ndị mbịarambịa gburugburu obodo France nke Lyon na 1968
Nna ya bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ akwa, na-arụ ogologo oge na ụgwọ dị ala, nke mere na e jiri ndụ ya tụnyere nke 'ohu nke oge a', dị ka otu akụkọ si kwuo

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, Taha na-arụ ọrụ n'ehihie na ụlọ ọrụ na-ekpo ọkụ, nke a kọwara dị ka 'ọrụ dị ala', ma kpọọ ọrụ a asị, mana n'abalị ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye DJ na klọb na-akpọ egwu Arabic, rap, salsa, funk na 'ihe ọ bụla ọzọ na-amasị ya'

Na ngwụcha afọ 1970, Taha guzobere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ abalị a na-akpọ The Rejects ma ọ bụ, na French, Les Refoulés, ebe ọ ga-agbanye mashups nke ndị Arab pop classics na Led Zeppelin, Bo Diddley na Kraftwerk backbeats
N'afọ ndị 1980, egwu pop nke Algeria nke a maara dị ka raï malitere inweta nlebara anya mba ụwa

Na mbụ, egwu raï dabeere na 'ndị na-eme ihe nkiri n'obodo na-eme ka egwu si n'osisi' ma kọwaa ya dị ka ribald, mana ọ ghọrọ ihe na-eme ngagharị iwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ndị na-eto eto na 1960s na 1970s jiri ya 'gosipụta iwe na ọchịchọ ha'
Taha tụrụ aro na ụdị egwu Algeria na egwu rock 'dị na njikọ chiri anya'
Taha nwere mmetụta nke otu egwu chaâbi nke Morocco bụ Nass El Ghiwane nke a kọwara dị ka 'azịza Morocco nye Beatles ma ọ bụ Stones'
N'afọ 1981, mgbe ọ bi na Lyon, Taha zutere Mohammed na Mokhtar Amini na ha atọ, tinyere Djamel Dif na Eric Vaquer ga-eme otu egwu n'oge na-adịghị anya
N'afọ 1982, Taha bụ onye isi na-agụ egwú maka otu egwu egwu Arabic nke ha kpọrọ Carte de Sejour, nke pụtara Green Card ma ọ bụ Residence Permit dabere na nsụgharị
Ọ bụrụ abụ na French na Arabic, mana ọ na-abụkarị Arabic
Taha sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke otu The Clash
Taha kwenyere na ndekọ mbụ ya nyere aka kpalie The Clash ịmepụta egwu 'Rock the Casbah'
Otu onye na-akọ akụkọ egwu na New York Times dere banyere mbipụta Taha nke abụ Clash nwere ike ịbụ na ọrụ mbụ ya metụtara ya
Afọ ndị a bụ afọ siri ike ebe ọ bụ na ụlọ ahịa ndekọ na-ajụkarị itinye ndekọ ha 'n'ihi na ha achọghị ka ndị Arab bata n'ụlọ ahịa ha'
E nwere obere ego; òtù ahụ rụrụ ọrụ na mpụga Lyon

Taha weere abụ ndị France na-ahụ mba n'anya nke akpọrọ 'Sweet France' (na French Douce France) nke Charles Trenet dekọrọ na mbụ n'afọ 1940, debere okwu ya, mana jiri 'na-ewe iwe' bụrụ ya nke kpasuru ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ntị French iwe, ọkachasị site na 'onye na-agụ egwu Arabic na-adịghị mma, nke yiri bohemian', ruo n'ókè ebe a machibidoro nsụgharị Taha na redio French
Abụ 'acerbic' mepụtara 'splash', n'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ma mee ka Taha bụrụ onye a ma ama dị ka onye na-ese ihe
Ìgwè ahụ enwetụbeghị ihe ịga nke ọma n'ahịa ma, n'ihi ya, Taha rụrụ ọrụ ọtụtụ ụbọchị n'ụlọ mmepụta ihe, mgbe ahụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe n'ụlọ, onye na-asa efere, ma mesịa dị ka onye ahịa encyclopedia
Ha dekọrọ abọm maxi mbụ ha Carte De Séjour na 1983
N'afọ 1984, site n'enyemaka nke onye na-agba ụbọ akwara na Britain bụ Steve Hillage, otu ahụ nwetara 'ụda dị nkọ, nke na-akwọ ụgbọala' nke na-egwuri egwu nke ọma na redio, aha LP bụ Rhoromanie
N'ide egwu ya, Taha dere banyere ibi na mba ọzọ na esemokwu ọdịbendị metụtara ịbụ onye Algeria kwagara na France
N'afọ 1986, a na-ahụ 'ihe mkpuchi punk-rock nke 'Douce France ya dị ka 'nnukwu mkpesa megide mmeso mba ahụ na-emeso ndị mbịarambịa ya', ma kpatara nkụda mmụọ na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị French
Abụ ya 'Voilà, Voilà' mere mkpesa megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Taha aghaghị ịnagide mmetụta na mgbagwoju anya na-emegide ndị Arab; dịka ọmụmaatụ, The New York Times kwuru na akụkọ ihu na Taha bụ onye Ijipt kama ịbụ onye Algeria, mana o mechara dezie ya
Ka e mesịrị, n' afo pụkụ abụọ na asaa, a kpọtụrụ Taha-dị ka onye mbịarambịa aha na France's National Center of the History of Immigration
Mgbe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri, Taha na-eyi uwe dị iche iche, gụnyere n'otu oge okpu fedora akpụkpọ anụ, mgbe e mesịrị okpu cowboy na-acha ọbara ọbara
E wepụtara LP nke abụọ na nke ikpeazụ nke akpọrọ Ramsa (Five) n'afọ 1986
Ìgwè ahụ gbasara n'afọ 1989
N'afọ 1989, Taha kwagara Paris iji malite ọrụ ya n'onwe ya
N'otu oge a kpọrọ ya ka ọ gaa Los Angeles ka ya na onye egwu Don Was, onye bụbu onye na-emepụta ihe na Rolling Stones
Taha gwakọtara ọtụtụ ngwá egwu na ụdị maka ụda ya
Site na ngwá egwu a na-akpọ doumbek ma ọ bụ darbuka, otu ọhụrụ ya na-akpọ egwu Arabic

O yiri n'otu oge na Taha nwere ike ịghọ 'ihe ịga nke ọma n'abalị', mana mgbe a tọhapụrụ abọm Barbès, ahịa na-akụda mmụọ na United States, ikekwe n'ihi na ndị America enweghị mmasị na egwu Arabic n'oge Agha Gulf mbụ
N'afọ 1993, Taha na Hillage rụkọtara ọrụ ọzọ bụ onye nyere aka mepụta abọm nke abụọ ya, nke akpọrọ Rachid Taha ma nyere ya aka inweta 'ụdị njikọ clubland-raï'
Hillage rụrụ ọrụ na abọm Taha itoolu site na 1993 ruo 2006, na-enyere Taha aka ịlaghachi na 'mgbọrọgwụ ugwu Afrịka'

N'afọ 1995, o wepụtara abọm akpọrọ Olé Olé na Taha na-ele anya dị ka 'Aryan androgyne' nwere ntutu na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na oghere anya na-acha odo odo, iji mee ka ihe banyere nkwenye ndị Arab na 'homophobia nke ọdịbendị North Africa'
Valencia gosipụtara abụ nke Kirsty Hawkshaw
N'afọ 1997, abụ ya 'Ya Rayah' ghọrọ ihe a ma ama
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Canary Islands

N'afọ pụkụ abụọ na otu, Taha wepụtara Made in Medina, onye na-enyocha egwu kwuru na o jiri 'ihe eji eme ihe zuru oke na nke dịgasị iche iche' yana 'ihe owuwu olu na-agbagwoju anya nke karịrị ụdị ọ bụla ọ na-etinye
' Edere abọm ahụ na Paris, New Orleans, na London site na ntinye sitere na American jam band Galactic
Taha hụrụ ihe yiri n'etiti egwu Africa na America wee sị ' Orleans ọhụrụ dị ka Algiers
Ha abụọ bụ ndị France na-achị n'otu oge, ọbụnakwa enwere mpaghara a na-akpọ Algiers, 'ma o kwuru na usoro drum nke Louisiana Zydeco yiri egwu raï
Emere na Medina jikọtara mgbọrọgwụ Algeria, techno, egwu pop, na mmetụta rock na punk mbụ na 'nkwekọ dị ịrịba ama' na ọrụ ndị gara aga, dị ka Hillage si kwuo
Radcliffe Bailey (amụrụ n'afọ 1968) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe n'oge a nke a ma ámá màkà ọrụ mgbasa ozi, eserese, na ihe ọkpụkpụ nke na-enyocha akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Africa na America
Ọ bi ugbu a na Atlanta, Georgia
A mụrụ Radcliffe Bailey na Bridgeton, New Jersey na 1968
Mgbè ọ dị afọ 4, ọ kwagara Atlanta, Georgia, nke bụ ebe ọ bi ugbu a
Mmasị ya na nka kpaliri site na nleta nwata na High Museum of Art na klas ise ihe o mechara gaa na Atlanta College of Art
Ọ na-ekwu akụkọ ihe méré eme nke Atlanta na ikike obodo na Agha Obodo dị ka ihe na-akpali akpali
Bailey nwetara nzèrè Bachelor of Fine Arts na 1991 site na Atlanta College of Art Site na 2001 ruo 2006, ọ kụziri na Lamar Dodd School of Art na Mahadum Georgia
A zụrụ Bailey dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe ma na-eme nnwale na ágbá na mgbasa ozi ngwakọta
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ime njikọta nke ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ, na-eji ihe ndị dị ka foto ochie nke ezinụlọ ya, ndekọ vinyl, mkpịsị piano na okpu karama
N'ụzọ isiokwu, nka ya na-enyocha njikọ nke ndị nnà nnà, agbụrụ na ncheta ọdịbendị
N'afọ 2003, ọ nakweere ụdị nka nke Kongo minkisi kpaliri, nke ọ kọwara dị ka 'ihe osise ụlọ ọgwụ'
N'ihi ya, a kọwaala ọrụ ya dị ka akụkụ atọ na nke dị larịị, na-etinye ihe ndị na-esi ísì na ụda

N'ajụjụ ọnụ nke afọ 2013, Bailey kọwara usoro okike ya na mmasị ya na njikọ dị n'etiti ógè gara aga na ugbu a, na-ekwu, sị Ahụmahụ nke nka kwa ụbọchị, ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ m nwèrè ike iyi ka ọ nwèrè akụkọ ihe mere eme a, ọ bụkwa mkpuchi màkà ihe Ìm na-emeso kwa ụbọchị
Ọ na-ekwu ọtụtụ ihe banyere taa
Anyị na-ekwu maka ebe m ga-aga ọzọ Ọ ka na-eche banyere taa na ụnyaahụ na ihe na-abịa n'ihu m echi
' Ọ bụ ndị akụkọ ihe méré eme kpaliri ya n'ụzọ dị ukwuu, na-ezo aka na ndị mmadụ dịka George Washington Carver na onye na-arụ ọrụ na Charleston bụ Philip Simmons dị ka isi iyi nke mkpali
E gosipụtara nnukwu ihe owuwu ya Windward Coast (2009-2011), dị ka akụkụ nke First International Biennial of Contemporary Art of Cartagena de Indias, Colombia
E nyela ya onyinye màkà onyinye nka ya, na-anata Joan Foundation Grant na 2008 na Elizabeth na Mallory Factory Prize for Southern Art na 2010
Bailey enweela ihe ngosi onwé ya n'ọtụtụ gallery na ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere
N'ubochí irí abụọ na asaá n'ọnwa Juun, 2009, Bailey lụrụ ónyé America na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agba egwu, na ónyé na-emepụta Victoria Rowell na Dublin, New Hampshire
A mara ọkwa agbamakwụkwọ ahụ na The New York Times
Di na nwunye ahụ gbara alụkwaghịm na 2014
Radia Bent Lhoucine (1912–1994) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Morocco nke malitere ịse ihe n'afọ mgbe ọ burugoro okenye
Ọrụ ya egosipụtala ma ree na ụlọ ngosi na Africa na Europe
A mụrụ Radia Bent Lhoucine (nke a na-akpọkwa Radia Bent El Houssein) na mpaghara Marrakech na Douar Oulad Youssef (na mpaghara Kalaât Sraghna) ma nwụọ na 1994 na Salé, Morocco
Ọ maliteghị eserese ruo n'afọ 1961; ọbụlagodi mgbe ahụ, ọ dị ụkọ maka ụmụ nwanyị Morocco ịchụso nka
Mgbe ọ hụrụ ihe osise nke nwa ya nwoke, onye na-ese ihe bụ Miloud Labied, ọ nwere mkpali ịmalite eserese n'agbanyeghị afọ ndụ ya, ihe karịrị afọ iri ise
N'ịbụ onye nwa ya nwoke gbara ume, o gosipụtara ụfọdụ ọrụ ya na studio nke Jacqueline Brodskis na Rabat, Morocco, na 1962
Ndị nkatọ nabatara eserese ya nke ọma bụ ndị depụtara ọrụ ya dị ka nka Naive
A na-atụlekarị ihe osise ya, ma gosipụta ya, ya na nke mmadụ abụọ n'ime ndị ọgbọ ya bụ Chaibia Talal (1929–2004) na Fatima Hassan El Farrouj (1945–2011)
E gosipụtara ya na ihe ngosi akpọrọ Two thousand years of Art in Morocco nke emere na Charpentier Gallery na Paris na 1963
O gosikwara n'otu afọ ahụ na Jean Dubuffet Foundation na Lausanne, Switzerland
Mgbe ahụ, e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Bab Rouah Gallery na Rabat na 1966 ya na ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe na Morocco

O sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ na Morocco na mba ofesi ebe ọrụ ya pụtara na nchịkọta dị iche iche gburugburu ụwa, ọkachasị, nke Société Générale Maroc na Casablanca, nke Villa des Arts Galerie na Museum of Contemporary Art nke ntọala ONA na nchịkọta onwe onye dị iche iche na Morocco na Switzerland
Radia Bent Lhoucine kwụsịrị eserese na njedebe nke afọ ndị 1970
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1994 na Salé, e wee zigara nwa ya nwoke, Labied ndekọ nke eserese ya nile
A kpọrọ ya otu n'ime 'ndị na-ese ihe atọ na-asụ ụzọ bụ ndị gosipụtara akụkọ nka nke Morocco,' na nkọwa nke ihe ngosi 2011 na Casablanca's Gallery 38 kwuru,

Ihe ngosi a ga-abụ ohere iji chọpụta eluigwe na ala dị ka nrọ nke Radia Bent Lhoucine, njikọ dị n'etiti nka nkume na akụkọ a ma ama ọrụ nke na-akọ uri ọhịa nke okike na ọnọdụ ya, ebe ndị na-eche n'echiche na ụmụ anụmanụ na-agbanwe na agba mara mma
Ka ọ na-erule 2020, ọrụ ya gosipụtara na Mohammed VI Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art na Rabat
Ihe ngosi mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
Radio Gaalkacyo Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ redio dabere na Galkayo, Somalia
O nwere webụsaịtị emetụtara nke edere n'asụsụ Somali na n'asụsụ bekee, na-enye akụkọ na mgbede dị ugbu a
A na-akpọbu Radio Free Somalia, Radio Gaalkacyo na-agụta ugbu a ndị ọbịa 50,000 kwa ụbọchị na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ya
O nwekwara ihe dịka ndị na-ege ntị 950,000 na redio FM nke dị na Galkayo Na Garowe na mpaghara Puntland nke dị n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ, nke ruru ihe karịrị 250 km2
Redio Lagos 1075 FM (nke a makwaara dị ka Tiwa n' Tiwa) malitere ọrụ na 1977 dị ka alaka nke Nigerian Broadcasting Corporation (NBC)
Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ redio FM nke mbụ nwere steeti na Lagos Steeti
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ na mbụ na ọnụọgụ abụọ AM (990 kHz303mtrs na 918 kHz327mtrs)
Mkpa maka mgbanwe mepụtara Radio Lagos 1075 FM (Tiwa n'Tiwa) n'okpuru nchịkwa nke Lagos State Radio Service na 2001
Redio Lagos bụ ụlọ ọrụ asụsụ mbụ pụrụ iche, nke nwere ihe karịri pasentị iri itoolu na asatọ (98%) nke nnyefe ya na Yoruba na Egun, na ihe dịka pasent abụọ (2%) maka akụkọ Bekee
Ndị na-ege ntị na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gụnyere ndị na-ege Yoruba ntị na Lagos na ndị Naijiria
Nhọpụta nke Maazị Olajide Isiaka Lawal dị ka onye isi njikwa nke Redio Lagos bụ nke Gọvanọ Lagos Steeti, Maazị Babajide Sanwo-Olu nyere ikike
E hiwere Federal Radio Corporation of Nigeria Kaduna, nke a maara dị ka Radio Kaduna, na 1962
Ọ nwere ugbu a ndị na-ege ntị na redio kachasị na mpaghara Sahara Africa

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-agbasa ozi n'asụsụ Hausa Bekee, Nupe na Kanuri Enwere ike ịnụ mmemme Hausa na steeti Kaduna na n'ụwa niile na ebili mmiri 6090 kHz, yana mmemme Bekee na 4770 kHz Ọwa FM na obodo Kaduna bụ Supreme FM na 961 MHz na Karama FM na 921 MHz

Radius dị irè nke igwe ojii (ma ọ bụ radius dị irè ma ọ bụ radios dị irè mgbè ọ dị n'ihe gbárá ya gbụrụ-gbúrụ) bụ ihe dị arọ nke nkesa nke igwe ojii
James E
Hansen na Larry Travis kọwara okwu ahụ n'afọ 1974 dị ka oke nkè oge nké atọ na nke abụọ nke nkesa nha droplet iji nyere aka na ntụgharị nke data a na-ahụ anya
N'ụzọ anụ ahụ, ọ bụ mpaghara radius nke igwe ojii
Na mgbakọ na mwepụ, enwèrè ike ịkọwa nke a dị ka
Radius nke ụwa nwèrè uru dị iche iche màkà mmiri na ice nke mbụ dị gbụrụ-gbúrụ 14 μm, ébé màkà ice ọ dị gbụrụ-gbúrụ 25 μm

Nnyocha na-egosikwa na radius nke ígwé ojii dị irè buru ibu n'elu oké osimiri karịa n'elu ala site na Pasent iri na ise ruo pasentị iri abụọ N'ụzọ dị iche, ọdịiche dị na oke ice n'elu ala na oké osimiri dị obere (naanị 5%)
Radmila Vasileva (amụrụ na 5 Jenụwarị 1964) bụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke Bulgaria

Radoje Domanović (Febụwarị 16, 1873 – Ọgọst 17, 1908) bụ onye edemede Serbia, odeakụkọ na onye nkuzi, ama ama maka akụkọ mkpirikpi ya

A mụrụ Radoje Domanović n’ime obodo Ovsište n’etiti Serbia, nwa onye nkuzi obodo na onye na-etinye ego Miloš Domanović, na Persida Cukić, nwa Pavle Cukić, otu n’ime ndị ọchịagha nke mbusoro agha Serbian nke mbụ na nke abụọ
Ọ nọrọ oge nwata ya n’ime obodo Jarušice dị nso na Kragujevac, ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị
Ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Kragujevac, yana ngalaba nke nkà ihe ọmụma na Mahadum Belgrade, ebe ọ mụrụ asụsụ Serbia na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Na 1895, Domanović nwetara ọkwa mbụ ya, ọkwa nkuzi na Pirot, na ndịda Serbia, mpaghara a tọhapụrụ n’oge na-adịbeghị anya n’Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman
Na Pirot, o zutere Jaša Prodanović (1867–1948), onye nkuzi na onye na-akwado onye nyere aka ịhazi echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya

N’ebe ahụ, ọ zutere nwunye ya n’ọdịnihu, Natalija Raketić (1875–1939), onye nkuzirks ụlọ akwụkwọ dara ogbenye tusitere na Sremski Karlovci, onye ga-akwado ya n’oge ndụ ya dị mkpụmkpụ na ọgba aghara, yana onye ọ mụrụ ụmụ atọ
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ sonyeere ndị otu Radical Party nke mmegide, ọ na-emegide ọchịchị eze Obrenović, a kpọfere ya na Vranje ka ọ na-erule ngwụsị 1895, mgbe ahụ na 1896 zigara Leskovac ọzọ
Ọrụ ide Domanović malitekwara n’oge nkuzi ya, na-ebipụta akụkọ mbụ dị mkpirikpi mbụ ya na 1895
Mgbe mpụta mbụ ya n’ihu ọha megide gọọmentị na 1898, a chụpụrụ ya na nwunye ya n’ọrụ obodo, Domanović so ezinụlọ ya kwaga Belgrade
Na Belgrade, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ndị edemede ibe ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa izu “Mkpamkpando” na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mmegide “Omajiji”
N’oge a, ọ malitere ide na ibipụta akụkọ mkpirikpi mbụ ya, dị ka “Mmụọ ọjọọ” na “Nwepu nke agụụ eme ihe”
Mbilite Radoje nke ịbụ onye ama ama sitere na mbipụta akụkọ ya ndị ama ama, “Onye ndu” (1901) na “Stradija” (1902), nke ọ wakporo n’ihu ọha wee kpughee ihu abụọ na ụgha nke oge ọchịchị

Mgbe mwepu nke kwụsịrị ọchịchị Aleksandar Obrenović na 1903, na oke ewu ewu, Domanović nwetara ọkwa odeakwụkwọ na ndi na hu maka akwukwo gọọmentị ọhụrụ nyekwara ya ohere ịga Jémanị maka otu afọ pụrụiche, nke ọ nọrọ na Munich
Laaghachi na Serbia, Radoje nwere nkụda mmụọ na enweghị ezigbo mgbanwe ọ bụla na ọha
Ọ malitere akwụkwọ akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ya kwa izu, “Stradija”, nke ọ gara n’ihu na-akatọ adịghị ike nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ọhụrụ, mana ide ya enweghịzi ike na mkpali ọ na-enwebu
Radoje Domanović nwụrụ ọkara elekere mgbe etiti abalị gasịrị na Ọgọst 17, 1908, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ato na ise, mgbe ọ gbasịrị mgba ogologo oge na oyi baa na ụkwara nta
E liri ya n’ili ncheta ọhụrụ nke Belgrade
Ọrụ ya ndị ọzọ edepụtabeghị furu efu n’oge Agha Ụwa nke Mbụ
Ufọdụ n’ime ọrụ Radoje Domanović ama ama gụnyere
Ọrụ zuru ezu nke Radoje Domanović
Rafael Nadal Parera (Mallorca, Spain, 3 June 1986), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Rafa Nadal, bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu tennis na Spain nke na-anọ n'ọnọdụ mbụ nke ọkwa ATP

A na-ewere ya dị ka onye egwuregwu tennis kachasị mma n'akụkọ ihe mere eme n'okporo ụzọ ájá na otu n'ime ndị kachasị mma n'oge nii Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ bụ nwoke na-eme egwuregwu tennis nke nwere ụtụ aha Grand Slam n'otu n'otu, na 22, n'ihu onye Serbia Novak Djokovic, na 21, na onye Switzerland Roger Federer, na 20

O meriri Open nke Australia ugboro abụọ, Roland Garros Tournament ugboro iri na anọ (bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu tennis nke meriri ya ugboro ugboro n'akụkọ ihe mere eme niile), Wimbledon Championship ugboro abụọ na United States Open ugboro anọ

Ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ, na-esote Novak Djokovic (38), dị ka onye na-agba bọọlụ nwere ọtụtụ aha Masters 1000 n'otu n'otu, na 36; na n'ihu ndị ọzọ a ma ama na-agba tenis dị ka Roger Federer (28), onye Czech Ivan Lendl (22) na ndị America John McEnroe (19), Jimmy Connors (17) na Andre Agassi (17)
Rafael José Orozco Maestre (Önwa Maachị 24, 1954 — Önwa Juun 11, 1992) bụ onye Colombia na-agụ egwú
Rafael Alencar Vitti (amụrụ 2 Nọvemba 1995) bụ onye omere na onye egwu Brazil
Ọ bụ nwa nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri João Vitti na Valéria Alencar, na nwanne onye na-eme ihe nkiri Francisco Vitti
Rafiatou Karimou (2 Mee 1946 - 4 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2018) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Benin na onye nkuzi site na ọrụ
Karimou bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ minista na mba ya
A mụrụ Rafiatou Karimou na afọ 1946 na Sakété, na ndịda nke Benin nke oge a, mgbe ahụ Colony of Dahomey
Ọ malitere ime mkpọsa na ntorobịa ya na General Union of Pupils and Students of Dahomey (UGEED) tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

N'afọ 1975, ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye isi distrikti na Benin na afọ 1989, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-eje ozi na mba ya mgbe Onye isi ala Mathieu Kérékou họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Ahụike Ọha
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa a ruo n'afọ 1990
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ozi ọzọ site na afo 2003 ruo na afọ 2006, n'oge a ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Mmụta Primary na Secondary
A họpụtara ya na Nzukọ Mba Benin na afọ 1999, wee laghachi na nzuko omeiwu na afọ 2003 na-anọchite anya African Movement for Development and Progress
O mechara gbaa arụkwaghịm n'òtù ahụ mgbe ọ ghọsịrị onye minista na-ekwu maka ihe kpatara enweghị nghọta na mba ya
Karimou bụ otu n'ime mmadụ abụọ merụrụ ahụ n'ihe mberede n'okporo ụzọ Bassila na Disemba 14, na afọ 2008 mgbe ụgbọala ha na-agba ya tụfuru njikwa mgbe taya gbawara
Mmadụ ise nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ahụ, n'etiti ha bụbu onye nnọchi anya na Canada na minista gọọmentị Véronique Ahoyo
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Rafiatou Karimou abụwo onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị na-etinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'oge a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ na Machị, na afọ 2017, ọ mara ụmụ nwanyị aka ka ha ghara ịrụ ọrụ nkwado
Ọ nwụrụ na 4 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2018 na Paris, mgbe ọ dị afọ 71
Rafiatu Folashade Lawal (amuru 12 Nọvemba n'afọ 1996) bu onye ebuli elu Naijiria
Ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi Afrịka n'afọ 2019 emere na Rabat, Morocco wee nweta ihe nrite ọla edo na 59 ụmụnwaanyị kg omume
O nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo na mmemme ya na asọmpi ịdị arọ nke Afrịka n'afọ 2021 nke emere na Nairobi, Kenya
N'egwuregwu Afrịka nke afọ 2019 e mere na Rabat, Morocco, o nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo na 59 ụmụnwaanyị kg omume
O nwetakwara ihe nrite ọla edo na mmemme Snatch na Clean & Jerk
O debere ndekọ ọhụrụ nke 93 n'Africa na mmemme Snatch
Ọ gbara asọmpi na oge 59 ụmụ nwanyị Ihe omume kg na asọmpi ibu arọ ụwa nke 2021 emere na Tashkent, Uzbekistan
Ọ meriri n'ọkwa 6 n'asọmpi a
Emekwara asọmpi ịdị arọ nke Commonwealth nke afọ 2021 n'otu oge na nsonaazụ ya nyere ya ihe nrite ọla edo na mmemme a
N’ihi ya, ọ tozuru oke ịsọ mpi n’egwuregwu Commonwealth n'afọ 2022 na Birmingham, England
Rag Tag bụ ihe nkiri British-Nigerian nke afọ 2006 nke Adaora Nwandu dere ma duzie, ọ bụkwa ihe nkiri mbụ Nwandum gosiputara
Rag Tag nwetara ihe ngosi mbụ ya na America n'afọ 2006 na San Francisco International LGBT Film Festival
Ndị enyi abụọ na nwata biakọtakwara mgbe ọtụtụ afọ gasịrị ma chọpụta mmetụta ha nwere n'ebe ibe ha nọ enwela mgbanwe ọhụrụ na ihe nkiri a

Raymond (Danny Parsons), nke ndị enyi ya maara dị ka 'Rag', bụ onye amụrụ na London nye nne na nna bụ ndị si Jamaica, mgbe ọ bụ nwata, ezigbo enyi ya bụ Tagbo (Damola Adelaja), ma ọ bụ 'Tag' n'ihi ya ichafụ, onye ndị otu ya bụ ndị si Nigeria
Mgbe e zigara Rag ka ya na nne nne ya biri, ya na Tag enweghị mmekọrịta, wee gaa n'ihu na-ebi ndụ dị iche iche dị ka ndị okenye
Rag, onye na-achụ nta ego nke nwere ikike dị ukwuu ime ihe ike, ma hapụ onye bụbu enyi ya nwanyị na nwa ya na Birmingham ma laghachi London, na-achọ ka ya na ezigbo enyi ya nwee nkwukọrịta
Ọ bụ ezie na Tag gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu ma na-achọ ọrụ mgbe ya na Olivia (Tasmin Clarke) n'akpa, bu onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọcha, ma ka biri n'ụlọ
Rag chọtara Tag, n'agbanyeghị ọdịiche ha n'oge na-adịghị anya, ha ghọrọ ezigbo enyi ọzọ
Rag na Tag yiri ka ha na-aghọta ibe ha ma na-ejikọ na nghọta ndị ọzọ n'enweghịMgbe Tag kpọọrọ Rag mee njem na Naịjirịa, ọbụbụ enyi ha gbagooro n'ọkwa ọzọ
Ọ bụ ezie na Rag ghọtara ezi mmetụta ha na mmasị ha, Tag ka na-ala azụ ịga n'ezie site na nzọụkwụ 'ikpeazụ'
Otú ọ dị, na site na ya niile, ha ga-eme ihe niile ha nwere ike ime iji lekọta ma lelee azụ ibe ha
E toro ihe nkiri a maka ngosipụta ya nke ndụ kwa ụbọchị n'etiti obodo ndị isi ojii Britain, nakwa maka ngosipụta ya nke ọgụ ndị LGBT na-eche ihu na Naịjirịa

Mgbe ọ na-ede na Variety, Dennis Harvey kwuru na 'Ọ bụrụ na Rag Tag na-eche na ọ gaghị eye, ọ ka bụ ofe nke nwere ihe ndị na-adọrọ mmasị, nke zuru ezu iji jide uche ma tụọ aro gbasara Nwandu dị ka onye nwere nka na-abịa abịa

Ngwakọta nke nwoke na nwanyị nke Afrịka, ịnụ ọkụ n'obi okpukpe na enyo agbụrụ, nghọta nke nwoke idina nwoke dị ka 'ọrịa ọcha', na nkwenkwe ike banyere ụzọ ụmụ nwoke ojii kwesịrị isi 'na-asọ oyi' n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ ụwa emeela ka nnwere onwe m niile ma ndụ m kwudo
Raging Grannies (ma ọ bụ naanị 'Raging Grannies') bụ òtù ndị na-eme ihe ike n'ọtụtụ obodo na obodo dị na Canada, United States, na mba ndị ọzọ
Ha bụ ndị na-ahụ maka ikpe ziri ezi na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ụmụ nwanyị niile toro ogologo iji bụrụ nne nne, ndị na-eyi uwe na-eme ka ụmụ nwanyị meworo agadi, ma na-abụ abụ na ngagharị iwe
Ha na-edekarị okwu n'onwe ha, na-etinye ozi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ha na ụda nke abụ ndị a ma ama
Mgbalị ha gụnyere udo na ihe ndị metụtara gburugburu ebe obibi
Ìgwè mbụ malitere na Victoria, British Columbia, Canada, n'oge oyi nke afọ 1986 na 1987
Na mbụ, ha kpọrọ onwe ha 'NERTINKERNERLEAR Emergency Response Team'
Ndị otu ahụ kwenyere na ọnụnọ ụgbọ mmiri nuklia nke US Navy na Victoria Harbour nwere ike ibute ihe ize ndụ ahụike na gburugburu ebe obibi na obodo ahụ
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2005, otu ndị California National Guard kwuru na otu isi nke Raging Grannies nyochara ya mgbe ọ haziri nzukọ ndị nne na-emegide agha
Onye omeiwu steeti California bụ Joe Dunn malitere nyocha ma mechie ngalaba nzuzo ahụ
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2005, e boro mmadụ ise n'ime otu ahụ ebubo na ha na-abanye n'ime obodo mgbe ha nwara ịbanye n'ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha US na Tucson, Arizona
Onye na-ekwuchitere otu ahụ kwuru na ha chọrọ ịbanye ma zigara ha Iraq ka ụmụ ha na ụmụ ha wee lọta n'ụlọ
Otu ìgwè gakwara New York City, ebe e jidere ha maka ebubo na ha na-egbochi ohere ịbanye n'ụlọ ọrụ na Times Square; na Eprel 28, na afọ 2006, a tọhapụrụ ha na ebubo niile
Njikọ Action nke San Francisco Bay Area Peninsula, dị ka a maara otu ahụ na Bay Area, bụ isiokwu nke ihe ngosi vidio na afọ 2009 Raging Grannies
Ndị Raging Grannies sokwa na ngagharị iwe 'March megide Monsanto' na Mee 25, na afọ 2013, iji mee ngagharị iwe megide nri gbanwere mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa
A na-asọpụrụ ndị Grannies mbụ na ncheta afọ 30 ha site na ngosipụta na Canadian Museum for Human Rights na Winnipeg, MB
Na Juun, na afọ 2020, ndị Raging Grannies mere ngagharị iwe iji gosipụta nkwado ha maka Black Lives Matter movement na obodo Portland, Oregon na San Bruno na Palo Alto, California
Ọ dịkarịa ala ihe nkiri abụọ, Granny Power na Two Raging Grannies, na ọtụtụ isiokwu agụmakwụkwọ, na-ekwu maka Raging Grandies
Ha na-ekwupụta ma na-egosi otu ha si agbagha echiche ndị a na-ahụkarị banyere ime ihe na ịka nká (ndị nne nne na nna anaghị etowanye ka ha na-aka nká, dịka ọmụmaatụ)
E nwere akwụkwọ abụọ banyere ha Off Our Rockers, nke Alison Acker na Betty Brightwell, na The Raging Grannies Wild Hats, Cheeky Songs na Witty Actions for a Better World
Rahama Sadau (amụrụ na ụbọchị 7 n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1997) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, nwanyị ọchụnta ego, onye n'emeputa ihe nkiri, onye na-agba egwu na onye na-agụ egwu
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Kaduna, ọ rụrụ asọmpi ịgba egwu mgbe ọ bụ nwata na n'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama na ngwụsị afọ 2013 mgbe ọ sonyere ihe nkiri Kannywood Industrị na ihe nkiri mbụ ya Gani ga Wane
Rahama pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa n'asụsụ Hausa na Bekee ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Naịjirịa ole na ole na-asụ Hindi nke ọma
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke ọ kacha mma na ụmụ nwanyị na'eme ihe nkiri (Kannywood) na City People Entertainment Awards n'afọ 2014 na 2015
O ritekwara nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri Afrịka kacha mma na 19th African Film Awards na 2015 site n'aka African Voice N'afọ 2017
Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama nke Hausa mbụ pụtara n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri kacha ewu ewu na Naịjirịa
N'oge ọrụ ya niile, Sadau abụwo onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-arụsi ọrụ ike, na-apụta na ihe nkiri na vidiyo egwu
A mụrụ Rahama Ibrahim Sadau na Kaduna Steeti, n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ steeti Naịjirịa nke bụbu isi obodo nke mpaghara ugwu nke Naịjirịa nke Alhaji Ibrahim Sadau
Ya na nne na nna ya tolitere na Kaduna ya na ụmụnne ya nwanyị atọ Zainab Sadau, Fatima Sadau, Aisha Sadau na nwanne ya nwoke Haruna Sadau
Sadau sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Kannywood n'afo 2013 site n'aka Ali Nuhu
Ọ rụrụ obere ọrụ ole na ole tupu ọ bụrụ onye ama ama site na arụmọrụ ya na Gani ga Wane,Jinin Jikina n'akụkụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Kannywood bụ Ali Nuhu

Na 3 Ọktoba n'afọ 2016, Motion Picture Practitioners Association of Nigeria (MOPPAN), nke bụ mkpakọrịta kachasị na Kannywood, kwụsịrị ya na kannywood maka ịpụta na vidiyo egwu ịhụnanya ya na onye na-agụ egwu Jos bụ Classiq Q
Otu afọ mgbe 2017, o dere akwụkwọ ịrịọ MOPPAN mgbaghara
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2018, e wepụrụ mmachibido iwu a machibidoro ya mgbe gọvanọ Kano Steeti Dr Abdullahi Umar Ganduje tinyere aka
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2016, a ghọtara ya dị ka afọ ahụ 'Ịhụ nke Kannywood'
N'ọnwa Ọktọba nke afọ ahụ, Sadau gosipụtara na usoro ihe nkiri na EbonyLife TV
N'afọ 2017, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe aha ya bụ Sadau Pictures bụ na ọ mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Rariya nke Ali Nuhu, Sani Musa Danja, Sadiq Sani Sadiq na Fati Washa

Ọ laghachiri ime ihe nkiri iji kpọọ onye nkuzi ọrụ na MTV Shuga Na 2019 MTV Shuga laghachiri ịnọ na Nigeria maka usoro 6, 'Choices', na Sadau bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-alọghachi maka usoro ọhụrụ nke gụnyere Timini Egbuson, Yakubu Mohammed, Uzoamaka Aniunoh na Ruby Akabueze
Sadau gụrụ Human Resource Management na ụlọ akwụkwọ Business na Finance nke Eastern Mediterranean University na Northern Cyprus
Raheb bụ salad Lebanese nwere aubergines, eggplant, na tomato, nke a na-ejikarị eme ihe dị ka akụkụ nke mezze
Raheb bụ Arabic maka 'onye mọnk'
Nchịkọta a na-ahụkarị nke raheb nwere ihe ndị na-edozi ahụ na-esonụ

Rahel Tewelde (amụrụ n'afọ 1974) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Eritrea
Rahel Tewelde gụrụ akwụkwọ na Asmara
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ Hid'get na telivishọn Eritrea
Tewelde sụgharịrị ihe nkiri Casablanca n'asụsụ Tigrinya
Rahim (Raḥīm رحيم, nakwa anglicized dị ka Raheem) bụ otu n'ime aha Allah na Islam, nke pụtara 'Onye Ebere', site na mgbọrọgwụ R-Ḥ-M
A na-ejikwa ya dị ka aha nwoke nkeonwe, nkenke maka Abdu r-Raḥīm 'Ohu nke Onye Ebere'
Mpempe okwu gụnyere Rahim, Raheem, Rohim na Roheem

Abdel Rahim Alhassane Bonkan (amụrụ ya na 1 Jenụwarị 2002), nke a maara dị ka Rahim Alhasa, bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dị ka onye na-ano na azụ aka nri maka otu Primera Federación Rayo Majadahonda
A mụrụ ya na Naijiria, ọ na-agbara otu egwuregwu mba Niger bọọlụ
Rahim Alhassane malitere ọrụ ya na Spain na Paracuellos Antamira na 2020, tupu ya abịnye aka na Rayo Majadahonda na Jenụwarị 2021
Na 1 Septemba 2021, ọ bịnyere aka na mgbazinye na Gimnástica Segoviana na Segunda División RFEF
A mụrụ ya na Naijiria, Rahim Alhassane bụ onye Nijeria
Ọ malitere na ndị otu mba Niger na asọmpi asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2023 na Tanzania na 4 June 2022
Rahima Gambo (amụrụ n'afọ 1986) bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na Naijiria nke bi na Abuja, Nigeria
Gambo gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Manchester na 2007 ebe o nwetara nzere bachelọ na Development Studies
N'afọ 2008, ọ natara nzere Master's na Gender na Social Policy na London School of Economics
N'afọ 2014, ọ natara nzere Master ọzọ na Journalism na Columbia Graduate School of Journalism
Mgbe e mesịrị n'afọ 2014, ọ malitere mkpakọrịta na Magnum Foundation
Rahima Gambo bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri multimedia nke bịara na ọrụ nka site na foto akụkọ na site n'ịrụ ọrụ n'onwe ya na ọrụ mgbasa ozi

Tatsuniya 2017 - na-aga n'ihu) usoro foto na ihe nkiri na-ewere ọnọdụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Shehu Sanda Kyarimi, Maiduguri, Nigeria na-agbatị mmekorita ya na ụmụ akwụkwọ nọ ugbu a nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-eme ihe nkiri na usoro ahụ
Anyị na-ahụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na-esi na klas gaa n'oké ọhịa na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ n'usoro nrọ, na-agbasawanye n'asụsụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke onye na-ese ihe mepụtara na 2017 na Tatsuinya I

Tatsuniya II na-aga n'ihu na akwara ọgụgụ isi na nke na-enweghị isi site na iji egwuregwu ụmụaka, uri na mmega ahụ site na akwụkwọ Mmụta Ahụike maka ụmụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị ka usoro maka ijikọta akụkọ ahụ ọnụ
A na-ahụ usoro ndị na-agagharị agagharị na ihe nkiri ahụ n'oge ọmụmụ akụkọ
