N'afọ 2019, Gambo hiwere ụlọ ọrụ A Walk Space ya yana ebe a na-ahụ maka nka na-agagharị agagharị nke na-enyocha njikọ dị iche iche nke 'ihe oyiyi na-agagharị agagharị' site na mmekorita, ihe ngosi na ọmụmụ ihe

Ọrụ ya kachasị ọhụrụ bụ Instruments of Air nke e mere na Burkina Faso Kwa ụtụtụ, ọ na-amalite ma nyochaa ebe ahụ, ọ na-ejidekwa igwefoto ekwentị ya n'aka, ala na-acha uhie uhie n'okpuru ụkwụ ya, akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ nke osisi ndị dị n'ihu ya, na n'elu ya mbara igwe na-acha anụnụ anụnụ, jupụtara na abụ nnụnụ
Ụda, ka Gambo na-ekwu, bụ ihe dị mkpa nye ya n'ụbọchị ole na ole mbụ ahụ, ebe ọ na-adịghị asụ French ma ọ bụ asụsụ ọ bụla nke obodo
Kama okwu, ọ ghọtara ụda olu na olu

Ihe masịrị ya bụ ahụmịhe nke imikpu onwe ya na gburugburu ebe obibi na ahụ nke onwe ya ma kwe ka ihe banye n'ime gị ala, ụda, ifufe na okpomọkụ nke anyanwụ na akpụkpọ ahụ gị, kamakwa ncheta nke akara nke ndụ ndị ọzọ hapụrụ ebe a
Na vidiyo ya, Gambo nwere obere ihe ọkpụkpụ ọla n'ihu igwefoto, nke ọ kpọrọ 'Walk Maps'
N'etiti nsọtụ dị ka isi, ha na-emepụta semicircles, triangles, angles ma ọ bụ serpentine lines
Ha na-ele anya dị ka ihe ndị dị n'oge gboo, na-enweghị mkpebi n'etiti ọrụ nka na ihe kwa ụbọchị, ihe oyiyi ma ọ bụ ngwaọrụ ịkwọ ụgbọ mmiri
Rahma Haruna (c
1996[] 25 Disemba 2016) bụ nwa agbọghọ Naijiria dị afọ iri na itoolu nké ghọrọ onyẹ a ma ama maka foto na-efe efe nke onye na-ese foto bụ Sani Maikatanga
A mụrụ Haruna n'ọge dị n'etiti afọ 1996 na 1997, na Naịjịrịa
Mgbe ọ dị ọnwa isii, ụkwụ na aka Haruna kwụsịrị itọ ma e wezụga otu aka ya
Ọ bụ onye ọrịa a na-amaghị ama nke mere ka ọ nwee nkwarụ, enweghị ike ịrụ ọrụ ndị dị mkpa dị ka ịga ije, ịdọrọ ma ọ bụ ọbụna ijikwa ọtụtụ ihe
N'ihi oke ihe mgbu n'akụkụ ya, ọ ghaghị ịnọ n'ime bọket plastik
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe foto ahụ gbasara, otu onye a na-amaghị aha ya nyere oche nkwagharị iji mee ka njem ya dị mfe
Nne na nna Haruna kwupụtara na ha mefuru ihe dị ka 1 nde naira na ọgwụgwọ (US $ 2,73789); Otú ọ dị, ọ gbakereghị
Ọ nwụrụ n'ihi ihe a na-amaghị ama na 25 Disembaa 2016, mgbe ọ dị afọ 19 na Kano, Naịjirịa
Ha hapụrụ nne na nna ya na ụmụnne ya
Rahma Hassan (amụrụ na 15 Disemba 1988) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye bụbu ihe nlereanya
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka ihe nlereanya na vidiyo egwu yana ụfọdụ mgbasa ozi
Ọrụ mbụ ya nke e mere n'afọ 2009, sochiri ọrụ ọganihu dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Al Alamy na Youssef El Sherif

Site n'ebe ahụ, ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri na Samir we Shahir we Bahir na 2010, mgbe ahụ na ọtụtụ usoro ihe nkiri dị ka Azmet Sokkar (Sokkar's Crisis), Al Da'eya (The Preacher), na Moga Harra (Heat Wave) na 2013
Rahma Hassan malitere ọrụ ya dị ka ihe nlereanya na Nadeem Nour na vidiyo ya 'El Leila Bs' na 'ya allah Sho Moshta2lak' na 2008
Mgbe ahụ, ọ malitere ime ihe na mgbasa ozi nke ụlọọrụ McDonald ('Fastest Delivery - Kitchen') na 2009 na mgbasa ozi Mobinil ('A7san Nas - El Magmo3a 'Mobinil')
Rahma Hassan malitere ya na 'El 3alamy' (ihe nkiri ya na Youssef El Sherif)

Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ malitere usoro TV mbụ ya 'Azmet Sokar' na Ahmed 3eeid, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'Sherwet', nwa agbọghọ siri ike na-amụta otu esi eme mkpebi n'enweghị mmasị na onye ọ bụla ma jụkwa nkuzi nke nwa nwanne ya, 'Sokar' (Ahmad Eid) na omume ya mgbe ọnwụ nna ya gasịrị, ọbụlagodi ịghọ aghụghọ, ma chọpụta na n'ikpeazụ, ọ ga-achịkwa omume ya

Rahma weere ọrụ 'Sherawet' dị ka ozi na-enweghị isi nye nwa agbọghọ ọ bụla nwere nnwere onwe, na-ekwu na ọ hụrụ ọtụtụ ndi nlereanya yiri Sherwet n'ime ndị enyi ya, ma hụ otú usoro ndụ nke oké ifufe ahụ
N'ihi njem na ezinụlọ, enweghị iwu, na ịhụ ọdachi ha tara n'ihi enweghị ndụmọdụ ezinụlọ
Nke a niile buru ibu ma dị obere maka nso na otu nwa agbọghọ ahụ si bụrụ onye ndị mmadụ na-anwa iji ọnụnọ ya mee ihe naanị ya n'enweghị onye nlekọta, ihe nchịkwa nke na-achịkwa ihe omume ya

O kwukwara na ọ tara ahụhụ n'ihe ngosi nke Sherawet, nke e mere site na usoro 'Nsogbu shuga' n'ihi na àgwà ya si n'àgwà Sherwet onye nweere onwe ya pụọ, onye jụrụ ịnabata ndụmọdụ ma na-agbaso mkpebi ndị nwere ọtụtụ nsogbu ma mee ka ọdachi kwụsị
Kama nke ahụ, n'ezie, ọ chọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ọ na-amụ ihe ma na-etinye onwe ya n'ịgụ akwụkwọ n'akụkụ dị iche iche
Mgbe nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma ya na usoro TV Azmet Sokar, Rahma rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri ya 'Samir na Shahir na Bahir' dị ka nne Shahir
Raimi Olakunle Gbadamosi (a mụrụ n'afọ 1965 na Manchester) bụ onye Britain na-ese ihe na onye edemede
Ọrụ ya na-ekwu maka isiokwu nke njirimara na nkà nka, na-eji akara ngosi ya nke odo, ọcha na oji
Aha etiti ya sitere na okwu 'Ola' nke pụtara 'ọgaranya' na 'Kunle' nke pụtara 'ihe karịrị n'ụlọ' na Yoruba
Gbadamosi nwetara nzere doctorati ya na nka na The Slade, London, n'afọ 2001
O nwekwara MA na nka na Manchester Metropolitan University (1995) na BA na nka na Staffordshire University (1994)
Gbadamosi kụziri ezigbo nka dị ka onye nyocha na-asọpụrụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Slade nke Nka ma hazie ihe ngosi dị iche iche
Dị ka onye edemede, e bipụtala ọrụ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ nka nke atọ, n'etiti akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ
Ọ bikwa na Johannesburg, South Afrịka ebe ọ kụziri nka na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand na Mahadum nke Pretoria Ọ hapụrụ Mahadum nke Pretoria n'afọ 2018

Dị ka Zoe Li, nke Arts Council England si kwuo 'Ọrụ Raimi na-enyocha mgbagwoju anya nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na omenala, na-agbakarị echiche anyị banyere agbụrụ, agbụrụ na ọdịbendị' Akụkụ ndị dị mkpa gụnyere 'Swadsquad', bọọdụ chess nwere akụkụ atọ
N'afọ 2007, ya na ndị na-ese ihe na Plymouth City Museum na Art Gallery, ebe o mepụtara njem ọzọ nke ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie akpọrọ Drakes Circus, na-adọrọ uche gaa n'ihe ndị metụtara ịgba ohu
A na-enwe ihe atụ nke ọrụ Gbadamosi n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta nka ọha, gụnyere Henry Moore Institute na Leeds, Novas na Liverpool na Étíti maka Nka Ọhụrụ, University of Central Lancashire
Site na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ya, ndị na-ekiri nwere ike ibudata ma debe ihe osise 'Free' nke onye na-ese ihe, nke kachasị n'ụdị okwu ederede
Gbadamosi egosipụtala ọrụ ya na Britain niile yana mba ụwa
N'afọ 2020, a họpụtara Gbadamosi ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka ikpe Sasol New Signatures art award
N'ihi ọrịa COVID-19, a kagburu asọmpi ahụ
'Rain Rain Go Away' bụ abụ a ma ama n'asụsụ Bekee
O nwere nọmba Roud Folk Song Index nke ogugu19096
E nwere nsụgharị ole na ole na ọdịiche nke ụda olu a
Ụdị nke oge a a bụ
Enwere ike ịchọta ụdị abụ ndị a n'ọtụtụ obodo, gụnyere Gris oge ochie na Rom oge ochie
Enwere ike ịkọwa okwu asụsụ Bekee nke oge a ma ọ dịkarịa ala na narị afọ nke iri na asaa mgbe James Howell na nchịkọta ilu ya kwuru
John Aubrey kwuru na 'ụmụntakịrị' jiri ya mee ihe iji 'ịma mma mmiri ozuzo
E dekọrọ ọtụtụ ihe ọzọ gụnyere 'Midsummer day', 'washing day', 'Christmas Day' na 'Martha's wedding day'
N'etiti narị afọ nke 19, James Orchard Halliwell chịkọtara ma bipụta nsụgharị ahụ
N'akwụkwọ sitere na ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, okwu ndị a bụ
Ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Raina (Urdu) nke dị na Pakistan
Àtụ Railway stations in Pakistan
Mmiri ozuzo bụ usoro mmiri ozuzo nké na-akpata iwepụ ihe ndị na-emepụta radiation site na ikuku gaa n'ala, na-emepụta mmiri ozuzo nuklia
Mmiri ozuzo nkè mmiri ozuzo na-abụkarị nkè mgbawa nuklia n'onwe yá na n'ihi nké a, iwepụ mmetọ nke mmiri ozu siri ike karịa 'ọkọkọ'
Na sayensị ikuku, mmiri ozuzo na-ezo ákà n'iwepụ ụdị ndị a na-agwọ agwọ na ikuku site ná mmiri ozuzo
Mmiri ozuzo nwèrè ike ime n'ébé dị nso na ala efu ma ọ bụ enwèrè ike iburu mmetọ ahụ n'elu tupu etinye ya dabere na ọnọdụ ikuku dị ugbu a na otu mgbawa ahụ si mee
Mgbawa, ma ọ bụ mgbawa, nwèrè ike ịbụ ikuku, elu, n'okpuru ala, ma ọ dị n'oké osimiri
Mgbawa ikuku ga-emepụta obere ihe karịa mgbawa yiri ya n'akụkụ ala n'ihi obere ihe na-emetọ
Mgbawa n'elu ga-emekarị ka ihe ndị ọzọ na-emebi emebi
N'ihe banyéré mgbawa mmiri, ụmụ irighiri ihe na-adịkarị mfe ma dị obere, na-emepụta obere mkpọtụ mpaghara ma na-agbasa n'ébé ka ukwuu
Akụkụ ndị ahụ nwere ọtụtụ nnu mmiri na mmiri ụfọdụ; ndị a nwèrè ike ịnwe mmetụta igwe ojii na-akpata mmiri ozuzo na mpaghara dị elu
Nsonaazụ sitere na mgbawa mmiri oké osimiri siri ike iwepụ ozugbo ọ banyèrè n'ime ébé ndị nwéré oghere n'ihi na ngwaahịa fission dị dị ka ion metal nke na-ejikọta ya na ọtụtụ ebe
Màkà mgbawa n'okpuru ala, enwere ihe ọzọ a na-akpọ 'isi elu'
Ntọala elu bụ igwe ojii nke na-esi na ala nke ogidi na-agbadata, nke na-esite na oke uzuzu ma ọ bụ mmiri na ikuku
Mmiri a nwèrè obere ihe siri ike, mànà ọ ka na-akpa àgwà dị ka mmiri
Ala ala na-eme ka ọ dị mma n'ịmepụta mmiri n'okpuru ala

Ọ bụ ezie na isi elu na-enwekarị naanị ihe dị ka pasent iri nke ngụkọta bọmbụ na mgbawa n'okpuru ala, ọ nwere ike ịmepụta radiation buru ibu karịa fallout dị nso na mgbawa, n'ihi na ọ na-abata ngwa ngwa karịa falloot, tupu ọtụtụ mbibi radioactive emee
Màkà mgbawa n'okpuru mmiri, mmụba a na-ahụ anya bụ, n'ụzọ dị irè, igwe ojii nke mmiri (na-abụkarị mmiri) nke nwere ihe onwunwe nke na-asọba dịka a ga-asị na ọ bụ mmiri homogeneous
Mgbè mmiri ahụ gbawara, ihe a na-adịghị ahụ anya nke obere radiation particles nwere ike ịnọgide
N'ụzọ ihu igwe, snow na mmiri ozuzo ga-eme ka ọgba aghara dị n'ógbè ahụ dị ngwa
N'okpuru ọnọdụ ihu igwe pụrụ iche, dị ka mmiri ozuzo nke na-esite n'elu igwe ojii radioactive, enwèrè ike ịmepụta mpaghara dị oke oke mmetọ n'okpuru ifufe nke mgbawa nuklia
Mmiri ozuzo n'ébé mgbawa nke elu na-emetọ na-agbanwe usoro nke ike radiation site na ịsacha ugwu dị elu, ụlọ, ngwá ọrụ, na ahịhịa
Nke a na-ebelata ike n'ébé ụfọdụ ma nwee ike ịbawanye ike na usoro mmiri; n'ala dị ala; na n'ébé dị larịị, ébé mmiri na-adịghị
Raising the Race Black Career Women Redefine Marriage, Nne
na Obodo bụ akwụkwọ sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke afọ 2015 site n'aka Riché J
Daniel Barnes, PhD, onye ọkà mmụta ọdịbendị ọha na eze
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke usoro Families in Focus site na Rutgers University Press ma bipụta ya mbụ n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2015
A tụlere akwụkwọ ahụ maka onyinye NAACP ihe nrite nke afọ 2015 ma nata American Sociological Association Distinguished Book Award na afọ 2017
Barnes mepụtara ọrụ akwụkwọ a mgbe ọ zutere ọtụtụ ndị nne nọ n'etiti ndị isi ojii na nnọkọ oge akụkọ na Atlanta, Georgia
Ọ bụ n'etiti ehihie, ọ nọkwa na-eche ihe mere ọtụtụ n'ime ndị nne a ji nwee ike ilekọta ụmụ ha n'ụbọchị ọrụ

N'akwụkwọ ahụ, Barnes na-enyocha 'otú ụmụ nwanyị ojii, ndị lụrụ di si eme ka mmekọrịta ha n'etiti ezinụlọ ya buru ibu ma dị mkpa, atụmanya nke obodo isi ọchịchịrị, yana ọchịchọ ha ịzụlite ụmụaka nwere onwe onye'

Mgbe ọ na-eme nchọpụta, o chọpụtara na ụmụ nwanyị ahụ dabere mkpebi ha karịa ọnọdụ nke onwe ya, ebe a bụ na ha tụlere ọgụ ndị inyom ojii gafere n'oge gara aga nakwa otu omume ha nwere ike isi metụta obodo ukwu

Echiche ndị dị mkpa mepụtara ma nyochaa bụ 'Black Strategic Mothering,' okwu nke Barnes mere iji nye usoro dị echiche maka ịghọta akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị ojii, ezinụlọ, na atụmatụ mkpebi obodo

Barnes na-enyocha ihe ọ kpọrọ, 'ọchị ndọrọ ọhụrụ nke nkwanye ùgwù' usoro sitere n'aka Evelyn Brooks Higginbotham 's politics of respectation') mepụtara n'akwụkwọ ya Righteous Discontent iji kọwaa atụmatụ ndị isi ojii ji mee ka ihe site na mmalite narị afọ nke iri abụọ bụ ụmụ nwanyị Black nọbu
Mmeghachi omume dị mma maka Raising the Race abụwo nke ọma

Na ntụleghachi maka Journal of African American History Diana Slaughter Kotzin toro ohere nke akwụkwọ ahụ nye ma 'ndị ọkà mmụta na ndị nkịtị na-achọ ma ọ bụ mmalite ma ọ bụ ozi emelitere banyere ụzọ ndụ nke ụmụ nwanyị America gụrụ akwụkwọ na ndị ọgaranya,' ma kwuo na '[t] ntụnyere bara ụba na iche na akwụkwọ ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ na isiokwu ndị yiri nke ahụ lekwasịrị anya na ụmụ nwanyị Africa America na-eme ka akwụkwọ a bụrụ ntụaka akwụkwọ ọgụgụ bara uru nke ukwuu
Winnifred Brown-Glaude, onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na College of New Jersey, nyochara Raising the Race for The Journal of Anthropological Research
Ọ kọwara na 'ike nke akwụkwọ ahụ dị n'ụzọ ethnographic ya, nke na-eme ka mgbagwoju anya nke ahụmahụ ndị isi ojii mara mma dịka ha si ekpebi otu esi elekọta ọrụ nka ezinụlọ
Ụmụ akwụkwọ na ndị ọkà mmụta nwere mmasị n'ịmụ nwanyị, ịkpa ókè nwoke ma ọ bụ nwaanyị ojii ga-ahụ ọrụ a bara uru ma dị mfe maka agụmakwụkwọ

Krista Lynn Minnotte na-ekwu, n'akwụkwọ akụkọ Journal of Family Theory and Review, na Raising the Race 'kwesịrị ịbụ oku ime ihe, gbaa anyị ume ịgbasawanye mkparịta ụka anyi banyere ọrụ na ezinụlọ iji hụ ka ha gosipụtara ahụmịhe dị iche iche nke ndị mmadụ gafee agbụrụ, klas, na okike

Na Sociology of Race and Ethnicity, onye na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị Anthony Kwame Harrison kọwara Raising the Reagdee dị ka 'ajụjụ mbụ nke okwu ndị mkpa' nke 'na-akwalite nghọta anyị banyere mmekọrịta ọha mmadụ ike

Raising The Race natara afọ 2017 Distinguished Book Award maka ngalaba agbụrụ, okike na klas nke Eba American Sociological Association ma ka tụleekwa ya anya dị ka NAACP ihe nrite Onyonyoe mgbe mbụ ọ pụtara na Disemba 2015
Raj Narain (23 Nọvemba 1917 31 Disemba 1986) bụ onye India na-alụ ọgụ maka nnwere onwe na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
O meriri n'okwu ikpe a ma ama megide Praịm Minista Indira Gandhi n'oge ahụ, nke dugara n'iwepụ ya na itinye ya n'ọnọdụ mberede na India na 1975
O meriri Indira Gandhi n'oge ntuli aka Lok Sabha nke afọ 1977
Raj Narain bụ nwa Anant Prasad Singh ma amụrụ na 23 Nọvemba 1917 na Bhumihar Brahmin bara ọgaranya nke a makwaara dị ka ezinụlọ Babhan n'obodo nta Motikoat na Varanasi

Ọ bụ onye ikwu nke usoro ndị eze Narayan, ndị bụ ezinụlọ eze nke Benares State, ọ na-ejikọkwa ya na ezinụlọ Maharaja Chet Singh na Maharaja Balwant Singh, ndị bụ Maharajas nke Benares Steeti, ihe karịrị otu narị afọ gara aga
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Hindu nke Banaras, ma mee MA na LLB

Onye ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ọ haziri ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ndị okenye, ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị, ebe ọmụmụ ihe na nzukọ ọrụ wee bụrụ onye otu Congress Socialist Party, na 1934, na National Committee of Students Federation, 1939[[44
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Mandal Congress nke Mahadum Banaras na onye otu Kọmitii District Congress (DCCỌ dị iche iche
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Student Congress n'oge 1942 Quit India movement, ma duzie ngagharị iwe na gburugburu Varanasi district na UP
Na mbido, ọ nọ 'n'okpuru' ruo ọnwa atọ ma mesịa jide ya na 28 Septemba 1942, n'oge Quit India Movement ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ ruo 1945
A tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ugboro iri ise na asatọ maka oge ruru dị ka afọ iri na ise n'ihe gbasara ụmụ akwụkwọ na òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
[citation needed]

Mgbe India nwetara onwe ya, Raj Narain sonyeere ndị Socialist Party nke Acharya Narendra Deva, Jayprakash Narayan na Dr Rammanohar Lohia duziri ma nwee ọtụtụ ọkwa pati gụnyere odeakwụkwọ nke UP Socialist Party, 1948 Xi51
Ọ dị nso na Guru ya Acharya Narendra Deva na DrRammanohar Lohia
Lohia kọwara ya dị ka 'onye nwere obi ọdụm na omume Gandhi'
Lohia nwere mmasị n'ebe ọ nọ nke ukwuu ma kwuo na 'ọ bụrụ na n'India enwere ike inwe naanị mmadụ atọ ma ọ bụ anọ dị ka ya, ọchịchị aka ike enweghị ike imegide ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya'
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu Uttar Pradesh n'afọ 1952 ma bụrụ onye ndú nke ndị mmegide na Nzukọ ahụ ruo n'afọ 1962

Òtù ndị ọ sonyeere gụnyere CSP (1934), Socialist Party (1948), Praja Socialist Party (1952)), Socialist party (na Afọ 1956), Samyukta Socialist Party (1964)), Socialistist Party (1971), Socialist Parti (Lohia) (1972), Bhartiya Lok Dal, (1974), Janata Party (1977), Janata party (Secular) (1979), Janata Parti (Secular), Democratic Socialist Party (19881), Janata, na Socialist Party, site na ọnwụ ya na 1984 Ruo na afọ 1986
Ọnọdụ pati ọ nwere gụnyere, Member National Executive, PSP, 195455, Chairman, Socialist Party, 196164
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Rajya Sabha site na 1966 na 1974 na 1977
Raj Narain megidere ụkpụrụ na omume nke Praịm Minista Indira Gandhi ma guzo (megide ya) na ntuli aka Lok Sabha nke 1971 site na Rai Bareli dị ka onye afọ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Samyukta Socialist Party
Ọ bụ ezie na e meriri ya na ntuli aka nke afọ 1971, ọ boro Indira Gandhi ebubo nrụrụ aka na ntuliaka ma tinye akwụkwọ mkpesa megide ya

Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Allahabad na 12 June 1975 kwadoro ebubo ahụ[Note 1] ma wepụ nhọpụta Indira Gandhi ma wepụ ya ka ọ ghara ịzọ ọkwa na ntuli aka Lok Sabha maka afọ 6 sochirinụ, nke dugara n'ịtinye ọnọdụ mberede na India
Ngagharị iwe mba niile malitere ma ndị mmadụ jupụtara n'okporo ámá n'okpuru nduzi nke Loknayak Jai Prakash Narayan na Raj Narain
Nke a bụ nnukwu ihe nkiri nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị India mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị, na Raj Narain dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi

A maara ya dị ka onye nkatọ kachasị ukwuu na onye iro Indira Gandhi, mgbe a manyere ọnọdụ mberede, e jidere Raj Narain ozugbo ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ n'otu ụbọchị ahụ, ya na ọtụtụ ndị isi mmegide gụnyere Jai Prakash Narayan, Morarji Desai, Satyendra Narayan Sinha, Charan Singh, L
Advani na Atal Bihari Vajpayee na-enweghị ọkwa ọ bụla ma kpọchie ya n'ebe ndị a na-amaghị
Oriakụ Gandhi wepụrụ ọnọdụ mberede na Jenụwarị na afọ 1977, gbasaa Lok Sabha ma hazie ntuli aka ọhụrụ maka ahụ
Narain sonyeere ndị ọzọ na-emegide ya iji guzobe njikọ Janata iji chee Mrs
Òtù Congress nke Gandhi
Narain guzogidere ya ọzọ site na mpaghara Rae Bareli
O meriri ya na ihe karịrị puku vootu iri ise
Njikọ Janata mekwara ntuli aka ahụ n'ebe ugwu India niile iji mepụta ihe ka ọtụtụ na ndị omeiwu (Lok Sabha)
Narain sonyeere gọọmentị Morarji Desai ma ghọọ Minista nke Ahụike na Ahụike Ezinụlọ
Oge Narain dị ka onye minista were ihe karịrị otu afọ mgbe a gwara ya na Charan Singh ka ha gbaa arụkwaghịm maka ịkatọ gọọmentị Janata
Ka oge na-aga, ọ chọrọ ka ndị otu Janata Party nwere njikọ na Hindu Nationalist, RSS hapụ njikọ ndị ahụ iji zere iguzosi ike n'ihe nkewa
Mgbe a leghaara nke a anya, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'òtù ahụ iji wepụta uwe ọhụrụ a na-akpọ Janata Party (Secular)
O nwere ike ịdọta ndị na-agba ọsọ zuru ezu site na ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị BLD iji mee ka gọọmentị Morarji Desai ghara inwe ntụkwasị obi na ndị omeiwu ma ghara inwe ike
A kọwaala arụmọrụ Raj Narain n'oge Janata nke 1977-1979 dị ka nke buffoon, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Guerilla, na dị ka ịnyịnya na-eso Charan Singh
Raj Narain kpọrọ onwe ya Hanuman na Ram nke Charan Singh
Kamlapati Tripathi meriri ya na ntuli aka Lok Sabha nke 1980 na Varanasi
Mgbe e mesịrị, ya na onye nkuzi ya bụ Charan Singh sere okwu, Raj Narain guzogidere Singh na mpaghara Baghpat na afọ 1984
N'oge a, n'echiche ya, Ram ya tụgharịrị na Ravan ma bibie ya
Onye nyocha nke Congress Socialist Party, 1946
Odeakwụkwọ distrikti, Congress Socialist Party (SP), 1946
Odeakwụkwọ, Uttar Pradesh Socialist Party (SP), 1948[[51
Onye nnọkọ nke Socialist Party na Delhi, na 9 June na afọ 1951
Onye isi oche nke mba, PSP, 1954-1955
Ọ sonyeere Samyukta Socialist Party (SSP) mgbe PSP na SP jikọtara
Odeakwụkwọ ukwu Samyukta Socialist Party (SSP), 1964-1966
Revived Socialist Party (Lohia), na 1972 ma bụrụ onye otu ya, 1972ī74
Ha jikọtara SSP (Lohia) n'ime BKD na 1974 wee guzobe Bhartiya Lok Dal
E guzobere Janata Party na 1977 mgbe njikọta nke BLD, Bhartiya Jana sangh, Congress (O), Socialist Party na Congress for Democracy (CFD)
O meriri onye bụbu praịm minista Charan Singh, na ntuli aka Lok Sabha nke 1984 site na Baghpat (UP) guzobere Socialist Party na 1985, ma soro ya na pati a ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1986
Raj Narain lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ nwoke atọ na otu nwa nwanyị
Raj Narain na-ebipụta kwa izu site na Varanasi ma nọrọ na bọọdụ nchịkọta akụkọ nke Dọkịta Rammanohar Lohia guzobere kwa ọnwa
Raja Nicola Eissa Abdel-Masih (Arabic) bụ onye otu Sovereignty Council of Sudan, onye isi ala nke mba ahụ, site na 21 Ọgọst 2019 ruo 25 Ọktoba 2021
A họpụtara ya maka ọnọdụ a dị ka otu n'ime ndị nkịtị isii nwere oche na kansụl mmadụ iri na otu

Ọ bụ naanị otu n'ime ha nke e kwekọrịtara aha ya site na nkwekọrịta dị n'etiti ndị Forces of Freedom and Change alliance (FFC) na Transitional Military Council (TMC), dịka e buru n'uche n'okpuru usoro nke Draft Constitutional Declaration nke August 2019

N'ihi nke a, ya na onye otu kansụl ibe ya bụ Aisha Musa el-Said, bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị abụọ mbụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Sudan nke oge a iji nwee ọrụ dịka onye minista gọọmentị etiti ma bụrụkwa Onye Kraịst mbụ (dị ka onye otu ndị Coptic) iji nwee ọkwá ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị elu na mba ahụ
Dị ka onye ọka ikpe, ọ na-ahụ maka usoro iwu na Sudan
A mụrụ Nicola na Omdurman ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1980 na Bachelor of Laws na Mahadum Cairo
N'ịbụ onye ọka iwu site na agụmakwụkwọ, Nicola jere ozi dị ka onye ọka ikpe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ministri Ikpe Ziri Ezi nke Sudan site na 1982 ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya na 2019 na Sovereignty Council

N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2012, Nicola kwuru na ikike okpukpe nke Ndị Kraịst nọ na Sudan nke a kwusiri ike n'okpuru Iwu Iwu Mba nke 2005 emezughị n'ụzọ zuru ezu, ebe ụfọdụ ndị were mmadụ n'ọrụ anaghị enye Ndị Kraịst ikike ikpe ekpere awa abụọ ha na ụlọ akwụkwọ anaghị ekwe ka ụmụaka Ndị Kraịst ghara ịnọ na Sunday maka ịga ozi okpukpe 88, 89

Nicolas kwukwara na Septemba 2012 na Kọmitii pụrụ iche maka ichebe ikike nke ndị na-abụghị ndị Alakụba na Khartoum nke e guzobere na 2007 anọwo na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ịkwado ụlọ ọrụ mmanye iwu maka ndị na-adịghị ndị Alakụbụrụ e jidere maka ebubo na ha mebiri iwu Shari'a, yana ibipụta akụkọ na aro mgbe niile nye gọọmentị gbasara ikike ndị na-enweghị ndị Alakụga
O kwuru na emechiela ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 2011, megide ọchịchọ nke ndị Kraịst, mgbe South Sudan kewara
N'ime nzukọ ya na Sudanese Solidarity Organization Against Racial Discrimination (SSOARD) na June, 2021, o kwusiri ike mkpa ọ dị itinye 'iwu na iwu niile megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ'
Nkwupụta Iwu nke Ọgọstụ 2019 nke na-akọwa ndị otu steeti na usoro maka mgbanwe Sudan nke 2019 gaa na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na-emepụta Kansụl Nnwere Onwe dị ka onye isi ala nke Sudan

Ịbịanye aka na nkwekọrịta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke July na Draft Constitutional Declaration site na ndị Forces of Freedom and Change alliance (FFC) na Transitional Military Council (TMC) sochiri ọkara afọ nke nnupụisi obodo na-aga n'ihu na ogbugbu 3 June Khartoum
FFC na ndị ọzọ na-abụghị ndị agha siri ọnwụ na gọọmentị zuru oke
Nkwupụta Iwu ahụ mebiri site n'ịmepụta Kansụl Nnwere Onwe na ndị nkịtị ise FFC họpụtara, ndị agha ise TMC họpụtara, na onye nkịtị nke isii iji nye Kansụl Ịbụ Onwe ọtụtụ ndị nkịtị
FFC na TMC ga-ekwekọrịta onye nkịtị nke isii
Na ngwụcha Ọgọstụ, FFC na TMC họpụtara Raja Nicola dị ka onye otu nke isii ha kwekọrịtara na Sovereignty Council
Nhọrọ nke Nicola, dị ka onye otu ndị Sudanese Coptic, ka a na-ahụ dị ka ihe doro anya maka ọdịiche dị iche iche, ọkachasị maka Ndị Kraịst Sudan
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe a ṅụrụ iyi dị ka onye otu Sovereignty Council, ọ kọwara ọhụụ ya banyere ọrụ nke kansụl ahụ, na-ekwu,
Rajae Imran ma ọ bụ Raja Imrane (Arabic) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri na onye bụbu onye nta akụkọ
A maara Rajae Imran nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị mkpa na usoro TV Al Mostadaafoun (المستضعفون, The Underdogs) dịka Aicha na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Rachid El Ouali, nke bụ ngosipụta mbụ ya
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Moroccan dịka Aalach ya waldi ?, Wahda men Bezzaf, Machaf Mara
Rajan Mahtani (a mụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1948) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na Zambia bụ onye isi oche nke Finance Bank Zambia Limited, ngalaba ụlọ akụ dị n'etiti na Zambia
Ọ gbasoro ọrụ na Ego na Iwu
Ọ bụ onye otu Chartered Association of Certified Accountants ma nwee PhD na Iwu Azụmahịa site na London Institute of Business Studies

N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2015, Mahtani kwetara inyefe ihe ọ na-ekwu maka ụlọ ọrụ Zambezi Portland Cement Factory, nke ndị na-ekenye ya 'Ventriglias' weghaara site n'ike na abalị asaa, na ọnwa Eprel, na afọ 2015
Emere nrara ahụ iji chebe ọdịmma nke ndị ọrụ dị ugbu a na-arụ ọrụ na Zambezi Portland Cement Factory
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2015, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Malawi mere mkpebi maka Dr
Rajan Mahtani ebe a hụrụ na Nyasa Times, bipụtara ọdịnaya mkparị n'aha Dr
Mahtani
N'enweghị ihe akaebe na arụmụka na-adịghị ike site n'akụkụ Nyasa Times, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nyere Dr
Rajan Mahtani mmeri na Nyasa Times ka a gwa ya ka ọ wepụ ọdịnaya mkparị niile site na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ya tinyere ịkwụ ụgwọ ego dị ka ụgwọ maka mmerụ ahụ kpatara

Dị ka The Post si kwuo, na Nọvemba 19, 2015, Onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Lusaka, Mwiinde Siavwapa mere mkpebi ikpe ebe a hụrụ na enweghị ike ịtụgharị uche na mmechi na-adịgide adịgide maka ikpe ọhụrụ
Ihe iseokwu a nwere njikọ na ịkekọrịta ebubo ụgha nke ezinụlọ Ventriglia tinyere na Dr
Rajan Mahtani gbasara Zambezi Portland Cement Factory
E kwubiri na ọ bụ ihe na-ezighị ezi n'aha onye na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye isi na-ahụ maka ikpe ọha na eze na onye ọka iwu iji kwado njide onye bụbu onye isi oche ụlọ akụ ego, Dr
Rajan Mahtani
Mkpebi ahụ nke e mere na mbụ n'afọ 2012, ga-eguzo dị ka otu ihe ahụ, ya mere, a pụghị ịjụ Mahtani ajụjụ banyere ebubo ịgha ụgha ọzọ
Ralph A
Vaughn (1907 ruo 2000) bụ onye ọkà mmụta Afrịka-Amerịka , onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya na Washington, DC, ọ bụ osote prọfesọ na Mahadum Howard tupu ọ kwaga Los Angeles, California, ebe o sere ọtụtụ ụlọ, ụlọ na ụlọ nzukọ
Ọ bụkwa onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị Afrịka Amerịka mbụ na-ewu ụlọ na Los Angeles
A mụrụ Ralph Augustine Vaughn na Eprel 24, 1907, na Washington, DC
Nna ya, Roscoe I
Vaughn, bụ onye nkuzi na onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Washington, DC
O nwere ụmụnne atọ
Vaughn gụrụ akwụkwọ na Armstrong Technical High School, ebe nna ya kụziri, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1925

Ọ gara Mahadum Howard, kọleji ndị isi ojii n'akụkọ ihe mere eme, mana ọ were otu afọ ezumike wee kwaga Mahadum Illinois na Urbanaz Champaign, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na ihe owuwu na 1932
Ọ nọ n'otu klas dị ka William Pereira na Charles Luckman, ha abụọ ghọrọ ndị na-ewu ụlọ a ma ama
O guzobere isi Pi Psi nke Omega Psi Phi, òtù African-American fraternity
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Michigan na Ann Arbor n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1932
Vaughn rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe maka Albert Cassell, onye Afrịka-Amerịka ọzọọzca-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ nt nke rụrụ ụlọ na campus nke Mahadum Howard
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe maka Ngalaba Ọrụ Ugbo nke United States ruo afọ abụọ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ maka Hilyard Robinson
Ọ ghọrọ osote prọfesọ na 1935
Ka ọ dịgodị, Paul R
Williams, onye Afrịka-Amerịka ọzọ na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye isi ọrụ aka maka Langston Terrace Dwellings
Ọ kwagara Los Angeles na 1937 ịrụ ọrụ oge niile maka Williams
N'oge ahụ, o nyere aka chepụta ụlọ ahịa Saks Fifth Avenue na isi ụlọ ọrụ MCA Inc
na Beverly Hills
O nyekwara aka mepụta ebe obibi nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Bert Lahr, Tyrone Power na Bill Robinson
E mere ya ka ọ ghara ịdị mkpa afọ anọ ka e mesịrị, na 1941, ka ọrụ iwu ụlọ kwụsịrị mgbe United States sonyeere agha ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe maka Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer n'akụkụ Cedric Gibbons site na 1941 ruo 1945
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, o nyere aka mepụta usoro Kismet, ihe nkiri 1944 nke Marlene Dietrich gosipụtara
O nyekwara aka mepụta ihe nkiri A Guy Named Joe na 1943, Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo na 1944, The Last Time I Saw Paris na 1954
N'afọ 1945, Vaughn malitere ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu na John C
Lindsey
Ha chepụtara ebe obibi onwe onye na Los Angeles, Sherman Oaks na Catalina Island
Ya na Heth Wharton (1892 ruo 1958), o chepụtara North Hollywood Manor na North Hollywood na Chase Knolls Apartments na Sherman Oaks na 1950
A na-edepụta nke ikpeazụ dị ka ihe ncheta akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọdịbendị Los Angeles
Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, na 1951, ha rụrụ Lincoln Place Apartment Homes na Venice, Los Angeles, ụlọ obibi nke gụnyere ụlọ iri ise na abụọ
A kọwawo ya dị ka otu n'ime 'ọrụ ya a ma ama'
A họpụtara Vaughn na Los Angeles Building and Safety Commission n'afọ 1953
Ọ bụ onye otu Archaeological Institute of America, National Society of Interior Decorators, American Association for the Advancement of Science na Smithsonian Institution
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Society of American Registered Architects
Mgbe o chepụtara ụlọ ọhụrụ maka Temple Beth Am, ụlọ nzukọ Conservative, na 1959, ọ natara onyinye site n'aka ha
Vaughn chepụtara ụlọ ọgwụ Schwab na Sunset Boulevard na ụlọ nke San Marcos Golf Club na San Marcos, California
O weghachiri Watts Towers na ngwụcha afọ 1970
Vaughn lụrụ Elizabeth Estelle Christmas Fry na 1935
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta ọ́bá akwụkwọ
Ha nwere nwa nwoke, Ronald Fry Vaughn
Vaughn lara ezumike nká na Stockton, California, na 1998
Ọ nwụrụ afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, N'Ọktoba 21, 2000
Ralph Lemon (amụrụ n'ubochí mbụ n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1952 na Cincinnati, Ohio) bụ ónyé America na-eme ihe nkiri, ónyé nduzi ụlọ ọrụ, ónyé édémédé, onye na-ese ihe nkiri na ónyé na-ahụ màkà echiche
A zụlitere ya n'ebe okpukpe, ọ zụliere nka ya dị ka nwatakịrị
Na mbido ọrụ ya, Lemon jiri ihe osise mee ihe dị ka isi iyi nke nkwupụta, ka ọ na-achọpụta ịgba egwú, jiri mmegharị dị ka ụzọ anụ ahụ nke nkwupụta
Lemon malitere ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya na akwụkwọ na ihe nkiri na Mahadum Minnesota
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1975, Lemon zụrụ Nancy Hauser, onye mechara gwa Lemon ka ọ sonye na ụlọ ọrụ ya
Tupu Lemon esonye, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Mixed Blood Theater Company na 1976, na Minneapolis
O mechara kwaga New York ebe ọ zutere ma gbaa egwu na Meredith Monk na ụlọ ọrụ ya
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè ọ hapụsịrị ụlọ ọrụ Monk na 1985, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Ralph Lemon Dance
N'ime ogologo ọrụ ya, ya na ụlọ ọrụ ndị a ma ama dịka Limón Dance Company, Alvin Ailey's Repertory Ensemble, Geneva Opera Ballet, Jacob's Pillow Dance Ensemble, na Lyons Opera Ballet rụkọtara ọrụ
Lemon mekwara ihe nkiri vidio ya na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri Bebe Miller
A na-ekwu na ọtụtụ ihe ịga nke ọma Lemon bụ ikike pụrụ ichè ya iji gosipụta ọdịnaya dị egwu na mmetụta uche site na mmegharị site na iji ụdị nka ọhụrụ
Ralph Lemon bụ ónyé nduzi nka nke Cross Performance Inc
na New York ugbu a
Lemon na-agba mbọ ịmepụta ma bụrụ ihe ọhụrụ na arụmọrụ ọ bụla ọ na-emepụta site na ịnye echiche dị ichè íchè na iji mgbasa ozi dị iche iche
A na-egosipụta isi nke ụdị Ralph Lemon n'ọrụ mbụ ya na ejiji siri ike na ihe nkwado iji nyere ndị na-ege ntị aka ịghọta akụkọ ahụ
Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ ndị 1990 ọ hapụrụ ụdị ihe nkiri gaa n'ụdị mmegharị site n'ilekwasị anya n'ahụ
Ralph Lemon na-eji ma nka ya na anthropology azụ iji metụta ihe nkiri ya, mana ọ na-ezere ịgbagọ mkpa ọdịbendị nke ịgba egwu n'ime ọdịnala
Ralph Tendai Mupita bụ injin nke Zimbabwe nke Zimbabwe, onye na-azụ ahịa dị ka onye isi ochev na onye isi oche na onye isi ala site na 1 September 2020 na 19 August 2020
Tupu ọ jere ozi dị ka onye isi ego nke MTN site na Eprel 2017 ruo Ọgọst 2020
A mụrụ Rapheal na Zimbabwe ihe dị ka afọ 1972
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
A nabatara ya na Mahadum Cape Town, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Civil Engineering
O sochiri nke a site na nzere Master of Business Administration, nke Mahadum Cape Town nyere ya
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Harvard, na mmemme nchịkwa gụsịrị
Mgbe ogo mmụta mbụ ya gasịrị, Mupita rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye injinia obodo na Haw & Inglis Civil Engineering, na Cape Town ihe karịrị afọ atọ, site na Disemba 1996 ruo Disemba 1999
Na Jenụwarị 2001, ọ sonyere Old Mutual South Africa, na-eje ozi na ọrụ dị iche iche
dị ka Director nke Strategy na dị ka Director nke Retail for High Net-worth & Affluent
Na February 2012, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ọrụ Emerging Markets for Old Mutual Plc, dabere na Johannesburg, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo Jenụwarị
Site na Eprel 2017, ruo Ọgọst 2020, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka CFO nke MTN Group Limited
Mupita nọchiri Rob Shuter onye rigoro dị ka onye isi ala na 31 Ọgọst 2020
Rama Brew bụ onye na - eme ihe nkiri Ghana ochie, omume onyonyo na onye egwu jazz
Mgbe ọ bụ nwata Rama chọrọ ịbụ onye ịgba egwu mana nna ya ekwetaghị
Nwanne nne ya nke na-arụ ọrụ na Ghana Broadcasting Corporation (GBC) webatara ya na telivishọn
Rama Brew banyere ọrụ na 1972
Rama ghọrọ onye ndu na usoro ihe nkiri TV Ultimate Paradise na 1993 mgbe ọ kwagara Ghana
Ọ meriri onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na 1994
Rama bụkwa onye na-agụ jazz na ndị malitere egwu jazz na 90's
Ọ bụbu onye na-egosi ihe ngosi ụmụaka na 'Groove FM
O mechara bụrụ onye ọka ikpe na ihe ngosi nka egwu TV3, 'Mentor'
O nwere nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Michelle Attoh bụkwa nwanyi na-eme ihe nkiri
Rama Jacqueline Aol (née Aol Jacqueline), nke a na-akpọkwa Aol Rama, (amụrụ na 26 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1969) bụ nwanyị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan na onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọ bụ nwanyị nnọchi anya mpaghara nke Nebbi District na 10th Ugandan Parliament (2016 ruo 2021)
Aol bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement (NRM)
Aol lụrụ di
N'okpuru ebe a bụ nkọwa zuru ezu nke agụmakwụkwọ ya
N'afọ 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na Serenity Centre
Ka e mesịrị n'otu afọ ahụ, ọ sonyeere Community Action Against Alcoholism and Drug Abuse dị ka onye nduzi ruo ugbu a
N'agbata afọ 2006 na afọ 2013, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu na Arua Technical Institute, Ragem
N'agbata afọ 2010 na afọ 2014, Aol rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onyeisi oche na West Nile Consortium on Elimination of Gender Based Violence
Site na afọ 2007 ruo na afọ 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ na Arua Diocese Media Centre-Radio Pacis
Site na afọ 1991 ruo na afọ 2001, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ na Gọọmentị Obodo Nebbi ma rụọkwa ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ na Ngalaba Ikpe n'etiti afọ 1986 na afọ 1991
Tupu ọ banye n'ụlọ omebe iwu nke Uganda dị ka onye omebe iwu maka Nebbi District na afọ 2016, Aol jere ozi dị ka ọkà okwu nke Oluk Sub-County, Arua District site na afọ 2011 ruo na afọ 2014
Aol na-eje ozi na ọrụ ọzọ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke mba Uganda dị ka Kọmitii na-ahụ maka Ohere Ha nhata na Ọrụ Ugbo
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi n'okpuru ndị otu ndị ọkachamara nke Uganda Journalists Union
Ramatoulaye Seck bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Senegal

N'akụkụ Arame Diène na Aïda Mbaye, a họpụtara Seck ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke mba ahụ n'afọ 1983; ụmụ nwanyị atọ ahụ niile ghọrọ ndị a ma ama maka ikike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ha n'agbanyeghị enweghị agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ bụ onye otu Socialist Party nke Senegal, ma ndị otu otu mpaghara họpụtara ya dị ka onye nọchiri Diène, onye a họpụtara ya
Ramatu Tijjani Aliyu (a mụrụ na 12 Juun 1970) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa si steetị Kogi
Ọ bụ onye Minịsta FCT nke onye isi ala Nigeria, Muhammadu Buhari, họpụtara na August 21, 2019
Tupu ọ bụrụ minista, ọ jere ozi dika onye isi ụmụnwaanyị otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị All Nigeria Peoples Party (ANPP) na All Progressive Congress (APC)
Amụrụ Ramatu na Wuse, Abuja, Naijiria
Ọ bụ nwa late Alhaji Mamman Sidi Ali bụbụ onye isi mba Lokoja na steetị Kogi
Ramata gara awkwukwo na Dawaki Primary school dị na Suleja site na 1976 ruo 1982 na Federal government college (FGC) Minna, Niger steetị ebe ọ gusịrị na 1988
N'afo 1990, ọ banyere mahadum Ahmadu Bello Zaria ebe ọ gụrụ Urban and Regional Planning
Ka ọ gusiri na 1995, o jere ịweta nzere mastas na mahadum Nasarawa Steetị dị na Keffi
Ramatu maliịtere ịrụ ọrụ mgbe o mechara National Youth Service Corps (NYSC) ya na ụlọ ọrụ nke Federal ministry works and housing

ọ banyere AZAH Intermediaries Nigeria Limited, ndi sịvịl injinịa ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi njikwa mana o mechara laghachi mahadum ebe ọ mere nzere mastas ya ma nata Asambodo ya na ihe gbasara ịduzi ndị Isi
N'afo 2004, onye isi oche ndi Gwagwalada nọ FCT, Abuja họpụtara Ramatu dika onye ndụmodụ gbasara ihe ụmụ nwaanyị, ndị ntọrobia na oganihụ obodo

Na 2007, ọ gbara mbo ibanye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka ịnọchite anya ndị mba Kwali / Abaji na ndị nnọchi anya ụlọ nke Naijiria (NASS) mana onweghị isi, mana na 2008, emere ya onye isi oche nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya nke bụ All Nigeria Peoples Party (ANPP) nke o jere ozi dika onye nlekọta North Central Zone
N'afo 2010, enyere ya okwa dika onye isi ụmụ nwaanyị otu ha na onye isi ala Council of African Political Parties (CAPP)
Na 2014, emere ya onye isi ụmụ nwaanyị na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a guzobere ọhụrụ bụ All Progressives Congress (APC) ebe o jere ozi ruo 2018
Di Ramatu bụ Alhaji Ahmed Tijjani Aliyu, onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ akụ na ndị na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka
Ha mụrụ ụmụ atọ
Ramatu na-arụ ọrụ na NGO ma guzobe Global Women and Youth Empowerment Strategy (GLOWYES)
Àtụ Infobox badminton player
Ramatu Yakubu (amuru 27 Maachị 1999) bu onye egwu badminton nke Naijiria
Yakubu nwetara ihe nrite ọla nchara n'egwuregwu ndị ntorobịa Afrịka nke afọ 2018 n'asọmpi n'ọkwa otu ụmụ nwanyị na ndi otu
N'afọ 2017, Yakubu gbara n'asọmpi badminton nke Benin International na Cotonou, Benin Republic, wee gbachaa dị ka ndị gbara ọkara ikpeazụ n'asọmpị ụmụnwaanyị n'ọkwa abụọ na ngwakọta nke abụọ
O mechara gbachaa dịka onye na-esote n'ọkwa abụọ ụmụ nwanyị na Lagos International ya na Zainab Momoh

Na 2020, Badminton Federation of Nigeria debara aha ya n'akwụkwọ ka ọ bụrụ ga agba asọmpi na 2020 All Africa Women's Team Championship, mana ọ gbaghara asọmpi ahụ n'ihi na ndị nnọchite anya Egypt gburuu oge maka akwụkwọ ikike visa ndi otu ya
N'ọkwa otu ụmụ nwanyị
N'ọkwa abụọ ụmụ nwanyị
Ramatu Yaradua bụ Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka Ministri itinye ego , azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ na Niger State, Nigeria
Rahmatu bụ onye obodo Enagi dị na ime obodo Edati nke dị na steeti Niger
Agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya malitere na Adrao International School, Lagos, wee gaa United Kingdom ebe ọ gara Ibstock Place School London
Ọ gụrụ International Relations na English na Mahadum nke Coventry ebe ọ nwetara BA na klas nke abụọ na elu
Ọ bụ kọmishọna nke gara aga na-ahụ maka azụmahịa, ụlọ ọrụ na itinye ego na steeti Niger
Dị ya bụ Alh Murtala Shehu Yar'Adua onye bu Minister nke dị Nche gara aga
Ramdane Touhami (amụrụ na 23 Septemba 1974 na Montauban, France) bụ onye France na Morocco na-ese ihe, onye nduzi okike na onye ọchụnta ego
A na-akpọkarị ya 'onye ọchụnta ego dị iche iche na onye na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi mba ụwa, o mepụtara ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche na ejiji, nka, PR, na ụlọ ọrụ ịma mma kemgbe mmalite afọ 90
A makwaara ya maka ịmegharị onye na-emepụta wax kasị ochie n'ụwa bụ Cire Trudon
Ya na nwunye ya Victoire de Taillac, bu ndi nchịkọba nke ụlọọrụ ịma mma nke Paris nke narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, l'Officine Universelle Buly
A mụrụ Ramdane Touhami n'ezinụlọ French Morocco nke nwere mmadụ isii na Montauban, obodo dị na mpaghara Occitanie na ndịda France
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, a họpụtara ya maka ajụjụ ọnụ ya ọ jụrụ onye isi ala France bụ Chirac
Ọ nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'ime ime obodo, mgbe ọ ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, o mepụtara ụdị ákwà ya, Teuchiland, na-eme Timberland na-arutu aka na cannabis
O ji ya nweta ego, mana a tọọrọ ya ma napụ ya ego niile
Mgbe ahụ, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi, hụ onwe ya n'akụkụ na-ezighị ezi nke ndị otu Toulouse wee gbaga Paris, ebe ọ na-enweghị ebe obibi ruo otu afọ
A mara ya mma, o nwere ọnyá ahụ ruo taa

Site n'ebe ahụ, ọ malitere ụlọ ahịa echiche mbụ ya L'Epicerie na Paris, 'ụlọ ahịa' na-ewu ewu ebe uwe, na-egosipụta àgwà mmegide Colette, na-enweta nlebara anya ngwa ngwa nke ndị nta akụkọ dịka Dazed & Confused, Herald Tribune, Le Monde, Vogue na The New York Times
Ramdane arụọla ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi okike maka ụdị dị iche iche, na-enyere ụlọ ahịa ejiji na ísì ụtọ okomoko aka ịmegharị ụlọ ahịa ha na ihe oyiyi ha
Ọ malitere site na ịmalitegharịa And A
na 2000, ụdị ejiji nke Japanese Group Sazaby, site na ịmegharị ime ụlọ ahịa ahụ, njirimara ọhụ na ihe ahịa, ịzụta, ngosi, ịmepụta nchịkọta uwe, na ọbụna nhọrọ egwu

Njem ahụ na-aga n'ihu mgbe e mesịrị n'afọ 2003 mgbe Liberty, ụlọ ahịa a ma ama na London kpọrọ ya ka ọ rụzigharịa ngalaba ụmụ nwoke ha, ebe ọ tụgharịrị akara ahụ dum na ịzụ ahịa, na-ezukọta obere ụdị ejiji iri ise na isii iji mepụta uwe ejiji maka uwe ụmụ nwoke, na-esote atụmatụ echiche ọhụrụ ya n'afọ 2010 maka Santa Eulalia Barcelona, na-aghọta 'bar à eaux de cologne' (ụlọ mmanya na-esi ísì ụtọ) dị ka palette na-esi ísì ụtọ
Otu n'ime nnukwu ọrụ mmegharị ya gụnyere Cire Trudon, onye na-eme kandụl French nke e guzobere na 1643, mgbe ọ nọ na-ehi ụra ihe karịrị afọ nari atọ na iri ise

Iji mee ka akụkọ ihe mere eme furu efu pụta, ọ laghachiri na aha mbụ ahụ, chegharịa echiche maka ụlọ ahịa ahụ, meziwanye usoro mbụ ahụ site na iji wax akwụkwọ nri, ma mepụta ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ iri abụọ maka akara kandụl na-esi ísì ụtọ, ebe nke ọ bụla nwere akụkọ nke ya nke a na-ejikọkarị na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke akara ahụ ma ọ bụ nke ka ukwuu nke France

N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2019, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ okike nke ya nke a na-akpọ Art Recherche Industrie, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka nka na mpaghara ndị dị mkpa, na-eme onwe ya ka ọ dị iche site na 'ụdị ọrụ mbụ na-akwado ụlọ na ihe ọ bụla'
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma na akara ịma mma ya, Officine Universelle Buly, Buly 1803 na nkenke, yana ndị mmekọ ndị ọzọ, dị ka Moncler
N'agbanyeghị ahụmịhe ya na nduzi nka, Ramdane na-akọwa onwe ya karịa, o na-eji 'ezi uche nke onye ọchụnta ego'

N'afọ 2003, ọ malitere ụdị uwe nwoke ya RT, nke ọ sere ma mepụta ákwà ya na mbipụta ya, Résistance sochiri ya na ụdị obodo mepere emepe, na-asọpụrụ ụfọdụ n'ime ihe oyiyi akụkọ ihe mere eme na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị kachasị mkpa
E rere RT

& Résistance na ụlọ ahịa 180 gburugburu ụwa 'Maria Luisa' na Paris, 'Nom de guerre' na New York City, 'Isetan' na Tokyo, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, ma hụ mmekorita dịka ya na Black Panther Party maka ncheta afọ iri anọ ya
Ka uche ya si na ejiji gaa na ísì ụtọ, Ramdane malitere ụlọ ọrụ ya na emepụta ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ Architecture Olfactive ozugbo ọ rụchara ọrụ na Cire Trudon na 2010

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ emeela ọtụtụ ísì ntanye maka ụdị na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche, dị ka The Kooples na Paris, Barney's na Mercer Hotel na New York, Santa Eulalia na Barcelona, yana ụlọ nkwari akụ Shangri-La na obí eze, tinyere echiche nke ísì maka ihe omume
N'afọ 2014, ya na nwunye ya, Victoire de Taillac-Touhami guzobere akara ịma mma ya Officine Universelle Buly na 6 rue Bonaparte na mpaghara nke isii na Paris

Ọ bụ Jean-Vincent Bully hiwere akara ahụ na 1803, ha abụọ mechara kpọlite ya, ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a n'ọtụtụ mba na mpaghara na-ere ọtụtụ ngwaahịa nke gụnyere ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na mmiri, kandụl na-esi ísì ụtọ, wdg
Ramdane lụrụ Victoire de Taillac-Touhami, onye ọkachamara n'ịma mma na onye bụbu onye nduzi nke mmekọrịta ọha na eze maka ụlọ ahịa echiche Colette
Ha bụ ndị mmekọ chiri anya kemgbe nzukọ ha na 90s, ma n'ụzọ ịhụnanya ma n'ọrụ
Di na nwunye a bi ugbu a na Paris, France, ya na ụmụ ha atọ
Na Disemba 2020, e nyere Touhami Chevalier des Arts et des Lettres (Knight of Arts and Letters)
Official website

Ramekon O'Arwisters (amụrụ n'August 15, 1960) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'Afrịka na America, nke a maara nke ọma màkà akwa ya na ọrụ nka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, Crochet Jam Ọ na-emepụta nka site na iji ọdịnala ọdịnala nke akwa akwa
E gosipụtara ọrụ Ramekon na New York, North Carolina, Tokyo, Bologna, Miami Beach, na San Francisco
Ọ bụkwa ónyé bụbu ónyé nlekọta nke foto nka dị mma na SFO Museum
A mụrụ Ramekon na Kernersville, North Carolina
Ọ tolitere n'ugbo
Nné na nnà ya rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ owuwe ihe ubi na Winston-Salem, North Carolina
Ọ gụsịrị kọleji na Mahadum nke North Carolina na 1982 na BA
na nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'afọ 1986, ọ nwetara nzere Master of Divinity (MDiv) na Duke University School of Divinidad na Durham, North Carolina
Ramekon bi na San Francisco ugbu a
Ọrụ Ramekon na-akọwa site na ncheta nwata a hụrụ n'anya nke jupụtara na omenala ndị Africa na America nke ịkpa ákwà na akwa
Ramekon na-enyocha ihe gbárá ya gburugburu nke iguzogide na nkwekọrịta, n'etiti njikwa na nnwere onwé site na ịkpa ihe osise n'efu
Ọ bụ ónyé natara 2014 Eureka Fellowship Award nke Fleishhacker Foundation na Artadia Award na 2003

Ramesh Agrawal bụ onye ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke India, onye nwe ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ịntanetị na onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi si Chhattisgarh, onye bụ onye guzobere otu Jan Chetana(nnnọ, nke pụtara uche ndị mmadụ)
Enyere ya ihe nrite gburugburu ebe obibi Goldman na 2014 maka mbọ ya n'ịhazi ngagharị iwe megide ụfọdụ atụmatụ mmepụta ihe na mpaghara ahụ, yana ọkachasị ịgwa ụmụ amaala ihe banyere ya
ihe ndị metụtara gburugburu ebe obibi na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke atụmatụ nnukwu igwu coal
Ramez Mohamed Galal Ahmed Tawufik (Arabic; a mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1973) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe ọchị, onye na-eme egwuregwu na onye na-agụ egwu
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Egyptian Academy of Arts
Ramez Galal bụ nwa nwoke nke onye nduzi ihe nkiri Galal Tawfik na nwanne Yasser Galal nke obere
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Kasr Al Tefl wee kwaga ụlọ akwụkwọ El Orman
Ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya bụ El Giza
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Galal kpebiri isonyere ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ihe nkiri, ngalaba ime ihe nkiri na iduzi
Galal banyere n'ọrụ agha mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, wee laghachi n'ime ihe nkiri
Na mbido ọrụ ya, o nwetara ohere iso onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama Salah Zulfikar na ihe nkiri TV dị mkpirikpi nke afọ 1993 'Al-Rajul Al-Tayeb'
N'afọ 2014 ọ pụtara na mgbasa ozi TV maka Zain
N'ihe ngosi ya, nke a na-egosi n'oge Ramadan, a na-ahụ ndị ọbịa Galal na egwu maka ndụ ha
Ọ na-eme ndị Egypt a ma ama na ndị ama ama dịka Paris Hilton, Steven Seagal, na Shah Rukh Khan
Mmeghachi omume nke Shah Rukh Khan n'oge ihe ngosi ahụ, bụ vidiyo YouTube nke anọ kachasị ewu ewu n'izu mbụ nke Ramadan afọ 2017
N'agbanyeghị na ihe ngosi ya na-ewu ewu, Galal enwetala nkatọ
Otu onye na-ekwu maka ikike ụmụ anụmanụ mere mkpesa na a na-eme ka ọdụm dị jụụ maka ihe ngosi ahụ
Onye nkatọ ọzọ kwuru na 'mkparị' nke na-efe mgbe a na-akụ ndị ọbịa ya na-emebi aha Egypt
N'afọ 2020, onye isi oche Zamalek bụ Mortada Mansour gbara akwụkwọ na-achọ ka a kwụsị ihe ngosi Ramez Magnoon Rasmy (Ramez bụ Officially Crazy)
N'ajụjụ ọnụ na-atụle mwakpo Minya nke afọ 2017 ebe e gburu Ndị Kraịst 29, gụnyere ụmụaka, na-aga ebe obibi ndị mọnk na Minya, Galal malitere anya mmiri na-akọwa mmetụta ya banyere ọdachi ahụ
Ramla Said Ahmed Ali (Arabic; amụrụ na 16 Septemba na afọ 1989) bụ onye Somalia ọkachamara na-akụ ọkpọ, ihe nlereanya, onye edemede na onye na-ahụ maka ịha nhata agbụrụ
Ali bụ onye Somalia mbụ na-akụ ọkpọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme iji sọọ mpi n'egwuregwu Olympic na nwanyị mbụ ghọrọ onye na-akụ akụ ọkachamara

Dị ka onye na-amụta ihe, Ali meriri na afọ 2015 Novice national championships na England, afọ 2016 England Boxing Elite National Championships, afọ 2016 Great British Championships, na 2019 African Zone featherweight title
Ali nọchitere anya England na mbụ mana na afọ 2018 gbanwere ịnọchite anya Somalia
Ọ laghachighị Somalia kemgbe ọ hapụrụ dị ka nwatakịrị mana ọ chọrọ inyere aka itinye mba ahụ n'isi akụkọ maka ihe ndị dị mma
Ọ bụ onye mbụ meriri n'asọmpi ịkụ ọkpọ Afrịka na ihe nrite ọla edo mba ụwa mgbe ọ na-anọchite anya Somalia
N'afọ 2021, o sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 2020 Summer Olympics
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ meriri n'ọgụ mbụ ya, ọ ghọrọ onye ọkpọ mbụ nọchitere anya Somalia n'ọkwa Olympic

Ali nyere aka guzobe otu egwuregwu ịkụ ọkpọ nke Somalia na Mogadishu ma ghọọ onye ọkpọ mbụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nọchitere anya Somalia na asọmpi asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị nke ụwa, nke emere na New Delhi, India
Na Jenụwarị 2018, Ali malitere The Sisters Club, ọrụ ebere e mepụtara iji nye ohere maka ụmụ nwanyị Alakụba na ndị ka nta iji mụta ma nwee obi ụtọ ịkụ ọkpọ na UK
N'ikpeazụ, atụmatụ ahụ gbasaa iji nabata ụmụ nwanyị ndị nwere mwakpo mmekọahụ ma ọ bụ ime ihe ike n'ụlọ iji mụta ichebe onwe ha
Ọrụ ebere ahụ jikọtara aka na ụdị Nike, Sports Direct & Everlast iji gbasaa mmemme ya na afọ 2021 ma mee ka ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị gafee mba ahụ
Ali kpebisiri ike inye pasent 25 nke ego ọ na-enweta n'afọ mbụ ya dị ka ọkachamara na Black Lives Matter charities

N'ịbụ onye IMG Models nọchitere anya, Ramla apụtala n'ihu ihu nke British Vogue, Grazia, Wall Street Journal, Financial Times, Guardian Observer, Wonderland, ELLE, The Square Mile, The Week, Beauty Papers, ES Magazine, Swiss Style, M Milenio Magazine, Exit Magazine na Puss Puss Magazine ma see ya foto maka mbipụta Time Magazine, Spanish Vogue, NY T Magazine, Sunday Times Style, Twin, Luxx Times, Gentlewoman & Conde Nast,
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya ụwa na Dior, Pantene, Cartier & Nike
Akwụkwọ akụkọ izizi Ramla 'Not Without A Fight' bụ akwụkwọ enyemaka onwe onye dabere na ọgụ iri kachasị mkpa na ndụ ya
Ọ bụ Merky Books & Penguin Random House bipụtara ya
A mara ọkwa na onye a họpụtara na Academy Award, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri BAFTA Lee Magiday ga-eme ihe nkiri ogologo oge na mmekorita ya na Film4 dabere na akụkọ ndụ Ramla Ali
Ali si Somalia kwaga England dị ka onye gbara ọsọ ndụ site na Agha Obodo Somalia
Mgbe Ali bụ nwata, e gburu nwanne ya nwoke mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ mgbe ọ na-egwuri egwu n'èzí, na-akpali ezinụlọ ahụ ịhapụ UK site na Kenya
Ọ malitere ịkụ ọkpọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma na mgbalị iji belata ibu
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri na ise ahọpụtara ka ha pụta n'ihu mbipụta Septemba 2019 nke British Vogue, site n'aka onye nchịkọta akụkọ Meghan, Duchess of Sussex

Rammellzee (nke a na-akpọ RAMM ΣLL ZΣ, nke a na-asụ 'Ram Ell Zee'; ubochí irí na isé n'ọnwa Disemba, 1960 rụọ úbọchị iri abụo na asatọ n'ọnwa Juun, 2010) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na'ese ihe, ihe osise, onye na ónyé na-eti egwu hip hop si New York City, ónyé a kpọtụrụ aha dị ka 'ihe eji eme ihe n'ịbata ihe ndị avant-garde n'ime omenala hip-hop'
Kemgbe 2021, ọrụ Rammellzee bụ naanị Jeffrey Deitch na-anọchite anya ya
A mụrụ Rammellzee na úbọchị irí nà isé n'ọnwa Disemba, 1960 na Far Rockaway, Queens n'aka nné Africa-America na nnà Italian nke rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nchọpụta njem
Ọ tolitere na Carlton Manor Projects dị nso na Far RockawayáMott Avenue A ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Ọrụ ya malitere igosi na 1970s na ụgbọ ala na ọdụ ụgbọ oloko nkè New York City, ọkachasị na ụgbọ oloko A ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụ ụgbọ oloko ya

Rammellzee gụrụ ọgwụ ezé na Clara Barton High School for Health Professions, ọ bụ ihe nlereanya màkà Wilhelmina (n'okpuru aha Mcrammellzee), ma mụọ obéré ógè màkà imepụta ọla na Fashion Institute of Technology (FIT)

N'ịbụ onye ndị na-ege ntị ka ukwuu chọpụtara site na ihe nkiri ofufe nke 1982 Wild Style nke Charlie Ahearn, e guzobere aha mbụ Rammellzee na gburugburu graffiti mgbe ọ na-ese ụgbọ okporo ígwè ụgbọ okporo ígwè New York na DONDI, OU3, na Ink 76, na dọkịta Revolt n'okpuru aha ya Hyte, Hytestyr, EG (Evolution Griller the Master Killer), Sharissk Boo, Razz, na Maestro na A, CC, 2 na 5 ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Rammellzee bụ onye otu Death Comet Crew, ya na Stuart Argabright, Michael Diekmann na Shinichi Shimokawa
O guzobekwara ndị otu Tag Master Killers, nke nwere A-One, Delta2, Kool Koor na Toxic
Rammellzee ghọrọ enyi na onye na-arụkọ ọrụ na onye na'ese ihe Jean-Michel Basquiat
N'afọ 1982, Rammellzee na Toxic sonyeere Basquiat na Los Angeles ka ọ na-akwadebe maka ihe ngosi ya na Gagosian Gallery
Ha kpọrọ onwe ha ndị Hollywood Africans dị ka nkwupụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị iji gbochie ngosipụta nke ndị Africa America na Hollywood
A na-egosipụta mmadụ atọ ahụ na ihe osise Basquiat Hollywood Africans n'ihu Chinese Theater with Footprints of Movie Stars (1983) na Hollywood Africins (1983)
Rammellzee lụrụ Carmela Zagari Rammellzé
Ọ nwụrụ na New York City na June 28, 2010, mgbe ọ dị afọ 49, ebe ọ na-ata ahụhụ site na ikpughe na mgba, anwụrụ ọkụ, resin na nsí ndị ọzọ site na ọrụ ya na nsogbu imeju
E depụtara ihe kpatara ọnwụ ya dị ka ọrịa obi
Ọ gbanwere aha ya n'ụzọ iwu ka ọ bụrụ Rammellzee na 1979 na ndị enyi maara aha ọmụmụ ya achọghị ikpughe ya, dịka ọchịchọ ya si dị
Mgbe ụfọdụ, ọ na-eji aha mkpirikpi nke 'Ramm' eme ihe
O kwuru na aha ya sitere na RAM gbakwunyere M maka Magnitude, Sigma (Σ) onye na-agbakọta ọnụ mbụ, nke mbụ bụ L ♡ ogologo, nke abụọ bụ L ♡ latitude, Z ♡ z-bar, Σ, Σ ♡ nchịkọta
O kwenyere na Jamel-Z, onye nduzi sitere na Nation of Gods and Earths ọ zutere na 1977, na mkpali maka aha ya
Ramona Berni i Toldrà (3 June 1887, Mollerussa - 22 April 1968, Barcelona) bụ onye anarcho-syndicalist nke Spain si Catalonia
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ ndị ọrụ ugbo si Pla d'Urgell
Ọ bụ ada Isabel Toldrà i Ginesta na Ramón Berni i Buria ma nwee ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ

N'afọ 1910, ọ kwagara Barcelona ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ akwa wee sonye na mmepụta na textile Union nke Confederación Nacional del Trabajo (CNT), ịbụ otu n'ime ndị mgbasa ozi nke otu ya na enyi ya Pepita Ọ bụghị
N'afọ 1918, ọ zutere Ricardo Sanz García, onye Pepita ga-eme n'ọdịnihu na onye ndu otu
Na njedebe nke 1910s, Berni lụrụ Blas Buyé wee mụọ nwa nwoke
Ọ gbara alụkwaghịm na 1933
ya Pepita Not
N'afọ 1918 ọ zutere Ricardo Sanz García, onye ga-abụ onye mmekọ Pepita na onye isi otu
Na ngwụcha afọ 1910, Berni lụrụ Blas Buyé ma mụọ nwa nwoke
Ọ gbara alụkwaghịm na 1933
Na 1923, ya na Pepita Not na Ricardo Sanz, o sonyeere otu Los Solidarios, nke e kere dị ka ihe nchebe megide ndị agha Sindicato Libre
Ndị mejupụtara otu a (Los Solidarios) bụ Buenaventura Durruti, Juan García Oliver, Francisco Ascaso, Eusebio Brau, Julia López Mainar, María Luisa Tejedor, na ndị ọzọ
N'ime otu ahụ o nwere ọrụ mbanye, njikọ na nzikọrịta ozi

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ dịghị mgbe a tụrụ Berni mkpọrọ n'ihi na ọ so na ya, ndị uwe ojii nwụchiri ya na nwa ya nwoke bụ Jaume Buyé i Berni, na February 28, 1924, mgbe e gbusịrị onye isi Los Solidarrios Gregorio Suberbiela, bụ nke ọ nọgidere na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
mkpofu nke ikike ndị agha izu ole na ole
N'oge ọchịchị aka ike nke Primo de Rivera, ndị otu ahụ belatara na ndị òtù anọ fọdụrụnụ, gụnyere Berni, na-emeso omume dị iche iche dị ka ịnyefe ngwá agha ndị e nwetara na Éibar na Barcelona
Mgbe mkpọsa nke abụọ Spanish Republic, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ otu ya, ma soro na ọtụtụ CNT nzukọ na Igualada (1931), Lleida na Canet de Mar (1932)
Mgbe nnupụisi nke Alt Llobregat gasịrị, o biri na Manresa (dị ka ụfọdụ isi mmalite na 1934, ndị ọzọ na 1936), ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka a textile ọrụ
N'oge agha obodo Spain, a na-achịkọta ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe ọ na-arụ ọrụ ma bụrụ onye nnọchiteanya nke otu
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Kansụl Obodo Manresa, nọ na-akwụ ụgwọ nke Ngalaba Nchebe Ime
Ngosipụta ikpeazụ ya n’ihu ọha bụ na nnọkọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na Kursaal dị na Manresa na 1938
Ná ngwụsị nke agha obodo ahụ, ọ gara biri n’ala ọzọ, ikekwe na France, n’agbanyeghị na ọ dịghị ihe ndekọ ọ bụla na-egosi na o si n’ogige ịta ahụhụ France gafere
France
Ọ nwụrụ na Barcelona na 22 Eprel 1968, ọ bụ ezie na, dị ka ụfọdụ akwụkwọ akụkọ, enwere obi abụọ banyere ma ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya na ụbọchị ọnwụ ya
Ramses Lonlack (amụrụ na 20 January 1989) bụ onye nche basketball ụmụ nwanyị Cameroon
Ọ na-egwuri egwu na mba ụwa na otu egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị nke Cameroon na ọkwa kọleji na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Memphis Tigers na Tennessee, United States
A mụrụ Lonlack na Belabo, Cameroon ma bụrụ nwa afọ Bertoua
Ọ kwagara United States na 2006 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa
Lonlack bụ onye egwuregwu kpakpando mgbe ọ na-aga Stoneleigh-Burnham School na Massachusetts, USA
N'oge oge kachasị elu ya (2011-12) na Memphis, a kpọrọ Lonlack onye egwuregwu Conference USA Defensive Player of the Year
A kpọkwara ya aha na C-USA All-Defensive Team na-esote oge nke abụọ na nke obere
Àtụ NBA player statistics legend
Ramses Naguib=Ramsis Nagib (8 June 1921- 4 February 1977) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, na onye nduzi
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri mara mma a ma ama bụ Lobna Abdelaziz n'agbanweghị na ọ bụ onye na-ekpe okpukpe Ndị Kraịst
Ọ lụghị ya n'Ịjipt iji merie iwu ndị Ijipt nke machibidoro alụmdi na nwunye dị otú ahụ
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gbara ya alụkwaghịm n'ime Ijipt nke megidere ọchịchọ ha abụọ Ha hụrụ ibe ha n'anya ma bie ndụ obi ụtọ ọnụ tupu ịgba alụkwaghịm
Lobna gụrụ banyere ịgba alụkwaghịm ya n'akwụkwọ akụkọ tupu ịgba alụkwaghim ya
Ramsey Nouah (amụrụ Ramsey Tokunbo Nouah Jr; December 19, 1970) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri na Naijiria
O ritere Africa Movie Academy Award for Best Actor in a Leading Role n'afọ 2010 maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri 'The Figurine'
O mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na ihe nkiri Living in Bondage Breaking Free n'afọ 2019 ma gaa n'ihu iduzi Nollywood classic Rattle Snake The Ahanna Story nke bụ mmegharị nke (1995)
A mụrụ Ramsey Tokunbo Nouah Jr
na Lagos na Disemba 19, afọ 1970, nna ya bụ onye Juu Israel na nne ya bụ onye Yoruba nke si Owo, Ondo Steeti
O tolitere na Surulere, Lagos, ebe ọ gara Atara Primary School nakwa Community Grammar School
O nwetara diplọma na nkwukọrịta ọha na eze na Mahadum nke Lagos, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gbasoro ọrụ ime ihe nkiri
Ramsey Nouah malitere ime ihe nkiri na mmalite afọ 90 n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ego maka General Certificate Education (GCE)
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri nke Nouah malitere mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri TV nke Naijiria bụ Fortunes
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ pụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na-egosi dịka onye ndu, a na-akpọkwa ya 'Lover-Boy' maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya
A na-ewerekwa ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri a na-achọsi ike na Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2015, o chebere ikike nke Living in Bondage Breaking Free site n'aka Kenneth Nnebue maka mmegharị nwere ike ịme na Europe, America, nakwa Nigeria
E mechara gosipụta akụkọ ahụ na Instagram, mana ihe nkiri ahụ yiri ka ọ nọ na mmepe ọkụ mmụọ ruo afọ atọ
N'afọ 2018, o kwupụtara na mmegharị ya aghọwo ihe ọzọ akpọrọ Living in Bondage Breaking Free, nke ewepụtara na Nọvemba 8, 2019
Nouah, onye na-eme onye isi nchụàjà ọhụrụ, na-eme ihe nkiri izizi ya, ya na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri mbụ bụ Okwonkwo, Udokwu, na Kanayo na-arụkwa ọrụ ha
Rapa na onye mmeri MBGN bụ Muna Abii nọkwa na ihe nkiri ahụ
N'afọ 2020, ihe nkiri Living in Bondage Breaking Free nwetara mmeri ihe nrite asaa na Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards
Nouah lụrụ Emelia Philips-Nouah
Di na nwunye a mụrụ ụmụ nwoke abụọ aha ha bụ Quincy Nouah na Joshua Nouah, na otu nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Desiree Nouah
Ramy Sabry (Arabic; a na-akpọkwa Rami Sabry; a mụrụ n'abalị 15 ọnwa Machị afọ 1978) bụ onye Egypt na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ egwu dị na Egypt, ọ amalitelarị ọrụ egwu ya site n'ide egwu maka ndị na-agụ egwú ole na ole a ma ama
E sere vidiyo atọ, abụọ n'ime ha bụ nke Tarek Alarian duziri na otu nke Moussa Eissa
N'inwe abọm Launched First Single Ramy Sabry gara n'ihu na-ekere òkè n'ọtụtụ ihe omume egwu dịka kọntaktị ndụ, mmemme ụlọ akwụkwọ na oriri na mahadum
N'ikpeazụ, Ramy ghọrọ ihe ịga nke ọma ma bụrụzi onye na-agụ egwú a ma ama na Egypt
N'afọ 2008, Ramy rụsiri ọrụ ike iji wepụta abọm nke abụọ ya, mana ọ malitere inwe oge
A na-agbanye abọm ahụ na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ma ọrụ ya na mgbalị ya niile furu efu
N'ikpeazụ, e yigharịrị abọm ahụ ihe karịrị otu ugboro
Ramy na-agba ọsọ megide oge iji kesaa ma bipụta abọm ya ọzọ, o nwere ike ịmepụta egwu ọhụrụ maka abọm ahụ n'oge ndekọ
N'ikpeazụ, abọm ahụ mere ya n'ahịa ma hụ ihe ịga nke ọma dị ukwuu na ahịa n'agbanyeghị obere mgbasa ozi, nke a kpaara ókè na otu mgbasa ozi na telivishọn na ụfọdụ posters
N'afọ 2015, Sabry wepụtara vidiyo egwu ya maka egwu ya Agmal Layali Omri (اجمل ليالي عمري)(The Best Nights of My Life)
N'afọ 2017 Ramy Sabry wepụtara abọm Al Ragel (The Man)
N'afọ 2018 ọ bịanyere aka na Rotana Records wee wepụta egwu Ahd Al Donia
N'afọ 2019 Ọ bịanyere aka na Nogoum Records wee wepụta abọm ọhụrụ Farek Maak (فارق معاك)
Rana El Nemr (Egyptian, b
1974, Hanover, Germany) bụ onye na-ese ihe nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Cairo, Egypt
Na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa na foto, ọ malitere nyocha nke ndụ obodo ukwu Egypt nke oge a, gụnyere ihe owuwu Cairo, oghere ọha na eze / nke onwe, na njirimara ndị nọ n'etiti
Ọ bụ onye guzobere The Contemporary Image Collective (CIC, Cairo), onye mmemme nke nkuzi, ihe ngosi, na ụlọ ọrụ na-enyocha ọrụ na-agbanwe agbanwe nke foto na ọdịbendị anya nke oge a
El Nemr gụrụ foto akụkọ, mgbasa ozi, na nka na Mahadum Amerika, Cairo
O gosipụtara na mba ụwa, gụnyere na Lebanon, Switzerland, Germany, Japan, Finland, na United States
Otu n'ime usoro El Nemr a ma ama, The Metro, site na 2003, na-egosi ụmụ nwanyị na uwe ọdịnala na nke na-abụghị ọdịnala na ụgbọ oloko Cairo, nke usoro ụgbọ oloko ahụ
Ranaram Bishnoi bụ onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi dị afọ iri asaa nke obodo Ekalkhori dị nso na Jodhpur, Rajasthan
Ọ malitere ịkụ osisi n'ọzara na ebe kpọrọ nkụ dị nso n'obodo ya
Ọ kọrọ ihe karịrị osisi 27,000 n'ala iri abuo na ise bigha na nnukwu ite ụrọ n'onwe ya
Ndị obodo ahụ maara ya dị ka ahhu 'nwoke osisi'
O kwenyere na ụdị ndị na-abụghị mmadụ nwere ikike nhata ma ọ bụ karịa ibi ndụ n'ụwa karịa ụmụ mmadụ
O kwuru na 'osisi na ụmụ anụmanụ nọ na mbara ala ọtụtụ tupu anyị erute ebe a
Ha nwere ikike karịa ụwa ma ọ bụrụ na anyị enweghị ike inye ha nke ahụ ọbụlagodi anyị nwere ike hụ na anyị agaghị ebibi ha na anyaukwu anyị
Onye ọrụ ibe ya bụ Khamu Ram Bishnoi, nke a makwaara dị ka nwoke Turban
N'ịkụ osisi ndị a, ọ kwụsịrị ọzara ka ọ ghara ịgbasa n'obodo ya nke nwere ike imebi ọtụtụ narị ihe ọkụkụ

Rands nke South Africa, ma ọ bụ naanị rand, (ihe ịrịba ama R; koodu ZAR[lower-alpha 1]) bụ ego gọọmentị nke Southern African Common Monetary Area nke gụnyere South Africa, Namibia (n'akụkụ dollar Namibia), Lesotho (n'okpuru Lesotho loti) na Eswatini (n'etiti Swazi lilangeni)
A na-ekewa ya na 100 cents (ihe ịrịba ama 'c')

Rand nke South Africa bụ ego iwu kwadoro na steeti ndị otu mpaghara ego nke Namibia, Lesotho ya na Eswatini, na mba atọ a nwekwara ego mba nke ha (dollar, loti na lilangeni n'otu n'otu) jikọtara ya na rand na nha ma ka na-anabata ya n'ọtụtụ ebe dị ka ndị nnọchi anya
Rand bụkwa ego iwu kwadoro na obodo Botswana ruo afọ 1976, mgbe pula nọchiri rand na par

Rand na-ewere aha ya site na Witwatersrand ('mmiri ọcha' n'asụsụ Bekee, rand bụ okwu Dutch na Afrikaans maka 'mkpu'), ugwu nke a luru Johannesburg na ebe a chọputara ọtụtụ ọlaedo nke obodo South Africa
N'asụsụ Bekee na Afrikaans, otu na ọtụtụ ụdị nke unit ('rand') bụ otu otu rand, rand iri, nde rand abụọ
E webatara rand na Union of South Africa na afọ 1961, ọnwa atọ tupu mba ahụ ekwupụta onwe ya dị ka mba
E guzobere Kọmitii Mkpụrụ Ego Decimal na afọ1956 iji tụlee ịpụ na denominations nke pound, shillings, na pence; ọ nyere aro ya na ubochi asatọ na onwa August na afọ 1958
Ọ nọchiri pound South Africa dị ka ego iwu kwadoro, na ọnụego nke abụọ rand na otu pound, ma ọ bụ iri shillings na rand
Gọọmentị weputara ihe nkedo, Desimaal Dan, 'nwoke rand-cent' (nke a maara na Afrikaans dị ka Daan Desimaal)
Nke a na-esonyere egwu redio, iji mee ka ọha na eze mara banyere ego ọhụrụ ahụ
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-akpọ ya n'ụdị Afrikaans dị ka /rʌnt/ na jingles mgbe ewepụtara ya, a na- ịkpọ ya n'oge a na South African English bụ /rænd/
Randa El Behery bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nlereanya
Nne ya bụ onye na-ahazi ma na-edozi ime ụlọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ngalaba Asụsụ Bekee na Akwụkwọ edemede na Mahadum Cairo
Randa wee rụọ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi azụmahịa ruo afọ atọ tupu ọ malite ime ihe nkiri
El Behery sonyere na usoro nke 'shames youm Geded(Sun of new day) na 2000
Ọ pụtara na mgbasa ozi na vidiyo

Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri telivishọn dị ka Awlad Hetetna (Ụmụ nke agbata obi anyị) na Ga2zat Npvel (Award for Novell), na El lolo2 El Mansor (Pearls Scattered), El Lyl we a5ro (Night and at the End)', na (Ghosts of Sayala), Banat Saltandyna (Girl Afan), na El Marsa wewl bahr (Mursi and the Sea), Ahlam Banat We We We Wews and the Public Issue of Laam (The Public Love) (The Public Times) (The Weam)
Ọ pụtara na sitcoms Esht el asfora (Bird's Nest) na Sherif We Nos (Sheriff and Half)
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Ahasys (Feelings) na Aychen El Lahza (Living the Moment) wee pụta na Ayam Saaba (Difficult Days) na Hassan na Marcus
Randle General Hospital bụ ụlọ ọgwụ steeti dị na mpaghara Surulere nke Lagos, Naijiria
Chief Majekodunmi guzobere ya maka iji obodo mee ihe na afọ 1964 ma ọ bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọgwụ nlekọta ahụike mbụ na Surulere
Ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike, ọkachasị na ngalaba ihe mberede na mberede
E guzobere ụlọ ọgwụ a iji nye nlekọta ahụike nne na ụmụaka, ọrụ ezé, ọrụ ahụike na ịwa ahụ wdg
A na-akpọ ya mgbe ụfọdụ Surulere General Hospital
Onye nduzi ahụike nke ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ bụ Dr
Aduke Odutayo
Ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ dekọrọ ngụkọta nke ndị ọrịa 6929 na-eleta ngalaba ezé maka oge Jenụwarị ruo Disemba n'afọ 2020
Rangu Souriya bụ onye India na-akwado ikike mmadụ na onye na-elekọta ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka

Ọ bụ onye guzobere Kanchanjunga Uddhar Kendra, otu nzukọ na-anaghi achọ uru nke dị na Siliguri, nke raara onwe ya nye inyere ndị na-ahụ maka ịzụ ahịa mmekọahụ aka na Darjeeling, North East India na Nepal
E nyere ya Godfrey Phillips National Bravery Awards n'afọ 2011
N'afọ 2004, Souriya gara Kathmandu ịchọ nduzi site n'aka Anuradha Koirala na ndị otu Maiti Nepal

Mgbe ọ na-emekọrịta ihe ma na-amụta ihe n'aka ha, ọ laghachiri Darjeeling wee malite Kanchanjunga Uddhar Kendra Kemgbe ahụ, ya na ndị ọzọ nọ na NGO azọpụtala ihe karịrị ụmụ agbọghọ otu puku na otu nari n'obodo dị ka Patna, Delhi, Mumbai, na Kolkata
Souriya natara Godfrey Phillips National Bravery Award n'afọ 2011 ma bụrụ onye Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry's Women Achievers' Award n'afọ 2009
Na mgbakwunye, ihe karịrị òtù mpaghara iri abụọ akwanyela ya ùgwù maka ọrụ ya

Na Jenụwarị 2016, edepụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime mmadụ otu narị nke Women Initiative nke Ministry of Women and Child Development (India) nke bu n'obi ịmata ma nabata ụmụ nwanyị otu narị na-eme ihe dị iche na obodo ha na mba ahụ,
Rania A
Al-Mashat (amụrụ na abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Jun afọ 1975) bụ onye Egypt na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ ya bụ Minista na-ahụ maka imekọ ihe ọnụ na mba ụwa ugbu a na onye bụbu Minista maka njem nlere anya site na 2018 ruo Disemba 2019
Ọ nọbu n'ọkwá dị elu na ụlọ ọrụ International Monetary Fund na Washington DC ya na Oba ego gọọmenti etiti mba Ijipt (Central Bank of Egypt)

Amụrụ Al-Mashat na Cairo di na mba Egypt nye Abdel Monem El Mashat, onye ọkammụta na ngalaba Sayensị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị (political science )na Mahadum Cairo na Nagwa el-Attar, onye rụrụ ọrụ na Mahadum Ain Shams
O ji nzere Bachelọ Ịkọnọmiks pụta na Mahadum Cairo (AUC) n'afọ 1995

A họpụtara nna ya dịka onye ndụmọdụ na ngalaba omenala na agụmakwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ n'ahụ maka ime njem baa ala Egypt nke dị na Washington DC n'afọ 1995, Al-Mashat ewee debanye aha na mahadum Maryland di nso ébé ahu, ebe ọ nwetara nzere Mastas n'afọ 1998 nwetakwa nzere PhD n'afọ 2001, na nkega nke mkpata na mmefu mba ụwa (International Economics) nke gbasara ego na nhazi ojiji ụgwọ (Monetary Policy and Debt Management
Al-Mashat rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba ụlọ ọrụ International Monetary Fund dị na Washington DC site na Jun 2001 ruo Julaị 2005
Mgbe ọ malitere na IMF, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụo na ise, ọ bụ onye kachasị bụrụ obere nwa na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mmemme ha, na India, Vietnam, na Gambia

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2005, Al-Mashat laghachiri Ijipt na òkù nke Minista na-ahụ maka itinye ego Mahmoud Mohieldin kpọrọ ya, iji nye aka melite usoro na mmekọrịta ụlọ akụ ala ahụ, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote gọvanọ na onye isi nke Ngalaba Iwu Ego maka Ọba ego gọọmenti etiti mba Egypt (Central Bank of Egypt)ruo Mee afọ 2016
Mgbe mgbanwe ọchịchị nke afọ 2011 gasịrị, o nyere aka hazie ma gosipụta usoro omume gbasara akụ na ụba nke gọọmentị
Ọ kụzikwaara akụ na ụba na Mahadum America dị na Cairo ma rụọ ọrụ na bọọdụ nke mgbanwe égo Egypt, Ọba ego Arab ya na Middle East Economic Association
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2016, Al-Mashat laghachiri na mba America mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nke onye isi nchịkwa nke IMF, Maurice Obstfeld
O kwuru banyere ọrụ a, 'Echere m na ahụmịhe m nwere bụ ime ndị karịrị m n'ọ́kwa Ihe ịtụ n'anya mgbe niile site n'ịbụ nwanyị Arab eji eme ọnụ'
N'afọ 2017, o sonyere na ndị òtù ọ̀kaikp
nke

nke World Economicna ihe nke emere a kpọrọ 'Investing In Peace', nke mere eji denye aha ya n'ime mmadụ iri bu ọpụrụiche, ndị eweere ihe ntinye ucheobi ha dika ndi a ga-ekwu mFkaoha ma enwewe mkparịtaụka n'isiokwu bụ anyere 'ime ka ụwa bụrụ ebe ziri ezi'
Na Jenụwarị afọ 2018, Praịm MinistaSherif Ismail họpụtara Al-Mashat dika minista njem nlere anya nke mba Egypt nke meziri ka ụmụ nwanyị so na òtù ndị ọrụ ya dị isii
Al-Mashat ghọziri nwanyị mbụ rúrú ógó minista na mba Ijipt, bụrụkwa ya bụ minista kacha bụrụ obere nwa n'oge ahụ
N'ọrụ a, ọ na elekata Bọọdụ n'akwalite n'ahụ maka njem nlere anya mba Ijipt (Egyptian Tourism Promotion Board) nakwa the Tourism Development Authority
O mèchàrà kwuo na nhọputa a tụrụ ya anya mana o mèchàrà ghọta na onye isi ala mba Egypt chọrọ ka ngalaba njem nlere anya ala ahụ bụrụ nke emeturu aka n'ụzọ pụrụ iche
Njem nlere anya na enye ala Egypt ego ruru pesentị iri na ise ruo pesentị iri abụọ nke ego niile gọọmenti Ijipt n'akpata
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2018, Al-Mashat duuru nwunye onye isi ala mba Amerika Melania Trump gaa njem nleta, gosi ya Giza Pyramids, na-ekwu na nleta ahụ gosipụtara ozi nke 'Nchebe na nchekwa Ijipt n'ụwa'
Na Jenụwarị 2019, Al-Mashat kwupụtara na a ga-amalite nnukwu ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke Ijipt n'afọ 2020 ma bụrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ onwe ga-achịkwa dị ka akụkụ nke atụmatụ gọọmentị ịchekwa ọtụtụ ebe ochie
Al-Mashat bụ otu n'ime ndị ọkà okwu isii na World Tourism Forum na Lucerne na Mee 2019
Al-Mashat ekwuola maka ịha nhatanha nwoke na nwanyị na mkpa agụmakwụkwọ dị, na-ekwu sị, 'Nye ụmụ agbọghọ Ijipt niile, nọgide na-itinye ego na agụmakwụkwọ gị
Ụwa nọ na-asọmmpi nke ukwuu nke bụ na ihe ị maara bụ ihe na-eme ka ị dị iche na onye ọ bụla ọzọ
Al-Mashat natara 2013 Distinguished Alumni Award site na AUC
N'afọ 2014, World Economic Forum kpọrọ ya 'Onye ndu ụwa na-eto eto'
N'afọ 2015, a kpọrọ ya otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri ise kachasị nwee mmetụta na akụ na ụba Ijipt
Na Maachị 2021, Al-Mashat natara onyinye 'Ndị nọ n'ihu n'iweta Mgbanwe' n'oge emume jikọrọ aka nke Embassies nke Mexico, Canada, na Sweden haziri na Cairo

N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2022, Al-Mashat natara ihe nrite maka 'Most Visionary and Outstanding Minister of International Cooperation of 2022 n'Africa', nke George Washington University Institute of African Studies na GE7 Initiative nyere ya na Ọgbakọ ndị ndú mba ụwa ndị nwere ebumnobi ọdịnihu dị mma (World Visionary Leaders'Summit) nke emere na Washington DC
Al-Mashat bụ onye Alakụba ma ọ gara njem ala nsọ mbụ ya na Mecca n'afọ 1997
Rania Salmi (Arabic رانيا السالمي; amụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1998) bụ onye Morocco na agba bọọlụ nke na agba ọsọ maka Atlas 05 na otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco
Salmi agbaala bọọlụ maka Atlas 05 na Morocco
Salmi emeela maka Morocco na ọkwa ndị na-erubeghị afọ-20 na ndị okenye
Ntinye na nsonaazụ depụtara ihe mgbaru ọsọ Morocco nke mbụ
Rano bụ Ógbè Gọọmentị ime Obodo na isi ụlọ ọrụ nke Rano Emirate council na Steeti Kano , Nigeria
Rano bụ mpaghara gọọmentị dị na Steeti Kano nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa n'obodo Rano

Mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo Rano bụ obodo Hausa-Fulani dị na mpaghara ndịda nke Steeti Kano nke a makwaara dị ka mpaghara ndị omeiwu nke Kano South n'akụkụ Albasu, Bebeji, Bunkure, Doguwa, Gaya, Kiru, Takai, Ajingi, Rogo, Kibiya, Tudun Wada, Garko, Wudil na Sumaila
Mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo Rano na-emekwa ka gọọmentị etiti dị n'akụkụ mpaghara gọọmentị mpaghara Bunkure na Kibiya
O nwere mpaghara nke km² narị ise na iri abụọ na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nke otu puku na iri anọ na ise na narị anọ na iri atọ na itoolu na ọnụ ọgụgụ afọ 2006

Obodo gọọmentị dị n'ebe ugwu site na Garun Mallam na Bunkure, n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ site na mpaghara gọọmentị Kibiya, n'akụkụ ndịda site na mpaghara ọchịchị Tudun Wada, na n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ site na ebe gọọmentị ime obodo Bebeji
Kansụl gọọmentị ime obodo Rano na-ahụ maka nchịkwa ọha na eze na mpaghara gọọmentị mpaghara Rano
Onye isi oche bụ onye isi oche nke gọọmentị ime obodo na-eduzi kansụl ahụ
Kansụl iwu Rano na-eme iwu na-achịkwa mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo Rano
Ọ nwere ndị kansụl iri na-anọchite anya ngalaba iri nke mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo
Ngalaba iri dị na mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo Rano bụ Dawaki, Lausu, Madachi, Rano, Rurum Sabon Gari, Rurum Tsohon Gari, Saji, Yalwa, Zinyau, Zurgu
Koodu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ 710101
Ndị agha Kwararrafa guzobere alaeze ahụ n'ụzọ zuru ezu n'afọ 523AD

Dị ka alaeze na-achị onwe ya n'onwe ya, ihe karịrị ndị eze iri anọ chịrị alaeze Rano tupu ọbịbịa nke ọchịchị ndị na-achị achị
Mpaghara nke alaeze Rano n'oge ahụ ekwuru n'elu bụ nke a

Ranti Bam (a mụrụ n'afọ 1978) bụ onye Britain-Nigerian na-ese ihe sitere na London na Lagos nke a maara maka ọrụ ụrọ ya mara mma na ihe ọkpụkpụ nke ejiri usoro ụrọ dị iche iche mee
A mụrụ Ranti Bam na Lagos, Nigeria ma a zụlitere ya na London
O nwetara MA na School of Art, Architecture and Design na London (nke bụbu The Cass), mee njem n'ọtụtụ ebe, ma biri na Gris
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na City Lit, London

Bam ekwuola na ihe gbara ya ume bu na e nwere ike ime nka na ụrọ mgbe ọ gara ihe ngosi Africa Remix na Hayward Gallery na London 'Ọ dị ka mmeghe nke anya nke atọ m,' ọ gwara onye na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ maka Ceramic Review, 'Na nke mbụ m na-ahụ ọrụ ọgbara ọhụrụ nke ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka mere
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị Fine and Applied Arts course na ceramik na City Lit, Bam egosipụtala ọrụ ya na otu na ngosi nke naanị ya na Europe, North America, na Africa]
N'afọ 2017, onye nduzi nke London gallery 50 Golborne, Pascale Revert, kpọrọ Bam ka ọ gosipụta ụrọ ya na UK
Crafts Council's annual Collect exhibition na nke mbụ ya; ọrụ ya gara nke ọma n'ebe ahụ nke e gosipụtara na Collect ruo afọ atọ n'usoro
50 Golborne egosipụtala ọrụ ya n'ụlọ ntu ha na Contemporary African Art Fair na Paris
N'afọ 2018, o sonyere na ihe ngosi otu onye nlekọta Bisi Silva The Gallery of Small Things na Senegal
Bam enweela ebe obibi na Moly-Sabata [fr] na Sablons, France; Catinca Tabacaru Gallery na Harare, Zimbabwe; na Cité Internationale des Arts na Paris, France, ebe ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ n'ime ọrịa COVID-19
A na-edebe ọrụ ya na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke V&A na Brooklyn Museum

Site na omume nka ya na ebe obibi ya, na site n'ịkụzi ọmụmụ ihe na nnọkọ mmekọrịta, ọkachasị ndị ya na ndị otu obodo na-enweghị ikike na ndị na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị, Bam na-aga n'ihu na-enyocha ohere iwu nke ụrọ na akụkụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

Ranya Senhaji (Arabic; amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2002) bụ onye Morocco a mụrụ n'America nke na agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na aga n'ihu maka ndị otu kọleji South Carolina Gamecocks na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco
A zụlitere Senhaji na Tinton Falls, New Jersey na nna Moroccan na nne Amerika
Senhaji gara Monmouth Ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị mpaghara n'obodo ya na Mahadum South Carolina na Columbia, South Carolina
Senhaji mere nnukwu mpụta mbụ ya maka Morocco na 10 June 2021 dị ka nnọchi na 3–0 enyi na enyi meriri Mali
O nyere goolu abụọ mbụ ya na mba ụwa ka ụbọchị anọ gachara megide otu onye iro ya
Raouf Ben Amor (Arabic) (a mụrụ na Disemba 24, 1946 - na Tunis ) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Tunisia
Raouia Rouabhia (amụrụ n'ime June 25, 1978 na Meyrargues, France) bụ onye Algeria na agba bọọlụ volleyball nke mba ụwa lara ezumike nká
Klọb dị ugbu a Venelle Volleyball (France)
Raptors Basketball Academy, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Raptors, bụ otu egwuregwu basketball nke Naijiria nke dị na Lagos
Otu egwuregwu bọọlụ a na-arụ ọrụ na Premier League nke Naịjirịa
Onye nkuzi Charles Ibeziakor guzobere otu ahụ na 2001 dị ka Spiders
N'afọ 2006, ọ gbanwere aha ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Raptors dịka ihe na-arutu aka na Toronto Raptors
N'afọ 2019, Raptors mere nke mbụ ha na Premier League
N'oge izizi ya, Raptors ruru na ngwụcha nke 2019 NBBF President Cup mgbe ha meriri Niger Potters wee ruo na ngwucha egwuregwu ahụ
Na ngwụcha, Rivers Hoopers meriri ndị otu ahụ
Premier League nke Naịjirịa
