Rapulana Seiphemo (a mụrụ na 4 Nọvemba 1967) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme fim
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka Tau Mogale na ihe nkiri ncha ogologo oge Generations na ịga n'ihu ya, Generations The Legacy
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Meadowlands, South Africa
Ọrụ ya malitere laa azụ n'afọ 1989
O nweela ọrụ dị mkpa na How to Steal 2 Million, Tsotsi na ihe nkiri egwuregwu Themba
O si na Generations The Legacy gaa sonye na telenovela Mzansi Magic The Queen na mbido afọ 2020
Rapulana Seiphemo na onye mmekọ azụmahịa ya a ma ama Kenneth Nkosi malitere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe a na-akpọ Stepping Stone Pictures laa azụ n'afọ 2003 nke ha gbara ruo afọ 2015
N'okpuru Stepping Stone Pictures, ha mepụtara ma mee ihe nkiri akpọrọ Paradise Stop
Ha mepụtara usoro ihe nkiri 13 maka SABC 1 nke a na-akpọ Task Force yana ọtụtụ ọdịnaya maka Mzanzi Magic gụnyere Laugh Out Loud (LOL) ma ha nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ a na- bingaka Fumba Academy for Acting
Rapulana Seiphemo lụrụ Olga Ruberio kemgbe afọ 2003
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2016, o nwere ihe mberede ụgbọ ala ma kpọga ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ
Raqiya Haji Dualeh Abdalla (Somali , Arabic) bụ onye Somalia na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
O nwela ọtụtụ ọkwa dị elu na-eme iwu na ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị, ndị na-abụghị gọọmentị na nke mba ụwa, gụnyere dịka osote minista ahụike nke Somalia
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere Somali Women's Democratic Organization (SWDO), na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche na osote onye isi oche nke otu ahụ
Tụkwasị na nke a, Raqiya bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Somali Family Care Network
A mụrụ Raqiya na Somalia
Maka agụmakwụkwọ ya na-esote sekọndrị, ọ nwetara BA
na Social Sciences site na College of Education na Mogadishu
Raqiya nwekwara nzere masta na Public Policy na Women in Development site na Institute of Social Studies nke bụ akụkụ nke Erasmus University Rotterdam nke dị na The Hague, Netherlands
Raqiya bụ onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
O nwela ọtụtụ ọkwa dị elu na-eme iwu na ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị, ndị na-abụghị gọọmentị na nke mba ụwa
Raqiya bụ onye guzobere Somali Women's Democratic Organization (SWDO)
E guzobere ya na afọ 1977, ọ bụ ndị omeiwu mbụ nke ụmụ nwanyị na Somalia
Ọ ga-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye isi oche na osote onye isi oche nke otu ahụ
N'etiti atụmatụ ndị ọzọ, e nyere SWDO iwu itinye n'ọrụ iwu nke Supreme Revolutionary Council na-achị na-amachibido igbu akụkụ ahụ nwanyị
N'ọnọdụ a, Raqiya malitere mkpọsa mbụ na-emegide FGM na Somalia
N'afọ 1979, n'aha SWDO, ọ nọchitere anya Somalia na nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe zuru ụwa ọnụ nke WHO na Khartoum
A họpụtara ya n'otu oge dị ka onye nnọchi anya Somalia na kọmitii ise nke nzukọ ahụ, nke e nyere ọrụ ịmepụta mkpebi na aro gbasara FGM
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Ministry of Culture, Raqiya bipụtara Sisters in Affliction na afọ 1982
Ọ bụ akwụkwọ mbụ gbasara infibulation nke nwanyị Somalia
Ọrụ ahụ nwere mmetụta zuru oke, ọkachasị mgbe e mesịrị sụgharịa ya n'asụsụ Somali nke Abdalla
Site na afo 1983 ruo na afọ 1986, Raqiya bụ onye enyemaka ma ọ bụ osote minista ahụike nke Somalia
Ruo afọ ise, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ mmemme dị elu na UNDP na Sudan
Raqiya mechara bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ maka Immigrant and Refugee Services of America, ụlọ ọrụ afọ ofufo nke mba
N'ebe ahụ, o nwere ogbako mba na ikike ọmụmụ maka ụmụ nwanyị si Somalia na Iraq, ma soro ndị isi obodo rụọ ọrụ
N'afọ 2001, Raqiya guzobere Somali Family Care Network (SFCN) na Washington, DC, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke otu ahụ
SFCN na-enye nkwado teknụzụ maka òtù ndị obodo Somalia na United States
Ọ na-enyekwa enyemaka na nlekọta ahụike n'ozuzu maka ụmụ nwanyị si Horn of Africa

Raquel Naa Ayorkor Ammah (a mụrụ n'abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1987) amaara aha nkwago ihe omume ya dị ka Raquel, bụ onye Ghana na-eti egwu, onye na-ede egwu, onye na-echeputa ma hazie egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye edemede
A maara ya nke ọma maka egwu ya bụ bu 'Sweetio' nke gosipụtara Sarkodie
A mụrụ Raquel na United Kingdom site n'ọmụmụ nne na nna si Ghana
O tolitere na West London ya na nne ya, ụmụnne ya nwoke abụọ na nwanne ya nwanyị
Raquel gara ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ n'ihi na ezinụlọ ya kwahariri n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ugboro ole na ole
Otú ọ dị, ụlọ akwụkwọ kachasị amasị ya ka bụ Hogarth Primary School nke dị na Chiswick, na West Thames College

Raquel batara n'otiti egwu n'afọ 2005 ma kemgbe ahụ, ya na ndị n'eti egwu na mba ụwa dịka Mario, Movado, Young (US) Lloyd (US), Kas (Nigeria), Cabbo Snoop (Angola), Duncan Mighty (Nigeria), Stephanie Benson (UK / Ghana) na akụkọ ka egwu
O wepụtara 'Odo' dị ka egwu ya kachasịnụ n'ọnwa July 2010

Dị ka akụkụ nke ya na ntunye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, Raquel ewepụtala onwe ya ịbụ onye ndụmọdụ maka ọrụ ebere onwe ya n'ime obodo ya n'ime Ghana nke a na-akpọ Christ Humanitarian Foundation (CHF)
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwado ọha na eze maka ntọala ahụ iji nyere ha aka inweta ego kwa afọ
O ritere ihe nrite nke nwanyị nwere nka n'egwu kacha mma nke afọ 2012 bụ Best Female Artist 2012, na YFM All Star Weekend Awards, December, 2012
O nwekwara otu nhọpụta na Hip Hop na RnB Awards 2011
Raquel Prado (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1970) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ọnụ ọgụgụ na Venezuela

Ọ bụ prọfesọ nke ọnụ ọgụgụ na Ụlọ akwụkwọ nke injinia na Jack Baskin nke Mahadum California, Santa Cruz, a họpụtakwara ya dịka onye isi oche nke International Society for Bayesian Analysis maka oge afọ 2019
Prado bụ ọkachamara na Bayesian inference maka data usoro oge
Ya na Mike West, ọ bụ onye dere akwụkwọ Time Series Modeling, Computation, and Inference ( Ederede na Statistical Science, CRC Press, 2010)
A mụrụ Prado na Eprel 24, 1970, na Caracas
Mike West lekọtara akwụkwọ edemede ya, Latent Structure in Non-Stationary Time Series
Mgbe ọ gụchara PhD ọ laghachiri na Mahadum Simón Bolívar dịka onye nkuzi tupu ọ kwaga Santa Cruz

N'afọ 1999, Prado na ndị edemede ya bụ Andrew Krystal na Mike West meriri Ihe nrite Ngwa Statistical pụtara ìhè nke American Statistical Association maka ọrụ ha na nyocha ọnụ ọgụgụ nke data electroencephalography
N'afọ 2013, Prado ghọrọ onye otu nke American Statistical Association

Ụdị dị ụkọ bụ abọm nke iri nke ndị otu egwu egwu na aga n'ihu na Finland bụ Waltari
Egwú niile sitere n'aka Hatakka, okwu sitere n'akwụkwọ Hatakka

Ras Kimono (9 Mee 1958 - 10 Juun 2018) bụ onye egwu reggae nke Naijiria nke abọm mbụ ya bụ Under Pressure, nke otu 'Rum-Bar Stylée' duziri, bụ nnukwu egwu na egwu Naịjirịa n'afọ 1989
Tupu o wepụta abọm ya, ọ nọ na otu a na-akpọ The Jastix ya na Amos McRoy na Majek Fashek

Oseloke Augustine Onwubuya, onye a maara dị ka Ras Kimono amụrụ ya na Ekeleke Elumelu, Delta State, Nigeria, Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka nwa akwụkwọ nke Gbenoba Secondary School Agbor ma mesịa bụrụ onye otu Jastix Reggae Ital, ya na Majek Fashek, Amos McRoy Jegg na Black Rice Osagie
Egwu ya nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu site na ịda ogbenye, enweghị nhata na ihe isi ike ọ hụrụ na mmalite ndụ ya
O weputara abọm izizi ya n'okpuru nrụgide na akara Premier Music n'afọ 1989, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ama ama na kọntinent ozugbo
Abọm ahụ nwere egwu dịka 'Under Pressure', 'Natty Get Jail' na nnukwu egwu 'Rhumba Style'
O mechara wepụta ọtụtụ abọm egwu, na-eme njem n'Africa, mba Europe na United States, na-akwalite ụdị egwu reggae ya
O ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite gụnyere Ihe nrite nke egwu Nigeria, Ihe nrite Egwu ama amaa na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2010, ọ ka na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na-eguzosi ike n'ihe n'afọ ndụ niile ma a ka na-akpọ egwu ya na redio, na West Africa niile
Kimono rụrụ ọrụ ogologo oge dịka onye na amụta egwu na mpaghara egwu Naịjirịa, na-anwale ọtụtụ ụdị, tupu ọ nwee ọganihu na ngwụcha afọ 1980 dị ka onye na-agụ egwu reggae
Ya na otu egwu ndi Massive Dread Reggae

Kimono wepụtara abọm izizi ya, Under Pressure n'afọ 1989, ya na egwu a ma ama, 'Rum-Bar Stylee', nke a kpughere ma mmetụta Jamaica na nke obodo Afrịka (nke ikpeazụ pụtara ìhè na nnyefe 'Patois', dịka Fela Kuti na-arụkarị ọrụ iji kwurịta okwu na ndị obodo mepere emepe)
Okwu esemokwu ya siri ike mepụtara ahịa album nke ihe karịrị otu narị puku, na ndị na-eso ya maka nkwado ya maka mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
What's Gwan gosipụtara ihe ịga nke ọma karị, na isiokwu ndị a họọrọ gụnyere nkwado iwu wii wii, na mkpa ọ dị ndị Afrịka iji ọgụgụ isi chụpụ ọchịchị colonialism na ókèala ya n'etiti ebo
N'ụzọ na-arụrịta ụka, ọ naghị ajụ ịkpọ aha kpọmkwem ndị nọ n'ọchịchị ọ hụrụ dị ka ihe jikọrọ ya na ọchịchị ndị agha azụ
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na 10 June 2018 na Lagos, Nigeria
Ras el hanout maọbụ rass el hanout (Arabic raʾs al-ḥānūt, Arabic pronunciation ) bụ ngwakọta ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ nke a na-ahụ n'ụdị dị iche iche na obodo Tunisia, obodo Algeria, na obodo Morocco
Aha ahụ na asusu Arabic pụtara 'isi ụlọ ahịa' ma na-egosi ngwakọta nke ihe ndị na-esi ísì ụtọ kachasị mma onye na-ere ahịa nwere inye
A na-eji Ras el hanout eme ihe n'ọtụtụ nri na-atọ ụtọ, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-agbanye ya n'anụ maọbụ azụ, maọbụ na-agbakọta ya na couscous, pasta maọbụ osikapa
Enweghị ihe doro anya nke ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na-eme ka ras el hanout
Ụlọ ahịa ọ bụla, ụlọ ọrụ, maọbụ ezinaụlọ nwere ike ịnwe ngwakọta nke ha
Ngwakọta ahụ na-enwekarị ihe karịrị iri na abụọ na-esi ísì ụtọ n'ụdị dị iche iche

Ihe ndị a na-ahụkarị gụnyere cardamom, cumin, clove, cinnamon, nutmeg, mace, allspice, ginger kpọrọ nkụ, chili peppers, mkpụrụ coriander, peppercorn, paprika na-atọ ụtọ ma na-ekpo ọkụ, fenugreek, ya na turmeric kpọrọ nkụ

Ụfọdụ ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ nwere ike ịbụ nke pụrụ iche na mpaghara ahụ, dịka mkpụrụ osisi ash, chufa, mkpụrụ nke paradaịs, mgbọrọgwụ orris, ose nke mọnk, cubebs, rosebud kpọrọ nkụ, mkpụrụ fennel maọbụ aniseed, galangal, ose ogologo
Enwere ike isi ihe ndị a na-etinye n'ọkụ tupu a gwọọ ha maọbụ kụọ ha n'ime ụrọ ma gwakọta ha
Nkwadebe ụfọdụ gụnyere nnu ma ọ bụ shuga, mana nke ahụ abụghị omume a nabatara

A naghị etinye galik, saffron, mkpụrụ osisi maọbụ ahịhịa kpọrọ nkụ, ebe ọ bụ na a na-agbakwunye ha na efere n'otu n'otu, mana ụfọdụ nkwadebe azụmahịa, ọkachasị na Europe na North America, nwere ike ịnwe ha

Ụfọdụ aphrodisiacs a na-eche na ha bụ ndị na-eme ihe ike, ije ndi a gụnyere 'green metallic beetles', cantharides, apụtala n'ọtụtụ usoro Moroccan ras el hanout, mana ndị a yiri ka ha abaghị uru maka ebumnuche ụtọ
A mụrụ Kelej n'afọ 1972 na Alexandria ma nweta nzere na ụlọ ahịa ọgwụ na Mahadum Alexandria
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ọgwụ na 1994 wee sonye na Merck KGaA na 1996
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke Merck Foundation na 2016
Kelej anọwo n'azụ mkpọsa dị ka 'Mgbasa Ozi Karịrị Nne' nke na-enyere aka n'ịkwụsị ihere n'akụkụ amụghị nwa na inye ụmụ nwanyị na-amụghị nwa na ndị na-amụghị nwa na Africa
ma zụọ ndị ọkachamara ọmụmụ na mba dịka Gambia, Sierra Leone, Guinea, Liberia, Chad na Niger na Central African Republic
Mgbasa ozi Kelej na ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ nke mba Africa jikọrọ aka
Burton Rashad 'Ringo' Smith (amụrụ na Septemba 28, 1972) bụ onye America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ hip hop na R&B
A mụrụ ya na England ma zụlite ya na Brooklyn, New York City, United States, n'ezinụlọ Jamaican na Haiti
Rashad tolitere n'akụkụ ndị omenkà hip hop ámá àmà dịka Mos Def, Busta Rhymes, Q-Tip, na ndị ọzọ
Mgbè ọ dị afọ 19, o nyere Main Source, Eric B na Rakim na A Tribe Called Quest
Ọ gara n'ihu n'ime azụmahịa egwu site n'iso Andre Harrell rụọ ọrụ na Uptown Records nke e mepụtara ọhụrụ
Mgbè ọ nọ na Uptown, Rashad zutere ónyé na-akpọ ụbọ akwara Avon Marshell onye ya na ya guzobere Tumblin Dice
Duo ahụ gara n'ihu na-emepụta maka ndị na-ese ihe kachasị na Uptown, gụnyere Mary J
Blige na Jodeci
Tumblin Dice ga-aga n'ihu ịghọ ndị na-emepụta ihe maka Bad Boy Records nke e guzobere na nso nso a, mgbe Sean 'Puffy' Combs rịọrọ Rashad ka ọ sonye na ndị otu mmepụta ya The Hitmen
N'oge a, Rashad mepụtara ihe ndị dị n'elu chaatị
Rashad gàrà n'ihu na chaatị ya na-aga n'ihu mgbe o dechara Busta Rhymes nke mbụ, 'Woo Hah!! Ọ Na-enyocha Gị Nile'
Rashad edeela egwu maka Aaliyah, Fat Joe, MC Lyte, Lil 'Kim, Foxy Brown, Das EFX, Slick Rick, En Vogue, 50 Cent, Erykah Badu, Nicki Minaj, na DJ Khaled na ndị ọzọ
Rasheed Wesley Sulaimon (amụrụ ya na Machị 9, 1994) bụ onye America-Nigeria ọkachamara basketball player maka Konyaspor nke BSL
A họpụtara ya dị ka McDonald's All-American nakwa dị ka Jordan Brand Classik All-American n'afọ 2012
Ọ bụ onye isi na-echekwa n'elu oche maka otu egwuregwu basket bọọlụ ụmụ nwoke Duke Blue Devils n'oge afọ 2014 - 15 tupu a chụpụ ya na Jenụwarị 29, 2015
O mechara kwaga Maryland maka oge kachasị elu ya

Ịnata onyinye sitere na ọtụtụ kọleji na mba ahụ, gụnyere North Carolina, Arizona, Baylor, Texas na Texas A&M, Sulaimon kwadoro Duke na February 10, 2011 n'oge nleta na-akwadoghị, na-edebanye aha na National Letter of Intent na November 9, 2011Àtụ College Athlete Recruit Start
Àtụ College Athlete Recruit Entry
A chụpụrụ Sulaimon na mmemme basketball Duke na Jenụwarị 29, 2015, mgbe ọ pụtara na egwuregwu 90 n'ime oge atọ

Ọ bụ onye ọkpụkpọ mbụ onye nkuzi Mike Krzyzewski chụpụrụ maka ịghara izute ụkpụrụ e debere maka onye ọkpịsị basketball DukeE mechara kpughe na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ boro Sulaimon ebubo maka mwakpo mmekọahụ n'ọnwa ndị bu ụzọ chụpụrụ ya n'ikpeazụ

Sulaimon gafere na Maryland maka oge kachasị elu ya, ebe n'egwuregwu 36, ọ nwetara akara 113 na425 na-agbapụ site na akara atọ, 35 rebounds na 35 nyere aka na nkeji 329 kwa egwuregwu, na-enweta aha nsọpụrụ All-Big Ten n'afọ 2015
Mgbe ọ gachara na 2016 NBA draft, Sulaimon sonyeere Chicago Bulls maka 2016 NBA Summer League
Na Septemba 7, 2016, ọ bịanyere aka na Charlotte Hornets, mana a hapụrụ ya na Ọktoba 22 mgbe ọ pụtara na egwuregwu anọ tupu oge ezumike
Na Ọktoba 31, Greensboro Swarm nke NBA Development League nwetara ya dị ka onye egwuregwu mmekọ nke Hornets
Na Julaị 3, 2020, ọ bịanyere aka na Casademont Zaragoza nke Liga ACB
N'October 8, a chụpụrụ Sulaimon n'etiti izu isii na asatọ ka ọ merụsịrị ụkwụ ya
Na Julaị 1, 2021, ọ bịanyere aka na JL Bourg nke LNB Pro A
Na Julaị 15, 2022, ọ bịnyere aka na Konyaspor nke Turkish Basketbol Süper Ligi (BSL)
A họpụtara Sulaimon maka otu egwuregwu basket bọọlụ nke mba Naịjirịa na Nọvemba 2020, ka ọ turu bọọlụ na AfroBasket 2021 qualification
A manyere ya ịhapụ egwuregwu ahụ n'ihi mmerụ ahụ ụkwụ, Otú ọ dị
Àtụ Konyaspor (basketball) current roster
Rasheeda Buckner-Frost, nke a maara dị ka Rasheeda (mgbe a na- emezi RaSheeda ), bụ onye America rapper, Reality TV cast member and boutique nwe
Rasheeda malitere ọrụ egwu ya dịka onye otu nwanyị hip hop trio Da Kaperz, nke mere onwe ya aha na Atlanta, Georgia na 1998
Na 2000, ọ malitere ọrụ solo ya
Na Machị 27, 2001, o wepụtara album ya Dirty South, site na D-Lo & Motown Records
Album ahụ gosipụtara ngosipụta ndị ọbịa sitere na Pastor Troy, Thugz Nation, Nelly & Re-Re
The album nwetara ụfọdụ notoriety, n'ihi ihe ịga nke ọma nke mbụ ya otu ' Do It '
Unyi South ga-etinye Rasheeda nke ọma na ụdị hip-hop ndịda
Rasheeda gara n'ihu nụchaa ụda ya na album nke abụọ ya, 2002's A Ghetto Dream, ntọhapụ onwe ya n'okpuru akara D-Lo mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Motown Records
Nrọ Ghetto na-egosipụta ukwe ngwa ngwa, iti nwere obi ike na enyemaka Lil'Jon na Eastside Boyz
N'afọ 2004, e gosipụtara Rasheeda na otu ' Vibrate ' nke Petey Pablo na otu Nivea ' Ị masịrị ya dị ka nke ahụ '
Na June 19, 2007, Rasheeda weputara album ya nke anọ, Dat Type of Gurl
Album ahụ nwetara nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma n'ihi ihe ịga nke ọma nke otu mbụ ya na album ' Got That Good (My Bubble Gum) ' nke e gosipụtara na GA Peach
Rasheeda kwughachiri ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ mbụ ya sitere na GA Peach, na ọtụtụ n'ime egwu ochie ya emelitere na remixes na samples
Na 2007, Rasheeda gosipụtara na Mims single ' Dịka Nke a '
N'ihe dị ka oge a, ọ malitere hip hop / R & B duo Peach Candy na onye na-agụ egwú R & B bụ Kandi Burruss
N'oge okpomọkụ nke 2009, D-Lo Entertainment jikọrọ aka na ndekọ ndekọ onwe ya Block Starz Music iji hapụ Rasheeda's debut mixtape Certified
Na August 18, 2009, Rasheeda weputara album ya nke ise Certified Hot Chick
O mechara bido wepụta mixtape usoro egwu Boss Bitch ya

Na June 18, 2012, o wepụtara ya nke isii album Boss Chick Music nke e wepụtara site Google Play na ya labelụ D-Lo Entertainment, na kwalite na nke iri nke Bad Girls Club Atlanta na Ịhụnanya & Hip Hop Atlanta
Akpa mbụ ya na album ahụ bụ 'Marry Me' na nke abụọ ya bụ 'Legs to the Moon' nke abụọ vidiyo egwu sochiri ya
Na 2013, n'oge oge nke abụọ nke Love & Hip Hop Atlanta, Rasheeda gbara vidiyo egwu maka 'Kụta Ya Site na Azụ'
Na 2015, Rasheeda weputara egwu ohuru na oge nke anọ nke Love & Hip Hop Atlanta nke akpọrọ, 'M Meant It', na-akọ na ọba egwu maka egwu nwere ike ịbụ mwepụta ikpeazụ ya
Na 2012, Rasheeda rutere ebe ya na di ya / onye njikwa Kirk Frost na VH1 's Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
Na 2015, Rasheeda nwetara ọrụ ndị ọbịa, nke nwere aha njirimara nke Scrumptious, na nkeji nke atọ nke Fox Rosewood
Ugbu a o nwere ahịrị emebere nke ya, Poiz Cosmetics, yana webụsaịtị uwe na ngwa ngwa, Imbossycom
Ụlọ ahịa ya, Pressed Boutique na Phipp's Plaza na Atlanta, mepere June 2015
Boutique Pressed nke abụọ na Houston mepere na Maachị 2018
Na 1993, mgbe ọ dị afọ 17, Rasheeda lụrụ Kirk Frost nke D-Lo Entertainment, onye ya na ụmụ nwoke abụọ mụrụ na 2000 na 2013
Dị ka usoro mgbe niile na Love & Hip-Hip Atlanta, ọrụ Rasheeda, azụmahịa azụmahịa, na ndụ onwe onye-gụnyere alụmdi na nwunye na Kirk ka edekọtara

Àtụ Infobox football biographyRasheedat Ajibade onye amụrụ na abalị asatọ n'ime ọnwa Disemba n'afo1999 bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa maara egwuregwu bọọlụ na- agbara Avaldsnes IL bọọlụ na Toppserien na otu Nigeria women's national football team
Ajibade nọchitere anya Nigeria na asọmpi oyi ebiri, tupu ịgba asọmpi mbụ ya maka ndị otu egwuregwu na 2018 WAFU Cup na Côte d'Ivoire
Na 2017, a họ́pụ̀tàrà ya dịka otu n'ime mmadụ iri nke ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ na-eto eto kachasị mma na mpaghara Africa site na Goalcom
Ajibade anọchitela anya Naịjirịa n'ogo afọ iri na asaa, ndị na- erubeghi afọ iri abụo nakwa ndị otu egwu bọọlụ sinịọ Ọ nọọrọ-ndị òtù bọọlụ FC Robo n'egwu kemgbe oge Nigeria Women Premier League 2013
Na 2014, edepụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị N'eto eto ụ́kwụ́ na aghọ nko na ngalaba egwuregwu a
N'ọ́nwa Septemba 2018, o meriri n'asọmpi egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa nke ugboro abụọ áchàghị̀ acha

N'ime oge egwuregwu 2015 Nigeria Women Premier League izu nke abụọ, e depụtara aha Ajibade dịka ndị nlereanya nke izu ahụ, nke Soccerladuma South Africa chịkọbara, n'agbanyeghị na Confluence Queens meriri ha n'oge agba egwuregwu a
N'oge 2017 Nigeria Women Premier League, emere Ajibade dịka kaptin ndị otu FC Robo
Ajibade bụ otu n’ime ndị nyere akara ya na mmeri Robos n’ụlọ ha megide ndị Ibom Angels n’oge a

Na 13 Julaị 2017, mgbe ndị ọbịa bịara bụ Rivers Angels merichara ndị òtù ya, Ajibade bụ onye SuperSport hotara iji mee ka ndị otu ya nwee ike iru Super 4, n'ihi ọdịiche dị na ákàrà na ọnụ ọgụgụ egwuregwu ole na ole fọdụrụ
Ajibade meriri ḿbípụ̀tá mbụ nke Nigeria National Freestyle Championship, nke bụ asọmpi iji kwalite onyinye amara ònyé n'egwu bọọlụ
Na 2017, agbanyeghị na Robo esoghị na otu egwuregwu ndị mechara, Ajibade bụ onye bọọlụ elegaara anya nke oge a ka o nyechara goolu asatọ iji zọpụta ndị otu ya
Na Mee 2018, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye kacha mma n'egwu ball na 2017 Nigeria Women Premier League na Nigeria Pitch Awards
Na Disemba 2018, a kọrọ na Ajibade bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ na akụkụ Norwegian, Avaldsnes IL, otu egwuregwu na -agba na Toppserien
N'asọmpi ndị mmeri n'Afrịka, ka ha na-aga asọmpi iko mba ụwa FIFA FIFA U-17 nke afọ 2014, Ajibade nwetara ọkpụ goolu abụọ maka mmeri mbụ Naịjirịa meriri Namibia
ka asọmpi malitere, Ajibade nyere goolu mmeri na egwuregwu mbụ Naịjirịa na China
N’egwuregwu bọọlụ ikpeazụ ha na Mexico, Ajibade nyere goolu na Naịjirịa, mmeri ọkpụ goolu abụọ iji kwalite ndọrọ ndọrọ ịbụ onye mmeri agba nke anọ ha na ndị Spen
A kpọrọ Ajibade na Coach Bala Nikiyu 21-man squad maka 2016 FIFA U-17 Women World Cup, ma yiri jeesi nọmba 10
Na asọmpi a, Ajibade bụ kaptin ndị Naịjirịa, wee gwa FIFAcom na mkpebi nke otu a bụ ime nke ọma karịa agba nke anọ na nke ikpeazụ ha mechara n'afọ 2014
Ajibade sokwa na ndị egwuregwu Naịjirịa na 2016 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup, akpọrọ ya onye nwe-egwu n'otu egwuregwu nke abụọ ha na Canada

N'egwuregwu agba mbụ emere iji chọpụta onye nnọchi anya Afrịka na 2018 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup, Ajibade nwetara ọkpụ goolu abụọ n'asọmpi mbụ ha gbara na Tanzania, nke nyere Naịjirịa ohere ọkpụ goolu atọ tupu agbaa bọọlụ na Dar e Sallam
Na nlọghachite ịgbagharị egwuregwu, nke emere na Ọktoba 2017, Ajibade nyere goolu abụọ nke Naịjirịa ji ọkpụ goolu isii merie ndị be ha
Na 27 Jenụwarị 2018, Ajibade nyere goolu abụọ na mmeri isii nke Nigeria meriri South Africa, mmeri ahụ gosipụtara ntozu Nigeria maka 2018 FIFA U-20 Women World Cup na France

Na February 2018, Ajibade n'akụkụ Joy Jegede, Osarenoma Igbinovia na ndị egwuregwu iri na asatọ ndị ọzọ họpụtara site n'aka onye isi nchịkwa, Thomas Dennerby ka ọ nọchite anya Nigeria na mbipụta mmalite nke WAFU Cup na Côte d'Ivoire
N'egwuregwu bọọlụ nke abụọ n'asọmpi mpaghara ahụ, Ajibade gbaturu ọkpụ atọ butere Naịjirịa na ọkara-ikpeazụ ya na-agba egwuregwu mbụ
Ajibade so na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị mba 2018 Afrịcan Nations Championship Nigeria women's national football team ebe o meriri asọmpi a tinyere ndị otu ahụ
Rashid Diab (Wad Madani, Sudan, 1957) bụ onye Sudan na-ese , onye na-ese foto na onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme
Diab gụrụ akwụkwọ na School of Fine and Applied Arts na Khartoum, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1978 na nsọpụrụ
N'ịbụ onye gọọmentị Spain kwadoro, ọ gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ihe ya na Mahadum Complutense nke Madrid, wee nyefee akwụkwọ edemede PhD ya na nkà ihe ọmụma nke Sudanese Art na 1991
Dika ọ laghachiri azụ na Khartum kemgbe 1999, Diab anọwo na-arụsi ọrụ ike dị ka onye na-ese ihe, onye nkuzi nka na onye nduzi nke ụlọ ọrụ nka nke ya
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ebe ma tinye ya na nchịkọta onwe onye

The Encyclopedia of African History na-akọwa ụdị Diab mara mma dị ka ihe atụ nke ọgbọ nke ndị na-ese ihe na-eso ndị ọsụ ụzọ Sudan dị ka Ibrahim El Salahi nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Khartoum ma 'mepụta ihe mara mma zuru ụwa ọnụ, nke na-ejikọta mmetụta ọdịda anyanwụ, Afrịka, na nke Alakụba ma gosipụta ọdịbendị ọdịbendị n'ọnọdụ ụwa'
O nwere ụmụ ụmụ abụọ otu n'ime ha bụ Juwana na nke ọzọ bụ Jumana nke na-eso
A maara Rashid Lombard (amụrụ n'afọ 1951) dị ka onye na-ese foto jazz na onye na-ede foto ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Lombard bụ onye isi oche nke espAfrika, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ n'ihi ihe omume nke ọ bịdọrọ n'afọ 1997
espAfrika bụ onye na-ahụ banyéré ịme emume Jazz International nke Cape Town, nke a maara na izizi dị ka North Sea Jazz Cape Town
A mụrụ Rashid Lombard na Port Elizabeth, Eastern Cape, South Africa n'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1951
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara Cape Town na mmalite afọ 1960

Lombard zụrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe owuwu ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ na-ese foto maka ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ, Murray na Roberts, tupu ọ ghọọ onye na-ede foto na-ekpuchi Africa, na, karịsịa, South Africa ebe ọ lekwasịrị anya na-ese onyinyo ịrị elu nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Ọrụ ya abụwo akụkụ nke ihe ngosi niile n'ebe ndịda Afrịka, gụnyere Mahadum Zimbabwe n'afọ 1983 na ihe ngosi Staffrider nke afọ 1984 na afọ 1985
N'afọ 1985, ọrụ ya bụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi na akwụkwọ, South Africa The Cordoned Heart, Essays by Twenty South African Photographers, nke Omar Badsha dezigharịrị ma bipụta na New York
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị na-ese ihe na Vukalisa nke na-akwalite ọrụ ọdịbendị obodo
Lombard esewo foto ma ndị egwu obodo na nke mba ụwa, ma lekwasị anya na ndekọ ndị egwu South Africa na-agba ọsọ dị ka Hugh Masekela, Miriam Makeba na Abdullah Ibrahim
N'afọ 2010, o nyere aka n'ihe ngosi ahụ na Duotone Gallery na Cape Town International Jazz Festival nke kwụrụ onye na-egwu saxophon nyéré South Africa, Hugh Masekela
Akwụkwọ foto jazz ya, Jazz Rocks, ka espAfrika na Highbury/Safika Media bipụtara n'afọ 2010
James Matthews, onye na-ede uri na onye edemede South Africa, n'okwu mbido nke akwụkwọ ahụ kwuru na 'Nchịkọta foto Lombard
bụ ode maka ndị egwu jazz nke South AfricaFoto ọ bụla e ji ịhụnanya were na-egosipụta ọmịiko ya na egwu na ndị na-egwu egwu
Dị ka onye na-ese foto echeghị m na Rashid bụ onye na-ekwu eziokwu, ọ na-etinye aka na ndị ọ na-ese maka nke ahụ
Onye na-ese foto ibe ya, George Hallett, dezigharịrị Jazz Rocks, onye n'etiti ndị ọzọ ritere ihe nrite maka foto ya nke Nelson Mandela ma rụọ ọrụ na ọrụ Nobel Peace Centre
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-akọ akụkọ oge site na mmalite afọ 1980 ruo ihe dị ka afọ 2004
Ebumnuche ya bụ ịsọpụrụ ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-agụ egwú nke Lombard rụkọtara ọrụ na ọrụ dị mkpa egwu rụrụ na ọgụ megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
N'okwu nke ya 'N'ime afọ ndị gafeworonụ, m nọrọ ọtụtụ oge n'azụ ikpo okwu nke na ohere dị n'azụ egwu bụ akụkụ nke m
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị egwu m sere foto karịrị nnọọ ihe m na-ekwu maka ya
Ndị na-agụ egwú ghọrọ ndị enyi na ezinụlọ m
Anyị nọrọ ọtụtụ awa na-emeziwanye nkà anyị ma na-akụziri ibe anyị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke nka
Rashidat Odun Sadiq (amụrụ n'abalị atọ nke onwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1981 na Ịbadan ) bụ Nigerian women's basketball player
Ọ egwurịrị egwu na University of Connecticut Huskies nakwa Oklahoma State Cowgirls na United States
Ọ gwurị kwara egwu dika onye otu ndị Nigeria women's national basketball team na-emume 2004 Summer Olympics na 2006 Commonwealth Games
Rashidi Yekini (23 Ọktoba 1963 – 4 Mee 2012) bụ onye ọkachamara na-agba bọọlu na Naijiria na agba bọọlu dị ka onye ọkpọỌ bụ onye kacha nwee goolu na mba ya
Ọrụ ọkachamara ya, nke gafere afọ iri abụọ, jikotara ya na Vitória de Setúbal dị na Portugal, mana ọ gbakwara bọọlu na mba isii ndị ọzọ na-abụghị nke ya

Yekini nyere goolu iri atọ na asaa dịka onye na-agba bọọlụ mba Naịjirịa nke Mba Uwa, ma nọchitekwa anya mba n'asọmpi asaa dị oké mkpa, nke gụnyere iko mba ụwa abụọ ebe o nyere goolu mbụ mba ahụ n'asọmpi ahụ
Akpọrọ ya aha onye na-agba bọọlụ Afịrịka nke afọ n'afọ 1993
A mụrụ Yekini na Kaduna, ma bụrụ onye ala Yoruba

na oge 1993–94 mgbe ọ gbatara goolu 21; mgbasa ozi gara aga ọ gbatara 34 na egwuregwu 32 nke bu ọkà mma na ọrụ ya, iji nyere Sadinos aka ịkwalite site na ngalaba nke abụọ, omume ndị ahụ mere ka ọ nweta aha onye na-agba bọọlu nke afọ n'Afirika otu ugboro, nke mbụ maka mba ahụ
N'oge okpomọkụ n'afọ 1994, Yekini bịanyere aka na ụlọ Klọb Greek Olympiacos, ma ya na ndị otu egwuregwu ya agakọrịtaghi ya wee pụọ n'oge na-adịghị anya

Ọrụ ya alaghachighị azụ n'ezie, ọbụlagodi na mgbe ọ laghachiri na Setúbal nke mere mgbe ihe adịghị mma, na La Liga ma na Sporting de Gijón ; ya na FC Zürich, Club Athlétique Bizertin na Al-Shabab Riyadh rụrụ nke ọma,tupu ya abanye na egwuregwu Afirika
N'afọ 2003, mgbe ọ dị afọ 39, ọ laghachiri n'asọmpi Naijiria ya na Julius Berger FC
Na Eprel n'afọ 2005, Yekini dị afọ 41 lọghachiri azụ, ya na onye òtù mba mbụ Mobi Oparaku na Gateway United FC
N'inye goolu iri atọ na asaa maka Naịjirịa n'ime egwuregwu iri isii na abụọ, Yekini bụ onye na enye goolu nke mba

Ọ bụ onye nke otu ndị sonyere na 1994 (ebe ọ nwetara goolu mbụ Naijiria na Ịkọ Ụwa, ma jiri 3-0 merie Bulgaria, añụrị ya mgbe ọ gbachara, mere ojiri jide ụgbụ goolu na ebe ákwà ghọrọ otu n'ime otutu onyonyo akara ngosi ndị na-eme egwuregwu nke asọmpi ) na Íko Ụwa 1998 nke FIFA
Na mgbakwunye, Yekini nyeere ndị Super Eagles aka merie Iko Mba Afrịka nke 1994 na Tunisia bụ ebe ọ nọkwa bụrụ onye mbụ na chaatị ndị nyere goolu ma bụrụkwa onye ọkpụkpọ kacha mma n'asọmpi ahụ
Ọ sonyekwara na ọkwa Olympic na Seoul 1988
Yekini lụrụ ụmụ nwanyị atọ
Ọ mụtara umua nwanyị atọ, aha ha bu Yemisi, Omoyemi and Damilola
A kọrọ na Yekini rịara ọrịa ogologo oge
N'afọ 2011, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na Naịjirịa malitere ikwuputa ozi gbasara ahụ ike ya dara ada, ma ekwuru na ọ na-arịa ọrịa bipolar, ịda mbà n'obi na ọrịa isi mgbaka ndị ọzọ ekwuputaghị
Ọ nwụrụ na Ibadan na 4 Mee 2012 na obere afọ 48, ndị kwadoro akụkọ a bu ndị otu egwuregwu mba ahụ bụ Mutiu Adepoju na Ike Shorunmu ; e liri ya n'ụlọ ya di na Ira, Kwara State
Ọ nwụnahụrụ nne ya mere agadi, nwanne ya nwoke, ndị nwunye ya na ụmụ ya na ndị ọzọ
Oke dị iche iche nwere oke ọkara, òké nwere ogologo ogologo
A na-ahụ ụdị oke oke n'ime usoro Rodentia niile, mana a na-ahụ oke stereotypical na genus Rattus
Ụdị oke oke ndị ọzọ gụnyere Neotoma (oke oke), Bandicota (oke bandicoot) na Dipodomys (oke kangaroo)￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼
A na-adịkarị iche na òké site na ogo ha
Dị ka ọ na-adịkarị, aha a na-ahụkarị nke nnukwu oke murid ga-agụnye okwu 'rat', ebe aha murid dị obere ga-agụnyere 'mkpụrụ'
Okwu ndị a na-ahụkarị rat na òké abụghị nke a kapịrị ọnụ
E nwere ụdị òké 56 a maara n'ụwa
A na-akpọ òké ndị nwoke bucks; ụmụ nwanyị na-enweghị di, na-eme, ụmụ nwanyị dị ime ma ọ bụ nne na nna, dam; na ụmụ ọhụrụ, ụmụ nwamba ma ọ bụ ụmụ
A na-akpọ otu ìgwè òké dị ka ihe ọjọọ
Ọ bụ meghari emume 1995 ihe nkiri Rattlesnake na- nke Amaka Igwe duziri
Ọ wepụtara ihe nkiri ya na 13 Nọvemba 2020
Ọ natara nlebanya dị iche iche site n'aka ndị nkatọ wee bụrụ nke iri abụọ na anọ n'ozuzu ya na ndepụta nke ihe nkiri Naijiria kacha enweta ego n'oge niile na njedebe nke usoro ihe nkiri ya
A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ihe nkiri Nigeria kacha mma na 2020
Ahanna (Stan Nze), nwa amadi na-ekpebi ịpụnara ndụ ọ na-achọ mgbe niile bu ebum n'obi ya
Ya mere, ọ na-achịkọta otu ìgwè ndị ikom a na-akpọ 'Armadas' nwere nkà dị iche iche, na-eme usoro nke heists dị egwu
Mana ihe na-aga ngwa ngwa na ndị otu ahụ na-ahụ onwe ha na ndị iro ka mma n'akụkụ abụọ
Nke a gosikwara mmekorita nke abụọ n'etiti onye ntụzi Ramsey Nouah na onye na-emepụta ihe Charles Okpaleke mgbe ihe nkiri Naijiria 2019 gachara Living in Bondage Breaking Free
Emere ihe nkiri a na-esochi ihe ịga nke ọma nke Living in Bondage Breaking Free na a mara ọkwa ihe nkiri ahụ dị ka ihe nkiri nke oge a nke 1995 kpochapụwo Rattlesnake
Onye nrụpụta kpughere ọkwa banyere nrụpụta ihe nkiri ahụ na Machị 2020
A na-eche na mbụ na ọ bụ ihe na-esote Rattlesnake mana onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri jụrụ ịkọ nkọ na-ekwu na ọ bụ mmegharị ihe nkiri nke afọ gara aga n'oge a
Play Network Studios kpughere akwụkwọ mmado nlele mbụ nke ihe nkiri ahụ na 1 Septemba 2020 site na Instagram
Ọtụtụ n'ime akụkụ ihe nkiri a bụ ndị a kacha mee na Lagos, Abuja na Capetown, South Africa
Esere ihe nkiri a n'ime naanị izu anọ n'etiti ọrịa COVID-19 na Naịjirịa
Egwu maka ihe nkiri a bụ Larry Gaaga gbara
Edepụtara mkpokọta egwu asatọ maka ọba egwu na-egosi ndị nka A-list Afrobeats
Ndekọ ụda meghere maka nnabata dị oke mma
Emere ihe nkiri a na FilmHouse cinemas dị na Lagos na 11 Nọvemba 2020 tupu ewepụtara ihe nkiri
A tọhapụrụ ya n'ihe nkiri n'abalị 13 nke ọnwa Nọvemba 2020 dabara na ngagharị iwe ịkwụsị ndị SARS na-eme na Naịjirịa megide ndị uwe ojii SARS

Raven B
Varona (amụrụ n'afọ 1990), nke a makwaara dị ka Ravie B, bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto
A maara ya nke ọma maka ije ozi dị ka onye na-ese foto maka Beyoncé na Jay-Z's 2018 On the Run II Tour, nke a họpụtara ya maka onyinye iHeartRadio
A mụrụ Varona ma zụlite ya na Bronx
Ọ bụ onye isi ojii na onye Ịtali
Ọ zụlitere mmasị ya na foto mgbe ọ gachara klas na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ma gaa n'ihu na-ese foto dị ka ihe ntụrụndụ n'oge kọleji
Varona nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Mahadum New York
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji, Varona malitere ịrụ ọrụ oge niile dị ka onye na-anabata ndị ọbịa na ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ụlọ, ma ọ na-arụ ọrụ foto n'akụkụ
N'afọ 2015 ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ya iji chụsoo ọrụ oge niile na foto
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ọ zutere Future site na njikọ ọkachamara ma were ya n'ọrụ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ese foto ndụ ya
Ọ gbara njem Purple Reign ya
Varona anọwo na-ese foto ndị rapa dịka Kanye West, Drake, Rick Ross, Cardi B, na Migos
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Bombay Sapphire
N'afọ 2018, Varona ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese foto maka Beyoncé na Jay-Z's On the Run II Tour
Mgbe o zigara Jay-Z Tweet na-arịọ ka ọ see ya foto, otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta Jay-Z kpọtụrụ ya, nke mere ka e were ya n'ọrụ maka OTRII
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-eme atụmatụ ịmalite ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya n'ọnwa Maachị afọ 2020, ọ na-egbu oge imeghe n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19
O gosipụtara ihe ngosi nka, And The B is For, na ngwụcha afọ 2020
Ka ọ na-erule ọnwa Juun afọ 2021 ọ na-eme atụmatụ mpịakọta nke 2 nke ihe ngosi ahụ
Varona kwuru n'ajụjụ ọnụ na ọ na-enweta mkpali site na ihe nkiri
N'ihe gbasara nka ya, ọ na-achọ 'ịme emume obodo ahụ na ndị mmadụ na ebe ndị kpụrụ ya' site n'ọrụ ya ma na-ese foto nke ọṅụ ugboro ugboro
Lydia T
Blanco nke Forbes kọwara ọrụ ya dị ka 'onye obi ike, nwanyị, na ọdịbendị'
Varona ekwuola banyere ụkọ nke ndị inyom ojii na-ese foto na ọchịchọ ya ije ozi dị ka ihe nlereanya
Varona bi na Bronx

Ravi Shankar KBE (Bengali pronunciation ; Bengali রবি শঙ্chy; a mụrụ Robindro Shaunkor Chowdhury, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-asụ ya dị ka Rabindra Shankar Chowdhuria; n'ụbọchị 7 Eprel 1920 ː 11 Disemba 2012) bụ onye India sitarist na onye na-ede egwu
Onye sitar virtuoso, ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama n'ụwa nke egwu ọdịnala nke North India na ọkara nke abụọ nke narị afọ nke 20, ma nwee mmetụta n'ọtụtụ ndị egwu na India na n'ụwa niile
E nyere Shankar nsọpụrụ kachasị elu nke India, Bharat Ratna, n'afọ 1999
A mụrụ Shankar n'ezinụlọ Brahmin Bengali na India, ọ nọrọ oge ntorobịa ya dị ka onye na-agba egwú na-agagharị India na Europe na ndị na-agba egwu nke nwanne ya nwoke Uday Shankar
Ọ kwụsịrị ịgba egwú n'afọ 1938 iji mụọ egwu sitar n'okpuru onye egwu ụlọ ikpe Allauddin Khan

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1944, Shankar rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede egwu, na-emepụta egwu maka Apu Trilogy nke Satyajit Ray, ọ bụkwa onye nduzi egwu nke All India Radio, New Delhi, site n'afọ 1949 ruo afọ 1956
Rawya Ateya[I] (Arabic, 19 Eprel na afọ 1926 - 9 Mee, na afọ 1997) bụ nwanyị Ijipt nke ghọrọ nwanyị omeiwu mbụ n'ụwa ndị Arab n'afọ 1957
A mụrụ Rawya Ateya na Giza Governorate na 19 Eprel, na afọ 1926
Ọ tolitere n'ezinụlọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Nna ya bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Wafd Party na Gharbia, ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dugara n'ịga mkpọrọ ya
[citation needed] Ateya n'onwe ya sonyere na ngagharị iwe site na nwata, ọ merụkwara ahụ n'oge ngagharị iwe afọ 1939 megide ndị Britain
[cittion needed] Ọ gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya ruo ọkwa dị elu, nke bụ a na-adịghị ahụkebe maka ụmụ agbọghọ Ijipt n'oge ahụ
[citing chọrọ] Ọ nwetara ọtụtụ nzere mahadum n'ọhịa dị iche iche iche n'akụkụ dị iche iche akwụkwọ ozi site na Mahadum Cairo na agụmakwụkwọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ dị mkpirikpi na akwụkwọ akụkọ
N'afọ 1956, Ateya ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ e nyere ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ na Liberation Army
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ukwuu na Agha Suez, n'oge United Kingdom, France na Israel wakporo Ijipt
O nyere aka zụọ ụmụ nwanyị 4,000 na enyemaka mbụ na nọọsụ n'etiti agha ahụ
Ateya nwere ọkwa nke onyeisi na otu ndị agha ụmụ nwanyị
N'oge Agha Ọktọba nke afọ 1973, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Society of Families of Martyrs and Soldiers, nke mere ka a kpọọ ya 'nne nke ndị agha nwụrụ n'ihi okwukwe'
O nwetara ọtụtụ onyinye agha site na steeti Ijipt, ọkachasị baajị nke ndị agha nke atọ, Medallion nke 6 Ọktoba na ihe nrite nke ndị agha
Onye isi ala Gamal Abdel Nasser gbatịkwuru ikike ịtụ vootu na iru eru maka ọrụ a họpụtara ahọpụta nye ụmụ nwanyị Ijipt site na nnabata nke Iwu Iwu 1956
E mere ntuli aka mbụ n'okpuru iwu ọhụrụ n'afọ sochirinụ, na 3 Julaị, na afọ 1957
E nwere naanị ụmụ nwanyị iri na isii n'ọhịa nke ihe karịrị ụmụ akwụkwọ 2,000
Nnyocha echiche e mere n'oge ahụ gosiri na pasent 70 nke ndị ikom Ijipt megidere echiche nke ụmụ nwanyị ịnọdụ oche na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu
Ka o sina dị, Ateya meriri ihe mgbochi ahụ ma nweta votu 110,807 na mpaghara ya
A họpụtara ya na Cairo na agba nke abụọ, ọ kọwara ajọ mbunobi siri ike ọ chere ihu n'oge ahụ site n'ikwu, sị 'Enwetara m iwe maka ịbụ nwanyị
Ma m gwara ha okwu ma chetara ha banyere ndị nwunye onye amụma na ezinụlọ ya ruo mgbe ha gbanwere echiche ha
' [citation needed] Na mgbakwunye na arụmụka okpukpe dị otú ahụ, o jiri ahụmahụ agha ya dị ka akụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Mmeri Ateya dị ịrịba ama karị ebe ọ bụ na onye na-emegide ya na ntuli aka ahụ bụ onye ọka iwu na-akwado ndị Kọmunist na onye na'ụlọ akụ Ahmed Fuad, enyi onwe onye na onye onye isi ala Nasser
Ateya nọ n'oche ya na National Assembly na 14 Julaị, na afọ 1957
Ọ bụ ezie na a họpụtara nwanyị ọzọ (Amina Shukri) na ntuli aka nke afọ 1957, a mara ọkwa mmeri ya na 22 Julaị, si otú a mee ka Ateya bụrụ nwanyị mbụ na-eme omeiwu n'Ijipt na ụwa Arab dum
N'oge ọ nọ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu, Ateya kwadoro ikike ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ siri ọnwụ na mmejuputa ọgwụgwọ maka ndị ọrụ nwanyị, ọkachasị ezumike ịmụ nwa ọnwa abụọ na ụgwọ ọnwa zuru ezu
[citation needed] Na Julaị, na afọ 1958, o wepụtara iwu na-ewepụ ịlụ karịa otu nwanyị
[cittion needed] Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ ndị omeiwu si n'obodo ndị dị ka Cairo na Alexandria kwadoro iwu ahụ, ndị omeiwu na-anọchite anya mpaghara ime obodo megidere iwu ahụ nke ukwuu ma ghara ịgafe
[citing dị ka] Athea ka ndị nta ahụ na-akwado America na-eche na-eleta oge dị ka ndị Arab States nke China, m ka ọ ga-ahụkarị na-akwado-eche na China, [m ga-ahụ China dị ka ọ dị ka ọ gafere'
O kwuru n'ihu ọha na ọ masịrị ya na United States na onye isi ala ya Dwight D
Eisenhower, ọnọdụ nke a wakporo ya
Ka o sina dị, o jisiri ike zere nkatọ ahụ n'ihi nkwado siri ike ya maka Onye isi ala Nasser, onye ọ kọwara dị ka 'mara mma'
Mmeri Ateya nwere n'afọ 1957 adịteghị aka afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ tụfuru mbọ ọ chọrọ ka a họpụta ya ọzọ
Otú ọ dị, ọ nọgidere na-arụsi ọrụ ike, karịsịa na-eje ozi na bọọdụ Red Crescent
Afọ iri abụọ na ise mgbe e meriri ya na ntuli aka, Ateya jisiri ike mee ka ọrụ omeiwu ya dịghachi ndụ
Onye na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu na 1984 n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ nke National Democratic Party
Ọ bụ onye isi nke Population and Family Council maka Giza na afọ 1993
Ateya nwụrụ na afọ 1997 mgbe ọ dị afọ 71
A na-ewere Rawya Ateya dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụmụ nwanyị Ijipt na Arab
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2007, e mere emume na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu Ijipt iji mee emume ncheta afọ iri ise nke mmeri Ateya
Lateefa Al Gaood si Bahrain, onye ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-eme emume ahụ na mpaghara Persian Gulf, yana Nada Haffadh si Bahrain na onye isi nwanyị mbụ nke mba ahụ
Ray Barbee (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 5, n'afọ 1971) bụ onye Amerịka skateboarder, onye na-ese foto, na onye egwu si San Jose, California
Barbee bụ otu n'ime ndị skeetbodas mbụ na-eweta freestyle / flatland aghụghọ n'okporo ámá, oru ollie Nchikota na ọtụtụ enweghị nrubeisi mgbanwe
A maara ya nke ọma maka enweghị nkwenye na ụdị mmiri
Barbee pụtara na vidiyo Powell Peralta Public Domain, Ban This na Propaganda
Barbee na-apụtakwa na egwuregwu vidio Skate 2 na Skate 3 dị ka onye na-egwu skater
N'afọ 1991, Barbee hapụrụ Powell Peralta maka The Firm Skateboards (nke na-adịghịzi), nke onye ọzọ bụ onye agha Powell, Lance Mountain, duziri
Barbee nwere akpụkpọ ụkwụ na Vans
Ndị ọzọ na-akwado ya bụ Independent Truck Company, na WeSC
A makwaara Barbee dị ka onye na-ese foto ma jiri igwefoto analog dị ka Leica M6 na-ese ihe
Onye na-ede egwu na onye na-aku ọtụtụ ngwá egwu, Barbee wepụtara EP mbụ ya na Galaxia Records n'afọ 2003, Triumphant Procession, nchịkọta egwu jazz nke Barbee mepụtara ma mepụta na ụlọ ọrụ ya

N'afọ 2005, a tọhapụrụ ya, In Full View, kwa na Galaxia, gosipụtara ndị ọbịa site n'aka ndị na-akụ ọkpọ Doug Scharin (nke HiM na June nke 44) na Carlos de la Garza (nke bụbu nke Reel Big Fish) yana onye na-akpọ saxophone Glen Darcey
Barbee na-akpọ ụbọ akwara, ụbọ akhara, ụbọ, ụbọ na xylophone
N'ọnwa Machị nke afọ 2007, Barbee dekọrọ na Japan na Mattson 2
Ihe ndekọ ahụ ghọrọ Ray Barbee Meets The Mattson 2, njikọ aka na-ejikọta jinta / ịgba nke Mattson 2 na Ray Barbee na-akpọ jinta ọzọ
Mgbe ọ na-egwuri egwu ọnụ, Ray na-ewere ọrụ bass abụọ / onye ndu (ma na guitar ya) mgbe ụfọdụ n'oge setịpụrụ
A makwaara Barbee maka ọrụ ya na-arụ n'onwe ya site na iji pedal na-egbu oge na igwe ịgba
E gosipụtara egwu ya na NPR ma jiri ya mee ihe n'ọtụtụ vidiyo
Ọ bụ Fender Guitars na-akwado ya

Ray Burse, Jr
(amụrụ Ọktoba 2, 1984 na Prospect, Kentucky ) bụ onye ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama na America
GuyBurse gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị St
Xavier na Louisville, Kentucky, wee gbaa bọọlụ kọleji na Mahadum Ohio State
Ọrụ 162 ya na-echekwa na ihe mgbaru ọsọ 111 megide nkezi (GAA) ahapụla ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eche nche kacha mma nke OSU ruo taa
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, a kpọrọ Burse aha onye America niile na- egwu egwu dị ka onye na- aga n'ihu
Na 2005 Burse na-egwuri egwu maka Chicago Fire Premier na USL Premier Development League, na-agwụcha afọ na 068 GAA dị egwu
Emebere Burse na agba nke atọ nke 2006 MLS Superdraft wee kpọọ na FC Dallas Reserve squad
N'ime oge 2006 maka FC Dallas, Burse emeghị ka ndị otu mbụ malite, mana ọ nọ na-echekwa oge niile
Burse mere mpụta mbụ ọkachamara ya na 1-1 Dallas sere CD Guadalajara na egwuregwu mmeghe nke SuperLiga na Julaị 24, 2007
Ọ mere egwuregwu MLS mbụ ya na mmeri 1-0 megide Colorado Rapids na August 4, 2007
N'afọ 2008, enyere ya ego n'aka Portland Timbers nke USL First Division
Ọ laghachiri na Dallas na June 4, 2008, ka ọ malitesịrị n'egwuregwu iri wee dekọọ mpempe akwụkwọ isii dị ọcha
O mere mmalite ya nke mbụ n'ime abụọ na June 1, 2008 na mmeri 2-1 megide Colorado Rapids
Ray jere ozi dị ka onye mgbaru ọsọ ndabere na egwuregwu 20 oge niile maka FC Dallas n'oge oge MLS 2008

Burse bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta nwa oge na Columbus Crew na February 19, 2011 n'ihi mmerụ ahụ nke ndị na-eche nche abụọ kachasị elu nke otu O mere mmalite abụọ maka Black & Gold na ụkwụ abụọ nke Crew's 2010-2011 CONCACAF Usoro nkeji nkeji nke Champions League megide Real Salt Lake
Na egwuregwu otu na February 22, 2011 na Columbus Crew Stadium, Burse gara n'ihu biputere ihe nkwụsị na 0-0 stalemate
Akpọrọ ya aha onye ọkpụkpọ egwuregwu ahụ site na ntuli aka ozi ederede site n'aka ndị Fans
Na Machị 15, 2011 ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri tọhapụrụ ya
Na Machị 29, 2011 ekwuputara na Puerto Rico Islanders nke North America Soccer League abanyela na Burse maka oge 2011
Oge a gosipụtara na ọ bụ nnukwu nlọghachi maka Burse
Ọ kwadoro agbachitere ndị Island ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ihe mgbaru ọsọ kachasị mma megide nkezi na otu na egwuregwu na-enweghị isi
Ọ bụ ọkpara n'ime ụmụ nwoke atọ nke Raymond Burse
Raymond Lema A'nsi Nzinga (amụrụ na 30 na ọnwa Machị 1946), nke a maara dị ka Ray Lema, bụ onye egwu Congolese (DRC)
Onye na-akpọ piano, onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara, na onye na-ede egwu, ọ biri na France na afọ 1982
A mụrụ Lema na Lufu-Toto, Bas-Congo Province
Dị ka nwatakịrị ọ chọrọ ịbụ onye ụkọchukwu ma na afọ 1957 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu ọ banyere seminarị nke White Fathers (òtù Roman Katọlik nke ndụ ndịozi), ebe a matara nkà ya maka egwu

Ọ malitere ịmụ organ na piano, n'ime akwụkwọ ọdịnala Europe nke gụnyere abụ Gregorian, Mozart na Chopin; egwu izizi ya bụ Beethoven's Moonlight Sonata Ọ hapụrụ seminarị na afọ 1962 wee gaa Mahadum nke Kinshasa, ebe ọ gụrụ kemịkal
Ọ malitere inwe mmasị na egwu a ma ama site na mpụga Afrịka ma mgbe ọ mụtachara ịkpọ ụbọ akwara ọ malitere itinye aka na egwu egwu Kinshasa
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na klọb ma bụrụ onye na-akwado ndị egwu dịka Jimi Hendrix na Eric Clapton
Na mbido afọ 1970, Lema gara gburugburu mba ahụ na-edekọ egwu dị ka onye na-ahụ maka egwu agbụrụ
Na afọ 1974, ọ ghọrọ onye nduzi egwu afọ abụọ nke National Ballet of Zaire
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, ya na ndị otu Tabu Ley Rochereau, Joseph Kabasele na Franco na-egwuri egwu, na 1978 otu nke ya, Ya Tupas, meriri French Maracas d'Or award
Na afọ 1979, Rockefeller Foundation kpọrọ ya na United States, ebe o dekọrọ abọm mbụ ya, Koteja (1982)
Ọ kwagara Europe, biri na 1982 na France
E wepụtara abọm ya bụ Kinshasa-Washington DC-Paris n'afọ 1983
E dekọrọ abọm eletrọniki ya bụ Medecine na London na onye na-emepụta Martin Meissonnier ma gosipụta Tony Allen na egwu 'Peupleyo'
Ihe ndekọ mbụ nke Lema na mbido afọ 1980 bụ maka Celluloid Records, na 1989 ọ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma mba ụwa na-etinye aka na Island Records subsidiary, Mango
Lema aghọwo onye isi na egwu ụwa, na-eme ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ mmemme egwu, ma rụọkwa ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede ihe nkiri
O tinyekwara aka na mmekọrịta mba ụwa dị iche iche

Ọ pụtara dị ka onye na-agụ egwú (ma na-ede egwu na egwu atọ) na album Stewart Copeland nke afọ 1985, The Rhythmatist Ndị ọbịa na album Lema nke 1989 Nangadeef gụnyere Courtney Pine na Mahotella Queens

Na afọ 1992, ọ nọrọ oge na Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire, na-ede ihe nkiri Un Touareg esangest marié avec une pygmée na ndị Cameroon Werewere Liking, ma na afọ ahụ, ya na onye Germany na-akpọ piano Joachim Kuhn rụkọọ ọrụ iji dekọọ Euro African Suites
Na afọ 1997, Lema dekọrọ abọm Bulgarian Voices na ndị ukwe nke Pirin Folk Ensemble, ma dee The Dream of the Gazelle maka ndị Swedish chamber orchestra
Na afọ 2000 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na otu egwu Moroccan Tyour Gnaoua ma wepụta CD Saf
Na afọ 2002, Lema pụtara na egwu akpọrọ 'No Agreement' na Red Hot Organization's tribute album to Fela Kuti, Red Hot and Riot n'akụkụ Res, Tony Allen, Baaba Maal, Positive Black Soul na Archie Shepp
E nyere ya 'Django d'Or' n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2003, na 2013 Charles Cros Grand Prix de la Musique

Raymond Edward Lemek (June 28, 1934 na September 17, na afọ 2005) bụ onye America na-agbachitere bọọlụ na National Football League maka Washington Redskins na Pittsburgh Steelers
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji na Mahadum Notre Dame ebe ọ bụ onyeisi ndị otu 1955

Raychelle Awour Omamo (amụrụ na Julaị 1962) bụ onye ọka iwu Kenya na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-akwado Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Kenya Site na 2020 ruo 2022, ọ bụ onye minista na-ahụ maka mba ofesi Kenya

Omamo gụrụ iwu na Mahadum Kent na Canterbury, UK Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ ukwu na onye na-akwado ụlọ ikpe dị elu maka afọ 27 Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ onye isi oche nke otu Law Society of Kenya site na 2001 ruo 2003 ka ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka onye otu kansụl site n'afọ 1996 ruo 2000 na onye nnọchi anya nwanyị mbụ nwanyị Kenya na France, Portugal, Holy See na Serbia yana onye nnọchite anya na-adịgide adịgide nke Kenya na UNESCO Ọ bụ onye otu Task Force on the Establishment of the Truth Justice and Reconciliation Commission for Kenya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi
N'oge gara aga, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke ndị na-ahụ maka nchekwa ruo afọ asaa na ọchịchị Uhuru Kenyatta, nwanyị mbụ na mba ahụ nwere ọkwa ahụ
Ọ bụ ugbu a osote onye isi oche nke East African Law Society, onye nnọchi anya Kenya na onye nduzi Mo-Consulty Ltd

Chief Raymond Anthony Aleogho Dokpesi (amụrụ na 25 Ọktoba na afọ 1951 - 29 Mee 2023) na Ibadan bụ onye ọchụnta ego mgbasa ozi Naijiria
Nne na nna ya si Agenebode, Edo steeti n'ezinụlọ gụnyere ụmụnne nwanyị isii
Ọ banyere na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Naijiria na ụlọ ọrụ ya DAAR Communications ma guzobe netwọk TV Naijiria Africa Independent Television (AIT)
Ọ bụ onye isi oche kọmitii nhazi nke nzukọ mba People's Democratic Party na afọ 2015
Ka ọ na-erule Maachị, na afọ 2020, ọ ka na-aga ikpe maka ebubo nrụrụ aka
Na Mee, na afọ 2020, Dokpesi ghọrọ onye lanarịrị COVID-19
Dokpesi malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Loyola College Ibadan
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ sonyeere Immaculate Conception College (ICC) obodo Benin ebe ọ bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ nke ụlọ Ozolua Play, otu ịgba egwu / ihe nkiri
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Benin Edo State ma mechaa akwụkwọ ya na Mahadim nke Gdansk, Poland ebe ọ nwetara nzere Doctorate ya na Marine Engineering
Alhaji Bamanga Tukur kwadoro ọmụmụ ya, site na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ruo na mahadum
Na mbido afọ 1990, n'ihi iwu National Broadcasting Commission nke akụkọ ihe mere eme, dị ka Muyiwa Oyinlola (2004) si kwuo, ọ bụ naanị gọmentị na-achịkwa mgbasa ozi Naijiria
Nanị ihe ọmụma sitere na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi gọmentị nwere mere ka o kwe omume
Otú ọ dị, Onye isi ala nke oge ahụ General Ibrahim Babangida, nyere iwu ọzọ nke nyere ohere mgbasa ozi onwe onye na Naịjirịa
Mgbe iwu a gasịrị, ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn nke mbụ na Naịjirịa, Africa Independent Television (AIT)
Dokpesi malitere AIT, ọ bụkwa ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn Satellite mbụ n'Africa
Taa, a na-ewere Dokpesi dị ka onye mgbasa ozi nke Naịjirịa
Ụfọdụ na-akpọkwa ya Ted Turner nke Naịjirịa
Dokpesi abụghị nanị onye ọsụ ụzọ nke mbụ satellite TV kamakwa ụlọ ọrụ redio mbụ nwere onwe ya na Naịjirịa
Dị ka onye nta akụkọ Kolapo si kwuo (2006), Raymond na-azọrọ na AIT setịpụrụ ụkpụrụ maka usoro ụgwọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke Naịjirịa Television Authority ṅomiri
Raymond Dokpesi malitere dị ka onye na-enyere Alhaji Bamaga Tukur aka otu n'ime ndị isi njikwa nke Naịjirịa Ports Authority
Dokpesi rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ gọmentị na Federal Ministry of Transport n'okpuru Alhaji Umaru Dikko na General Garba Wushishi
Njikọ nke Raymond Dokpesi na ndị dị ka Tukurs na Abiola nwụrụ anwụ, mere ka ọmụmụ nke African Ocean Lines (AOL)
Dokpesi (2006) chịkọtara African Ocean Lines; otu n'ime High Chief, Dr
Raymond Dokpesi mbụ azụmaahịa bụ mbụ ụmụ amaala Shipping Line na Africa
E guzobere ya na afọ 1980 ha

Ọ bụ ezie na azụmahịa ahụ adịteghị aka, o nyere aka nke ukwuu na ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri Naijiria ka o nyere aka ịhazi iwu ụgbọ mmiri Naịjirịa iwu nke afo 1986 nke kwuru usoro ịkekọrịta 40 20 20 maka ibu n'etiti mba ndị mepere emepe na ndị na-emepe emepe
Otú ọ dị, dị ka Onye isi dị elu, Dr
Raymond Dokpesi na-arụ ọrụ n'ọhịa ọmụmụ ya; ọ chefughị ịhụnanya mbụ ya, showbiz na ntụrụndụ
Enwere ike ịchọta nke a n'oge mbụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị mgbe ọ bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ nke Ozolua Playhouse, otu dance drama
O kpebiri imezu nrọ ya mgbe o chepụtara echiche nke ịmalite ụlọ ọrụ redio n'oge ọchịchị Ibarahim Babaginda mgbe ikuku dị mma n'ihi mwepụ nke mgbasa ozi na Naịjirịa
N'afọ 1994, ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ redio FM nke Naijiria nke mbụ bụ RayPower
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ malitere Africa Independent Television
Ya mere, dị ka Oyinlola (2005) si kwuo, ọ ghọrọ onye na-eme ihe n'ụwa nke mgbasa ozi Naịjirịa maka ndị dị ka Galaxy TV, Silverbird TV, MBI telivishọn, Rhythm FM na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Africa Independent Television enwetala ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi
Na 20 Septemba, na afọ 2003, Africa Independent Television malitere akara ya na United States
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, a na-enweta AIT na America, Mexico, Caribbean, na Europe-wide na Satellite Hotbird yana mba ndị dị n'ime Africa
Ihe Dokpesi rụzuru gụnyere
Dokpesi nwekwara aka ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Otu n'ime ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mbụ ya bụ dịka onye njikwa mkpọsa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka Alhaji Bamanga Tukur, nke hụrụ Tukur n'ime ụlọ gọmentị Gongola nke oge ahụ
Ọ rụkwara otu ọrụ ahụ n'oge Alharji Adamu Ciroma na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala, na Alharji Bamanga Tukur na-azọrọ ọkwa onye isi obodo n'afọ 1993N'otu aka ahụ n'oge mkpọsa onye isi ala Peter Odili
Dokpesi bụ otu n'ime ndị isi nke Ndịda-Ndida People Assembly (SSPA) otu nzukọ na-achọ ịkwalite ndịda ndịda Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2017, Dokpesi sonyere n'ọkwa onye isi oche nke PDP National mana Uche Secondus meriri ya
Dokpesi enwetala onyinye maka otuto ya n'aha DAAR Communications Plc, a na-enyekwa ya utu aha site n'obodo ya iji kelee nnukwu mbọ ọ na-agba na Naịjirịa
Obodo nna ya nyere ya utu aha abụọ, nke a na-enye naanị ụmụ nwoke kwesịrị ekwesị
Ọ bụ Oghieumua na Ezomo nke Weppa Wanno, Edo Steeti, yana Araba nke Osoroland, Okpe
Dị ka Ojewale (2004), dị ka e kwuru n'oge mmemme Dr

Kwame Nkrumah Leadership Award na Accra, na Foundation for Excellence in Business Practice Geneva Switzerland, a jara Dokpesi mma maka nkwukọrịta Daar ịrị elu n'elu Afrika na onyinye nke ụlọ ọrụ redio na telivishọn nke debere Naịjirịa na map ụwa
Raymond Dokpesi ewuola ụlọ akwụkwọ maka obodo ma nyekwa agụmakwụkwọ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ ga-abanye n'ụlọ akwụkwọ tertiary
N'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2010, e jidere Dokpesi maka ọrụ a na-ebo ya ebubo na ọ bụ bọmbụ ụgbọ ala Abuja
A tọhapụrụ ya mgbe ọ nọrọ awa itoolu n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ma mesịa gbaa ndị uwe ojii nzuzo nke mba ahụ akwụkwọ maka ebubo a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2015, Dokpesi, n'aha pati PDP, rịọrọ mgbaghara n'ihu ọha n'ihi enweghị nchịkwa nke Naịjirịa n'okpuru ọchịchị PDP
'Ekwela ka o mehiere, PDP maara na e nwere njehie e mere n'ụzọ
Anyị kwetara na n'oge ụfọdụ n'oge gara aga, emeela njehie; anyị emezughị atụmanya nke ndị Naijiria
Anyị na-arịọ mgbaghara
Mana ihe gara aga bụ kpọmkwem ihe ọ bụ
Anyị na-akpọ ndị niile na-eguzosi ike n'ihe, ndị na-akwado na ndị na-enwe ọmịiko ka ha soro anyị gaa n'ihu
Ọ katọkwara PDP maka itinye Jonathan Goodluck dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke PDP na ntuli aka Machi, na afọ 2015

Na 9 Disemba, na afọ 2015, Dokpesi na ụlọ ọrụ ya, Daar Holding and Investment Limited, e boro ebubo n'ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke gọọmentị etiti, Abuja na ebubo USD21bn nke a na-ebo ebubo na ọ na-eme ka ego na-apụnara mmadụ ihe

FG kwuru na ego ahụ bụ maka ịzụta ngwá agha maka ndị agha Naijiria iji lụso ndị agha Boko Haram ọgụ, mana Dasuki Sambo, onye ndụmọdụ nchekwa mba n'oge ahụ, kwadoro ya na Dokpesi's Daar Holding and Investment Limited maka ntuli aka onye isi ala Naijiria nke afọ 2015 maka onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan
Ebubo ụlọ ikpe ahụ nke e dere 'FHC/ABJ/CR/380/2015' nke Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) tinyere na ha na-ebo ebubo imebi Iwu Ego, Iwu EFCC na Iwu Ịzụta Ọha
Onye ọka ikpe na-achị isi, Justice Gabriel Kolawole, nyere Maazị Dokpesi mgbapụta ma yigharịa ikpe ahụ ruo 17 Febụwarị, na afọ 2016

Na Maachị 22, na afọ 2019, a laghachiri n'ụlọ mkpọrọ mgbe e jidere ya n'enweghị ihe kpatara ya na Nnamdi Azikiwe Airport dị na Abuja, ebe ọ bịarutere mgbe ọ lọtara site na ọgwụgwọ na Dubai, mana a tọhapụrụ ya n'oge na-adịghị anya
N'ọnwa Nọvemba, na afọ 2019, e nyere ya ikike ịhapụ Naijiria n'ihi ihe gbasara ahụike n'agbanyeghị usoro ikpe na-aga n'ihu
Na Thursday, abalị mbu nke Aprel, na afọ 2021, a tọhapụrụ Raymond Dokpesi na ebubo niile nke ịkwụ ụgwọ site n'aka Ụlọikpe Mkpegharị Ikpe nke Naijiria
N'afọ 2020, a kpọgara Dokpesi na ndị ezinụlọ ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ na Mahadum nke Abuja Teaching Hospital mgbe a chọpụtara na ha nwere COVID-19
A tọhapụrụ Dokpesi na ụmụ ụmụ ya abụọ na Mee 14, na afọ 2020 mgbe ha niile nwalere na ha enweghị COVID-19
N'oge a na-ahapụ ya, Otú ọ dị, nwa Dokpesi Raymond Jr
na ndị ọzọ nọ n'ezinụlọ ka na-anata ọgwụgwọ
Raymond Ekevwo (amuru n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na atọ nke ọnwa Maachị afọ 1999) bu onye egwuregwu ịgba oso Naijiria
Ọ bụkwa onye otu egwuregwu agbagharị agbagharị nke Naijiria nwetara ihe nrite ọlaọcha n'egwuregwu ahụ
Nkà egwuregwu Ekevwo pụtara ìhè kemgbe oge ịgụ akwụkwọ ya
N'afọ 2015, mgbe ọ ka bụ nwata akwụkwọ na High Standard Comprehensive School, Ughelli, ọ gbara akwụkwọ maka immepụta onye mmeri ihe onyonyo eziokwu asọmpi egwuregwu, Ọgba ọsọ nke mbụ
O mechara mee ka ndị ikpe niile na-agbalị ime ka ọ banye n'òtù ha
Ọ tụrụugo mmeri na 100m dị elu na ihe nrite na mbipụta afọ 2016 nke asọmpi ahụ mgbe ọ ka dị obere
Ọ bụrụ onye mmeri nke obere Naijiria na 100 mita na asọmpi afọ 2016 asọmpi ndị ntorobịa na ndị obere nke D K Olukoya jiri ọkaibe kacha mma n'oge ahụ nke 1035
Dị ka onye mmeri nke obere mba, a họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya obodo ahụ na asọmpi 2016 IAAF U20 Mba ụwa
Otú ọ dị, ọ tụfuru asọmpi ahụ n'ihi na ndị otu Naijiria abịaghị n'oge asọmpi ahụ
O sonye na mgba 4 x 100m ya na ndị otu ya bụ Soyemi Abiola, Godwin Ashien na Emmanuel Arowolo mana ọ nọghị rue n'asọmpi nke ikpeazụ
Ekevwo sonyeere Mahadum Oral Roberts maka oge 2017 - 2018 mana ọ nwere obere oge n'ihi mmerụ ahụ
O mechara gafere na Mahadum Florida n'oge okpomọkụ maka oge ọzọ
Otu Ekevwo, Hakim Sani Brown, Grant Holloway na Ryan Clark ghọrọ ndị mmeri 2019 NCAA na mgbagharị 4 x 100m
Ọ ghọrọ onye Naijiria nke ise meriri n'asọmpị egwuregwu Afrịka na 100m N'egwuregwu mba Afrịka nke afọ 2019 na Rabat
Mgbe ọ gbasịrị ọsọ na-enweghị onye meriri ya site na okirikiri, ọ nwetara ọnụọgụgụ dị mmasị 996s iji nweta aha n'ihu Arthur Cisse
Akara a debere ndekọ egwuregwu Afrịka ọhụrụ
O wee jikọta ya na Divine Oduduru, Emmanuel Arowolo na Usheoritse Itsekiri maka mgbagharị 4 x 100 m
Ndị otu ahụ debere nke abụọ n'azụ ndị otu Ghana iji nweta ihe nrite ọlaọcha
