Raymond Ofula bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ nọwo na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri obodo na nke mba ụwa
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri dka To Walk with Lions (1999), Lara Croft Tomb Raider - The Cradle of Life (2003), The White Masai (2005), Winterreise (2006) nakwa The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind (2019)

Ọ pụtakwara na Netflix show Queen Sono Raymond bụkwa onye ọka ikpe nwere nkà na-enyere aka ịmepụta ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nwere nkà na-abịanụ ya na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Naomi Nga'nga na ihe ngosi TV nke Startimes Kenya kpọrọ dịka onye na-esote Ofula lụrụ Anne Ofula ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2008
Raymond Rajaonarivelo (amụrụ n'afọ 1949) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Madagascar
A mụrụ Raymond Rajaonarivelo na Antananarivo na 1949
Ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na Mahadum Montpellier na Mahadụ Paris
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bi na mpụga Paris, ọ laghachiri Madagascar maka ime ihe nkiri
N'afọ ndị 1970 Rajaonarivelo mere ihe nkiri mkpirikpi abụọ nke Malagasy
Ọ bụ ihe nkiri Malagasy mbụ a gosipụtara na Cannes Film Festival, ebe ọ meriri Ihe nrite Audience Award n'afọ 1988
O nwetakwara ihe nrite ndị ọka ikpe na 1989 Taormina Film Fest, na ihe nrite mbụ na 1989 Carthage Film Festival

Raymond Saunders (amụrụ n'afọ 1934) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke a maara màkà ihe osise multimedia ya nke na-enwekarị mmetụta mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nke na-agụnye nchịkọta, eserese, collage na ederede a chọtara
A makwaara Saunders Màkà ntinye ya, ihe ọkpụkpụ, na ọrụ nhazi ya
Saunders nwetara nzèrè Bachelor of Fine Arts na Carnegie Institute of Technology na 1960
Ọ zụrụ na Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts, Mahadum Pennsylvania, na Barnes Foundation tupu ọ gaa n'ihu nweta nzèrè Master of Fine Arts na California College of Arts and Crafts na 1961
Saunders bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Oakland, California
Saunders bụbu prọfesọ nke Painting na California College of the Arts, Oakland, na prọfesụ emeritus na California State University, East Bay, na Hayward, California

Saunders na-arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi dị iche iche, mana a maara ya nke ọma màkà ọrụ nke na-agụnye ihe osise na mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi, mgbe ụfọdụ na-ejikọta ihe ọkpụkpụ (dị ka na Pieces of Visual Thinking, 1987) mana na-ejigide mmekọrịta ya na mkpịsị mgbidi dị larịị na modernism na eserese

Ihe osise Saunders na-egosipụta ihe, ma na-ejikarị collage (karịsịa obere akwụkwọ e bìrì ebi a na-ahụ na ndụ kwa ụbọchị), okwu ndị a na-ede ede (mgbè ụfọdụ a na-agbakwunye ntụaka na ọdịdị n'emeghị ka usoro ihe dị ike

Nke a na-enye echiche nke akụkọ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ọbụna ọrụ ya na-enweghị atụ nke na-eme ka ọ dị iche na ndị na-ese ihe dị ka Robert Rauschenberg, Jim Dine, ma ọ bụ Cy Twombly, nke ya na ya nwèrè njikọ doro anya
N'afọ 1967, Saunders kwupụtara na 'ọcha bụ ụcha'
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, Saunders ajụla echiche ahụ bụ na ndị na-ese ihe ojii na-emepụta ihe a ga-akọwa dị ka 'ihe osise ojii'
N'ọrụ nke ya, ọ gbalịrị ikewapụ ọrụ ya na ihe mgbochi nkè nka na-akpali njirimara, 'Abụ m ónyé na-ese ihe
Ekwenyeghị m na ọrụ nka kwesịrị ịbụ nke a kpaara ókè ma ọ bụ kewaa site na agbụrụ mmadụ

E wezụga ihe osise ya, Saunders bụ ónyé a maara màkà mpempe akwụkwọ ya na ngwụcha afọ 1960 Black is a Color, nke na-arụ ụka megide iji ihe atụ eme ihe nke echiche 'ọcha' na ma ụwa nka na-enweghị atụ na nke echiche na Black Nationalist omenala ederede nke ógè ahụ
Saunders nwèrè nke mbụ ya na New York n'onwe ya n'afọ 1962
O nwèrè otu ihe osise, 'Night Poetry', na Third Philadelphia Arts Festival
Na ngwụcha afọ 1960, ụlọ ngosi Terry Dintenfass nọchitere anya ya n'oge mgbè ụlọ ngosi New York na-egosi ndị ọcha
O gosipụtara na mba ụwa, na-etinye ógè na Paris ma na-egosi na Latin Quarter's Galerie Resche
Ihe ngosi mba ụwa ya gụnyere ebe dị na France, Germany, Switzerland, Denmark, Singapore, Korea, Japan, China
E ji ihe osise ya nke Jack Johnson (1972, ugbu a na Philadelphia Museum of Art) mee ihe dị ka mkpuchi nkè Powell's Black Art and Culture na narị afọ nkè iri abụo
N'afọ 1964, e nyèrè Saunders Rome Prize Fellowship na eserese
E nyèrè ya Guggenheim Fellowship na 1976 na abụọ National Endowment for the Arts Awards nke mbụ na 1977, nke abụọ na 1984
N'afọ 1988 ọ bụ ónyé natara 9th annual Awards na Visual Arts
Saunders haziri Paris Connections na 1992 na San Francisco's Bomani Gallery

Raymond Steth (1917 - 1997), a mụrụ Raymond Ryles, bụ ónyé na-ese ihe osise na Philadelphia nke a maara màkà ihe osise ya na lithographs na ọnọdụ ndị Africa na America n'etiti narị afọ nke 20, mgbe mgbe site na ihe nkiri nke ndụ ime ọbọdọ na ịda ogbenye
Na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru ngalaba eserese nke Works Progress Administration na 1930s na 1940s, nka Steth kpuchiri ọtụtụ isiokwu na mmetụta uche site na ndụ ugbo na-atọ ụtọ na mkpesa na obi nkoropụ
A mụrụ Steth na Norfolk, Virginia na 1917 na Lulu Mann na Charles Ryles, ezinụlọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbo
Ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ ógè n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'otu nnukwu ugbo dị na North Carolina, nke ga-emesị metụta ọrụ nka ya
Rolando Corpus na-ekwu, sị 'Steth zụlitere n'okpukpe n'ime okwukwe Pentikọstal
'Obi nke chọọchị,' ka ọ chetara, 'dị nnọọ ka ha niile dị njikere ịga eluigwe Mgbè ọ kwagara Philadelphia mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, Steth gàrà Central High School afọ abụọ
O mechara rụọ ọrụ na eserese ihe ịrịba ama na ihe nkiri vaudeville
Steth gụrụ akwụkwọ na Philadelphia College of Art site na 1941 ruo 1943, na Barnes Foundation site na 1942 ruo 1944
E jikọtara Steth na American Scene movement, nke gụnyere ndị na-ese ihe WPA na-echegbu onwé ha banyéré isiokwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke oge a

Steth malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ngalaba eserese nke WPA kwadoro Federal Art Project (FAP) na Philadelphia malite na 1938, ebe ọ zutere ma soro Dox Thrash rụkọọ ọrụ, nke a maara màkà ịmepụta ụzọ ọhụrụ nke Carborundum printmaking, bụ ndị kwenyere na enwere ike ịnyefe ọrụ Steth na usoro obibi akwụkwọ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'akụkụ Michael J
Gallagher, John Turner, na Claude Clark, otu ọ ga-egosipụtakarị ọrụ ya
Steth na Clark nwekọrọ otu studio n'oge ha nọ na WPA / FAP
Ya na ndị na-ese ihe, Hubert Mesibov na Samuel Brown mekwara
Mgbe WPA na ọrụ agha gasịrị, Steth gara n'ihu na-etinye aka na nka na ihe kpatara ọbọdọ 'Steth duziri Philographic School of Art, ụlọ ọrụ óbíbí akwụkwọ na ihe osise
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere inyere aka guzobe usoro óbíbí akwụkwọ na Morgan State College na Baltimore, nri, na ịrụ ọrụ màkà Ọfịs Ónyé isi ọbọdọ nke Mmepe Ọbọdọ
Tụkwasị na nke a, ọ sonyeere Fleisher Art Memorial site na 1948 ruo 1954, ma kụzie na Philadelphia College of Art site na 1949 ruo 1951
O mechara bụrụ ónyé bi na Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts
Steth nwụrụ na 1997
Ọrụ Steth dị na nchịkọta nke Metropolitan Museum of Art, Philadelphia Museum of Art
E tinyere ọrụ ya na ngosi 2015 We Speak Black Artists na Philadelphia, 1920s-1970s na Woodmere Art Museum
Raynes Birkbeck (amụrụ n'afọ 1956) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nkè bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Manhattan
Birkbeck bụ onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya nké na-ese, na-ese ọkpụkpụ, na-adọkpụ, ma na-ede uri
A mụrụ Birkbeck na Bronx, NY
O gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Bureau of General Services, New York, Situations, New York; na Safe Gallery, Brooklyn
Willow Glen Films na-emepụta ihe ngosi banyéré Raynes, na ngosipụta ya na Nino Mier Gallery, LA
Raypower bụ otu ụlọ ọrụ redio Naijiria nwere onwe ha na-agbasa ozi n'ọtụtụ obodo na mba niile, gụnyere na 1005 FM frequency site na Abuja na Lagos Steeti
N'ihi mwepụ nke mgbasa ozi na 24 ọgọọst 1992, DAAR Communications Plc, nke Raymond Dokpesi guzobere, tinyere akwụkwọ ma nye ya ikike iji rụọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ redio kwụụrụ onwe ya

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nke malitere ịnwale nnyefe na 15 Disemba 1993 mere akụkọ ihe mere eme na 1 Septemba 1994 mgbe ọ malitere mgbasa ozi azụmahịa site na mmalite nke Raypower 1005 fm na Lagos dị ka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi awa iri abụọ na anọ nke mbụ na Naịjirịa yana ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa akụkọ onwe onye mbụ na mba ahụ
A malitere ụlọ ọrụ Abuja na 1 Jenụwarị afọ 2005

Na Jụn afọ 2019, National Broadcasting Commission mechiri Raypower na ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn nwanne ya nwanyị, Africa Independent Television; Dokpesi, onye mmegide, kwuru na a na-elekwasị anya na ụlọ ọrụ ya ma na-ekwu na ụgwọ ikikere dị oke elu
Kọmitii ahụ kwuru na ọ manyere ha imechi ruo mgbe ebighi ebi n'ihi mmebi nke koodu mgbasa ozi na enweghị ike izute ọrụ ndị ọzọ nye onye nchịkwa
Ọ wepụrụ ọkwa nkwụsị na ngwụcha ọnwa ahụ
Razan Naiem Almoghrabi (Arabic), nke a na-ahụkwa dị ka Razan Naim Moghrabi, bụ onye edemede na onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na Libya
Razan Naiem Almoghrabi gụrụ akwụkwọ ndekọ ego tupu ọ buruzie onye na ede akwụkwọ akụkọ
Almoghrabi anọwo na-ebipụta ọrụ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ Libya kemgbe 1991 ma bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka magazin ọdịnala a na-akpọ Horizons

Ọrụ ya bipụtara gụnyere ọtụtụ nchịkọta akụkọ dị mkpirikpi, n'etiti ha In Exile and Horses Devour the Sea (2002), Texts with a Lost Signature (2006), An In-between Man (2010), na Soul for Sale (2010); akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ (Migration to the Tropic of Capricorn na 2004 na Women of Wind na 2010) na otu mpịakọta nke uri

Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya bụ Women of Wind (Nisa al rih), nke otu onye Moroccan na-eje ozi na Tripoli na-achọ onye na-ebubata ihe iji hazie njem ya na Europe, edepụtara maka Arabic Booker Prize (International Prize for Arabic Fiction) na 2011
N'afọ 2015, e nyere Almoghrabi onyinye Oxfam Novib / PEN maka mbọ ọ na-agba iwetara ndi ode akwukwọ akụkọ mmeri nakwa ndị nta akụkọ na Libya

Almoghrabi haziri nzukọ mbụ nke umunwanyi mere maka inweta ikikere nke ha na afo 2012 ma bịanyekwa aka na ikwupụta idinaotu ụmụ nwanyị nke Syria, na Forum on Women's Rights, Peace and Security na Istanbul
N'afọ 2013 ọ kwuru okwu n'ihu Kọmitii Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu na Ọnọdụ Ụmụ nwanyị banyere ikike ụmụ nwanyị na Libya

Nkwado ụmụ nwanyị ya n'ihu ọha, gụnyere nhọrọ ya ịghara iyi ákwà mkpuchi, emeela ka ọ bụrụ onye ana atụ aka inwu ọnwụ bịakwa bụrụ onye ana ahuta ka onye na ebute ogbaaghara na Okpụkpere Chi, na afo 2013 na ihu ụlọ ya ka agbara ọtụtụ egbe nke ndị gbara egbe a bu ndi otu soja
Anita Alaire Afoke Asuoha (amụrụ na abalị iri abụo na itoolu, n'ọnwa Ọktoba nke afọ 1990) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe ọchị, onye na-agba egwu na onye na-ahụ maka ikuku, nke aha ya bụ Real Warri Pikin
A mụrụ Anita Asuoha ma zụlite ya na Warri, Delta State, Nigeria
Nna ya bụ onye agbụrụ Ijaw si na okpuru ochichi Burutu nke Delta State ebe nne ya bụ onye agbụrụ Urhobo
Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụ isii
Ọ gụrụ Political Science / Public Administration na Mahadum Benson Idahosa na Benin City ma gụsịkwa akwụkwọ na afọ 2012
Ọ lụrụ Maazị Victor Ikechukwu Asuoha n'afọ 2013
N'afọ 2008, ọ zọrọ asọmpi ịgba egwu 'Glo Rock ‘N' Rule' wee merie bụrụ onye mbụ
A kpọrọ ya onye nnọchi anya Globacom n'afọ 2009
N'afọ 2011, ọ gara nyocha na 'The Maltina Dance All family competition' wee bụrụ onye nke abụọ ya na ezinụlọ ya
O meela ihe nkiri dị ka onye na-eme ihe ọchị n'ọtụtụ ihe omume na Naịjirịa gụnyere Warri ọzọ, Akpororo vs akpororo Nwoke nọ na ọkụ, na ihe ngosi AY
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe omume n'ọtụtụ ihe omume na mba ahụ
Aha Anita Asuoha bụ 'Real Warri Pikin'
O nwoputarau
usoro ya akpọrọ 'School of Thought'
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ikuku na ihe ngosi akpọrọ 'Real Talk With Real Warri Pikin na Max 909 FM Radio Station Abuja

Onye edemede, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, MC,Host,influencer,Content creator Ọ kwadoro nnukwu ihe ngosi ọchị na Wana abalị nke mbụ na ọnwa ọgust nke afọ ust 2aha ya bụ led REAL WARRI PIKIN UNFILTEỌshe malitere akara uwe ya n'oge na-adịbeghị anya https //realwarripikinmerchcom/
Real (n'ọtụtụ réis) bụ bu ego nke obodo Portuguese Cape Verde ruo n'afọ 1914
Ọ bụ otu ihe dika Portuguese real
A na-eji mkpụrụ ego Portuguese eme ihe mana Banco Nacional Ultramarino wepụtara akwụkwọ ego maka Cape Verde malite na 1865
E ji escudo Cape Verdean dochie anya real, na ọnụego nke 1000 réis = 1 escudo
N'afọ 1865, e tinyere akwụkwọ ego Portuguese maka iji ya mee ego na Cape Verde
N'afọ 1897, e webatara akwụkwọ ego nke Cape Verde, na okpukpu nke 1000, 2500 na 5000 réis
Akwụkwọ ego maka 10,000, 20,000 na 50,000 réis sochiri n'afọ 1909
Rebecca Amuge Otengo bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ka ọ na-erule 2017, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya Uganda na Ethiopia na Djibouti na-ebi na Addis Ababa
Ọnọdụ a mekwara ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Uganda na African Union (AU), Intergovernmental Authority on Development (IGAD) yana UNECA Ọ bụbu Minista Steeti maka Northern Uganda na Cabinet nke Uganda
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 27 Mee 2011
Rebecca Amuge bụ onye omeiwu a họpụtara dịka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Alebtong District
A mụrụ Rebecca Amuge na 26 Eprel 1966 na mpaghara Lango, na Northern Uganda
Ọ gara St
Katherine Girls' Secondary School maka ọmụmụ O-Level ya, tupu ọ gaa Dr
Obote College na Lira, maka agụmakwụkwọ A-Level
N'afọ 1990, ọ nwetara diplọma na Business Studies site n'ihe a maara dị ka Uganda College of Commerce, mana a maara ya ugbu a dị ka Makerere University Business School
N'afọ 2008, ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Human Resource Management na Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ochie na Uganda
N'otu afọ ahụ, e nyere ya asambodo na Iwu Nchịkwa site na Law Development Centre
N'afọ 2010, Mahadum Makerere nyere ya nzere Master of Science na Human Resources Management
Amuge Otengo malitere ọrụ ya na 1991 dị ka onye njikwa / onye nkuzi na Sun-Set Group, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo 1993
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ndị ọrụ na Church of Uganda provincial project na Jinja, site na 1993 rụọ 1995
N'agbata afọ 1996 na afọ 2001 ọ bụ onye nhazi ọrụ na Church of Uganda, Lango Diocese
Site na 2002 ruo 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Gọọmentị Obodo Lango
N'afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya ụmụ nwanyị na Lira District, na-eje ozi site n'afọ 2006 ruo n'afọ 2011
N'afọ 2011, ọ gbara ọsọ maka oche ndị omeiwu nke onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka mpaghara Alebtong nke e mepụtara ọhụrụ ma họpụta ya
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke steeti maka Northern Uganda; ọ nọchiri David Wakinona, onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta nke steeti na-ahụ maka azụmahịa na ihe ochie
Rebecca Amuge Otengo bụ nne lụrụ di
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement
Rebecca Bell (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1953) bụ ọkachamara na agụmakwụkwọ gburugburu ebe obibi si Maryland, United States
Bell bụ onye ndu n'iweta ihe gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi na usoro ọmụmụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze Maryland wee sọpụrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi sayensị nke afọ Maryland Middle School
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka mmemme onye nkuzi n'oké osimiri nke National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration nke ya na ndị sayensị na-arụkọ ọrụ iji nyochaa mgbanwe na gburugburu ebe obibi
N'afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Delaware II, na-akwado NOAA na nyocha ha gbasara usoro okike ogologo oge
Bell na-ejekwa ozi na Gọvanọ Maryland Martin O'Malley's Climate Change Commission
N'afọ 2009, a họpụtara ya dị ka Women's History Month Honoree site na National Women's Story Project
Rebecca J
Cole ( Maachị 16, 1846 – Ọgọst 14, 1922) bụ dibịa bekee, onye hibere ọgbakọ na onye na-eme mgbanwe mmekọrịta
Na afo 1867, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị Africa-America nke abụọ ghọrọ dọkịta na United States, mgbe Rebecca Lee Crumpler gasịrị afọ atọ gara aga
A mụrụ Cole na Philadelphia na March 16, afo 1846, otu n'ime ụmụaka ise
N'ime ndụ ya niile o chere ihe mgbochi agbụrụ na nwoke na nwanyị ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ahụike ya, ọzụzụ na ụlọ ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị niile nke ọgbọ mbụ nke ụmụ nwanyị dibịa gụsịrị akwụkwọ na-elekọta
Cole gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Institute for Colored Youth ebe usoro ọmụmụ gụnyere Latin, Greek na mgbakọ na mwepụ, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afo 1863
Ọ gara n'ihu gụchaa na Women's Medical College of Pennsylvania na afo 1867, n'okpuru nlekọta nke Ann Preston, nwanyị mbụ ghọrọ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike ụmụ nwanyị tọrọ ntọala site na Quaker abolitionists na ndị na-eme mgbanwe iwe na afo 1850
Na mbụ aha ya bụ Female Medical College of Pennsylvania, ọ bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mbụ nyere ụmụ nwanyị ọzụzụ ọzụzụ ahụike na njedebe nke MD
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Cole gụsịrị akwụkwọ bụ aha Anya na ihe mgbakwunye ya
N'ime afọ agadi ya, Cole na ụmụ akwụkwọ ibe ya bụ Odelia Blinn na Martha E
Hutchings biri

Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri atọ ka e mesịrị Blinn dere otu akụkọ na-akọwa otú ịgafe 'akara agba' na Philadelphia fọrọ nke nta ka ọ ghara imebi ọmụmụ ihe Cole na kọleji na atụmatụ ya maka ọrụ ahụike

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Cole batara na Elizabeth Blackwell 's New York Infirmary maka ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka nwere nsogbu ebe e kenyere ya ọrụ nke ịbanye n'ụlọ ezumike iji kuziere nlekọta ịmụ nwa na ịdị ọcha nye ụmụ nwanyị
Cole gara n'ihu na-eme ọgwụ obere oge na South Carolina tupu ọ laghachi Philadelphia
Na afo 1873 Cole mepere ebe ndekọ aha ụmụ nwanyị na Dr
Charlotte Abbey nke nyere ndị inyom na ụmụaka ndị dara ogbenye ọrụ ahụike na iwu
Cole rụrụ ọgwụ ruo afọ iri ise
Na afo 2015, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye Innovators Walk of Fame honoree site na Mahadum City Science Center, Philadelphia
Cole nwụrụ na August 14 ,afo 1922 mgbe ọ dị afọ 76
E liri ya n'ebe a na- eli ozu Eden na Collingdale, Pennsylvania
Ole na ole ndekọ ma ọ bụ foto ya dị ndụ
Rebecca Ann Heineman bụ onye America na-emepụta egwuregwu vidio na onye mmemme
Heineman bụ onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ egwuregwu vidio Interplay Productions, Logicware, Contraband Entertainment, na Olde Sküül
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Olde Sküül kemgbe afọ 2013
A mụrụ Rebecca Ann Heineman (onye amụrụ William Salvador Heineman) ma zụlite ya na Whittier, California
Mgbe ọ dị obere, ọ pụghị ịzụta egwuregwu maka Atari 2600 ya, ya mere ọ kụziiri onwe ya otu esi edepụtaghachi cartridges ma wuo onwe ya nnukwu nchịkọta egwuregwu vidio
N'ikpeazụ, ọ bịara nwee obi ụtọ na ọ na-edepụtaghachi egwuregwu ma gbanwee koodu njikwa iji ghọta otú e si eme egwuregwu ahụ
N'afọ 1980, Heineman na enyi ya gara Los Angeles iji sọọ mpi na ngalaba mpaghara nke asọmpi Space Invaders nke mba
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ tụghị anya na ọ ga-ada n'okpuru ndị 100 kachasị asọmpi, ọ meriri asọmpi ahụ
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ọ merikwara asọmpi ahụ na New York
N'ihi ya, a na-ewere Heineman dị ka onye mmeri mbụ nke asọmpi egwuregwu vidio nke mba
Mgbe o meriri asọmpi ahụ, e nyere Heineman ọrụ edemede maka magazin Electronic Games kwa ọnwa na ọrụ ndụmọdụ maka akwụkwọ a na-akpọ How to Master Video Games
N'oge a, ọ gwara otu onye na-ebipụta magazin na ọ mepụtara koodu Atari 2600, onye na- ebipụta ya haziri nzukọ n'etiti Heineman na ndị nwe onye na-emepụta egwuregwu Avalon Hill
Ka ọ na-ezute ha, e were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye mmemme ozugbo
Heineman, onye dị afọ iri na isii n'oge ahụ, kwagara gafee US maka ọrụ ọhụrụ ya, na-akagbu atụmatụ ya inweta diplọma ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Na Avalon Hill, Heineman mepụtara akwụkwọ ntuziaka maka ndị otu mmemme ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, injin egwuregwu nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Heineman laghachiri California ịrụ ọrụ maka onye mmepe ọzọ, Boone Corporation

Maka Boone, ọ haziri egwuregwu Chuck Norris Superkicks na Robin Hood, na-enweta ihe ọmụma nke mmemme maka Commodore 64, Apple II, VIC-20 na IBM PCs, nke ngwaike egwuregwu vidio, yana imewe egwuregwu vidio
Boone kwụsịrị ọrụ na 1983, ya mere Heineman sonyeere Brian Fargo, Jay Patel na Troy Worrell, na mmadụ anọ ahụ guzobere Interplay Productions (nke e mechara mara dị ka Interplay Entertainment)
Heineman rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndu mmemme maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, na-arụ ọrụ na Wasteland, The Bard's Tale, Out of This World, na Mac OS na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri 3DO nke Wolfenstein 3D
Heineman gara n'ihu mepụta The Bard's Tale III Thief of Fate, Dragon Wars, Tass Times in Tonetown, Borrowed Time, Mindshadow na The Tracer Sanction, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, maka Interplay

Ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ toro ruo ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ 500, Heineman, na-achọ ịlaghachi na mgbọrọgwụ ya, hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1995 wee soro guzobe Logicware, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi teknụzụ na onye isi mmemme
Ewezuga egwuregwu mbụ, Heineman lekọtara ọrụ porting nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, nke gụnyere Out of This World, Shattered Steel, Jazz Jackrabbit 2 na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Mac OS nke Half-Life
N'afọ 1999, Heineman guzobere Contraband Entertainment, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ya
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mepụtara ọtụtụ egwuregwu mbụ n'akụkụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri na nyiwe dị iche iche maka ndị mmepe ndị ọzọ
Ọrụ ndị Heineman duziri gụnyere Myth III The Wolf Age na Activision Anthology, na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Mac OS maka Aliens vs
Predator, Baldur's Gate II na Heroes of Might and Magic IV

N'oge a, ọ nyekwara ọrụ ndụmọdụ kpọmkwem maka ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'Senior Engineer III' maka Electronic Arts, koodu engine maka Barking Lizards Technologies na Ubisoft, koodu kachasị mma maka Sensory Sweep Studios, rụrụ ọrụ dị Ka onye isi na-emepụta ngwanrọ maka Bloomberg LP
na Amazon, nyere ọzụzụ na mmepe Xbox 360 maka ụlọ ọrụ mmepe Microsoft, ma rụọ ọrụ na koodu kernel maka PlayStation Portable na PlayStation 4 na Sony
N'oge ọ nọ na Amazon, Heineman bụ, na mgbakwunye na ọrụ teknụzụ ya, 'Transgender Chair' nke otu LGBTQ+ nke Amazon, nke a maara dị ka Glamazon
E wepụrụ iwu na 2013, Heineman guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ, Olde Sküül, ya na Jennell Jaquays, Maurine Starkey, na Susan Manley
Na Olde Sküül, Heineman na-arụ ọrụ dị ka CEO
N'ihe dị ka afọ 2003, a chọpụtara na Heineman nwere dysphoria nwoke na nwanyị ma malite ịkwaga ibi ndụ dị ka nwanyị
Ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Rebecca Ann
Kemgbe mgbanwe ahụ, Heineman anọwo na-ebi ndụ dị ka nwanyị na-edina nwoke
O nwere ụmụ ise ma lụọ Jennell Jaquays
Heineman bi na El Cerrito, California, ebe ụlọ ọrụ ya Olde Sküül dị
Heineman bụ akụkụ nke bọọdụ ndụmọdụ nke Video Game History Museum kemgbe 2011, ọ bụkwa akụkụ nke bọmbụ ndị nduzi nke LGBTQ + GLAAD
A maara Heineman dị ka onye mmeri mbụ nke asọmpi egwuregwu vidio nke mba maka mmeri nke 1980 National Space Invaders Championship
Sailor Ranko, ihe na-atọ ọchị nke dabeere na Sailor Moon nke Heineman dabeere na ọrụ mbụ nke Duncan Zillman dere, enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye
Ọ gbakwara mbọ iru eru maka Fortnite World Cup
N'afọ 2017, ọ ghọrọ onye a nabatara maka International Video Game Hall of Fame
Àtụ Bard's Tale series

Rebecca Joshua Okwaci bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Sudan, na Minista nke Telecommunications na Postal Services na Gọọmentị nke Republic of South Sudan Ọ bụ 'onye na-eme mkpọsa udo na onye na-akwado ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị na udo', ọ bụkwa onye guzobere ọtụtụ òtù ụmụ nwanyị Sudanese, South Sudanese ma ọ bụ pan-African, gụnyere ịbụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Women Action for Development
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2013, Jess Mathias nke The Guardian kọwara ya dị ka onye kwesịrị ekwesị maka ụmụ agbọghọ karịa ụmụ nwanyị a na-efe ofufe dịka Rihanna na Beyoncé
Okwaci nwetara nzere bachelọ na asụsụ Bekee, akwụkwọ, na ntụgharị site na Mahadum Alexandria nke Egypt, soro nzere masta na mmepe nkwukọrịta site na Machị Daystar nke Kenya

Okwaci, n'oge agha obodo nke abụọ nke Sudan na 1986, sonyeere ndị Sudan People's Liberation Movement nke e guzobere ọhụrụ wee malite ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ maka Redio SPLA, ebe a maara ya dị ka 'olu nke mgbanwe'
Na Jenụwarị 2015, Okwaci bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ya na onye Kenya ibe ya Fred Matiangi iji tinye eriri fiber optic 600 kilomita n'akụkụ ụzọ Juba-Nadapal-Eldoret
Okwaci duziri ndị nnọchi anya South Sudan, ma kwuo na eriri a ga-eme ka njikọ South Sudan na ụwa ndị ọzọ dịkwuo mma, ọ ga-emekwa ka mmepe, mepụta ohere ọrụ, ma weta udo na nkwụsi ike
A na-atụ anya na a ga-arụcha eriri ahụ tupu ụbọchị a tụrụ anya na a rụchara ya na 2022
Okwaci bụ onye guzobere ọtụtụ òtù, Sudanese Women Association, nke dị na Nairobi, Sudanese women Voice for Peace, na Sudanese Women Empowerment for Peace
Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Women Action for Development (WAD)
Rebecca Alitwala Kadaga (amụrụ na 24 Mee 1956) bụ onye ọka iwu na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda nke jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda site na 19 Mee 2011 ruo 21 Mee 2021
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka osote praịm minista mbụ nke Uganda
Ọ na-eje ozi n'otu oge ahụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara obodo East African, na Cabinet nke Uganda
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda
Ọ nọchiri Edward Ssekandi, onye jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche site na 2001 ruo 2011
Ọ bụkwa onye omeiwu (MP) ugbu a maka mpaghara ụmụ nwanyị nke Kamuli District, mpaghara Busoga, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya kemgbe 1989
A mụrụ ya na Kamuli District, Eastern Uganda, na 24 Mee 1956
Rebecca Kadaga gara kọleji Namasagali maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu na Mahadum Makerere, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Laws (LLB), na 1978
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta diplọma na Legal Practice site na Law Development Center na Kampala na 1979
N'afọ 2000, ọ nwetara diplọma na Iwu Ụmụ nwanyị na Mahadum Zimbabwe
N'afọ 2003, ọ nwetara nzere Master of Arts (MA), ọkachamara na Iwu Ụmụ nwanyị, site na Mahadum Zimbabwe
N'afọ 2019, Mahadum Nkumba, mahadum onwe onye dị na Uganda, nyere Kadaga nzere Doctor of Laws
N'agbata afọ 1984 na afọ 1988, ọ nọ na-arụ ọrụ iwu onwe onye
Site na 1989 ruo 1996, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu maka Kamuli District na District Woman's Constituency
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke Kansụl Mahadum maka Mahadum Mbarara, n'etiti afọ 1993 na 1996
N'afọ 1996, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke East African Women Parliamentarians Association
Site na 1996 ruo 1998, Rebecca Kadaga bụ Minista nke Mba Uganda maka imekọ ihe ọnụ mpaghara (Africa na Middle East)
Site na 1998 ruo 1999, ọ bụ Minista nke Steeti maka nkwukọrịta na ụgbọ elu, ma site na 1999 ruo 2000, ọ bụ Minisita nke Mmekọrịta Ndị omeiwu
A họpụtara ya dị ka osote onye isi oche nke ụlọ omebe iwu n'afọ 2001, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya ruo na 19 Mee 2011, mgbe a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche
Mgbe ntuli aka nke onwa February na afọ 2016 gasịrị, a họpụtara Kadaga ọzọ dị ka onye isi oche nke ndị omeiwu na 19 Mee na afọ 2016
Na onwa Disemba na ogugu 20, 2017, Kadaga duziri ndị omeiwu Uganda ka ọ na-eme mgbanwe na Iwu Iwu nke, n'etiti usoro ndị ọzọ, wepụrụ ihe achọrọ na ndị na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala erubeghị afọ 75
Mgbanwe ahụ nyere Museveni ohere ịzọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Uganda maka oge nke isii ya n'ọchịchị
Na 14 Jenụwarị 2021, a họpụtara Kadaga ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị maka mpaghara Kamuli
N'ihi ya, ọ malitere mkpọsa iji nọgide n'ọkwa ya dị ka onye isi oche nke ụlọ omebe iwu maka oge nke atọ
Kadaga tụfuru onye isi oche Vote n'aka onye osote ya bụ Jacob Oulanyah mgbe ọ nwụsịrị ihu ọma na pati ya, National Resistance Movement (NRM)
E wezụga ọrụ ya dị ka ọkà okwu nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu Ugandan, ọ nọdụrụ na kọmitii ndị omeiwu na-esonụ
Kadaga kwere nkwa na ọ ga-eme ka iwu Uganda Anti-Homosexuality Bill gafee ndị omeiwu na onwa Disemba nke afọ 2012
Iwu a na-akpọ mgbe ụfọdụ 'Kill the Gays bill' n'otu oge chọrọ ime ka omume ndina ụdị onwe bụrụ nke a ga-ata ahụhụ site na ọnwụ ma ọ bụ mkpọrọ ndụ mana e mechara wepụ nhọrọ ntaramahụhụ ọnwụ na iwu ahụ
Ọ na-ekwu na ọ ga-aghọ iwu ebe ọ bụ na ọtụtụ ndị Uganda 'na-achọ ya'
N'ọnwa Disemba na afọ 2012, Kadaga nọ na Rom iji kwuo okwu na nnọkọ nke asaa nke ndị omeiwu maka ụlọ ikpe mpụ mba ụwa na iwu iwu

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe akụkọ ahụ pụtara, ọnụ na-ekwuchitere Vatican bụ Father Federico Lombardi wepụtara nkwupụta nke kwuru, sị Mmekọrịta ya na ndị nnọchiteanya ahụ abụghị ihe a na-ahụkarị, ọ dịghịkwa ngọzi e nyere
Ìgwè ndị omebe iwu nke Uganda kelere Popu dị ka ndị ọzọ ọ bụla na-aga nzukọ na Popu na nke a apụtaghị na ọ bụ ihe ịrịba ama doro anya nke nkwenye nke omume ma ọ bụ atụmatụ ya
N'ọnwa Machị na afọ 2020, n'oge ọrịa COVID-19, Kadaga tweeted na a chọpụtala 'mgbasa, nke na-egbu nje Corona ozugbo' ma ga-arụkọ ọrụ na Uganda

O nyere echiche na ihe e mesịrị ghọta dị ka ihe na-eme ka ọ dị ọcha bụ ọgwụgwọ maka COVID-19 n'ezie ma nweta mmeghachi omume dị ukwuu site n'aka ndị Uganda na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta na ndị ọkachamara na ngalaba ahụike dị ka Uganda Medical Association, na Pharmaceutical Society of Uganda
Ọ zaghachiri site n'ịkpọ ndị otu Association ụbụrụ na-enweghị isi

N'ọnwa Eprel na afọ 2020, n'oge ọrịa COVID-19, Kadaga na ndị otu ndị omeiwu ibe ya nyere onwe ha ihe karịrị ijeri shillings 10 nke Uganda nke ihe a chọrọ ịbụ ego enyemaka maka mbọ ịlụso ọrịa a ọgụ na nsogbu mmekọrịta na akụ na ụba ya

Rebecca Kalu (amụrụ 12 June 1990) nọchitere anya otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria n'okpuru-20 dị ka onye ọkpọ egwuregwu na 2008 na 2010 FIFA U-20 iko mba ụwa, ma nọ na ndị Nigeria maka asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke 2011 FIFA
Ọ pụtaghị n'asọmpi ahụ
Na ọkwa klọb, ọ gbara Piteå IF na 2009 na Sweden
Àtụ Nigeria squad 2011 FIFA Women's World Cup
Batsogile Lovederia ' Rebecca ' Malope (amuru ka ọnwa juune dị mkpụrụ Ụbọchị iri atọ n'afọ 1968 ) bu onye ukwe ozioma nke South Africa
A maara ya dị ka 'The African Queen of Gospel' Ọrụ egwu ya karịrị afọ iri atọ
Ọ rere opekata mpe ọbá nde iri n'ụwa niile, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ozi ọma kacha ere oge niile
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọba iri atọ na isii ọ wepụtara eruola ọkwa multi-platinum
Ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi telivishọn nke syndicated, Ọ bụ Oge Oziọma, n'etiti afọ 2004 na 2019
Na afọ 2013, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọka ikpe na Clash of Choirs South Africa
N'afọ 2021, Onye isi ala Cyril Ramaphosa kwanyere ya ugwu site na Order of Ikhamanga (OIS), maka ntinye pụrụiche ya na egwu South Africa
A mụrụ Rebecca Malope na afọ 1968 na Lekazi dị nso na Neslpruit na Mpumalanga
Mgbe ọ ka dị obere, ọ nọ n'oche nkwagharị mgbe ọ rịara ọrịa; ndị dọkịta kwenyere na ọ gaghị enwe ike ịga ije n'onwe ya
Mgbe ọ bụ nwata, ya na ụmụnne ya ndị nwanyị na-abụ abụ n’ime ụlọ ụka ha
Ka oge na-aga, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, ọ sonyeere otu ozioma nke mechara duru ya gaa Johannesburg, bụ ebe a kpọtara ya n'ihu onye mmepụta Sizwe Zakho
Ọrụ egwu ya malitere na afọ 1984
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, ya na nwanne ya nwanyị Cynthia hapụrụ obodo ha nke Kanyamazane, nke dịdebere Nelspruit, wee mee njem ruru km narị anọ
ruo Evaton, wee ruo Johannesburg n'ikpeazụ
N'afọ 1985, Malope so ndị otu ya na ha nọ banye asọmpi Shell Road to Fame, mana ewepụrụ ha na agba nke mbụ nke asọmpi ahụ
N'afọ 1986, ọ zutere Sizwe Zako na Gallo Studios
O chetara ya site na nlegharị anya ha ekweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
Zako chere na site na nduzi ya,Malope nwere ike imeri Shell Road to Fame ebe ọ ga-abanye asọmpi dị ka onye na-ese ihe
N'afo1987, Malope mere nke a wee nweta Shell Road to Fame na ngalaba nke Female Vocalist na egwu ozioma 'Shine On', nke raara nye ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'oge Apartheid na South Africa
N'agbanyeghị mmeri Shell Road to Fame, ọ gbalịsiri ike ịchọta ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ
N'ikpeazụ, MFM nyere ya nkwekọrịta ịdekọ ihe mana a gwara ya na egwu ozi ọma akwadoghị
A kpaliri ya ime egwu disco iji ree ndekọ iji soro Brenda Fassie, Yvonne Chaka Chaka na Mercy Phakela bụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị ukwuu n'oge ahụ
Sizwe Zako mere ka ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ na MFM kwenye ka ha tinye otu egwu ozioma na ọba mbụ nke Malope Sthembile Kuwe
A nabatara egwu ahụ nke ọma karịa egwu pop na ọba ahụ
N'afọ 1989, Malope wepụtara ọba abụọ, Daalụ nke ukwuu na Woza Lovey
Ọbá abụọ ahụ ruru ọkwa platinum
N'afọ 1990, Malope tọhapụrụ Buyani
Enyere egwu aha 'Buyani' nye ndị ọ lere anya dị ka ndị dike mgba, ọkachasị Nelson Mandela onye a tọhapụrụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Robben Island n'otu afọ ahụ
Ndekọ ahụ nwetara ọkwa platinum okpukpu abụọ ma Malope meriri onye na-agụ egwú nwanyị kacha mma na OKTV Awards, na-eti Brenda Fassie
Nafọ 1991, o wepụtara album pop ikpeazụ ya Saturday Nite
Dị ka ọba ndị gara aga, o tinyere abụ ozi ọma atọ
N'afọ 1992, Malope weputara ọbá ozioma zuru oke Rebecca Sings Gospel
Ndị nkatọ egwu, mgbasa ozi na ndị na-akwado egwu nabatara ọba ahụ nke ọma, wee gbasaa ama ama ya
Ọ bụ onye mbụ na-ese ozi ọma nke a na-akpọ egwu ya na egwu a ma ama dịka egwu pop na Afrikaans
Ruo ugbu a, ọba a erela ihe karịrị otu nde ma na-ahụta ya dị ka otu n'ime ọba ozi ozi ọma kacha mma na South Africa ]
N'ịgbaso ihe ịga nke ọma nke Rebecca Sings Gospel, na afọ 1993 ewepụtara Ngiyekeleni, wee soro otu ihe ịga nke ọma nke ọbá ya gara aga
N'afọ 1994, o wepụtara Umoya Wam onye egwu aha ya bụ egwu mbinye aka Malope
Ọbá ahụ karịrị ihe ndekọ ya gara aga n'ihe gbasara ire ere
Malope meriri Coca-Cola Full Blast Music Show Best Established Local Artist award na ndekọ nke nde iri, ndị na-ege ntị
Ọ meriri Best Contemporary Gospel ọbá na mbụ South African Music Awards n'af ọ 1995
A raara ọba ahụ na udo na South Africa ka ọ na-agbanwe na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na afọ 1994
Na afọ 1996 ọ tọhapụrụ Shwele Baba; ọ gbásárá nke ọma I bụ ọbá a kasị ere n' ahịa na mba South Africa, na-ere nde narị nkeji n'ime izu atọ nke ntọhapụ
Malope ewepụtala ọba iri atọ na isii na ọrụ egwu na-ewe ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ ruo taa
Na afọ 2009, o wepụtara ọbá nke iri atọ ya, akpọrọ My Hero, nwere CD abụọ
N'ọnwa' April n'afọ 2010, o wepụtara ọbá 'iri atọ na otu ya Uzohamba Nami

Na mkpụrụ Ụbọchị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 2011, Malope wepụtara ọbá ya nke iri atọ na abụọ, Ukuthula (nke pụtara 'Udo')ọ kwụrụ ya n'otu akwụkwọ akụkọ mpaghara na-ekwu, sị 'Na Ukuthula ndị mmadụ ga-atụ anya na ụda na-emegharị ahụ ma na oba ahụ dumn'amasi mEkpebiri m aha ahụ mgbe m chechara echiche banyere ọnọdụ ụwa dị taa
Ndị mmadụ enweghị udo
A na-alụ agha n’ebe niile, ọbụnadị n’ọgbakọ
Achọrọ m ka ndị mmadụ gbakọta ọnụ ma nke kachasị mkpa bụ ka ha nwee udo na ndụ ha, ka anyị wee nwee udo n'ụwa'
Malope lụrụ onye oji ego achụnta ego Themba Tshabalala
Malope nwetara nzere doctorate site na Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal na Mahadum California maka ntinye aka ya na ụlọ ọrụ egwu
Malope bụ onye na-abụ abụ ozi ọma na South Africa onye ama ama mgbe o meriri asọmpi Shell Road to Fame Fame n'afo 1987
Rebecca Ndolo Muambo (amụrụ na ụbọsị 16 July 1985) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba mgba
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị nke 48 kilogram na 2014 Commonwealth Games ebe o ritere ọla nchara
Rebecca Naa Dedei Aryeetey (1923 – 22 June 1961) nke a makwaara dị ka Dedei Ashikishan bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego Ghana, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-akwado nwanyị
A maara ya nke ọma maka azụmahịa ntụ ọka ya na Accra
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị nọ na mkpụrụ ego Pesewas iri ise nke Ghana
A mụrụ Rebeca Naa Dedei na 1923, na Osu o wee tolite na James Town, Accra
Nne ya bu onye Ga Asere ebe nna ya bụ onye Osu
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị, Naa Dei banyere azụmahịa ntụ ọka
Ọ ghọrọ ọgaranya na onye nwere mmetụta site na azụmahịa ntụ ọka ya nke mere ka ọ bụrụ 'Ashikishan', okwu Ga nke pụtara ntụ ọka
A maara ya dị ka onye isi n'ahụ maka ihe gbasara ego nke pati CPP mgbe ahụ ma duru ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị CPP n'ụlọ ya na Kokomlemle - Accra
Dịka onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke CPP, ọ ma kwadoro Nkrumah na pati CPP wee rụọ nnukwu ọrụ n'oge Ghana Ghana na-agba mgba iji nweta nnwere onwe
O nyere Nkrumah ego ka o nweta oche kansụl omebe iwu Ashiedu Keteke nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala Ghana mbụ
Ịbịaru Nkrumah nso mere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye iro nke otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke ekwuru na ọ bu ya mere ka ọ nwụọ n'oge
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụzọ dị mwute n'ọgbakọ CPP na Ho na 22nd June 1961 mgbe ọ dị afọ 38
E boro ebubo na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị na-ahụ maka nkwado nwanyị bụ ndị enyere ihe na-egbu egbu n'ọgbakọ ahụ mgbe ha ṅụchara tii dị ọkụ ọ malitere mewe mkpesa maka afọ mgbu
Ụgbọ ala abụọ nke Harry Sawyer butere na Accra bụ aha ya 'Auntie Dedei', o nwekwara ihe oyiyi ya na stampụ mba yana na mkpụrụ ego pesewa iri ise nke Ghana, ha niile na-asọpụrụ ya
Rebecca M

Nabutola (amụrụ ya na Jenụwarị 17, 1959) bụbu onye odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide (PS) nke Mịnịstrị na-ahụ maka njem nlegharị anya na anụ ọhịa nke Kenya Nabutola gụrụ akwụkwọ na Institute of Social Studies, Hague, na-enweta diploma na International Relations and Development, na Mahadum Nairobi, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Arts
Rebecca Nandwa bụ onye edemede Kenya nke a maara nke ọma maka akwụkwọ ụmụ ya dere na Swahili
Ọ na-etinye aka n'ọtụtụ ọrụ odeakụkọ na ọrụ nchịkọta akụkọ ma bụrụ onye nkuzi
Mgbe ọ gachara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Western Kenya na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Limuru, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Kenyatta na BEd
Ọrụ nkuzi mbụ ya bụ na Emusire High School na afọ 1988
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ kwagara Nairobi n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ịnọ ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ mba ahụ nso
N'afọ 2013, o ritere ihe nrite Jomo Kenyatta na Kiswahili Children's Category maka akwụkwọ ya Nimefufuka, ọ bụkwa onye a họpụtara n'afọ 2015
O dere ihe karịrị akwụkwọ 35 maka ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ dị iche iche, gụnyere ole na ole na Bekee
Ụlọ ọrụ Kenyan Institute of Curriculum Development na-atụ aro akwụkwọ ya maka iji ya mee ihe na ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ
Chura Mcheza Ngoma gosipụtara na International Board on Books for Young People (IBBY) n'ịntanetị
A na-etinye ụfọdụ n'ime akwụkwọ Nandwa na mmemme Worldreader na Pole Mzee Bonga ya bụ otu n'ime ihe ha dere maka East Afrika n'afọ 2014
Rebecca Nyandeng nke Mabior (amụrụ na 15 Julaị 1956) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Sudan
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị osote onye isi ala nke South Sudan na gọọmentị ịdị n'otu kemgbe Febụwarị 2020

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke okporo ụzọ na njem maka gọọmentị na-achị onwe ya nke Southern Sudan, yana dịka onye ndụmọdụ maka Onye isi ala nke South Sudan na okike na ikike mmadụ site na 2007 ruo 2014
Ọ bụ nwanyị di ya nwụrụ nke Dr
John Garang de Mabior, onye isi ala mbụ nke Sudan na onye isi ala nke gọọmentị South Sudan, na nne Akuol de Mabior
Ọ bụ onye agbụrụ Dinka nke Twic East County nke South Sudan
A mụrụ ya na 15 Julaị 1956 na Bor Town

Mgbe ọnwụ Dr
John Garang gasịrị, General Salva Kiir weghaara ọkwa ya wee bụrụ osote onye isi ala mbụ nke Sudan na onye isi ala nke Gọọmentị South Sudan na onye ọchịagha nke SPLM / A
General Kiir họpụtara Rebecca Nyandeng De Mabior dị ka Minista nke okporo ụzọ na njem maka Gọọmentụ South Sudan

John Garang bịanyere aka tupu ọnwụ ya na 30 Julaị 2005
Ọ gara n'ihu na-akwado mmejuputa usoro udo ruo mgbe South nwetara nnwere onwe na 9 Julaị 2011
N'otu afọ ahụ mgbe di ya nwụrụ, Madam Rebecca gara United States of America wee zute Onye isi ala George W
Bush
O nyere ozi ekele maka itinye aka America na ịchọ udo na South Sudan
N'afọ 2009, Onye isi ala Obama gara n'ihu na mbọ ya na odeakwụkwọ Clinton na onye nnọchi anya Rice na-agba iji hụ na a na-etinye nkwekọrịta udo na Sudan
Madam Rebecca nwetakwara ajụjụ ọnụ site na NPR
O kwuru banyere mkpebi ya maka nnwere onwe nke South Sudan ebe ọ na-akwanyekwara mkpa ọ dị inwe Sudan dị n'otu n'okpuru ọhụụ ọhụrụ nke Dr John Garang mepụtara na 1983
Ọ gara Grinnell College na Iowa State University, mahadum Iowa ebe di ya nwụrụ anwụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya tupu Agha Obodo Sudan nke Abụọ amalite na 1983
John Garang nwụrụ anwụ na nwunye ya Rebecca nwere ụmụ isii bụ ndị na-akwado udo na nkwụsi ike na Republic nke South Sudan ọhụrụ
Dị ka Sudan Tribune si kwuo, Nyandeng zutere onye isi ala South Sudan Salva Kiir Mayardit na 22 Disemba 2013 iji kwurịta nchekwa n'ihi nsogbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Sudan na 2013
Rebecca Nyandeng egosila enweghị afọ ojuju n'ụzọ gọọmentị Sudan nọ na Khartoum si emezu nkwekọrịta udo zuru oke (CPA)
N'ime afọ agha, ọ sonyeere ndị agha Southern a maara taa dị ka Sudan People's Liberation Army na Sudan People'S Liberation Movement
A maara ya maka nkwado ya maka ikike nke South Sudan ọ bụ ezie na ọ nweghị ihe ọ bụla megide Sudan dị n'otu n'okpuru ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Agha dị n'etiti North na South Sudan nke nwere ogologo akụkọ ihe mere eme site n'oge ndị Britain hapụrụ Sudan na 1956 emetụtala ọtụtụ nde ndị Southern Sudan
N'ihi agha, ihe karịrị nde mmadụ abụọ nwụrụ na South Sudan na nde mmadụ anọ na South Sudan bụ ndị a chụpụrụ n'ime ụlọ na ndị bi na mba ndị ọzọ dị ka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ

Oké Osimiri Uhie nwere ihe dị ka 438,000 km2 (169,000 mi), ọ dị ihe dị ka 2,250 km (1,400 mi) n'ogologo, na - n'ebe kachasị obosara - 355 km (221 mi) n'obosara
O nwere nkezi oimi nke 490 m (1,610 ft), na etiti Suakin Trough ọ na-eru omimi ya kachasị elu nke 3,040 m (9,970 )

Akwụkwọ Ọpụpụ nke Akwụkwọ Nsọ na-akọ akụkọ banyere otú ụmụ Izrel si gafee otu mmiri, nke ihe odide Hibru kpọrọ Yam Suph (Hibru יַם סוּף) A na-akpọ Yam Suph na omenala dị ka Oké Osimiri Uhie Rabbi Saadia Gaon (882‒942), na nsụgharị Judeo-Arabic nke Pentateuch, mere ka ebe a na-agafe Oké Osimiri Uhie dị ka Baḥar al-Qulzum, nke pụtara Ọwara Suez
The construction of the canal during Darius's reign is evidenced by ancient records, including inscriptions
Darius commemorated the completion of the canal by creating stelae (stone monuments) with inscriptions in several languages, describing the construction and its benefits
The canal not only facilitated trade but also solidified Darius’s control over Egypt and enhanced the Achaemenid Empire's economic and political power in the region
N'ọgwụgwụ narị afọ nke anọ BC, Alexander Onye Ukwu zipụrụ njem ụgbọ mmiri ndị Gris gbada n'Oké Osimiri Uhie gaa n'Oké Osimiri India
Ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri Gris gara n'ihu na-enyocha ma na-achịkọta data na Oké Osimiri Uhie
Agatharchides chịkọtara ozi gbasara oke osimiri na narị afọ nke abụọ BC

The Periplus of the Erythraean Sea ('Periplus of the Red Sea'), nke Gris periplus nke onye edemede a na-amaghị dere na narị afọ nke mbụ, nwere nkọwa zuru ezu nke ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri na ụzọ oké osimiri nke Oké Osimiri Uhie
Periplus kọwakwara otú Hippalus si buru ụzọ chọpụta ụzọ kpọmkwem site n'Oké Osimiri Uhie na-aga India

Oké Osimiri Uhie nwere mmasị maka ịzụ ahịa ndị Rom na India malite n'oge ọchịchị Ọgọstọs, mgbe Alaeze Ukwu Rom nwetara ikike n'ebe Mediterenian, Ijipt, na Oké Osimiri Uhie dị n'ebe ugwuThe route had been used by previous states but grew in the volume of traffic under the Romans
From Indian ports goods from China were introduced to the Roman world
Mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Rome na China dabere n'Oké Osimiri Uhie, mana alaeze Aksumite mebiri ụzọ ahụ n'ihe dị ka narị afọ nke atọ AD
In 1513, trying to secure that channel to Portugal, Afonso de Albuquerque laid siege to Aden but was forced to retreat
They cruised the Red Sea inside the Bab al-Mandab, as the first fleet from Europe in modern times to have sailed these waters
Later in 1524 the city was delivered to Governor Heitor da Silveira as an agreement for protection from the Ottomans
In 1798, France ordered General Napoleon to invade Egypt and take control of the Red Sea
Although he failed in his mission, the engineer Jean-Baptiste Lepère, who took part in it, revitalised the plan for a canal which had been envisaged during the reign of the Pharaohs
Several canals were built in ancient times from the Nile to the Red Sea along or near the line of the present Sweet Water Canal, but none lasted for long
The Suez Canal was opened in November 1869
After the Second World War, the Americans and Soviets exerted their influence whilst the volume of oil tanker traffic intensified
However, the Six-Day War culminated in the closure of the Suez Canal from 1967 to 1975

Today, in spite of patrols by the major maritime fleets in the waters of the Red Sea, the Suez Canal has never recovered its supremacy over the Cape route, which is believed to be less vulnerable to piracy[Tinye edensibịa]
The rainfall over the Red Sea and its coasts is extremely low, averaging Àtụ Cvt per year
The rain is mostly short showers, often with thunderstorms and occasionally with dust storms
The scarcity of rainfall and no major source of fresh water to the Red Sea result in excess evaporation as high as Àtụ Cvt per year and high salinity with minimal seasonal variation

A recentÀtụ When underwater expedition to the Red Sea offshore from Sudan and EritreaÀtụ Verify source found surface water temperatures Àtụ Cvt in winter and up to Àtụ Cvt in the summer, but despite that extreme heat, the coral was healthy with much fish life with very little sign of coral bleaching, with only 9% infected by Thalassomonas loyana, the 'white plague' agent
loyana
Scientists are investigating the unique properties of these coral and their commensal algae to see if they can be used to salvage bleached coral elsewhere

In general, tide ranges between Àtụ Cvt in the north, near the mouth of the Gulf of Suez and Àtụ Cvt in the south near the Gulf of Aden, but it fluctuates between Àtụ Cvt and Àtụ Cvt away from the nodal point
The central Red Sea (Jeddah area) is therefore almost tideless, and as such the annual water level changes are more significant

Because of the small tidal range the water during high tide inundates the coastal sabkhas as a thin sheet of water up to a few hundred metres rather than flooding the sabkhas through a network of channels

However, south of Jeddah in the Shoiaba area, the water from the lagoon may cover the adjoining sabkhas as far as Àtụ Cvt, whereas north of Jeddah in the Al-Kharrar area the sabkhas are covered by a thin sheet of water as far as Àtụ Cvt
The prevailing north and northeast winds influence the movement of water in the coastal inlets to the adjacent sabkhas, especially during storms
Winter mean sea level is Àtụ Cvt higher than in summer
Tidal velocities passing through constrictions caused by reefs, sand bars and low islands commonly exceed Àtụ Cvt
Coral reefs in the Red Sea are near Egypt, Eritrea, Israel, Saudi Arabia, and Sudan[Tinye edensibịa]
Modern development is focused on the following fields
The Durwara 2 Field was discovered in 1963, while the Suakin 1 Field and the Bashayer 1A Field were discovered in 1976, on the Egyptian side of the Red Sea
The Barqan Field was discovered in 1969, and the Midyan Field in 1992, both within the Midyan Basin on the Saudi Arabian side of the Red Sea
The 20-m thick Middle Miocene Maqna Formation is an oil source rock in the basin
Oil seeps occur near the Farasan Islands, the Dahlak Archipelago, along the coast of Eritrea, and in the southeastern Red Sea along the coasts of Saudi Arabia and Yemen

Ọgaranya dị iche iche bụ n'otu akụkụ n'ihi 2,000 km (1,240 mi) nke coral reef na-agbasa n'akụkụ osimiri ya; reefs ndị a dị n'akụkụ ya dị afọ 5000-7000 ma bụrụ e ji nkume acropora na porites corals mee
Reefs na-emepụta ikpo okwu na mgbe ụfọdụ ọdọ mmiri n'akụkụ osimiri na ihe ndị ọzọ dị ka cylinders (dị ka Blue Hole (Red Sea) na Dahab)
Ụdị azụ ndị dị n'oké osimiri Red Sea na-eleta ugwu ndị a, gụnyere ụfọdụ n'ime ụdị 44 nke shark
Ebe obibi ndị ọzọ dị n'ime mmiri gụnyere ahịhịa mmiri, nnu, mangrove na nnu

Red red bụ nri Ghana nke nwere anya ojii, nke a na-esi na mmanụ nkwụ / mmanụ akwụkwọ nri na plantain
Nri ahụ nwetara aha ya site na ụcha uhie ọ na-ewere site na mmanụ nkwụ uhie (zomi) na plantain esiri esi
Red red na-ejikarị azụ, dị ka mackerel ma ọbụ pilchards, peas nwere anya ojii, ose, yabasị, mmanụ na tomato
A maara ya na Ghana dị ka 'kokoo ne beans'
