Ozugbo ha gafere, ha na-enweta asambodo nke itinye aka, nke ha nwere ike iji maka ọfịs ha
Regenesys esorola otu dịka MTN Group rụkọọ ọrụ

Pearson Education, India dabeere Times of India Group, South African Department of Trade and Industry, Microsoft, Intel, Institute of Personnel Management na ndị ọzọ iji gbasaa atụmatụ agụmakwụkwọ n'efu na ndị ọrụ dị iche iche
Dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ si kwuo, ọtụtụ ndị debanyere aha ma na-eji ọrụ ahụ
Reggae bụ ụdị egwu Jamaica nke malitere na ngwụcha afọ 1960
Ka e mesịrị, ọ ghọrọ akụkụ dị mkpa nke egwu Naijiria, karịsịa mgbe onye na-agụ egwu Majek Fashek bilitere
Fashek bụ, dị ka ọtụtụ ndị na-eme reggae na Naijiria, akụkụ nke otu egwu 'The Jahsticks'
Onye a ma ama bụ Daniel Wilson (AKA Mr
Ragamuffin) onye webatara ụdị egwu ragamuffin ya na Naịjirịa
Daniel Wilson ji egwu egwu dị ka MrRagamuffin na Original Bad Boy mee ihe na-atọ ụtọ
Ndị egwu ndị ọzọ gụnyere Jerri Jheto, Daddy Showkey, Ras Kimono, Rymzo, De king, ìgwè ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke Victor Eshiet na Peggy Umanna, The Mandators, na MC Afrikan Simba nke dị na London
Ndị ọsụ ụzọ ndị a nke egwu Reggae gụnyere nnukwu aha dịka Orits Williki, Peterside Ottong, Andy Shoreman, Alex Zitto, Evelyn Ogoli, Wale Man, Isaac Black, na ndị ọzọ
Ndị ọsụ ụzọ ndị a kwadebere ụzọ maka ọgbọ ọhụrụ nke ndị na-ese egwu reggae
A kpaliri egwu reggae n'ime ndị Naijiria n'etiti afọ iri asatọ

N'oge a, ụlọ ọrụ redio FM ghọrọ ihe dị mma maka ọtụtụ ndị na-edekọ egwu na ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ, n'ihi mmemme egwu ya na-enye ndị na-ege ntị na oke nke ọhụrụ, na ndị na-eto eto na-agbasa ozi redio a kpọtụrụ aha n'okpuru ebe a
Ha chepụtara ụzọ a ga-esi gosipụta mmemme egwu na FM Radio nye ndị na-ege ntị gburugburu mba ahụ
Na mgbasa ozi na-ebipụta na nke elektrọnik, ha hụrụ ụzọ iji kwalite ụdị egwu dị iche iche na ndị Naijiria dị iche iche
N'afọ 1980, ọbịbịa nke ụlọ ọrụ redio FM gụnyere Radio Nigeria 1 Ikoyi-Lagos, Radio Nigeria 2 Lagos na Martin Street, na ụlọ ọrụ nwanne nwanyị ọhụrụ Radio Nigeria 3 Ikoyi-Лagos, na 1987
Ha malitere ma na-ejikarị ụdị egwu ọhụrụ a na-akụ ikuku nke na-eburu ndị Naijiria n'oké ifufe
Onye Redio na ndị na-agbasa ozi
Ka afọ na-aga n'ihu, ihu nke egwu Reggae na Naịjirịa dịkwa
N'ịgwakọta ọtụtụ ụdị na Reggae beats, ọgbọ ọhụrụ nke ndị na-ese egwu Reggae nke Naijiria apụtala

Ụdị ngwakọta nke na-adabere na mmetụta nke Reggae, Hip hop, R&B, na omenala dance-hall; ndị na-ese ihe dịka Banton, Winning Jah na Benny Paladin gbasaa nkọwa nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Reggae a mụrụ na Naijiria, na-edebe usoro nke egwu Reggae dị ka a hụrụ n'ụwa niile
Àtụ ReggaeÀtụ Genres of African popular music
Reggie Tsiboe (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 7 n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1964) bụ onye Ghana-English na-eme egwuregwu, onye na-agba egwu na otu n'ime ndị na-abụ abụ nke otu disco Boney M
n'etiti afọ 1982 na 1986 na mgbe e mesịrị n'etiti afọ 1989 na 1990
N'afọ 1982, Tsiboe nọchiri anya onye na-agba egwu Bobby Farrell, mana n'afọ 1984 Farrell sonyeere otu ahụ wee bụrụ quintet
N'afọ 1986, ndị otu mbụ ahụ kewara mgbe afọ iri gara nke ọma, mana n'afọ 1989, Liz Mitchell na Reggie guzobere nsụgharị ọhụrụ nke Boney M
n'afọ 1990 wepụtara site n'enyemaka nke onye mmepụta Frank Farian otu 'Stories', mana ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị, ha abụọ gara ụzọ dị iche iche

Tsiboe pụtara na abọm atọ ikpeazụ nke Boney M Ten Thousand Lightyears (1984), Kalimba de Luna - 16 Happy Songs (1984) na Eye Dance (1985) ma dekọọkwaa egwu Krismas na otu ahụ, nke ewepụtara na mba ụwa naanị mgbe nkewa nke ìgwè ahụ na abọm ọhụrụ Boney M
Christmas, The 20 Greatest Christmas Songs n'afọ 1986

Reggie bụrụ abụ isi olu na ọtụtụ egwu Boney M, gụnyere 'Kalimba de Luna', 'Happy Song', 'Going Back West', 'My Chérie Amour', 'Young, Free and Single', 'Dreadlock Holiday' na 'Barbarella Fortuneteller'

N'abalị 21 ọnwa Septemba afọ 2006, Tsiboe na ndị isi abụọ ọzọ na-abụ abụ nke Boney M, Liz Mitchell na Marcia Barrett, bụ ndị ọbịa pụrụ iche na London na mbido egwu Daddy Cool, nke dabeere na egwu nke otu a ma ama
Tupu ọ banye na otu ahụ, ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Ghana
Otu n'ime ihe nkiri ndị mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ama ama bụ ihe nkiri Love Brewed in an African Pot
N'ịgbaso oge Boney M ya, Tsiboe laghachiri ime ihe nkiri, O meela ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri TV ole na ole nke UK gụnyere Doctor Who
Tsiboe bi ugbu a na Marlborough, Wiltshire na England

Reginald (Reggie) Yates (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 31 n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1983) bụ onye edemede na onye nduzi Britain nwere ọrụ ruru afọ iri atọ na ihuenyo dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-egosi telivishọn na redio DJ
N'afọ 2021, Yates wepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Pirates

A mụrụ nne na nna Yates, Felicia Asante na Reginald 'Jojo' Yates, na Ghana; Otú ọ dị, nna nna ya bụ Harry bụ nwa onye na-ahụ maka ego Bekee, George Yates, onye na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta ọla edo

Nne Harry Yates bụ Dorothy bụkwa onye agbụrụ agwakọta nna ya bụ onye nchịkwa ọchịchị British, Augustus George Lloyd, ebe nne ya Sarah bụ onye agbụrụ Fante, onye na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye ọrụ ugbo na onye ahịa na Dixcove, Ghana
Yates tolitere na North London, ma gaa Central Foundation Boys 'School na Cowper Street, Islington
Yates pụtara na telivishọn mbụ ya na Desmond's mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
Ọ pụtakwara na Disney Club, dịka Robbie
N'afọ 1998, Yates pụtara dịka onye ọbịa na Diggit na CITV n'okpuru aha Robbie
N'afọ 2002, o mere Carl Fenton na usoro ụmụaka a ma ama Grange Hill

N'ihe ngosi ahụ, egwu ya gụnyere 'Boombastic', 'You're The First, The Last, My Everything', 'It Ain't Over Til It's Over', 'U Can't Touch This' na 'This Old Heart of Mine (Is Weak for You)' Ọ na-abụkwa abụ abụọ, 'It Takes Two', ya na Edith Bowman, onye meriri n'ihe ngosi ahụ
O mere ka ntutu isi ya na-acha uhie uhie maka arụmọrụ ya nke 'Dancing on the Ceiling'
Na 10 Machị 2006, Yates pụtara na Stars in Fast Cars ma merie okpomọkụ ahụ iji banye na nke ikpeazụ, na-eti Elton Welsby na Ben Fogle na agba ikpeazụ
N'afọ 2006, Yates pụtara na Reality TV Special nke The Weakest Link ma bụrụ onye a họpụtara na agba nke anọ
N'afọ 2007, Yates pụtara na usoro nke atọ nke usoro akụkọ sayensị Doctor Who dịka Leo Jones, nwanne nwoke nke onye ibe Dọkịta nke Iri bụ Martha
Ọ pụtakwara na vidiyo egwu Dizzee Rascal nke afọ 2007 'Flex' dịka otu n'ime ndị ikpe na ihe ngosi TV a na-akpọ 'Flex Factor'
Regia Estelatus Mtema (1980-2012) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania
Ọ bụ onye otu oche pụrụ iche nke ndị ome iwu maka pati Chadema, na Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ na ọrụ
A mụrụ Mtema na 21 Eprel 1980, nwa nwanyị nke Estelatus Mtema
Ọ gara Forodhani Secondary School na Dar es Salaam tupu ọ gaa Machame Girls Secondary School maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị dị elu
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Science na akụ na ụba ụlọ na nri na-edozi ahụ na Mahadum Ọrụ Ugbo nke Sokoine
Nwanyị nwere nkwarụ, Mtema na arụsi ọrụ ike na Tanzania Federation for People with Disabilities, na-anọchite anya ha na 2008 workshop
Ọ bụkwa onye isi ọrụ na Chademaz Directorate of Youth Affairs
Mtema nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọala na 14 Jenụwarị 2012
E liri ya na Ifakara, Kilombero District na Morogoro Region
Regideso (Régie de distribution d'eau) bụ ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze na Democratic Republic of the Congo nke a na-akwụ ụgwọ maka mmepụta na nkesa mmiri nye ndị bi na ya, ndị ahịa na ndị ahịa ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ bụ akụrụngwa ọha, e guzobere ya na 1933
Regideso bụ ụlọ ọrụ kwụụrụ onwe ya n'ime Ngalaba Mines na Energy nke gọọmentị DRC
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Kinshasa

Regina Askia-Williams (A mụrụ Imaobong Regina Askia Usoro na Legọsi n'ụbọchị iri na isi n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ1967) bụ onye Naijiria, onye America na-ahụ maka nọọsụ ezinụlọ (FNP), onye na-ahụ Maka ahụike na agụmakwụkwọ, onye na-emepụta telivishọn, onye edemede, na onye na-ekwu okwu n'ihu ọha, onye nwetara aha dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya

Regina Marcia Benjamin (amuru Ọktoba 26, 1956) bu dibia America na onye u osote onye isi ochichi na US Public Health Service Commissioned Corps onye jere ozi dika 18th Surgeon General nke United States

Benjamin bu ụzọ duzie ụlọọgwụ ngwaọrụ na-enye akwụkwọ na-enye na Bayou La Batre, Alabama, wee jee ozi na bọọdụ ndị ọrụ maka Schoollọ Akwụkwọ Ọgwụ nke MorehouseRegina Marcia Benjamin (amuru Ọktoba 26, 1956) bu dibiabia America na onye u osote onye isi ochichi na US Public Health Service Commissioned Corps onye jere ozi dika 18th Surgeon General nke United States
Benjamin bu ụzọ duzie ụlọọgwụ nlekọta ahụike na-anaghị akwụ ụgwọ na Bayou La Batre, Alabama, wee jee ozi na bọọdụ ndị nlekọta maka Schoollọ Akwụkwọ Ọgwụ nke Morehouse
A mụrụ Benjamin na Mobile, Alabama na Ọktoba 26, n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise na isii
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Fairhope High School na Fairhope, Alabama, wee gaa mahadum na Xavier University of Louisianake dị n na New Orleans, ebe amụrụ ya na isi Gamma Alpha nke Delta Sigma Theta sorority
Ọ bụkwa onye otu klas nke abụọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Morehouse School of Medicine
Ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta MD ya na Mahadum Alabama na Birmingham wee gụchaa ebe obibi ya na nchịkọta ezinụlọ na Medical Center nke Central Georgia

Banyere aihuta a dị ka onye mbụ n'ime ezinụlọ ya ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike, o kwuru na 'Ahụtụbeghị m dọkịta ojii tupu m aga mahadum' Mgbe ọ banyere n'ọrụ ahụike naanị na Bayou La Batre, Alabama, Benjamin rụrụ ọrụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ na ụlọ mberede na ebe a na-elekọta ndị agadi iji kwado ọrụ ya
Mgbe ọ natara MBA site na Freeman School of Business na Tulane University, ọ gbanwere ụkwara ọ ọrụ ya n ka oburu zie ọ ọgwụ ahụike ime obodo
Benjamin bụ onye bụbu onye otu onye isi maka ahụike ime obodo na kọleji nke ọgwụ na Mahadum South Alabama, ebe ọ na-elekọta ihe na-eme na AHEC Alabama wee n'duzie ihe na-eme na Telemedicine ya
Ọ jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Medical Association of the State of Alabama (MASA) n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na abụọ

Nafo otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri iteghete na ise, a họpụtara ya na ndị isi oche nke American Medical Association, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ dọkịta mbụ n'okpuru afọ iri anọ nakwa nwaanyị mbụ African-American nke a a ga-ahọpụta
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Board of Trustees nke Mahadum Florida A & M, nke Gọvanọ Florida Jeb Bush họpụtara

Site n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na asatọ ruo n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iteghete ọ jere ozi dị ka Onye isi oche nke Board of Trustees of Federation of State Medical Boards, otu mba na-anaghị akwụ ụgwọ na-anọchite anya bọọdụ ahụike na osteopathic 70 nke United States na ókèala ya
Benjamin bụ onye diplomate nke American Board of Practice Family and Fellow of American Academy of Family Physicians
Ọ bụ onye Kellogg National Fellow yana onye ndu Rockefeller na-esote ọgbọ

Ọ jerela ozi na bọọdụ na kọmitii gụnyere Kaiser Commission on Medicaid na ndị anaghị akwụ ụgwọ; Ahụike Katọlik East; Medical Association nke steeti Alabama; Alabama Board of Medical Examiners; Kọmitii steeti Alabama nke ahụike ọha; Mobile County Medical Society; Alabama Rural Health Association; Ọchịchị Alabama; Mpaghara mkpanaka Red Cross; Mercy Medical; Ụlọ Azụmahịa Mobile; United Way of Mobile; Ndị dọkịta maka ikike mmadụ ; na Deep South Girl Scout Council

Onye na-ahụ maka ahụike na United States Secretary nke na-ahụ maka ahụike na onye ọrụ mmadụ Donna Shalala họpụtara ya na kọmitii na-emeziwanye ụlọ nyocha ụlọ ọgwụ na Council of Graduate Medical Education, ọ bụkwa onye so na 'Kọmitii 3' Na Alabama, ọ na-arụbu ọrụ dịka osote onye isi oche nke Gọvanọ Commission on Aging, ma bụrụkwa onye so na Gọvanọ Health Care Reform Task Force na Gọvanọ Task Force màkà Ahụ Ike Ụmụaka
Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ ana-akwụ ụgwọ maka Burger King, kwadoro inye ndụmọdụ nri na onyinye ha
Ebibiri ụlọ ọgwụ Benjamin nafo pụkụ abụọ na ise site na Hurricane Katrina na n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na isii site na ọkụ n'ụbọchị Afọ Ọhụrụ, otu ụbọchị tupu echere ịmaliteghachi
O mere akụkọ mgbe o wughachiri ụlọ ọgwụ nke ugboro abụọ
Na Maachị 10, n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na isii, a mara ọkwa na Benjamin ga-elekọta ọgbakọ nghọta CKD nke National Kidney Foundation

Edebere nzuko a maka ọdịda nke 2016, ọ bụkwa akụkụ nke mmemme mgbochi CKD ọhụrụ nke National Kidney Foundation, atụmatụ ọtụtụ afọ nke na-achọ ibuli nyocha na njikwa ọrịa akụrụ na-adịghị ala ala (CKD) n'ihu ahịrị nke ahụike mgbochi
Usoro ahụike US
Na mgbakwunye na Dr

Benjamin, ndepụta nke ndị a kpọrọ òkù gụnyere, ma ọnweghị oke na, ndị ọkachamara ahụike, nnukwu usoro nlekọta ahụike, ọrụ ụlọ nyocha, otu nkwado, ndị ọkachamara ụlọ ọrụ nkà na ụzụ, na gọọmentị na ndị na-ere ahịa ahịa
Ha ga-ezukọ iji mepụta ụzọ ọhụrụ iji merie ihe mgbochi ndị na-egbochi nchoputa ọrịa akụrụ n'oge
Ebumnuche nke nzukọ a bụ ịmepụta atụmatụ doro anya, nke jikọrọ ọnụ nke ga-emepụta ụzọ maka mgbanwe nke ga-ebuli echiche mba ahụ banyere ọrịa akụrụ ma mepụta omenala ebe nchọpụta mbụ dịkwa mkpa
N'onwa Julaị n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na isii, Benjamin sonyeere Board of Directors of Darkness to Light, onye na-akwado mba na-akwadoghị maka igbochi mmetọ ụmụaka
'Nke a abụghị naanị okwu maka otu ezinụlọ ma ọ bụ obodo - ọ bụ okwu ahụike ọha na eze na-emetụta ọha mmadụ n'ozuzu,' Benjamin kwuru banyere okwu mmetọ ụmụaka
Benjamin bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke Bayou La Batre Rural Health Clinic na Bayou La Batre, Alabama, obere obodo ntakiri n'akụkụ Gulf Coast
Benjamin bụ isiokwu nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Reader's Digest nke depụtara mgbalị ya iji wughachi ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ mgbe Ajọ Ifufe Katrina gasịrị

N'ọnwa Julaị 13, n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iteghete, Onye isi ala Barack Obama kwupụtara nhọrọ nke Benjamin maka ọkwa nke Surgeon General nke United States yana dịka onye isi ahụike na ngalaba na -ahụ maka ahụike ọha mgbe niile
N'onwa Ọktoba 7, n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iteghete, Kọmitii Senate nke United States kwadoro Benjamin niile maka ahụike, agụmakwụkwọ, ọrụ na ụgwọ ezumike nka
Ndị omebe iwu United States kwadoro Benjamin na Ọktoba 29, N'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iteghete
Benjamin nabatara nhọpụta Onye isi ala, ma mee ka o doo anya na enweghị afọ ojuju ya na usoro nlekọta ahụike dị ugbu a, n'ihe gbasara ịnweta yana ọnụ ahịa
N'ịnabata nhọpụta ya, Benjamin kọwara ihe isi ike ya chere ọrịa na ọrịa chere ezinụlọ ya ihu

O kwuru na ọnwụ nke nwanne ya nwoke, bụ onye nwụrụ HIV, nakwa dị ka nna ya, bụ onye nwụrụ n'ihi ọbara mgbali elu na ọrịa shuga, na nne ya nke nwụrụ n'ihi na akpa ume cancer, ihe niile, o kwuru, bụ 'oria a gaegbochi nwụ'

N'onwa Jenụwarị n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri, Benjamin wepụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya, nke isiokwu ya bụ 'The Surgeon General's Vision for a Healthy and Fit Nation' N'ime ya, ọ kọwapụtara usoro dị egwu nke ndị America buru ibu na oke ibu, ma nyekwa ụkpụrụ maka mbọ ntọala ime mgbanwe na-akwalite ahụike na ịdịmma ezinụlọ na obodo
Ọrụ ya na mpaghara a gara n'ihu
Otu mmemme gbara ụmụ nwanyị nwere agba ume ka ha na-emega ahụ nke ukwuu ma ghara ịwụpụ mgbatị ahụ n'ihi egwu nke 'imebi ntutu ha' nyere $5,000 onye meriri n'asọmpi ntutu dị mma na ahụike
Ekọwapụtara nke a n'ajụjụ ọnụ NPR
N'ime ajụjụ ọnụ a, a tụlere ọtụtụ mmemme ndị ọzọ, gụnyere mkpọsa megide oke ibu, na mkpọsa 'Obi nde' iji gbochie otu nde nkụchi obi kwa afọ
N'onwa Jenụwarị 20, n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na otu, Dr
Benjamin nyere The Surgeon General's Call to Action to support Breast feeding, nke bụ akwụkwọ nchịkọta sayensị dabeere na sayensị iji kpalie ime ihe n'ịkwalite ọnụego nwa ara na United States

Ọ kpọkuru akụkụ niile dị n'ime ọha mmadụ ka ha wepụ ihe mgbochi na-enye nwa ara ma na-amụba mmalite nke inye nwa ara, ogologo oge, na nke pụrụ iche - bụ nke bụ isiokwu mgbasa ozi ahụike ọha na eze ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ gara aga

Ọbụghị naanị akwụkwọ a nyere ihe omume na atụmatụ mmejuputa zuru oke, mana ọ matakwara nkwado nke ndị ezinaụlọ, obodo, ndị dọkịta, sistemu ahụike, na ndị were were n'ọrụ dị ka ihe dị mkpa maka akụkọ ịga nke ọma inye nwa ara
Nkeji otú, mkpa inye nwa ara, gosipụtara ozi gbasara oke ihe egwu dị n'ahụ ike dịịrị ndị nne na ụmụ ha metụtara ị naghị enye ara, yana uru akụ na ụba na gburugburu ebe obibi maka ịhọrọ inye ara
Nkeji abụọ, Ọnụọgụgụ nke inye nwa ara, nyere ozi gbasara usoro mba ụwa na ọnụego inye nwa ara, ma kọwapụta ndịiche na-adịgide adịgide a na-ahụ na omume inye nwa ara

Nkeji atọ, Ihe mgbochi na-enye nwa ara na United States, chọpụtara adịghị ike na ihe ọmụma, nrụgide mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ịzụ ahịa, ezughị ezu nkwado sitere n'aka ndị ezinụlọ na ndị enyi, imebiga ihe ókè nke ara nwanyị, na-edozi nsogbu na lactation, ịlaghachi n'ọrụ na ịchọta nlekọta ụmụaka kwesịrị ekwesị, yana dị ka ọrụ nlekọta ahụike kewara ekewa na nnabata nke atumatu ma ọ bụ omume a na-eme n'oge na-egbochi mmalite inye nwa ara, ogologo oge, na ewepu

Nkeji anọ, Ịnye ara site na Echiche Ahụike Ọha, haziri ọdịiche dị na ihe ọmụma, mmetụta omenala, enweghị nkwekọrịta ụlọ ọgwụ, ihe ịma aka, na ajụjụ a na-azaghị n'ofe ụlọ ọrụ kachasị mma iji dozie nsogbu ndị a chọpụtara
Nkeji ise, oku ime ihe, ewepụtara ọrụ dịịrị ngalaba ọ bụla n'ime ọha ma nyekwa usoro mmejuputa iwu chọrọ iji nweta ebumnuche obodo maka inye ara
Enwere ihe omume iri abụo yana atụmatụ mmejuputa iri ise na abụọ kwadoro
N'onwa September, n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na abụọ, Surgeon General Benjamin wepụtara 'The 2012 National Strategy for Suicide Prevention, a akụkọ sitere na US Surgeon General na Action Alliance'
a ebumnoiri isii m0 maka ibelata igbu onwe onye n'ime airi so sochirinụ
N'apụkụ0abụọ na abụọ, 2, Dọkịta Ọkachamara David Satcher wepụtara atụmatụ mba mbụ maka igbochi igbu onwe ya
Benjamin gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa nke US Surgeon General na Julaị 16, 2013
E kwuwo na nkwado ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị o nyere maka ime ime dị ka isi iyi nke esemokwu, ebe Benjamin bụ onye Katọlik, Chọọchị Katọlik na-emegidekwa ime otú ahụ
Agbanyeghị, ọ nwetakwara ihe nrite n'aka Pope Benedict XVI
Benjamin na-anọdụkwa na bọọdụ nke Catholic Health Association ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ụlọ ụka obodo ya
Benjamin jere ozi na bọọdụ ndị nlekọta nke Òtù Ahụ Ike Katọlik
Lloyd Dean kwadoro ya, onye isi oche nke Catholic Healthcare West, usoro ụlọ ọgwụ kachasị na California, onye wepụtara nkwupụta na-ekwu na ọ 'nwere obi ụtọ' maka nhọpụta ya
N'oge usoro nkwenye ya, ndị nkatọ chọkwara ime ka ibu nke Benjamin bụrụ isi iyi nke esemokwu
Onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ nri New York Times Mark Bittman kwuru na Benjamin, 'dị ka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bu ya ụzọ', zeere esemokwu, ma zere ịkatọ ụlọ ọrụ
Na 1998, ọ bụ onye United States nwetara onyinye nrite Nelson Mandela maka ahụike na ikike mmadụ

Akpọrọ Benjamin aha site na dị ka otu n'ime 'Nation's 50 Future Leaders Age 40 and Under' E gosipụtara ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ New York Times, 'Angel in a White Coat,' wee họrọ ya 'Onye nke izu' site na ABC 's World News Tonight with Peter Jennings, 'Nwanyị nke Afọ' site na CBS Morning a
na 'Nwanyị nke Afọ' site na magazin ndị mmadụ
E gosikwara ya na mkpuchi December 1999 nke Clarity Magazine wee nweta 2000 National Careing Award, nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ mama Teresa
N'afọ 2006, Pope Benedict XVI nyere ya obe nke popu Pro Ecclesia et Pontifice
Na Septemba 2008, ọ bụ otu n'ime klas nke 25 nke afọ ahụ na MacArthur Fellows Programme, nke a na-akpọ 'Genius Awards,' na-enweta onyinye sitere na John D
na Catherine T
MacArthur Foundation nke ga-abụrịrị $ 500,000 n'ime oge
afọ ise
Otú ọ dị, dị ka onye ọrụ gọọmenti etiti, ọ kwụsịrị ịnakwere MacArthur Fellows stipend mgbe ọ nabatara ọnọdụ dị ka Surgeon General
N'afọ 2009, ọ natara ihe nrite nturu ugo American Medical Association Foundation Leadership Award
N'afọ 2010, e nyere ya nzere nsọpụrụ nke Dọkịta Sayensị si Dartmouth College na emume mmalite ya

Na Mee 8, 2010, e nyere ya nzere nsọpụrụ nke Doctorate of Pharmacy site na Albany College of Pharmacy and Health Sciences na mmemme mmalite mmalite 130 nke kọleji emere na Empire State Plaza na Albany, New York
Na Satọde, Mee 15, 2010, Dr
Benjamin nwetara nzere nsọpụrụ nke Dọkịta Sayensị na Mahadum Tulane
N'October 7, Nafo 2010, ọ natara onyinye nturu ugo Trumpeter site na National Consumers League na-amata afọ ole ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji kwalite ahụike mba ahụ
Na May 28, 2011, ọ natara akara nsọpụrụ nke Doctorate of Humane Letters site na Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o nyefere adreesị maka mmalite 205 nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Na Mee 18, 2012, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta nsọpụrụ nke Doctorate of Science na Mahadum Rochester Medical Center 's School of Medicine and Dentistry
O nyekwara adreesị mmalite
N'onwa Mee 9, 2014, ọ natara Nichols-Chancellor's Medal site na Mahadum Vanderbilt wee kwuo okwu na mmemme ụbọchị Senior University
Na Mee 14, 2016, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta nsọpụrụ na kọleji Elizabethtown
Regina Daniels (amụrụ n’abalị iri n’ọnwa iri n’afọ 2000) bụ nwaafọ Nigerian na eme ihe nkiri
Regina Daniels bụ onye na- eme ihe nkiri Nollywood na ihe nlereanya
Amụrụ ya na Lagos, Nigeria n'ọnwa Oktoba 10, 2000
Nne ya bụ Rita Daniel onye bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri / onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye isi oche nke Actors Guild of Nigeria (AGN) na Delta State, Nigeria
Regina toro na Asaba, Delta State nke Nigeria
Ọ nwere ụmụnne ise - ụmụnne nwoke atọ na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ
Ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ n’ime ezinụlọ ha
Otu n'ime ndị nlereanya o tolitere bụ onye na - eme ihe nkiri n'egwuregwu Academy bụ Angelina Jolie
Ọ gara Hollywood International School na na 2018, Daniels gara n'ihu na-amụ Mass Communication na Mahadum Igbinedion
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa; Nne ya (Rita Daniels) bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
O nwetara nkwado site n'aka nne ya na ụmụnne ya
O gosiputara n’ime ihe nkiri nke akpọrọ “ Miracle Child ” n’afọ 2010
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2019, a họpụtara Daniels dịka onye nhazi mgbasa ozi nke ndị ntorobịa Atiku Abubakar
N’ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2020, O bipụtara magazin a kpọrọ aha ya na họtel dị n' Abuja
Nkata iji megide Daniels n'ihe abụghị eziokwu nke metụtara eserese foto malitere ka ọnwa November dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ n'afọ 2017
Otu onye kwuru na ya zigara Daniels foto, ewee gwa ya ka ya na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri zukọọ bụ onye ga-akuziri ya otu esi emepụta ihe nkiri
Mgbe emechara nzukọ a , e kwuru na Regina Daniels wesoro onye ahụ iwe si na onye ahụ kwesiri inye onye nhazi fim onwe ya
Ka ụbọchị abụọ gacharaị, Daniels gọrọ ebubo niile ndị a, wee kwuo na onye ọzọ ji aha ya egwu nwata nwaantị ahụ na-eme ihe nkiri wayo
N'ụbọchi iri abụọ na atọ nke ọnwa November afọ 2017, aka ndị uwe ojii kpaara onye ahụ na-emendị mmadụ wayo, nke a mere ka Regina Daniels nnwere onwe ya
N'ụbọchị nke mbụ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2019 akụkọ si webịsite e ozi kwuru na ọnye ji ego akwado Regina Daniels bụ Ned Nwoko
Ihe mbipụta a wuru ewu na webụsite ndị ọzọ dị na Nigeria

Etinosa Idemudia na nzaghachi ndị nkatọ mgbasa ozi zara na soshal midia ya na ọ bụ nsọpụrụ ka enyere Regina Daniels site na ime ya nwunye nke isii onye sinetọ a ahọpụtara karịa ime ya enyi nwaanyị 'side chic'

N'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2019, Ned Nwoko nwetara akara ugo mmụta dị elu site na Federal University of Petroleum Resources Effurun ebe Harrysong bụ onye nchịkọta mmeme mgbe a hụrụ Regina Daniels na Ned Nwoko ka ha na-agba egwu
Ndị enyi ya na ndị nwere mmasị ebe ọ nọ nakwa ndị Naijiria akatọla ya nke ukwuu na alụmdi na nwunye ya na-ide ji ego dị afọ iri ise na iteolu lụrụ
N' abali iri-abụọ na iteolu n’ime ọnwa Juun n’afọ 2020 ka ọ mụụrụ Nwoko nwa nwoke
Regina George (amụrụ 17 Febrụwarị 1991 na Chicago, United States ) bụ onye oso nke Naijiria a mụrụ na mba Amerịka ọ bụ ọkachamara na 400 mita
Ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi Summer Olympik 2012 wee bụrụ onye nrite ọla ọcha na asọmpi Africa na 2012
Nna ya Phillips bụ onye Naijiria, kwagara US na egwuregwu enyemaka akwụkwọ ọgụgụ
Nna nna ya si Onitsha ebe nne nne ya si Rivers State, Nigeria
Nne ya bụbu onye egwuregwu Venezuelan 400 m, Florencia Chilberry
Nne na nna George ha abụọ bu ndi na-eme egwuregwu egwu na ogige ji ohere agụmakwụkwọ na Wichita State
George gbara asọmpi na Chicago Park District na-ezute dị ka nwata wee gbaa ọsọ otu maịl na 6 13 mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu
Ọ nwere otu nwanne tọrọ ya na ụmụnne atọ ndị o tọrọ
Na 2014, ya na Inika McPherson kwupụtara na mgbasa ozi ọha na ha na e mmekọrịta
Dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu nke obere, George nọchitere United States na 2010 World Junior Championship
Ọ debere nke asaa n'asọmpị 400 m nke ikpeazụ
Ọ mechara chịkọta ndị otu United States 4 × 400m ka ha nweta ihe nrite ọla edo n'ihu ndị otu Naijiria bụ ndị debere nke abụọ
Na asọmpi a, George kwupụtara ọchịchọ ya ịgba ọsọ maka Naijiria (ndị otu ya gbachara na ọkara nke abụọ n'azụ ya maka ihe nrite ọlaọcha ) nye onye nchịkwa Naijiria, Gabriel Okon
Ọ malitere ịsọ mpi Naijiria n'afọ 2012, tupu asọmpi Africa na London Olympik
Dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu kọleji maka Mahadum Arkansas, George meriri aha isii na 4 × 400 m SEC, na nke ime ụlọ atọ na aha n'èzí atọ
Ọ bụkwa onye SEC onye meriri 400 m na 2012 ya na 2013
Ọ kwadoro Razorbacks na aha NCAA 4 × 400 m nke èzí na 2013
O debere nke abụọ n'azụ Shaunae Miller na 400m nke ikpeazụ na 2013 NCAA Division I Indoor Championship na ime ụlọ PB nke 5105s
Nke a bụ oge nke atọ ọ na-edebe nke abụọ na asọmpi ime ụlọ
Ọ mechara nyere ndị otu Razorback 4 × 400m aka n'ọkwa nke abụọ n'ikpeazụ
Dị ka na 2015, George nọgidere na-ejikọta ya na Ryan Tolbert dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu 400m kasị elu nke na-enwetaghị aha ime ụlọ NCAA
George ghọrọ onye mmeri Naijiria n'afọ 2012 wee nweta ihe nrite ọla ọcha n'asọmpi 400 mita n'azụ onye mmeri n'ụwa bụ Amatle Montsho, na asọmpi Africa 2012
N'egwuregwu Olympic nke London 2012, George meriri okpomọkụ 400 m na 5124 mana ọ nweghi ike jikwaa njedebe nke ise na semifinal ya wee tụfuo na ikpeazụ
Ọ laghachiri maka okpomọkụ 4 × 400 ma mesịa gbaa ụkwụ nke atọ maka ndị otu Naijiria na nke ikpeazụ
Ndị otu ahụ gụchara n'ọkwa nke asaa mgbe mbụ bụ ndị a chụpụrụ n'ihi mmejọ ụzọ n'oge mgbanwe n'etiti Odumosu na George
Na 2013, George dara n'okpuru 51 s na oge mbụ na Nigeria Athletics Championship na Calabar
Ọ gbara 5099 iji nweta aha mba n'ihu Patience George
Nke a setịpụrụ ọnọdụ maka oge fọdụrụnụ
Na asọmpi mba ụwa nke Moscow, o mepụtara ihe kacha mma nkeonwe bu 5084 iji banye nke atọ na ọkara ikpeazụ mana ọ tụfuru ebe ya na nke ikpeazụ
Ọ laghachiri maka relays wee mepụta nkewa nke sub 50 nkewa iji nweta Nigeria ebe ntozu akpaaka maka asọmpi 4 × 400 m ikpeazụ
Ndị otu ahụ mechara debere nke isii na nke ikpeazụ ya na George na-agba ọsọ sub 50 nkewa ọzọ
Na 2013 Penn relays, ọ gbakwara ọsọ kacha ngwa ngwa na nkewa nke nzukọ niile
Na Jenụwarị 2014, George gbara ọsọ 600m n'oge ndekọ ime ụlọ Africa nke 1 2576
Oge a mere ka George gaa na ọkwa nke itoolu na ndepụta ime ụlọ n'ụwa niile
Dị ka onye kasị ọsọ na iru eru, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọkacha mmasị maka 2014 IAAF World Indoor Championships, ma o pụrụ na ọkara ikpeazụ n'ihi krampu ụkwụ
Na 2014 mbipụta nke mbu IAAF World Relays na Nassau, Bahamas, ọ gbara ọsọ nkewa n'oge ikpeazụ nke mgbagharị 4 × 400 m
Ndị otu Naijiria nwere Sade Abugan, Regina George, Omolara Omotoso na Patience George gbachara n'ọkwa nke atọ n'azụ USA na Jamaica
Na 2014 Nigerian Track and Field Championship na Calabar, a manyere ya ịchekwa aha obodo nke ọ meriri n'afọ abụọ gara aga
Ọ gbara oge ntozu kacha ngwa ngwa na semifinal
N'ụzọ dị ịtụnanya, ọ debere nke anọ na nke ikpeazụ n'azụ ndị otu ya si na 2014 world relay quartet
Onye bụbu onye mmeri nke obere asọmpi ụwa, Sade Abugan nwetara aha mba ahu
Abugan ga-emecha bụrụ onye mmeri Africa na 2014
George gbara ọsọ n'oge okpomọkụ na ngwụcha nke 4 × 400 m na egwuregwu Glasgow Commonwealth
Ndị otu nke mejupụtara Patience George, Regina George, Ada Benjamin na Sade Abugan nwetara ihe nrite ọlaọcha n'azụ ndị otu Jamaica
Otu otu a gara n'ihu nweta ihe nrite ọla edo n'asọmpi Afrịka na Marrakesh ebe George debere nke isii n'asọmpị 200m ikpeazụ
Na 2015 IAAF World Relays na Nassau, George gbara ụkwụ nke abụọ nke ndi otu 4 × 200 m relay nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo n'ihu ndị otu Jamaica na German
Otu ndị mejupụtara Blessing Okagbare, George, Dominique Duncan na Christy Udoh meriri n'ọsọ 1 3052 wee kpuchiri ndekọ Afrịka gara aga na mmemme ahụ
Ọ debere nke abụọ n'asọmpi Naijiria n'azụ Patience George wee si otú ahụ mechie ọkwa ya maka asọmpi mba ụwa na 2015 na Beijing
Ọ enweteghi ihe ebe kacha efu na okpomọkụ 400m na Beijing ma ọ banyeghị na ọkara nke ikpeazụ
Ọ du kwara ndị otu relay Nigeria 4 × 400 m gbachara n'ọkwa ise na 4 × 400 m nke ikpeazụ
George so na ndị otu Nigeria 4 x 400 m nke gbachara nke abụọ n'asọmpi Afrịka na Durban
Regina Ilyinichna Spektor (n'asụsụ Russia; amụrụ na Febụwarị 18, 1980) bụ onye Russia na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, nakwa onye na-akpọ egwu

Mgbe o weputara egwu atọ mbụ ya ma bụrụ onye na-ewu ewu na ihe nkiri egwu nke New York City, ọkachasị ihe nkiri nke hiwere isi na New York City's East Village, Spektor bịanyere aka na Sire Records na 2004 wee malite inweta nkwanye ùgwù dị ukwuu
Mgbe o nyechara abọm nke atọ ya nnukwu mweputa, Sire wepụtara abọm nke anọ nke Spektor, Begin to Hope, nke nwetara asambodo Gold site na RIAA
Abọm abụọ ya sochirinụ, Far na What We Saw from the Cheap Seats, pụtara na nọmba nke atọ na Billboard 200
Egwu nke o weputara na 2016 a kpọrọ 'Remember Us to Life' ruru nọmba nke ịrị abụọ na atọ na 200
Mayor Bill de Blasio kwupụtara June 11, 2019 dika ụbọchị Regina Spektor n'obodo New York
A kpọbatara Spektor na Bronx Walk of Fame na Mee 18, 2019, site n'aka onye isi obodo Borough Rubén Díaz Jr
A mụrụ Spektor n'afọ 1980 na Moscow, Soviet Union, nye ezinụlọ ndị Russia na ndị Juu na-agu egwu
Nna ya, Ilya Spektor, bụ onye na-ese foto na onye na-akpọ violin
Nne ya, Bella Spektor, bụ prọfesọ egwu na kọleji egwu nke Soviet ma na-akụzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ọha na eze na Mount Vernon, New York
Spektor nwere nwanne nwoke, Boruch (nke a makwaara dị ka Bear), onye egosipụtara na egwu nke asaa, '* * *', ma ọ bụ 'Whisper', nke abọm ya nke afọ 2004 Soviet Kitsch
Mgbe ọ na-etolite na Moscow, Regina malitere ịmụ piano mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa ma mụta otú e si akpọ piano site n'ịme ihe na Petrof nke nna nna ya nyere nne ya

O tolitere na-ege egwu oge ochie na ndị ama ama na Russia dị ka Vladimir Vysotsky na Bulat Okudzhava Nna ya, onye nwetara egeu dị iche iche na Eastern Europe ma soro ndị enyi ya na Soviet Union na-azụ ahịa kaseti, kpughere ya nye ndị na-ahụ egwu rock and roll dịka Beatles, Queen, na Moody Blues
Ezinụlọ ahụ hapụrụ Soviet Union gaa Bronx na 1989, mgbe Spektor dị afọ itoolu na ọkara, n'oge Perestroika, mgbe e kwere ka ụmụ amaala Soviet kwaga
Ọ ghaghị ịhapụ piano ya

Ịjisi ike nke ọmụmụ piano ya mere ka nne na nna ya tụlee ịghara ịhapụ Soviet Union, mana ha mechara kpebie ịkwaga mba ọzọ n'ihi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, agbụrụ, na ikpa oke nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke chere ndị Juu ihu
Ha bu ụzọ gaa Austria, e mechaa ha gaa Italy, a nabatara ezinụlọ Spektor na United States dị ka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ site n'enyemaka nke HIAS (Hebrew Immigrant Aid Society)
Ha biri na Bronx, ebe Spektor gụsịrị akwụkwọ na SAR Academy, ụlọ akwụkwọ etiti ndị Juu na mpaghara Riverdale nke Bronx
Ebe ọ bụ na ezinụlọ ahụ enweghị ike iweta piano ha site na Moscow, Spektor malitere imu ihe na mbadamba nkume na ebe ndị ọzọ siri ike ruo mgbe ọ chọtara piano iji kpọọ n'okpuru ụlọ nzukọ ya

Na New York City, Spektor gụrụ piano oge ochie ya na Sonia Vargas, prọfesọ na Manhattan School of Music, ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa; nna Spektor zutere Vargas site n'aka di Vargas, onye na-akpọ violin aha ya bụ Samuel Marder

Spektor gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị afọ abụọ na Frisch School, yeshiva na Paramus, New Jersey, mana ọ gafere n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze, Fair Lawn High School, na Fair Lawn, New Jersey, ebe ọ gụsịrị afọ abụọ ikpeazụ nke agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Spektor nwere mmasị na egwu oge ochie naanị, mana o mechara nwee mmasị na hip hop, rock, na punk

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-abụ abụ mgbe niile n'ụlọ, ọ malitere inwe mmasị n'ịde egwu n'oge nleta ya na Israel ya na Nesiya Institute n'afọ iri na ụma ya mgbe ọ dọtara uche ụmụaka ndị ọzọ na njem ahụ maka abụ ndị o mere mgbe ọ na-eme njem
N'ịgbaso njem a, Spektor hụrụ ọrụ Joni Mitchell, Ani DiFranco, na ndị ọzọ na-agụ egwu, nke gbara ya ume ikwere na ọ nwere ike ịmepụta egwu nke ya
O dere egwu acappella mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii nakwa egwu mbụ ya maka olu na piano mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa
Spektor mechara mmemme nhazi studio nke afọ anọ nke Conservatory of Music na Purchase College n'ime afọ atọ, na-agụsị akwụkwọ na 2001
N'oge a, ọ rụkwara ọrụ obere oge na ugbo urukurubụba na Luck, Wisconsin, ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Tottenham (na North London) maka otu oge
Spektor ji nwayọọ nwayọọ nweta nkwanye ùgwù site na arụmọrụ na obodo New York City, nke kachasị na East Village SideWalk Cafe
O mekwara ihe nkiri na kọleji obodo (dịka Sarah Lawrence College) ya na ndị egwu ndị ọzọ, nke gụnyere Trachtenburg Family Slideshow Players
O rere CD ndị o bipụtara n'onwe ya n'oge a 11 11 (2001) na Songs (2002)
Njem mbụ Spektor na mba niile na-eso The Strokes dị ka mmeghe na njem Room on Fire nke e mere n'afọ 2003-2004 nke gụnyere ihe nkiri na The Theater na Madison Square Garden
Mgbe ọ nọ na njem ahụ, ya na ndị otu ahụ mere ma dekọọ 'Modern Girls & Old Fashion Men'
Mgbe njem ahụ gasịrị, Kings of Leon, bụ ndị mmeghe nke abụọ na njem ahụ, kpọrọ Spektor ka ọ meghere ha njem nke ha na Europe
N'afọ 2004, Spektor bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ya na otu egwu nke Warner Brothers' a kpọrọ Sire Records iji bipụta ma kesaa abọm nke atọ ya Soviet Kitsch, nke ewepụtara onwe ya na 2003
N'afọ 2005, ọ malitere ịpụta na TV mbụ ya nke gụnyere ọnọdụ ndị ọbịa na ihe ngosi okwu abalị dị iche iche
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2005, Spektor bụ onye mmeghe maka ndị otu egwu piano nke Bekee bụ Keane na njem ha na North America, n'oge a, o mere ihe ngosi na Radio City Music Hall na June 7, 2005
Spektor gara n'ihu wepụta abọm Begin to Hope na June 13, 2006
Abọm ahụ malitere na nọmba nke ịrị asaa na Billboard 200, mana n'ihi iwu ewu nke egwu 'Fidelity', ọ gara n'ihu wee ruo na nọmba nke ịrị abụọ, RIAA jiri onyinye ọla edo wee kwado ya
Spektor nwetara nlebara anya mgbe e lere vidiyo ya maka 'Fidelity' ihe karịrị ugboro pụkụ narị abụọ n'ime ụbọchị abụọ na YouTube
Njem Spektor mere n'afọ 2006 iji kwado abọm Begin to Hope gụnyere ihe ngosi obodo na Town Hall Theater na New York City na Septemba 27 na Septemba 28, 2006
Njem a bụ nke mbụ Spektor gosipụtara otu ndị egwu ya na-akwado ya
Ndị na-ege ntị na Sirius Radio's Left of Center channel họpụtara otu egwu ya 'Fidelity' dị ka egwu nke mbu na 2006

Ka ọ na-erule ngwụsị afọ 2006, VH1 gosipụtara ya dịka akụkụ nke 'You Oughta Know Artists on the Rise' featurettes, na-egosi ihe nkiri sitere na vidiyo egwu 'Fidelity' ma na-egosi akụkụ nke ajụjụ ọnụ a jụrụ Spektor n'oge ezumike azụmahịa na ọwa ahụ
Vidio Spektor maka 'Fidelity' ruru nọmba nke atọ na VH1's Top 20 Countdown
Spektor ruru nọmba nke ịrị atọ na atọ na mmadụ otu narị kachasị elu nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Blender nke afọ 2006 ma depụta ya dị ka otu n'ime 'Hottest Women of Rock'
Na Jenụwarị 21, 2007, e nyere ya nnukwu ihe ngosi na CBS News Sunday Morning nke gosipụtara mmalite egwu ya na ewu ewu
N'afọ 2007, Spektor malitere ime ọtụtụ ememme egwu nke gụnyere Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival, Bonnaroo Music Festival, Lollapalooza, Virgin Festival, na Austin City Limits Music Festival
Na Ọktoba 1, 2007, ewepụtara vidiyo ya maka 'Better' na VH1 na YouTube, ebe ọ natara ihe nlele karịrị otu narị puku n'ime awa iri abụọ na anọ mbụ ya
Spektor rụrụ ụda olu na Neil Young's Bridge School Benefit na Shoreline Amphitheatre na October 27, 2007
Na Nọvemba 14, 2007, na egwu ya na Ryman Auditorium na Nashville, Spektor dara n'oge nyocha ụda, e wee buru ya gaa n'ụlọ mberede obodo
Dị ka nkwupụta e nyere ndị na-ege ntị, Spektor dị mma, mana ndị dọkịta kwuru na ọ pụghị ime ihe ngosi ọ bụla n'abalị ahụ
E mechara kwuo na ihe kpatara ọdịda ahụ bụ ọrịa ntị nke kpatara nnukwu vertigo
E megharịrị ihe ngosi ahụ na mbụ maka Disemba 6, 2007, mana emegharịrị ụbọchị ahụ ọzọ, egwu ahụ mechara mee na Febụwarị 29, 2008
Mgbe ọdịda mbụ ya na Nashville gachara, o nwere ike ịme egwu na Mountain Stage, na West Virginia, na Nọvemba 18, 2007 (e gosipụtara egwu ahụ na Septemba 2008), na Mahadum Duke na Nọvemba 19, 2007
Spektor dere egwu 'The Call' maka ihe nkiri 2008 The Chronicles of Narnia Prince Caspian, nke pụtara nke ọma na usoro ikpeazụ nke ihe nkiri ahụ
Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara dị ka onye ọbịa na-agu egwu na 'You Don't Know Me', otu egwu sitere na abọm Ben Folds nke afọ 2008 a kpọrọ Way to Normal
N'ịkwalite otu egwu ahụ, ha abụọ gụkọrọ ma gosipụta egwu ahụ ọnụ na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi okwu abalị
E wepụtara abọm nke ise nke Spektor, Far, na June 23, 2009
Maka mmepụta abọm ahụ, ya na mmadụ anọ ndị na-emepụta ihe rụkọrọ ọrụ David Kahne (onye ya na Spektor rụkọrọ ọrụ na Begin to Hope), Mike Elizondo, Jacknife Lee, na Jeff Lynne
Ihe ndekọ ahụ rere mkpụrụ pụkụ ịrị ise n'izu mbụ ya, na-abanye na US 200 na nọmba nke atọ; ndekọ ahụ nọgidere na chaatị maka izu iri na itoolu
Abọm ahụ ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ ịrị atọ na mba UK nakwa ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ịrị na isii na Canada
O mechara bụrụ onye isi na Serpentine Sessions, usoro egwu na London's Hyde Park na June 29, 2009
Ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ na Europe na 2009 gụnyere Glastonbury Festival, Hultsfred Festival, Oxegen 2009, T in the Park, Paradiso, Latitude Festival, na Rock Werchter
Spektor kpọrọ ndị otu egwu Jupiter One nke dị na Brooklyn ka ha mepee egwu na njem ya na North America n'afọ 2009
Dị ka akụkụ nke njem ahụ, na Ọktoba 14, 2009, Spektor mere isi egwu na Radio City Music Hall na NYC
Na Septemba 16, 2009, a mara ọkwa na Spektor ga-ede egwu maka egwu Beauty, mgbanwe nke oge a nke akụkọ ifo Sleeping Beauty, nke e debere na mbụ imeghe n'oge 2011–12 Broadway
Regina mere Saturday Night Live mbụ ya na October 10, 2009, na-eme 'Eet' na 'The Calculation' na Far
Na Mee 2010, Spektor mere ihe ngosiputa nye Barack na Michelle Obama tinyere ọtụtụ narị ndị ọbịa ndị ọzọ na nnabata White House iji kwanyere ọnwa ndị Juu America ùgwù
O mere 'Us' na 'The Sword & the Pen'
E wepụtara abọm nke isii nke Spektor, What We Saw from the Cheap Seats, na Mee 29, 2012
Dị ka abọm ya gara aga, ọ malitere na nọmba atọ na Billboard 200
Njem ụwa ya iji kwado What We Saw from the Cheap Seats gụnyere ihe ngosiputa na Moscow; Spektor alọtabeghị kemgbe ya na ezinụlọ ya gbapụrụ na 1989
N'afọ 2012, a kpọrọ Spektor onye 'Steinway Artist'; ọ na-akpọ piano nke Steinway & Sons dika ọkachamara
Spektor dere ma dekọọ isi egwu, 'You've Got Time', maka usoro Netflix mbụ Orange Is the New Black, nke malitere na July 2013
A họpụtara ya maka ihe nrite nke Best Song Written for Visual Media category na 56th Annual Grammy Awards
Spektor kwupụtara abọm nke asaa ya, 'Remember Us to Life' na July 21, 2016, site na akwụkwọ akụkọ email ya
E wepụtara abọm ahụ na Septemba 30, 2016
E wepụtara egwu mbụ, 'Bleeding Heart', na Julaị 22, 2016
E wepụtara egwu sochiri ya, 'Small Bill $', n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 11, 2016
Regina Spektor mere ihe ngosiputa nke George Harrison's 'While My Guitar Gently Weeps', nke e wepụtara n'August 5, 2016, maka ihe nkiri Kubo and the Two Strings
N'afọ 2016, Spektor bụ otu n'ime ndị na-agu egwu e mepụtara na The Hamilton Mixtape; ọ na-abụ remix nke 'Dear Theodosia' ya na Ben Folds
N'afọ 2017, e gosipụtara Spektor dị ka onye ọbịa na-abụ na egwu aha nke abọm Gypsy-punk band Gogol Bordello's a kpọrọ Seekers and Finders
E gosikwara Spektor dị ka onye ọbịa na egwu Odesza 'Just A Memory' site na abọm ha A Moment Apart
Na Nọvemba 8, 2018, Spektor wepụtara egwu ọhụrụ akpọrọ 'Birdsong', nke e dere maka usoro ihe omume nke Amazon Prime a kpọrọ The Romanoffs
Na Machị 25, 2019, Spektor kwupụtara na ọ ga-eweta egwu ya na Broadway dị ka Artist in Residency na Lunt-Fontanne Theatre maka ihe ngosiputa ise na June 20–26, 2019
Na Julaị 26, 2019, Spektor wepụtara ụdị egwu ọzọ nke egwu ya 'You've Got Time', nke dabara na mwepụta nke oge nke asaa na nke ikpeazụ nke ihe nkiri Orange Is the New Black
E gosipụtara abụ ahụ na ihe omume ikpeazụ nke usoro ahụ
Ná ngwụsị afọ 2019, Spektor wepụtara egwu ọhụrụ, 'Walking Away', maka usoro ihe nkiri nke Amazon Prime a kpọrọ Modern Love
Na Febụwarị 22, Spektor kwupụtara abọm nke asatọ ya bụ Home, before and after n'ụbọchị mweputa nke June 24, tinyere mweputa nke egwu 'Becoming All Alone'
Emeputara ya na ugwu New York, Spektor na John Congleton mepụtara abọm ahụ
Ngwá egwu Spektor bụ piano, ọ na-akpọkwa guitar dị ka ngwá egwu nke abụọ, na-akpọkarị na Epiphone Wildkat archtop hollow-body electric guitar maka arụmọrụ ndụ
Spektor ekwuola na o meela ọtụtụ egwu mana ọ dịghị edekarị nke ọ bụla n'ime ha
Abụ Spektor anaghị abụkarị akụkọ ndụ ya kama ọ dabere na ọnọdụ na ihe odide sitere n'echiche ya
Egwu ya na-egosi mmetụta sitere na ndị mmadụ, punk, rock, Jewish, Russian, hip hop, jazz, na egwu oge ochie
Spektor ekwuola na ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike iji hụ na nke ọ bụla n'ime egwu ya nwere ụdị egwu ya, kama ịnwa ịzụlite ụdị dị iche maka egwu ya n'ozuzu ya 'Ọ dịghị m mma ka m dee ụfọdụ ụdị egwu
Achọrọ m ide egwu dị ka 'Yesterday' mana abụ ndị na-enweghị atụ banyere bọọlụ anụ na friji na-abata n'isi m - enweghị m ike inyere ya aka
Spektor na-arụ ọrụ site na iji ụda olu sara mbara, na mgbatị falsetto, mana enweghị nkwụsị ọ bụla

Ọ na-enyocha usoro olu dị iche iche dị iche na nke na-adịghị mma, dị ka amaokwu ndị mejupụtara ụda olu na-ada ụda nke egbugbere ọnụ na ụdị beatbox na-eme nke ọma n'etiti ballads, ma na-ejikwa usoro egwu ndị a na-adịghị ahụkebe dị ka iji mkpanaka drum na-agbanye ụda n'ahụ oche
Akụkụ nke ụdị ya na-esitekwa na ikwubiga okwu ókè nke akụkụ ụfọdụ nke ụda olu, ọkachasị nkwụsị glottal, nke a ma ama na otu egwu 'Fidelity'
Ọ na-ejikwa olu New York siri ike n'okwu ụfọdụ, nke o kwuru na ọ bụ n'ihi ịhụnanya ọ hụrụ New York na omenala ya
Spektor na-abụkarị abụ n'asụsụ Bekee, ọ bụ ezie na mgbe ụfọdụ ọ na-etinye okwu ole na ole ma ọ bụ amaokwu nke Latin, Russian, French, ma ọ bụ asụsụ ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-eji mkpọpụta egwuri egwu nke ọ gwara NPR ka ọ bụrụ ihe fọdụrụ n'afọ ndị mbụ ya mgbe ọ na-ege pop na Bekee n'aghọtaghị okwu
Okwu egwu ya dịkwa iche, na-ewerekarị ụdị akụkọ na-enweghị atụ ma ọ bụ ọmụmụ onye mbụ, dịka akụkọ dị mkpirikpi ma ọ bụ vignettes na-abụ
Ụfọdụ n'ime okwu Spektor gụnyere edemede edemede, dị ka F

Scott Fitzgerald na Ernest Hemingway na 'Poor Little Rich Boy'; The Little Prince na 'Baobabs'; Virginia Woolf na Margaret Atwood in 'Paris'; Ezra Pound na The Merchant of Venice na 'Pound of Flesh'; Boris Pasternak na 'Après Moi'; Samson na Delilah na 'Samson'; Oedipus Rex na 'Oedipus'; Edith Wharton's Ethan Frome na '299 Blues'

Isiokwu na isiokwu ndị a na-ahụkarị na abụ Spektor gụnyere ịhụnanya, ọnwụ, okpukpe (karịsịa ntụgharị Bible na ndị Juu), ndụ obodo (karịsịa ntụgharị New York), na ụfọdụ ahịrịokwu dị mkpa nke a na-emegharị na abụ dị iche iche, dị ka ntụgharị aka na ndị na-eli ozu, Osisi nke Ihe Ọmụma na Ihe Ọjọọ, na aha 'Mary Ann'

Ojiji Spektor ji satire mee ihe pụtara ìhè na 'Wasteside', nke na-arutu aka na 'The Twelve Chairs', akwụkwọ akụkọ mkpaọchi nke ndị edemede Soviet bụ Ilf na Petrov dere, ma kọwaa obodo a mụrụ ndị mmadụ, na-akpụ ntutu isi ha, wee ziga ha n'ili ozu
E dekọrọ abọm mbụ nke Spektor, 11 11, ma wepụta onwe ya mgbe ọ ka nọ na kọleji
Ọ dị iche na mwepụta nke Spektor mechara wepụta ebe ọ bụ na blues na jazz nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'oge mmepụta ya
E dekọrọ abọm nke abụọ ya, Songs, n'ụbọchị Krismas nke afọ 2001
E dekọrọ egwu ọ bụla naanị otu oge ma bụrụ ụda olu
Oge nke e si nweta abọm ahụ abụghị nke ebu n'uche dị ka nnọkọ ndekọ abọm
Abọm nke atọ ya, Soviet Kitsch, gosipụtara ụdọ n'ọtụtụ egwu ma bụrụ nke mbụ ya gosipụtara otu egwu zuru ezu
Mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na nnukwu ụlọọrụ mmepụta egwu - nke nyere mmefu ego buru ibu maka mmepụta na oge studio - Spektor malitere imesi mmepụta ike ma jiri ngwá egwu pop mee ihe n'ụzọ pụtara ìhè
Spektor na-ekwu na ihe ndekọ ndị kachasị emetụta ya bụ nke 'ndị egwu ha metụtara n'ezie'
O hotara Beatles, Bob Dylan, Nirvana, Madonna, Eminem, Kate Bush, Rufus Wainwright, David Bowie, Ramones, Patti Smith, Billie Holiday, Radiohead, Tom Waits, na Frédéric Chopin dị ka ndị isi mmetụta
Onye na-agụ egwu Britain bụ Kate Nash kwuru, sị, 'Mụ na ya nwere mmekọrịta n'ihi na ọ bụ nwanyị na-akpọ piano ma na-ede egwu ndị a na-echepụta n'echiche
Akpọwo m piano kemgbe m dị ihe dị ka afọ asaa mana ahụtụbeghị m ya dị ka ngwá egwu maka egwu pop
Regina Spektor mere ka piano dị jụụ
Enwere m mmasị na olu ya na-enwu gbaa
Mgbe m malitere ịme egwu, ọ kpaliri m ịbụ abụ dịka m na-ekwu okwu, n'ihi na nke ahụ bụ ihe dị adị
Kemgbe afọ 2005, ejirila egwu Spektor mee ihe na mmemme telivishọn na mgbasa ozi dị iche iche
Spektor maara asụsụ Russian nke ọma ma na-agụ asụsụ Hibru

O nyewo ekele maka ihe nketa ya nke Russia, na-ekwuputa uri 'February' nke onye Russia na-ede uri bụ Boris Pasternak dere na abụ ya 'Après Moi', ma kwuo, 'Enwere m njikọ dị ukwuu na asụsụ na ọdịbendị'

Spektor na ezinụlọ ya alaghachighị Moscow ruo n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2012, mgbe ọ gara njem na Russia iji kwado abọm nke isii ya, What We Saw from the Cheap Seats O kwuru na ọ bụbu onye na-adighi eri anụ, ọ bụ ezie na ọ kwụsịrị nke a mgbe ya na The Strokes, bụ ndị na-eri anụ rikọrọ nri ugboro ugboro
Spektor lụrụ onye na-agụ egwu Jack Dishel n'afọ 2011
N'oge gara aga, Dishel bụ onye na-akpọ egwu na ndị otu egwu The Moldy Peaches, Dishel bụ onye otu egwu Only Son, ya na Spektor gụkọrọ egwu 'Call Them Brothers'
Ha mụrụ nwa nwoke na Machị 2014
N'ajụjụ ọnụ nke afọ 2016 na NPR, 'Regina Spektor 'Ana m ahụ ezinụlọ m
Na Onye ọ bụla', Spektor na-atụle ahụmịhe na mgba dị ka onye ntorobịa si mba ọzọ na New York nwere n'inye aka na abọm na-adịbeghị anya Remember Us to Life
N'afọ 2007, Spektor kpuchiri 'Real Love' nke John Lennon maka Instant Karma The Amnesty International Campaign to Save Darfur
N'afọ sochirinụ, o sonyere na Songs for Tibet, atụmatụ iji kwado ikike mmadụ na Tibet na Dalai Lama nke iri na anọ
E wepụtara abọm ahụ na August 5, 2008, site na iTunes na August 19 na ụlọ ahịa egwu gburugburu ụwa
Na Jenụwarị 22, 2009, Spektor mere ngosiputa egwu na ememe Roe on the Rocks nke atọ kwa afọ na Bowery Ballroom iji nweta ego maka Planned Parenthood New York City
Ọzọkwa, na-aga n'ihu na nkwado ya maka Tibet, Regina Spektor kpọrọ egwu maka egwu Tibet House kwa afọ na Carnegie Hall na Febụwarị 26, 2010
N'ihe na-erughị otu ọnwa ka e mesịrị, na Machị 23, 2010, Spektor nyere egwu na Fillmore na Irving Plaza na New York City iji nweta ego maka ọrụ Médecins Sans Frontières na Haiti

Ọzọkwa, n'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Eprel, o wepụtara mkpuchi nke egwu Radiohead 'No Surprises', nke ego niile e metara na ya gara Médecins Sans Frontières iji nyere ndị ala ọma jijiji metụtara aka na Haiti na Chile

N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2012, Spektor mere egwu bara uru na Rose Hall maka HIAS (ụlọ ọrụ na-erite uru nke UJA-Federation of New York), otu nzukọ nke nyeere Spektor na-eto eto na ezinụlọ ya aka ịkwaga Soviet Union
Spektor sonyekwara n'ọtụtụ egwu ncheta na uru maka ezinụlọ Dan Cho, onye bụbu onye na-akpọ cellist ya nke nwụrụ mgbe ya na ya na-eme njem na 2010
Abọm Studio
MVPA Awards
Regina Gelana Twala (1908), bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị, onye edemede, onye nchọpụta, onye na-ezisa ozi ọma, na onye ndú nnwere onwe n'ihe bụ eSwatini ugbu a
Mgbe ọ ghọsịrị nwanyị ojii mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, Twala ghọrọ onye nchọpụta na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na-enyere aka ịmepụta Swaziland Progressive Party
Ọ bụkwa naanị nwanyị na-azọ oche na Kansụl Iwu mbụ nke Swaziland na 1964
A mụrụ Regina Twala na 1908, n'ezinụlọ Zulu
N'afọ 1948, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị ojii mbụ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand na Johannesburg
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, ebe thesis ya lekwasịrị anya na beadwork Africa
Ọ ghọrọ onye nchọpụta na-arụpụta ihe, ọkachasị na nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị na omenala obodo na ndịda Afrịka
O guzobekwara ọbá akwụkwọ kpọmkwem maka ụmụ nwanyị
Dị ka onye edemede, Twala nyere aka na kọlụm akwụkwọ akụkọ n'ọtụtụ mbipụta na Swaziland, gụnyere Umteteli Wa Bantu na Izwi lama Swazi
Ọ na-ede ugboro ugboro n'okpuru aha nzuzo, gụnyere Mademoiselle, Gelana, RD Twala, Reggie, na Sister Kollie
Mgbe ọ nwụrụ, ọ hapụrụ akwụkwọ anọ a na-ebipụtaghị
Twala bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ n'Afrịka na onye ndú nnwere onwe, na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ihe omume na-emegide ọchịchị
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya gụnyere na 1960 na-akwado ntọala Swaziland Progressive Party, nke ọ bụ onye nwere mmetụta
Ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye omeiwu mbụ nke Swaziland na ntuli aka Swazi nke afọ 1964, na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye nweere onwe ya na mpaghara Manzini
Twala bụ naanị nwanyị a họpụtara na ntuli aka ahụ
O nwetaghị oche
Na mgbakwunye, Twala bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ nke ofufe Pentikọstal na mpaghara ahụ, onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'òtù Ndị Kraịst na-ekwusa ozi ọma
A na-eto ya maka iwebata Assemblies of God denomination na mpaghara nke bụ ugbu a eSwatini
Ọ lụrụ di mbụ ya, Percy Kumalo, na 1936
N'afọ 1939, mgbe ha abụọ gbara alụkwaghịm, ọ lụrụ onye ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze Dan Twala, onye ghọrọ onye na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ n'ọrụ ya
Di na nwunye ahụ bụ ezigbo enyi Nelson Mandela na Winnie Madikizela-Mandela
Twala nwụrụ na 1968, otu ọnwa tupu Swaziland enwee nnwere onwe
Reginald K
Gee (April 28, 1964) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, ónyé édémédé na onye na-eti egwu
E gosipụtara usoro ihe osise akpa akwụkwọ na-acha nchara nchara (1995-2002) na nyocha afọ 25 na David Barnett Gallery
A mụrụ Reginald K Gee na 1964 na Milwaukee, Wisconsin ma nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'akụkụ ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ na mpaghara Havenwoods
Gee bụ onye Afrịka na Native-American (Blackfoot / Choctaw)
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụnne atọ
Nné na nnà Gee si Mississippi, ébé ezinụlọ nne ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ndị na-ekere òkè
Nna Gee, Hamilton R
Gee, bụ onye agha nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ nke bịara Milwaukee na 1950s ịrụ ọrụ maka International Harvester
Nne Gee, Ethel L
Gardner Gee, bụ ónyé na-akwa ákwà nke lara ezumike nká na American Motors Corporation
Na mbido ndụ ya, Gee gosipụtara nkà nka ya na Byron Kilbourn Elementary School
Ihe ngosi nka izizi nké Gee mèrè na Febụwarị 1988 n'oge ngosi na Dean Jensen Gallery na Milwaukee, Wisconsin
Isiokwu Gee gụnyere ndị egwu jazz, ọdịdị ala, ọdịdị mmiri, romance, fantasy na nkọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
N'oge mmalite afọ 1990, egosiri nka Gee na Baltimore Folk & Visionary Art Show, New York Outsider Art Fair na National Black Fine Art Show na Puck Building na New York City
N'afọ 2002, a họọrọ ihe osise abụọ nke Gee, The Honest Crowdī na Inspirationī màkà 2002 Smithsonian Traveling Exhibition, In the Spirit of Martin The Living Legacy of Dr
Martin Luther King Jrī A họọrọ ihe nkírí ọzọ nke Gee, Ban Ban nke ụtaba, ©ī 1998, màkà mkpọsa megide ịṅụ sịga nke American Lung Association kwadoro
Ọchịchị ndị ruuru mmadụ nke mpaghara bụ ndị na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ikike mmadụ n'onwe ha nke dị n'ime nnukwu ọrụ nke omume ikike mmadụ nke mba ụwa
Enwere ike ịchọpụta ihe atọ bụ isi na mpaghara ruuru mmadụ, African Charter on Human and Peoples' Rights, Nkwekọrịta America na ikike mmadụ (America) na European Convention on Human Rights
African Union (AU) bụ otu mba obodo dị iche iche nke nwere steeti iri ise na atọ nke Afrịka

N'ịbụ nke e guzobere n'afọ 2001, ebumnuche AU bụ inye aka nweta ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n'Africa, ikike mmadụ, na akụ na ụba na-adịgide adịgide, ọkachasị site na iweta njedebe nke esemokwu dị n'ime Afrịka na ịmepụta ahịa dị irè
Akwụkwọ iwu Afrịka n'ihe gbasara ikike mmadụ na ndị mmadụ bụ isi ihe ruuru mmadụ na mpaghara ahụ ma pụta n'okpuru nkwado nke Organisation of African Unity (OAU) (ebe ọ bụ na African Union nọchiri ya)
E kwupụtara ebumnuche nke idepụta akwụkwọ ikike nke Afrịka maka ikike mmadụ na ndị mmadụ n'afọ 1979 ma jiri otu olu kwado akwụkwọ iwu ahụ na Mgbakọ OAU nke afọ 1981

Dabere na edemede nke iri isii na atọ ya (nke ọ ga-amalite ịrụ ọrụ ọnwa atọ mgbe odeakwụkwọ ukwu nabatara ngwá ọrụ nke nkwenye ma ọ bụ ịgbaso ọnụ ọgụgụ dị mfe' nke mba ndị otu OAU), African Charter on Human and Peoples' Rights malitere ịrụ ọrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'ubochí iri abụọ na otu, afọ 1986 - iji kwanyere ya ùgwù nke a kpọpụtara n'ọnwa Ọktoba ụbọchị irí abụọ na otu 'Ụbọchị Ikike Mmadụ nke Afrịka'

The African Commission on Human and People' Rights(ACHPR) bụ ngalaba ikpe nke African Union nke ọrụ ya bụ ịkwalite na ichebe ikike mmadụ na ikike nchịkọta (ndị mmadụ) na kọntinent Afrịka niile yana ịkọwa Charter Afrịka na ikike mmadụ na ndị mmadụ na ịtụle mkpesa nke onye ọ bụla banyere mmebi nke Charter
Kọmitii ahụ nwere akụkụ atọ dị ukwuu nke ibu ọrụ
Organization of American States (OAS) bụ nzukọ mba ụwa, nke isi ya dị na Washington, DC, United States
Ndị otu ya bụ steeti iri atọ na ise nwere onwe ha nke America

N'ime afọ ndị 1990, na njedebe nke Agha Nzuzo, nlọghachi na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Latin America [nkọwa dị mkpa], na ntinye aka n'ịkwado ụwa ọnụ, OAS mere mgbalị dị ukwuu iji weghachite onwe ya iji kwekọọ n'ọnọdụ ọhụrụ ahụ
Ihe ndị dị mkpa ugbu a tinyekwara ihe ndị a
Inter-American Commission on Human Rights (IACHR) bụ akụkụ nwere onwe ya nke Organization of American States, nke dịkwa na Washington, DC
Tinyere Inter-American Court of Human Rights, nke dị na San José, Costa Rica, ọ bụ otu n'ime ahụ mejupụtara usoro inter-American maka ịkwalite na nchedo ikike mmadụ
IACHR bụ òtù na-adịgide adịgide nke na-ezukọ na nnọkọ pụrụ iche ụfọdụ ugboro n'afọ iji nyochaa ebubo nke imebi ikike mmadụ na gburugburu ụwa
Ọrụ ruuru mmadụ ya sitere na akwụkwọ atọ
Enweghị òtù ma ọ bụ mgbakọ dị n'Eshia niile iji kwalite ma ọ bụ chebe ikike mmadụ
Obodo dịgasị iche iche n'ụzọ ha si ele ikike mmadụ anya na ndekọ ha n'ihi nchedo ikike mmadụ

Njikọ nke Mba Ndịda Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia (ASEAN) bụ nzukọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na akụ na ụba nke mba iri dị na Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia, nke Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Singapore na Thailand guzobere n'afọ 1967
Òtù ahụ ugbu a gụnyekwara Brunei, Vietnam, Laos, Myanmar na Cambodia
Ebumnuche ya gụnyere ngwa ngwa nke uto akụ na ụba, ọganihu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, mmepe ọdịbendị n'etiti ndị otu ya, na ịkwalite udo mpaghara
ASEAN guzobere n'afọ 2009 rụọ afọ 2010 otu Intergovernmental Commission on Human Rights
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2012, ASEAN nakweere Nkwupụta Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ nke ASEAN, mana, ka ọ na-erule afọ 2015, ọ ka enweghị mgbakọ ikike mmadụ ma ọ bụ ụlọ ikpe
Kansụl nke Europe, nke e hiwere n'afọ 1949, bụ nzukọ kachasị ochie na-arụ ọrụ n'ihe gbasara njikọta Europe
Ọ bụ nzukọ mba ụwa nwere ikike iwu kwadoro n'okpuru iwu mba ụwa ma nwee ọnọdụ onye nlele na United Nations
Isi oche nke Council of Europe dị na Strasbourg, France
Kansụl nke Europe na-ahụ maka ma European Convention on Human Rights na European Court of Human Rights
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị a na-ejikọta ndị otu kansụl ahụ na ụkpụrụ nke ikike mmadụ nke, ọ bụ ezie na ọ siri ike, dị nro karịa nke akwụkwọ iwu nke United Nations banyere ikike mmadụ
Kansụl ahụ na-akwalite European Charter for Regional or Minority Languages na European Social Charter
Ndị otu na-emeghe maka steeti Europe niile nke na-achọ njikọta Europe, na-anakwere ụkpụrụ nke iwu ma nwee ike ma dị njikere ijide n'aka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, ikike mmadụ na nnwere onwe
Enweghị ụzọ mpaghara ma ọ bụ nkwekọrịta gbasara ikike mmadụ maka Oceania, mana ọtụtụ mba nwere ndekọ ikike mmadụ nke ọma
Otú ọ dị, etinye n'ime afọ 2005 Pacific Plan, bụ nkwa maka atụmatụ nke 'ịgbachitere na ịkwalite ikike mmadụ' na mpaghara ahụ
Ebumnuche nke usoro ikike mmadụ mpaghara na-aga n'ihu, na ebumnuche iji guzobe ombudsman na usoro nchekwa nke na-agabiga Pacific Islands Forum

Reham Abdel Ghafour (amụrụ na 6 Septemba 1978 na El Mahalla El Kubra) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na nwa nwanyị nke onye Egypt a ma ama na-eme egwuregwu Ashraf Abdel Ghafur Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba Faculty of Commerce-English
Ya na Mohamed Henedi na Ashraf Abdel Baki pụtara n'ihe nkiri Saheb Sahbo
Reham na-eme ihe nkiri na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri TV dị ka Mallaki Eskinderiya, Kan yom Hobak, Gayy fel Saree', BelAraby cinderella
O sonyekwara n'egwuregwu dịka Bint Bonoot, AlMalek Lear (ya bụ
Eze Lear) na onye nkiri a ma ama Yehia El-Fakharany na Hamlet na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ndị Ijipt
Reine Sosso (onye bụ onye amụrụ n'abalị̀ iri na iteghete nke ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 1993 bụ(1993-03-19) ọ sobu dị ka nwanyị Cameroon na-echebe maka onyinye goolu bọọlụ
Ọ sonyeere dị ka otu n'ime ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Cameroon n'afọ 2012 Summer Olympics Na klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ nye ndị otu klọb nke Franck Rollycek
Reine Swart (née Malan) bụ onye nduzi South Africa, onye edemede na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Afrikaans bụ Die Pro (2015)
Ọ pụtara n'akụkụ Tye Sheridan, Bel Powley na Emory Cohen na ihe nkiri Detour (2016)
Swart bụ onye isi na Siembamba nke Darrell Roodt (2017)
Reine rụrụ ọrụ ya na James Badge Dale na 20th Century Fox's The Empty Man (2018)
N'afọ 2018, Swart mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na ihe nkiri egwu Heks, nke e wepụtara na South Africa n'okpuru aha Her Mask na United States dịka The Hex n'afọ 2020
N'otu afọ ahụ, Swart so n'otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri egwu egwu Triggered, nke a tọhapụrụ na United States na Nọvemba afọ 2020 na South Africa na Jenụwarị 2021
O sokwa dee ihe nkiri egwu na-abịanụ Flesh, nke Danielle Harris na-eme, ya na onye nduzi ihe nkiri ahụ, Chris McGowan
Swart gara Afrikaanse Hoër Meisieskool
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na Injinia Ụlọ Ọrụ na Mahadum Pretoria n'afọ 2012
Rekiya Yusuf bụ onye n'eme ihe nkiri Nollywood nke Naijiria
Ọ nọ na mmalite nke African Movie Channel Original Productions (AMCOP), ngalaba mmepụta nke African Movie Canal (AMC) n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ n'eme ihe nkiri Nollywood
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'Valerie' na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri Sunkanmi Adebayo nke afọ 2015, Spotlight, nke Segun Arinze, Desmond Elliott, Omoni Oboli, nakwa ndị ọzọ gosipụtara

N'afọ 2017, akwụkwọ akụkọ Guardian nke Nigeria bipụtara na onye n'eme ihe nkiri Naijiria, John Njama, ga-eduzi usoro ihe nkiri onyonyo akpọrọ, My Flatmates, iji gosipụta Rekiya Yusuf, Bright Okpocha (Basket Mouth), Steve Onu (Yaw), Okey Bakassi, Buchi onye na-atọ ọchị, Emmanuel Ikubese, Scarlet Sotade, nakwa Wofai
A họpụtara ya maka onyinye Best Actress (TV Series) na mbipụta nke abụọ nke Ghana-Naija Showbiz Awards (GNSA), nke emere na Lagos, Nigeria na Oktoba 14, 2018
E gosipụtara ya n'ihe nkiri egwu mbụ nke Bright Okpocha n'afọ 2019 nke akpọrọ, Exorcism of Alu, nke a sịrị na a ga egosi ya n'ụlọ ihe nkiri Naijiria site na Jenụwarị 15
Ndị ọzọ gụnyere onye na-agụ egwu Naijiria Sound Sultan na ndị mba ụwa dị ka Tevez Houston, Winona Crawford, Jamie Whitehouse, nakwa ndị ọzọ
Rele Gallery bụ ogige nka na ihe ngosi nke oge a dị na Lagos, Nigeria
Ọ dị na ogbe Military ,na Onikan Lagos na Victoria Island, Lagos
Ọ bụ Adenrele Sonariwo, onye na-ahụ maka nka na onye bụbu onye na-ndekọ ego, onye bụbu onye na arụ ọrụ PricewaterhouseCoopers, guzobere Rele
Ụlọ ngosi ahụ bụ akụkụ nke Rele Arts Foundation, otu ejiwere ma bụrụ nke na abụghị maka ịchunta ego
N'afọ 2021, ụlọ ngosi ahụ meghere ogige nke dị na Los Angeles, na California
Ọ bụ ụlọ ngosi ihe nkiri Africa mbụ emeghere na Los Angeles
Rele Gallery gosipụtara ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe ngosi na mba Naijiria nke gụnyere Victor Ehikhamenor na Kelechi Amadi-Obi
Ụlọ ngosi ahụ sonyekwara na Art Hamptons Fair (July 2013)

Relebogile Mabotja (amụrụ na Septemba 5, 1985) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ihe ngosi, onye na-ahụ maka redio, onye n’eti egwu, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye edemede, onye nduzi egwu ma nọ ugbu a obizi na Johannesburg, South Africa
A mụrụ Relebogile Mabotja nke a makwaara dị ka Lebo na 5 Septemba 1985 na Pretoria, Gauteng, South Africa
O tolitere na Pretoria, South Africa ebe ọ chọtara ike ya dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, a ghọtara ya maka ịgu egwu na ime ihe nkiri ya
N'afọ ikpeazụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, na Pretoria High School for Girls, 2003, e nyere ya ohere ịrụ ọrụ nke 'Mabel' na mmepụta Stage nke a na-akpọ Fame the Musical
Ná mmalite afọ 2000 Lebo nwetara ohere ịme ihe na mmeghe nke egwu 46664 na Cape Town International Convention Centre
O mekwara ihe nkiri na oriri nri abalị ya na ndị egwu ibe ya bụ Mara Louw, Shelley Meskin na Jo Redburn
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụsị afọ 2004, e nyere ya ohere igosi ihe ngosi na etv nke a na-akpọ BackChaton CrazE

A tụkwara ya na ihe ngosi televishọn ndị a Home Affairs, Zone 14, Generations (South African TV series), Skeem Saam, Rhythm City, Isidingo, ihe nkiri Afrikaans sketch comedy Kompleks yana ihe nkiri German a na-akpọ Traum Hotel
O nwetakwara ọrụ ngosi na etv show Gospel Grooves, nke gosipụtara n'ụtụtụ Sọnde
Ọ kọkwara akụkọ pụrụ iche nke SABC 2 nke akpọrọ 'The 12 Days of Christmas' n'afọ 2006
N'agbata afọ 2010 na afọ 2011, ọ kwadoro oge 1 na 2 nke ihe ngosi asọmpi nke gosipụtara na SABC 1 nke a na-akpọ Dance Your Butt Off
Ihe ngosi a bụ nsụgharị South Africa nke American Show Dance Your Ass Off
Kemgbe Machị 2017, ọ bụ onye ọbịa na-ahụkarị maka ihe ngosi abalị SABC 3 kwa ụbọchị Trending SA
N'afọ 2012, Lebo nwetara ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi redio n'onwe ya ma n'afọ 2013 ọ gara n'ihu na-akwado Overnight Live na Early Breakfast Show na Talk Radio 702 na 567 Cape Talk
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtakwara ya dị ka onye na-agụ akụkọ na onye na-akwado ihe ngosi nke Metro FM's afternoon drive show “The Kings Suite” mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwado ya maka Breakfast Show
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2019, a kpọrọ Lebo onye nnọchi anya Discovery “Real Time’, ọwa 155 na DSTV
Ná ngwụsị afọ 2004, e nyere Lebo ohere ịme egwu Afrikaans a na-akpọ Imbuba / Samesyn
O mere otu egwu ahụ na mmemme ndị na-esonụ Klein Karoo Nasionale Kunstefees na Innibos na Oudtshoorn na Nelspruit (Mbombela) n'otu n'otu
Na ngwụcha afọ 2000, Lebo rụrụ ọrụ nke “Pinky the Shebeen Queen” na egwu Soweto Story nke emere na Joburg Theatre na Gauteng
N'afọ 2013, Lebo rụrụ ọrụ na egwu egwu mbụ ya, o dere egwu ọwa ọhụrụ maka SABC 2's rebrand, You Belong, ya na onye mmepụta na onye na-ese ihe RJ Benjamin

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na egwu aha maka ihe ndị a Afro Café song, Nedbank's Ke Yona “Making the Team', SABC 1’s Making Moves, Sunday Chillas, Mzansi Insider, Koze Kuse, The Remix SA, The Sing Off South Africa na Business Battle
SA, The Sing Off South Africa na Business Battle
N'afọ 2014, a kpọrọ Lebo onye na-emepụta usoro na onye nduzi egwu maka Oge 10 nke Afro Café
O dekwara egwu isiokwu, duzie egwu na egwu studio maka ihe ngosi ETV 'I love South Africa'
Ọ na-emekwa olu; ọ bụ olu n'azụ egwu isiokwu maka Africa Magic, Africa Magic Plus maka DStv na egwu ọhụrụ LOTTO 'Otu ụbọchị bụ otu ụbọchị'

N'ihe banyere njikọ nke okpukpe agbụrụ dị iche iche nke Nigeria, agbụrụ ndị Hausa dị na mgbago ugwu bụkarị ndị Alakụba, agbụrụ ndị Yoruba dị n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ kewara n'etiti ndị Kristian na ndị Alakụba nwere ọtụtụ ndị na-agbaso okpukpe ọdịnala, ebe ndị Igbo nke ọwụwa anyanwụ na ndị Ijaw nọ na ndịda bụkarịrị ndị otu Kristi nwere ụfọdụ ndị na-eme okpukpe ọdịnala
Ogwe dị n'etiti Nigeria nwere ọtụtụ agbụrụ dị obere na Nigeria na ha bụ ndị Kristian na Ndị Kraịst na-atụgharị, yana ndị otu okpukperechi ọdịnala nwere ndị Alakụba ole na ole

Ebe ugwu Naịjirịa abụwokwa ebe ọgụ esemokwu ndị Alakụba na- aga n'ihu nke butere ọnwụ na ngagharị nke ọtụtụ iri puku mmadụ
Ndabere na atụmatụ 2018 na World Factbook nke CIA, ọnụọgụ ndị mmadụ nwere ihe dịka 535% Alakụba, 459% Ndi Kraịst (106% Roman Katọlik na 353% Ndị Kraịst ọzọ), na 06% dịka ndị ọzọ
Na akụkọ 2019 nke Pew Research Center wepụtara na 2015 e mere atụmatụ na ndị Alakụba ruru 50% ebe ọnụọgụ ndị Kristian bụ 481%
Nzukọ Pew na akụkọ 2010 jiri akụkọ tụnyere ọtụtụ ebe

Na 2008 Ịtụ igwe mmadu na nyocha ahuike nke ndị bekee kpọrọ (DHS) choputara 53% Alakuba, 45% Ndị Kraịst, na 2% ndi ozo; na nghoputa nke Afrobarometer nke 2008 choputara 49% Christian, 50% Muslim, na 1% ndi ozo; Nyocha nke Pew hụrụ 52% Muslim, 46% Christian, na 1% ndị ọzọ

Ndị Kraịst ndịda bi na mgbago ugwu, ọkachasị na obodo ndị ka buo ibu, nwere ọgbakọ na ụka hibere n'oge 1920

Nkwenkwe Africa na ịgba afa na amoosu bụ ikike ọjọọ nke a na-anakwere nchebe megide; ememe okpukpe na-ekpo ọkụ ma nwee mmụọ, na-emesi ike itinye aka onwe onye na ịnakwere mmụọ

Aderemi Waheed Babalola bụ onye na-echekwa ego na onye bụbu onye ozi nke Federal Republic of Nigeria
A mụrụ ya na Ibadan, Oyo State, ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Prospect High School, Ibadan, Yango State nke Nigeria n'afọ 1975, nweta asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ West African (Division 1) n'afọ 1980
Ọ gara Oyo State College of Arts & Science (OSCAS) maka ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu ya na agụmakwụkwọ dị elu n'afọ 1980
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1982, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ HSC na Cambridge na-agafe atọ na nke ọ bụla
Remi gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ibadan, Oyo State n'etiti afọ 1982 n'afọ 1986 dugara n'inye nzere bachelọ (nke nwere nsọpụrụ) na akụ na ụba ugbo
N'agbata afọ 1991 na afọ 1993, ọ gara Mahadum Lagos, Akoka Lagos ebe ọ nwetara nzere masta na Banking na Finance
Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Lagos Business School (LBS), Remi gụsịrị akwụkwọ Advance Management Programme na LBS n'afọ 2000
Na mgbakwunye, Remi sonyere na ụlọ ọrụ, ọmụmụ ihe, nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe na mmemme n'oge ọrụ onwe ya na nke ọha na eze
Remi arụwo ọrụ n'ọhịa dị iche iche dị ka nyocha ego na ụgwọ, ego azụmaahịa, ụlọ akụ itinye ego, njikwa ego, ọrụ ụlọ akụ mba ụwa na mpaghara

N'oge gara aga, onye na-ahụ maka ego na onye isi atụmatụ nke Zenith Bank, Remi bụ onye na-elekọta atụmatụ na usoro mmefu ego zuru oke, akụ na ụba ụlọ na nkwado nchịkwa mgbanwe mba ọzọ, yana ịmepụta na nhazi nke echiche ụlọ ọrụ uru
Ahụmahụ ọrụ ya ndị ọzọ gara aga gụnyere ịnọ afọ anọ na Arthur Andersen
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka nyocha, ndụmọdụ, ọzụzụ na ọrụ mmepe na Ụlọ ọrụ otu Ụlọ akụ na ego
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Price Waterhouse ruo ọnwa iri na asatọ

Remi bụ onye otu West African Insurance Institute, Chartered Institute of Taxation of Nigeria, Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria, Instituto of Directors of Nigeria, na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọkachamara ndị ọrụ banki Nigeria

Remi bụ ugbu a Pro-chancellor na Onye isi oche nke Kansụl Na-achịkwa nke Mahadum KolaDaisi, Ibadan, Oyo Steeti, mahadum nke onwe kwadoro site na National Universities Commission of Nigeria na Nọvemba 2016
Ọ nọkwa na Board of Trustees nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

Remi nọkwa na Bọd Ndụmọdụ nke Apis Partners, onye ESGI-native global private equity and venture capital asset manager nke na-akwado ọrụ ego na azụmaahịa akụrụngwa ego site n'inye ha ego na-akpali uto uto uto

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na Swede Control Limited, nwetara ọtụtụ òkè na Law Union na Rock Insurance PLC n'afọ 2012
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa na-abụghị onye isi oche, osote onyeisi oche ma mesịa bụrụ onyeisi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ịnshọransị (nke bụzi Tangerine General) ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ n'afọ 2020
N'April 30, 2021, Central Bank of Nigeria họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ bu FBN Holdings PLC, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya ruo mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na Disemba 17, 2021
Ọ bụ Minista nke State maka ego nke Federal Republik nke Naijiria, site na July 26, 2007 ruo September 16, 2010
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2008, a họpụtara Remi ka ọ bụrụ minista na-ahụ maka isi obodo gọọmentị etiti, na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya dị ka minista na ụtụ isi; ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọkwa mbụ ruo na ngwụcha afọ 2008
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye ozi n'ihi ọrụ aka n'ihi iwe nke nkwupụta ya na ikike mmanụ ala steeti mebiri
N'ịgbaso nkwupụta ya banyere enweghị ego nke mmanụ, a kpọpụrụ Remi na ngalaba na-ahụ maka ego gaa na ngalaba na'ọrụ pụrụ iche, mmepe nke dugara n'ịgba arụkwaghịm ozugbo dị ka minista nke mba etiti

Oge Remi nọ n'ụlọ ọrụ ọha na ndị nọ na ikike ochichi gosipụtara nchegbu banyere nghọta nke malitere na ya bụ otu n'ime ndị ọrụ gọọmentị etiti mbụ na nchịkwa Umar Yar'Adua (2007/2011) iji kwupụta akụ ya
Ilekwasị anya a n'imeziwanye usoro nchịkwa mmefu ego ọha na eze mere ka o guzobe ihe mgbochi na mwepụ na-ezighị ezi site na isi iyi ego sitere na gọọmentị mpaghara na nke obodo

Remi bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke First Bank of Nigeria na-ahụ maka azụmahịa Lagos na odida anyanwu yana ụlọ akụ ndị ahịa na ịkwụ ụgwọ eletrọniki ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka Minista Na-asọpụrụ maka ego na July 26, 2007
Remi bụ osote onye isi njikwa (DGM) na onye isi nke ụlọ ọrụ na-eme atụmatụ na nhazi otu nke ụlọ akụ ahụ tupu nhọpụta ya na Board
Ihe kachasị mkpa nke ọrụ ya bụ itinye aka n'ịtụgharị First Bank ka ọ bụrụ 'Onye ndu doro anya' nke Naịjirịa Odida obodo ego
Remi bụ onye isi njikwa na Zenith Bank Limited tupu FirstBank achụ ya isi
Na Zenith Bank, ọ rịgooro site na osote onye njikwa ruo onye isi njikwa, ihe karịrị afọ iri nke ọrụ ụlọ akụ
Ọ na-etinye aka nke ukwuu na ọrụ ebere, ntụziaka na inye ikike / mmepe nke obere ụlọ ọrụ na nke dị n'etiti site na Remi Babalola Initiatives Incorporated
N'afọ 2009, Remi nwetara US $ 1 nde iji wuo ụlọ ọgwụ ọkaibe (nke a maara dị ka Remi Babalola Red Cross Medical Centre) maka ndị otu Nigerian Red Cross na Ibadan, isi obodo Oyo State
Ebe ahụ akwadowo nnyefe nke ọrụ ahụike isi na Ibadan
Chief Victor Babaremilekun Adetokunboh Fani-Kayode, QC, SAN, CON (1921 ruo 1995) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, onye ogo ọchịchị nweta ama ama, onye otu mba, onye ọchịchị na onye ọka iwu

A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi ala nke mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa n'afọ 1963 ma rụọ ọrụ dị mkpa na akụkọ ihe mere eme na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Naịjarịa site na ngwụcha afọ 1940 ruo 1995
DeFani-Kayode si n'ezinụlọ ife nke Yoruba a ma ama ma bú ndị gụrụ akwụkwọ nke ọma nke , nke sitere na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Nna nna ya, Rev
Emmanuel Adedapo Kayode, bụ onye ụkọchukwu Anglican, onye nwetara nzere Master of Arts na koleji Fourah Bay , nke n'oge ahụ bụ akụkụ nke Mahadum Durham
Nke a mere n'afọ 1885
Nna ya, Victor Adedapo Kayode, gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu ma gụsịa akwụkwọ na Selwyn College, Cambridge na 192
A kpọrọ ya na Middle Temple na 1922, o wee gaa n'ihu bụrụ onye ọka iwu a ma ama na onye ọka ikpe, na Naịjirịa
Nne ya bụ Mrs
Aurora Kayode, nke a mụrụ Fanimokun, onye bụ nwa nwanyị nke Rev
Joseph Fanimokun, onye ụkọchukwu Anglịkan
O nwetakwara nzere Master of Arts na koleji Fourah Bay ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi nke CMS Grammar School a ma ama na Lagos, na-eje ozi site na afo 1896 ruo 1914
Nke a bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ụka nke Bishọp Samuel Ajayi Crowther guzobere
N'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1958, o nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịzije arịrịọ maka nnwere onwe Naịjirịa na Federal House of Assembly na Lagos

O kwuru na nnwere onwe kwesịrị ịpụta ihe n'abalị abụọ nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 1960 (minutes nke Hansard, 1958; Richard Sklar's 'Nigeria's political parties Power in an Emergent African Nation', World Press, p
269), Prọfesọ Onabamiro's 'Glimpses in Nigeria's History', p
N'afọ 1959, e nwere nzukọ ọzọ e mere na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu Naijiria, na-arịọ maka obere mmezigharị nke atụmatụ Fani-Kayode nke ọnwa Julai, afọ 1958

Nkwupụta ọhụrụ a, nke Sir Abubakar Tafawa Balewa kpaliri, rịọrọ na ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel, afọ 1960 maka nnwere onwe, nke ndị omebe iwu nabatara ma kwado na nke ndị ọchịchị Britain kwadoro, ga-ebugharị site na nke abụọ n'ọnwa Epreli nke afọ ahụ gaa na nke mbụ n'ọktoba
Nzukọ omebe iwu mechara kwado ma kwado atụmatụ mmezigharị a ma ndị Britain kwenyekwa ya
Nke ahụ bụ otu ụbọchị nnwere onwe Naịjirịa, nke Ọktoba afo 1960, si rute
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ King, dị na Lagos, Remilekun Fani-Kayode gara Downing College na Mahadum Cambridge, n'afọ 1941
O mere ule British Bar wee bụrụ onye kachasị n'afọ ya maka British Commonwealth dum
A kpọrọ ya na The British Bar na Middle Temple n'afọ 1945, wee gaa n'ihu ka a họpụta ya dị ka Queen's Counsel na 1960 (ọ bụ onye Naijiria nke atọ na nke kachasị nta ka e mere QC)
Mgbe e mesịrị, e mere ya onye isi ọka iwu nke Naijiria na 1977 (ọ bụ onye Naijiria nke atọ e mere SAN)
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọka iwu Naijiria mbụ na 1948, ya na Chief Frederick Rotimi Williams na Chief Bode Thomas, ndị ọka iwu abụọ, bụ ndị a zụrụ na Mahadum Cambridge na London, n'otu n'otu
A na-akpọ ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọka iwu ha guzobere 'Thomas, Williams na Kayode'
N'afọ 1970, ya na enyi ya ochie, Chief Sobo Sowemimo SAN
guzobere ụlọ ọrụ iwu ọzọ a na-akpọ 'Fani-Kayode na Sowemimo'
Chief Remilekun Fani-Kayode keere òkè dị mkpa n'ọgụ maka nnwere onwe Naịjirịa
N'afọ 1952, ya na Rotimi Williams, Bode Thomas na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ, ndị ọchịchị Britain jidere ya maka ọrụ siri ike na nke na-akpali akpali na ọgụ megide ndị Britain
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ndú nke ngalaba ndị ntorobịa Action Group n'afọ 1954
O guzobere ngalaba ndị ntorobịa maka otu ahụ, ndị na-eyi 'uwe ojii' ma jiri 'mosquito' dị ka ihe nnọchianya ha iji gosipụta nlelị ha maka ọchịchị ndị Britain
Ọzọkwa, n'afọ 1954, a họpụtara Oloye Fani-Kayode n'ime Ụlọ Nzukọ Federal na ikpo okwu nke Chief Obafemi Awolowo's Action Group, ọ gara n'ihu na ọgụ ya maka nnwere onwe Naịjirịa site n'ebe ahụ
Ọ bụ osote odeakwụkwọ gọọmentị etiti nke Action Group ma n'ihe gbasara nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa, ya na odeakwụkwọ gọọmenti etiti, Chief Ayo Rosiji, na nhazi na nchịkwa nke Action Group
Ya, ya na Chief Awolowo, S
Ighodaro, E
Eyo, Adeyemi Lawson na S
Ikoku, nọchitere anya Action Group n'afọ 1957 nke ọgbakọ London Constitution

N'afọ 1957, ọ duziri otu ndị ọka iwu Action Group, bụ ndị na-anọchite anya ma lụọ ọgụ maka ndị dị nta nke ndịda ugwu na ndị dị nta nke Willinks Commission na ọchụchọ ha maka ịmepụta mpaghara etiti, nke a ga-esi na Northern Region nke Nigeria
N'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1958, ọ kwagara arịrịọ maka nnwere onwe Naịjirịa na Federal House of Assembly (minutes of Hansard, 1958; p
269; Prọfesọ Onabamiro's 'Perspectives on Nigeria's History', p
N'afọ 1959, Remilekun Fani-Kayode gbara arụkwaghịm n'òtù Action Group wee sonye na National Council nke Nigeria na Cameroon, otu ndị mmegide
N'afọ 1960, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ndú nke NCNC na Western House of Assembly
N'afọ 1963, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi ala nke mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naijiria n'okpuru Chief Samuel Akintola, na nchịkọta nke Nigerian National Democratic Party
A họpụtakwara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara gọọmentị ime obodo maka mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ n'otu afọ ahụ

N'isi ụtụtụ nke abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Jenụwarị, afọ 1966, Major Kaduna Nzeogwu, onye ọrụ ndị agha Naijiria nke sitere na Igbo, gbalịrị ime ka ndị agha mbụ wepụ ọchịchị n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naijiria
Mgbalị ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na ọ nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma, kpatara ọtụtụ ọbara na ọtụtụ ndị isi nke pati na-achị achị, ndị agha na gọọmentị nke ụbọchị ahụ, e ji obi ọjọọ gbuo ha
N'isi ụtụtụ ahụ, ndị nnupụisi, n'okpuru iwu nke Captain Emmanuel Nwobosi, wakporo ma wakpo ụlọ Chief Remi Fani-Kayode, osote onye isi ala nke Western Region
Ndị nnupụisi ahụ mekpọọrọ Fani-Kayode n'ihu ezinụlọ ya na n'ihu nwa ya nwoke, Femi Fani- Kayode, onye ga-aghọ Minista Naịjirịa nke Ụgbọelu afọ iri anọ ka e mesịrị
Ha wee kpọrọ ya gaa n'ebe a na-amaghị ama
Mgbe ha hapụsịrị ụlọ Fani-Kayode, ndị nnupụisi ahụ, na Fani- Kayode n'aka ha, gara Ibadan n'ụlọ nke Chief SL
Akintola, onye bụ Premier nke Western Region
Ha batakwara n'ụlọ ya, ma gbuo ya n'ihu ezinụlọ ya
Ha merụkwara nwa nwa ya na nwunye nwa ya ahụ
Chief Fani-Kayode hụrụ ogbugbu nke enyi ya SL
Akintola site n'aka ndị nnupụisi, ma site n'ebe ahụ, a kpọgara ya n'ogige ndị agha na Lagos, ebe ha mekwara ndokwa ka ha gbuo ya
Otú ọ dị, ọ dabara ya nke ọma, mgbe ha rutere n'ogige ndị agha Ikeja na Lagos, ndị agha na-akwado ya n'okpuru iwu nke Lt
Col meriri ndị nnupụisi ahụ, merie ha ma gbuo ha
Yakubu Gowon (onye mechara bụrụ Onye isi ala Naịjirịa)
Ndị na-akwado ya tọhapụrụ Fani-Kayode ma debe ya n'ụlọ dị nchebe ruo mgbe e weghachiri iwu na usoro na mba ahụ
Ndị agha na-akwado ọchịchị ahụ mere ka mgbalị ahụ kwụsị n'ụzọ dị irè ma gbuo ma ọ bụ jide ndị isi ya niile ma jide ha

N'ime ndị isi gọọmentị na ndị isi ndị agha niile a wakporo n'ụlọ ha ma jide ha site n'aka ndị nnupụisi na ndị na-agba ọchịchị mgba okpuru n'abalị ahụ, gụnyere Sir Ahmadu Bello (Prime Minister), Sir Abubakar Tafawa Balewa (Prime Minista), Chief Okotie-Eboh (Minista nke Ego), General Maimalari (Chief of Army Staff), Brigadier Ademulegun(Commander of the Northern Garrison) na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Chief Remi Fani-Kayode, tinyere Sir Kashim Ibrahim (Gọvanọ nke Northern Region) bụ naanị ndị a na-egbughị

N'ihi ya, General Johnson Aguiyi-Ironsi weghaara ike site n'aka ndị fọdụrụ na gọọmentị Tafawa Balewa na'abalị iri na isii nke ọnwa Jenụwarị, ụbọchị mgbe o jisiri ike mebie nnupụisi na nnupụis nke Major Nzeogwu
Mgbe ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye isi ala nke Federal Republic of Nigeria na onye isi ndị agha Naịjirịa
Otú ọ dị, ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị, a chụpụrụ ya n'ọchịchị nke ọma n'ebe ugwu, nke e mere na abalị iri abụọ na itoolu nke onwa Julaị afọ 1966, nke Lt
Col
duziri
Murtala Mohammed na Lt
Col
Yakubu Gowon (dị ka ha dị n'oge ahụ)

N'oge nnupụisi ahụ, ndị agha ugwu n'okpuru Major Theophilus Danjuma jidere General Johnson Aguiyi-Ironsi na Ibadan, ya na onye ọbịa ya, General Adekunle Fajuyi, na ndị agha ugwu nọ n'okpuru iwu nke Major Theophileus Danjuma (dị ka ọ dị n'oge ahụ)
A chụpụrụ ndị ikom abụọ ahụ ma kpọga ha n'ọhịa dị n'akụkụ ụzọ, ebe a na-eyi ha ọtọ ma gbaa ha égbè
Nke a bụ obi ọjọọ nke 'ịbọ ọbọ' nke ugwu nke abalị iri abụọ na itoolu nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1966, nke na e gburu ihe karịrị ndị isi ndị agha Igbo narị atọ na ndị na-abụghị ndị ọrụ

Nke a bụ n'ihi eziokwu ahụ bụ na, n'etiti ọtụtụ mkpesa ndị ọzọ, ndị isi ndị agha ugwu nwere echiche na General Aguiyi-Ironsi nwere obi ụtọ na Major Nzeogwu na ndị nnupụisi ibe ya, mgbe abalị iri ise nke ọnwa Jenụwarị Igbo nwara iwe ọchịchị nke ọtụtụ ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị (Hausa 化 Fulani) na ọdịda anyanwụ (Yoruba) ji obi ọjọọ gbuo ndị isi ndị isi agha
Ihe ndị isi ndị agha ugwu na-enyo enyo na e nwere nkwekọrịta na nghọta n'etiti otu Nzeogwu na General Aguiyi-Ironsi, bụ eziokwu ahụ bụ na Aguiyi -Ironsi bụ onye agbụrụ Igbo

Afọ iri anọ ka e gbusịrị ya, nwa Aguiyi-Ironsi, Thomas Aguiyi -Ironsi، ga-aghọ Minista Nchebe Naijiria ma weghara ọnọdụ ahụ site n'aka General Theophilus Danjuma, nwoke gburu nna ya afọ iri anọ gara aga

Ọtụtụ ndị ekwuola na atụmatụ nke ndị ọrụ gọọmentị ugwu nke July 1966, nke butere ogbugbu nke General Aguiyi-Ironsi na ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ndị ọzọ sitere n'aka ndị Igbo na nke mechara bute agha obodo Naijiria, bụ nke akpara n'abalị nke ụbọchị iri na ise nke ọnwa Jenụwarị , site na nkwafu ọbara nke Major Nzeogwu na ndị ikom ya, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị Igbo

Mgbe nwalee ogbugbu nke ndi ọchịchị nke mbụ na Naịjirịa na Jenụwarị ụbọchị iri na ise, 1966, Remilekun Fani-Kayode na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ a ma ama bụ ndị gọọmentị ndị agha nke General Johnson Aguiyi-Ironsi jidere
E mechara tọhapụ ha na ọnwa July 1966, mgbe nnupụisi nke ndị ugwu, nke Lt
Col
Murtala Muhammed na Major Theophilus Danjuma
Mgbe Lt
Col
Yakubu Gowon ghọrọ Onye isi ala Naịjirịa, Remilekun Fani-Kayode hapụrụ Naịjirị na ezinụlọ ya dum wee kwaga n'obodo ezumike dị n'akụkụ osimiri nke Brighton na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ England
Ha guzobere ụlọ ma biri n'ebe ahụ na mba ọzọ ruo ọtụtụ afọ
N'afọ 1978, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere ma bụrụ onye ọsụ ụzọ nke National Party nke Nigeria
N'afọ 1979, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke pati ahụ ma n'ịghọta onyinye ya na mmepe mba, Onye isi ala Shehu Shagari nyere ya nsọpụrụ nke Commander of the Order of the Niger

N'agbata afọ 1990 na afọ 1994, ọ bụ onye otu ndị okenye nke National Republican Convention (NRC), otu n'ime òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị abụọ nke gọọmentị ndị agha nke General Ibrahim Babangida guzobere n'oge mba nke atọ nke Naịjirịa

Mgbe a kagburu ntuli aka onye isi ala nke Chief Moshood Abiola 'abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa June afọ 1993, Chief Remilekun Fani-Kayode bụ otu n'ime ndị, bụ ndị dere n'ihu ọha ma kwuo okwu siri ike megide nkagbu ahụ
Ọbụna ọ gara ụlọ ikpe maka okwu ahụ
N'afọ 1994, gọọmentị nke General Sanni Abacha họpụtara ya n'ime ndị ọka ikpe Kayode Eso nke nyocha, nke nyochara ma nyere aka mee ka ụlọ ikpe Naijiria dị ọcha ma wepụ ndị ọkàikpe rụrụ arụ
Chief Remilekun Fani-Kayode lụrụ nwanyị aha ya bụ Chief (Mrs) Adia Adunni Fani-Kayode

Chief Remilekun Fani-Kayode nwekwara ụmụ anọ ọzọ Mrs

Aderemi Raji-Oyelade (amụrụ n'afọ 1961) bụ onye Naijiria na-ede uri, na-ede akwụkwọ n'asụsụ Bekee
A maara yà nkè ọma site na aha édémédé ya, Remi Raji

Ónyé Salzburg Fellow na prọfesọ na-eleta na ónyé édémédé n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ, n'etiti ha Southern Illinois University na Edwardsville, Mahadum California na Riverside na Irvine, Mahadim Cape Town, South Africa, na Mahadum Cambridge, UK, Raji ebipụtala édémédé agụmakwụkwọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ gụnyere Research in African Literatures and African Literature Today
Ọ gụrụ uri ya n'ọtụtụ ébé n'Africa, Europe na America
N'afọ 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé edemede ọbịa na obodo Stockholm, Sweden

Mpịakọta nké uri ya gụnyere Webs of Remembrance (2001), Shuttlesongs America A poetic guided tour (2003), Lovesong for My Wasteland (2005), Gather My Blood Rivers of Song (2009) nà Sea of My Mind (2013)
A sụgharịrị ọrụ ndị Raji n'asụsụ French, German, Catalan, Swedish, Ukrainian, Latvian, Croatian na Hungarian
Ọ bụ ónyé Alexander von Humboldt Scholar na Mahadum Humboldt, Berlin, Germany
A họpụtara Remi Raji dị ka odeakwụkwọ mgbasa ozi nke isi nke Oyo State nke Association of Nigerian Authors (ANA) n'afọ 1989
Ọnọdụ nke abụọ a họpụtara ya bụ dịka osote ónyé isi oche nke ANA na 1997
Ọ ghọrọ ónyé isi oche nke ANA site n'afo 1998 ruo afọ 2000, na nhọpụta nke Dr
Wale Okediran na kọmitii ntụziaka mba nke ANA
Raji jere ozi dị ka Ónyé nchịkọta akụkọ Afọ 2000 nke ANA Review, akwụkwọ akụkọ gọọmentị nke njikọ ahụ
N'ụbọchị nke atọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2011, n'ogè emume ncheta afọ iri atọ nke ntọala Association of Nigerian Authors, a họpụtara Remi Raji dị ka ónyé isi oche nke iri na otu nke ANA
